23b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs/ /sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi/ /gsum sel mdza' yas grol gsum thob/ /sgrib pa kun las nges par grol/ /mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das/ /zhes smos te/ gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas
23b6(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa lnga ma spangs rang sar grol te/ ye shes lngar snang ba ste/ bum pa la sogs pa'i dpang la ltos pa ma yin te/ ye shes gcig rdzogs kyi dbang zhes bya'o/ /gzhi rig pa gcig la snang tshul ye shes kyi brgyan pa de shin tu mdzes pa'i phyir cod pan no/ /de yang/
23b7(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis chos la dbang thob na rdzas tshig mtshan ma'i dpang rnams kun/ /ma bskur kyang ni thob par 'gyur/ zhes pa lta bu'o/ /ye shes lnga'i gzugs brnyan sangs rgyas lngar shar te/ gsal zhing mdzes pa'i phyir rgyan zhes bya'o/ /sdug bsngal 'di gsum du 'dus/
24a1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar byam pas sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang/ 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang gsum zhi la/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyang dug gsum du 'dus te/ des sel zhing spong ngo/ /de gsum bsal nas 'gro ba mdza' yas pa'i don myas?
24a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ 'gro ba nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang gsum thob par byed do/ /khyad par du sku gsum la bya'o/ /de yang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang/ shes bya'i sgrib pa kun las grol nas/ nam mkha' lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid la gnas te/ de phan
24a3(rgyud 'grel): chod nyon mongs pa'i dri ma las 'das pa'o/ /de ltar rtogs pa'i ngo bo ci zhe na/ dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po/ /sems can kun gyi gtso bo che/ /yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod/ /lus kun las ni rnam grol pa/ /nam mkha' i lam la rab gnas pa zhes smos te
24a4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid la dus gsum du dbyer med de/ de yang/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang ma 'ongs de bzhin nyid/ /da ltar de bzhin nyid 'di thams cad bye brag med ces pa lta bu'o/ /de ltar rtogs pa ni sems can kun las ches khyad par 'phags pas gtso bo che ba'o/ /de
24a5(rgyud 'grel): yang/ 'jig rten pa bas nyan thos yon tan che la/ de las kyang rang rgyal ba/ de las kyang byang chub sems dpa' / de bas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan che ba rnams zhes bya'o/ /thod ni yon tan gyis mdzes par brgyan pa'o/ /de las kyang thod ltar mdzes shing
24a6(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gyur pa ni rje btsun nyid do/ /de ltar 'gro ba'i lus kun tu skye ba grol nas nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes la gnas so/ /'o na 'gro ba'i don ji ltar mdzad na/ yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang/ /khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi bdag /dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste/
24a7(rgyud 'grel): bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /byed pa sems can kun don byed/ /phan 'dod sems can mnyes shin pa/ /zhes pa smos te/ gzhan don 'byung ba'i dpe yid bzhin nor bu la yang chos brgyad de/ sems can gyi dgos 'dod 'byung ba dang/ de yang gsol ba ma btab
24b1(rgyud 'grel): na mi 'byung ba dang/ btab na 'byung ba dang/ dus su 'byung ba dang/ ji ltar 'tsham par 'byung ba dang/ zad mi shes par 'byung ba dang/ rtog pa med par 'byung ba dang/ phyi lan la re ba med pa'o/ /de dang 'dra ba'i yon tan rin po che lta bu des kun la khyab pa'i bdag nyid do/ /yang? dpegs?
24b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam shing dang 'dra ste/ de la yang chos bcu ste/ snga ma brgyad kyi khar bsil ba dang/ 'gro ba ngal sos pa'i gnas su gyur pa lta bu bcu'o/ /yang bum pa bzang po bsgrub pa dang 'dra ste/ de la chas bcu ste/ snga ma brgyad kyi khar/ bsgrubs na 'byung ba dang/ ma bsgrubs na mi 'byung ba
24b3(rgyud 'grel): dang bcu'o/ /de yang bum pa bzang po dang ni dpag bsam shing/ /yid bzhin nor rnams sems dang mi ldan pas/ /sems can rnams kyi don ni 'byung 'gyur na/ /thugs rje cher mnga' rgyal ba smos ci dgos/ /zhes pa lta bu'o/ /de lta bu gcig pa'i ma ltar phan 'dogs pa'o/ /
24b4(rgyud 'grel): nges 'dul bya'i bsam pa ji ltar mkhyen ce na/ bzang ngan shes shing dus shes la/ /khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan/ /dus shes sems can dbang po shes/ /rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po/ /yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes/ zhes smos te/ las
24b5(rgyud 'grel): bzang ngan shes shing/ de'i 'bras bu dus ji tsam na 'byung shes la/ thugs rjes kun la khyab pa'i bdag po gzhan gyi dam tshig kyang shes la/ rang yang de kho na las mi 'da' ba' i dam tshig ldan pa'o/ /don mdzad pa'i tshe 'dul ba'i dus tshod shes shing sems can gyi dbang bo
24b6(rgyud 'grel): rab 'bring za ma dang/ dad pa dang brtson 'grus rab 'bring tha ma'i don shes pa'o/ /de yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' bas/ nyan thos dang/ rang rgyal ba dang/ theg pa chen po dang rnam grol gsum sa mkhas? pa'o/ /sku dang ye shes stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs
24b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yon tan dang/ rje btsun nyid kyang ldan zhing/ nyan thos dang/ rang rgyal ba la sogs pa'i rgyud la yod pa'i yon tan rnams kyang shes pa'o/ /de ltar gyur pa'i bkra shis pa'i dam par bstan pa'i phyir/ /chos zhes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung/ /bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis?
25a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge/ dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che/ /dga' chen mol mo chen bo ste/ zhes smos te/ de ltar chos kyi don shes bas tshe 'dir yang legs pa'i yon tan kun 'byung bas bkra shis la/ phyi mar yang
25a2(rgyud 'grel): legs pa'i yon tan kun 'byung bas bkra shis 'byung ngo/ /'jig rten pa'i cho ring ba dang/ nor dang rigs rgyud 'phel ba la sogs pa bkra shis pa rnams kyi nang na yang bkra shis dam par 'gyur ro/ /khams gsum du grags shing legs pa'i yon tan
25a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bas grags pa'i bkra shis so/ /mi dge ba las 'o gnas dge ba sna tshogs la zhugs pas snyan grag dge ba'o/ /'gro ba rnams thar pa'i lam du dbugs 'byin pas kun dga' ba'i chos kyi ston mo chen po mdzad cing/ zag med kyi bde ba thob
25a4(rgyud 'grel): pas dga' chen/ 'dod pa'i yon tan mi spong bas rol mo chen po zhes bya'o/ /des 'gro ba skyob pa'i tshul ni/ bkur sti rim 'gro phun sum tshogs/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i grags dag dpal/ /mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste/ /skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su
25a5(rgyud 'grel): bos/ 'jig rten dgra ste rab kyi mchog /'jigs pa ma lus sel ba bo zhes smos te/ kun gyis bkur ba dang/ rim gror bya ba'i 'os ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi gter du gyur pa/ mchog tu 'gro ba'i don la
25a6(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba/ khams gsum du grags shing tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas dpal te/ yon tan gyi skal pa mchog dang ldan zhing/ gzhan la yang mchog ster ba'i gtso bor gyur pa'o/ /des sdug bsngal ba rnams 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las skyob cing de las lhag pa med pas
25a7(rgyud 'grel): skyobs su 'os ba'o/ /ci las skyob cem 'jig rten gyi rtog pa dgra yin te/ nge las skyob pa'o/ /de yang 'jig rten las rab tu gyur pas nyan thos so/ /de las rab tu gyur pas rang rgyal lo/ /de las rab tu gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' / de dag las kyang mchog tu gyur ba rje btsun no/ /nges
25b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa'o/ /mu stegs kyi cha byad kyis 'dul ba la der sbrul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir/ /gtsug phud phud bu lcang lo can/ /ral pa mun dza cod pan can/ /gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan/ /zur phud lnga pa me tog thong/ ces smos te/ gtsug
25b2(rgyud 'grel): phud ni kha spu gzhar bregs nas spyi bor gtsug phud tsam 'dzin pa 'dul ba der sprul/ /phung bu ni skra gzhar bregs nas dpral bar bcings pa'o/ /lcang lo can ni skra sil pu ring ba'o/ /ral ba ni ra la ba sogs kha non ba ni/ lta chen po la dad pa rnams kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'o/ /mun
25b3(rgyud 'grel): dza ni rkang sor slebs pa'i ral ba ske rags su bcings pa'o/ /cod pan ni dar la sogs pa thod du bcings pa'o/ /tha ma cod pan du 'phur ba'o/ /gdong lnga ni phyogs bzhi na gdong pa ba ni/ spyi bo'i gtsug na gcig ste lnga'o/ /gdong bzhi nas rig byed kyi sgra bzhi 'don te/ shar nas nges brjod kyi rig
25b4(rgyud 'grel): byed/ lho nas mchod brjod kyi rig byed/ /nub nas snyan dngags kyi rig byed/ byang nas srid bsrung gi rig byed 'don pa'o/ /de lar tshangs pa gdong lnga ba lta bus 'dul ba der sgrul lo/ /yang mgo la gtsug phud lnga dang ldan pa mu stegs gzegs zan gyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba la der
25b5(rgyud 'grel): sprul lo/ /yang mgo la rin po che'i zur phung lnga yod pa dri za'i gzugs kyis 'dul bal der sprul lo/ /yang mgo la me tog gi thong bcings pas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gzugs kyis 'dul bal der spru'o/ /'o na sangs rgyas pa'i brtul zhugs ji ltar 'dzin zhe na/ mgo
25b6(rgyud 'grel): zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang/ /tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog /dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che/ /gtsang gnas dam pa go'u ta ma/ /bram ze tshangs ba shes zhes smos te/ shAkya thub pa lta bu'i rab tu byung bas 'dul ba la mgo zlum du sbrul nas gnod pa las zlog pa'i
25b7(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs 'dzin par mdzad do/ /yang tshangs par sbyong ba'i sdom pa la gnas shing brtul zhugs 'dzin pas 'dul ba la der ston to/ /shAkya thub pa chu bo nai raM dzA rar dka' thub mdzad pa lta bu la yang der ston to/ /gau ta ma ni shAkya'i rigs te/ gtsang spra la gnas pa rgyal rigs su?
26a1(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa dang/ rang bzhin gyi dka' thub dang/ gtsang sbra la gnas pa bram ze lta bur kyang sbrul pa mdzad de/ nyid la nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pas tshangs pa/ gzhan skyon dang bral ba'i thabs shes pas tshangs pa shes zhes bya'o/ /de ltar sprul pa'i phan yon ci zhe na/ mya
26a2(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'das pa tshangs pa thob/ /grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus/ /rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid/ /mya ngan 'das pa mya ngan 'das/ /legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye/ /bde sdug sel ba mthar gyur pa/ zhes smos te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang bral bas mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /de nyid la zhen pa dang bral
26a3(rgyud 'grel): bas tshangs pa thob pa'o/ /de ltar 'ching ba mdza' dag las grol zhing thar nas ye shes kyi sku thor ste/ des yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i rten byed pas lus zhes bya'o/ /de ltar nyon mongs pa las grol zhing sbros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad zhi bas zhi ba'o/ /zhi bde nyid las myang ngan las
26a4(rgyud 'grel): 'das ba'i chos kyi yon tan rnams 'byung ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni nyan thos kyi lam mo/ /mya ngan las 'das pa phyi ma ni rang rgyal ba'i lam mo/ /legs par mya ngan las 'das pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so/ /bde ba mya ngan las 'das ba'i mdza' dang/ sdug bsngal
26a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i mdza' gnyis sel te/ mthar gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas nyid do/ /gzhi'i gnas lugs rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid du bstan pa'i phyir/ chags bral lus la 'das pa po/ /thub pa med pa dpe med pa/ /mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min
26a6(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po/ /phra zhing zag med sa bon bral/ /rdul med rdul bral dri ma med/ /nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa/ zhes smos te/ yul rnams la chags pa'i glo dang bral ba'i ye shes su snang ba las 'das te /de nyid mi mthun ba'i phyogs stobs
26a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis mi rdzi bas thub pa med do/ /gang dang yang mnyam pa med pas dpe med do/ /'di mtshan nyid dngos po cir yang mi mthong la mtshan ma gang du yang mi snang ste/ rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid du gnas pas don la gsal byed mi dgos te mar me
26b1(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'o/ /'dus ma byas pa'i rkyen gang gis kyang mi 'gyur zhing/ /bde gshegs kyi snying po kun grol des til 'brul la mar bzhin kun la khyab bo/ /rtul pos mi shes pas phra zhing zag pa ste srid par skye pa'i sa bon ma rig pa bdag tu 'dzin pa dang gral ba'o/ /de ltar gzhi la
26b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rtog ba'i rdul dag nas med la/ de ma rtog pa'i blo yang de nyid/ /rtogs na rtogs pa'i rdul dang bral par 'gyur la/ de nyid la yang ma zhen ba'i dri ma med pa'o/ /de ltar sgrib pa gnyis spangs pas nyes pa'i skyon gang yang med pa'o/ /don gnyis su med pa lhun gyis grub pa'i
26b3(rgyud 'grel): tshul ni/ shin tu sad pa sad pa'i bdag/ kun shes kun rig dam pa po/ /rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das/ /ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chad ba/ /rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub/ /ces smos te /sgrib ba gnyis las sang ba 'am/ /yang na snang ba ye shes su sang ba'am/
26b4(rgyud 'grel): sems stong par sad pas ji snyed pa kun shes shing/ ji lta ba rig la/ de yang dbyer med du shes pas dam pa'o/ /de ltar rtog pa dang bral pas rnam par shes ba'i chos nyid kyi klong du 'das pa'o/ /'das pa tsam ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul 'chad ba'o/ /rnam par rtog
26b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bral ba'i ye shes rgyu rkyen med par lhun gyis grub pa ste/ ngo bo lhun grub po/ /de la yon tan thams cad lhun gyis grub pas yon tan lhun grub bo/ /rgyu rkyen gyis ji ltar ma bskyed cen/ dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa/ /sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med/ /dang po'i
26b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rgyud de pa/ ye shes mig gcig dri ma med/ /ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs/ zhes smos te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can 'dren pa'i las mdzed de/ /sangs rgyas la thog ma 'di nas byung bya ba dang/ tha ma 'dir song bya ba med de dang po nyid
26b7(rgyud 'grel): nas rgyu med ba'o/ /de la gnyis 'dzin gyi dri ma med pas ye shes mig gcig go/ ye shes drug ro gcig pa'i lus yin pas de skad bya'o/ /de la gsung gi khyad par ci zhe na/ tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che/ /smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal/ /smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas
27a1(rgyud 'grel): smra ba'i seng ge tshugs pa med/ /ces smos te/ zab cing rgya che ba'i chos gsungs pas tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che'o/ /mu stegs kyi smra ba las mchog tu gyur cing/ nyan thos kyi smra ba zil gyis gnon pas smra ba'i rgyal lo/ /rang rgyal ba'i smra
27a2(rgyud 'grel): ba las 'phags pas dam pa'o/ /skye med kyi sgra chos smra ba'i gong na gzhan med pas mchog gi gnas so/ /de ni seng ge dang 'dra ste bdud la sogs pa'i rgol bas mi tshugs so/ /'o na sku'i cha ba gang zhen/ kun tu lta ba mchog tu dga' / /gzi brjid phung po lta na sdug /'di
27a3(rgyud 'grel): bzangs 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u/ /lag na 'od 'bar snang ba po/ /zhes smos te/ /shes rab dam pas don la lta zhing/ /thugs rje dam pas 'gro ba la gzigs pas kun tu lta'o/ /bde ba chen po 'phags pas mchog tu dga' o/ /gzi brjid chen po gzhan yid du 'ong
27a4(rgyud 'grel): sdug ba'i sku mnga' la/ nang na ye shes drug 'bar bsam rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'i rtags phyi ru 'od kha dog drug 'bar ba'o/ /mtshan thun mong ma yin pa thugs ka na rin po che dpal be'u yis brgyan pa'o/ /phyag las kyang 'od zer 'bar te zhi bas 'dul pa rnams 'dun
27a5(rgyud 'grel): pa skye bar byed la/ des mi 'dul ba rnams tshar gcod pas byed do/ /des 'gro ba'i nad ji ltar sel zhe na/ sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste/ /zug rdu 'byin pa bla na med/ /sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing/ /nad cog gi dgra che gzhes smos te/ sman pa'i mchog ste bdag med
27a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi don bstan nas bdag 'dzin gyi zug rdu 'byin cing/ de yang sman gyi dpe na ljon shing dang 'dra ste/ rtsa ba dang yal ga dang lo 'dab dang me tog la brten nas 'bral bu 'byung ba lter rtsa ba byang chub sems so/ /yal ga ni rtogs par byed pa'i thabs kyi yan lag rnams
27a7(rgyud 'grel): lo ma ni 'dir theg pa so so'i tshigs kyang bkag pa med pa'o/ /me tog ni rtogs pa'i nyam myong ngo/ /'bras bu ni de mthar phyin pa'o/ /der yang ma zad phyi nang gi sman snang chogs su yang sprul lo/ /des dgra phyi nang gi nad sel bar byed do/ /'o na sku'i khyad par ci zhe na/ /sdug gu
27b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog/ dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can zhes smos te/ sems can gyi ngo bo la sdug cing mdzes pa slul nas don mdzad de/ dper na rgyu skar rnams kyi nang na zlab ltar/ /lha dang mi rnams zil gyis gnon pa'o/ /des skyob pa'i thugs rje ji lta bu can
27b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu nam mkha' mdza' gtugs pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs/ /'gro na gdugs cig yangs pa ste/ /byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can/ /dpal ldan pad+ma gar kyi bdag /bya ba bdag chen po rin chen gdugs/ /zhes smos te/ rgya ni phyogs bcu nam
27b3(rgyud 'grel): ma ba'i mdza' dang mnyam par dam pa'i chos sgrogs pa'i mtshan mar rgyal mtshan 'dzugs shing/ gdugs kyis chal dang nyi ma la sogs pa skyob pa lta bu ni/ byams pa dang snying rjer ldan pa'i dbang gis so/ /de yang ma gos pas pad+ma dang 'dra la/ /'gro ba'i 'dren pa'i thabs
27b4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs bskyur ba ni gar dang 'dra'o/ /de yang yon tan rin po che'i gdugs lta bus skyob pa'i bdag po ni rje btsun nyid do/ /ji ltar bstan kyang des pa'i lam gcig las med pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba/ /sangs
27b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa cig ces smos te/ rje btsun nyid las sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid chen po mnga' la/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku rnam pa gsum yang 'chad par mdzed/ thams cad rje btsun gyi sprul pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas
27b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi rnal 'byor tshe/ thabs dang shes rab kyi gtso bor yang bzhugs la/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i chos ji snyed cig gsungs kyang/ yang dag par na gnyis su med par ston pa'i theg pa gcig las med de/ de yang/ theg pa'i sgo ma bsam yas kyang/ /des pa'i don
27b7(rgyud 'grel): du gcig las med ces pa lta bu'o/ /des pa'i don gcig la ye shes lnga ji ltar snang zhe na/ rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal/ rin chen kun bdag phyug ste/ /'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che bu zhes
28a1(rgyud 'grel): smos te/ rdo rje ni tshul mi tshugs pa dang par shes bya 'bigs pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings rtog pa la dbang thob pas/ de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo ste/ des zhe sdang rang kha ma 'dul bar byed pa'o/ /chos thams cad mnyam ba nyid
28a2(rgyud 'grel): du rtogs te/ yon tan rin po che kun la dbang sgyur ba'i bdag po ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rin chen 'byung ldan ngo bo ste/ des nga rgyal dang ser sna rang kha ma 'dul lo/ /des 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyi ngo bo so so ma 'dres pa la gsal ba la dbang sgyur
28a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bdag po ni so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes snang ba mdza' yas kyi ngo bo ste/ des 'dod chags rang kha ma 'dul lo/ /rdo rje ltar 'phrin las thogs ba med par 'chang ba ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes don yod grub pa'i ngo bo ste/ des phrag dog dang le lo rang kha ma
28a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dul lo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa chen po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo ste/ des gti mug rang kha ma 'dul lo/ /de dag kyang sku gsung thugs su 'dus pa'i tshul bstan pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi
28a5(rgyud 'grel): thugs la gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin/ /zhes smos te/ rje btsun gyi thugs ni ye shes drug ro gcig cing mnyam ba ste/ /des sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la khyab cing gnas pa'o/ /de yang shes bya ma lus
28a6(rgyud 'grel): pa mkhyen cing rig pas na thugs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi skur sprul ba yang rje btsun nyid yin pas sku rnams kyi nang na che ba'o/ /de yang khyab cing rten byed pa dang/ snang bas na sku'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung 'byung ba'i rgyu dang ngo bo nyid du yang rje btsun 'gyur
28a7(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ gsum ba dang go bar byed pa dang grags pa'i phyir na gsung de/ /des gzhan don mun ba sel zhir ma gos pa ni/ rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che/ /rdo rje zla ba med 'od/ /chags bral la sogs chags ba che/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ rdo rje
28b1(rgyud 'grel): skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'jin pa/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes/ /zhes smos te/ gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho skems pas nyi mche'o/ /ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bas zla ba'i 'od do/ /chags pa rang kham dang bral zhing don
28b2(rgyud 'grel): dang gdul bya la chas pa'o/ /yang na pha rol tu phyin pas 'dul ba'i gang zag la chags pa dang bral ba'i tshul du chos bshad la/ gsang sngags kyi rigs can la chags ba rang rgyud du sbyod pa'i tshul gyis chos bshad do/ /nang na ye shes dang thugs rje'i 'od 'bar ba'i rtogs/ phyi
28b3(rgyud 'grel): rol du kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od 'bar ba'o/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i rtags su rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams 'gro ba la byams pa'i chos 'dzin pa ni thugs mi rtogs pa'i tshul gyis rang sgrar shar ba la'o/ /nyes skyon dang bral ba ni pad+ma lta bu ste/ de ni sangs rgyas
28b4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi skye gnas su gyur pa'o/ /tshul ji lta bu zhe na/ kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa/ /rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang/ /che ba'i sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang zhes smos te/ shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed ba mkhyen pas kun mkhyen ye shes kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o/ /yon tan gyi bgo skal
28b5(rgyud 'grel): las rgyal ba dang bdud las rgyal zhing sgya ma lta bu'i sprul ba mos pa sna tshogs 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs 'chang ba'o/ /che ba'i yon tan khyad par du gsang sngags kyi ngo bo thabs shes rab dang/ rig sngags kyi ngo bo shes rab dang/ ye shes 'chang ba'o/ /'o na shes rab kyi las gang zhe na/ /rdo rje gnon po
28b6(rgyud 'grel): ral gri che/ /yi ge mchog ste rnam par dge/ theg pa sdug bsngal gcod/ /mchon cha chen po rdo rje chos/ /rdo rje zang mo dzI na dzika/ rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig/ ces smos te/ gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ral gri dang 'dra bas bdag tu rtog ba thams cad gcod cing/ don mi 'gyur ba yi ge dang 'dra ste/ rtog pa'i dri
28b7(rgyud 'grel): bsam gos bas mchog go/ /shes rab snying rjes khyad par byas pas theg pa chen po ste/ de rtogs pas sdug bsngal rtsa ba nas gcod pa'o/ /de gcod pa'i mchon cha ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes lta bu'o/ /de lta bu'i zab mo ni rgyal ba'i yang rgyal bo yin pas dzI dzi go/ shes rab chen po'i blo dang zan
29a1(rgyud 'grel): pas/ shes bya ji lta ba'i don rig pa'o/ /de ltar rig pas gdul bya la rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa ston pa ni pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa/ /sa rnams kun gyi rgyan dang ldan/ /rnam par dag pa bdag med ches/ /yang dag ye shes zla 'od
29a2(rgyud 'grel): bzang/ /brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste/ rgyud chen gyi ni bdag po mchog ces smos te/ rje btsun nyid la pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo rnams kyang rdzogs par mnga' la/ sa bcu'i yon tan gyis kyang brgyan te/ ma gos pas rnam par dag pa bdag med chos so/ /yang dag pa'i
29a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes zla ba'i 'od lta bus ma rig pa dang gdung ba sel cing/ 'gro ba'i don la brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan te/ sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pa sna tshogs ston cing/ khyad par du rgyud thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ston pa'o/ /rtsa ba byang
29a4(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi sems gnyis su med pas rgyal ba kun gyi snying por bstan pa'i phyir/ rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus ldan/ /ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang/ /kun tu bzang po blo gros bzang/ /sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che/ zhes smos
29a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ gzhi chos sku rdo rje lta bu rtogs pa las ye shes kyi sku sna tshogs 'byung zhing bzang ngan dang blang dor gang yang med pas kun tu bzang la/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa mkhyen pas blo gros bzang do/ /sa bzhin du sems can la phan pa'i yon tan bskyed pa'i
29a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir dang/ snod kyi 'jig rten du sprul nas 'gro ba'i don mdzes pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa 'byung ba'i snying po chen por gyur pa'o/ /snying po de la sprul pa tshul ji ltar 'byung ba ni/ sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog
29a7(rgyud 'grel): dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin/ /skye med chos de sna tshogs ston zhes smos te/ rig pa byang chub sems cir yang 'char bas sgrubs thabs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'byung ba yin la/ der yang ma zad sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa sna tshos 'byung ba'i
29b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhi yin la/ snod bcud kyi dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin skye med du gnas pas kyang mchog go/ don med skye ba med kyang gzugs rnams rnam pa nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar lta bur kyang ma 'gag par shar bas rang bzhin 'dzin te/ mder
29b2(rgyud 'grel): na zab par skye ba med kyang rgya che ba sna tshogs su ston to/ /zab pa dang rgya cheb gnyis med pas theg pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya'o/ /shes rab dam pa'i ngo bo ci zhe na/ chos kun do bo nyid 'chang ba/ shes rab chen po'i ska cig la/ chos kun khong du chung ba
29b3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste/ zhes smos te/ chos kyi phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la soD pa kun gyi ngo bo nyid ni mnyam pa chen po yin la/ de gang gis rtogs na shes rab chen pos skad cig la/ shes bya'i chos thams cad khong
29b4(rgyud 'grel): du chud de mngon sum du gsal bar rtogs pa'o/ /shes rab de'i stobs ji lta bu zhe na/ thub pa blo mchog 'byung po sel/ mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa/ /ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal
29b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes smos te/ lus ngag yid gsum mi dge ba'i las la thub cing/ chos nyid rtogs pa'i blo yi mchog yong pas rnam rtog gi gnod pa 'byung ba lta bu sel te/ mtshan ma gang gis kyang mi g.yo bar chu dang ba lta bu'i bdag nyid gsal la rtog pa med pa ni rdzogs pa'i
29b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste/ de yang lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni mchog mkhyen la/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mkhyen te/ ye shes de'i dpe ni mi lce 'bar ba dang 'dra la/ ma rig pa sel ba dang/ nyon mongs pa sel pa dang/ srin bu me khyer la sogs pa'i 'od
29b7(rgyud 'grel): zil gyi gnon pa dang/ zhing khams grangs med du snang bar byed pa'o/ /da ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i mtshan bstan pa'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste/ /ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong pa/ /mgon po sems can
30a1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi mtshag /sems can thams cad rab grol byed/ /nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba/ /mi shes dgra'i dregs pa 'joms/ zhes pa la sogs pa smos te mtho ris dang thar pa 'dor pa rnams kyi don du sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas sgrub
30a2(rgyud 'grel): par byed de/ mdam na pa ngan song gsum las kyang thar pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos bstan na rgyu dang 'bras bu sbyong zhing/ sems can kun gyi don byed pas mchog go/ /sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen pas blo'i rim pa dang/ sbyar nas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching
30a3(rgyud 'grel): pa las grol bar byed do/ /chos ji snyed gcig bshad kyang nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i gnyen por gcig go/ /de yis mu stegs la sogs pa zil gyis gnon pas dregs pa 'joms pa'o/ /gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa de ltar 'joms na/ 'o na gzhan 'dul ba'i gzugs su ji
30a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar ston zhe na/ dpal ldan blo dang sgeg par ldan/ /bstan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba/ zhes smos te/ bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal du gyur pas shes rab chen po'i blo dang ldan/ bltan mdzes par mdzad pas na sgeg pa'o/ /don mi 'gyur pa brtan rna la/ zhi bas mi 'dul
30a5(rgyud 'grel): ba la bdud la sogs pa zlog pa'i 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs 'chang ba'o/ /de yang gar la chos pa la gar du ston pa'i phyir/ lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing/ /gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa/ /dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la/ /nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa/k zhes smos te/
30a6(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa 'dul ba'i gar lag pa brgyu sprul te bsgyur ba dang/ chogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i mthus lag pa brgyar sprul te/ nam mkha' khyab tshad du 'gro ba'i don byed ba'o/ /lus kyi rdzu 'phrul gzhan yang ston pa'i phyir/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhi yi khyon/ rkang pa ya gcig
30a7(rgyud 'grel): mthil gyis gnon/ /rkang theb sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang/ /tshangs pa'i yul sa rtse nas gnon/ zhes smos te/ glid bzhi'i kyab 'jug gis 'dul ba de'i gnyen por kling bzhi ri rab dang bcas pa rkang pa ya gcig gi mthil gyis mnan pa ste/ gling bzhi chung du ma song la zhabs
30b1(rgyud 'grel): che ru ma song ngo/ /gyen la ni zhabs kyi mthe bong tshang pa'i 'jig rten dus gcig du gnon to/ /sna ma ltar che chung du ma song pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston no/ /'khor ba 'di ma spangs ? ji ltar grol bar 'gyur zhe na/ don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don/ /dam pa'i don de 'jigs pa med/ rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs
30b2(rgyud 'grel): don can/ /rnam shes sna tshogs rgyud dang ldan/ /dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' / /stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste/ /srid gsum dga' ba chen po pa zhes smos te/ gnyis su med pa ni don dam pa chos kyi sku ste/ gzhan gyis ma thub pas 'jigs pa med de/
30b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje dang smon lam gyi shugs kyis rnam rig sna tshogs kyi gzugs su sprul lo/ /kun bzhi rnam shes nyid rnam rtog sna tshogs dang 'brel pas rgyud do/ /de ltar dngos po 'khor ba'i don ma lus par mdzad pa las dgyes shing/ /don dam par stong pa nyid la dga' zhing chags kyang khams gsum
30b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'dod chags rang kham las grol bas spangs pa'o/ /shes rab chen pos sring ba las grol kyang thugs rjes der sprul nas don mdzad pa la dga' o/ /don mdzad pa'i che sku'i gzi ma dangs ci 'dra zhe na/ sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar/ 'od bzangs ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i
30b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil ltar mdzes/ /sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar zhes smos te/ don la ma gos pa'i mtshan ma 'od kha dog sprin ltar dkar zhing/ ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phro ba'i dpe ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od lta bu ma rig pa'i mun pa sel zhing gdung ba tshim par byed pa'o/ /de las kyang ye
30b6(rgyud 'grel): shes drug ro gcig pa'i rtags su 'od kha dog drug dang ldan pa'i sku mnga' ste/ 'gro ba la thugs rjes chags pa'i rtags su phyag gi sen mo dmar ba'o/ /rgyan gyi khyad par ji lta bu zhe na/ cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse/ /skra mchog mthon ka chen po pa/ /nor bu chen po 'od chags
30b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal/ /sangs rgyas sbrul ba'i rgyan dang ldan zhes smos te/ mdza' gnyis las rgyal ba'i rtags su dbu la rin po che'i cod pan bzang zhing mdzes pas rgyan pa'o/ /skra yang gzhan pas mchog tu gyur pas rin po che mthon ka ltar sngo zhing mdzes pa'i skra mnga' ba'o/ /'gro ba'i
31a1(rgyud 'grel): don rdzogs par mdzad pa'i rtags su thugs ka na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches brgyan cing/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dpag tu med pa mnga' ba'i rtags su ba spu re re la ye shes sems dpa' re re gsal zhing mdzes par brgyan pa'o/ /de lta bu de la lam gyi
31a2(rgyud 'grel): khyad par ji lta bu mnga' zhe na/ 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan/ /de nyid dran pa chen po 'chad/ /zhes smos te/ 'jig rten khams brgya ni mtshon pa tsam ste/ mdza' yas par bskyod par mdzad do/ /bskyod nas ci mdzad na
31a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sogs pa'i sgo nas 'gro don mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni 'dul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ sems kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin dang
31a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba'o/ /de yang don mi snyel ba'i dran pa chen po 'chang ste/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal/ /byang chub yan lag me
31a5(rgyud 'grel): tog spos/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho/ /lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig /yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa/ zhes smos te/ dran pa bzhi ni/ lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang/ sems dang tshor ba dang/ chos so/ de rnams ni tshogs lam gyi
31a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas skabs so/ /dran pa bzhi po de la yang ma chags pas ting 'dzin rgyal lo/ /de la mthong lam gyi gnas skabs na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ chos rnam par dbye ba dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ dga' ba dang/ shin tu
31a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ btang snyoms so/ de lta bu'i sgo nas 'gro ba'i don byed pa dang/ 'phags pa mnyes par byed pas me tog spos so/ /der yang ma zad de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho
31b1(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyis gzhir rje btsun nyid 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang sgom lam gyi gnas skabs na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang/ rtog pa dang/ ngag dang/ las kyi mdza' dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ rtsol ba dang/ dran pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin no/ /de lta bu'i
31b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul rig nas 'gro ba 'dren par mdzad do/ /de ltar rig pa ni yang dag par sangs rgyas pa'i lam rig pa'o/ /don mdzad pa la sngon du thugs rje skye dgos pa'i phyir/ sems can kun la shas cher chags/ /nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med/ /sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug /sems
31b3(rgyud 'grel): can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs/ zhes smos te/ sems can kun la bu gcig pa'i ma ltar thugs rjes chags shing/ 'o na mtshan mar mi 'gyur ram zhe na/ don nam mkha' ltar mkhyen pas chags pa rang kha ma sel lo/ /de yang sems can kun gyi yid la khyab par 'jug cing
31b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i don la brtson 'grus yid ltar 'gyogs par mdzad pa'o/ /de yang don bya ba'i yul mkhyen pa bstan pa'i phyir/ /sems can kun gyi dbang don shes/ sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa/ /phung po lnga don de nyid shes/ /rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba/ zhes smos te/ sems
31b5(rgyud 'grel): can kun gyi dbang po rab 'bring tha ma shes shing don gang la mos pa rnams shes pas so/ /sku lta bas mchog mi shes pa ston pas gyad sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog la/ yid rtog bcas rtog med du zlog pas kyang yid 'phrog pa'o/ /de yang phung po lnga'i don kun rdzob sgyu ma lta
31b6(rgyud 'grel): bur shes la/ don dam du skye ba med par shes pa'o/ /de yang rnam par dag pa'i phung po lnga dang ldan te/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang/ shes rab kyi phung po dang/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung
31b7(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /'o na don byed pa'i thabs ji ltar mkhyen ce na/ nges 'byung kun gyi mdza' la gnas/ /nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas/ /nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas/ /nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa zhes smos te/ khams gsum pa las nges par 'byung ba'i chos kun gyi
32a1(rgyud 'grel): mthar thug pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te/ de la rje btsun nyid ngang gis gnas shing nges par 'byung ba'i chos kun ston pa la yang mkhas pa'o/ /nyid kyang lam de la gnas pa'i tshul ston te/ gzhan dang 'dra pa'i phyir ro/ /
32a2(rgyud 'grel): gdul bya rnams la ji ltar 'tsham par 'byung ba'i chos ston par mdzad do/ /des gzhan don ji ltar mdzad ce na/ yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton/ /dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chad/ /bden bzhi tshul gyi rnam pa can/ /shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa
32a3(rgyud 'grel): 'chang/ /bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan/ /de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig /rnam pa nyi shu byang chub pa/ rnam par sangs rgyas kun rig mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i sku/ /bye ba dpag med 'gyed pa po/ /zhes smos te/ rten 'brel yan
32a4(rgyud 'grel): lag bcu gnyis kyis ni srid pa yin te/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed 'byung/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam shE? ba'i rkyen gyig? ming dad gzus ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i
32a5(rgyud 'grel): rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'o/ /de rnams kyi rtsa ba ni ma rig pa yin te/ ma rig pa 'gags na de rnams 'gag pa'i phyir ro/ /gnyis su
32a6(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i ye shes chen pos ma rig pa rtsa ba nas bton pa'o/ /yang skye mched bcu gnyis dag pa'i tshul ni/ mig gi skye mched dang/ gzugs kyi skye mched dang/ rna ba dang sgra dang/ sna dang/ dri dang/ lce dang ro dang/ lus dang reg bya dang/ yid dang/ chos kyi'o/ /yang
32a7(rgyud 'grel): bden pa rnam pa bzhis kyang sems can khrid par mjid/ sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang/ kun 'byung gi bden pa dang/ 'gog pa'i bden pa dang/ lam gyi bden pa'o/ /de dag ni thun mong gi lam mo/ /khyad par gyi lam ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyi rang
32b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rtogs pa'i ste/ de yang tshogs bdun ni kun gzhi'i byin brlabs kyis 'byung ba yin la/ kun gzhi skye med du shes pas/ des 'dres pas brgyad car skye med du shes par 'gyur ro/ /de yang 'di skad du/ brgyad pa skye med shes pa yi/ /dgongs pa rgyal ba kun
32b2(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam zhes pa lta bu'o/ /yang dag pa'i bden pa'i don sangs rgyas pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis dang yang ldan te/ rigs lnga ye shes lnga shes rab dang snying rje khyad par can no/ /de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni stong pa nyid bcu drug ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/
32b3(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang/ chen po stong pa nyid dang/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus bya stong pa nyid dang/ 'dus ma bya stong pa nyid dang/ mdza' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang/
32b4(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /de ma rtogs pa sems can gyi dus na/ sa la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga/ gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga/ 'dod chags la
32b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs? pa nyon mongs pa lnga/ mig la sogs pa dbang po lnga ste/ rnam pa nyi shur snang ba ste/ don rtogs pa'i dus na de dag kyang rigs lngar shar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang de dag tu 'dus te/ rnam pa de dag las grol nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yin pas mchog go /de
32b6(rgyud 'grel): yang 'di skad du/ 'byung ba lnga dang nyon mongs phung po lnga/ /dbang po rnam lnga'i zhen pa dang bral nas/ /rigs lnga ye shes lngar snang la/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub yin zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /de lta bu'i sangs rgyas la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' 
32b7(rgyud 'grel): bas kun rig pa'o/ /rig nas sprul pa bye ba dpag tu med pa dkye nas sems can gyi don 'dzin pa'o/ /de yang gdul bya'i blo dang 'tsham pa'i theg pa stan pa'i phyir/ skad cig thams cad mngon pas rtogs/ /sems kyi skad cig don kun rig /theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis/ /
33a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bas don la rtogs pa po/ /theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas/ /zhes smos te/ skad cig gis gdul bya'i bsam pa dang pag la nyal ba thams cad rig mngon mdzad de/ 'on rtogs bcas su thal lo/ /zhe na/
33a2(rgyud 'grel): rtogs byed de rang yang skye med du rig pa'o/ /rig nas theg pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o/ /de yang 'di skad du/ ji srid sems rnams 'jug gi bar/ /theg pa'i mdza' la thug pa med /ces pa lta bu'o/ /de yang gdul bya theg pa gsum gyis 'dul
33a3(rgyud 'grel): ba la nyan thos dang/ rang rgyal dang/ theg pa chen po bstan no/ /yang dag par theg pa gcig ste 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa'o/ /de yang 'bras bu sangs rgyas na ji ltar gnas pa da lta nyid nas lam du khyer nas 'bras bur gnas zhes bya'o/ /de yang sku dgu theg dgu
33a4(rgyud 'grel): bstan yang 'gro ba'i don bstan ma gtogs pa/ theg pa 'di kun yang dag pa'i theg pa dag las gzhan ma yin zhes pa lta bu/ de yang gsum po ni rgyu'i theg pa'o/ /gcig ni 'bras bu'i theg pa'o/ /de yang rgyu la sbyor ba rgyu'i chos/ /'khor lo shin tu bskor
33a5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /'bras bu'i theg pa nye lam zhig /dus tshigs phyi mar 'byung bar 'gyur/ zhes pa lta bu'o/ /de la'ang spangs pa'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir/ /nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag /las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa/ /chu bo rgya mtsho kun las
33a6(rgyud 'grel): rgal?/ /sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba/ /nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs/ /bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa zhes smos te/ gnyis med rtogs pas nyon mongs pa dag cing/ las ngan slong par byed pa'i sems med pa dang/ las zad par byed pa'o/ /
33a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i spyod yul ji snyed pa rnams ni chu po dang 'dra ste/ rgyun ring ba dang rgyun phyogs su khyer bar byed pa dang/ rgal dka' ba dang/ mang pa'i phyir de las rgal zhing don la sbyor ba'i ye shes ni/ rtog pa las dben pas dgon pa zhes bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba drug dang/ de ba nga?
33b1(rgyud 'grel): nye ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa sdug bsngal rnams dang bag chags sa bon dang bcas pa gtan nas spangs pa'o/ /de nyid thabs dang shes rab dam pa dang ji ltar ldan zhe na/ snying rje chen po shes rab thabs/ /don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa/ /'du
33b2(rgyud 'grel): shes kun gyi don spangs shing/ /rnam shes don ni 'gag par byed ces smos te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pas zhi ba'i mdza' la mi gnas shing/ /shes rab chen po dang ldan pas srid pa 'am 'khor ba la mi gnas te/ thabs de lta bus 'gro ba'i don
33b3(rgyud 'grel): byed do/ /'o na mtshan mar 'dzin pa can du mi 'gyur ram zhe na/ 'du shes ni yul la mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste/ des spangs shing rnam shes zag pa dang bcas pa skye med du rtogs pas de'i skyon med do/ /de ltar rang rtogs pa ma nor bas gzhan ma nor ba'i lam la 'god
33b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ sems can kun gyi yid dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rig pa/ /sems can kun gyi yid la gnas/ /de dag sems can mthun par 'jug /sems can kun yid tshim par byed/ /sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba/ /grub pa mthar phyin 'khrul pa med/ /
33b5(rgyud 'grel): nor pa? thams cad rnam par spangs/ /don gsum the tsom med pa'i blo/ /kun don yon tan gsum gyi bdag ces smos te/ sems can gyi yid dang mthun par don mdzad pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi thugs mi rtog par rig pa'i sgo nas mdzad de/ des sems can kun gyi yid
33b6(rgyud 'grel): la khyad par gnas te/ de dag gi sems dang mthan par 'gro ba'i don la 'jug la/ zhugs nas sems can ji ltar 'dod pa ltar tshim zhing dga' bar byed de/ sems can gyi don sgrub pa mthar phyin par byed do/ /de yang 'khrul pa 'am nor pa thams cad slangs
33b7(rgyud 'grel): te/ drang ba'i don dang/ nges pa'i don dang/ theg pa sna tshogs kyi don dang gsum la the tshom med pa ste/ grub pa'i mdza' rnams nges par shes pa'i phyir ro/ /sems can kun gyi don du gyur pa'i yon tan sku dang gsung dang thugs gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa'o/ /'di
34a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid las kyang/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin/ /zhes 'byung ngo/ de yang rgyu rtogs pas 'bras bu mchog tu grub pa'i phyir/ phung po lnga don dus gsum du/ /
34a2(rgyud 'grel): skad cig thams cad bye brag phyed/ /skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang/ /lus med lus de lus kyi mchog /lus kyi mdza' ni rtogs pa po/ /gzugs rnams sna tshogs snang ba'i dpal/ /nor bu chen po rin
34a3(rgyud 'grel): chen tog /ces smos te/ rgyu'i dus na phung po lnga la dus gsum gyi skad cig mas gzhigs na bye brag phyed de/ mu stegs kyi bdag po la sogs par byed de/ 'bras bu'i dus su de kho na nyid thugs su chung pa la rim pa yong pa ma yin pas skad cig
34a4(rgyud 'grel): mas sangs rgyas te/ 'di ni las 'phro dang dbang po'i mchog tu gyur pa la byed rtsol gyi spros pa bcad de/ de bzhin nyid bsgom pas lam nye bar ston no/ /de yang byed rtsol gyi spros pa bcad pa ni 'di skad du/ shes rab dam pas ma zin pa'i/ /lam gyi dge ba
34a5(rgyud 'grel): stegs bcas kyang/ /mtho ris lha dang mi ru ste/ /skye shi med pa'i sa mi thob/ /ces pa lta bu'o/ /de yang sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin mnyam/ /thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad par mnyam/ /mdzad lugs mi mnyam/ sku bong dang tshe tshad dang/ tshul dang/ rigs mi
34a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa ltar snang ngo/ /de yang rang bzhin skye med 'chang bar mdzad do/ /chos kyi sku la zag bcas kyi lus med la/ de'i byin gyis brlabs las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku lus kyi gyur pa 'byung ngo/ /lus thams cad kyi mdza' skye med du rtogs pa las sprul sku sna
34a7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa 'gro ba'i dpal du 'byung ba ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar 'dod pa skod pas rab ces bya'o/ /co to zhes bya'o/ /me tog ces bya'o/ /de yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni nges pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan te/ rnam pa nges pa dang/ gnas nges pa dang/ 'khor rngos?/
34b1(rgyud 'grel): chos nges dus nges pa'o/ /sprul sku ni rnam pa ma nges/ gnas ma nges/ 'khor ma des/ chos ma nges/ dus ma nges ba'o// //da ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i mtshan bstan par bya ste/ de yang 'phrin las kyi rgyu gang zhen/
34b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyis rtog bya ba/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med/ /ces pa la sogs pa smos te/ chos kyi sku gnyis ni sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i chos chen po yin la/ de rtogs nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa'o/ /gsang sngags las byung yi ge med/ /
34b3(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngaT chen po rigs gsum pa/ /gsang sngags don kun bskyed pa bo/ /thig le chen po yi ge med/ /stong pa chen po yi ge lnga/ /thig le stong pa yi ge brgya/ /zhes pa thabs dang shes rab las 'byung ba'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid brjod du med pas yi ge med pa'o/ /sku che ba
34b4(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab las 'bras bu che ba sku gsung thugs kyi rigs gsum lhun gyis grub pa'o/ /des gsang sngags kyi don bskyed rims dang/ rdzogs rims gzhan gyi rgyud la bskyed par byed pa'o/ /don dam par thig chos nyid mi 'gyur ba la/ le khyab cing gdal ba ste/
34b5(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo tshig gis brjod du med pa'o/ /stong pa chen po chos kyi sku de nyid las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon yi ge ma 'gag par shad pa ni/ oM aM hUM swAhA/ de lnga'o// //thig le skye ba med pa de las yi ge brgya ste/ de la brten nas sgrub thabs sna tshogs 'byung
34b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ don du na chos kyi sku la kyo gas ris med cing 'gag pa med pa'i mthu'o/ /'o na thugs kyi sprul pa gang zhen/ rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med/ bcu drug phyir phyed thig le can/ /yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das/ /bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can /bsam gtam yan lag
34b7(rgyud 'grel): kun shes shing/ /ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa/ zhes smos te/ kun rdzob tu mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs te snod bcud kyi rnam pa kun dang ldan la/ /don dam par snang ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug gi phyed/ yi ge brgyad yin la/ brgyad kyi phyed bzhi ir?
35a1(rgyud 'grel): te/ a A oM A(rgyud 'grel): ces pa'o/ /de bzhin ni mtshon byed du byung ba yin te/ de bzhis ci mtshon na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi mtshon te/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa dang/
35a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs mkhas pa'i rnam par thar pa'o/ /de yang stong pa nyid kyis ni dngos po las 'byin par byed do/ /mtshan ma med pas ni mtshan ma phra mo'i zhes pa las kyang 'byin par byed do/ /smon pa med pas ni 'bras bu re smon gyi mdza' la dmigs pa las 'byin par byed de/ /
35a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs la mkhas pa'i ni thabs dman zhing mi mkhas pa rnams las 'byin par byed do/ /de bzhi yang spros pa phyogs re bcad pa'i yon tan gyi cha nas bzhir bshad kyis/ don du ni thig le chen po yi ge med pa'o/ /yang spyi po bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ni byang
35a4(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi sems thig le cha bcu drug tu gnas te/ de las kyi phyag rgya'i thabs kyi bye brag rnams la brtan te/ spyi bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i thig le bcu drug po bzhu pa'i phyed brgyad snying kha chos kyi 'khor lor phab/ de bzhu ba'i phyed lte ba sprul pa'i
35a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lor phab/ de'i phyed gsang ba bde skyong gi 'khor lor phab ste/ gnyis shor gnyis mnyam gyi dus su ngos gzung ngo/ /de yang dang yang du goms par byas pas mthar de'i zhen pa tsam dang yang bral te/ thig le chen po yi ge ming pa rtogs par
35a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /de yang 'di skad du/ /zab mo rnam par thar pa bzhis/ /rnon po'i don du bshad pa yin/ 'khor lo bzhin du bskor byed pa/ /rtul po'i don du shes par bya/ zhes 'byung ngo/ /de ltar bsgoms pas rnam rtog gi yan lag med pa/ brjod pa'i rtsis
35a7(rgyud 'grel): lam 'das pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin bzang ba ni bsam gtan bzhi la lha'i ting nge 'dzin lta bu'o/ /nyid kyang de ldan zhing gzhan gyi bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams kyang shes te/ de yang 'dod pa'i khams na lhag mthong shas che ba'i bsam gtan kyang shes ba'o
35b1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs med pa'i khams ni zhi gnas shes che'i bsam gtan kyang shes pa'o/ /gzugs kyi khams ni zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel ba'i bsam gtan kyang shes te/ de la bsam gtan bzhi la yan lag bco brgyad de/ bsam gtan dang po la yan lag lnga ste
35b2(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa dang/ dpyod pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ sems rtse gcig pa nyid do/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang yan lag bzhi ste/ dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ nang rab tu dang ba dang/ sems rtse gcig pa nyid do/ /bsam gtan gsum pa la yang yan lag lnga ste/
35b3(rgyud 'grel): btang snyoms dang/ dran pa dang/ shes bzhin dang/ bde ba dang/ sems rtse gcig pa nyid de/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa la yan lag bzhi ste/ btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang/ dran pa yongs su dag pa dang/ bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba yongs su
35b4(rgyud 'grel): dag pa dang/ sems rtse gcig pa nyid do/ /de rnams rje btsun nyid kyis shes pa'o/ /gzhan dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ seng ge rnam par bsbyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya
35b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya rtsa gcig kyang mkhyen cing/ gang zag gi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang skye gnas kyi rgyud kyis bsdus pa rnams kyang rig cing mkhyen no/ 'o na longs sku'i mtshon pa ci zhe na/ ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog /longs
35b6(rgyud 'grel): spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal/ zhes smos te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi lus can ni chos kyi sku ste/ sku de gnyis kyi rten byed cing mchog tu gyur pa de ni gzhi'o/ /de las theg pa chen po'i chos la longs spyod pa sku rnam par snang mdzad du snang ste/ de yang nges pa lnga dang ldan zhing 'khor los
35b7(rgyud 'grel): sgyur ba'i rgyal po lta bur bzhugs pa ste/ de yang theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir/ /thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs bskur 'dod/ ces pa lta bu'o/ /de yang sku'i mdzad spyod rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas 'khor sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' i gtso bor gyur pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor
36a1(rgyud 'grel): lo bskor bar mdzad do/ /de la sprul pa'i sku'i mdzad spyod ci zhe na/ sbrul pa'i sku ste sku'i mchog /sangs rgyas sgrul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba/ /phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed/ /ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa/ /zhes smos te/ de yang rgyal
36a2(rgyud 'grel): pa sprul pa'i sku ni/ 'khor rigs drug gi sems can dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang rgyal ba rnams la gsung gi mdzad spyod rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad de/ sprul sku ma dag pa las mchog tu gyur pa sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/
36a3(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor can la sogs pa sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis kyi rgyud du sprul pa'o/ /sprul nas gang du 'gyed na phyogs bcur 'gyed de/ bkye nas ci byed na ji ltar 'tsham pa ltar 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o/ /'o na ma dag pa'i sprul sku gang zhe na/ lha yi dbang
36a4(rgyud 'grel): po lha yi lha/ /lha yi bdag po lha min bdag /'chi med dbang po lha yi bla/ /'joMs byed 'joMs byed dbang phyug po zhes smos te/ lha'i dbang po ste khyab 'jug gis 'dul ba la khyab 'jug du sprul lo/ /lha yi lha ni tshangs pa'o/ /lha'i bdag po ni brgya byin no/ /
36a5(rgyud 'grel): lha min bdag ni thags bzangs ris so/ /'chi med dbang po ni 'thab bral la sogs pa'i lha'i rgyal po rnams so/ /lha'i bla ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la sogs pa'i lha'i rgyal po'o/ /'joms byed ni drag po 'jigs byed do/ /'joms byed dbang phyug ni
36a6(rgyud 'grel): ma hA de pa'o/ /de rnams kyis 'dul ba la de rnams su sprul nas don mdzad do/ /chos kyi sbyin pa'i tshul ni/ /srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba/ ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla/ /'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa/ /chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po/ /byams
36a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i go chas chas pa ste/ /snying rje yi ni ya lad bgos/ /shes rab ral dri mda' gzhu thogs/ /nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sel/ /dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba/ /bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed/ /bdud kyi dbung rnams pham
36b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa/ zhes smos te/ srid pa ni nges pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ dgon pa ni de las dben pa'o/ /de las rgal te don gnyis med rtogs pas ston pa gcig pu'o/ /yang na bstan pa gcig la ston pa gnyis mi 'byung bas so/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi ston par gyur pas
36b2(rgyud 'grel): na bla ma'o/ /de yis 'jig rten phyogs bcur grags te/ rgyu cis grags na chos kyi sbyin pas grags so/ /de yang rlom pa lta bu ma yin te/ byams pa'i go cha gon zhing/ snying rje'i khrab gon pa'o/ /de'i mtshon cha ni nyon mongs pa gcod pa'i shes rab kyi ral gri dang
36b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs shes rab kyi mda' gzhus nyon mongs pa dang ma rig pa'i g.yul ngo sel lo/ /gang las dpa' na bdud 'dul bas dpa' o/ /gzhan bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa las kyang skyob cing sel bar byed do/ /phyogs gcig sel ba tsam ma yin te/ bdud kyi
36b4(rgyud 'grel): dpung sde dang bcas pa pham par byed pa ste/ de yang sems skye ba med pa rtogs pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom/ sems nyid la rgas rgud med pas phung po'i bdud bcom/ sems nyid la skye shi med pas 'chi bdag gi bdung bcom/ sems nyid rtogs
36b5(rgyud 'grel): pas the tsom dang dral te lha'i bu'i 'dud bcom/ /de yang 'di skad du gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye ba dag /sangs rgyas sku bsgyur bar chad smra byas kyang/ /chos la mkhas pas chos nyid rab thob ste/ /de dag byang chub las ni zlog mi nus/ zhes pa lta
36b6(rgyud 'grel): bu'o/ /de lta bu de mchod pa'i 'os su? bstan pa'i phyir/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren/ /mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas/ /rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os/ /bkur 'os brjod pas bya ba'i mchog /phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab ces smos te/ sangs rgyas kyi
36b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid rje btsun gyis 'jig rten pa rnam par thar par gnas su 'dren pas/ mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ sku gzugs bris la mchod pa dang/ rgyan gdags pa dang/ phud tu bkur ba dang/ yon tan bsgrags pa dang/ lus dag yid gsum gus
37a1(rgyud 'grel): pas phyag bya ba la sog te/ bla ma'i rab tu gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i mkhyen pa'i bye brag ci zhe na/ 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod/ /mkha' ltar mdza' med rnam par gnon/ /gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste/ /mngon shes
37a2(rgyud 'grel): drug ldan rjes dran drug ces smos te/ 'jig rten gsum po de shes rab kyis gom pa gcig gi bar tu bgrod la/ rtags rdzu 'phrul gyi gom pas bgrod do/ /nam mkha' ltar chos kyi sku mdza' med par rtog pas nyon mongs pa gnon par byed do/ /de yang phyir
37a3(rgyud 'grel): sde snod gsum rig la/ nang du sku gsung thugs rig ste/ bdag gzhan gyi dri ma dang bral bas gtsang ma dag pa'o/ /gzhan yang mngon par shes pa drug ste/ lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang/ lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang/ pha rol gyi sems shes
37a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa dang/ zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa'o/ /rjes su dran pa drug ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/ chos rjes su dran pa dang/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang/ dam tshig rjes su dran pa dang/ thugs rje
37a5(rgyud 'grel): rjes su dran pa dang/ mdzad pa rjes su dran pa dang drug go /shes rab dam pa ji lta bu zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rten 'das/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mdza' / /shes rab kyis ni de nyid thob/ ces smos te/ byang
37a6(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' ni rang don/ /sems dpa' chen po ni gzhan don no/ /de yang byang chub ni nam mkha' lta bu'i chos kyi sku la/ sems dpa' de ni de rtogs par 'dod pa'i 'dun pa yong pa dang/ gzhan gyi don la dpa' ba' o/ /de yang 'di skad du/ byang chub
37a7(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i mtshan nyid de/ /kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /gang zhig de rtogs 'dod pa de/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /zhes pa lta bu'o/ /de rdzu 'phrul chen po brnyes te 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthar thug pa de kho na nyid
37b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ shes rab kyis thob par byed do/ /de nyid dpe las 'das par bstan pa'i phyir/ bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa/ /kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog /dper bya kun las 'das pa ste/ /shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog /ces smos te/ ji lta ba bdag
37b2(rgyud 'grel): gi don dang/ ji snyed pa gzhan gyi don thams cad rig pa'i sgo nas kun la phan par byed pa ste/ gang zag ltar sprul kyang dngos ma yin pas mchog go /cung zad du yang mnyam pa med pas na dpe las 'das pa'o/ /shes par byed pa dang shes par bya ba'i don gnyis
37b3(rgyud 'grel): ga'i bdag po'i mchog tu gyur pa'o/ /gang gi sgo nas shes par byed ce na/ gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste/ /phyag rgya bzhi bo don ston pa/ /'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog /ngos 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi/ /don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal/
37b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum na skal bzang che/ /zhes smos te/ rje btsun nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas kyang chos kyi sbyin pa ni sbyin pa rnams kyi gtso bor gyur pa'o/ /de'i bdag po ni rje btsun no/ /de phyag rgya bzhi'i chos sten te/ de la yang bka' rtags
37b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyag rgya bzhi la/ theg pa chung dun gyi bka' rtags kyi phyag rgya bzhi ni/ mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal pa dang/ stong pa dang/ bdag med pa'o/ /de yang/ mi rtag sdug bsngal stong dang bdag med pa/ /de ni rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i chos/
37b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes 'byung ngo/ /'di nyid las kyang/ bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can/ zhes 'byung ngo/ /theg pa chen po'i dbang du byas na/ bka' la snang/ don dang mthun/ rigs pas 'thad/ gtan tshigs kyis rgyas pa'o/ /de yang bka' don rigs pa gtan
37b7(rgyud 'grel): tshigs dang /snang dang mi 'gal rgyas 'thad yin/ zhes pa lta bu'o/ de la lha'i sku phyag rgya chen po bzhi ni/ sku phyag rgya chen po/ gsung chos kyi phyag rgya/ thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya/ 'phro 'du las kyi phyag rgya'o/ /gdul bya lam gyi phyag rgya bzhi ni/
38a1(rgyud 'grel): las kyi phyag rgya dang/ chos kyi phyag rgya dang/ phyag rgya chen po dang/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /de ltar ston pa ni 'gro ba rnams kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i chos kyi mchog go /nges 'byung gsum ni theg pa gsum mo/ /de bgrod pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /
38a2(rgyud 'grel): don dam pa sgrib pa gnyis dag pas bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal du 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gsum na skal ba mchog tu gyur pa'o/ /de lta bu'i ston pa de gang yin zhe na/ tshogs gnyis rdzogs shing bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal du gyur pa 'byor pa phun sum
38a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa ster bar byed pa rje btsun nyid yin pas/ dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa/ /'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog /ces gsungs pa yin no/ /da ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la bstod pa'i le'u bstan pa'i phyir/ /mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog tshog
38a4(rgyud 'grel): khyod 'dud/ /yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud/ /stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud/ ces pa la sogs pa smos te/ de yang 'dis ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa ste/ mchog tu gyur pa'i chos kyi dbyings
38a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan la sbyin par byed pa ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed pa'i mchog rje btsun 'jam dpal khyod yin pas khyod la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal zhes pa'o/ /khyod ces pa ni bod pa'i sgra kun la sbyar ro/ /yang dag pa'i mthar gyur pa ni skye ba med pa
38a6(rgyud 'grel): khyod la 'dud pa'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi don rtogs pa las byung ba khyod la 'dud do/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub dam pa yin pas khyod la gus pas 'dud/ cos pa'o/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas chags pa
38a7(rgyud 'grel): khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /ces smos te/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes me long lta bus chos kyi dbyings la gnas shing chags pa khyod/
38b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dren par 'dod pa khyod la 'dud do/ /sangs rgyas kyi sems me long lta bus chos kyi dbyings rtogs pas dgyes par khyod la 'dud do/ /sangs rgyas kyi dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa la rol pas khyod la phyag 'tshal
38b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'dud do/ /da ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas bzhad la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/
38b3(rgyud 'grel): ces smos te/ sangs rgyas kyi de kho na nyid khong du chud pas mnyes nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pas khyod la 'dud do/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa la dgyes nas bzhad pa ni chos gsung pa'i snga ltas ston pa khyod la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud do/ /
38b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas gsung gi sgo nas gdul bya la sna tshogs su chos ston pas khyod la 'dud do/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos mdzad kyang thugs mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos pas khyod la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud ces pa'o/ /da ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes
38b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgo nas bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir/ med pa las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud/ /ces smos te/ chos thams cad dngos po med par
38b6(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa la 'byung ba khyod la 'dud do/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i don la 'jig rten du 'byung bas khyod la 'dud do/ /chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu rtogs pa las che ba'i yon tan thams cad 'byung bas khyod la 'dud do/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes
38b7(rgyud 'grel): las 'byung ba'i 'jam dpal khyod la 'dud do/ /da ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud/ /thams cad thams cad khyod la
39a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dud/ /ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud/ ces smos te/ sgyu ma lta bu'i sprul pa thams cad thabs dang shes rab dra ba lta bur 'brel bas med pa sprul zhing yod pa bsgyur ba khyod la 'dud do/ /'gro ba'i don du sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung
39a2(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rol pa sna tshogs ston pa khyod la 'dud do/ /yon tan thams cad dang ldan zhing yon tan thams cad kyi gzhan don grub par byed pa khyod la 'dud do/ /ye shes drug ro gcig po las grub pa'i sku nyid 'jam dpal khyod yin pas phyag 'tshal 'dud do
39a3(rgyud 'grel): shes bstong pa'o/ /da ni 'bang ba don yong par bya ba'i phyir nyams su glangs pa'i phan yon bstan pa ni/ lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur ba'i ming ngo/ /lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyis gsnang ba zhes?
39a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ de snang stong dang/ grags stong dang/ rig stong du rtogs dka' bas gsang ba'o/ /lhag ma ni go sla'o/ /chos thams cad kyi lung ngo zhes pa ni/ mtshan yang dag pa 'di khyab che bas na lung ngo/ /mi slu pas na lung/ bzung bla bas na lung ngo/ /tshangs pa'i gnas
39a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ni tshad med pa bzhi'o/ /rdzab thams cad las thar pa ni/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i phung po dang bral ba'o/ /mi khom pa brgyad po ni/ sems can dmyal bar skye ba dang/ yi dags dang/ byol song dang/ dbang po mtshang ba dang/ lta ba log pa 'dzin pa dang/ yul mdza' 
39a6(rgyud 'grel): khob du skye ba dang/ sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i zhing du skyes pa dang/ 'du shes med pa'i srid par skyes pa'o/ /'jigs pa chen po brgyad ni/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ glang po che smyon pa dang/ sprul dang/ rgyal po'i chad pa dang/ me dang/ chu dang/ sha za'i 'jigs pa dang brgya do/ /
39a7(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa ni/ yon tan kyi dbang phyug brgyad la bya ste/ de yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzhung gis/ sku yang ba dang/ phra ba dang/ gzhan gyis mchod pa dang/ bdag por gyur pa dang/ longs spyod pa dang/ gar yang phyin pa dang/ 'dod dgung
39b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa dang/ /dga' mgur spyod pa dang brgyad do/ /gsang sngags kyi gzhung gis sku'i dbang phyug dang/ gsung gi dbang phyug dang/ thugs kyi dbang phyug dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang phyug dang/ thams cad du song pa'i dbang phyug dang/ 'dod spyod kyi dbang phyug dang/ ci gnod
39b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa'i dbang phyug dang/ gnas kyi dbang phyug dang brgyad do/ /de yang 'di skad du yang zhing phra ba mchod pa'i 'os/ /bdag gyur longs spyod gar yang phyin/ /'dod gur ldan zhing dga' mgur spyod/ /de dag rgyal po'i dbang phyug brgyad/ /ces pa 'byung ngo/ /sku gsung
39b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs dang rdzu 'phrul che/ /kun song 'dod sbyor gzhan la sbyin/ /gnas kyi dbang phyug rnam pa brgyad/ /'di dag rdo rje 'chang gi chos/ /zhes 'byung ngo/ /spyan lnga ni gong du bshad zin no/ /grong ni khang khyim gcig yod pa'o/ /grong khyer ni khyim mang po chen gcig
39b4(rgyud 'grel): tu spungs pa'o/ /grong brdal lam ni grong tshom bu mang po yod pa'o/ /ljongs ni yul lung pa gcig gi bsdus pa'o/ /yul 'khor ni yul gru mang po zhig phyogs gcig tu byas pa'o/ /ma ma bdun po ni khyo med ma bzhi/ khyo can ma gsum ste 'dun las tshangs pa mo dang/
39b5(rgyud 'grel): khyab 'jug mo dang/ dbang mo dang/ gzhon nu ma dang/ bzhi khyo med ma'o/ /drag mo dang/ phag mo dang/ rgan byad mo dang gsum ma hA de ba'i chung ma'o/ /snyigs ma lnga ni/ lta ba'i snyigs ma dang/ nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang/ tshe'i snyigs ma dang/ zas kyi snyigs ma
39b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dus kyi snyigs ma dang lnga'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni go sla bas ma bshad do/ /da ni shin tu bsdus pa las mtshan thams cad bsdus pa'i sngags bstan pa'i phyir/ oM sarba d+ha rma zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ oM ni bkra shis pa'i tshig kyang yin/ ye shes lnga
39b7(rgyud 'grel): yang yin/ phyag 'tshal zhing byin gyis rlob par byed pa yang yin no/ /sarba ni thams cad d+harmA na chos a b+hA pa ni dngos po med pa/ swa b+hA ba ni rang bzhin/ bi shud+ha ni rnam par dag pa/ tsa klu ni mig /a A aM a ni/ rnam par thar pa bzhi yi mtshon pa ste/ stong
40a1(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ thabs mkhas pa dang bzhi ste/ 'di bzhi yang don skye ba med par 'du ste/ de ltar mdza' bas bskus pas/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i de'i mig gi skye ba med pas
40a2(rgyud 'grel): shes so/ /zhes bshad pa yin no/ /de dag gis ni rtsa ba'i sngags bstan to/ /pra kri ni ma bdang rgya che ba gnyis su med pa/ pa ri shud+d+ha ni yongs su dag pa/ sarba d+harmA ni chos thams cad/ ya du ta ni skyed pa/ sarba ta thA ga ta ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ dz+nyA na kA ya ni ye
40a3(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi sku/ many+dzu sh+rI ni 'jam dpal lo/ /pa ri shu d+d+hi ta ni yongs su dag pa/ mu pa ta ye ti a/ /zhes pa byin gyis brlab par byed bzhes kyang ston to/ /khaM saM blang ngo/ /gzung bar byas/ /zhes par yang ston to/ /mdza' bsdus pas zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis su med
40a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ yongs su dag pa las chos thams cad skyed par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku 'jam dpal yongs su dag par khas blangs gzung bar bya/ /zhes pa'o/ /a a ni skye 'gag med pa/ sarba ta thA ga ta ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ h+ri
40a5(rgyud 'grel): da ya ni snying po ste thugs so/ /ha ra ha ra 'phrog par byed pa'o/ /oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs byin gyis rlob pa'o/ /b+ha ga ba na ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /dz+nyA na mu rti ni ye shes sku'o/ /bA gi shwa ra ni dag gi dbang phyug go /ma hA pA tsa ni gsung ba chen po'o/ /sarba
40a6(rgyud 'grel): d+harmA ni chos thams cad/ ga ga na ni nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /a ma la ni dri ma med pa/ su pa ri shu d+d+ha na yongs su dag pa'o/ /d+ha rmA d+ha tu ni chos kyi dbyings so/ /dz+nyA na garb+hA? A ni ye shes kyi snying po'o/ /mdza' bsdus pas skye 'gag med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
40a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi thugs 'phrog par byed pa/ sku gsung thugs byin gyi rlob par byed pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi sku dang/ gsung gi dbang phyug gsung pa chen po/ /chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes snying
40b1(rgyud 'grel): po zhes bya ste/ des ni las sngags bstan te/ bsdus pa'i don to// //de ltar ston pa shAkya thub pas lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i chos so/ /thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan gsungs pas 'khor rjes su yi rang ba bstan pa ni/ de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang/ /dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ de yang 'dis ni tshul ji ltar yi rang ba bstan te/ mtshan gyi gzhung rdzogs pa'i rjes de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang/ rang dang gzhan gyi don yongs rdzogs pas dga' zhing/ de
40b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i ston pa mgu nas lus tsog bur 'dug /lag pa thal mo sbyar nas yi rang ngo/ /yul gang la yi rang na/ mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas/ zhes smos te/ 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad pas
40b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang shAkya thub pa/ bdud bzhi bcom zhing/ /legs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan pas/ zab pa de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa dang/ rgya che ba 'gro ba'i don la gshegs pa/ tshogs gnyis rdzogs shing/ spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ ye shes phun sum
40b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa de la/ lus ngag yid gsum gus pa dang bcas nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje 'khor mang po dang bcas te phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /'khor gang dang bcas te yi rang na/ de ni mgon po gsang ba'i bdag /lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal/ /sna tshogs
40b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dang lhan cig tu zhes smos te/ 'gro ba'i mgon mdzad pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis las khro bor dbang bskur/ dbang rtags su lag tu rdo rje gtad/ /gsang mtshan du lag na rdo rje zhes btags pas na/ khro bo'i rgyas
40b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /yon tan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i 'khor lnga brgya po gzhan dang lhan cig tu yi rang ngo/ /tshig gang gis sgo nas yi rang na/ gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol/ /mgon por dag cag yi rang ngo/ /legs so legs so legs par gsungs/
41a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes smos te/ gsang bstod nas ni/ zhum pa med par dbu 'phangs bstod pa'o/ /bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa yi rang ste/ zab pa rang gi don 'byung ba lags so/ /rgya che ba gzhan gyi don 'byung ba lags so/ /zab pa rgya che ba gnyis su
41a2(rgyud 'grel): med par gsungs pas legs par gsungs pa'o/ /dgos pa gang gi phyir yi rang na/ rnam grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba yi/ /'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni/ /bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad/ /ces smos te/
41a3(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las grol ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i 'gro ba'i mgon med pa rnams dang/ bdag cag gi rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa'i don du mdzad pas so/ /chos gang la yi rang na/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa/ /'di ni rnam dag legs
41a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lam/ /zab cing yangs ma rgya che ste/ /don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa/ zhes smos te/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i chos su bstan pa 'di ni shin tu legs pa'i lam ste/ zab pa dang/ yangs shing rgya che ba dang/ 'gro ba'i don bgyid pas so/ /yid ches
41a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyu mtshan ci yod pa'i phyir rjes su yi rang na/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bshad ces smos te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul gyi chos 'di ni gang zag gi ma gsungs te/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
41a6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pas/ brdzun dang/ nor pa mi 'byung bas yid ches pa'i phyir/ rjes su yi rang zhes bshad pa yin no/ /de yang lung ni yid ches tshig yin te/ nyes pa zad pa rdzun gyi tshig /smra bar mi byed rgyu med phyir/ /nyes zad lung du shes par bya'o
41a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o// //sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'jam dpal mtshan/ /zab cing rgya che'i shin tu dpag dka' yang/ /bshad pa'i rgyud dang gdams ngag la brten nas/ /slob mas gsol ba btab phyir bdag gi
41b1(rgyud 'grel): brtsams/ /nongs par gyur pa 'phags dang mkhas la bshags/ /'di brtsams dge ba ma nor mchis pa yis/ /kun gyis 'jam dpal go 'phang thob par shog /chos skang byings la ma brten bod kyi mis/ /go ba bde phyir rang so'i skad kyis bkrol/ /
41b2(rgyud 'grel): de phyir mkhas pas tshig skyon brtag mi rigs/ /'on kyang rgyal ba'i lung la'ang bskur 'debs na/ /bdag 'dra'i gzhung la ci phyir smos mi rigs/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa mtshan don gsal bar byed pa'i sgron me zhes bya ba
41b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //slob dpon bi ma la mi tras mdzad nas thugs kyi sras nyid ting nge 'dzin gyis zhus pa'o/ /gnyegs gnya' nas bsgyur ba'o// //'phags pa 'jam dpal gri mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i don gsal bar byed pa slob dpon dga' rab rdos mdzad
41b4(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ yArya ma ny+dzu Sh+nyA nA ma siM gA tyadtha lo ka ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i don gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
41b5(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo 'gog med dag pa'i dang/ /rang 'byung ye shes 'od gsal ba/ 'jam dpal zhi ba'i ye shes sems/ /mi rtog gzugs sku dang byung ba'i/ /mgon po de la gus btud de/ /rgya cher rab zab dag pa'i rgyud/ /rin chen lta bu'i dgongs pa la/ /'gro ba
41b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad thabs bsam mi khyab kyang/ /bde gshegs ston pa'i byin brlabs gdams pa yis/ /des don phyogs gcig bdag gis gsal bar dgrol/ /'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par rjod pa 'di la spyi don rnam par gus bstan te/ /le'u dang po
41b7(rgyud 'grel): zhus pa dang/ zhus lan du phun sum tshogs pa lnga dang sbyar te bstan pa dang/ le'u gnyis pa mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po drug pa rdo rje 'chang gi don bstan pa dang/ le'u gsum pa shes bya ngo bos stong pa chos kyi dbyings kyi don bstan pa dang/ le'u bzhi/
42a1(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhi 'gag pa med pa me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi don bstan pa dang/ le'u lnga pa gzhi'i rtsal so sor dpyod pa so sor rtogs pa ye shes gyi don bstan pa dang/ le'u drug pa gzhi'i ngo bo skye 'gag med pa na nyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang
42a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar te bstan pa dang/ le'u bdun pa shes bya thogs pa med pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi don bstan pa dang/ le'u brgyad pa che ba brjod pa sngags kyi sgra dang bcas pa bstan pa dang/ le'u dgu pa rjes su yi rang ba'i sgo nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don mthar
42a3(rgyud 'grel): phyin par bstan pa'o/ /de nas le'u dang po bshad de/ de nas zhes pa ston pa la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gnas so/ /'dis dus phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'o/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang/ /zhes pa zhu ba pos te/ de yang rtogs pa bdag
42a4(rgyud 'grel): gi dpal dang/ thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal lo/ /don gyi rdo rje chos kyi rgyud dang ldan zhing/ yon tan gyi snang ba rgyu gnyis dang gis gsal de mi 'bral ba'i/ /gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog ces pa/ ston pa'i sprul pa gong ma'i 'phrin las te/ thabs ma
42a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gags pa'o/ /dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes pa/ 'jig rten gsum gyi nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal 'jems shing/ rang la de'i skyon gyi ma gos shing/ 'khrul snang gi ye shes su snang ba'o/ /de ltar 'khor ba 'joms nus pa ji lta zhe
42a6(rgyud 'grel): na/ rdo rje yin pa dang/ dbang phyug yin pa dang/ gsang ba'i bdag po yin pas gong ma las rgyal zhes pa'o/ /pad+ma dkar po rgyas 'dra'i spyan zhes pa zhu ba pos don mdzad pa ni/ gang la gang 'dul mkhyen te/ /spyan lnga dang ldan pas don mdzad kyang skyon gyis ma
42a7(rgyud 'grel): gos pa? pad+ma lta bu'o/ /pad+ma rgyas pa'i gdan la bzhugs zhes pa 'dis gnas phun sum tshogs pa ston to/ /bya rgod 'phung po'i ri la skyon med pa'i dgongs pa la gnas zhes bya'o/ /rang gi lag gi rdo rjes chog ces pa/ /don gyi rdo rje yong ba'i rtags su phyag
42b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /yang dang yang du gsor byed pa/ zhes pa ni khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o/ /khro gnyer rim pa ldan la sogs zhes pa de dang/ tshul mthun pa 'khor phun sum tshogs
42b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje mdza' yas pa/ zhes pa de'i 'khor rigs 'dzin pa sprul pa'i 'khor bgrang ba las 'das pa'o/ /dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po zhes pa 'khor de rnams kyang ma rig pa dang log rtog 'joms nus pa'o/ /'jigs su rung ba'i dpa' 
42b3(rgyud 'grel): byed can/ zhes pa bdud dang srin po zil gyis gnon pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje zhes pa rig pa'o/ /rtse mo zhes pa ye shes so/ /'phro zhes pa ma 'gags pa'o/ /rang gi zhes pa rig pa'o/ /lag gi zhes pa yon tan gyi rtsal lo/ /gsor byed pa
42b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad pa'i/ /snying rje che dang zhes pa mdzad pa dang bcas pa'i snying rje ma yin te/ mdzad pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'o/ /de yang gang las 'byung zhe na/ shes rab dang zhes bya ste/ phyogs lhung med pa'i shes rab bo/ /thabs kyi 'gro
42b5(rgyud 'grel): don byed pa'i mchog ces pa bya btsal mi mnga' ba'i ye shes lnga byung nas sku gnyis su gyur te/ 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o/ /de yang gzhan las spags pa'i don bya btsal las 'das pa'i sku dang ye shes mtshon pa'o/ /dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can
42b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa nyon mongs pa mi mnga' bar dgyes pa'o/ /khro po'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa zhes pa ni/ thabs ma 'gag pa'i skur de ltar yang snang ba'o/ /sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon zhes pa ste/ tshad med pa bzhi 'am phrin las bzhis sems can skyed
42b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /lus btud rnams bang ldan cig pa zhes pa/ de'i 'khor dang bcas pa sten pa la bstod cing/ mos pa bskyed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das zhes pa dang/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas/ zhes pa ston pa la 'khor rnams
43a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis so/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ zhes pa zhu ba po'i lus kyi 'dug tshul lo/ /spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol zhes pa ston pa'i drung du zhu ba po 'dug ste/ zhu ba dbul ba'o/ /ji skad 'bul zhe na/ khyab bdag ces pa ston pa
43a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag la phan pa dang zhes zhu ba po la'o/ /bdag don zhes pa bdag la mi dgos kyang gzhan mos pa skyed pa'i ched du tshul bstan pa'o/ /bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/ zhes pa ston pa de zhu ba po la byams thugs dang ldan pa'o/ /sgyu 'phrul zhes pa ma
43a3(rgyud 'grel): rig pa dang sems so/ /dra ba zhes pa gnyis su med pa'o/ /mngon zhes pa da ltar gsal ba'o/ /rdzogs zhes pa sku la che ba rdzogs pa'o/ /yang na rig pa la ye shes rdzogs pa'o/ /byang chub ces pa rig pa'i ye shes so/ /ci nas bdag thib mdzad ces pa/ ston
43a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thugs rje dang thabs kyis bdag gi don rang la yod pas de rtogs shing thob par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o/ /nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing/ /mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi/ /sems can kun la sman pa dang/ /bla med 'bras bu thob
43a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'i phyir/ /zhes pa 'gro drug dug lnga dug gsum gyis zin pa la ye shes kyi skyabs dam pa mdzad du gsol zhes pa ste/ gzhan don du zhus pa'o/ /gang la zhus she na/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la'o/ /de'i phyir na 'gro ba'i bla
43a6(rgyud 'grel): ma ston pa po zhes pa ci ste zhe na/ dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen/ /dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gi zhes pa'o/ /de yang don spyod yin zhes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku/ /gtsug tor chen po tshig gi bdag /ye shes sku ste rang
43a7(rgyud 'grel): byung ba zhes pa/ ston pa'i sku bag chags kyi dngos pa can min te 'od kyi sku yin la/ sku de la nub pa dang 'gyur pa med de/ tshig gi tshigs thams cad kyi mnga' bdag go /ci'i phyir zhe na/ ye shes sku ste rang 'byung ba zhes ba'o/ /de ni ston
43b1(rgyud 'grel): pa phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag nyid do/ /'jam zhes pa rig pa'o/ /dpal zhes pa rig 'dzin gyi sa'o/ /ye shes zhes pa longs sku'o/ /sems dpa' i zhes pa sprul pa'i sku'o/ /ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog ces pa/ de'i don mtshan tshig la brten
43b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ gcod cing mtshon pa'o/ /don zab pa zhes pa sgro 'dog mi nus shing/ skur pa gdab mi nus te/ gzhan gyi blos dpag par dka' bas so/ /don ni rgya che zhing zhes pa dang po'i gnas lugs/ bar du 'khrul lugs/ tha ma grol lugs la sogs pa
43b3(rgyud 'grel): ston pa'o/ /don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba zhes pa/ gzhi dag pa chos kyi sku la 'bras bu dag pa shes rab rig pa'i sku lngas brgyan pa de'i gong na gzhan med pa gzhan gyis mgran zla med pa'o/ /thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba zhes pa/ dus gsum
43b4(rgyud 'grel): du bzang por gnas pa'o/ /ci ste zhe na/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la/ /da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /yang dang yang du gsungs pa gang/ zhes pa'o/ /rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul
43b5(rgyud 'grel): dra ba las/ zhes pa/ ngon gyi rgyud chen po rig pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa las so/ /rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang zhes pa dang la rdo rje sems dpa' sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid don gzhan las khyad par 'phags pa gong bzhin rig pas skal pa dang ldan pos/
43b6(rgyud 'grel): dpag med rnams kyi dga' bzhin du/ zhes sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pas gsungs so/ /glur blangs gang lags bshad du gsol/ zhes zhus pa/ thugs las ni bkrol/ mgur gyi dur par dril te/ ljags kyi dbang po la bkram nas gsungs pa gang lags
43b7(rgyud 'grel): par ston bas bdag la gsungs zhes pa'o/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi/ /gsang 'dzin can nas bdag 'gyur phyir zhes pa bshad pa'i dgos pa'o/ /de yang dus gsum bud+d+ha'i don gyi mtshan nyid sems la 'dzin te/ ci ste bdag kyang de ltar 'gyur ba'i
44a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir na'o/ /nges par 'byung gi bar du 'di zhes pa/ don ci tsam gsung gi bar du'o/ /bdag gi bsam pa brtan por gzung/ zhes pa zhu ba bos gsungs pa'i don thugs la 'chang pa'o/ /nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang/ /mi shes ma
44a2(rgyud 'grel): lus spang ba'i phyir zhes pa gzhan gyi don gyi dgos pa'o/ /de'i phyir na/ bsam pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du/ sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal zhes gsungs te/ 'gro ba'i blo dang mos pa'i khyad par dang sbyar nas don mdzad ces pa'o/ /gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis zhes
44a3(rgyud 'grel): pa zhu ba pos so/ /de bzhin gshegs la de skad du/ zhes ston pa po la'o/ /gsol nas zhes pa dgongs skad de/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas te zhes pa/ zhu ba'i tshul gyi spyod pa'o/ /de nas zhes pa dgongs skad zhus nas so/ /bcom zhes pa bdud bzhi bcom pa'o/ /
44a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan zhes pa sku dang ye shes su/ shA zhes pa ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' i sprul pa thub pa drug gdul bya so so la snang ba'o/ /kya zhes pa sprul sku re res don re re mdzad pa'o/ /thub ces pa/ thugs rjes 'gro ba'i ma rig pa dang log rtog 'joms pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i
44a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog ces pa/ gong ma'i ston pa de 'khor rnams kyi nang na mchog tu byung pa'o/ /nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang ba zhes pa thugs la dkrol/ /mgur gyi dum par bril/ /ljags kyi pad+ma bkram/ tshems kyi bar nas bshar te don gsungs pa'o/
44a6(rgyud 'grel): de yang smra ba'i seng ger gyur pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing/ /bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams sel byed pa/ zhes pa gong ma'i dgos pa'o/ /sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum/ /zhes pa sems can las kyi bye brag gis dmyal ba yi dags kyi tshul dang
