65b1(rgyud 'grel): por 'gyur pa'o/ /stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud ces pa/ dbyings stong pa dang/ rig pa stong pa dpyer mi phyed pa'i nang nas sku gnyis nang gsal du 'byung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud ces pa rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par yon tan
65b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dbang du ma gyur ba'o/ /sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud ces pa zag med pa'i bde ba'o/ /sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshel 'dud ces pa thams cad kyis thob bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dkyes pa khyod la 'dud ces pa gnyis su med pa'i don mthar phyin te/ mya
65b3(rgyud 'grel): ngan las 'das pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud ces pa gnyis su med pa'i mthar phyin pa gdul bya theg pa chen po'i don gzhan la bzhag ste shin tu yang dgyes pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud ces pa lus ston pa'o/ /de yang sangs rgyas bzhad pa ni
65b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma zil gyis gnon pa'o/ /sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud ces pa rang 'byung gi ye shes gsung ma 'gags pa thams cad kyi brjod bya'i rgyur gyur pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud ces pa mi 'gyur ba'i rig pa de bag chags dbral
65b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /med pa las byung khyod la 'dud ces pa yon tan gyi stobs sku gsum ye shes lngar 'byung ba'o/ /nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud ces pa dngos por med la yon tan du yod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud ces pa yon tan gyi stobs sku lnga
65b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lnga chos nyid kyi dang na gnas shing gsal ba'o/ /ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud ces pa gzhi gnas kyi ye shes las mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa'i ye shes lnga 'byung ba'o/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud ces pa rig pa 'gag pa med pa'i ye shes
65b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med par gcas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud ces pa ye shes kyi snang ba ma 'gags pa'o/ /thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud ces pa thams cad gnyis su med pa'o/ /ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud ces ye shes kyi skur gyur pa'o/ /
66a1(rgyud 'grel): oM zhes pa bzhi gnas kyi ye shes las mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i ye shes lngar rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/ /sa zhes pa de'i bzhugs gnas te/ chos kyi dbyings so/ /rba zhes pa gong ma'i thugs rje skur snang ba'o/ /de bzhin du sgra ji bzhin
66a2(rgyud 'grel): du bzhi sbag la sogs pa dang bstun la khong nas mnga' o/ /d+harmA b+hA ba/ swa b+hA ba/ bi shud+d+ha/ badzra tsak+Shu/ a A aM a/ pra kri ti/ pa ri shud+d+ha /sarba d+harmA ya du ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ dz+nya na kA ya/ many+dzu sh+rI pa ri shud+d+ha ti/ mu pa ya te/ aM a/ sarba ta thA
66a3(rgyud 'grel): ga ta/ h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+ri/ b+ha ga bAM/ dz+nyA na mUrta/ bA gI shwa ra/ mahA bA tsa/ sarba d+harmA/ ga ga na/ a ma la/ su pa ri shud+d+ha /d+harmA d+ha tu/ dz+nyA na garb+ha A:/ de yan chad du le'u brgyad pa/ cha ba brjod pa sngags kyi sgra dang bcas pa bshad pa'o/ /
66a4(rgyud 'grel): da ni le'u dgu pa rjes su yi rang ba'i sgo nas bdag gzhan gyi sgo nas dgongs pa mthar phyin par bstan te/ de nas zhes pa ston pas gong ma'i don gsungs nas bar gzhan gyis mchod de/ zhu ba pos rjes su yi rang bar phul ba'i tha tshig go /dpal ldan zhes pa rtogs
66a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bdag gi dpal ldan te/ ston pa'i thugs kyi dgongs pa mkhyen pas mkhyen pa'o/ /thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal dang ldan te/ gsang sngags kyi don zhus nas 'gro don mdzad pa'o/ /zhu ba po rang rgyud pa med de rdo rje sems dpa' i thugs kyi krong nas phyung/ 'od lnga
66a6(rgyud 'grel): shangs kyi rlung sgrom nas bton nas phyag na rdo rje'i skur gyur pa'o/ /de yang zhib tu gzhan na gsal bas ma smos so/ /rdo rje 'chang zhes pa phyag na rdo rje'o/ /dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar zhes pa ston pa'i bka' phyin ci ma log pa'o/ /de yang bdag
66a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi don mthar phyin pa'o/ /mgon po zhes pa bdag gzhan gyi mgon no/ /de yang gang zhe na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas zhes pa/ zhu ba pos ston pa la'o/ /de ni mgon po gsang ba'i bdag
66b1(rgyud 'grel): ces pa zhu ba pos ston pa'i thugs mkhyen pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal zhes pa khro bo gzhan las lhag par 'gyur ba'o/ /sna tshogs gzhan dang lhan cig tu zhes pa 'khor rnams so/ /gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol zhes pa dgongs pa skyes pa'o/ /mgon
66b2(rgyud 'grel): po bdag cag yid rang ngo zhes pa phyi nang gsang ba'i don ston pa la zhus pas 'khor dang bcas pa dgyes pa'o/ /legs so zhes pa tshig ma nor bas so/ /legs so gnyis ma nor bas so/ /legs par gsungs zhes pa ston pas bdag gzhan gyi don du bshad
66b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi yan lag dang ldan par gsungs pa'o/ /rnam grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba yi zhes pa skad cig gsum la phyi nang ni rnam pa las grol nas 'bras bu ye shes chen po thob par 'tshal ba'i 'khor tam gong ma'o/ /gang zhe na/ 'gro ba mgon med
66b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang ni zhes pa thun mong gi 'khor rnams so/ /bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi zhes pa ni khyad par gyi 'khor ro/ /byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad ces pa gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu tsam yin te/ bud+has mya ngan las 'das pa'i dgongs pa gsungs
66b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul ston pa zhes pa rig pa dang ye shes kyi 'dug tshul lo/ /'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam zhes pa don ma nor ba'o/ /zab cing yang sa la rgya che ba zhes pa gting dpag dka' ba'o/ /don kun 'byung ba'o/ /kun snang chen po'o/ /nam
66b6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' lta bur nub pa med pa'o/ /don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa zhes pa ston gong ma'i don gsungs pa ni/ don chen 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni zhes pa dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhes bya'o/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
66b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi bshad ces pa che ba'i ye shes dang tshogs chen po gi'as? ye nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i zhes pa ni bdud bzhi dad gis
67a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ste/ sgu dang ye shes su shugs kyis ldan nas/ rtag chad kyi mdza' las ye nas 'das pa'o/ /sku gsum ye shes lnga'i don gnyis su med pa'i mtshon chig bting nas ma nor bar gsungs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
67a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsungs pa zhes mi'i thug pa das ston pa rdo rje 'chang gi don 'khor rnams la gong bzhin gsungs pa'o/ /de yan chad du le'u dgu pa rjes su yi rang ba'i sgo nas bdag gzhan gyi don mthar phyin par bstan pa'o/ /
67a3(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i gdams pa thugs kyi gter/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi thugs 'chang ba/ /'di bris nyes pa 'byung mi srid/ /gal te nyes pa 'byung ba na/ /bla ma bde gshegs chos skyong rnams/ /rtog med ye shes dang du bzod par bzhes/ /'di bris 'di
67a4(rgyud 'grel): yi dge ba yis/ /dri med rgyud chen grol 'gyur shog /'grel pa rgyun gcod spu gri zhes bya ba dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //na tshar yang dag par brjod pa nye bar bsdus pa'i rnam par rtog ge zhes bya ba dpal gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje 'dra?
67a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ nam(rgyud 'grel): sang gI tya ba d+ha ra bi tarka nA ma/ bod skad du/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i nye bar bsdus pa'i rnam par rtog pa /zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 
67a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi sku dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /longs spyod min de da 'bab pa yis/ /'od gsal las ni yang dag byung/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams so/ /der gnas thim pas phyag 'tshal te/ /mtshan brjod pa yi rnam grangs tshig/
67a7(rgyud 'grel): ming ni du ma bshad par bya/ /ji ltar 'khor lo drug pa sems rtsa ba'i 'khor lor de thim pas 'gro dang mi 'gro bar bgyid de/ /rlung dang rnam par shes phyir ro/ /bag chags kyis ni lus sogs gsum/ /tha mal rtag tu 'ching bar byed/ /
67b1(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas rtag tu mi 'ching ste/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i bag chags tshul/ /stod dang snying rje dbyer med las/ /'gro dang mi 'gro yang dag byung/ /gnyis med bzhi las gzugs brnyan gis/ /pha rol dag gi don byed pa'o/ /de ltar thabs ni bzhir byas nas/ /bsam
67b2(rgyud 'grel): gtan rigs kyi ming nyid du/ /byang chub sems dpa' brjod pa yin/ /tshigs bcad brgyad dang drug cu ni/ /de bzhin gnyis lhag de rnams so/ /gzhan dag kyang ni phan yon gyi/ /tshigs bcad brgya dang de bzhin phyed/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las byung ba'i/ /rtag tu
67b3(rgyud 'grel): bstong pa'i rgyal po de/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan/ /de ltar man ngag mang po ni/ /theg bzhi gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i/ /bstan bcos sna tshogs lugs nyid du/ /dgongs pa'i skad kyis bston pa yin/ /rnal 'byor 'byung ba che dbus dang/ /
67b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa rgyur byas spyod yul lo/ /de ltar tshigs bcad dang po sogs/ /ye shes sku yi bar du ni/ /phyag 'tshal bstod tshig ji snyed pa/ /a ba d+hu tI la gnas tshig /de nas yi ge sbyor ba yi/ /tshig bcad tshig ni mi zad pa/ /rtsa ba'i mdza' ru bnas/
67b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /'khor lo rnam pa drag gi mid/ /da ni ji ltar rnal 'byor lud/ /mdo ru bsdus te rab bshad bya/ /sa pa d+hu tI thams cad rten/ /dga' ba bcu dug mtshan nyid ngo/ /ayon shu ga'i rtsa lam nas/ /dza landa ra'i bu gar 'jug /ye shes cho ga'i nus pa las/ /
67b6(rgyud 'grel): 'o gnas steng 'jug yang dag rdzogs/ /a ba d+hu tI la brten nas/ /rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /rang bzhin mang po de dag las/ rang rig pa ni mchog gi gnas/ /de rim bral ba ma rungs pa/ /de nas dpa' sogs ro dgur ldan/ /dag gi brnga ru brtags
67b7(rgyud 'grel): las skyes/ /ji ltar ba yi bde las byung/ /stad nyid snying rje dbyer med pas/ /dag gis brjod pa las ma skyes/ /ji lta bde las dga' ba'i sems/ /me long ltar gyur gzhan yang khro/ /lus 'dud ye shes 'phags pas so/ /rab 'dud sngon du cho ga yis/ /
68a1(rgyud 'grel): srog dang rtsol bar rnam dpyad bya/ /bcom ldan rtag tu stong nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings so/ /thal mo sbyar ba snyed 'og sbyor/ /kun rdzob bden pa'i spyan sngar 'dug /don dam de bzhin tha dad min/ /nor bu'i nang
68a2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs rnal 'byor gyis/ /de bzhin longs spyod grol ba'i 'bras/ /dbu ma nyid du rnam dpyad par/ /gyur pas bsam gyis mi khyab thob/ /nyon mongs shing don nyi nyon mongs/ /mi shes 'dam gyi rtog pa ste/ /de dag rnam dpyod thob par ni/ thogs med
68a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad zad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rab tu gsal bar 'gyur/ /mar me 'bar ba'i rtse mthar gyur/ /de bzhin rtag tu sangs rgyas te/ /las kyi phyag rgya sogs las skye'o/ /bcom ldan b+ha ga rnal 'byor dang/ /bdag la sogs pa'i bden bzhi
68a4(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /shes pas shes bya gsal bya ba/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das pa spangs/ /song ba rang bzhin tha mal kun/ /rdo rje chen po'i lus bdag nyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gsum mdza' o/ /de ni mi brjod pa du brtags/ /don chen po yi phyag rgya gang/ /de ni 'di ru
68a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o/ /dus gsum bya ba byed pa ni/ /theg gsum rtogs pa sangs rgyas so/ /ma yi yi ge sbyor ba ni/ /yig dral gzhan yang ma yig phral/ /de nas sgyu 'phrul dra bar gsungs/ /a ba d+hA tI'i don rtogs pas/ /bdag nyid rtog tu mchog gis
68a6(rgyud 'grel): tshim/ /de la rang bzhin med pa ni/ /mi bden pa la bden ltar byung/ /ye shes chen po ma lus pa'o/ /'bras bu rgyu las yang dag 'byung/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu de byar med las/ /rnal 'byor lus ni 'bras bu min/ /de skad bya dang mi bya kun/ /gang gis
68a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rdo rje mchad/ /shes bya shes byed dbyer med pa/ /tshe 'di la ni 'bras longs spyod/ /de ltar gang du ci gsungs pa'i/ /bsdus pa'i don 'di bshad par bya/ /yi ge dang po'i skyor ba ni/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig gcig mthar/ /a ba d+hA tI thams
68b1(rgyud 'grel): cad brten/ /de ni rnam shes mtshan nyid do/ /rang bzhin mang po de dag kyang/ /dag gi brnga ru brtags las skyes/ /de las snying ga'i las zhugs nas/ /srog dang rtsol ba rnam rtags shing/ /dbu ma nyid du rnam dpyad pas/ /rigs med thams cad zad
68b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /gang zhig rab tu gsal gyur pa/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das pa spangs/ /tha lam du gyur rang bzhin kun/ /theg gsum rtogs pas sangs rgyas so/ /ma yi yi ge sbyor ba ni/ /a ba d+hU tA'i don brtags nas/ /ye shes chen po ma lus pa'i/ /'di nyid la
68b3(rgyud 'grel): ni 'bras longs spyod/ /de dag mgrin pa'i 'khor lo ste/ /thog ma tha mar rtsa las grub/ /de nyid longs spyod 'khor lo ste/ /gang nas rnam par shes la 'bab/ /tshigs su bcad pa bcu drug po/ /phyag na rdo rjes tha mi dang/ /de nyid grub pas thabs su brjod// //
68b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhad yang shes rab brjod bya ste/ /de nas shAka thub ces pa yi/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes pa yi mthar/ /nam mkha' 'di ni 'khor lo drug /'dzum pa gnyis gnyis gzhan don te/ /'khor lo drug la rtsa re re/ /'gog pa'i tshul gyis nam mkha' 'gengs/ /shes
68b5(rgyud 'grel): rab don 'byung gsal bar 'grub/ /'jig rten gsum ni rnam pa gsum/ /tshangs pa rkang gi bu ga 'gengs/ /gyen du gsang ba'i bug gnyis nas/ /gsum pas so so gsum snang byed/ /de ltar 'gro ba rdo rje 'dzin/ /legs so zhes ni brjod pa'o/ /snying rjes 'gro
68b6(rgyud 'grel): ba mngon du byas/ /de ni yan lag drug bzhi'o/ /phyag rgya chen po'i yan lag rdzogs/ /snying rje'i dus ni bcu drug pa'i/ /ye shes lus kyi mtshan brjod pa/ /brngar btags sbyor bas pha rol 'gro/ /de ni snying ka'i dbus dang ni/ /gsang ba lte ba dbral ba ru/ /
68b7(rgyud 'grel): yan lag drug bsam?? rnal 'byor gyis/ /de dag stong pas bla ma/ /de dag gi ni mtshan nyid do/ /don kun bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /de dag dang po'i yi ge yis/ /ji ltar tshigs su bcad pa'i don/ /nam mkha' 'di ni 'khor lo drug/ /shes rab don 'byung gsal bar
69a1(rgyud 'grel): 'grub/ /gsum pos so sor gsum snang byed/ /de ni yan lag drug gi bzhi/ /phyag rgya chen po'i yan lag rdzogs/ /de dag ston pas nga bla ma/ /tshigs su bcad pa de drug gis/ /thub pa chen po'i bka' stsal lan/ /gang
69a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir thub pa'i rnal 'byor de/ /rang rig pa ni rtogs pas na/ /sgra brnyan brag cha lta bu las/ /phyag na rdo rje rtogs pa byung/ /gnyis su med pa'i don brjod pa'i/ /rig pa las ni brjod par bya/ /de nas sogs nas cher gzigs mthar/ /tshigs su bcad gnyis
69a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags las skyes/ /rigs kyi sgra yis gnyis med grub/ /dbang po kun ni rigs can yin/ /'khor lo drug gi thog ma mthar/ /rlung dang rnam par shes pa brten/ /rnal 'byor dbang pos phra mor dbye/ /bag chags ngan pa'i dri ma bcom/ /dbang po'i
69a4(rgyud 'grel): dbus na snang byed pa/ /rtag tu bdag gzhan med par 'gro/ /phyag rgya chen po'i ming gis ni/ /snang las rig ni yang dag byung/ /de dag gi yang don bsdus pa/ /tshigs bcad kyi ni bdag gis brjod/ /'khor lo drug gi thog ma mthar/ /snang las
69a5(rgyud 'grel): rig ni yang dag byung/ /steng 'og rlung ni bkag pa las/ /gnyis dang gnyis med gnyis ka min/ /ye shes lta stangs snang ba yis/ /rig drug rgyu ba brjod pa'o/ /de dag yi ni brla gsal ba/ /grangs med pa ni rab tu spro/ /de ltar kun don bden pa
69a6(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /dbus su don dam bden pa ste/ /de ni ma skyes pa yi chos/ /sgyu ma yis ni yang dag bsdus/ /gang phyir mngon du rtog pa ru/ /sems can rnams la yi ge don/ /de phyir rtag tu rab bshad pa/ /zab mo'i man ngag dbang las so/ /nye bar
69a7(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa 'di dag gis ni/ gsol ba btab pa dang/ bka' stsal ba'i lan dang/ de bzhin du rigs drug snang ba'i rtogs pa zhes bya ste dang po'o// //tshigs su bcad pa gsum brjod pas/ /chos kyi phung po stong phrag ni/ /brgyad cu rtsa bzhi grangs
69b1(rgyud 'grel): med de/ /bsdus nas nye bar brjod pa yin/ /'di 'dra'i de nyid mang po de/ /dang po yi ge brnga ru byas/ /rnal 'byor chen po bcu gnyis te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyis gsungs/ /de yi mtshan nyid rgyas bshad bya/ /shes dang shes par bya ba'i don/ /gus
69b2(rgyud 'grel): pas de yi mtshan nyid bshad/ /rtag tu gnyis gnyis sbyor bsdus pas/ /nam mkha' i bu ga'i dbus gnas te/ /a ba d+hU tI'i mkha' drug ni/ /'khor lo drug gi dbus su 'dod/ /gang phyir bu ga gnyis gnyis po/ /drug po gnyis 'gyur las bcu
69b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis /de la de dag sa bon ni/ /yi ge gnyis gnyis rim bzhin te/ /lte ba'i bu gar a A dgod/ /i a'i snying kha'i bu ga gnyis su/ /mgrin pa dag tu u a'u'o/ /e i dbral ba'i bu ga gnyis su'o/ /spyi bor 'khor lo la o aau/ /aM a(rgyud 'grel): gsang
69b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bu ga gnyis la/ /de dag dbyangs yig thung bshad pa/ /'og gi cha yi bu gar ro/ /ring po de bzhi steng du dgod/ /thabs dang shes rab lugs nyid du/ /nam mkha' drug gi dbus nyid du/ /rtag tu srog dang rtsol ba sdom/ /bcu gnyis ba ru gnas
69b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /sa yi rim par shes bya ste/ /pha rol phyin pa rnam par dag /de dag gis ni lugs gnyis kyang/ /ji ltar bla ma'i man ngag gis/ /nam mkha' i dbus su 'dzin cing gnas/ /sngon du bsam par shes par bya/ /gyen du bzlog cing thur du lte/ /e
69b6(rgyud 'grel): i yi kyi yang dag bsdu/ /de ltar a i gnyis po de/ /lte ba nas thur gsang gnas gyen/ /gzhan yang yi ge a o gnyis/ /lte ba dang ni spyi bor lta/ /mgrin nas thur du snying nas gyen/ /i u gnyis po'i bshad pa'o/ /de bzhin dpral bar yi ge
69b7(rgyud 'grel): e/ /mgrin par u yig de bzhin no/ /de bzhin i yig a yi ge /'og dang steng du bzhag par bya/ /de ltar A i yang dag sbyor/ /A i de bzhin lus nyid do/ /u e u o de bzhin du'o/ /gzhan yang a A rtag tu bsam/ /de bzhin o A
70a1(rgyud 'grel): yang dag sbyor/ /steng dang 'og tu bsam par bya/ /lta stangs sum cu rtsa drug gis /bla na med pa'i gnas la 'jug /de dag lte ba'i dbus nyid du/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas yang dag gnas/ /de yi ming ni gzhan dag kyang/ /'jam
70a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal gzhon nu zhes byar btags/ /sti /gnas pa'i sgra yis yang de bstan/ /sum cu rtsa gsum yi ge'i gtso/ /oM oM yi ge tshangs pa'i mchog /ba gnas pa khams nyid du'o/ /badzra/ rol pa gang phyir rtag tu byed/ /tI/ drag po dman po las
70a3(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa/ /k+Sha? /yi ge phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /du/ bka' ba srid pa'i rgya mtsho las/ /ba/ nam mkha' 'dra bar snying rje dag /ts+tshe gcod pa sems kyi bag chags so/ /nga/ lta ba dag pa ma lus pas/ pra/ tha mar dri ma med par gsal/ /dz+nyA/ shes dang
70a4(rgyud 'grel): shes bya'i tshig don te/ /dz+nyA/ ye shes rnam shes dbyer med thim/ /na/ mi gnas pa'i rnam par shes/ /mu/ rtsa ba u ma ni ru brjod/ /rha/ dka' thu pa de bzhin bzlas pa'o/ /ye/ gang byed gang phyir gyis so/ /dz+nyA/ ye shes la goms rnal 'byor gyis/ /na/
70a5(rgyud 'grel): mi bden bden pa'i rtog pa med/ /lus kyi las ni rtag tu byed/ /gang las sangs rgyas mchog 'byung ba'o/ /bA/ bag chags gang phyir rtag tu gnas/ /gI/ brjod de thar pa'i rgyu ru'o/ /shwa/ dbugs dbyung ba'i rlung chen po/ /ra/ bu gar rnal 'byor
70a6(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis dbang/ /a/ mi 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs dus/ /ra/ gsang ba'i rnal 'byor du brjod pa'o/ /pa/ ji ltar pad+ma'i ze 'bru'i sku/ /tsa/ zla ba 'dzag ltar yang dag byung/ /na/ yod min skye bcung zad kyang/ /ya/ theg pa gsum las yang dag byung/ /
70a7(rgyud 'grel): te/ de nas gzhan yang theg gsum por/ /na/ ming sogs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bsdams/ /ma/ rdo rje chen po'i lugs de las/ /brjod kyis mi lang sangs rgyas byung/ /der gnas sangs rgyas zhing nyid du/ /sems can smin phyir rab tu zhugs/ /de
70b1(rgyud 'grel): ltar sngags pa yi ge yis/ /don gye brngar btags rab brjod pa'o/ /de don rtag tu bsgom pa pa/ /snying la 'khor lo brgyad drug sogs/ /de phyir byang sems rdo rje yi/ /sprul pa thog ma tha ma shes/ /de bzhin sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /sprul pa 'bum sogs
70b2(rgyud 'grel): grangs med do/ /de dag bde ba'i gzugs su ste/ /tshigs bcad gsum las yang dag byung/ /de dag gzhan yang 'di ltar sogs/ /bskal pa bzang po 'di las skyes/ /a yig gsum las yang dag rdzogs/ /bo d+hi tsit+ta yi ge de'o/ /de las sku rnams
70b3(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa ni/ /chos dang longs spyod bde chen po/ /sna tshogs rnal 'byor sbyor ba las/ /rtag tu sprul pa nyid kyang skye/ /gang phyir de ni srog chen po/ /mi zad skye ba rnam par spangs/ /sems 'dul ba'i bsam pa yis/ /dag gis thams cad brjod pa yin/ /
70b4(rgyud 'grel): dang? phyir sgyu 'phrul dra ba tsam/ /rgyud med sangs rgyas rnam kyis gsungs/ /des na tshigs bcad de gnyis dang/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i de bzhin gsum/ /lnga yis spyi gtsug 'khor lo bshad/ /gnyis gnyis sbyor las yang dag byung/ /yang ni
70b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar shes bya sogs/ /de yang tshigs bcad bcu bzhi ste/ /de rnams tshigs bcad gnyis dang ni/ /lhag ma bcu gnyis kyi nang nas/ /brgyad kyis snying kha'i 'khor lo'o/ /gzhan yang bzhi yis shes bya ba/ /'khor lo'i nang nas
70b6(rgyud 'grel): dbral ba'i 'o/ /de ltar thams cad shes bya ba/ /ngag gi dbang phyug chos kyi dbyings/ /don dam la ni bstod pa'o/ /nye bar bsdus pa las spyi gtsug gi 'khor lo'i rnam par rtog ge zhes bya ste/ gnyis pa'o/ /gzhan yang snying kha'i
70b7(rgyud 'grel): bu ga yi/ /tshigs bcad brgyad pa brjod par bya/ /sems kyi thig le dag gi ming/ /dang po'i ming nas kun gzhi mthang/ /de rnams ming du btags pa ni/ /brgyad cu rtsa drug dag tu brjod/ /gzhan du gsungs pas rnyed sla bas/
71a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni bdag gis ma brjod de/ /de dag nges tshig tu gyur pa/ /ji ltar bslab pa'i man ngag las/ /chen po chen po chen po sogs/ theg pa chen po'i tshul mchog gis/ ji srid mdza' ru thug pa'i bar/ /tshig dag drug cu rtsa
71a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga ste/ /rtag tu zhes bya chen po dag /de bzhin 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dbye ba las/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni drug cu'o/ /de bzhin sngar ni brjod pa las/ /rA hu las ni long spyod byed/ /de dag gis ni dang po'i don/ /
71a3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar gsal ba brjod par bya/ /ji ltar de yi lha rnams ni/ /ngag gi dbang phyug chos kyi dbyings/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas snying kha ru/ /ye shes sems dpa' brjod pa'o/ /de'i snying khar sa bon dag /'dod chags la sogs lnga'i dngos/ /
71a4(rgyud 'grel): de re dag la bcu gnyis dngos/ /yi ge bcu gnyis dag tu dbye/ /dang po dbyangs yig thung ngu ste/ /gnyis po de bzhin ring po'i/ /gsum pa thig ler sbyor ba'o/ /tsheg drag sbyor ba bzhi pa yin/ lnga pa drag po'i thig le can/ /dbyangs ?
71a5(rgyud 'grel): yig grangs su shes bar bya/ /ji ltar dbu yi rnal 'byor la/ /gzung bas rnam 'byor pha rol 'gro/ /de dag thung ngu chen po lnga/ /'dod chags la sogs dbu mar gnas/ /gang phyir rtag tu ring po ni/ /chen po chen po'i de ltar brtags/ /
71a6(rgyud 'grel): gang phyir 'dod chags la sogs bzhi/ /dang po sangs rgyas de bzhin gnyis/ /nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor gnas su ni/ /nyi ma'i lam gyi lha rnams so/ /gzhan yang g.yon pa'i lam gyi ni/ /nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor drug la ni/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas
71a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dag dang/ /de bzhin rdo rje rnon po gzhan/ /rdo rje ral gri ye shes sku/ /ngag gi dbang phyug drug pa'o/ /de bzhin g.yon pa'i zla ba las/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor lha rnams so/ /sna tshogs rdo rje rdo rje las/ /bsrung ba gnod sbyin khu tshur
71b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ /rdo rje dang po kun ming la/ /de bzhin du yang rdo rje gar/ /de la me yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /chos kyi rdo rje rdo rje chos/ /de bzhin rnon po rgyur smra ba/ /de bzhin gzhan yang rdo rje klu/ /ming gi mang por rdo rje ldan/ /de dag g.yon gyi zla 'bab pa'o/ /da la? de
71b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin chu dkyil 'khor/ /sems dpa' i rdo rje rdo rje sems/ /rgyal po chengs ba de bzhin legs/ /de bzhin gzhan yang rdo rje sgeg /de las sa yi dkyil 'khor las/ /rdo rje rin chen rin rdo rje/ /nyi ma rgyal mtshan de bzhin bzhad/ de bzhin gzhan
71b3(rgyud 'grel): yang rdor phreng ma'o/ /de bzhin g.yas kyi nyi ma yi/ /sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor te/ /sbos kyi glang po ye shes tog /'bar ba'i 'od dang nyi ma'i 'od/ /de bzhin me tog rdo rje zhags/ gzhan yang chu yi dkyil 'khor las/ /de bzhin byams
71b4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'jam pa'i dpal/ /de bzhin du ni thabs kun skye/ /mya ngan mun pa thams cad ni/ /nges par 'dzams pa'i blo gros gzhan/ /bdug spos rdo rje 'gugs byed pa'o/ /de bzhin me yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /de la rgya mtsho'i blo gros dang/ /de bzhin blo gros mi
71b5(rgyud 'grel): zad rim/ /zla ba'i 'od dang bdud rtsi'i 'od/ /de bzhin mar me lcags sgrog ma'o/ /de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /pra tI b+ha na brtsegs pa'i mchog /gnas chen po ni thob pa dang/ /nam mkha' mdzod ni gsum pa'o/ /sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang/ /
71b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba rdo rje dril bu ma'o/ /de ltar dbu ma'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rA hu la yi rgya bar shas/ /gang phyir rtag tu thim pa ni/ /'dod chags pa sogs drug cu lnga/ /dkyil 'khor re re'i mdza' ru ni/ /ye shes pha rol 'gro bar shes/ /chen sogs
71b7(rgyud 'grel): tshigs bcad brgyad kyi mdza' / bsam pa ye shes rgya mtsho ste/ /de bzhin byams sogs ji srid pa/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /bzhi dag spyi bo nas skye ba'o/ /brgyad ni snying kha nad nas so/ /rdo rje 'jam pa'i rang bzhin la/ /ye shes skyes pa'i bstong?
72a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /gang phyir brgyad cu rtsa drug chig /mdza' ru bshad par yang dag gnas/ /de ltar snying khar 'khor lo yi/ /thig le'i sgra ni yi ge med/ /nye bar bsdus pa las ngag gi dbang phyug chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rtog ba/
72a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o/ //de bzhin dpral ba yi 'khor lo/ /rkad gcig med pa nyi shu lnga'i/ /tshigs su bcad pa chos dbyings kyi/ /ji ltar rgyal bas gsal bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad chen sogs/ /dad pa'i ming du brjod
72a3(rgyud 'grel): btags pas/ /mtshan nyid du ma brjod pa yang/ /rang nyid bsgom pa klog pa'o/ /bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings lta bur/ /sems dang sems min brtags pa med/ /dbu ma'i nang gi rnal 'byor ro/ /yid kyi mthu bo'i gnas su de/ /gang phyir rnam
72a4(rgyud 'grel): bar snang mdzad che/ /las dag pa yi dbyings can yin/ /theg pa chen po'i chos yin te/ /sems can dgos pa'i rgyu can du/ /skye ba ma yin 'gag pa med/ /rkyen gyi don phyir 'ba' shig po/ /gzugs brnyan smig rgyu lta bur ni/ /mthong ste spyod
72a5(rgyud 'grel): yul dngos ma yin/ /skyes kyang bdag tu grub ma yin/ /de las ma gtogs gzhan yang min/ /de la gang phyir byas skyes min/ /rang nyid ma grub byed po gang/ /sems can chen po de phyir las/ /blo yi ming tsam gyis byas pa'o/ /ngas na ming dang
72a6(rgyud 'grel): tshig gis bsus/ /rnam snang mdzad sogs yang dag byung /de las byas seng+ge zhes bya'i ming /thub pa chen po rab gsal byed/ thub chen zhes bya thub pa'o/ /gsang sngags tshul chen ku su pa/ /skye 'byung zhes bya me tog go /gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can
72a7(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang po/ /pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ni/ /kun gyi ded dpon du brjod pa'o/ /pha rol phyin pa bcur gnas pa/ /phyag rgya chen po'i ming nyid do/ /pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ni/ /stobs po che ru brjod pa yin/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu
72b1(rgyud 'grel): tshul ni/ /rgyu skar rnams kyi rgyal po'i ming/ /sa bcu yi ni dbang phyug ni/ /sman ldan byang chub sems dpa' o/ /mgon po zhes bya de bzhin grags/ /sa bcu la ni gnas pa po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal mtshan ming/ /shes bcu po ni 'od zer che/ /rnam
72b2(rgyud 'grel): dag bdag nyid grol phung po/ /shes bcu rnam dag 'chad ba ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam snang mdzad/ /rnam pa bcu pa nyi ma'i snying/ /don bcu zhes pa zla ba'i ming/ /don zhes de bzhin 'od zer can/ /thub dbang zhes pa 'od 'phro bzang/ /stobs bcu
72b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa mya ngan med/ /khyab bdag ces pa de bzhin sgeg /kun gyi don ni ma lus byed/ /phreng ba'i 'dzin par brjod pa'o/ /rnam bcu zhes pa yon tan 'od/ /dbang ldan zhes pa don ston pa'o/ /che zhes pa ni me mer ldan/ /thog med ces pa rab grub pa'o/ /
72b4(rgyud 'grel): spros med bdag ni sman zhe'o/ /dam pa'i bdag ni dpal zhes bya/ /de bzhin nyid dag mjad spu zhe'o/ /bden par smra ba bstan pa'o/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi lha'o/ /gzhan gyi tshig min mthong bar dka' / /gnyis
72b5(rgyud 'grel): su zhes pa yon tan tog /gnyis med ldan pa sgra gcan no/ /yang dag mdza' la rnam par gnas/ /byang chub sems dpa' grangs can min/ /bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /mu stegs ri dags zhes pa'i sgra/ /
72b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'i mtshams zhes bya ba'i ming/ /'jigs byed ces pa rigs par ldan/ /kun tu 'gro ba 'od mdzad pa'o/ /don yod stobs po zhes pa ni/ /ri bo chen po zhes brjod pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid mgyogs ni/ /da bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i
72b7(rgyud 'grel): ming/ /rgyal brgyal min zhes pa'i mtshan/ /dgra rgyal zhes pa 'jigs med pa'o/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i rin chen mtshan/ /'khor los sgyur ba pad+mar gsungs/ /stobs po che ni stobs sde can/ /tshogs kyi gtso bo me tog 'od/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon
73a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes 'od/ /tshogs rje zhes pa lha chen po/ /tshangs pa tshogs kyi bdag po'o/ /btsugs pa chen po snang mdza' yas/ /ring po ste ni klus byin no/ /gzhan gyi tshul ni bstan pa'i rim/ /tshul chen po ni don yod mthong/ /tshig
73a2(rgyud 'grel): rje zhes pa dpa' bo sbyin/ /tshig bdag ces pa mi ltung ba/ /tshig mkhas pa ni seng rgyal mtshan/ /tshig dbang zhes pa rgyal ba'o/ /tshig mdza' yas pa chos pa'o/ /tshig bden pa ni dka' ba'i rgyal/ /bden pa smra ba don 'dod pa'o/ /bden pa
73a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ni nyer ston pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba mdzad/ phyir mi ldog pa chu yi lha/ /phyir mi 'od ba yon tan lag /bse ru zhes pa yangs pa'i spyan/ /'dren pa rang rgyal zhes bya ba/ /don yod dbyangs can zhes pa'i mtshan/ /sna tshogs
73a4(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'das las byung/ /thugs bzang po zhes bya bar brjod/ /'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po/ /rtag tu zla ba'i mtshan du gnas/ /dgra bcom zhes pa'i ri bod can/ /zag pa zad pa grags chen po/ /dge slong zhes pa gtsug nor bu/ /'dod
73a5(rgyud 'grel): chags bral ba zhes drag po/ /thub pa zhes pa seng ge 'gros/ /bde ba rnyed pa dang pa'i ming/ /'jigs med thob pa zhes pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam rgyal don/ /bsil bar gyur ba shes rab brtsegs/ /rnyog med pa ni legs gnas
73a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rig pa spyod pa phun sum tshogs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mtshan/ /bde gshegs shes pa yan lag skyes/ /'jig rten rig pa'i mchog ces pa/ /bdud rtse blo zhes pa yi mtshan/ /bdag gir mi 'dzin gzugs bzad po/ /
73a7(rgyud 'grel): ngar mi 'dzin ni ye shes can/ /bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtshan/ /'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son pa/ /sangs rgyas bdar ba'i dkar 'od can/ /bya ba byas ba bkra shis ldan/ /skam sar gnas bu bden
73b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tog /ye shes 'ba' shig las byung ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mtshan/ /shes rab mtshon chen rnam 'joms pa/ /mi yi theg pa zhes pa'i mtshan/ /dam chos zhes bya bde ba'i lag /chos rgyal zhes pa'i mtshan yang ni/ /de bzhin/
73b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mdzad pa'i blo/ /gsal ldan zhes pa 'ang bral min/ /'jig rten snang byed ces pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas byin/ /mchog ni de bzhin rin chen mdzad/ /chos kyi dbang phyug me tog lha/ /chos kyi rgyal ni legs bsam ngan/ /
73b3(rgyud 'grel): legs pa'i lam ni chos dbang phyug /nye bar ston pa blo gros grags/ /den yod grub pa rdo rje tog /bsam pa 'grub pa pan sgrub pa'o/ /kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /rnam par rol pa'i mde? can no/ /rnam par mi rtag rtogs pa'i mchog /mi
73b4(rgyud 'grel): zad ces pa du pa'i lha/ /chos dbyings zhes pa dri yi tog /chos kyi dbyings ni 'od kyi tshogs/ /chos dbyings dam pa mi zad ming/ /dam pa de bzhin rin chen snying/ /bsod nams ldan zhes bya ba ni/ /bsod nams ldan pa grong khyer mthong/ /bsong
73b5(rgyud 'grel): nams tshogs ni chos pa'o/ /ye shes shes pa yid kyi yul/ /ye shes mdzad pa yon tan grogs/ /chen po zhes bya zla ba'i don/ /ye shes ldan ni gsal pa'i ro/ /yod med shes zhes bya ba ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i tog /tshogs
73b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis tshogs na bsags pa'o/ /lus las bzlog dpal zhes bya'i mtshan/ rtag pa zhes bya snying po dpal/ /kun rgyal dngos po'i mthar ston pa'o/ /rnal 'byor zhes bya glog gi'o/ /bsam bya zhes bya gser gyi sbyin/ /bsam pa'i bdag
73b7(rgyud 'grel): po gang phyir tshig /de bzhin gzhan gyis mi thub tog so so rang rig ces pa'i rgyal/ /mi g.yo ba ni rab grub grags/ /mchog gi dang po brtson 'grus brtan/ /sku gsum 'chad ba zhes pa'i tshig /dpe bral zhes pa grags pa'i mtshan/ /sku
74a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i bdag nyid can zhes pa/ /sangs rgyas 'jigs pa shin tu gyur/ /de la ye shes lnga bdag ni/ /mar me chen po zhes pa'i mtshan/ /khyab bdag ces pa 'jig rten 'od/ /sangs rgyas lnga bdag ces bya ni/ /
74a2(rgyud 'grel): dre yi bdag por grags pa'o/ /yon tan rtse 'dzin cod pan can/ /spyan lnga zhes pa mun bral gyur/ /chags med 'chang ba seng ge spre/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags/ /sangs rgyas sras po skyod?
74a3(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin/ /dam chos yi skyed zla ba'o/ /shes rab srid pa legs par ston/ /skye 'byung gzugs brnyan brgyan pa'o/ /skye gnas shes pa she bu bzang/ /chos las byung ba gang phyin tshig /ri bo brtsegs pa tog gi ming/ /'byung ba srid sol
74a4(rgyud 'grel): chos 'byung gnas /de la gcig bu sa 'khregs gzhan/ /rnam par don nges ye shes can/ /rdo rje'i bdag ni chos ste ba'o/ /skyes ma thag ni rin chen gnas/ /gang phyir 'gro ba'i bdag gi tshig /rgyal ba'i dbang po btags pa'i ming/ /nam
74a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' las byung ston pa ni/ /seng ge rnam mnon 'gro ba'o/ /rang byang ba ni gnas pa'i blo/ /shes rab ye shes shes pa ni/ /skal bral gdugs shes pa yi mtshan/ /chen po thu bo de bzhin gshegs/ /rnam par snang mdzad brjod pa'i
74a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal/ /'od chen po ni seng ga'i sgra/ /snang bar byid ni rnam rol pa'o/ /rnam par snang ba klu yi 'od/ /'gro ba'i mar me zhes bya ni/ /me tog ri zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /ye shes skar ma gla dga' can/ /gzi brjid chen po dri dbang phyug/ /
74a7(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsal ba ni shin tu bsam/ /rig sngags rgyal ni stobs kyi lha/ /sngags mchog ces pa yon tan phred/ /gsang sngags rgyal po klu yi phyag /don chen byed ni gzugs brnyan brgyan/ /gtsug phung chen po rgyas pa'i blo/ /rmad byung gtsug ni ye
74b1(rgyud 'grel): shes khyab/ /de bzhin sna tshogs ston pa ni/ /bdud rtsi mig can zhes bya'o/ /nam mkha' bdag po bdan par smra/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi mchog /de bzhin gshegs pa rab zhi blo/ /'gro kun dga' ba'i mig ldan ni/ /mdza' yas
74b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs shes bya ba'i mtshan/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni rnam snang mdzad/ /skyed pa po ni rin chen tog /mchod pa zhes bya 'dod pa bral/ gus pa legs zhibs zhes pa'i mtshan/ /drang srong chen po zhes pa'i sgra/ /don yod sangs rgyas rin
74b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /gzhan yang rigs gsum 'chang zhes pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs pa 'chang/ /sngags can zhes pa me tog tog /dam tshig chen po sngags 'chang ba/ /ming ni rdo rje dbang rgyal po/ /dkon mchog gsum zhes bya ba'i tshig
74b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas gzi brjid chen po can/ /gtso bo 'dzin pa don ston mdzad/ /theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med/ /don yod zhags pa gang phyir gzhan/ /khro bo dbang phyug tu ni 'dod/ /rnal 'byor don
74b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas ye shes can/ /rdo rje zhags pa de bzhin du/ /mi shigs grags par ming du btags/ /'dzin pa chen por rnam bshad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dri ma bral/ /zhags pa che ni tsha ba'i lha'o/ /de ltar de dag
74b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan kun ni/ /a ba d+hA tI'i nang nas skyes/ /dkyil 'khor gcig gi nang du yang/ /zhugs bas sangs rgyas spyod yul lo/ /skye dang 'gags pa shes pa las/ /lcas kyi skye sogs rnam par spangs/ /ye shes chen po chos kyi dbyings/ /
74b7(rgyud 'grel): brgya rang brgya ru rtsa gcig /gang phyir tha lam 'khrul pa ni/ /dngos po skye dang 'jig la sogs/ /de nyid spangs pas grol ba ni/ /mkhas pas srid pa mdzad pas so/ /de ltar rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs/ /sngags kyi ming gi sbyor ba ni/ /de
75a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams bshad par bya ba ni/ /theg pa gsum sogs chos lugs su/ /slob dpon du ma yis ni gsungs/ /de dag gis ni ma bshad de/ /rol pa'i rdo rje'i 'grel pa las/ /mdo ru bsdus pa rgyu gnyis tsam/ /de'i
75a2(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma shes par bya'o/ /yang ni gzhan du bstan pa ste/ /'on kyang thams cad yongs ma rdzogs/ /gang phyir mdza' yang sangs rgyas gsungs/ /tshad mar thams cad mi gnas te/ /de phyir chos ni rgyal ba yis/ /ming nyid mang po chos mang po/ /chos
75a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings kyi dang du bshad/ /nye bar bsdus pa las chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam par rtog ge shes bya ba ste bzhi pa'o/ /ming ni mang po bsdus pa yis/ /rnam pa mang po bshad par bya/ /cung zad man dag gis kun bsgrubs/ /sngon du me long ye shes te/
75a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dang rgyud nang tha dad pa/ /'dir ni yang dag bsdus pa'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa bzhi cha sogs/ /mchen ni bdun cu rtsa gcig gis/ /de'i nang nas tshigs bcad gsum/ /cha lhag ma ni dpral ba ru/ /lhag ma bdun ni yang dag bshad/ /
75a5(rgyud 'grel): lte ba'i 'khor lo'i spubs su ni/ /de phyir rdo rje 'jigs byed sogs/ /sgra dang ldan pa nam mkha' o/ /de lta bu yi bar du ni/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje rtag tu gnas/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud las te/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed khro bo ni/ /phyag dang zhal dang zhabs rnams ni/ /
75a6(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa gsum dgu bcu drug /de ltar brdra yi gzugs dang ni/ /rnal 'byor dus kyi bdag nyid do/ /dga' bas bcu drug zhabs nyid do/ /bu ga dgu ni zhal nyid do/ /phyag ni lta ba bdag nyid bshad/ /gnyis po bzhin ni nang song brtag /de ltar
75a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi nang du ni/ /yid kyi sbyor bas 'jigs par byed/ /khro bo rgyal po zhes pa'i mtshan/ /khro bo rnam rgyal rgyud las ni/ /rtog pa phung po ma lus pa/ /gang du longs spyod bya phyi ro/ /de la 'di ni zhal drug pa/ /yan lag drug tu rnam thar?
75b1(rgyud 'grel): bstan/ /de nyid sgyu 'phrul dra ba ru/ /dngos po lnga bcu rtsa drug ste/ /gzhan yang de bzhin bshad par bya/ /gnyis bsdoms grangs ni drug cu ste/ /phyag dang zhabs su shes par bya/ /khro bo rgyal po ming nyid do/ /'jigs pa 'gro kun dbang byed de/ /khro bo'i
75b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs ni spros pas so/ /de dag gi ni rang bzhin kun/ /phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur las/ /mig drug ces pa khams drug gi /ye shes la sogs pa yi mthar/ /lpags sogs la ni de shes bya/ /gang phyir sdom pa sor yang 'grub/ /lag drug ces
75b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dkyil 'khor te/ /zla ba nyi ma gnyis la brten/ /rtag tu thim par gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor rgyan las so/ /stobs ni kun gzhi rnam par shes/ /srog ni ming du brjod pa yin/ /rnal 'byor rgyud las spyod pa gsungs/ /bla med dpal gyi rgyud las so/ /
75b4(rgyud 'grel): keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa'i sgra/ /de ni nye bar bstan bya ste/ /sngon du mtshe ba bskum pa ni/ /lce yis ha yis la reg bya/ /phyi nas lces ni rkan bskyod gzungs/ /rdo rje tshogs 'thon rgyud las so/ /keng rus zhes pa bshad pa ni/ /'chi ba blu ba'i bdag
75b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid de/ /ra ka ta 'bar bas mdzed pa ste/ /'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud las so/ /ha la ha la zhes sdom pa/ /shes rab dbugs kyi bar byed pa/ /gnyis gnyis sbyor ba gsungs pa ste/ don yod zhags pa'i rgyud las so/ /gdong brgya pa zhes gsungs
75b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ /rtsa brgya yi ni rang bzhin can/ /de yi gtso bsting nyid de/ /rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las so/ /gshin rje gshed ni thig le ste/ /drug gi nang du yid nyid de/ /de yi mtshan nyid bshad pa yang/ /gsang 'dus phyi ma'i rgyud las so/ /bgegs
75b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal zhes bya ba'i ming/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rnal 'byor can/ /'og gi sgo nas bkug pa ste/ /sgyu 'phrul dra sogs rgyud las so/ /rdo rje shugs zhes bya ba'i ming/ /gang du rtag tu skye sa bon/ /sngon du bde ba 'dus pa ste/ /dam tshig chen po'i
76a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las so/ /gzhan yang 'jigs byed gsungs pa ni/ /log pa'i dbang po rnam par 'joms/ /steng dang 'og tu song zhing stan/ /gsang dbang thig le'i rgyud las so/ /rdo rje grags pa zhes bshad pa/ /lte bar gnyis med
76a2(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul can/ /rtag tu thabs dang shes rab las/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i rgyud las so/ /rdo rje snying po zhes bya'i tshig /mtshan nyid mtshan med dang ldan pa/ /gnyis ka spang bar shes par bya/ /zla gsang thig le'i rgyud las gsungs/ /sgyu
76a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul rdo rje zhes pa ni/ /gnyis gnyis rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /dngos po dngos med phyi na bden/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las gsungs pa'o/ /gsus po che zhes bya ba'i tshig /stong gsum stong gi chen por 'gro/ /de 'og yang dag gsungs pa yang/ /
76a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad yang min lhag ma'o/ /rdo rje bdag ces bya ba'i tshig /rdo rje bu ga gnyis nas ni/ /steng dang 'og tu yang dag dbab/ /rdo rje sa 'og rgyud las so/ /rdo rje skye gnas shes pa ni/ /'byung bzhi bdag nyid las byung ba/ /rtag phur bdud rtsi rnam lnga 'dzin
76a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po 'dul pa'i rgyud las so/ /rdo rje snying po zhes bshad pa/ /spyi bor dri ma med par 'gyur/ /mi 'gyur pa yi rlung nyid de/ /rdor snying rgyan gyi rgyud las so/ /mkha' 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ming/ /khams ni sum cu rtsa drug grangs/ /rigs dang rigs
76a6(rgyud 'grel): ni gnyis ka bral/ /de yang sangs rgyas rgyud las so/ /mi g.yo byang chub sa bon te/ /rlung dang srog ni g.yo bas so/ /des ni de nyid 'thob pa ste/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las so/ /ral pa gcig ces bshad pa yang/ /steng dang 'og gi lce gnyis
76a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ /de dag bsdams pa gnas kyi sgor/ /glang chen ko rlon zhes pa'i tshig /lha yi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /a ba d+hU tIr yid song nas/ /nang gi bu ga'i dbus su bsgom/ /'gro ba dga' dang bcas par byed/ /lus dang ngag gnyis yang
76b1(rgyud 'grel): dag byung/ /rtag tu chos kyi dbyings bdag las/ /'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud las so/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams gnas las skye/ /chogs kyi dbus na rol pa yang/ /snying rje ro yi sbyor ba las/ /btung ba sa bon bde chen po/ /ha ha zhes sgra sgrogs pa'i ming/ /bsil
76b2(rgyud 'grel): ba bcu gnyis mtshams su song/ /de yang sgra mtshams lkog gnyir mthar/ /khro bo rnam rgyal rgyud las so/ /de la grags chen zhes bya ba/ /rang 'byung sgra las brten nas ni/ /mthil gnyis sprang pas 'dar ba ste/ /lce dang lce'u chung phrad pas so/ /hi hi
76b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes sgrogs zhes bshad pa/ /gong du bshad pa'i tshig bzhin te/ /rnal 'byor gyis ni 'grogs par byed/ /khro zla'i thig le rgyud las so/ /'jigs par byed ces bya ba ni/ /'gog pa mchog gi rim pa las/ /nan tan gyis ni 'du bar 'gyur/ /
76b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kun las ni bsdus las gsungs/ /gang rgyangs shes pa mchog tshim pa/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor bas skye/ /rgyud mi 'chang par sbyor ba ni/ /gang mo chen po zhes brjod do/ /sa bon thim par gyur pa'i phyir/ /ye shes gang mo rgya chen po/ /rdo rje
76b5(rgyud 'grel): gad mo'i rnam grangs te/ /yid ldan rnal 'byor spyod pas so/ /che sgrogs zhes ni rnam bshad pa/ /rtsa gsum dag ni gang ba'o/ /yang na kha dang kha sbyor ba/ /rtag tu shes rab kyis ni byed/ /gsang ba thun mong ma yin dpal/ /rgyan bkod pa yi rgyud
76b6(rgyud 'grel): las gsungs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa'i mtshan/ /mchog gi tshim pa brjod pa'o/ /sems dpa' chen po zhes gsungs pa/ /rgyun mi 'chad par 'bar ba'o/ /de bzhin rdo rje rgyal po ni/ /sa bon thim par byed pa'o/ /gang phyir bde ba chen po'i tshig/
76b7(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu shes rab las la gus/ /de ltar rdo rje sems dpa' sogs/ /gsum pa dag ni go rims bzhin/ /mchog gi dang po gsung ba 'dus/ /de bzhin gsang mdzad gzhan yang ni/ /rnal 'byor rgyud gsum las gsungs pa'o/ /de dag thabs kyi mtshan
77a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid de/ /'khor lo sdom pa 'ba' shig ni/ /shes rab kyi ni rgyud na bshad/ /des na rdo rje drag ces te/ /brjod pa las kyi shes rab las/ /gtum po 'bar ba'i sgyu ma ni/ /rdo rje rtsa bar lam nyid de/ /de ni myur 'gro
77a2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor te/ /bdud rtsi btung ba stang du 'gro/ yang dag 'jug la bdag las min/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud las so/ /dga' ba che zhes bya ba'i ming/ /rang gi ye shes bdag nyid che/ /gnas pa ma yin mi gnas min/ /gsang nor
77a3(rgyud 'grel): thig le rgyud las so/ /rdo rje hUM sto hUM zhes pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rnam grangs te/ /sum b+ha ni la sogs pa'i sngags/ /de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las so/ /mtshon du rdo rje mnga' thogs min/ /don nyid kyi ni bshad bya ste/ /ji ltar
77a4(rgyud 'grel): shugs kyis sbyor gsungs dang/ /dngos po de sgom gnyis pa'o/ /des na rdo rje dang ni mdza' / /rdo rje mda' ni mchog tu 'dzin/ /de dag dgongs pa'i tshig yin te/ /dam tshig chen po'i rgyud las so/ /rdo rje la gi zhes pa'i mtshan/ /de
77a5(rgyud 'grel): yang gnyis su gsungs pa ste/ /nam mkha' lnga yi dbus rdo rje/ /ral gri gsang ba'i pad+ma lo/ /de ltar rdo rje dang ral gri/ /gnyis ka 'dzin bas phyag mtshan te/ /phan tshun las ni srog 'gugs pa/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las so/ /de dag ma
77a6(rgyud 'grel): lus gcod ces pa/ /rtog pa yang dag byung ba gcod/ /'od gsal bar gsungs bdag nyid de/ /sems dang sems byung rtog pa gcod/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'chang zhes pa/ /srog la sogs pa'i rlung lnga pa/ /rnal 'byor gyis ni ma lus bzung
77a7(rgyud 'grel): mngon par byang chub rgyud las so/ /de la rdo rje can zhes la/ /ye shes dbyer med ngo bo ste/ /de 'dzin pas ni rdo rje can/ /yang na du ba la sogs lam/ /rdo rje gcig pu zhes bshad pa/ /rnal 'byor ngo bo sngar gsungs bzhin/ /gnyis ka thim?
77b1(rgyud 'grel): bar thal bar 'byung/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i rgyud las so/ /gang phyir g.yul las zhes pa'i tshig /'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs gcod/ /rgyal ba rnam par rgyal ba ste/ /khams gsum rnam pa rgyad las so/ /rdo rje 'bar
77b2(rgyud 'grel): mig mi bzang/ /nang gi don du bsgrub pa ste/ /ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /ji ltar rmi lam de bzhin snang/ /ji ltar sgyu ma de bzhin gzhan/ /de ltar rdo rje dang 'bar ba'i/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud las so/ /de lta bu yi snang
77b3(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ /mtsho skyes rdo rje 'bar ba ste/ /rtsa rnams pad+mar yang dag bshad/ /'bar bas sems ni 'gugs pa'o/ /rdo rje 'beb shes la sogs pa/ /khro bo bzhi yi ming yin te/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor dbang po las/ /rtag tu rdo rje dbab par
77b4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de bzhin gzhan yang 'beb pa che/ /spyod yul thim par longs spyod ngo/ /mig brgyas thams cad mthong ba dang/ /ribs mchog gnyis su med pa spong/ /rdo rje mig ces bye ba'i sgra/ /sangs rgyas gnas ni mi zad pa/ /rna bas rna bar
77b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyud pa yin/ /bla mas slob ma shes par bya/ /de la rdo rje ba sbu sogs/ /gnyis su dbye bar gsungs pa ste/ /dang po gcig ni mi 'gyur don/ /rnal 'byor ma dag rang las skyes/ /rdo rje pa spu gnyis pa ni/ /rtsa ni bye ba phyed dang bzhi/ /yang
77b6(rgyud 'grel): na brgyad cu'i grangs kyis te/ /byang chub sems kyi ba spu las/ /myu gu bskyed pa de dag go /tha mal pa yi dri ma med/ /de yang las la rab 'jug phyir/ /rdo rje spu ni gcig pu lus/ /de yi don gyi khyad par yang/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor
77b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal las gsungs/ /rdo rje rtse zhes bya ba'i ming/ /'jig pa ru ni gsungs pa ste/ /de yi dus kyi gnas skabs kyang/ /rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las so/ /de dag dang 'dra gzhan yang ni/ /sen mi skyes pa brjod bya ste/ /mi 'byung ba na 'byung ba ste/ /rdo rje
78a1(rgyud 'grel): rtse de sngar gzhan na/ gang phyir rdo rje snying po'i tshig /chos 'byung nang du thim pa'o/ /lpags pa mkhregs pa rnam bshad pa/ /bla ma rgyud pa'i gus rim gyis/ /rdo rje phreng sogs shes pa ni/ /rtag tu phra mo bya ba las/ /rtog pa thams
78a2(rgyud 'grel): cad rnam 'joms pa/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i sgrar gsungs pa'o/ /rdo rje brgyan gyis zhes pa ni/ /sngon du gsungs pa rnal 'byor tshul/ /brgyan pa skal pa phun sum tshogs/ /'khor lo rnam rgyal rgyud las so/ /ha ha gang rgyangs zhes pa ni/ /rtag tu
78a3(rgyud 'grel): goms par bya ba ste/ /spyi bo sogs nas nor bu'i mdza' / /'dar zhing rgod pa thub pa'o/ /rgyangs ni srog gi thig le ste/ /de dag thim par bsam par bya/ /dur khrong sa ni rkang mnan pa pas/ /rgyangs dang ldan par gnas pa ste/ dur khrod bcu
78a4(rgyud 'grel): drug rtag bshad pa/ /khams ni bcu yi bdag nyid do/ /ha ha gang rgyangs steng gi lam/ /lag bzangs dpal gyi rgyud las bstan/ /'on kyang de kun brjod pa ni/ /gsang ba la sogs tshig gi rim/ /nges par grags pa zhes pa'i tshig /nges
78a5(rgyud 'grel): par 'byung nas 'og tu song/ /zhugs pa'i sgra ni sgyu ba ste/ /dpa' bo gcig pa'i rgyud las so/ /rdo rje sgra zhes bya ba ni/ /sgra yang a ba d+hU tI'i dbus/ /dgos pa thams cad nyan pa ni/ /brgya stong bsdus pa'i rgyud las so/ /yi ge drug ces bya ba ni/ /
78a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor drug tu bsngam bya ba/ /mi 'gyur mchog gi rnal 'byor gyis/ /shes rab drug gi tshul rgyud las/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i tshig /rtag tu 'khor lo drug tu srog /grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma yin sdom/ /'phags pa
78a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal rgyud las gsungs/ /sgra che ba zhes bya ba'i tshig /gnyis med ye shes spyod yul te/ /de bas spul pa thams cad 'byung/ /mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las so/ /'jig rten gsum las bya ba'i tshig /sa na phra ba'i rang bzhin
78b1(rgyud 'grel): can/ /nang dang phyi rol dbyer med de/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal rgyud las so/ /de nas chen po sgra gcig ste/ /sgom pa thu po'i dbus su ni/ /sgra gcig bstan pa'i chos kyis ni/ /sa 'ogs stengs mtho ris la/ /nam mkha' i dbyings la sogs
78b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /tshigs bcad du mas de nyid ston/ /pad+ma yongs rdzogs nam mkha' yi/ /khams ni rnam shes brgyad pa ste/ /rnal 'byor dgongs pa'i bar du 'gro/ /rang byung skra ni sgrogs pa'o/ /de dag dus ni bzhi rnams so/ /sku bzhi dag ni yang
78b3(rgyud 'grel): ngag byung/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /yang na gzhan duAng brjod par bya'o/ /dga' ldan nam mkha' zhes bya ba/ /sngar kun gsungs pa'i mchen nyid yin/ /'jam dpal gyis ni rgyud las ni/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor pa yis bya/ /de
78b4(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'dir ni rnal 'byor bshad/ /bdun cu rtsa gcig ming gis so/ /thams cad spros pa'i rgyud nyid kyang/ /ji ltar mngon rtogs rims las gsungs/ /rnal 'byor sbyong dang bya rgyud dag /shin tu rgyas pa yang dag byung/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni
78b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul chen po/ /yang na rnam pa sna tshogs byung/ /me long ye shes kyis ni sku'i/ /cho ga rnam pa du ma byas/ /gzhung ni gsal ngang mi gsal bas/ /zhal nas zhal du brjod par bya/ /de ltar mi bskyod rdo rje yi/ /ting 'dzin ni thams cad gsungs
78b6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings sogs ye shes kyi/ /nang nyid du ni rtag tu gnas/ /sngon du rnal 'byor yang dag byung/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni so sor rtog /rab tu gsal ba'i ye shes ni/ /rab tu gsal ba'i me long ngo/ /nye bar bsdus pa las me long lta
78b7(rgyud 'grel): bu'i ye shes kyi bstong pa'i rtog ge zhes bya ba ste lnga pa'o// //sngags kyi mtshan gyis sangs rgyas te/ /de yi mtshan nyid brjod par bya/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin/ /rnal 'byor la brten rnal 'byor pa/ /nges nas bsam gtan
79a1(rgyud 'grel): yin pa bas/ /sangs rgyas ngag gi phrin las mdzad/ /ming ni don can 'dus zhes bya/ /gnyis med la ni gnyis 'byung ba/ /gnyis ni bden pa yod ma yin/ /sgyu ma lta bur rab tu grags/ /sems can 'dul ba'i
79a2(rgyud 'grel): don du ni/ /snang ba gnyis med rgyu can no/ /de la tshigs bcad bzhi bcu dang/ /de bzhin du ni gnyis lhag gzhan/ /mtshan dag kyang ni gnyis brgya dang/ /de bzhin bdun cu rtsa lnga dang/ /de bzhin nyid ces sogs pa nas/ /ye shes 'od ni 'od
79a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal mthang/ /de ltar sngon gsungs bdun po dang/ /de bzhin gshegs yang bzhi bcu dang/ /gnyis lhag par ni gsungs pa dang/ /bco lnga mnyam nyid ye shes kyi/ /nyer bsdus lte ba'i 'khor lo yi/ /drug cu du ni gsungs pa yin/ /de bzhin zhes pa
79a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes grags/ /yang dag pa zhes de bzhin rgyal/ /bdag med ces pa yon tan 'od/ /yang dag mthar sgra khyad par che/ /yi ge med pa zla ba gang/ /stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'od/ /zab mo zhes pa
79a5(rgyud 'grel): dka' thub? bzang/ /rgya che ba ni mar me rgyal/ /chos kyi dud ste glog gi tog /sgra chen po ni 'od kyi rgyal/ /chos kyi gaN+Di gsal ba'i rgyal/ /sgra bo che zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /dpe bral grags zhes brjod pa yin/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa ni/ /de
79a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa pdmong grags/ /phyogs bcu'i chos kyi nga bo che /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mchog /gzugs med pa ni spyan bzangs mchog /gzugs bzang po ni grags med don/ /dam pa zhes pa grags pa'i sde/ /sna tshogs gzugs
79a7(rgyud 'grel): ni bsod nams 'od/ /yid las skyes pa khyad par ro/ /gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal/ /chogs med blo can zhes pa'i ming/ /gzugs rnams ma lus 'chang ba ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rA hu la/ /mtshungs med pa ni ye shes
79b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od/ /cher grags zhes pa grogs dang ldan/ /khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ni/ /mtshan ni ye shes dbang po btags/ /'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i tog /chos kyi tog ni rA hu la/ /dar ba chen
79b2(rgyud 'grel): po sman chen no/ /'jig rten gsum cig sman pa'i rgyal/ /gzhon lus bsod nams dbang po yi/ /gnas brtan zhes pa rgyu ba'i mtshan/ /rgan po skar ma'i rgyal po'o/ /skye dgu'i bdag pa zhes pa'i mtshan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal pa'i
79b3(rgyud 'grel): sgra/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan zhes pa/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer 'char ba'o/ /sdug gu zhes pa chos kyi mdzod/ /'jig rten gsum na mdzes zhes pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros legs/ /yon tan slob dpon 'jig rten shes/ /rgyal pa'i
79b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang po mtshan du grags/ /'jig rten slob dpon rdo rje ste/ /'jigs pa med ni rdo rje brtsegs/ /mgon po sangs rgyas legs gnas pa/ skyob pa zhes pa rgyal ba'i blo/ /'jig rten gsum thob tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /skyabs zhes bya ba klu yi
79b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang/ /sgrol pa yon tan gsal dbang phyug /gang phyir bla na med pa'i tshig /ming gi mngon par shes pa'i tog /nam mkha' i mdza' la longs spyod ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi tog /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mtsho/ /
79b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa ngag pa'i mtshan/ /gzhan yang tshangs pa zhes su brjod/ /ma rig ces pa sgra mi snyan/ /sgro nga'i sbubs ni rol pa'i gar/ /yang dag 'byin ni klus sbyin no/ /sring pa dra ba bden pa'i tog /'jigs pa de bzhin mkhas
79b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshan/ /nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed ni/ /mtshan ni gzhan gyis mi thub dbyangs/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin/ /sangs rgyas rin chen 'od zer can/ /ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsung dbyangs sbyin/ /
80a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan byas ni/ /mtshan ni seng ge zhes btags pa'o/ /sdug bsngal gsum gyis sdug bsngal zhi/ /nyi ma sna tshogs zhes pa'i mtshan/ /gsum mdza' ye shes dpa' bo'o/ /sel ba pad+ma'i phung par?
80a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum grol zhes pa me tog go /sgrib pa gsum las nges grol ni/ rnam pa mnan cing 'gro ba'i dpal/ /mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid song ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsong nams spungs/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun spangs ni/ /mtshan ni
80a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gyur pa'i blo/ /dus gsum zhes pa gsal ba'i mtshan/ /dus med par song rtogs pa ni/ /zla ba'i mar me zhes pa'i mtshan/ /sems can kun ni mi zad pa'o/ /gtso bo che ni blo bzangs spyan/ /yon tan thod can rnams kyi gtsug
80a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag gtsug /nyon mongs kun las rnam grol ba/ /shes rab yul zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i nor bu gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu gyur/ /yid bzhin nor bu chen po
80a5(rgyud 'grel): 'chang/ /rab tu 'joms pa'i 'od der mtshan/ /rin chen kun gyi mchog ces pa/ /sangs rgyas zhes ba byin zhes bya/ /gang phyir khyab pa zhes pa'i tshig /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /dpag bsam shing chen zhes
80a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /chogs med 'dod pa zhes pa'i mtshan/ /sangs rgyas zhes pa thu bo sbyin/ /bum pa bzang po che mchog ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa drag pa'i mtshan/ /sems can kun don byed ces pa/ /ye shes rnam rim zhes pa'i mtshan/ /
80a7(rgyud 'grel): byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od/ /phan don zhes pa dbang po yi/ /sems can mnyes gshin zhes pa na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thugs 'chang ba'o/ /bzang ngan shes pa zhes pa'i lta/ /dus shes pa yi 'od zer bzang/ /
80b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig ces pa gzugs bzang ba'o/ /dam tshig ldan ni rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /khyab bdag ces pa don grub mdzad/ /sems can dbang po zhes pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ste/ dus shes zhes ni dri ldan no/ /rnam grol gsum la
80b2(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i mtshan/ /yon tan ldan ni rgyal ba'o/ /yon tan zhes ni mchog snying po'o/ /chos shes bsod nams 'od zer can/ /bkra shis shes pa mdog bzang po/ /bkra shis 'byung ba nyan
80b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'o/ /bkra shis kun shes bya ba ni/ /mtshan ni mar me'i rgyal po'o/ /bkra shis pa ni rin chen brtsegs/ /grags pa zhes bya 'tshogs med lta/ /de bzhin bkra shis pa yi bdag /snyan grags zhes pa grol par 'gro/ dog ba ba/ ser
80b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi gtsug phung do/ /gang phyir dga' ba chen po'i tshig /rA hu la ni bzang po'i mtshan/ /dbugs chen zhes pa thub pa'o/ /dga' chen khyod ni rang bzhin thub/ /rol mo chen po zla ba 'ong/ /bkur sti zhes pa'i tshig nying ni/ /gser mdog bzang po'i 'ong
80b5(rgyud 'grel): ces bya/ /rim gro zhes pa dag pa'i mtshan/ /phun tshogs yon tan dpa' bo'i lha/ /mchog tu dga' ba chos kyi gdugs/ /grags bdag dpal zhes bya ba ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan legs/ /mchog ldan 'gro ming zhes pa ni/ /mchog
80b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin zhes pa ye shes rdzogs/ /gtso bo zhes pa zhib mo'i blo/ /skyabs ni 'od zer kun 'bar ba'o/ /dam pa skyabs kyi sman nyid do/ /'jigs pa chen po dgra zhes pa/ /rnam grol tog ces bya ba'i mtshan/ /rab kyi mchog ni shes rab mchog /'jigs pa
80b7(rgyud 'grel): ma lus ste kha ba ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal/ /gtsug phud ming ni 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /phud pu zhes pa glo bur 'joms/ /lcang lo can na thogs med grags/ /ral pa zhes pa bden pa spungs/ /mun dzar mtshan ni dag
81a1(rgyud 'grel): snyan pa'o/ /cod pan can ni ngag dbang grags/ /gdong lnga zhes pa chos kyi brtsegs/ /gtsug phung lnga ldan grol ba'i 'od/ /zur phud lnga pa legs par brgyan/ /thod ces pa ni rab zhi lus/ /brtul zhugs chen po
81a2(rgyud 'grel): 'chad zhes pa/ /yid ces dgra ces bya ba'i mtshan/ /mgo zlam? seng ge mche ba rno/ /tshangs par spyod ni sel ba po/ /brtul zhugs mchog ces bya ba ni/ /'gro ba mchod pa zhes pa'i mtshan/ /dka' thub chen po seng ge reg /dka' thub chen
81a3(rgyud 'grel): po phyin zhes ba/ chos kyi mtshan zhes bya ba'i ming/ /gtsang gnas zhes bya ba skal pa bzang/ gau tam mi bskyod pa yi mdog /dam pa bya zhes 'bar rgyal ba'i/ /tshangs bzhes ni rtogs pa'o/ /bram ze zhes pa spyan bzang ngo/ /tshangs pa don rig pa yi blo/ /mya ngan 'das pa tshangs pa ni/ /'jigs
81a4(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa'i 'od zer mtshan/ /thob pa zhes pa dri yi 'od/ /grol ba de bzhin dga' ba'o/ /thar pa zhes pa don yod 'gro /rnam grel khro bo thal ba'i mdog /rnam grol mchog gi gzugs zhes bya/ /zhi ba de bzhin nyan pa'o/ /zhi ba zhes
81a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gtso bor grags/ /mya ngan 'das pa drag pa sbyin/ /mya ngan 'da' ba zhes pa ni/ nyi ma lha zhes bya bar grags/ /zhi ba zhes pa shes rab snang/ /bkra shis zhes brjod pa yi tshig /gshin rje 'joms pa'i yan lag mtshan/ /bde sdug
81a6(rgyud 'grel): sel ba mthar 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin gshags pa shing rta 'gro/ chags bral zhes pa gsor bcom/ /nyon mongs lus zad ces pa ni/ /skal par ldan zhes gtsug phung ming/ /thub pa med pa de bzhin phyug /dpe med ces pa dga' ba
81a7(rgyud 'grel): brtan/ /mi mngon myos pa 'joms pa'o/ /mi snang ba ni ye shes mjod/ /gsal byed min ni tshangs pa'i grong/ /dus med ces pa tsan dan no/ /ku 'phro zhes pa mya ngan med/ /khyab pa po ni seng ge 'od/ /phra zhing zhes pa tog gi yul/ /sa
81b1(rgyud 'grel): bon padmo'i snying po'o/ /gang phyir zag pa med pa'i tshig /'od zer mdza' yas zhes pa'i mtshan/ /rdul med ces pa lha yi 'od/ /rdul bral bsod nams me tog mtshan/ /dri ma med ni rig pa'i hoM/ /nyes pa spangs pa ye shes dbang/ /skyon med tshangs
81b2(rgyud 'grel): pa gsal ba'o/ /gshin tu sad ba rin chen phyag /blo gsal bdag ni dbang po ldan/ /kun shes zhes pa dpe bral 'gro/ kun rig thu bo the com ldan/ /ngam pa zhes pa mchod pa'i mtshan/ /rnam par shes pa 'bar ba'o/ /chos nyid spangs pa zhes
81b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhes pa'i mtshan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas gdugs/ /ye shes zhes pa 'dam gyi mchog /gnyis med tshul 'chang zhes pa ni/ /ye shes 'od dang ldan pa'i mtshan/ /mi rtag ces pa bya 'grub pa'o/ /lhun gyis grub pa rma bya'i
81b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos dang ldan/ /thog ma tha ma med ces pa/ /phan par ldan pa gzugs zhes mtshan/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mtshan de bzhin/ /dang po sangs rgyas zhes bya ba/ /grags pa
81b5(rgyud 'grel): yi ni mtshan du brjod/ /rgyud med pa ni 'od zer 'bar/ /ye shes mig gcig ces pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa/ /dri ma med ces bya ma ni/ /bai DUrya yi snying po'o/ /ye shes lus ni rgyu skar ro/ /de bzhin gshegs ni lha nyid ldan
81b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig gi dbang po zhes pa ni/ /ri bong can zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /smra ba che ni dran pa'i 'od/ /smra ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i 'od/ /smra ba'i skyes bu zhes pa ni/ /yon tan kun 'byung 'od zer mtshan/ /smra ba'i dam pa zhes sogs nas/ /tshigs
81b7(rgyud 'grel): bcad phyed kyi nang du ni/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu bdag nyid du/ /tshig dbang phyug ni sngon gsungs pa/ /bdag gis des na 'dir ma bshad/ /gzhan du dgos pa sna tshogs gsungs/ /kun tu lta ba yid lags pa'o/ /rab tu dga' ba'i zhes pa ni/
82a1(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan/ /gzi brjid phreng ba bcad pa ni/ /lta na sdug ni ye shes mcho/ /dpal gyi be'u zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi dbang phyug ri ya mtshan/ /'od bzangs skra la lta ba'o/ /bzang? pa'i
82a2(rgyud 'grel): yon tan byed pa'i stobs/ /lag pa 'od 'bar zhes pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba'i dbang/ /sman pa che ni legs pa'i dbyangs/ /mchog cas pa ni legs par reg /gtso bo don grub ces pa'i mtshan/ /zug rngu 'byin pa zhes
82a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /yon tan gzi brjid dpal gyi ming/ /de la bla na med pa'i tshig /kun tu mnyam nyid ye shes mtshan/ /sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing/ /bdud rtsi dbyangs zhes bya bar brjod/ /nyon mongs nad kyi sgra che ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar
82a4(rgyud 'grel): snang/ /thig le 'jig rten gsum zhes pa/ legs pa'i blo zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ mchog ni rnam grol don tsam mo/ /dpal ldan zhes pa khyad dbang phyug /rgyu skar dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni/ /rol ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mtshan/ /phyogs
82a5(rgyud 'grel): bcu nam mkha' mthar thug ni/ /lhag mthong zhi gnas de bzhin gshegs/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po'i chogs/ /nyes pa spangs zhes bya bar gsungs/ /'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs ba nyi ma'i 'od/
82a6(rgyud 'grel): byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /bkra shis rgyas pa blo yi mtshan/ /dpal ldan pad+ma gar zhes pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mchog /rin chen gdugs ni nyi ma'i 'od/ /de bzhin khyab bdag chen por brjod/ /so sor gsungs
82a7(rgyud 'grel): mdog ces pa'i mtshan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che/ /de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i mu/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos bdag 'chad/ /chogs kyi dbang po zhes pa'i mtshan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor ni/ /'jigs pa
82b1(rgyud 'grel): bral ba'i mtshan yin no/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sred/ /rdo rje rin chen zhes pa'i tshig /spros pI mtshan nyid ces bya'i mtshan/ /'on kyang 'di las gzhan du ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa drug tu gsung/ /dbang bskur
82b2(rgyud 'grel): da ni blo yi mchog /rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri bong can 'jig rten dbang phyug kun bdag ni/ /rin chen zla 'od ces pa'i mtshan/ /rdo rje zla 'od kun gyi rje/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ni/
82b3(rgyud 'grel): me long chen po zhes pa'i mtshan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs song ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba/ /snyan pa'i gsung zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung smra ni/ /shes rab chen po'i mu ru
82b4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /rdo rje nyi ma snang chen ni/ /kun tu mnyam pa blo yi mtshan /rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od/ /rdo rje tshogs kyi blo zhes bya/ /chags bral la sogs chags chen ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa blo dang ldan/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /mtshan ni nam
82b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' i dbang po'o/ /rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ngag dbang phyug /sangs rgyas chos 'dzin yang dag brjod/ /yon tan phyag ces bya ba mtshan/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal/ /
82b6(rgyud 'grel): kun mkhyan ye shes mjod ces pa/ /mtshan ni 'phags pa 'dod pa'o/ /sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul 'chang zhes pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i ri/ /sangs rgyas rigs 'chang zhes pa ni/ /rnga sgra phun tshogs dbang phyug rgyal/ /chen po 'dod pa'i
82b7(rgyud 'grel): spyan gdong can/ /rdo rje rnon po zhes pa ni/ /ye shes legs pa zhes brjod do/ /ral gri chen mo zhig nas mtshan/ /rnam dag ces pa ye shes bzang/ /yi ge mchog ni rab 'dug mtshan/ /sdug bsngal gcod ces pa la sogs/ /tshigs bcad phyed du
83a1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa ste/ /de ni tshig rkang bzhi yin pas/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan bde gshegs so/ /rgyal ba 'dzin ni dri ma bral/ /rdo rje zab mo ye shes phyug /rdo rje blo gros zhes pa'i tshig /de bzhin gshegs pa bskal bral sgra/ /de bzhin
83a2(rgyud 'grel): rin zhes bya ba ni/ /yon tan gzi brjid 'od kyi mtshan/ /thams cad pha rol phyin pa 'gengs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong dbang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal yin no/ /blo gros phan zhes pa yi mtshan/ /rnam dag chos ni bdag med pa/ /de bzhin
83a3(rgyud 'grel): spros pa'i 'khor lo lo/ /yang dag ye shes zla 'od snying/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i zhal /brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni/ /bde gshegs nyi ma zla ba'o/ /rgyud kun gyi ni mchog ces pa/ /yon tan rgya mtsho zhes pa'i mtshan/ /ma
83a4(rgyud 'grel): lus rdo rje skyil krung ni/ /bde gshegs yon tan bsdus pa'i mtshan/ /ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bla med thob/ /kun tu bzang po bsod nams tog /blo gros bzang ni spobs pa'i yul/ /sa snying zhes pa
83a5(rgyud 'grel): rigs skyes mtshan/ /'gro ba 'dzin ni rgyal rigs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che/ /rnam grol don bsam zhes pa'i mtshan/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs mtshan/ /gnyis pa'i mtshan du bstan pa las/ /khyad par dbang phyug
83a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'o/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog /gang phyir nga yi tshig gnyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi'o/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin/ /ye shes spangs zhes pa yi mtshan/ /skye med chos ni sna tshogs don/ /de bzhin
83a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa nam mkha' i mkha' / /chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin 'chad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod byed mtshan/ /skad cig la sogs tshig gnyis ni/ /dpung chogs dpal zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ni/ /bde
83b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs yon tan zla ba'i mtshan/ /thub pa blo mchog 'byung po sel/ /yang ni rA hu la yi mtshan/ /mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag /bdud rtsi 'od ces bya ba brjod/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
83b2(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'od/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum na/ /zla ba 'dod pa ces pa'i mtshan/ /gang phyir ye shes 'od kyi tshig /blo ldan seng ge stobs kyi mtshan/ /rab tu 'od gsal zhes pa ni/ /ye shes sku zhes bya bar gsungs/ /gzhan
83b3(rgyud 'grel): yang rdo rje 'jam pa'i mtshan/ /sangs rgyas kun la khyab pa'o/ /gcig dang du ma'i bar bzhin las/ /bsam gyis mi khyab yang dag 'byung/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang/ /rang rig ye shes skye ba ste/ /'on kyang ji ltar shing
83b4(rgyud 'grel): las me/ /ma gtsubs par ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin lus las ye shes ni/ /srid pas bsdums las skye ma yin/ /de phyir bla ma dam pa las/ /bsrubs pas 'byung bar the tshom med/ /rnam par rtog pa kun 'joms pa'i/ /gnyis
83b5(rgyud 'grel): med pa ni bsrubs las skyes/ /de lta ma lus phun sum tshogs/ /gang byed pa ni srid mthar 'byin/ /a ba d+hu tI'i dbus gnas yang/ /sangs rgyas la sogs sku dag 'byung/ /dkyil 'khor gcig gi dus su ste/ /sngar la ltos
83b6(rgyud 'grel): pas gnyis pa'o/ /de dag rnal 'byor mchog gi gtso/ /dbang po 'bring dang dman pa la'o/ /dbang po mchog tu gyur pa la/ /de bzhin pha rol phyin pa'i theg /mchog gi mchog tu gyur pa la/ /pha rol phyin pa? gsang sngags gnyis/ /de
83b7(rgyud 'grel): dag 'khor lo drug gi las/ /srid pa 'ching las grol bar byed/ /nye bar bsdus pa las/ dpral ba dang lte ba'i 'khor lo gnas pa/ /sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par rtog ge zhes bya ba ste drug pa'o// //ji ltar ming gi
84a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam grangs don/ /mnyam nyid ye shes brjod par bya/ /brgya las bzhi lhag pa yi ming/ /tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis/ /rnal 'byor dang ni ldan par brjod/ /dang por 'dod pa'i don grub nas/ /nor bu chen po zhes pa'i mthar
84a2(rgyud 'grel): ji snyed dbang po don phyir song/ /skyes so cog ni 'gag par 'gyur/ /de dag ldan pa'i mtshan gsungs pa/ /ji skad du gsungs las skyes te/ /'dod pa'i don grub ces pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsgrub pa'i dpal/ /dam pa ye shes nyi ma'o/
84a3(rgyud 'grel): ngan song thams cad rnam spyod ni/ /don grub ces ni bya ba'i mtshan/ /sems can kun mchog ces pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab brtsegs/ /mgon po zhes pa dgra sbyin mtshan/ /sems can kun rab grol zhes pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
84a4(rgyud 'grel): padmo mtshan/ /nyon mongs g.yul las gcig dpa' ni/ /dgra bcom grags zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /mi shes dgra yi dregs 'joms ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes stobs/ /blo ldan zhes bya nyon mongs 'joms/ /sgeg par 'chang ni me
84a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'o/ /dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs 'chang ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i dri/ /lag brgya zhes sogs tshig gnyis kyi/ /dbe bral bkod pa zhes pa'i mtshan/ /dpal ldan lag pa zhes pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ri bo grags/ /
84a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig sogs nas ni tshig gnyis kyis/ /srid pa'i mdza' ston pa yi mtshan/ /tshangs sogs de bzhin tshig gnyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam dang ni/ /gnyis med chos ni rin chen zla/ /dam pa'i don ni seng ge rgyal/ /'jigs pa med
84a7(rgyud 'grel): ni bsam gtan don/ /rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dpe dang bral/ /sems shes pa ni rnam par rol/ /rnam shes yon tan rin chen no/ /rgyu ldan tshig ni don grub mtshan/ /dngos don ma lus
84b1(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba ni/ /dgra bcom grags chen zhes pa'i mtshan/ /stong nyid dga' ba rin chen 'od/ /blo mchog ces pa gnyis su 'dod/ /gcig ni srid pas bcings pa ste/ /gnyis pa spyod pa'i rnam par 'khrul/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ni/ /
84b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod sbu'o/ /srid gsum dga' ba chen po ni/ /spobs pa gags pa zhes pa'i mchin/ /sprin dkar dag pa zhes pa ni/ /bde gshegs rdo rje nor bu'o/ /'od bzang ston ka zla ba ni/ /tshe dpag med ces bya ba'i mtshan
84b3(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma shar ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bkod/ /sen mo'i mdangs ni shas ched dmar/ /dbang po chen po zhes pa'i mtshan/ /cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od/ /skra mchog
84b4(rgyud 'grel): ma thon ka chen po 'chad/ /ri bo grags pa brtsegs pa'i mtshan/ /nor bu chen po 'od dpal ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bcu/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan ldan ni/ /gnyis dang bral zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod
84b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sku yi stobs/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa stobs chen ni/ /yid du 'ong ba zhes pa'i mtshan/ /dran pa chen po 'chang zhes pa/ /bde gshegs rin chen zla ba yi/ /de nyid ces pa shugs kyi mtshan/ /dran pa bzhi po'i ting 'dzin
84b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsal bar byed/ /byang chub yan lag me tog spos/ /dga' ba'i dbang phyug ces pa'i mtshan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho/ /bde gshegs gtsug phud 'od zer ro/ /lam gyi yan lag brgyad
84b7(rgyud 'grel): tshul rig /'jigs bral zhes bya ba yi mtshan/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lam rig ni/ /bde gshegs yon tan snying po'o/ /sems can kun la shas cher chags/ /dri med grags zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /nam mkha' lta bur chags med ni/ /
85a1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid zhi/ /sems can kun gyi yid 'jug ni/ /gdung ba grangs zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /sems can kun gyi yid mgyogs ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha mang po/ /sems can kun gyi dbang
85a2(rgyud 'grel): don shes/ /legs par mnyam zhes pa yi mtshan/ /sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi 'dod pa'o/ /phung po lnga don de nyid shes/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gzugs/ /rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ni/ /rgyal
85a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i stobs zhes bya ba'i 'dod/ /nges 'byung kun gyi mdza' la gnas/ /bde gshegs seng ge gshegs pa'o/ /nges par 'byung ba kun la mkhas/ /grong khyer cher mthong zhes pa'i mtshan/ /nges 'byung kun gyi lam gnas ni/ /
85a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros legs/ /nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa/ /'jig rten 'od ces bya'i mtshan/ /yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa 'byin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lha/ /dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang/ /skal
85a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan shing rta zhes pa'i mtshan/ /bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa ni/ /yang dag rgyal pa zhes pa'i mtshan/ /shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dga' ba'i bkod/ /bden pa rnam pa bcu gnyis so/ /
85a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi mu zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig /de bzhin gshegs pa dka' thub che/ /rnam pa nyi shu mngon byang chub/ /bde gshegs zla ba'i mtshan zhes pa'o/ /rnam par sangs rgyas kun rig mchog /de bzhin gshegs
85a7(rgyud 'grel): pa chos brtan pa/ /sangs rgyas grangs med sprul pa ni/ /mi thub zla ba zhes pa'i mtshan/ /sku ni bye ba rnam grub pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ri bo 'od/ /skad cig thams cad mngon rtogs ni/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /seMs?
85b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi skad cig don kun rig /de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i lha/ /sna tshogs theg sogs tshigs bcad gnyis/ /yon tan brtsegs zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung ni/ /bde gshegs seng ge zla ba'o/ /theg pa gcig
85b2(rgyud 'grel): gis 'bras bur gnas/ /nor bu go cha zhes pa'i mtshan/ /nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mtshan/ /las kyi khams rnams zad byed ni/ /sgra dang mtshungs par bya ba'i mtshan/ /chu bo rgya mtsho kun las rga pa/ /
85b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa grags chen no/ /sbyor ba'i dgon pa las rgal ba/ /gzi brjid shugs zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /nyon mongs zhes sogs tshig gnyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi grags/ /snying rje chen po shes rab thabs/ /dga' 
85b4(rgyud 'grel): bar ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /don yod 'gro ba'i don byed ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dri bzangs po/ /'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing/ /ri bo'i rgyal mtshan zhes pa'i mtshan/ /rnam shes don ni dga' ba'i 'od/ /'gog 'chan zhes bya
85b5(rgyud 'grel): pa yi sgra/ /de bzhin mchod yon can zhes brjod/ /sems can kun yid yid ldan ni/ /srid mdza' i nor bu zhes pa'i mtshan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rig pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bden par gsungs/ /sems can kun gyi yid la
85b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /rnam par snang mdzad ces pa'i mtshan/ /de dag sems dang mthun par 'jug /rnam par nges pa zhes pa'i mtshan/ /sems can kun yid tshim pa ni/ /grags pa'i mdza' zhes bya bar brjod/ /sems can kun gyi yid dga' 
85b7(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ying 'chang ba/ /grub pa mthar phyin 'khrul med ni/ /sangs rgyas seng ge'i 'od zer ro/ /nor pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /srog dang ldan zhes bya'i mtshan/ /don gsum the tsom med blo ni/ /de bzhin
86a1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa 'gro ba'i theg /kun don zhes ni bya ba'i mtshan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thun mong ngo/ /yon tan kun gyi bdag ces pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i mchog /phung po lnga don dus gsum mi/ /
86a2(rgyud 'grel): blo bzangs byang chub sems dpa' o/ /skad cig thams cad bye brag phyed/ /nor bu'i zla ba zhes pa'i mtshan/ /skad cig gis ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dka' thub mi bzad ces pa'i mtshan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chad/ /gsal
86a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan sems can don byed pa'o/ /lus med lus ni nor bus 'khor/ /lus kyi mchog ni 'jig rten 'das/ /lus kyi mdza' ni rtogs pa po/ /seng ge glang po zhes pa'i mtshan/ /gzugs rnams ma lus kun ston na/ /sangs rgyas yon tan
86a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan zhes bya/ /nor bu chen po rin chen tog /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od/ /de ltar de dag gsungs pa ni/ /mtshan ni sngags kyi ngo bo ste/ /dkyil 'khor gcig gi sbyor ba las/ /sngar la stos par gsungs pa yin/ /rtog bcas
86a5(rgyud 'grel): shes pa ma lus pa/ /rtog bral bdag nyid dngos po'o/ /dngos po dngos por mnyam gzhag pas/ /chos dbyings nang gi spyod yul lo/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /de nyid dmigs pa thim pa ni/ /kun rdzob tshul ni rnam pa ste/
86a6(rgyud 'grel): don dam gyi ni mdza' ru thim/ /rang rig pas ni mchog yin la/ /gsang gnas spyi bo'i mthar lam skye/ /gang phyir 'dir ni gal te nang/ /de dag mtshan ni brjod pa ni/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyi gtso bo ste/ /sgyu 'phrul dra sogs gsung phyir ro/ /
86a7(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar nang gi bdag nyid de/ /rnal 'byor rtag tu bshad dam ci/ /'dus pa la sogs ma gsungs phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das ni bden pa min/ /bya dang byed pa ma grub pas/ /rnam par 'khrul pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom/ /des na 'di dag
86b1(rgyud 'grel): brdzun min nam/ /yin na dmyal bar yang mi 'gro/ /phyin ci log tu bstan pas na/ /bdag dang gzhan dag brlag par byed/ /'di lta bu'i dgongs par ni/ /gyur pa de la brjod par bya/ /gang phyir 'di ni bstan pa ste/ /'jig rten byis pa'i ma yin te/ /gar
86b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /rgyud kun gyi ni gtso bor gsungs/ /gang de snga ltar sngon du ni/ /bcom ldan shAkya thub pa yis/ /phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur phyir/ /chos dbyings dag gi dbang phyag gi /dkyil 'khor chen po rab tu bskor/ /khams
86b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum dag tu lung bstan pa/ /de yang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul/ /gsang 'dus la sogs dgongs pas min/ /gal te 'du sogs ma yin na/ /'o na bcom ldan rdzun smra mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yang/ /res 'ga' dag tu bu
86b4(rgyud 'grel): tir gsungs/ /ji srid gsang 'dus la sogs nas/ /gang phyir nam mkha' mnyam la sogs/ /gshin rje gshed mthar sngags dang ni/ /'khrul 'khor dag ste gnyis kyi tshig /ma yin pa dang ma grub par/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs/
86b5(rgyud 'grel): de yang lung dang rig pa min/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i sbyor ba ni/ /gang phyir mtshan ni brjod pa yin/ /rgyud kun rdo rje'i tshig rnams la/ /de bzhin gshegs pas dbang por gsungs/ /thog ma med nas mi gnas min/ /'jig rten pa las grub pa'i gtan
86b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin bdag len pa po yis dus/ /dbang po dang ni ldan par ro/ /phyi ma'i dus su dag par 'gyur/ /de ltar de dag tshig mthun bar/ /rdo rje can zhes bstan pa dag /gsang 'dus la sogs nang nas ni/ /gtso bor sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste/ /dbang bskur ba yi
86b7(rgyud 'grel): khyad par yang/ /skal par ldan yang skal med gyur/ /grub pas nang gi bdag nyid sbyor/ /mtshen brjod pa la sogs pas gsungs/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa bya ba sogs/ /de bzhin gzhan yang rgyud kun las/ /mtshan brjod pa ni thams cad
87a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /bstong pa zhib mo'i rgyal po ste/ /gang de rmongs pa'i bdag nyid dang/ /snyigs ma lnga yi dus yin pas/ /dka' ba'i sems ni 'ba' zhig dag /rtog ge skam po'i bdag nyid do/ /gzhan yang rtog ge skam po yis/ /
87a2(rgyud 'grel): gal te sems ni zhi gyur na/ /des na thams cad sangs rgyas su/ /mngon sum nyid du gdon mi za/ /nye bar bsdus pa las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ming bstan pa'i rnam par rtog ge zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o// //'dir ni gzhan yang
87a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod bya ba/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes te/ /gang phyir tshigs bcad bco lngas 'dir/ /dgu bcu rtsa lnga'i ming can te/ /'od gsal las ni yang dag byung/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs rnams so/ /de dag mtshan ni bstan pa yang/ /
87a4(rgyud 'grel): sems nyid sgom par 'gyur phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas kun zhes rdzogs pa nas/ /dpal dang ldan pa mchog mthar ro/ /de la mtshan ni 'di dag kun/ /rnal 'byor sgom pa po yi rtags/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rtogs bya ni/ /dbang du byed pa'i
87a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal por gsungs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ces pa'i sgra/ /bdud rtsi rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan/ /bla med de bzhin shes bya ba/ /sangs rgyas mnyam pa'i bsam gtan can/ /yi ge med cing rtog bral ba'o/ /gsang sngags las byung zhes phan
87a6(rgyud 'grel): dri ma rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan/ /gsang sngags zhes pa rigs gsum pa/ /rmongs pa ston pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /gsang sngags don kun skyed pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rol pa'o/ /thig le chen po zhes bshad pa/ /dge bzang po yi mtshan zhes bya/ /
87a7(rgyud 'grel): gang phyir yi ge med pa'i tshig /gzhan yang rnam pa'i ye shes shugs/ /yi ge lnga ni smra ba'i dbang/ /stong pa che ni lha chen po/ /thig le stong ni blo gros zab/ /yi ge drug ces bya ba ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med/ /rnam pa kun ldan
87b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams med ni/ /chos kyi stobs zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'chang/ /'jig rten gsum mchod sangs rgyas so/ /dus dang dus min zhes pa ni/ /de bzhin sgra gcan nyi ma'i snying/ /bsam gtan bzhi'i rtse mo can/ /de bzhin gshegs
87b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rgyal mtshan grol/ /bsam gtan dus kun shes zhes pa/ /sman pa mchod pa'i mtshan zhes pa/ /ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud 'dzin pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'od/ /ting 'dzin lus te lus mchog ni/ /dge ba'i gtsug phud ces pa'i mtshan/ /
87b3(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'od/ /sprul pa'i sku te sku mchog ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'od/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba/ /rgya mtsho brtan zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /phyogs bcur sprul pa sna
87b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ni/ /bde gshegs rin chen phung po'o/ /ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa/ /rol pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i mtshan/ /lha yi lha ni nyi ma'i mtshan/ /lha yi dbang po dag pa'i 'od/ /lha min dbang ni rin chen gtsug /srid pa'i bdag po
87b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni/ /dpal ni rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan/ /'chi med dbang po seng ge'i 'gros/ /lha yi bla ma zhes pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'o/ /'joms byed ces pa me tog sbyin/ /'joms byed dbang phyug grol ba'i 'od/ /srid pa'i dgon pa
87b6(rgyud 'grel): las rgal ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa padmo'i mtshan/ /gcig ces pa ni ye shes 'dor/ /ston pha rol pa bkod pa'o/ /'gro ba'i bla ma zhes pa'i tshig /don yod gnas pa zhes pa'i mtshan/ /rab grags la sogs bstan pa'i 'od/ /che ba 'o ni
87b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan tog /byams pa'i go cha go bgos pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i bsam/ /snying rje'i ya lad gyon pa ni/ /rnam grol rgyal po zhes pa'i mtshan/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshul shes pa/ /nyon
88a1(rgyud 'grel): mongs mi shes g.yul ngos sel/ /rgya mtsho zhes pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /bdud sgra zhes pa'i rin chen 'dzin/ /bdud 'dul zhes pa mi thub pa'o/ /dpa' bo 'gro ba mnyes pa'o/ /bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel byed pa/ /de bzhin?
