88a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa sgra chen po/ /bdud kyi dpung las rgyal byed pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dul ba'i mtshan/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes mngon gsungs pa/ /dkyil 'khor drug po dag gi lha/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /de dag kun gyi
88a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /de bzhin gzhan yang nang du gnas/ /'jig rten 'dren pa zhes pa'i mtshan/ /dngos po srid pa'i dri ma spong/ /phyag ces pa ni mchog gi mu/ /mchod pa zhes pa lha mang sgra/ /bstong pa'i gnas ni rin chen stobs/ /
88a4(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu rim gro bya ba'i 'os/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i phyag /bkur 'os mchod ces bya ba ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra las rgyal/ /phyag ces pa ni rtogs pa grub/ /bla ma'i rab ni yul bzang po/ /'jig rten gsum po gom cig
88a5(rgyud 'grel): bgrong/ /mi rtog 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan/ /mkha' ltar mdza' med rnam med ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra/ /gsum rig pa ni zla ba smra/ /thos pa po ni rdul bkrus pa'o/ /gtsang zhes pa mi g.yo'i mtshan/ /mngon shes drug
88a6(rgyud 'grel): ni blo gros mtshan/ /rjes drug ldan zhes bya ba'i sgra/ /bsod nams mar me'i rgyal po'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa ni/ /rtogs pa'i sgra zhes bya bar brjod/ /sems dpa' che ni gau ta ma/ /'jig rten las 'das gzi brjid stobs/ /sgyu
88a7(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul che zhes bya ba'i tshig /blo rnams gzugs zhes bya ba'i ming/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mdza' ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba bzang/ /shes rab de nyid ces pa ni/ /byang chub yan lag me tog mtshan/ /thob ces pa ni ston pa'o/
88b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag rig ces pa gzi brjid bzang/ /gzhan rig ces ni bya ba'i tshig /ye shes gzi brjid stobs zhes brjod/ /thams cad ces pa dge ba'i 'od/ /kun la zhes pa brten pa'i stobs/ /gang phyir gang zag mchog ces pa/ /lha yi bu zhes pa
88b2(rgyud 'grel): yi mtshan/ /dper bya kun las 'das pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rab zhi ba'o/ /shes bya zhes pa nyi ma'i zhal/ /shes bya'i bdag po grol ba'i 'od/ /mchog ni tshul khrims 'od ces brjod/ /chos kyi sbyin bdag ces pa ni/ /dka' thub rnam pa zhes pa'i
88b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ /gtso bo de bzhin rdul med pa'o/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i gsung/ /bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog ces pa/ /mig sman zhes pa'i mtshan du brjod/ /'gro ba zhes pa kun la rgyal/ /nges 'byung
88b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum ni sems can 'od/ /bgrad rnams zhes pa dri ma med/ /dam pa'i don zhes bya ba ni/ /dran pa'i dbang po zhes su brjod/ /rnam dag dpal ni zhal ras sdug /'jig rten gsum skal bzang zhes pa/ /rgyal mtshan mdza' yas zhes pa'i mtshan/ /
88b5(rgyud 'grel): chen po zhes pa blo mchog go /'byor pa kun zhes bya ba ni/ /de bzhin dpung bzhi rab zhi'i mtshan/ /dpal ldan zhes pa rin chen 'dod/ /'jam dpal zhes pa chos dbang phyug /dpal dang ldan pa mchog gi ming/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs
88b6(rgyud 'grel): lta/ /kun gyis tshig don bcod pa dag /ming nyid sngags kyi mtshan dag ste/ /de dag ltar na bu ga'i mnga' / /sangs rgyas mtshan ni sbyor la skye/ /dkyil 'khor gcig gi dbus su yang/ /sngar bshad ltos pas bzhi pa'o/ /a ba d+h+ru la brte na rnal
88b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor/ /sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi/ /g.yas pa dang ni g.yon gnyis la/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba 'bab/ /dkyil 'khor re re dag la yang/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bzhi dag tu brtags/ /yang ni dbugs ni gcig la yang/ /
89a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba bar thams cad skye bar 'gyur/ /go rims ji ltar bzhi 'gyur gyis/ /nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o/ /de dag bgrangs pa'i yon tan 'gyur/ /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'o/ /lhag ma brgya phrag drug po ni/ /drug dang brgyad
89a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi grangs 'gyur las/ /stong phrag brgya dang drug brgya'o/ /re re la yang go rims bzhin/ /brgya phrag drug tu shes par bya/ /drug brgya dag gi yon tan ni/ /de kun ston pa'i grags zhes ni/ /khri phrag bzhi dang stong phrag gsum/ /de ni brgya phrag gcig gi
89a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /gnyis ka bsdom pa'i grangs nyid kyang/ /'bum phrag 'khri bcu rtsa gsum mo/ /bya dang byed par gsungs pa ste/ /de ltar 'khor lo drug po la/ /dbugs rgyu ba ni lha rnams so/ /'khor lo gnyis su bshad par bya/ /gcig ni nang du bsgrom bya ste/ /spyi gtsugs
89a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs nas gsang ba'i mthar/ /rgyud dang rgyud kyi nang du gsungs/ /gnyis pa rdo rje dbyings la sogs/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mthar/ /de dag ji bzhin rim pa bzhin/ /mgrin pas gtsug snying kha dbral/ /de bzhin gsang ba lte ba ru/ /yang ni ming gi rnam grangs ni/ /
89a5(rgyud 'grel): dag gi dbang phyug chos dbyings kyi/ /ming can spyi gtsug 'khor lo'o/ /chos dbyings rnam par dag pa yi/ /ming ni mgrin par gsungs pa'o/ /me long ye shes sku yi ni/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor la 'dod pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni/ /lte ba'i 'khor lo'i ming can/ /
89a6(rgyud 'grel): dpral ba'i 'khor lor gsungs pa ni/ /de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes kyi/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni/ /gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i bdag nyid do/ /de ltar rnal 'byor rgyud kun la/ /ston pa'i rgyal po chen pos khyab/ /sna tshogs ye shes lnga bdag nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi
89a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid dngos/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /gong nas gong du brgyud pa'o/ /gzhan dag lhag ma gzhan kun ni/ /slob dpon la sogs bdag chen rnams/ /kun gyis bsgom par bya ba dang/ /glags pa tsam gyis grol bar 'gyur/ /nye bar bsdus pa las
89b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i rnam par rtog ge zhes bya ba ste brgyad pa'o// //da ni rnal 'byor de dag gi/ /ye shes lnga po brjod par bya/ /phyag 'tshal 'dud la sogs pa nas/ /ye shes sku nyid tshig gi mthar/ /gang phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig /nyi shu
89b2(rgyud 'grel): bya dang byed pa ste/ /bdag nyid chen po'i tshigs bcad ni/ /dang po nyid du byed pa'i rgyu/ /lhag ma bzhi ni gsungs pa ni/ /gang phyir bya ba ji ltar rim/ /de dag ye shes lnga nyid de/ /rgyu la sogs pa ji ltar rim/ /rgyu dang rkyen gyi ye shes dang/ /gnad kyi ye shes de bzhin
89b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan/ /sgom pa'i ye shes gsungs pa dang/ /lnga ba grol ba ye shes so/ /rgyu ni me longs yang dag bshad/ /rkyen ni chos kyi dbyings nyid do/ /so sor rtog pa gnad kyi'o/ /mnyam pa nyid ni sgom pa'i mchog /grol ba'i yes bya grub kyi'o/ /de ltar ris bzhin shes pa bya/ /tdu? yi yais
89b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa bzhi/ /phyi rol dang ni nang du 'dod/ /phyi rol dpe yi mtshan nyid de/ /nang nyid dpe yis mtshon pa'o/ /mchog sbyin rdo rje 'dud ces pa/ /dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin nas/ /yang dag mdza' yi bar du ni/ /bde pa'i longs spyod bzhi yi mchog /gang phyir
89b5(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid kyi tshig /rtog tu gzhi la dran med thob/ /de bzhin snying po zhes pa'i tshig /bde dang stong nyid dbyer med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ces pa yang/ /rnal 'byor dang ni sngon byang chub/ /de dag dpe tsam gzhan yod min/ /bde yang gsungs shing bstong
89b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog /phyag 'tsal 'dud pa rnam bzhi ste/ /mchod dang mchog bya'i rang bzhin can/ /rtag tu mchod bya'i las bya ba'ang/ /sngar gsungs me long ye shes la'o/ /de bzhin du na mchod pa'i ming/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dngos/ /de nyid 'ong gsal bar ni bshad
89b7(rgyud 'grel): stong 'og sbyor ba phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar rnal 'byor rnam gsungs pa/ /dpe yis nye bar mtshon pa'i mchog /phyi rol gnyis gnyis snyom 'jug pas/ /gzhan yang shes rab ye shes so/ /thabs dang rgyu yi sbyor bas ni/ /phyi rol ston pa ma yin no/ /
90a1(rgyud 'grel): des na sangs rgyas chags pa sogs/ /bcu drug po yi tshig rnams ni/ /de bzhin dga' ba bcu drug ste/ /tshig ni re re'i mdza' nyid do/ /de la sangs rgyas chags pa'i tshig /dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid do/ /rnal 'byor dbang po mdzad dus su /thog ma tha
90a2(rgyud 'grel): ma dbus nyid min/ /de yi chags chen zhes pa nas/ /gang de bzhi pa zhes pa'i mthar/ /gang phyir rtag tu chos dbyings ni/ /rdo rje mchog ces bya bar gsungs/ /sangs rgyas sku zhes bya ba'i bzhi/ /yang dag mdza' ru gsungs pa'o/ /chos kyi sku zhes gsungs pa ni/ /dge 'phral ba na bzhi
90a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /sangs rgyas dgyes pa'i tshig nyid ni/ /de bzhin stong nyid snying po las/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dus nyid du/ /gnyis spangs par ni gsungs pa'o/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas rol pa ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rkyen can ni/ /dga' ba la sogs bzhi pa yi/ /lhag ma lha ma'i bar du
90a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas 'dzum pa'i tshig /so sor rtog pa gsang ba'o/ /gnang kyi ye shes bshad pa yang/ /bcu gnyis dang po gnad kyi sgo/ /sangs rgyas bshad pa zhes pa'i tshig /lan gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin can/ /rnam pa gnyis su yang dag bshad/ /phyi rol dang ni nang du 'dod
90a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas nyid ces bya ba'i mtshan/ /las kyi phyag rgya nyi yi brdas/ /de la a ba d+hU tI gnas/ /srog dang rlung du rnam par gsungs/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes pa'i tshig /longs spyod du yang gsungs pa'o/ /sprul bdag ni ma lus dang/ /lhan cig skyes dang chos sku mchog /de dag
90a6(rgyud 'grel): gang phyir med las byung/ /med pa rtag tu stong pa ste/ /ye shes 'byung ba nyid du bshad/ /sku bzhi po dag grangs med pa'i/ /de las gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'byung/ /rang bzhin nyid ni sku dang ldan/ /nam mkha' zhes pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /bzhi pa la ltos lnga pa'i/ /de yi rang bzhin
90a7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas nyid/ /nam mkha' las byung rang rtags pa/ /mkha' ni lhan cig skyes par bshad/ /rnal 'byor ba dang rang las skyes/ /ye shes las byung ba yi tshig /ji ltar sems ni bzhi pa'i mdza' / /yod dang med las rnam par 'das/ /rang rig pa'i sangs rgyas mchog
90b1(rgyud 'grel): sgyu 'phrul zhes pa'i tshig nyid kyang/ /bshad pa nang gi bdag nyid 'dod/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams sgyu 'phrul tshig /dra ba mchog tu bde ba'o/ /sangs rgyas rol pa zhes pa'i tshul/ /rnal 'byor rgyud dang rnal 'byor mo'i/ /thams cad lhan cig skyes pa ces/ bsams gtun?
90b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yi nang las skye/ /thams cad thams cad ces pa ni/ bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can/ /shes dang shes bya nyid du gsungs/ /rdo rje snying pa rtse mo can/ /dga' ba zhes pa'i ming nyid ni/ /gsang ba'i gnas su skye ba ste/ /bcu drug tshig tu shes par bya/ /dngar? sogs nas gang ba'i
90b3(rgyud 'grel): mthar/ /dang po rig pa'i dga' ba'o/ /de bzhin gzhan yang chags pa'i dga' / /'dod pa'i dga' ba gsum po 'di/ /rus sbal dga' ba mchog tu 'dod/ /zla ba'i dga' ba de bzhin gshegs /keng rus dga' ba drug pa'o/ /bdun pa ru ni gsungs pa ni/ /sgra
90b4(rgyud 'grel): yi dga' ba ma lus pa'o/ /'jigs pa'i dga' ba brgyad par gsungs/ /de bzhin gzhan yang sna tshogs dga' / /bcu pa bcu yi dga' ba'o/ /bcu gnyis pa ni nam mkha' i dga' / /de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' / /bco lnga par ni gsungs pa ni/ /lhan cig
90b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i dga' bar 'dod/ /bcu drug pa yi mtshan nyid ni/ /dga' bral du ni bshad pa yin/ /da ngag dga' chen bcu drug ni/ /zla ba lta bu'i dbus na'o/ /dkar po phyogs la yang dag bshad/ /gang ba gsum gyi bye brag gis/ /ge rims ji bzhin
90b6(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa yang/ /dga' ba gsum ste rtsa gsum pa'o/ /thams cad gzung bar ldan pa ni/ /go rims ji bzhin 'pho ba ste/ /shes rab de nyid khyad par ro/ /thabs na bcu drug gsungs pa yang/ /rtag tu stong pa nyid la bshad/ /dang po sogs nas gnam stong par/ /gang phyir
90b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal ba'i tshig /bcu drug pa yi ming can no/ /gnyis med rnal 'byor phun sum tshogs/ /dkar nag phyogs ni gnyis med 'dod/ /bdag nyid chen por gang spyod de/ /srid pa las ni rgal nas 'gro/ /lhan cig skyes pa gtsang ba yin/ /lhan cig skyes ba rtog/
91a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang yin/ /ltan cig skyes pa bla ma yin/ /mchod pa'i gnas kyang ltan cig skyes/ /slob ma lta bu mkhas pa'ang de/ /mchod pa po ni sgom pa dngos/ /gang phyir lhan skyes gnyis med ni/ /lhan skyes bya ba de yi mchog /lhan skye ?? ??
91a2(rgyud 'grel): yang bshad/ /lngang dang nyal la sogs pa'ang de/ /ji srid lhan skyes tsam nyid la/ /sems nyid ngal so spyod yul lo/ /de la bya dang byed pa yi/ /gnyis po dag las gnyis med 'byung/ /de ni rtog med mtshan nyid de/ /rnal 'byor ma yi kha na las/ /de dag de
91a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams gsum pa ni/ /bdag nyid 'ba' zhig dran pa'o/ /yang na dad pa can dag gi /rang gi slob ma rgyud pa las/ /mngon par dga' dang klags pa dang/ /mnyan pa dang ni sgom pa dang gzhan dag ni bstan pa ste/ /skal dang skal med rnam dpyad na/ /de dag
91a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i 'khor lo yi/ /tshigs bcad dag la go nims bzhin/ /dgu pa dang ni bco lnga lnga/ /de bzhin du ni steng 'og gnyis/ /gcig pa nyid ni spyi gtsug dbus/ /kun bsdus sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog /nye bar bsdus pa las ye shes lnga'i bstod pa
91a5(rgyud 'grel): don bsdus pa rnam par rtog ge zhes bya ba ste dgu pa'o// //de bzhin gzhan yang phan yon no/ /tshigs bcad lnga yi nang du ste/ /'di de rdo rje la sogs pa/ /bstod pa yis ni nang du gsungs/ /gzhan dag kyang ni rnyed sla bas/ /nye bar bsdus
91a6(rgyud 'grel): par pas ma bshad/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dang/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni grangs med rnams/ /byang chub sems dpa' i chogs mchog nyid/ /ma lus bdag la bzod par gsol/ /sgyu 'phrul dra sogs mdor bsdus nas/ /gleng gzhi mchog tu gsungs pa ste/ /
91a7(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams de yis 'jig rten pa/ /ji ltar de bzhin rol par smon/ /gnas ni phra ba phu ri ru/ /gzhan dag gis ni gsol btab nas/ /mtshan mo mchog dag mthong gyur pas/ /gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje byas/ /nye bar bsdus pa las phan yon rtogs par sla ba rnam
91b1(rgyud 'grel): par rtog gi zhes bya ba ste bcu pa'o// //mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i nye bar bsdus pa rnam par rtog ge zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po nges par sbyangs pa dpal gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen
91b2(rgyud 'grel): po sh+rI badzra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpal ser rtsa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' i rnam 'phrul gyi/ /gnas mchog sman lung gtsug lag khang/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dbang ldan ma/ /de dag don du legs
91b3(rgyud 'grel): par bsgyur// //nye bar bsdus ba'i rnam par rtog ge dang sbyar ba'i bsdus don mtshan gyi sgron ma bzhugs/ /bu? rigs mchog tu sangs rgyas kyang/ /kun tu gzigs pas 'dong byon pa/ /sangs rgyas kun bskyed yab 'gyur zhes/ /mtshan gsol 'jam dbyangs dang bdud
91b4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rnyed la gdud sogs nga min gyi/ /ma 'dres mtshan la dad sems kyis/ /bdag dran phyir byas 'gal ba med/ /gzhan du gyur na'ang de mi 'gal/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku/ /gtsug tor chen po tshig bdag gi /mtshan rnams yang dag brjod pa la/ /spyi don
91b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu bzhi deng bsdus bzhi/ /de la spyi don bcu bzhi yi/ /rnam bar dbye ba bya ba ni/ /zhus nas slar gsungs rigs drug gzigs/ /sgyu 'phrul mngon par byang chub dang/ /rdo rje 'chang chen dkyil 'khor dang/ /rnam par snang mdzad mi bskyod dang/ /tshe dpag med dang rin chen
91b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung/ /don yong 'khor lo dag bstod pa/ /phan yon dang ni sngags rings dang/ /bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /zhus la tshigs bcad bcu drug ste/ /de la nang bses rnam pa bdun/ /gang gis zhus la tshigs bcad lnga/ /gang ltar zhus la tshigs bcad
91b7(rgyud 'grel): gcig /gang phyir zhus la gnyis su gnas/ /gang la zhus la gcig yin no/ /gang zhus pa la tshigs bcad bzhi/ /ji skad zhus pa'i don bzhin du/ /sgrub par khas blangs ba la gnyis/ /de phyir gug tan tshigs bcad gcig /slar gsungs pa la tshigs
92a1(rgyud 'grel): bcad drug /nang gi dbye ba rnam pa bdun/ /gang gis gsungs la tshigs rkang gnyis/ /gang ltar gsungs la shu log gnyis/ /gang la gsungs la shu log phyed/ /gang phyir gsungs la tshigs rkang gnyis/ /gang gsum pa la rkang pa gsum/ /??
92a2(rgyud 'grel): gtod nyon cig 'doms pa la/ /tshigs bcad phyed dang gnyis su gzhes/ /gnang nas gtang rag phul rkang gcig /ris drug gzigs la tshigs bcad gnyis/ /'dis gzigs dang po tshig rkang gcig /de 'og tshig gcig spyir gzigs/ /lha drug don yod
92a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam snang mdzad/ /mi bskyod mdza' yas rin chen 'byung/ /rdo rje sems dang drug rims bzhin/ /zhus lugs gzhan la gzhan du snang/ /de la gzigs nas 'di mjad brjod/ /dkyil 'khor drug gi bstod pa dang/ /phan yon sngags rigs bsdus sogs
92a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi /gzhung tshad mtshan don go rims bzhin/ /rang rang skabs su 'og nas 'chad/ /bsdus pa'i don bzhir bzhag pa yin/ /rnam par dbye bar bya ba ni/ /zhus dang slang gsungs ris drug gzigs/ /dmigs pa'i yul du bzhag par bya/ /mngon rtogs dkyil
92a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor drug dang bstod/ /sngags rings dang dgus nyams blangs thabs/ /phan yon gyis ni bskyed pa dang/ /thob bya'i 'bras bu bstan pa yin/ /bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas/ /dmigs thabs 'bras bu gsum bsdus bstan/ /'dis zhus 'dis gsungs
92a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dis gsungs gsum/ /'khor dang ston pa rnam pa gsum/ /mchog gsum rgyu 'bras thabs dang gsum/ /thob bya'i yul du bzhag pa yin/ /gzhan yang zhus lan gzigs pa gsum/ /thabs dang de bzhin shes rab dang/ /gnyis su med dang rnam gsum
92a7(rgyud 'grel): du/ /rang gi chon bzhag pa yin/ /nyams brang ba'i thabs dag ni/ /rnal 'byor gzhung gi 'khor lo ste/ /de yang phyi nang dbye ba yis/ /rnam pa gnyis su bstan pa yin/ /phyi rol la yang rnam gsum ste/ /snying kha shes rab 'khor lo dang/ /pho brang lha yi
92b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dang/ /'khrul 'khor las kyi 'khor lo'o/ /nang gi 'khor lo gcig nyid de/ /lus gnas rtsa yi 'khor lo'o/ /'khor lo bzhi po de dag la/ /re re la yang bdun bdun no/ /de la shes rab 'khor lo ni/ /ji ltar nam par bsam zhe na/ /dang por rang 'dod pa'i lha/ /
92b2(rgyud 'grel): sa bon mdog dang so so'i rgya/ /de thugs dang po'i sangs rgyas ni/ /zhal lnga phyag brgyad kun thun mong/ /de yi thugs kar 'khor lo ni/ /ris drug dbye bas rnam pa drug /bsdus pa dang ni bdun gyur te/ /lte ba rtsibs dang rtsibs rten can/ /lta ba mu khyad gnyis kyis bskor/ /
92b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsabs rten mu khyud gnyis yod pa/ /lte ba'i mu khyud nang ma la/ /sngags rings gnyis phyed rtsa ba dgod/ /phyi la A li rnams dgod do/ /rtsibs rten mu khyud nang ma la/ /sngags rings gnyis phye phreng sngags dgod/ /phyi la kA li legs par dgod/ /mu khyud sngags
92b4(rgyud 'grel): dang mdog dkar mtshungs/ /rtsibs grangs so so'i dang po la/ /drug ste sngags drug mchen re dgod/ /mdog drug ldan par bsgom par bya/ /dbus su a ni dkar por bkod/ /so sor rtog pa'i rtsibs brgyad la/ /badzra hik+Sh+NA la sogs dgod/ /yig 'bru re re kha dog dmar
92b5(rgyud 'grel): dbus su h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yang kha dog mthun/ /me long lta bu'i yang brgyad pa/ /du(rgyud 'grel): bats+tshe da la sogs pa/ /'bru re re ste kha dog sngo/ /lte dbus hUM yang mdog mchog sngo/ /chos dbyings ye shes rtsibs bcu pa/ /rtsibs rnams kun la dgod pa ni/ /pradz+nyA dz+nyA na la sogs bcu/ /
92b6(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi a dang deT na dkar/ /bya grub ye shes 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad dz+nyA na kA la sogs/ /rtsibs re 'bru re lte bar a/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i ljang khu'o/ /mnyam nyid 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ /de la bA gi shwa ra sogs/ /'bru re dgod cing kha dog ser/ /
92b7(rgyud 'grel): drug pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs dgu pa/ /a ra pa tsa la sogs pa/ /yig dgu gcig la gnyis dgong bya/ /dbus su a ni rab tu dkar/ /shes rab 'khor lo'i lte ba ru/ /dang po la ni ye shes sems/ /thun mong mtshan dang ldan par bsam/ /gzhan la mtshan yang so
93a1(rgyud 'grel): so ste/ /so sor rtog la rdo rje rno/ me long ral gri sdug bsngal gcod/ /chos dbyings shes rab ye shes so/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes sku/ /mnyam pa nyid la ngag dbang byug /rdo rje sems la mtshan mchog ni/ /a ra pa tsa na zhes pa/ /mdog
93a2(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag mtshan so sor bsam/ /mngon rtog la ni tshigs bcad gsum/ /tshigs bcad dngos gcig sngags la gnyis/ /de ltar shes rab 'khor lo ni/ /gzhung tshang bcad pa legs bstan nas/ /da ni pho brang lha 'khor lo/ /de yi dbye ba bstan par bya/ /
93a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad ce zhes pa/ /byang chub sems kyi rdo rje ni/ /lnga yi rang bzhin drug pa ste/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor lha dang mtshan/ /gtso bo'i thugs ka'i ye shes sems/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /mtshan rnams rnam pa gnyis su bzhed/
93a4(rgyud 'grel): de yi thugs ka'i zla dkyil na/ /mtshan ni rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang a las byung/ /de steng a la rnam gsum ste/ /a ni yig 'bru kun mchog dang/ /don chen zhes ni 'byung ba dang/ /yi ge dam pa zhes pa gsum/ /de ltar de dag
93a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum po ni/ /mtshan mchog rnam pa 'dun du bzhed/ /gsang ba'i yum bzhi'i rnams la ni/ /khong nas byung dang skye med gnyis/ /satwa badzri ma yi mtshan/ /tshig du brjod pa spangs gcig pu/ /ratna badzri ma yi mtshan/ /brjod pa kun gyi rgyu mchog nyid
93a6(rgyud 'grel): d+harma badzri ma yi mtshan/ /tshig kun shes ni 'byung ba dang/ /rab tu gsal byed ma dang gnyis/ /karma badzri ma yi mtshan/ /de dag la ni mtshan drug ste/ /dang po tha ma gnyis gnyis so/ /rgyal ba lnga la mtshan gsum gsum/ /tshig rkad dang
93a7(rgyud 'grel): ?? gnyis gnyis so/ /'og ma 'og ma re re la/ /mchod pa chen po chags chen? nas/ /khro ba chen po dgra che'i mthar/ /rgyal rnams bco lnga yum bzhi drug /nyi shu rtsa gcig ngag tu bshad/ /'dod pa che dang bde ba che/ /rdo rjes sems dang rgyal po
93b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ /dga' ba che dang mgu che gnyis/ /chags pa dang ni legs pa'i mtshan/ /tshig rkang gnyis la bzhir bzhed de/ /byang chub sems kyi mtshan rnams so/ /gzugs che lus kyang che ba nas/ /dkyil 'khor chen po yang pa yin/ /tshig su bcad pa gcig la ni/ /
93b2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' bzhi ste mtshan rnams lnga/ /de dag dbang bskur sems dpa' bzhi/ /shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba nas/ /snang ba chen po gsal che'i mthar/ /tshigs su bcad pa gcig la ni/ /sems dpa' bzhi ste mtshan mchog bdun/ /rkang pa dang po rdo rje chos/ /mtshan
93b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gcig tu shes par bya/ /rnon po la ni gnyis yin te/ /nyon mongs lcags kyu che dang mchog /rgyu la grags chen snyan grags gnyis/ /smra la snang che gsal che gnyis/ /ye shes sems dpar grags pa yin/ /mkhas pa bsgyu 'phrul che 'chang nas/ /skyu 'phrul
93b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po mig 'phrul mthar/ /tshigs bcad gcig la sems dpa' bzhi/ /mtshan rnams drug du bzhed pa yin/ /mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul che 'chad gnyis/ /rdo rje las su shes par bya/ /sgyu 'phrul che dang don grub pa/ /rdo rje bsrung ba'i mtshan yin no/ /lhag ma gnyis la
93b5(rgyud 'grel): re re'o/ /sems dpa' de dag bzhi po ni/ /las kyi sems dpa' rnams yin no/ /sems dpa' bcu drug rnams la ni/ /tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang bzhi/ /mtshan rnams nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/ /sems dpa' i bsdus don de yin no/ /sbyin bdag chen po zhes pa nas/ /
93b6(rgyud 'grel): smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho 'bar/ /pha rol phyin bcu'i tshigs bcad gnyis/ /lha mo brgyad dang sgo bar bzhed/ /sbyin bdag che dang gtso bo gnyis/ /sgeg mo yi ni mtshan yin no/ /tshul khrims chen dang 'chad mchog ni/ /phrad pa ma la gnyis su bzhed/ /bzod
93b7(rgyud 'grel): chen 'chad dar brtan pa gnyis/ /glu ma yi ni mtshan yin no/ /brtson 'grus che dang btul ba gnyis/ /gar mkhan ma yi mtshan yin no/ /me tog ma la mtshan cig ste/ /bsam gtan chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /shes rab che dang lus 'chang gnyis/ /'dug
94a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ma yi mtshan yin no/ /bsam gtan zhes pa mar me ma/ /thabs chen zhes pa dri chab ma/ /yan lag bdun dang 'phags lam brgyad/ /stobs dang ye shes sgo bar bzhed/ gsang mchod la brgyad phyi la lnga/ /sgo ba la gnyis sbyir bco lnga/
94a2(rgyud 'grel): byams chen rang bzhin zhes pa nas/ /mkhas pa chen po thabs che'i bar/ /tshig rkang bzhi la rims bzhin du/ /shar phyogs gnas pa'i skal bzangs bzhi/ /tshig rkang dang po byams pa yin/ /snying rje dang ni blo mchog gnyis/ /'jam dpal gyi ni mtshan yin/ /
94a3(rgyud 'grel): sbos glang shes rab blo chen gnyis/ /mkhas pa che dang thabs che gnyis/ /ye shes tog gi mtshan yin no/ /lho yi sems dpa' rnam bzhi ni/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs ldan bzang skyong gi/ shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ni/ /blo gros rgya mtsho'i mtshan
94a4(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa/ /blo gros mi bzad pa yi mtshan/ /spobs pa rtsegs pa zhes bya ba/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon cig bu/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi sems dpa' bzhi/ /srid pa'i ri bo che 'joms nas/ /'jigs chen 'jigs par
94a5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i mthar/ /mthu chen thob dad ngan song 'dren/ /mya ngan 'joms dang dra bcan/ /go rims bzhin du tshig rol/ /mtshan yang re re dag tu 'dod/ /byang phyogs kyi yang sems dpa' bzhi/ /mgon po rigs mchog chen po nas/ /theg pa chen
94a6(rgyud 'grel): pa tshul mchog mthar/ go rims bzhin du legs sbyar te/ /mgon po rigs dad mchog chen gnyis/ /zla 'od gzhon nu'i mtshan yin no/ /'od dpag med dang nam mkha' mdzod/ /sgrib pa rnam par sel dang gsum/ /tshig gsum mtshan gsum go
94a7(rgyud 'grel): rims bzhin/ /tshigs bcad dag ni bcu bzhi ste/ /mtshan don brkyang cu rtsa drug bzhed/ /rigs bsdus chon dbus dkyil 'khor/ /bde gshegs dkyil 'khor lha rnams ni/ /seng ge dang ni rab gsal byed/ /thub pa dang ni me tog dang/ /me
94b1(rgyud 'grel): tog mdzes dang spyan bzad do/ /kun ded dpon dang phyag rgya che/ /stobs po che dang rgyu skar rgyal/ /sman pa dang ni grags pa dang/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni 'od zer che/ /grol phung dang ni rnam snang mdzad/ /nyi bzang po dang zla ba bzang/ /'od zer can dang 'od
94b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phro bzang/ /mya ngan med dang de bzhin skags/ /'od 'phro 'dzin dang yon tan 'od/ /don ston pa dang mar me ldan/ /rab bzang dang ni sman bzang po/ /dpa' bo dang ni mjad spu dang/ /brtan po dang ni dpal gyi lha/ /mthong bar dka' dang yon
94b3(rgyud 'grel): tan 'od/ /sgra can dang ni grangs can dang/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang brtan pa'i mtshams/ /rig pa ldan dang 'od mdzad pa/ /ri bo che dang rdo rje che/ /rgyal min dang ni 'jigs med pa/ /rin po che dang pad+ma dang/ /stobs sde can dang me tog 'od/ /ye shes
94b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od dang lha chen po/ /tshig gi bdag dang snang mdza' yas/ /klus sbyin dang ni brtan pa'i rim/ /ngon yod mthod dang dbang po sbyin/ /mi ltung ba dang seng rgyal mtshan/ /rgyal ba dang ni tshogs pa po/ /dga' ba'i rgyal dang ngon 'dod pa/ /dga' bar mdzad dang chu yi
94b5(rgyud 'grel): lha/ /yon tan lag dang spos glang po/ /don yod dbyangs dang thugs bzang po/ /zla ba dang ni ri bong can/ /grags chen pa dang gtsug nor bu/ /drug po dang ni seng ge 'gros/ /dang pa dang ni rnam rgyal don/ /shes rab brtsegs dang legs gnas ba/ /blo gros
94b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ni yan lag skyes/ /bdud rtsi bu dang gzugs bzang po/ /ye shes can dang 'od zer can/ /dka' thub brtan dang bkra shis ldan/ /bde ba'i tog dang pad+ma dang/ /mi yi theg dang bde bI phyag/ ye shes mdzad blo dang 'od bral/ /tshangs pas byin dang rin
94b7(rgyud 'grel): chen mdzod/ /me tog lha dang legs pa'i don/ /chos dbang phyug dang blo gros grags/ /rdo rje tog dang pad+ma sgrub/ /rnam par rol dang du ma'i lta/ /ri yi tog dang 'od kyi tshogs/ /mi zad pa dang rin chen snying/ /bzod chen pa dang chos kyi blo/ /yid kyi
95a1(rgyud 'grel): yul dang yon tan grags/ /zla ba'i 'od dang gsal ba'i ro/ /seng ge rtog dang lus las bzlog/ snying po dpal dang nges pa'i tog/ /glog gi 'od dang gser sbyin cha/ /gzhan gyis mi thub tog gi rgyal/ /rab tu
95a2(rgyud 'grel): grags dang brtson 'grus brtan/ /dpe bral grags dang gshin 'jigs 'gyur/ /dgra bcom lta dang mar me che/ /'jig rten 'od dang dri dang po/ /yon tan 'jig dang mun bral 'gyur/ /seng ge spro dang rin chen grags/ /skye rang bzhin dang yid skyes zla
95a3(rgyud 'grel): legs par ston dang gzugs brnyan brgyan/ /nor bu bzang ngad rin chen tog/ /chos 'byung gnas dang rnam nges ngon/ /che ster ba dang rin chen gnas/ /rgyal dbang po dang rin chen mnan/ /gnas pa'i blo dang bskal bral gdugs/ /rnam snang dpal
95a4(rgyud 'grel): dang seng ge sgra/ /rnam par rol dang klu yi 'od/ /me tog ro dang klu dbang can/ /ri dbang phyug dang shin tu bsam/ /stobs kyi lha dang yon tan phreng/ /klu yi phyag dang gzugs brnyan brgyan/ /rgyal ba'i blo dang ye shes khyab/ /bdud rtsi sgra dang bden
95a5(rgyud 'grel): par smra/ /rab zhi blo dang mdza' yas gzugs/ /rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen tog/ 'dod pa bral dang legs gzhibs pa/ /don yod sangs rgyas rtogs pa 'chang/ /me tog dang ni rdor dbang rgyal/ /gzi brjid can dang don ston pa/ /tshe dpag
95a6(rgyud 'grel): med dang khro dbang phyug/ don gnas can dang mi shigs grags/ /mya ngan med dang dri ma bral/ /che ba'i lha zhes bya ba'o/ /'di yi gzhung gi tshad dag kyang/ /tshigs bcad nyi shu rtsa lngar ni/ /tshig rkang gcig gis ma tshang ba/ /rgyal ba lnga la
95a7(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin du/ /sum cu rtsa drug rtsa drug mtshan/ /sngoms pas brgya dang brgyad cu gcig/ mi bskyod dkyil 'khor lta rnams ni/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud las gnyis/ /khro bo rnam rgyal sgyu 'phrul dra/ /phyag rdor dbang bskur rgyud las gnyis/ /rdo rje brgyan
95b1(rgyud 'grel): dang rig pa mchog /bde mchog rgyan dang rdo rje 'dus/ /don yod zhags dang rdo rje thod/ /gsang ba 'dus dad rnam snang 'dra/ /dam tshig che dang zla gsang thig /gnyis med mnyam dang zla gsang thig/ rgyu de rnams las mtshan re re/ /sgyu 'phrul drug stong pa las
95b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ /'byung po phyogs dang rdor sa 'og/ rdor snying rgyan dang sa 'og rgyud/ /sgyu 'phrul dra dang bde mchog rgyud/ /khro bo bde mchog sang dang ni/ /rgyud de rnams la mtshan re 'byung/ /khro bo rnam rgyal rgyud gnyis las/ /khro zla dang ni rta mchog rgyud/ /mtshan
95b3(rgyud 'grel): ni re rer shes par bya/ /mi mnyam mnyam ngang gsang rgyud de/ /rgyud de las ni bzhi 'byung ngo/ /dpal mchog dang po gsang ba 'dus/ /gsang ba mdzod dang gsang ba 'dus/ /rdo rje gsang rgyan nor bu gsal/ /de nyid ?? pa'i rgyud dang ni/ /rgyud de rnams
95b4(rgyud 'grel): las mtshan re re/ /dam tshig chen po'i rgyud las gnyis/ /rnam snad mngon byang chub las gnyis/ /gnyis med mnyam dang khams gsum rgyal/ /rgyud de las ni re re'o/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud las gnyis/ /phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i/ /rgyud las
95b5(rgyud 'grel): khro bo bzhi 'byung ngo/ /rdo rje snying po'i rgyud las gnyis/ /rdo rje thod 'phreng rgyud las gnyis/ /khro bo rnam rgyal rgyud las gnyis/ /dbung bzangs rgyud dang legs par grub/ /yi ge drug dang 'bum pa dang/ /'jam dpal rgyud dang mdon dam rgyan/ / g de bzhin khams gsum rnam rgyal dang/ /rgyud de rnams las re re'o/ /'jam dpal rgyud las gnyis 'byung ngo/ /'de yig gzhug tshang bstan pa ni/ /tshig bcad bcu dang rkang pa gcig/ mtshan rnams bdun cu rtsa gcig ste/ /rgyal ba lnga la bcu bzhi re/ /
95b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud sde so sor lha dbye byas/ /pad+ma gar dbang dkyil 'khor gyi/ /lha rnams nges pa'i brjod pa ni/ /ye shes grags dang de bzhin rgyal/ /yon tan 'od dang khyad par che/ /zla ba rgyal dang pad+ma'i 'od/ /dka' thub rgyal dang mar me bzad/ /glog gi tog dpa' o 
96a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi rgyal/ /gsal ba pa dang dpe bral grags/ /pad+ma grags dang me tog mtshan/ /spyan bzang mchog dang grangs med don/ /drag po sde dang bsod nams 'od/ /khyad par can dang tshogs med blo/ /ru du la dang ye shes 'ong/ /grags dpong?
96a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ni ye shes dbang/ /skar ma'i tog dang rA hu la/ /snan pa che dang sman pa'i rgyal/ /bsod nams dbang dang rgyu ba pa/ /skar ma'i rgyal dang rgyal ba ba/ /nyi 'od 'char dang chos kyi mdzad/ /blo gros legs dang rgyal dbang bo/ /rdo rje sde dang rdo rje brtsegs/ /legs
96a3(rgyud 'grel): par gnas dang rgyal ba'i blo/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang kru dbang po/ /yon gsal dbang dang mngon shes tog /'od kyi tog dang dga' tshangs pa/ /sgra mi snyan dang rol ba'i gar/ /mkhas dang gzhan gyis mi thub dbyangs/ /rin chen 'od dang gsung dbyangs
96a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin/ /seng ge dang ni nyi sna tshogs/ /ye shes dpal dang bde phung po/ /me tog dang ni rnam mnan 'gro/ /gsal ba dang ni zla mar me/ /mi bzad pa dang blo bzangs sbyan/ /yan lag btsugs dang shes rab yul/ /mchog tu gyur dang rab 'joms zer/ /
96a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab sbyin dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /tshigs med sbyod dang thu bo sbyin/ /dag pa dang ni ye shes gnam/ /bde gshegs 'ang dang dbang po'o/ /thub pa 'chang dang lha zhes pa/ /'od zer bzang dang gzugs bzang po/ /rgyal po dang ni don grub mdzad/ /seng ge
96a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ni dri ldan dang/ /grags pa zhes dang rgyal pa'o/ /mchog snying dang ni bsad nams zer/ /mdog bzangs dang ni nyan 'dod pa/ /mar me dang ni rin chen brtsegs/ /tshigs med lnga dang dang ba'i bdag/ /grol bar 'gro dang gser gtsug phung/ /sgra gcan
96a7(rgyud 'grel): bzang dang ma thub pa/ /rang bzhin thub dang zla ba'i 'od/ /gser mdog bzang po dad dge ba/ /yon dbang lha dang chos kyi gdugs/ /yon tan legs dang grol zhes pa/ /ye shes rdzogs dang zhib mo'i blo/ /'ong rab 'bar dang skyabs kyi sman/ /rnam
96b1(rgyud 'grel): grol tog dang shes rab mchog /ye shes rgyal dang 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /glo bur 'joms dang thogs med grags/ /bden par gsung dang ngag snyan pa/ /ri dbang grags dang chos brtsegs la/ /'gro ba'i 'od dang legs par brgyan/ /rang gi lus dang
96b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dag /seng mche rno dang sel ba po/ /'gro ba mchod dang seng ge grags/ /chos kyi mtshan dang skal pa bzang/ /mi bskyod mdog dang 'bar ba'i rgyal/ /rtogs pa dang ni spyan bzang po/ /ngon rig blo dang 'jigs med gser/ /dri yi 'ong dag dga' 
96b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /don yod 'gro dang khro thal mdog /mchog gi gzugs dang nyan pa po/ /gtso bo grags dang drag po sbyin/ /nyi ma'i lha dang gshin 'joms lhag /shing rta'i 'gros dang blo gros bzang/ /gser bco ma dang skal ldan btsug /dbang phyug dang ni
96b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba bstan/ /mos pa 'joms dang ye shes mdzod/ /tshangs pa'i 'gro dang tsan dan dang/ /mya ngan med dang seng ge'o /tog gi yul dang pad+ma'i snying/ /'od mdza' yas dang lha yi yul/ /bsod nams me tog yig pa'i lta/ /
96b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dbang dang tshangs pa gsal/ /rin chen phyag dang dbang po ldan/ /dpe bral 'gros dang the bcom ldan/ /mchod pa dang ni 'bar ba dang/ /sangs rgyas gdags dang 'dam gyi mchog /yid 'ong ldan dang bya grub pa/ /rma bya dang
96b6(rgyud 'grel): ni chos ldan dang/ /phan ldan gzugs dang ye shes dang/ /grags pa dang ni 'od zer 'bar/ /ma lus phan dang de du'i snying/ /rgyu skar dang ni lha nyid lhan/ /ri bong can dang dra ba'i 'od/ /dge ba'i 'od dang yon tan zer/ /yid legs pa dang rigs
96b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'od/ /spyod pa lo dang rigs kyi mtsho/ /chos dbang phyug dang sku yi lha/ /yon tan stobs dang 'khor lo dbang/ /legs pa'i dbyangs dang legs par reg /don grub pa dang gzi brjid dpal/ /kun mnyam nyid dang bdud rtsi dbyangs/ /bde bar snang
97a1(rgyud 'grel): dang legs pa'i blo/ /rnam grol don dang khyad dbang phyug /rol pa'i mchog ngang lhag mthong gnas/ /nyes pa spangs dang nyi ma'i 'ong/ /bkra rgyal blo dang pad+ma'i mchog /nyi ma'i 'od dang so sor gsungs/ /legs pa dang ni tshogs pa nga?
97a2(rgyud 'grel): po/ /'jigs pa bral dang ye shes sing/ /spobs pa'i mchen nyid dang blo mchog /ri bong can dang rin chen zla/ /mi 'jigs pa dang me long che/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang snyan pa'i gsung/ /shes rab 'ong dang kun mnyam blo/ /rdo rje blo dang blo dang ldan/
97a3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i dbang dang dag dbang phyug /yon tan dpal dang gnas kyi dpal/ /'phags pa'i 'od dang gsal ba'i shugs/ /gsal ba'i ro dang dri dbang phyug /'dod can gdong dang ye shes gsung/ /rab tu 'dug dang chos rgyal mtshan/ /dri ma bral
97a4(rgyud 'grel): dang chos dbang phyug /skal bral sgra dang gzi brjid 'od/ /drang srong dbang dang blo gros phan/ /sbobs pa'i 'khor lo dang zla zhal/ /nyi zla'i 'od dang yon tan mtsho/ /yon tan gsungs par blo me tog /bsod nams tog dang spobs pa'i yul/ /rigs
97a5(rgyud 'grel): ba bskyed dang rgyal rigs dang/ /rnam grol bsam dang dbang phyug dang/ /mchog ces pa dang ye shes dbyangs/ /nam mkha' i mkha' dang mchod pa dang/ dpung tshogs dpal dang yon tan zla/ /rA hu la dang bdud rtsi 'od/ /rin chen 'od dang zla ba'i 'od/
97a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes stobs dang ye shes sku/ /'di yi gzhung tshad bstan pa ni/ /tshigs bcad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so/ /mtshan ni nyis brgya bdun bcu lnga/ /ye shes lnga po re re la/ /lnga bcu rtsa ni lnga lnga'o/ /rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor gyi/ /lha rnams ma lus bstan pa ni/ /don grub dpal dang yes nyi ma/ /don yod grub dang ri dbang brtsegs/ /dgras sbyin dang ni pad+ma dang/ /dgra bcom grags dang ye shes tog /nyon mongs 'joms dang me zhes pa/ /bde ba dri dang dpe bral 'ong/ /ri bo grags
97b1(rgyud 'grel): dang srid mdza' ston/ /zla ba dang ni rin chen zla/ /seng ge rgyal ngang bsam gtan 'dong/ /dpo dang bral dang rnam par rol/ /yon tan rin chen dang don grub/ /dgra bcom grags pa rin chen 'ong/ /srid pa bcings dang spyod rnam 'phrul/ /mdzod spu dang
97b2(rgyud 'grel): ni srobs pa grags/ /rdong nor bu dang tshe dpag med/ /nor bu 'ong dang ri bo grags/ /'od zer bcu dang gnyis dang bral/ /klu yi stobs dang yid du 'ong/ /rin chen zla dang shugs can dang/ /gsal ba dang ni dga' dbang phyug /btsun phung 'ong
97b3(rgyud 'grel): dang 'jigs bral dang/ /yon snying po dang dri med grags/ /gzi brjid zhi dang gdang tha grags/ /lta mang po dang legs par grags/ /sangs rgyas lnga 'dong rin chen gzugs/ /sangs rgyas stobs dang seng ge gshog /
97b4(rgyud 'grel): grong che mtho dang blo gros legs/ /'jig rten 'ong dang rin chen lha/ /skal ldan shing rta yang dag skyal/ /dga' ba bkong dang 'ong kyi mu/ /dga' thub che dang zla ba dang/ /chos bstan pa rang mi thub zla/ /ri bo 'od dang 'chang ba'i dbyangs/ /bden pa'i
97b5(rgyud 'grel): lha dang yon tan brtsegs/ /seng ge lha dang nor go cha/ /zla ba dang ni skra dang mtshungs/ /grags chen dang ni gzi brjid shugs/ /chos kyi grags dang dga' ba ldan/ /dri bzang po dang ri rgyal mtshan/ /dga' ba'i 'od dang mchod yon can/ /srid mdza' i nor
97b6(rgyud 'grel): bu dang bden gsung/ /rnam snang mdzad dang rnam par nges/ /grags pa'i mdza' dang klag 'chang ba/ /seng ge 'od zer srog dang ldan/ /'gro ba'i theg dang thun tshong dang/ /grags pa mchog dang blo bzang chub/ /nor zla 'od bspub thub mi bzad/ /skar
97b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal don byed dang nor 'khor/ /seng ge glang nges yon tan brgyan/ /rin chen 'od sa bya ba ste/ /mnyam nyid ye shes 'khor lo la/ /gzhung ni tshigs bcad nyi shu bzhi/ /mtshan ni brgya dang rtsa bzhi'o/ /rigs re nyi shu nyi shu ste/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi
98a1(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo la/ /go rims bzhin du brtag par bya/ /de phyir brgya dang rtsa bzhir nges/ /don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor lha/ /nges par sbyar bar bya ba ni/ /dbang byed rgyal dang bdud rab bzhi/ /sangs rgyas mnyam dang rtog bral dang/ /dri rab zhi
98a2(rgyud 'grel): dang rmongs la ston/ /rol pa dang ni dge bzang po/ /ye shes thugs dang smra ba'i dbang/ /lha chen po dang blo gros bzang/ /tshe dpag med dang chos kyi stobs/ /'jig rten mchog dang sgra gcan nyi/ /rgyal mtshan grol dang sman pa mchog /me tog dang ni dge
98a3(rgyud 'grel): gtsug pud/ /bdud rtsi 'od dang byang sems rdor/ /rgya mtsho brtan dang rin chen dpung/ /rol pa'i stobs dang nyi ma'i dpung/ /dga' ba'i 'od dang rin tshug dang/ /rjes mthun dpal dang seng ge 'gros/ /gsungs pa po dang me tog sbyin/ /grol pa'i 'ong
98a4(rgyud 'grel): dang pad+ma dang/ /ye shes 'od dang rol pa'i bkod/ /don yod gnas dang bstan pa'i 'od/ /rgyal mtshan tog dang bde ba'i bsam/ /rnam grol rgyal dang sems tshul shes/ /rgya mtsho dga' dang rin chen 'dzin/ /mi thub pa dang 'gra ba mnyes/ /sgra chen
98a5(rgyud 'grel): po rang dul pa dang/ /dkyil 'khor lngar gsungs kun lha dang/ /srid dri spod dang mchog gi mu/ /lha mar sgra dang rin chen stobs/ /pad+ma'i phyag dang dga' las rgyal/ /rtogs grub pa dang ni yul bzang po/ /me tog 'ong dang seng ge sgra/ /zla ba smra dang rdul
98a6(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa/ /mi g.yo ba dang blo gros dang/ /bsong nams mar me dang rtogs sgra/ /gzi brjid stobs dang blo gnas gzugs/ /zla ba gsang dang bya ba yon tan/ /ston pa dang ni gzi brjid bzang/ /ye shes gzi stobs dang dge 'o/ /brten pa'i stobs dang
98a7(rgyud 'grel): lha yi bu/ /rang zhi ba dang ni ma'i zhal/ /grol pa'i 'ong dang tshul khrims 'od/ /dka' thub dang ni rdul med dang/ /rgya mtsho'i gsung dad mig sman dang/ kun las rgyal dang sems can 'og /dri med 'od dang dran pa po/ /zhal ras sdug dang rgyal mdza' yas/ /
98b1(rgyud 'grel): blo yi mchog dang dpung rab zhi/ /rin chen 'od dang ches dbang phyug /sna tshogs lha zhes bya ba'o/ /bya grub ye shes 'khor lo la/ /tshigs bcad bco lnga gzhung tshad yin/ /mtshan ni dgu bcu rtsa lnga ste/ /rigs re re la bcu dgu dgu'o/ /sgyu 'phrul mngon par
98b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub pa/ /tshig gi bdag pos tshigs bcad nas/ /ya te na ma'i mdza' tshig gsum/ /ma lus pa dang de bzhin du/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan nas/ /tshig kun gsal bar byed pa'i mthar/ /gnyis te lnga
98b3(rgyud 'grel): yis spyi gtsug 'khor/ /byams chen rang bzhin zhes pa nas/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul mchog mthar/ /tshigs bcad bzhi dang bde gshegs kyi/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga 'chang ba dang/ /me long rdo rje 'jigs byed nas/ /glang chen ko rlon zhes pa'i mthar/ /tshigs bcad
98b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang rkang gcig ste/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis dpral 'khor lo/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu yi/ /mchod pa chen po chags che nas/ /smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho'i mthar/ /tshigs bcad brgyad kyis snying 'khor lo/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi/ /drag chen ha ha
98b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes sgrags nas/ /sgra dang ldan mthar tshigs bcad bdun/ /lte ba'i 'khor lo'i tshig du 'gyur/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'chad pa dang/ /mnyam nyid ye shes dkyil 'khor gyi/ /'dod pa'i don grub dam pa nas/ /rnam pa kun
98b6(rgyud 'grel): rig sangs rgyas par/ /tshigs su bcad pa bco lnga ste/ /spyi sdom drug cu rtsa bzhi yis/ /lte ba'i 'khor lo rab tu grags/ /mnyam nyid ye shes dgu las ba'i/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul sku nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin mthar/ /brgyad ni
98b7(rgyud 'grel): mgrin pa'i 'khor lor bzhed/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi/ /tshigs bcad bco lnga ched ba la/ /mnyam nyid tha ma'i tshig bsnan pas/ /bcu drug gsung ba'i 'khor lo'o/ /sgyu 'phrul mngon par byang chu ba dang/ /rdo rje dbyi drangs de bzhin gshegs
99a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs/ /rin po che dang las rigs bdun/ /tshigs bcad brgya dang sum cu gsum/ /nang gi 'khor lo drug pa'o/ /'dam grangs tshigs bcad grangs kyang mnyam/ /gnas lugs gong du bstan pa yin/ /
99a2(rgyud 'grel): las kyi 'khrul 'khor skabs 'dir bya/ /bstod pa'i rim par phye ba la/ tshigs rkang nyi shu tshigs bcad lnga/ /me long chos dbyings so sor rtog /mnyam nyid bya grub go rims bzhin/ /byang sems rdo rje'i 'khor lo la/ /tshigs bcad lnga po kun
99a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis bstod/ /lhag ma 'khor lo lnga la ni/ /bdud rtsi tshigs bcad re re dang/ /sbyar zhing so sor bstod par bya/ /rigs kun bsdus pa'i 'khor lo la/ /dang po'i sgo la kun gyis bstod/ /lhag ma sgo rnams so so la/ /tshigs bcad ye shes bstun
99a4(rgyud 'grel): zhing bstod/ /gsang ba lus kyi 'khor lo la/ /bstod pa dag dang ye shes su/ /sbyar te dang po 'dud bzhi'o/ /mchog gi dga' bzhi me long ngo/ /lhag ma bzhi tshig bcu drug go /dga' ba bcu drug rim pa bzhin/ /chos dbyings kun rtog
99a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid dang/ /bya grub rims bzhin 'dud bzhi bzhi/ /nang gi rgyas bshad 'dir ma byas/ /gsang ba'i phyir dang mdor bsdus phyir/ /phan yon brjod pa'i gzhung tshang ni/ /brgya dang lnga bcur shes par bya/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang/ /zhes
99a6(rgyud 'grel): pa pos nas gsungs bdun la/ /dang po gnyis kyi 'khor lo ni/ /dang po yi ni phan yon bstan/ /lhag ma bzhi ni 'khor lo bzhi'i/ /rim pa bzhin du phan yon yin/ /zhes pa rang la bsdus phan yon/ /yang na klog sems la sogs so/ /gsang
99a7(rgyud 'grel): sngags rim par dpya la yis/ /gzhung tshang tshigs bcad phyed dang bzhi/ /de la dbye ba rnam gnyis te/ /oM zhes pa nas oM a(rgyud 'grel): mthar/ /rtsa ba'i sngags su shes par bya/ /pra kri ti nas a yi mthar/ /phreng ba'i sngags zhes bya ba yin/ /snying ro?
99b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs sngags kun la/ /thun mong ming ni rnam bzhi ste/ /mgon med mdza' med bsdus pa sprul/ /'di ni mdza' med ces bya yin/ /sku kun bskyed pa'i sngon du ni/ /bzlas dang rgyud du bzlas pa dang/ /'khor lo dgong par bya ba dang/ bya ba thams cad
99b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dis byed de/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa kun byed phyir/ /bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa la/ /tshigs rkang nyi shu tshigs bcad lnga/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi dri med shes rab sku/ /'jam dbyangs mtshan gsol zab cing rgya che ba/ /des lung mi 'gal bla mas
99b3(rgyud 'grel): man ngag rgyud/ /de la brten nas bdag don tsam brtsams te/ /bshad mdzad dgongs 'grel bdag gis 'ga' ba med/ /nyes pa ci mthong bdag blo dbya pa'i rigs/ /bdag pas dman la phan pa 'ga' srid na/ /dge nges 'gro kun mtshan mchog
99b4(rgyud 'grel): rtogs gyur cig/ //'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba khri drug stong pa ting nge 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las/ 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa phan yon dang bcas pa'i bshad pa/ nor bu'i gling du 'khrungs pa dpal ldan byang chub mchog
99b5(rgyud 'grel): gi skal pa can/ dpal sna tshogs gzugs kyis mjod pa'i 'grel pa/ sngags don rnam par gzigs pa dang/ de'i rjes su 'breng ba slong dpon chen po gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/ nye bar bsdus pa'i rnam par rtog ge dang sbyar ba'i bsdas don mtshan gyi
99b6(rgyud 'grel): sgon ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //pradzA gu rus mdzad do/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan mang dag par brjod pa'i 'thel pa bsnyed ngo mngon par rtogs pa slob dpon chen po dpal gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa bzhugs/ /rgya gar skad du/ A rya many+dzu sh+rI nA a si kI tI DI kI sar no pi ka
99b7(rgyud 'grel): nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dag la gyi mtshan yang ngag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa snying po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ /'phags la 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzugs sogs dbang po'i yul les 'das par yi/ /
100a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi sku/ /dbang po'i gzhu 'dras sa lam rab grol zhing/ /gzhon nu'i 'o mas bu ltar gso mdzad lha/ /dam pa'i skyes mchog nges ston mdzad pa yi/ /zhabs kyis mtsho skyes gnas der spyi ba tung?
100a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /tshig rgyas pa yi las rab bsdus pa'i don/ /dpag med 'byung gnas thabs mang ston pa'o/ /blo ni rmongs 'gyur rig pa'i gnas med kyang/ /rje btsun drin gyis rgyud rnams kun gyi bcung/ /rtogs shing gsung rab la sogs gzhung
100a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang/ /mthong bas snying po'i mngon rtogs bshad par bya/ /rgyud gzhan rim pa ma yin pa'i/ /'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /thig le bzhir 'gyur dgur bcas pa/ /mda' gnyis rab tu phyeb la/ /rim gnyis rab bu sbyor ba ste/ /
100a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyi rgyud nyid bshad kyi nyon/ /de la rgyud 'di ni rin po che lta bu yin te/ dpang po bzhi dang shin tu spyor ba'i phyir ro/ /la la dag ni bya ba dang spyod pa dang/ rnal 'byor dang/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi thabs dang/ shes rab kyi rgyud kho na bzhis? zer
100a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ de dag ni snying po la spyod pa'i gang thag ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin spros pa thams cad kyis dben zhing brtags pa'i rtog pa gang gis kyang ma gos par gcig pas du ma mi gnas kyis kyang gdul bya'i blo'i khyad par
100a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis du mar snang bzhi rang rang gi rtog pa las bden par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i phying sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'ga' zhig tu/ /ye shes gcig kyang ma gsungs par/ /chos kyi char gyis tshim mdzad pa/ /sems can gzhug pa'i ched du gnas/ /zhes
100a7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs bas so/ /de bas na kho bo ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i 'bras bu ni gtso bor ston to/ /gzhan gyi rig pa ma yi ni pa yang/ /chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir/ /gtso bos theg dbye ma mchis kyang/ /gang gis theg pa gsum bstan pa/ /
100b1(rgyud 'grel): da ni thabs la mkhas pa'i dngos/ /zhes gsungs pas na/ /dman pa dang 'bring dang rab kyi khyad par gyis nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ /theg pa chen po bstan pa yin no/ /rgyud du ston pa nyid du yang rigs te/ sngon du byung bas yang rgyad gcig gnyis
100b2(rgyud 'grel): la du mar bzhag pa nyid de/ /de ltar yang sgyud gcig nyid la du mar go ba'o/ /de yang 'khor 'gro ma rdo rje dra ba'i gur las/ /skyes bu bsdu bar byed ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rgyud bshad do/ /btsun mo bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor ma yin rkyud
100b3(rgyud 'grel): bshad do/ /dman pa las ni las kyi rgyud/ /las kyi rnal 'byor de lhag pa/ /sems can mchog la lhag rnal 'byor/ /bla med rnal 'byor de ltag la/ /zhes gsungs pas na/ /rten la sogs pa'i khyed par du shes par bya'o/ /glang gzhi bstan
100b4(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyis chog pa ma yin te/ sngar bzhin no/ /dbang po rab dang yang rab tu gyur pa la/ e bi ma ya sh+ru ta sa ma ya a ka/ zhes gsungs pa nyid kyis snying po la 'gro ba brtson par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyang ldan pa yin te/ chos kyi phung po brgyad
100b5(rgyud 'grel): khri dang/ /bzhi stong gi ni grangs snyed kyi/ /kun gyi gzhi dang pha ma ni/ /yi ge gnyis su yang dag bstan/ /yi ge e ni mar gyur la/ /baM ni pha zhes bya bar grangs/ /thig le de gnyis sbyor ba ste/ /sbyor de shin tu rmad du 'byung zhes gsungs pas
100b6(rgyud 'grel): so/ /thams cad du mi 'gyur ba ma yin te/ thabs dang shes rab 'dus byas pa'i sbyor ba las nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos gsungs par gyur to/ /de bas na skyes pa dang bud med gnyis sbyor ba ni ma ning ste/ de 'jug pa'i
100b7(rgyud 'grel): khyad par gcig pu pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po brjod pa na nges pa ste/ de bas na/ gcig pu thams cad mkhyen pa sto/ /kun tu 'gro ba shin tu phra/ zhes gsungs pa dang/ gzhung gzhan gyis kyang shes par bya'o/ /de ltar don
101a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi rang bzhin gtan la phab nas/ tshig gi tshogs blo la rab tu sbyor ba'i dgos pas don bsdus nas bstan par bya ste/ de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang/ zhes pa nas/ yang dang yang du gsor byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis thun mong
101a2(rgyud 'grel): ma yin pa'i 'khor bstan to/ /khro gnyer rim par ldan la sogs/ zhes pa nas/ lus btung rnams dang lhan cig tu/ zhes pa'i bar gyis thun mong gi 'khor bstan to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das zhes pa nas/ spran sngar 'dug
101a3(rgyud 'grel): ste 'di skad gsol zhes pa'i bar gyis mchod par brjod pa bstan to/ /khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang zhes bstan nas byang chub ci nas bdag thob mdzod/ /ces pa'i bar gyis bdag gi don du gsol ba bstan to/ /nyon mongs pas ni sems
101a4(rgyud 'grel): dkrugs shing/ zhes pa nas/ bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i bar gyis gzhan gyi don du gsol ba bstan to/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ zhes pa nas/ dbang po'i bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis/ zhes pa'i bar gyis spangs pa dang ye
101a5(rgyud 'grel): shes phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas su bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku zhes pa nas/ glur blangs gang lags bshad du gsol/ zhes bya ba'i bar gyis yang dag pa'i mtshan gyi don gsol bar bstan to/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gi /
101a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa nas/ sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal zhes pa'i bar gyis mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i don gyi gsol ba'o/ /de dag ni gleng gzhi'i don gleng bsleng ba dang 'brel bar bstan pa ste 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o// /
101a7(rgyud 'grel): gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis/ zhes pa rnam las btud nas ni spyan sdar 'dug /ces pa rgyud nyan pa la gus pa'i sbyor ba bstan to/ /de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub ces pa nas/ sbyong bar byed ba'i 'dzum bstan nas/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis ljags
101b1(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs bdud mthar byed pa'i sbyor ba bstan to/ /tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis/ zhes pa nas/ legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang/ zhes pa'i bar gyis tshangs pa'i gsung gis 'khor la ched du brjod pa bstan to/ /lag na rdo rje khyod legs so
101b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa nas/ khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis nyan pa po thos pa dang sbyar bar bstan to/ /rkang pa ya gcig gis mtshams sbyar bar bstan te/ 'di dag ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub/ ces pa nas/ rigs?
101b3(rgyud 'grel): chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas/ zhes pa'i bar gyis rigs la gzigs pa bstan to/ /tshig gis bdag pos tshigs su bcad ces pa nas/ sde chen bzhi pa dang lnga pa'i mdza' byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin bstan cing bshad do/ /'di ltar sangs
101b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ zhes pa nas/ tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed ces pa'i bar gyis chos thams cad yi ge gcig gi lus la gnas par bstan te/ /mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che zhes pa nas/ chags pa thams cad sel par byed ces pa'i
101b5(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis nyon mongs pa dang rigs rnam par dag pa'i mchod pa bstan to/ /'dod pa chen po bde ba che zhes pa nas/ sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul che/ zhes pa'i bar gyis khams dang che ba bcu drug gi rnam bdag bstan to/ /sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo che zhes
101b6(rgyud 'grel): pa nas/ bsam pa'i ye shes rgyu mtsho ste/ zhes pa'i bar gyis rnam shes tshogs dang lha mo'i rnam dag bstan to/ /byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med ces pa nas/ theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog ces pa'i bar gyis sa dang skal bzangs bcu drug gi
101b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag bstan te/ de dag ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam dag de kho na nyid kyi snying po bstan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/ /zhes pa nas gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can zhes pa'i bar gyis ches kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin bstan
102a1(rgyud 'grel): to/ /pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste/ zhes pa nas rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis lam gyi yon tan rdzogs pa bstong pa bstan to/ /thog ma med pa spros med bdeg ces pa nas/ yang dag mdza' la rnam par gnas/ zhes pa'i
102a2(rgyud 'grel): bar gyis thugs kyi byin rlabs la bstod pa bstan to/ /bdag med seng ga'i sgra dang ldan/ /zhes pa nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba stobs po che zhes pa'i bar gyis gsung gi byin rlabs la bstong pa bstan to/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi bdag ces pa nas/ /
102a3(rgyud 'grel): tshul chen gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog ces pa'i bar gyis sku'i byin rlabs la bstod pa'o/ /tshig rje tshig bdag smra mkhas pa/ zhes pa nas/ bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po zhes pa'i bar gyis 'gro ba'i 'dren ston du gyur pa bstan to/ /phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong/ /
102a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa nas/ bde gshegs 'jig rten rig pa'i mchog /ces pa'i bar gyis theg pa gsum gyi lus ye shes su bstan te/ /bdag gir mi 'dzin dang mi 'dzin zhes pa nas/ 'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog /ces pa'i bar gyis 'jam dpal ye
102a5(rgyud 'grel): shes sems dpa' i ye shes bstan to/ /chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal/ zhes pa nas/ bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan bdag ces ba'i bar gyis de thams cad rnal 'byor gyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid du bstan to/ /so so rang rig mi g.yo ba zhes pa nas/
102a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas sras po dam pa'i mchog ces pa'i bar gyis rang rig tu gzhi gcig par bstan to/ /shes pa srid 'byung skye gnas med/ /ces pa nas/ /gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba zhes pa'i bar gyis de nyid la brnyog pa bcus ma gos par bstan
102a7(rgyud 'grel): to/ /sngags mchog mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal zhes pa nas/ drang srong che gus mtshad cing brjod/ /ces pa'i bar gyis sku'i 'khor lo bstan to/ /rigs gsum 'chang ba gsang sngags 'chang/ zhes pa nas theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po zhes
102b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bar gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo bstan to/ /don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal zhes pa nas/ rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che zhes pa'i bar gyis rigs kyi 'khor lo bstan to/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed ces pa nas/ sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyis mchog
102b2(rgyud 'grel): ces pa'i bar gyis me long lta bu'i ye shes la bstong pa bstan to/ /yang dag bdag med la sogs pa'i rkang pa gnyis kyis don gyis rgyud la bstod pa bstan to/ /stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste/ zhes pa nas/ chos kyi gaN+Di sgra bo che/ zhes pa'i bar gyis
102b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig gi rgyud bstan to/ /mi gnas pa la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis kyis rab tu byed pa'i rgyud bstan to/ /gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste zhes pa nas/ gzugs rnams ma lus 'chang ba po zhes pa'i bar gyis bde ba chen po'i rgyud bstan to/ /mtshungs pa
102b4(rgyud 'grel): med cing cha bar grags/ /zhes pa nas/ dar ba chen po chos kyi rtog /ces pa'i bar gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud bstan to/ /'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig ces pa nas/ sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes/ zhes pa'i bar gyis 'bras bu'i rgyud bstan to/ /
102b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten shas legs slob dpon te zhes pa nas/ skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med ces pa'i bar gyis thabs kyi rgyud bstan to/ /nam mkha' i mthal la longs spyod pa zhes pa nas/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol phyin zhes pa'i bar gyis thabs ye shes sems
102b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i? rgyud bstan to/ /ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can zhes pa nas/ gsum sel mdza' yas grol gsum thob ces pa'i bar gyis dri ma rnam par dag pa'i rgyud bstan to/ /sgrib pa kun las nges par grol zhes pa nas/ lus kun las ni rnam par gnas/
102b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i bar gyis bya ba bral ba'i rgyud bstan to/ /nam mkha' i mdza' la rab gnas pa zhes pa nas/ ston ldan zhing yon tan shes/ zhes pa'i bar gyis gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan to/ /chos shes bkra shis bkra shis 'byung zhes pa nas/ bkur sti rim
103a1(rgyud 'grel): gro phun sum tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar gyis rang don bkra shis rgyud la skye bar bstan to/ /mchog tu dga' ba grags bdag dpal zhes pa nas/ 'jig rten sgra ste rab kyi mchog ces bya ba'i bar gyis rang bzhin brtags pas dgegs?
103a2(rgyud 'grel): bstan to/ /'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po zhes pa nas/ gdong lnga gtsug phung lnga dang ldan zhes pa'i bar gyis dge ba phyag rgya chen por bstan to/ /zur phung lnga pa me tog thong ces pa nas/ dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che zhes pa'i bar gyis?
103a3(rgyud 'grel): bar du dag ba chos kyi phyag rgya bstan to/ /gtsang gnas dam pa go tam zhes pa nas grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus zhes pa'i bar gyis tha mar dge ba las kyi phyag rgya bstan to/ /rnam grol zhib zhi ba nyid ces pa nas/ ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs/
103a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bde ba chen po'i lus lhan cig skyes pa bstan to/ /tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che/ zhes pa nas/ smra ba seng ge tshugs pa med/ ces bye ba'i dang gyis tshig la mi gnas pa'i tshig gi gnas su bstan to/ kun tu dga' ba mchog tu dga' /
103a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa nas/ lag na 'od 'bar snang ba po zhes pa'i bar gyis sku dang ye shes la sogs pa'i snang ba bstan to/ /sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste/ zhes pa nas/ nad do cog gi sgra che ba/ zhes pa'i bar gyis 'gro ba la sman par snang ba bstan to/ /sdug
103a6(rgyud 'grel): gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog /ces pa nas/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs/ zhes pa'i bar gyis chos kyi rgyal mtshan du snang ba bstan to/ /'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste/ zhes pa nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig
103a7(rgyud 'grel): ces pa'i par kyis rim pa gnyis su bstan to/ rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal zhes pa nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin/ zhes pa'i bar gyis rigs su snang ba bstan to/ /rdo rje'i nyi ma nas rkang pa gnyis kyis bklag pa'i thabs dang mi gnas bar?
103b1(rgyud 'grel): bstan to/ /chags bral la sogs chags pa che zhes pa nas/ yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag /ces pa'i bar gyis lam gyi ye shes lhun gyis grub pa bstan to/ /theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod ces pa nas/ rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog /ces
103b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bar gyis ye shes lhun gyis grub pa bstan to/ /rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan zhes pa nas/ sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang zhes pa'i bar gyis bsam don lhun gyis grub pa bstan to/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog chas pa nas/ ye
103b3(rgyud 'grel): shes me lce 'od rab gsal zhes pa'i bar gyis ye shes lhun gyis grub pa bstan to/ /'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste zhes pa nas/ sems can thams cad rab grol byed ces pa'i bar gyis mnyam pa nyid kyis ye shes mdor bstan to/ /nyon mongs
103b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yul du gcig dpa' ba zhes pa nas/ tshangs pa'i g.yul sa rtse nas gnon/ /zhes pa'i bar gyis las kyi phyag rgya bstan to/ /don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don zhes pa nas/ nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes/ zhes pa'i bar gyis dpe don
103b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'brel pa bstan to/ /sen mo'i 'od ni shas chen dmar/ zhes pa nas/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud dang ldan/ zhes pa'i bar gyis mtshan dpe bstan to/ /'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa zhes pa nas/ nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa/ zhes pa'i
103b6(rgyud 'grel): par gyis thun mong gi lam rdzogs par bstan to/ /yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton/ zhes pa nas/ bya ba dpag med 'gyed pa po zhes pa'i bar gyis spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to/ /skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs/ zhes pa
103b7(rgyud 'grel): nas/ theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas/ zhes pa'i bar gyis skad cig gi ye shes bstan to/ /nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag ces pa nas/ sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba/ zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsang sngags mdza' i don du bstan to/ /
104a1(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis kyis 'khor ba'i sa bon dang bral bar bstan to/ /snying rje chen po shes rab thabs zhes pa nas/ nor pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ zhes pa'i bar gyis gzhan don mdzad pa bstan to/ /
104a2(rgyud 'grel): don gsum the tsom med pa'i blo zhes pa nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang zhes pa'i bar gyis de nyid kyi 'thad pa bstan to/ /lus med lus te lus kyi mchog ces pa nas/ nor bu chen po rin chen tog ces pa'i bar gyis ye shes kyi lus
104a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi mdzad pa bstan to/ /sangs rgyas la sogs pa rkang pa gnyis kyi bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes mdor bstan to/ /gsang sngags las byung yi ge med/ ces pa nas/ thig le stong pa yi ge brgya/ zhes pa'i bar gyis yi ge thams cad chogs gcig
104a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stong par bstan to/ /rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med ces pa nas/ bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can/ zhes pa'i bar gyis/ e ba gyis dbugs dbyung ba bstan to/ /bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing zhes pa nas/ phyogs bcur sprul
104a5(rgyud 'grel): pa sna tshogs 'gyed ces pa'i bar gyis sku gsum du bstan to/ /de bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa/ zhes pa nas/ srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba/ zhes pa'i bar gyis 'gro ba gsum gyi gtso bor snang ba bstan to/ /ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla
104a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa nas/ bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa/ zhes pa'i bar gyis bdud pham par byed pa bstan to/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren ces pa nas/ phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab ces pa'i bar gyis bsnyen bkur gyi gnas su bstan to/ /
104a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum po gom cig bgrod ces pa nas/ shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog /ces pa'i bar gyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sprul pa mnga' bar bstan to/ /gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste/ //
104b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa nas/ 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog ces pa'i bar gyis mjug bsdu bstan to/ /de dag gis ni byang chub kyi sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snang ba ye shes lngar bstod pa'o/ /mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ ces pa nas/ yi ge re re zhis?
104b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings la sogs pa la bstod pa bstan to/ /rigs kyi bdag po nas gzung ste/ aM shtha na dang/ u shma Sha'i gnyis pa dang/ bzhi pa'i bar gyis ye shes sngags kyi rang bzhin du bstan to/ /rigs kyi bdag po nas bcu drug pa'i bar gyis de
104b3(rgyud 'grel): yang 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i sngags kyi rang bzhin du bstan to/ /de dag ni don gyi snying po yon tan bsdus pa'i don gyi bstod pa'o/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang zhes pa nas/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas/ zhes pa'i par
104b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'khor gyi mchod pa brjod par bstan to/ /de ni mgon po gsang ba'i bdag ces pa nas/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad/ ces pa'i bar gyis ched du brjod pa'i bstod pa bstan to/ /de dag ni ye shes kyi rjes su mthun pa'i/ /mtshan
104b5(rgyud 'grel): nas brjod pa'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa ni sgo lnga'i khyad par shes par bya'o/ /de ltar bsdus pa'i don yongs su shes shing/ don lhag par rnyed pa'i gang zag gis rgyud kyi rab tu byed pa'i don 'di nyid kyang bde blag du rnyed par 'gyur ro// //
104b6(rgyud 'grel): da ni tshig gi don gsal bar dbye bar bya ste/ de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang zhes bya ba la soD pas mchog dang thun mong ni dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas mtshon pa la gang gnas she na/ man tra'i rang bzhin shes shing skyob pa'o/ /des sbangs pa dang ye
104b7(rgyud 'grel): shes phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang ngo/ /gdul dka' ba ni theg pa gsum ste/ sprul pa dang/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'dul ba rnams so/ /kyi zhes pa ni drug pa'i don gyi gnyis pa'i/ /
105a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par dag pa ni theg pa'i yang rnam par dag pa ste/ bde ba dang/ stong pa dang/ gnyis su med pas na mchog go /dpa' bo ni 'jigs shing thub pa med pa ste sku dang/ gsung dang thugs kyi khyad bar gyis
105a2(rgyud 'grel): sa 'og dangs steng dang/ sa bla las rgyal ba'o/ /rdo rje ni stong pa nyid bde ba chen po'i snying po can te/ gang la yod pa na dbang phyug go /de lnga'i gsang ba las thob pa ni rgyal pa'o/ /pad+ma dkar po ni dkar ba la sogs pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa ste/ 'dir rnam par rtog pa
105a3(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /ye shes la ched du brjod pa ni rang las te/ 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i don gyis na yang zhes sbyar ro/ /khro gnyer dang sku dang/ og spu ser la brjes pa dang/ mig dmar ba dang/ lce 'dril zhing ya sos ma mchu mnan pa dang/
105a4(rgyud 'grel): thud zhing gel ba dang/ gsus pa che ba dang/ yan lag rab tu bgrad pa dang/ nyid lag rdo rje rtse mo lta bu dang/ dur khrod dang/ gdug pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ mtshon cha 'bar zhing 'phro ba dang/ mgo bo'i do shal dang/ me 'bar ba'i gnas
105a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rim par ldan pa la sogs pa ste/ lag na rdo rje dang mtshungs par mdza' yas pa la yod pa ni ma rig la sogs pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bcu gnyis zad pa'i don to/ /de snyed kyi ba spu'i khung nas 'phro ba yang rdo rje rtse mo ste khro bo'i gzugs so/ /
105a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lag gis gsor bar byed pa ni snga ma bzhin te/ de'i don kyang snying rje chen po dang shes rab dang zhes pa'o/ /thabs ni sngon rang gi don du gyur pa ji ltar de nyid kyis gzhan don du 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar sprul ba dang yang sprul gyi gzugs thams cad bcom
105a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin lus ngag yid gsum gyi mchod pa'i phyir/ dga' dgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can no/ /khro bo 'ba' zhig mi rigs pa ma yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sems kyi mgon du gyur pas so/ /de dang lhan cig
105b1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni phyag na rdo rje'o/ /thams cad bsam pa mthun par zhes pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid snang ba med pa'i ye shes thugs su chud nas 'gro ba'i don la gshegs pas so/ /shes rab kyis bcom pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ dbang phyug la sogs pa'i
105b2(rgyud 'grel): yon tan dang ldan pas mi gnas pa brnyes pas na bcom ldan 'das so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni byang chub sems dpa' la yang gsungs shing bshad pa ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i yon tan ni de ba chen po'i thob pa 'ba' ?
105b3(rgyud 'grel): zhig la'o/ /khyab bdag ni yongs su dag pa'i ye shes thams cad la khyab pa'i bdag nyid do/ /yang na sems can thams cad kyi snying por gnas pa dang/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i byed pa po nyid
105b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'gro ba bzhi'i dbang po la khyab pa'i bdag nyid do/ /bdag ni bdag nyid kho na'o/ /sman pa ni tshig dang/ don dang spobs pa'i gzugs kyis so/ /bdag don ni mthar thug pa'i don to/ /phyir ni dgos pa'o/ /thabs khyad par can gyi sgyu ma dang 'phrul gyi rnam pa lta
105b5(rgyud 'grel): bu ste/ nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sbyor bas bde ba chen po'i dra bas kun la yog par bya ba nyid kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur bar ro/ /ci nas zhes pa ni/ nan tan du bya ba'i tha tshig go /theg pa chen por 'gyur ba nyid yin te/ dper
105b6(rgyud 'grel): na sa bon gyi ma gtogs par myu gu la sogs pa'i yon tan 'byin par ga la nus/ de bas na ma rdzogs rdzogs par byed mda' yin no zhes gsungs pas/ rgya'i gnas skabs thabs kyi sbyor ba la yang bkag na/ phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir lta
105b7(rgyud 'grel): smos kyang ci dgos/ dang por nag gi bdag nyid la bzhag cing sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir/ sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa/ /rgyal pa skyang ni ma gsungs na/ /bdag 'dra ngan pa smos ci dgos/ /de bas 'jig rten bsam pa btang/ /zhes gsungs pa'i don kyang
106a1(rgyud 'grel): de'o/ /rgyu 'bras rjes su mi mthun pa yin te/ byams pa dang snying rje sngon du song ba'i byang chub kyi sems smos pa dang 'jug pa dang/ shin tu 'jug pa la sogs pas sems kyi don gyi phyir nang du bzhag pa'o/ /de bas rnam
106a2(rgyud 'grel): par rtog pa gang gang gis/ /gang gang blo ni bsgoms pa dang/ /sgom pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa dang/ /bde gsal mi rtog blo 'bras can/ /zhes pas kyang shes par bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa ni thams cad rang bzhin dngos po dang/ dngos po
106a3(rgyud 'grel): med pa dang/ btang snyoms kyi rnyogs pas sems dkrugs pa'o/ /mi shes pa ni rgyud pa'i gzhung lugs dang bral bas don ma phrad de smig rgyu la tshur bzung bas ngal zhing gdungs pa bzhin/ 'dir yang brtags pa'i rnyog pa'i 'dam du bying
106a4(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur pa rnams so/ /sman pa ni gzhan gyis shes rab gsum la sbyar ro/ /nang gi bdag nyid la 'jug pa'i dgos pas na phyir ro/ /bla ni 'bras bu ster ba'i don gyis so/ /ston pa ni log rtog bzlog pa'o/ /dam tshig ni sdom pa ste/ bde ba
106a5(rgyud 'grel): dang stong pa'i dra ba phyed pa de nyid ji lta ba mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni/ e baM las ni rab tu zhugs/ zhes gsungs so/ /dbang po gdul bya'i rgyud mkhyen pa'o/ /bsam pa ni gdul bya'i 'dod
106a6(rgyud 'grel): pa mkhyen pa'o/ /de dag ni gnas su gyur pas mchog go /gi ni drug pa'i don gyi gnyis pa'o/ /ye shes sku ni ye shes phung po can ste bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyis rtag pa nyid rtag tu 'byung ba'o/ /de bas na/ gang gis nga la gzugs
106a7(rgyud 'grel): su mthong/ /gang gis nga la skrar shes pa/ /log par rtogs pa spong ba ste/ /skye bo de yis nga mi mthong/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi sku/ /'dren pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni/ /de ni rnam par shes mi nus/ /zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /
106b1(rgyud 'grel): gtsug tor ni bltar mi mngon pa ste/ de nyid bril gyis mi non pa'i rtags yin pas na gtsug tor chen po'o/ /tshig gis brjod pas byed pa ste/ mi zad pa'i gsung mnga' bas bdag po'o/ /ye shes ni mdza' dang bral ba ste mi 'gyur bas na sku'o/ /de'i
106b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid ni rang 'byung ba ste/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i mtshan gyi don brjod pa'o/ /'brel pa gcig pas mchog go/ don zab pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o/ /don rgya che ba ni blo'i yul ma yin pas so/ /don chen po ni rang gzhan grub pas so/ /
106b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs pa med pa ni gcig pur gyur pas so/ /zhi ba ni glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral bas so/ /dge ba gsum ni skye ba dang/ gnas pa dang/ 'gag pa dben pa'o/ /yang na lus dang ngag dang/ yid gsum las 'byung ba gsum mo/ /yang na dus gsum
106b4(rgyud 'grel): du gsungs pa dang/ gsung bar 'gyur ba dang gsung pa'o/ /de nyid ni yang dag pa'i shes par sgrub par byed par yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /rgyud ni tshig dang don to/ /rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu chen po ste/ de rab tu rgyas par gsal bar byed pas tshig la yang ngo/ /
106b5(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi rgyud sgyu 'phrul dra ba mtshon pas btags pa ste/ /lha sbyin zhang po can zhes bya ba lta bu'o/ /las ni skal pa'i rgyud de gong du bstan zin to/ /rdo rje 'chang chen ni grags chen la/ /gsang sngags 'chang ni snying po don gyi sangs rgyas so/ /ji snyed pa ni
106b6(rgyud 'grel): dpag med rnams kyis so/ /dgyes bzhin du glur blangs pa bshad du gsol/ zhes pa ni nges pa'i don to/ /gsang 'dzin ni rgyud 'di nyid sngar bshad pa'i don yang ngo/ /phyir ni gtso bor gyur pa gzhan med pa'o/ /nges pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das
106b7(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ der ma byung gi bar las 'byung gi bar zhes bya'o/ /gzung ba ni bdag don du'o/ /gsal ba spang ba ni gzhan gyi don gyi phyir ro/ /bsam pa'i khyad par ni dbang po'i bye brag la'o/ /bshad par 'tshal ba ni de kho na nyid bcu dang/ rim pa gnyis
107a1(rgyud 'grel): dang zung du 'jug pa'o/ /gsang dbang ni dug bcom pa'i de nyid la dbang ba'i lag na rdo rjes so/ /de skad du/ zhes pa ni lnga'i gsol ba gdab po/ /spyod lam ni gus pa'i rtags so/ /de nas de ma thag tu'o/ /rigs dang stobs
107a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshon pas shAkya thub pa'o/ /rkang gnyis ni lha dang mi yi ste/ de'i mchog tu gyur pa'o/ /bzang ba dang/ kha dog dang dbyibs phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /ring zhing yangs pa ni chu dang zheng do/ /brkyad ba dang/ 'od phyung ba dang/ 'dzum pa bstan pa'i
107a3(rgyud 'grel): bdud btul ba dang/ 'khor bag dang ldan pa la dgong pa dang/ thugs rje chen pos sems can gyi yid dang mthun par bstan pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs ni yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa ste/ 'dir snyan pa dang/ che ba dang gsal
107a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ don go bar nus par 'dus pa ston pa'o/ /bkang ba ni grags pa'o/ /gsang ba ni gsang ba chen po la'o/ /slar gsungs pa ni zhus pa'i lan no/ /snying rje chen po ni thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'o/ /dag par byed pa ni nyon mongs
107a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dag par byed pa ste/ bkra shis par ro/ /sdig sel ba ni rdul dang bral ba'o/ /brtson pa ni ma yengs par rtse gcig pa'o/ /rang don nyid kyis legs so zhes pa'o/ /gnyis pas gzhan don bzung ba'o/ /legs par bstan pa ni
107a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i lam du'o/ /nyon zhes pa ni/ rdo rje 'chang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin du lta ba dang rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di nyid yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che sra brtan 'bar ba lta bur blta ba dang/ thun mong gi 'khor rin po che lta
107a7(rgyud 'grel): bu'i gang zag tu blta ba dang/ bshad bya sems kyi rang bzhin shes rab dang snying rje dbyer mi phyed par blta ba dang/ gsung dri ma med pa'i bdud rtsis dbang po che zhing khyab par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ gsang sngags ni 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dum bu lha'i
107b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo ste/ snying po dang/ phyag rgya dang/ rig sngags rnams la thams cad ces bya'o/ /de dag ni rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo gzung ngo/ /de nyid kyi rigs shes par yang bya'o/ /rigs chen ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i
107b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin lnga dang drug pa'o/ /kho bo ni rigs 'pho bar 'dod pa ste/ dam pa'i zhal las 'ongs pa ni rgyas gdab gsum gyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir te mdor bstan pa'o/ /gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs/ zhes pa ni gsang
107b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags la sogs pa ni rig sngags kyi las byed cing/ don bsgrubs pas na 'chang ba ste las kyi rigs so/ /yang na thams cad shes rab kyi rtags su shes par byas la/ des de la nan tan du byas pas de 'grub ces pa'o/ /sku dang gsung dang
107b4(rgyud 'grel): thugs ni rigs gsum ste/ la ni de nyid gzhir byas pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni zhes bya ba la snang bar gzigs pa ni sku'o/ /'jig rten ni log pa'i shes pas brtags pa'i 'khor ba ste/ de nyid rang gi ngo bo
107b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rang bzhin la/ 'khor ba'i skyon gyis mgos pas na pad+ma'i rigs so/ /de bas na/ dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las gti mug la sogs kyis mi 'ching/ rang rang nyid ni rdzogs byang chub ces gsungs pa'i
107b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro/ /'jig rten gzugs la sogs pa ste/ snang ba'i dbang po'i yul du 'gyur ba'o/ /de'i byed pa po ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ rin po che rigs la phyogs med pas na chen po'o/ /phyogs rgya ni khyab cing mi 'da' ba' i don
107b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis te/ 'bras bu 'ba' zhig pas chen po'o/ /rigs mchog ces pa ni/ rigs lnga dbyer mi phyed pas rtsod 'das kyi rigs so/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni chen po ste/ rigs bzhi'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir 'khor rnams la thil gyis mi non
108a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i skye mched yod pa dang/ nyid kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i mched kyis 'khor rnams ris drug gi rgyad du mkhyen pas gtsug tor cher gzigs nas zhes bya'o/ /gtso bo rdo rje dbang phyug la dgongs pa dang/ 'bras bu kho na lam du bya
108a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir/ rigs drug gi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po nyid bshad par bya ste/ tshig gi zhes pa na tshig gi rgyud do/ /bdag po ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ste rdo rje 'chang ngo/ /tshigs su bcad pa ni rkyang pa bsdus pa'o/ /bka' stsal
108a3(rgyud 'grel): pa shugs kyis shes par bya ste/ longs spyod rdzogs pa chen po dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba dang/ bstan pa'i bdag pos so/ /gsang sngags ni skye ba med pa'i snying po can yi ge a'o/ /rgya po ni thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas so/ /drug ni sde tshan shes
108a4(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi yi ge'o/ /ldan pa ni sde tshan bdun pa'i thabs kyi yi ge'o/ /de mchon byed du gyur cing/ thun mong dang mchog gi nus pa 'byung zhing shes par bya'o/ /gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang zhes bya ba ni ma ning gi yi ge'i rang bzhin mtshon par bya'o/ /mi
108a5(rgyud 'grel): skye ba ni ngo bo ste chos so/ /ches ni rkyen las skyes pa ste chos can no/ /can ni tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin 'di gsungs pa'o/ /de ltar gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yongs su dag cing dri ma med pa ji ltar gnas she na/ ring thung gi bye brag gis rigs dang rigs
108a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang ye shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngags ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te/ mtshan dang dpe byad kyi 'khor lor snang ba dang/ sna tshogs dkar dmar gyi rnam bar snang ba ni gdul bya'i snang bI khyad par te/ de nyid rnam par dag pa dang rnam par dag pas rang
108a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni i a'i zhes bya'o/ /rin po che'i riD ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ thun mong ma yin pa'i dbang po'i longs spyod du gyur pa dang/ thun mong gi dbang po'i spyod yul du gyur pa ni gdul bya'i dbang po'i khyad par te/ rnam par dag pa
108b1(rgyud 'grel): dang rnam par dag pas mdza' bzhi la mi gnas pa ni o aau zhes bya'o/ /pad+ma'i rigs ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te/ khro bo dang mnyam pa dang zhi ba'i khyad par gyis rigs bsdus rgyas bya brag du snang ba dang/ rnam shes skye ba'i sgo tha dad par snang ba ni gdul
108b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'i dbang po'i khyad par te/ rnam par dag pa dang rnam par dag pas kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba rgyud gcig tu gnas pa u a'u zhes bya'o/ /las kyi rigs ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes te/ thogs pa med pa'i skus rigs so so'i 'phrin
108b3(rgyud 'grel): las rtag tu rgyan mi 'chad par mdzad pa dang/ dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid rang rang mthun pa'i don byed 'dul bya'i snang ba'i khyad par te/ rnam par dag pa dang rnam par dag pas 'bad pa med par rang gi dang gis 'byung ba ni oM a(rgyud 'grel): 'o/ /rdo rje'i rigs
108b4(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te/ thams cad gcig tu gyur pa nyid dang/ sgro skur dang bral ba nyid na de bzhin gshegs pa dang gang zag gi khyad par te/ rang gi ngo bos ni gcig la rtag tu 'byung ba dang rjes 'jog tu gnas pas rnam par dag pa dang/ rnam
108b5(rgyud 'grel): par dag pas 'di'i zhes 'ga' la yang mi gnas pa'i e i zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i rigs ni bde ba chen po'i ye shes te/ gzugs can ma yin pa dang/ skye 'jig med pa dang/ yul la mi gnas pa dang/ 'gro 'ong med pa dang/ phyi
108b6(rgyud 'grel): dang nang gi chos thams cad de'i ngo bor gcig pa dang/ zug rdu gang gi kyang ma gos pa'i ye shes snang ba med pa la sogs pa 'bras bu'i lus brgyad dang ldan pa dang/ mtshan ma thams cad rang grol bas dbang po rang zhi zhing ming gis dben? pa'i zung
108b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jug rgyud las skyes pa ni/ rigs thams cad ye shes thams cad nyid yin pas rtsod 'das zhes bya ste/ dbye ba med pa la a A zhes bya'o/ /de rtogs par bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i blo'i khyad par nang rten cing 'brel te 'byung bas 'jug ste/ s+thi to h+ri
109a1(rgyud 'grel): di zhes bya ba ni re shig pa'i gnas mtshon pa ste/ snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'o/ /dz+nyA na zhes bya ba na dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang/ dga' bral dang/ lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ye shes gnas
109a2(rgyud 'grel): de dag tu rnyed par 'gyur pa'o/ /mu rti zhes bya ba ni spyi gtsug la bya ste/ phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyi sbyor bas 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor bas lam nges par sbyangs nas thig le'i rnal 'byor gyis shigs pa med pa'i yi ge haM las byang chub kyi sems
109a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzag pa 'dren cing rol pa bde ba rnyed par 'gyur ba'o/ /ra ni ra ste chags pa chen po'i sbyor bas 'og nas 'byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma'i ye shes de nyid haM mo/ /ji ltar rnal 'byor du bya ba ni ra ste rdo rje dang pad+ma'o/ /de yang ye shes kyi byed pa po dang
109a4(rgyud 'grel): phrad pa las byang chub kyi sems gnyis ni a dang bud+d+hi'o/ /de nyid nang gis 'jug pa'i rim pas rtogs par gyur pa ni bud+d+hA nAM ngo/ /dga' ba gsum lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor 'byung ba dang/ lhan cig skyes pa dus gsum du 'byung ba ni trye d+d+hwa
109a5(rgyud 'grel): brti nAM ngo/ /man ngag bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya'o/ /ji ltar nyams su blang ba yang dbyer mi phyed pa'i ye shes blo'i yul ring du gyur pa ni badzra tIk+ShtA 'o/ /de ltar yang sdug bsngal gcod par nus pa yang ma yin te/ dam pa'i zhabs
109a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi pad+ma? la btud pa'i drin gyis/ skad cig la rnyed par gyur pas du(rgyud 'grel): kha ts+tshe da'o/ /de bas kye ho grogs dag lhan cig skyes pa de/ gzhan nas mi rnyed bla ma'i zhal las dris zhes gsungs pas so/ /des gnang bar gyur pa'i rim pa ni pradz+nyA dz+nyA na'o/ /
109a7(rgyud 'grel): mu rte ni rgyun te bzhi pa'o/ /ya ni ya te gnas pa'i don no/ /de nyid gnyug ma'i ye shes rang gi mtshan nyid du byas pa ni dz+nyA na ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje nyid yin par kA ya bAka go/ yang ni ba gI shwa ra
109b1(rgyud 'grel): ni gsung gi dbang phyug gi rgyud pas de nyid shes pas bya ste/ lung dang rang gi rigs pa dang bla ma'i gdams ngag gis shes gzhan du bstan to/ /a la sogs pa'i don ni skye ba med pa'i bde ba chen po'i snying po zhes dang/ mngon par zhen pa dang gral
109b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i stobs kyis dam tshig gi spyod pa dang/ rigs pas thams cad kyang de bzhin bsdu ba dang/ de kho na nyid re re dang bral ba dang/ zhes bya ba'i don la yang mi gnas pa'o/ /'di ltar ni bshad zin pa dang sbyar ro/ /a las 'byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi
109b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud don a'o/ /don chos la sogs pa ni don che bas phan yon che ba 'byung bas na skye ba med pa'i snying rje'i snying po can ni yi ge dam pa a las 'byung ba yin no zhes bya'o/ /mchog ni mchod pa dang brjod bzhi thams cad kyi srog tu gyur pa ste/ khong
