131b6(rgyud 'grel): la gsang sngags dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang/ bslab pa gnyis dang/ bden pa bzhi bstan pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba la sogs rgyas par bshad pa ste/ de yang 'di ni rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das gcig pu kho na lhag pa'i dbye zhes
131b7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /mi shes pa ni gti mug go /dgra'i dregs pa ni bden pa gnyis med la the tshom za ba'o/ /de yang rig pa'i ye shes kyis 'joms pa'o/ /dpal ldan blo dang steg par ldan zhes pa ni/ dpal ni gzhung lugs kyi byin gyis brlabs so/ /
132a1(rgyud 'grel): blo ni sangs rgyas kyi snying po'i sa bon no/ /steg ni lhag pa byang chub kyi sems so/ /de rnams ro gcig tu skyes pa ni ldan pa ste/ de yang bla ma'i brgyud thabs bsten pa dang/ bsod nams las ni yang dag shes/ /zhes gsungs pa'i
132a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro/ /brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba/ /zhes pa ni/ rtogs pa la sems brtan pas 'khor ba sdigs pa'i brda'o/ /lag pa brgya pa kun bskyod cing/ /zhes pa ni/ phyi nang gsang ba'i bye brag gis/ /brtags dang thabs kyi bye brag dang/ /
132a3(rgyud 'grel): yul sna tshogs pa thams cad bde bar bskyod pa'o/ /gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa yang de bzhin te/ rtags la 'byung ba bzhi bde bas non pa dang/ dga' ba bzhi don gyis lhan cig skyes pas gnod pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
132a4(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyi mthe bo gcig gis gdan la reg par gzhes so zhes pa'i don to/ /de nges don du bsgrub pa'i phyir rkang mtheb la sogs pa gsungs te/ srid pa de nyid du byed par yang sbyar ro/ /don gcig ces pa la sogs pa ni 'brel ba ste/ de
132a5(rgyud 'grel): yang don gcig gnyis med ni gnyug ma'o/ /chos kyi don ni dpe'o/ /des cir 'gyur zhe na/ dam pa'i don de zhes pa ni ma bcos pa ste/ 'khor bas 'jigs pa med pa de ni mtshon pa'o/ /nyams su myong ba ni rnam par rig pa nyid las sna
132a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs par snang ba gzugs la sogs pa'i don dang/ gnyis su med pa myong bas na can zhes bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i tshogs ni thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i rjes su 'jug par 'gyur te/ rnam shes sna tshogs rgyud dang ldan zhes pas/
132a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad don dam par byang chub kyi sems su ldan zhes bya'o/ /de bas bla ma mnyes pa las de'i bka' lung gis de lta bu'i rlung dbang po rnams la bkug ste/ rgyun tu 'jug pa dang 'byung ba'i bya ba byed pa'i rnal ma'i yid nyid du 'jog par
132b1(rgyud 'grel): byed do/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /phyis zhen par mi 'gyur ba ni/ dngos don ma lus rnams la dga' zhes bya ste/ nyams su myong ba'i phyir na des na sngon yongs su btang ba'i dbang po de yang yid dang bral bar byed pa med par 'gyur te/ mas bor pa'i be'u nyid rjes su 'tshol
132b2(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhin du 'dir yang dbang po rnams yid kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ gang du yid 'jug pa der rab tu 'jug ste/ /gang gis phyir de ma rtogs par 'di dag rab tu sbyor bar med pa ma yin zhes gsungs pas so/ /zung 'jug tu mi 'gyur ba ma yin pa ni/
132b3(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo zhes bya'o/ /srid par gyur pa ma yin pa ni srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste zhes bya'o/ /log par rtogs pa gsal ba'i phyir srid pa'i 'dod chags ni srid pa'i 'dod chags te/ rgyud thabs bsten pa nyid kyis 'dra bar gyur
132b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ zangs las ra gan du gyur te/ gser ma yin pa bzhin no/ /spangs pa ni spangs pa ste gser rnyed pa'i dus na sngar kyi dra ba la dgos pa med pa'o/ /bde ba dang bral ba ma yin te/ srid pa gsum gyi rang bzhin dga' ba yin la/ de la yang chen po ba zhes
132b5(rgyud 'grel): pas dogs pa med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa nyid de/ dper na nam mkha' la sprin nag po dang ser po la sogs pa gsal ba'i rjes sbrin dkar yang dag pa'i dkar ba bzhin du dkar ba'i bde ba'i stong pa phra mo tsam mi gnas kyang bde bar 'thad de/ 'od bzangs ston ka'i
132b6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i 'od/ /ces pas zla ba dang 'od bzhin dag pa dang bde ba la tha mi dad par 'char ro/ /phyi'i sgro 'dogs chod pa'i dga' ba'i 'char ba ma yin te/ nang rten 'grel gyi dus na nyi ma 'char kha dang shar ba'i dkyil ltar mdzes so/ /des tha dad gyur pa ma yin te/
132b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshon par byed par gcig gis mtshon pa'i phyir ro/ /phyis rang rgyud du 'gyur ba ma yin te/ 'di ni thabs dang shes rab las skyes pa'i bde ba chen po nyid yin pas/ rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs mdza' dag yongs su spangs nas bla na med pa'i longs spyod du nye bar
133a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro zhing/ 'gro ba 'di dag ni bde ba chen po'i rnam par 'gro bar 'gyur te/ dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis phog pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs bzhin du/ 'gro ba rnams snying po med par snang ngo zhes gsungs bas so/ /
133a2(rgyud 'grel): sen mo 'od la sogs pa la phyi nang sbyar bar bya ste/ sngar bshad pa dang 'chad par 'gyur ba thams cad grags pa'i mtshan dpe la sbyar ba dang/ de nyid rnam par dag pa bde ba la sbyar ba'o/ /de ltar na bde ba nyams su myong ba'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir/ nang bu chen
133a3(rgyud 'grel): po 'od chags dpal zhes gsungs te/ nor bu ni rin po che'o/ /chen po ni pad+ma'i bre 'bru'o/ /chags pa ni thig le ste bde ba dang ldan pa'o/ /dpal ni des gzhan gyi don du 'gyur ba'o/ /ji ltar 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas ni shigs
133a4(rgyud 'grel): pa med pa'i haM ngo/ /sprul pa ni byang chub kyi sems so/ /rgyud ni dga' ba bzhi'o/ /mtshan nyid mi mthun pas mtshon par mi nus pa ma yin te/ dang ldan zhes pas snga ma bzhin no/ /'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa/ /zhes pa ni/ phyi nang gi bye brag gis
133a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang/ ye shes mthong ba'i dus na sa g.yos la sogs pa'i rtags 'byung bar bshad pa bzhin no/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan zhes pa ni/ sngar bzhin gyis kun rdzob kyi rdzu 'phrul bstan pa las/ don gyi stobs chen
133a6(rgyud 'grel): po lnga dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang zhes pa ni/ sngar gyi bye brag gis dbang po dman pas mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor bya ba dang/ de las gzhan pas bde ba chen po'i dran pa 'chang ba po/ dran pa bzhi po zhes pa ni sngar gyi bye
133a7(rgyud 'grel): brag gis tshor ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang/ dus kyi ye shes dran pa dang/ chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang/ dus kyi ye shes snang bar dran pa'o/ /sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang/ dus kyi ye shes sdug bsngal du dran pa'o/ /lus dran pa nye bar
133b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhag pa dang/ lus kyi ye shes bden par dran pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rgyal zhes pa ni sngar bzhin gyi bye brag gis seng ge rnam par rtse ba dang/ nam mkha' mdzod dang/ dri ma med pa dang/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa'i
133b2(rgyud 'grel): kha sbyor ba la sogs pa'i yan lag brgyad do/ /byang chub yan lag gi sngar bzhin gyi bye brag gis bdun dang rnam par shes pa'i bdun gyis lus rgyun gyis rtags pa nyid do/ /me tog spos ni dngos dang ma bcos shing rang snang ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
133b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yon tan mtsho zhes pa ni/ sngar bzhin gyi bye brag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la sogs pa'i thams cad dang/ yon tan mche rnyed kyi gnas byang chub kyi sems so/ /lam gyi yan lag brgyad rig pa zhes pa ni/ sngar gyi bye brag gis de nyid dang
133b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lta ba gang gis bdag dang sems can dang/ srog dang/ gsob dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag dang/ shed pu dang/ shed las skyes pa dang/ byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang/ thong ba po'i lta ba kun nas ldang bar mi byed cing/ rtag
133b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ chad pa dang/ skye ba dang 'gag pa dang/ dge ba dang/ mi dge ba kun nas bslang ba dang/ srid pa dang bral ba'i kun nas bslang ba dang/ srid pa dang bral bar bstan pas lta ba kun nas bslang pa dang/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i lta
133b6(rgyud 'grel): ba kun nas ldang bar mi byed pa ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'o/ /kun tu rtog pa gang gis 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi kun nas nyon mongs ba skye ba dang mthun par gang du mi rtog cing tshul khrims dang/ ting 'dzin dang shes rab dang/
133b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par grol ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po skye ba dang mthun par kun tu rtog pa 'di ni yang dag par rtog pa'o/ /dag gang gis bdag dang gzhan gdung bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba dang/ bsnun par
134a1(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur pa dang/ bzhad gang du mi 'gyur zhing/ rigs dang bral bas yang dag pa'i dag la 'jud par byed pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i dag go /las gang las kyang gnag la rnam par smin pa yang gnag pa'i mngon par 'du mi
134a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa dang/ las gang las kyang dkar ba rnam par smin pa yang dkar ba de mngon par 'du byed pa dang/ las gang la dkar ba yang rnam par smin pa gnag pa de mngon par 'du mi byed cing/ las gang la gnag kyang rnam par smin par dkar na nag
134a3(rgyud 'grel): po zad de/ dkar po'i phyogs 'phel bar byed cing/ mngon par 'du byed cing dam pa'i las kyi rjes su 'brang ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mdza' o/ /gang la yang 'phags pa'i rig pa can gyi sbyangs pa'i yon tan cung zad la gnas shing/ tshul
134a4(rgyud 'grel): 'chos dang kha bsags la sogs pas 'tsho ba spangs te/ rang gi spyod pa'i dang tshul rigs pa dang ldan pas skye bo gzhan las rnyed kyang rung ste/ cung zad tsam gyis ma gus shing/ kha na ma tho ba med pa dang/ 'phags pas rjes su gnang ba'i 'tsho ba 'di
134a5(rgyud 'grel): ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o/ /rtsal ba gang gis bsags pa rjes su gnang ba'i 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug la sogs pa bsten par mi byed cing/ yang dag pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gyi bden par zhugs te/ mya ngan las
134a6(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa'i 'dod pa bsten cing rjes su 'gro ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o/ /gang du nye bar gnas na sku mi g.yo zhing 'khyogs pa ma yin par 'gyur ba ste/ 'khor ba'i skyon rnams dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ lam gyi yon tan rjes su dran
134a7(rgyud 'grel): zhing lam gyi mthar thug pa la yang dag pa'i sbyor ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i dran pa'o/ /de nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas sems can thams cad rnam par thar pa mdzad cing/ mya ngan 'das par brtan por gnon pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i ting nge
134b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin te zhes dgongs so/ /de nyid gcig tu byas pa'i ye shes ni/ yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa zhes bya ste/ lhan cig skyes pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi lam mo/ /sems can kun la shas cher chags/ /zhes pa ni sngar bzhin gyi bye brag gis sbyin ba dang/ /?
134b2(rgyud 'grel): snyan par smra ba dang/ don mthun pa dang/ don byed pa'o/ /gnyis pa ni thun mong ma yin pa'i snying rje dang/ de skye bar byed pa'i dbang la sogs pa gsum ston pa'o/ /nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med ces pa ni/ dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje dang/ sems can gyi
134b3(rgyud 'grel): yul ma snang ba'o/ /sems can kun gyi yid la 'jug ces pa ni/ ye shes kyi snying po can du bstan cing/ de gsal bar mdzad pa por yang 'gyur ba'o/ /sems can kun gyi yid ltar 'gyogs/ /zhes pa ni/ sngar bshad pa dang byang chub la myur ba'o/ /
134b4(rgyud 'grel): de'i rgyu mtshan ni sems can kun gyi dbang don shes zhes bya ste/ de nyid kyi phyir/ /don mdzad pa dang/ myur ba dang/ snang ba dang/ sems lhan cig skyes pa shes par myong ba'o/ /log rtegs bzlog pa'i phyir/ sems can kun gyi yid
134b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dreg pa/ /zhes gsungs pa ni/ gdul bya'i dbang po la mi bzad pa'i gzugs su gyur pa dang/ yid rnam par dag nas lhan cig skyes par gyur pa la 'phrog ces bya ste/ gser 'gyur gyi rtsi bzhin no/ /phung po lnga don de nyid shes zhes pa ni/ ji ltar ston pa bstan pa
134b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /rigs lnga dang zag pa med pa'i phung po lngar shes pa dang/ de kho na nyid du dbyer med pa'o/ de'i phyir/ rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba zhes pa ni gnyi ga la'o/ /nges 'byung kun ni theg pa gsum ste/ mdza' la gnas pa ni sa gnyis so/ /gzhan spangs tha ma
134b7(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ des par 'gyur ba kun la mkhas zhes pas so/ /nges 'byung kun gyi lam la gnas zhes pa/ theg pa gsum gyi lam la rim gyis sbyangs pa dang/ gnas shes pas ldan pa ste skye ba'i rim pa bzhin no/ /nges par 'byung ba kun ston pa zhes pa de ni bshad
135a1(rgyud 'grel): zin to/ /yan lag la sogs pa phun sum tshogs bshad par bya ste/ yan lag bcu gnyis ni ma rig pa la sogs pa'o/ /srid rtsa bton pa ni dus kyi gsum pas byin rlabs theb pa dang/ lam gyi gsum pa rten med pa las
135a2(rgyud 'grel): thos pas sa bon gyi bag chags dang/ mngon du rgyu rtsa ba nas bton pa'o/ /phyis de ltar mi 'gyur ba ni/ dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang zhes pas/ skye mched bcu gnyis rang gi ngo bo dag pa ste/ de yang mig ces bya ba steng ba ste/ dbus na rnam shes ji/
135a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar mchis zhes pa la sogs pa la/ de ltar na gzugs ma mchis pas lta ba ma mchis so zhes pas so/ /srid pa rgyur 'gyur ba ma yin te/ bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can zhes pa/ sdug bsngal gyi rgyu ye shes su shes pa dang/ kun 'byung bde
135a4(rgyud 'grel): bar sang ba dang/ 'gog pa rang 'byung ba dang/ lam 'bras bu rang chas su ldan pa'o/ /nyan thos dang mtshungs pa ma yin te/ shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang zhes pas brgyad la zad pa shes pa dang/ mi skye ba shes pas khyab pa'i phyir/ de nyid du
135a5(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'o/ /man ngag gi drin yin pas bstan pa'i phyir/ bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan zhes pa ste/ bden pa bzhi'i tshul gsum dga' ba bzhir rab tu ldan pas so/ /de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig ces pa ni/ 'di dang ldan pa'i phyag
135a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya las rig par 'gyur ba 'am/ dga' ba nyid bye drag gis don gyis bcu drug tu 'gyur ba 'am/ dga' ba nyid bcu drug 'gyur du bshad de/ de yang/ ye shes sems dpa' 'dzin pa'i bdag /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /zhes
135a7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i don gyis so/ /rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa zhes pa na/ sngar bzhin bye brag gis ji ltar sa gser zla ba me la sogs pa dang/ de nyid rnam par dag pa'i rigs lnga dang/ sangs rgyas lnga dang/ sku lnga dang/ ye shes lnga dang dbyer mi
135b1(rgyud 'grel): phyed par gyur pas/ phung po lnga dang/ 'byung ba lnga dang/ 'dod yon lnga dang/ dug lnga rang bzhin gyis zhi bar gyur pa la bya ste/ de yang sa dang bcas pa dang/ sa phyogs par shes par bya'o/ /de'i phyir rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes rig bste/
135b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog ces gsungs pa ni rang gi don te/ sangs rgyas dang chos la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi don to/ /da ni skad la sogs pa gzhan gyi don bstan par bya ste/ skad cig ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /thams cad ni thams cad kyi rang bzhin no/ /mngon par rtags
135b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni the tshom med pa'o/ /de yang ye shes tha dad pa ma yin pa ni sems kyi zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa ste/ rang gi rang bzhin du bstan pa ni kyi zhes bya/ de skad cig gi dus dmigs pa dang/ dga' ba sna tshogs nyid du brjod/ /mchog dga' rnam par smin pa
135b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /dga' bral rnam pa med pa ste/ /lhan cig dga' ba mtshan nyid bral zhes gsungs pas so/ /don kun rig ces pa ni/ gzhan mi dmigs par bstan pa'o/ /'gro ba la gdod ma nas bstar par rigs pa ma yin te/ theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis/ /
135b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba 'don par mdzad pa yin gyis/ /don la rtog pa bskyed pa'i phyir te bshad zin to/ /gong ma la 'jug par mi 'gyur ba ste/ smon lam gyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad la/ des go rim ston pa'i phyir theg zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/ /
135b6(rgyud 'grel): theg pa bzhi po yod par ni ma yin te/ gcig nyid khyad par du byas pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa la sogs pa bag chags kyi sa bon mi gnas par ston te/ nyon mongs pa ni lnga'o/ /khams rnams shes pa ni bco brgyad do/ /dag pa'i bdag ces pa
135b7(rgyud 'grel): ni rang bzhin gyis lus su gyur pa'o/ /las kyi khams rnams zhes pa ni gsum ste zad par byed pa'o/ /chu'i rgya mtsho ni 'dod pa dang/ srid pa dang/ lta ba dang/ ma rig pa'o/ /brgal ba ni thar pa'o/ /de yang sbyor ba ni nang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sbyo
136a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ sems dben pa thob pa'i dgon pa las 'bras bu 'byung bas na/ theg pa'i bye brag bla na med pa la dgos pa yod do/ /bag chags dang rjes su mthun par sa bon bral ba ni ma rig pa dang/ sred pa ??
136a2(rgyud 'grel): len pa la nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o/ /srid pa dang/ 'du byed la nye ba'i nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa dang/ ming dang gzugs dang/ skye mched drug dang/ reg pa dang/ chor pa dang/ skye ba dang/ rga shi ni kun nas nyon mongs bzhes
136a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ gtan spangs pa ni dug sngags kyis btul ba 'gyur ba bzhin no/ /bde ba chen po'i thabs kho nar gyur pa ma yin te/ snying rje chen po shes rab thabs zhes pas zung du 'jug pa'o/ /des ji ltar 'gyur ba ni don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa zhes so/
136a4(rgyud 'grel): de yang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i don dang/ 'du shes med pa snyoms par 'jug pa'i don dang/ gzugs kyi khams kyi don dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyi don spong pas na 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing zhes pa ni bcom ldan
136a5(rgyud 'grel): 'das so/ /rnam shes ni rnam shes mdza' yas la sogs pa ste/ gzugs med pa'i skye gnas kyi don ni 'gog par byed pa'o/ /gang gis don byed pa bstan pa'i phyir sems can kun gyi yul dang ldan zhes gsungs te/ yid dang mthun par ro/ /
136a6(rgyud 'grel): des ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs sems can gyi rig par nus so/ /dpe nye bar grub pa ma yin te/ sems can kun gyi yid la gdod ma nas sangs rgyas kyi thugs gnas pas sems can de dag gi sems dag dang/ sangs rgyas
136a7(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi thugs kyi rang bzhin gtsig pas mthun par 'jug pa'o/ /gzhan gyi don gyis 'gyur ba ma yin te/ sems can gyi yid tshim par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na sems can kun gyi yid tshim par byed pa ste/ rnam rtag zad par byed pa'o/ /
136b1(rgyud 'grel): de tsam du ma zad kyi sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba zhes pas lhan cig skyes pa thob pa'o/ /gtan la phab pa'i yid med pas grub pa'i mthar phyin 'khrul pa med pa'o/ /nor pa thams cad rnam par spangs zhes pas/ don ji lta ba la blo ji lta ba bzhin zhu
136b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /don gsum ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba gsum du'o/ /the tsom med pa'i blo zhes pa ni rgyun gcig par ro/ /kun don ni g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba kun gyis don mdzad pa'o/ /de'i thad pa ni/ yon tan gsum gyi bdag cas bya ste
136b3(rgyud 'grel): rdul mun pa snying stobs gsum yang 'gro ba'i don du bstan pa'o/ /nyan thos la phung po dang don gsum du bdag med par ston pa'o/ /theg pa chen po la skad cig thams cad bye brag phyed ces pa ste/ rgyu'i dus su dge ba'i chos tshol ba dang thos pa dang
136b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa dang bsgom pa thams cad shes rab kyis so sor rig pas so/ /skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes pa 'bras bu'i dus na zang pa'i ye shes dang/ mi skye ba'i ye shes thob par ston to/ /rgyu 'bras rjes su mthun te/ lhan cig skyes
136b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rkyen ni du ma yin la/ nye bar len pa'i rgyu ni gcig kho nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chad/ zhes pas rgyu 'bras rjes su mthun pas thams cad gcig pa nyid do/ /lus mi 'byung ba ma yin te/ lus med ces pas rnam par smin pa'i lus med ces pa ni
136b6(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi sku can no/ /lus kyi mchog ces pas ye shes kyi phung po can du snang ba'o/ /du ma dang sna tshogs 'byung ba ni lus mdza' rtog pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na gzugs la sogs pa'o/ /ji ltar 'gyur ba na nor bu rin chen ltar ro/ /dga' ba ma yin te/ rin chen
136b7(rgyud 'grel): tog ces pas khams gsum gyi rgyal mtshan ni/ de dag gis mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la bstod pa'o// //da ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa bsdus te bstan pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rtags pa dang mkhyen pa dang/ mngon du mdzad pa ni
137a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub gsum dang/ bla na med pa'i bde ba chen po ste/ bya ba nan tan de bzhin du 'dir sangs rgyas dang sems can rgyud gcig tu rtags par bya ba dang/ thams cad sems kyi khyad par du shes par bya ba dang/ 'bad pa med pa rang
137a2(rgyud 'grel): gi ngag gis 'byung ba la mngon du byung ba ni bla na med pa ste/ bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so/ /de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ gsang sngags 'chang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ de yang ye shes nyid dang/ de'i rnam 'phrul dang/ ma rig pa'i rlung dang/
137a3(rgyud 'grel): rlung bcu dang/ dag dang/ yi ge dang/ ming dang/ tshogs rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gsang sngags 'byung bas skye gnas so/ /yi ge med ces pa ni de nyid gdod ma'i gnas su thim pas spros pa las 'das pa'o/ /de nyid mtshon par byed pa ni yi ge ste/ oM
137a4(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): hUM do/ /de la gsang sngags chen po zhes gsungs te/ sku gsung thugs kyi rigs yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de las rigs lnga dang/ drug tu 'gyur zhing gsang sngags kyi don mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub kun skyed pa por byed pa ni bya ba nan tan no/ /
137a5(rgyud 'grel): de yang thabs dang shes rab kyi rigs gnyis su bsdu ba'i phyir/ thig le chen po zhes bya ste/ e baM de yang bde ba chen po'i rigs gcig tu bya ba'i yi ge med ces bya'o/ /de nyid yi ge sna tshogs su snang bas stobs po che zhes bya'o/ /dbyangs yig bcu
137a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis so/ /yi ge lnga ste/ oM hUM traM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): a'o/ /thig le rang gi sa bon te/ mu sems kyi ngo bo'i stong pa ni rig par 'dzin pa med par ro/ /yi ge brgya zhes pa ni phyogs gcig mtshon pa tsam du zad kyi/ ri rab kyi rdul phra rab snyed du yang 'gyur la/
137a7(rgyud 'grel): yon tan yang de snyed du 'gyur ba ste/ don sngar bshad pa'i yi ge drug gi rang bzhin du bsdu bar bya'o/ /rnam pa kun ldan ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /rnam pa med pa de nyid gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par ro/ /bcu drug gi dbyangs yig go/ phyed ni grong
137b1(rgyud 'grel): khyed dkrug pa'o/ /gnyis pa ni gleng gzhi'o/ /thig le ni rdo rje dang mi bskyod pa'o/ /'chang ba ni dbugs dbyung ba'o/ /yan lag med pa ni phyi rol gyi rdzob dgag pa'o/ /rtsis ni btags pa'o/ /de las 'das pa ni bde ba chen po'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi ni dga' 
137b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ bde ba dang/ sems rtse gcig pa dang/ dran pa ste dga' la sogs pa nyid da/ /rtse mo can ni ro gcig pa nyid do/ /'jig rten bar 'gyur ba yin te/ bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing/ /zhes pas rtog pa dang/ /dpyod pa dang/ dga' ba dang
137b3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba ni dang ba'o/ /rtag pa dang bcas dpyod pa med pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba ni gnyis pa'o/ /dga' ba med pa'i btang snyoms dang/ dran pa yang dag par brjod pa ni gsum pa'o/ /sdug bsngal dang/ bde ba med pa btang snyoms kyi dran pa yongs su dag pa ni
137b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'o/ /mkhyen pas don yod pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs du ma dang/ gang zag gi rgyud du ma rigs rtse gcig bsgom pa'i rigs kyi dbye bas nyan thos la sogs pa'i bzung ba'i mchog la dbugs dbyung gnyis lhag par ston te/ ting 'dzin lus can ni
137b5(rgyud 'grel): gang zag go /lus kyi mchog ni chos sku'o/ /de nyid ni 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ste/ longs spyod rdzogs pa la sogs par snang ngo/ /thun mong 'phrul ba ni de bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa zhes pa ste/ lha'i dbang po ni khyab 'jug go/ lha'i lha ni
137b6(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'o/ /lha'i bdag po ni brgya byin no/ /lha min bdag ni rA hu la'o/ /'chi med dbang po ni nye dbang ngo/ /lha'i bla ma ni phur bu'o/ /'joms byed ni thag bzangs ris so/ /gnyis pa ni srin po'i bdag po'o/ /dbang phyug ni mahA de ba ste/ bcom ldan
137b7(rgyud 'grel): 'das la sogs pa'i rang rang gi rgyal por bstod pa'o/ /de bas sems can thams cad sred pa'i dgon pa las rgal bar mdzad pa ni ston pa gcig pu ste/ de bas na 'gro ba'i bla mar gyur pa'o/ /de ltar gyur par bstan pa'i phyir 'jig rten la sogs pa'o/ /
138a1(rgyud 'grel): dgos pa ji lta bu mnga' ba bstan pa'i phyir byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste zhes pa ni phyogs med pa'o/ /snying rje yi ni ya lang bgos zhes pa ni sdug bsngal dang bral bar byed pa ste bsrung ba'o/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs
138a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni rtags dang don te shes rab dang rigs pas nang dang phyi'i sgro 'dogs mi mnga' ba dang kha sbyor snyoms 'jug pa'o/ mi shes pa ni gti mug go/ g.yul do ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i dus so/ /sel ba ni dge bar mdzad pa'o/ /dpa' bo
138a3(rgyud 'grel): ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /bdud ni bzhi'o/ /dgra ni log par 'dren pa'o/ /bdud 'dul ba ni btul ba ste rdo rje gdan la'o/ /de'i mthu ni bdud bzhi la sogs pa'o/ /mchod pa'i 'os su bstan pa'i phyir/ de bas na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten
138a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dren zhes bya ste/ khyod nyid thams cad du 'khrul zhing rim gyis dbang po'i bye brag dang mthun par bstan pa khyod nyid/ nyid du ma gyur pa dang/ mi 'gyur pa med ces bya ba'i don ton to/ /de bas na 'di dag la gnyis sbyar te/ rtags ni gzhung ltar ro
138a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan pa yang mchod 'os ni thos pa dang dran pa mthar phyin pa'o/ /bstod 'os ni rang bzhin gcig tu rtogs pa'o/ /phyag gi gnas ni thams cad kyi skye gnas su gyur pas so/ /rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os ni theg pa gsum gyi rang rang gi lam rgyud la
138a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs pa'o/ /bkur 'os ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ste/ lam dngos bstan pa'o/ /brjod par bya ba'i mchog ni theg pa chen po pa rnams kyi ste rang bzhin gyi don phun sum tshogs pa snang bas so/ /phyag bya ba'i 'os ni sngags sbyod pa
138a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi ste/ rang rig ston pas so/ /bla ma'i rab ni dbang thob pa rnams kyi ste/ de kho na nyid mthong ba dang/ chos thams cad byin gyis brlabs pas so/ /bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes thugs su chud pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten la sogs pa'o/ /
138b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum rig ni dus mkhyen pa dang/ mchod pa mkhyen pa dang mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid mkhyen pa yin la/ gtsang ma dag pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni mi slu zhing rig pa la the tsom mi mnga' ba'o/ /mngon shes drug ldan ni lha'i mig la sogs pa'o/ /rjes dran drug ni sangs rgyas?
138b2(rgyud 'grel): dang chos dang dge 'dun dang yi dam dang dam tshig dran pa mnga' ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni theg pa gzhan gyi yab tu 'gyur pa'o/ /sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa chen po'i yang yab tu 'gyur pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'o/ /'jig
138b3(rgyud 'grel): rten 'das pa la sogs pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'o/ /mjug bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir/ gtso bo chos kyi sbyin bdag ste zhes bya ba'i don ni 'der phyag rgya bzhi'i don ston pa zhes bya ba'i don te/ rigs phyag rgya bzhi ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o/ /rtags phyag rgya bzhi
138b4(rgyud 'grel): ni byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus su'o/ /don phyag rgya bzhi ni lam gyi dus su'o/ /nyes mchis gyur pa la sogs bzod pa mjod/ /shes rab yul ni mdza' dang bral/ /zab mo'i don ni gzhal dka' bas/ /gzhal bya brngal byed kyis stong pa'i/ /'gro kun snying po len
138b5(rgyud 'grel): par shog /sngags pa rnal 'byor la mi mkhas/ /phal cher bag med lam 'gro la/ /snying po mngon rtogs 'di brjod pas/ /thams cad rnal 'byor la 'jug cing/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /don ni ngo bor 'gyur bar shog/ 'phags pa'i 'jam dpal
138b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi mtshan yang dag par rjod pa'i 'grel pa snying po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po dpal gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa chen po pradz+nyA sh+rIdz+nyA na kI rtis rang 'gyur du byas pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/
138b7(rgyud 'grel): Arya dz+nyA na satwa many+dzu sh+rI no pi/ kA? nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po ni/ /ku gsung thugs kyi
139a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /rgyal ba kun gyi yab gyur te/ /'khor lo sgyur bcas pa thams cad kyis/ /rang gi rigs la bstod byas te/ /bskyed pa'i rim las rdzogs 'byung ba'i/ /brjod dang nges brjod bshad
139a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /thog mar bsam gtan pas dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i sa phyogs su cung zhig blo bde bar gnas te sems bskyod par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying gar sa bon gyi yi ge gzi brjid dang ldan pas 'gro ba ma lus pa sbyangs shing dag par yid kyis bltas
139a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ dbyangs kyi yi ge'i stod la rjes su bya ba nyid kyis gzhug cing rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' 'gro ba'i bla ma dang ldan pa spyan drangs te/ 'dud nyi shus bstod par bya'o/ /de nas sngags kyi phreng ba lan bdun du grangs
139a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ me tog gi mchod pas sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba mi bzad pa gnang bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems mi g.yo bar bya'o/ /de nas yang A lis sbyangs te/ 'od zer rnon po can dang ldan pa'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bya'o/ /de'i dkyil du sna
139a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa'i pad+ma shes rab dang thabs yang dag par 'dus pa'i blo gros chen po ye shes kyi mtshan pa'i sa bon las sngar gyi bde bar gshegs pa bla ma dang ldan pa'i tshogs ji snyed pa bcug ste/ de dag las skyes pa'i 'jam dpal ye shes sems
139a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ni zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa/ rdo rje skyil mo krung las cung zhig 'gying pa/ dkar ba dang sngo zhing dmar ba dang/ dmar zhing dkar ba'i mdog can nyi ma dang/ zla ba dang/ utpal blo gros chen pos mtshan pa dang/ zla ba dang/ gzhu dang/ utpal rtsa ba dang
139a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa ye shes chen pos mtshan pa'i phyag rgya can/ khro ba dang zhi ba mnyam pa'i nyams mnga' ba/ rin po che'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas spras pa/ zla ba rgyas pa lta bu bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyis 'jam dpal ye shes
139b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' 'am/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo chen po spyan drangs te/ yang bstod nas rab tu gnas pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ byin gyis brlab pa ni de nyid las yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de nas yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang ba thob nas/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i
139b2(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa bya'o/ /de dag ni brjod pa'o/ /yang skad cig gis 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpar dmigs te/ rang gi sa bon las spyan drangs nas/ a dang re ba las gyur pa'i shes rab dang thabs 'dus byas pa'i dbus su yi ge mu dmar ser gyis 'gro ba spungs nas/ gcig tu
139b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' i khams su bzhugs su gsol te/ stegs bu dri zhim pa rin po che 'am/ me tog bcal bkram pa'i steng du glegs bam gzhag la/ sardza rardza la sogs pa btul te/ lkog ma sbyang ba byas nas/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bklag par bya'o/ /
139b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas yan lag bdun pa byas la/ yang sngar bzhin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba rin po che thob nas/ lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma gnas par bya'o/ /'di dag gi rnal 'byor ni zhal gsum dkar zhing zhi ba dang/ phyag bzhi pa nyi ma dang zla ba yangs pa'o/ /
139b5(rgyud 'grel): yid la mi byed pa'i rnal 'byor glegs bam gyi go 'phang dang ldan pa rnams ni brag cha lta bu'i kha ton bya ste/ nges par brjod pa'o/ /bdag gis mngon par rtogs pa 'dis/ /blun po rnams ni blo 'phel zhing/ /blo gros can rnams bad rnyed nas/ /ye shes sems dpa' i gnas
139b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur shog /rin chen rgyud rgyal 'di ni sa phyogs gang na gnas pa dang/ /'don cing glog par byed pa'i skyes bu de nyid ni/ /yid bzhin nor bu brgya byin gtsug na gnas pa bzhin/ /bdud rnams zil gnon 'jigs pa thams cad bde bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa
139b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/ rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA sh+rI dz+nyA na kI rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ dz+nyA satwa many+dzu sh+rI na bi ma ba
140a1(rgyud 'grel): ratna mu dra bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i rin po che'i phyag rgya dri ma med pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag blo yang ldan chog
140a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa dang/ /dri ldan mnyes gshin byang chub sems dpa' des/ /rtsod dus rkyen dbang shes rab nyams chung la/ /rgyud kyi rin chen phyag rgya btud de bshad/ /snying rje chen dang chen por ldan/ /brtse bas don byed skyo ba med/ /spobs pa che zhing pan blo ldan/ /ngang
140a3(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzang zhing skyo bar bzong/ /shes rab che zhing nus pa yong/ /rtsod rang tshig gi sbyor ba bsdeb mkhas/ /dpa' zhing brtul phod brtson 'grus che/ /bkas sgo ba la drid mi 'jog /dad dang shes rab gtso bor gnas/ /bla ma'i brgyud thabs srog bzhin bsrung?/ /yid
140a4(rgyud 'grel): la mi byed don bstan na/ /pad+ma'i mdangs 'phro gnas la ldog /dam tshig gsum ni mig bzhin du/ /srung byed rin chen phyag rgya'i snod/ /de la 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis yid la sos par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu des ni grub
140a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshogs chung dus bdag gis byed par 'gyur ro/ /de yang bsam gtan gyi khang par yid du 'ong ba'i ras ris kyi mdun du glegs bam rab tu gnas par byas te gzhag la/ de dang nye bar tsan dan dkar pos byugs pa'i maN+Dal khru gang pa gru bzhi pa'i
140a6(rgyud 'grel): steng du me tog gi tshem bus mchod la/ tsan dan gyi bdar bu dang/ me tog dkar po snyim pa gang thogs te/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes sems dpa' chen po mchog nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan
140a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'khor lo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs thams cad dang yang dag pa'i don gyi rnal 'byor du mdzad du gsol/ zhes lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu brjod la/ me tog dkar po'i phreng ba mgo la bcings te/ tsandan sen
140b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsi dang/ til mar la bdar ba'i chu mig la byugs la/ rmi lam brtag pa'i? ltas kyang shes par bya'o/ /de nas tho rang ci rigs pa'i rnal 'byor du gnas te/ slob ma rtags dang rmi lam gyis shes pa'i yo byad kyis sbras nas/ nye ba dang lha'i maN+Dal dang/ sems bskyed pa
140b2(rgyud 'grel): che? po che yi phyag rgya'i yon phul te/ tshul dang mthun pa'i gnas la/ oM kye kye kye ye shes sems dang zhi ba rab mdzes sku/ /khyod thugs bskyed pa 'gro la sman pa'i gtso/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgyas gti mug dral mdzad cing/ /me long lta bu'i mtshan bstong thugs
140b3(rgyud 'grel): chung ltar/ /sems bskyed la mos bde gshegs rigs 'gyur dag/ 'gro ba rnams kyi sku yis gdul bya'o phyir/ /bde gshegs rigs kyi sems bskyed gzung bar bgyi/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bdag byin brlab? tu gsol/ /zhes lan gsum dang gsum gsuM
140b4(rgyud 'grel): ?? rjod pa ni dbang po dang shes pa'i bye brag gis shes par bya'o/ /phyag rgya'i bye brag ni man ngag gis so/ /de nas tshes gcig nas nye bar bzung ste/ rnal 'byor bas rang gi spyod pa bcu la zhugs nas/ lha'i bsgrub pa ldan pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod
140b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bsnyen pa ji srid spro yi bar bya'o/ /thun tshams dang blo bur gyi las ni mkhas pa dag gis ci rigs par sbyar ro/ /paN+Di ta dang/ rgyal po dang/ blon po chen po dang/ dmag dpon dang/ bram ze sgo ba dang/ grong du 'jug pa dang/ don gnyer ba la
140b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i tshogs na gnas pa rnams kyis ni dran pa gcig pa'i byin gyis brlab ba tsam la ci rigs pas bstod de/ bdag dang 'gro ba gsbrang tsam bya'o/ /tshel sogs pa'i sbyor ba 'phel ba dang/ 'dir gsungs yon tan rnams ni 'grub par 'gyur/
140b7(rgyud 'grel): lha dang mi yi mchog 'gyur gtso bo bzhin/ lo ka dag las lhag pa'i gnas su 'gro/ /mun nag 'thug po dkris pa rnams/ /zad 'gyur dri ma med pa'i 'od zer srung?/ /pad+ma'i rtsa bar rtsi yis mchog gnas gang/ /g+ha tra shing gi 'dab mas len bzhin du/
141a1(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa'i grangs la rag las mi 'gyur bar/ /mi yi tshe 'di nyid kyis 'dod bzhin thob/ /yang dag mtshan 'di'i sgo la dad pa gang/ /de yi mtshams med lnga yang skad cig des/ /dag na 'don dang blo ga pa smes ce dgos/ /ri khrod
141a2(rgyud 'grel): mgon po las thob pa'o/ /rgyud kyi rin chen phyag rgya 'di/ /sgyu 'phrul dra pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /skye pa'i rim 'byung byams pas byas/ /rigs gang rigs kyi lha las ni/ /dngos grub thogs med thob gyur cig /nam mkhas gar khyab lo ka 'gro ba rnams/ /
141a3(rgyud 'grel): ma rig phyag rgyas rab tu bcings gyur pa/ /blo gros chen po'i phyag rgyas gcad nas kyang/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i zhabs grub shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' rin po che'i phyag rgya dri ma med pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ /
141a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA sh+rI dz+nyA na kI rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i mngon rtogs dang/ 'jam dpal ye shes
141a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' i rin po che'i phyag rgya dri ma med pa'i cho ga gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa bzhugs// //rgya gar skad du/ A rya dz+nyA na satwa many+dzu sh+rI ni pa ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/
141a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal le/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /rgyal ba kun gyi yab gyur te/ /'khor los sgyur bcas thams cad kyis/ /
141a7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi ris la bstong byas te/ /bskyed pa'i rim pas rdzogs 'gyur pa'i/ /brjod dang nges brjod bshad par bya// //thog mar bsam gtan pas dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i sa phyogs su cung zhig blo bde bar gnas te sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas
141b1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi snying gar sa bon gyi ye ge gzi brjid dang ldan pas 'gro ba ma lus pa sbyangs shing dag par yid kyis bltas te/ dbyangs kyi yi ges bstod la rjes su bya ba gnyis kyis gzhug cing rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems
141b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' 'gro ba'i bla ma dang ldan pa spyan drangs te/ 'dung nyi shus bstod par bya'o/ /de nas sngags kyi phreng ba lan bdun du blangs te me tog gi mchod pas sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba mi zad pa gnang bas byin gyis brlab
141b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems mi g.yo bar bya'o/ /de nas yang A lis sbyangs te/ 'od zer rnon po can dang ldan pa'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bya'o/ /de'i dkyil du sna tshogs pa'i pad+ma shes rab dang thabs yang dag par 'dus pa'i blo gros chen po ye shes kyis mtshan pa'i sa
141b4(rgyud 'grel): bon las sngar gyi bde bar gshegs pa bla ma dang ldan pa'i tshogs ji snyed pa bcug ste/ de dag las skyes pa'i 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ni zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa rdo rje skyil mo krung la cung zhig 'gying ba/ dkar ba dang sngo zhing dmar ba dang/
141b5(rgyud 'grel): dmar zhing dkar ba'i mdog can/ nyi ma dang/ mda' dang/ u ta pa la blo gros chen pos mtshan pa dang/ zla ba dang/ gzhu dang/ gzhu dang/ u tpa la rtsa ba dang ldan pa ye shes chen pos mtshan pa'i phyag rgya can/ /khro ba dan gzhi ba mnyam pa'i nyams mda' ba/ rin
141b6(rgyud 'grel): po che'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas spras pa/ zla ba rgyas pa lta bu bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyis 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo chen po spyan drangs te/ yang bstong nas/ rab tu gnas pa dang/
141b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba dang/ byin gyis brlab pa ni de nyid las yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de nas yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snang ba thob nas/ mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bstod pa bya'o/ /de dag ni brjod pa'o/ /yang skad cig gis 'jam dpal? ye
142a1(rgyud 'grel): shes sems dbang dmigs te/ rang gi sa bon las spyan drangs nas/ a dang re ba las gyur pa'i shes rab dang thabs 'dus byas pa'i dbus su yi ge muM dmar ser gyi 'gro ba sbyangs nas/ gcig tu gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam
142a2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' i khams su bzhugs su gsol te/ stegs bu dri zhim pa rin po che 'am/ me tog gcal bkram pa'i steng du glegs bam bzhag la/ sardza ra rdza la sogs bkul te/ lkog ma sbyang ba byas nas/ mchan yang dag par brjod pa bklag par bya'o/ /de nas
142a3(rgyud 'grel): yan lag bdun pa byas la/ yang sngar bzhin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba rin po che thob nas/ lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas par bya'o/ /'di dag gi rnal 'byor ni zhal gsum dkar zhing zhi ba dang/ phyag bzhi pa nyi ma dang zla ba yangs
142a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /yid la mi byed pa'i rnal 'byor glegs bam gyi go 'phangs dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni brag cha lta bu'i kha don byas te/ nges par brjod par bya'o// //bdag gis mngon par rtogs pa 'dis/ /blun po rnams ni blo 'phel zhing/ /blo gros
142a5(rgyud 'grel): can rnams bde rnyed nas/ /ye shes sems dpa' i gnas 'gyur shog /rin chen rgyud rgyal 'di ni sa phyogs gang na gnas pa dang/ 'don cing klog par byed pa'i skye bu de nyid ni/ /yid bzhin nor bu brgya byin gtsug na gnas pa bzhin/ /bdud rnams zil gnon
142a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten thams cad bde bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa/ rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA sh+ri dz+nyA na kI rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //
142a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ dz+nyA na sa tra many+dzu sh+rI na ba la ratna mu tra bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i rin po che'i phyag rgya dri ma med pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag blo yang
142b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan cho ga rdzogs pa dang/ /drin ldan mnyes gshin byang chub sems dpa' nges/ /rtsod dus rkyen dbang shes rab nyam chung la/ /rgyud kyi rin chen phyag rgya btung de bshad/ /snying rje che dang chen por ldan/ /brtse bas don byed skye ba med/ /spobs pa che zhing phan blor? ldan
142b2(rgyud 'grel): dang tshul bzang zhing skyo bar bzod/ /shes rab che zhing nus pa yod/ /rtsod dang tshig gi sbyor bsdebs mkhas/ /dpa' zhing rtul phod brtson 'grus che/ /bkas bsgo ba la drin mi 'jog /dad dang shes rab gtso bor gnas/ /bla ma'i rgyud thabs srog bzhin bsrung/ /ying
142b3(rgyud 'grel): la mi byed don bstan na/ /pad+ma'i mdangs 'phro gnas la ldog/ /dam tshig gsum ni mig bzhin du/ /bsrung byed rin chen phyag rgya'i snod/ /de la 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis yid la sos par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu des ni grub
142b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshegs chung dus bdag gir byed par 'gyur ro/ /de yang bsam gtan gyi khang par yid du 'ong ba'i ras bris kyi mdun du glegs bam rab tu gnas pa byas te bdag la/ de dang nye bar tsandan dkar pos byugs pa'i maN+Dal khru gad pa gru bzhi pa'i steng du me tog
142b5(rgyud 'grel): gi tshom bus mchod la/ tsandan gyi bdar bu dang/ me tog dkar po snyim pa gang thogs te/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes sems dpa' chen mchog nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan gyi 'khro lo thams cad la
142b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i tshogs thams cad dang yang dag pa'i don gyi rnal 'byor du mdzad du gsol zhes lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu brjod la/ me tog dkar po'i 'phreng ba mgo la bcings te/ tsandan sen rtsi dang/ til mar la bdar ba'i
142b7(rgyud 'grel): chu mig la byugs la rmi lam brtag pa'i ltas kyang shes bar bya'o/ /de nas tho rangs ci rigs pa'i rnal 'byor du gnas te/ slob ma rtag pa dang rmi lam gyis shes pa'i yo byad kyis spras nas/ nye ba dang lha'i maN+Dal dang/ sems bskyed pa'i rin po che'i phyag rgya'i yon phul te/
143a1(rgyud 'grel): tshul dang mthun pa'i gnas la/ oM kye kye kye ye shes sems dang zhi ba rab mdzes sku/ /khyod thugs bskyed pa 'gro la sman pa'i gtso/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgyas gti mug bral mdzad cing/ /me long lta bu'i mtshan bstod thugs chung ltar/ /
143a2(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed la mos bde gshegs rigs 'gyur dag /'gro ba rnams kyi sku yis gdul bya'i phyir/ /bde gshegs rigs kyi sems bskyed gzung bar bgyi/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bdag byin brlab tu gsol/ /zhes lan gsum dang gsum du
143a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa ni dbang po dang shes pa'i bye brag gis shes par bya'o/ /phyag rgya'i bye brag ni man ngag gis so/ /de nas tshes gcig nas nye bar bzung ste/ rnal 'byor pas nang gi spyod pa bcu la zhugs nas/ lha'i bsgrub pa'i bstan pa'i mtshan yang dag par
143a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'i gnyen po ji srid spro'i bar du bya'o/ /thun mtshams dang glo bur gyi las ni mkhas pa dag gis ci rigs par sbyar ro/ /paN+Di ta dang/ rgyal po dang/ blon po chen po dang/ dmag dpon dang/ bram ze sgo ba dang/ grong du 'jug pa dang/ don gnyer ba la sogs pa'i
143a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs na gnas pa rnams kyis ni dran pa gcig pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa tsam la ci rigs pas bstod de/ bdag dang 'gro ba sbyang tsam bya'o/ /tshe la sogs pa'i sbyor ba 'phel ba dang/ /'dir gsungs yon tan rnams ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /lha dang mi
143a6(rgyud 'grel): yi mchog 'gyur gtso bo bzhin/ /lo ka dag las lhag pa'i gnas su 'gro/ /mun nag mthug pos dkris pa rnams/ /brang 'gyur dri ma med pa'i 'od zer spung/ /pad+ma'i rtsa bar rtsi'i mchog gnas gang/ /g+ha Ta shing gi 'dab mas len bzhin du/ /
143a7(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa'i grangs la rag las mi 'gyur bar/ /mi yi tshe 'di nyid kyis 'dod bzhin thob/ /yang dag mtshan 'di'i sgo la dang pa gang/ /de'i mtshams med lnga yang skad cig de/ /dag na 'don dang klog pa smos ci dgos/ /ri khrod mgon po las thob pa'i/ /
143b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyi rin chen phyag rgya 'di/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ /skye ba'i rim 'byung byams bas byas/ /rigs gang rigs kyi lha las ni/ /dngos grub thogs med thob gyur cig /nam mkhas gar khyab lo ka 'gro ba rnams/ /ma rig phyag rgyas rab tu bcings gyur bar?
143b2(rgyud 'grel): blo gros chen po'i phyag rgyas bcad nas kyang/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i zhabs grub shog /'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i rin po che'i phyag rgya dri ma med pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa bsong snyoms pa pradz+nyA sh+rI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ man+t+ra tsa rya da sha ka swa b+hA ba d+ha sa nA ma/ bod skad du/ rang bzhin du gnas pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa bcu
143b3(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma dang ni lhag pa'i lha/ /tha dad med par mchod par bya/ 'gro ba rnams dang rang nyid la/ /bdag gzhan mi 'byed dus gsum gter/ /lus dang longs spyod srog
143b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis/ /'gro ba'i mchog gtso brtsal bas rnyed/ /de yis dbang bskur rin po che/ /dus gsum du ni dran par byed/ /phyi dang nang gi chos spyod kun/ /gnyen po bsten pas ma yin zhing/ /dad pa'i stan las gang 'ongs pa/ /kha zas bzhin du bsten
143b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /lha'i rnal 'byor 'byor pa can/ /yang na rigs gzung mchog gtso bor/ /byas pa'i gang yin de dag ni/ /thun bzhir bstan pas bsgom par bya/ /gal te rdzogs pa'i skal yong na/ /ye shes sku ste rang 'byung ba/ /'jam dpal ye shes
143b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' yi/ /ming ni ya bdag brjod pa'i mchog /bzlas brjod don dang klog pa dang/ /bya ba'i rim pa la mos na/ /rigs gzhan du ma ma yin pa'i/ /rang gi rigs la bslab par bya/ /gang zag 'o mar ldan pa dang/ /de bzhin bza' dang 'thung ba'i dus nas?
144a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams ni bsdus byas la/ /bdud rtsi myang ba bsgrub par bya/ /glu dang gang ni ji snyed dang/ /de bzhin yul la ro snyoms na/ /yul gyis bslang ba ma yin zhing/ /rang gi nyams kyis rol par bya/ /dben pa'i gnas la brten dus
144a2(rgyud 'grel): gtsang sbra ngo tsha spyod pas min/ /dogs pa kun las grol ba'i sems/ /bsnyung dang dka' thub gnas mi bya/ /skyo dub sdug bsngal ci byung yang/ /dam pa'i dran gyis gzengs bstod de/ /yid chang skyid lugs mi 'gyur bar/ /sems dge ba la gnas par
144a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas pa'i/ /sngags pa mkha' spyod gnas su 'gro/ sngags la zhugs nas spyod pa spong/ /mkha' 'gro skrag cing mnar med 'gro/ /rang bzhin du gnas pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa bcu pa zhes bya ba/ dpal ldan gnyis med rdo
144a4(rgyud 'grel): rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA sh+rI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ swa pa ne k+Sha/ bod skad du/ rmi lam brtag pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems
144a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus ngag yid gsum rtag tu dang ba yis/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la btud de/ /rigs kyi phyag rgya rin chen lta bu yi/ /gang dgongs 'gyur phyir rmi lam bshad par bya/ /ku sha'i gdan la gnas nas kyang/
144a6(rgyud 'grel): dri ldan rtsa la rngas su gzhug /je ta pa yi phreng ba bcing/ /bu mo gzhon nu'i 'o ma la/ /sngags kyi phreng ba bzlas shing bdar/ /gzhan dang ldan pa mig la byug /dang po'i cha ni bag chags 'khrug /gnyis par yi dags rgyu bar 'gyur/ /tha mar rmi lam btab
144a7(rgyud 'grel): la nyal/ /mi long lag tu thogs pa dang/ /tshes gcig zla ba mthong ba dang/ /shing rta'i 'khor lo zhon pa dang/ /gos dkar rgyan dkar gyon pa dang/ /glang po lcags kyus 'dul ba dang/ /snying rjes ded dpon byed pa'o/ /rmi lam na ni gsar rnyed dang/ rang bzhin
144b1(rgyud 'grel): khrus la 'jug pa dang/ /bum pa spyi gtsug bzhag pa dang/ /gling gzhan kun la dbang sgyur dang/ /rta zhon nor bu'i gling 'gro dang/ /mi yi khyogs kyis 'degs pa'o/ /me tog pad+ma 'thu ba dang/ /glegs bam lag ma thogs pa dang/ /dung la sogs pa 'bud? par?
144b2(rgyud 'grel): me tog phreng ba 'dogs pa dang/ /rma bya snying yis 'dzin pa dang/ /snying rjes dam chos 'chad pa'o/ /mchon thogs g.yul las rgyal ba dang/ /rgyal po 'khor du gyur pa dang/ /dmag mi g.yul du bskor ba dang/ /zhi ba'i las la 'god pa dang/ /bya shar te'u
144b3(rgyud 'grel): pho nyar gtong/ /nags tshal me yis bsregs pa'o/ /chu la mi nub rkyal ba dang/ /nam mkha' la yang 'gro zhing lding/ /nyin zla rgyan du gon pa dang/ /seng ge khri stan gnon pa dang/ gdugs dkar phub cing rgyal mtshan bsgreng/ /kun gyis mchod pa'i
144b4(rgyud 'grel): 'os 'gyur ba'i/ /khrag dang chu zer zag pa dang/ /me dpung brdzi zhing mi 'jigs dang/ /sbrul dang sdig pa za ba dang/ /rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa dang/ /ri bo rtse la gnon pa dang/ /grong khyer mdzub mos skyor ba'o/ /bla ma yi dam mchod pa dang/ /glegs bam
144b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dri zhing mchod rten brtsig /gcer bur byung zhing glu gar byed/ /dge slong tshogs dang lhan cig 'grogs/ /gos bzang gyon zhing shing 'bru za/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /shis pa brjod cing lung ston byed/ /chu yi rdzing chen 'khyil ba dang/
144b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas khang mthon po brtsig pa dang/ /yid dang mthun par 'byung ba'o/ /dgra yis rgyan dang dral ba dang/ na chung mya ngan byed pa dang/ /khri mon nang du bcug pa dang/ /nor phrogs lcags su bcug pa dang/ /'gro ba ngan pas brdzi ba dang/ /gcan gzan
144b7(rgyud 'grel): lus la 'phyang ba dang/ /srad bus dkris shing dri mas g.yogs/ /dri ma za zhing dri ma 'thung/ /bla ma slob dpon grogs po dang/ /pha ma rnams ni mthong nas 'bros/ /shin tu cong rong mi med dang/ /yang na 'dro ga dgon la sogs par/ /zas dang skom gyis
145a1(rgyud 'grel): nyam thag ste/ /kyi hud bdag sdug zer gyi g.ya'/ /go cha bshus nas mtshon gyis 'debs/ /nags kyi dkyil nas phyin nas kyang/ /stag dang lce spyang dud 'gro 'debs/ /de sogs yid dung bar 'byung ba/ /dge dang me dge'i
145a2(rgyud 'grel): lta su rigs/ /rnam par snang mdzad rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ /'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa dang/ /mi bskyod pa dang rdo rje sems rigs drug /go rim nyid dang sna tshogs 'dres pa'i?/ /shis pa'i rmi lam ni sgrub pa tsam/ /rin chen phyag rgyar
145a3(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /mi dge'i ltas la til gyi sbyin sreg bya/ /rigs de zhig la stong gis sbyangs pa'o/ /bag chags yi dags yid brid pa/ /'khor ba'i chos kun rmi lam bzhin/ /rnal 'byor pa yis blta bar bya/ /'khrul pa? yang
145a4(rgyud 'grel): dag min phyir ro/ /bzang po rtogs las ye shes skye/ /blos brtags don ni skye ba med/ /de phyir gas sngags rtog 'byung ngo/ /thabs la rag las gtso bor bzung/ /byang chub sems bskyed pa dang dbang bskur ba'i/ /rmi lam bstan pa klu sgrub
145a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhung las btus/ /legs dang nyes pa'i rim pa gsal byed pa/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i zhal mthong shog /rmi lam brtag pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/? //
145a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nya sh+ri dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sa mA ti bu d+hI bi Sha gA ta bo d+hi dI paM nA ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsam gtan dug sel bar byed pa'i mang me
145a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis dam pa'i zhabs kyi padmo la/ /yun rings btud pa'i mthu ni gzi brjid ldan/ /gang zhig rgyud la bcan thabs 'jug byed pa/ /shes dras? mig dang
145b1(rgyud 'grel): mi ldan nyam ngar rgyug /gdung ba gcod byed rgyu ni sems dpa' i shes rab ste/ /thams cad theg chen lam du 'jug pa'i rigs/ /rab tu byed pa'i lam du ma zhugs pa'i/ /bsam gtan pa ni nags klung bung ba bzhin/ /rig pa'i gnas lnga rgal te char
145b2(rgyud 'grel): gcod gang/ / gzhung lugs mi ldan pas ni don ma rnyed/ /tshogs rgyas pa yis rab tu nga rgyal ba/ /rgyal ba'i sgro ba bzhin du bde blag bral/ /ye shes drug gi yul la ma zhugs na/ /yid ni ngang tshul ngan pas rgya cher min/ /rtogs dang nyams su
145b3(rgyud 'grel): myong ba'i mdza' bral bas/ /brtan dang goms pa ma rnyad ta la 'dra/ /chos rnams rnam par dag pa'i ye shes ni/ /gser la rtsis bsgyur rgyan du byas pa bzhin/ /gang zhig 'brel med ting 'dzin gang bsgom pa/ /thams cad mkhyen par mi
145b4(rgyud 'grel): rung sangs rgyas min/ /bskyed pa'i rim la gnas na rdzogs rim mchog /de yang snying po sbyangs nas gcig 'gyur ba/ /rnam pa'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bde chen de/ /yid bzhin nor bu gtsug tu btags pa bzhin/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa
145b5(rgyud 'grel): gces spras mdzod 'dzin na/ /lha yi bag chags nyid kyis grol mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin nang dang zab mo'ang de yin te/ /glang chen mig srung zug rdur gyur pa bzhin/ /ldog pa gcod la chos rnams brgyad khrir bden/ /de phyir rigs dang ye shes bde gshegs
145b6(rgyud 'grel): gsung/ /rang bzhin shes na gar yang bde ba med/ /mi bden med phyin kun mkhyen tshig gis dbul/ /de ltar bya ba'i rim pa zhes pa ni/ /ka shi lnga rnams mu tig rnyed pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bde ba che la gnas/ /go cig 'dres shing 'dus pas
145b7(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid/ /gcig la bstod pas thams cad bstod 'gyur ba/ /ye shes sems dpa' brjod pa thugs mthun yin/ /'khor dang myang 'das chos su ci snang dang/ /sna tshogs 'bru dang sna tshogs byed pa dang/ /so so'i rgyud la bden par snang mod kyang/ /bso
146a1(rgyud 'grel): shes sems dpa' i sprul pa nor bu bzhin/ /'on kyang kun rdzob tsam du thams cad yong/ /gsung dag pa la brten nas 'phags pa mthong/ /yid 'ong de ni dge ba'i las las byung/ /sdug bsngal mi sten phyir na spang par bya/ /
146a2(rgyud 'grel): de phyir gsang sngags rten 'brel 'byung ba zhi man ngag rgya mtsho'i gnas ni rin chen brgyud/ /'di las 'byung bzhin rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis/ /skas kyi rim pa bzhin du rim par bgrod/ /ma rig dang bcas shes pa 'di yis ni/ /go bar mi rigs zhen pa'i
146a3(rgyud 'grel): mthu las byung/ /mi gnas snying po rgyud las skyes pas na/ /'khrul bar mi rigs gdod ma'i mthu las byung/ /rang bzhin rtag cing mi 'gyur rtag pa nyid/ /dri ldan do shes rang rig rgyud las byung/ /rang bzhin rgyud la ji ltar yang gnas pa/ /bsaM
146a4(rgyud 'grel): par mi nus e ma ngo mtshar che/ /sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsam gtan gyi dug sel ba'i mar me zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs// //rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA sh+rI dz+nyA na/ /
146a5(rgyud 'grel): kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ dz+nyA na satwa many+dzu sh+rI sA mA ti tsa kra mA nA ba tA ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i yid 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ 'jam
146a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ston ka'i zla ltar dkar la dri ma med pa'i sku/ /rab tu sku mdzes gzhon nur bzhugs shing yid dang gnas/ /ye shes sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ /thugs
146a7(rgyud 'grel): kar bzhugs shing nyi ma stong ldan 'khor lo 'khrug /sems can khur khyer glang po de la phyag 'tshal te/ /rgyud kyi gsang sngags 'khor lo yid 'jug pa/ /glog gi phreng ba lta bus bdung tshogs zil gnon cang/ /bgegs dang lor par?
146b1(rgyud 'grel): 'den pa tshang gcod mtshon cha che/ /rigs lnga'i dpa' po'i 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya/ /dang po 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i rnal 'byor bas/ gnas khang yid du 'ong zhing dben la bkra shis pa bltas te/ sangs rgyas gang+gA klung ga bye ma
146b2(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam pa la mchod bstod de/ sngags kyi phreng ba lan bdun du brjod pas/ sangs rgyas gi gA klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa sa bon la bsdus pas/ 'og nas 'byung ba dang mthun pa'i skur gyur te/ sngags kyi phreng ba 'di mgal me'i 'khor lo lta bur
146b3(rgyud 'grel): stong? phrag bcu'i bzlas par bya'o/ /oM sarba d+ha rmA d+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badzra tsak+Shu/ a a aM a(rgyud 'grel): pra kri ti pa ri shud+d+ha sarba d+ha rma ya du ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ dz+nyA kA ya/ many+dzu sh+rI/ shu d+d+hi ta mu pa ra ye ti sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/
146b4(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM h+rI b+ha ga bA na/ dz+nya na mU rti/ bA gI shwa ra ma hA pA tse/ sarba d+ha rma/ ga ga nA ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+ha rma d+hA tu dz+nyA na garb+ha A(rgyud 'grel): de dag ni snyen pa'o/ /de nas lhag pa'i lha'i ris kyi mdun dud am tshig dang chang sbyar ba'i maN+Dal gru bzhi pa bya'o/ /re
146b5(rgyud 'grel): nas dkyil du me tog sngon po dri zhim pa spungs te/ oM sarba d+harmA b+ha ga swa b+hA ba bi shu d+d+ha d+ha rma d+hA tu dz+nyA na ga rb+ha A(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan 'dun bzlas pas/ 'jam dpal mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon po rig pa dang ldan pa bskyed do/ /de nas me tog ser po dri zhim pa dang
146b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas lho'i ngos su spungs te/ oM tsak+Shu a a aM a pra kri taMba ri shud+d+ha/ d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na garb+ha a(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan bdun du bzlas pas/ 'jam dpal rin chen 'byung gnas/ /sku mdog ser po rig pa dang ldan pa bskyed do/ /de nas me tog dkar po ri zhim
146b7(rgyud 'grel): pa shar gyi ngos su spungs te/ oM sarba d+harmA me du ta sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/ d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na sarba a(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan bdun du blzas pas/ 'jam dpal rtsam rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po rig pa dang ldan pa bskyed do/ /de nas me tog dmar po rig? me
147a1(rgyud 'grel): pa nub kyi phyogs su spungs te/ oM many+dzu sh+rI shu d+d+hi ta mu pa ta ye/ d+ha rmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na garb+ha a(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan bdun du bzlas pas/ 'jam dpal 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog dmar po rig dang ldan pa skyed do/ /de nas me tog
147a2(rgyud 'grel): ljang ser dri zhim pa byang gi ngos su spungs te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ d+ha rma d+hA tu dz+nyA na ga rb+ha a(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan bdun bzlas pas 'jam dpal don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang khu rig pa dang ldan pa bskyed do/ /de dag thams cad
147a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang zhal gsum pa phyag bzhi pa khro zhing cung zad zhi ba/ rin po che'i rgyan gyis spras pa'i/ /dang po ni sngo ba dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'i zhal can/ ral gri dang/ rdo rje dang/ po ti dang/ dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /gnyis pa ni dkar ba dang/ sngo ba dang/
147a4(rgyud 'grel): dmar pa'i zhal can/ ral gri dang/ po ti dang/ 'khor lo dang/ dril bu 'dzin pa'i/ /gsum pa ni mer ba dang sngo ba dang/ dkar ba'i zhal can/ ral gri dang/ po ti dang/ rin po che dang/ dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /bzhi pa ni dmar ba dang/
147a5(rgyud 'grel): sto ba dang/ dkar ba'i zhal can/ ral gri dang/ po ti dang/ pad+ma dang/ dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /lnga pa ni ljang khu dang/ sngo ba dang/ dkar ba'i zhal can/ ral gri dang/ po ti dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /yum rnams ni zhal
147a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis pa/ gcer bu skra grol zhing g.yon nas g.yas su 'khyud pa rdo rje'i dril bu dang ldan pa'o/ /de dag thams cad kyang sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgyan pa la bzhugs pa ste/ rnam par snang mdzad ni zla ba'i
147a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la'o/ /de nas rab tu gnas pa dang/ dbang bskur pa dang/ byin gyis brlab pa dang/ rgyas gdab pa dag gis yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ mchod cing mtshan yong dag par brjod pa'i bstod pa brgya phrag bcu'i bar du
147b1(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ de nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i pho brang du zhugs pa ni thun mtshams kyi nge nyid de nye bar bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs pa'i nang du/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' zhal gsum
147b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhi pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas te/ cho ga rdzogs pa dang/ nam mkha' i bdag po 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i snying khar bzhag ste/ rigs kyi bsnyen pa ye shes sems dpa' i yang pho brang du ji srid spro'i bar du blangs shing go rims kyis khri phrag re re
147b3(rgyud 'grel): chang du bya'o/ /thun chem su ni sngar dang mthun pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bstod pa dag kyang byas te/ de dag ni sgrub pa'o/ /de nas nam mkha' i pho brang ci 'byor ba'i mchod bas mnyes par bya ste/ tshogs kyi 'khro lo'i mchod pa chen po yang byas la/ mtshan
147b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi bstong pa byas te/ sangs rgyas go gA klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa la bdag nyid kyi thabs dang shes rab yan lag mchog gi dbus su/ a thung du lam lus par rdzogs par bstim nas/ 'dod pa'i don chen po la rol nas bde ba'i ye shes zad mi shes pa'i
147b5(rgyud 'grel): par rig la skad cig de nyid la rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba ni/ /rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal/ /rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste/ /'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyi Tur lag nas/ /sangs rgyas?
147b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi sku che ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin/ /rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che/ /rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od/ /chags bral la sogs chags pa che/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa/ /
147b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan sangs rgyas par skyes/ /kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa/ /rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang/ /che ba'i sangs rgyas rig sngags rgyal/ /rdo rje rnon po ral gri che/ /yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag /ces bya ba ni nge'i bar du byed pa'?/ /rab
148a1(rgyud 'grel): tu gnas pa yang 'di nyid kyis bya ste/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren/ /mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gis gnas/ /rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os/ /bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog /phyag byar 'os pa bla?
148a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i rab ces bya'o/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo ni ras dkar pa'am ta la'i lo ma la dri zhim pa sna tshogs kyis byugs te/ gur kum gyis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi ba mu khyud dang ldan pa bris la/ oM bA gI shwa ri muM na ma swA hA/ dkyil du'o/ /a A/
148a3(rgyud 'grel): i a'i/ u a'u/ e i/ o aau/ i a(rgyud 'grel): de'i phyi rim du'o/ /s+thi ti h+raM/ dz+nyI na mu rti/ ra haM bubd+hI Ta d+d+ha nUM/ trye d+hA brtI nI ma ma rak+Sha swAhA/ /de'i phyir rim du'o/ /oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na du(rgyud 'grel): kats+tshe da padz+nyA dz+nyA na mu rta ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya bA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa nA ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): rak+Sha
148a4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ lte ba'i mu khyud la'o/ /rigs kyi dang po ni lte ba'i khor yug tu'o/ /gzhan rnams ni 'khor lo la'o/ /dre nge sngags ni phyi'i yu khyud la'o/ /de la sngar bzhin bskyed de/ chog rdzogs par byas nas/ 'khor lor gyur bde spyi gtsug tu btags na/
148a5(rgyud 'grel): dus su 'chi ba'ang zlog par 'gyur te/ gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de dag ni sgrub pa chen po'o/ /bsod nams yongs rdzogs ye shes zla bzhin 'phel/ /dkra shis phun tshogs bstan pa yun ring rgyu/ /bdud dgra pham par byed pa'i sgrub
148a6(rgyud 'grel): thabs 'dis/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i zhabs grub shog /bdag ni blo dman rab 'byed rgyud la rmongs/ /dam pa snyan brgyud la brtan tshig 'ga' zhig /bris pa 'di la blo bzang dang gyur na/ /rang gi bu bzhin khyed kyis bzod pa mdzod/ /
148a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i yid 'jug pa'i/ /bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pra dz+nyA sh+rI dz+nyA na kI rtis rang 'gyur du
148b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ ti la ka sid+d+hi/ bod skad du/ thig le grub pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang blo dri ma'i rgyun 'dzag gang/ /nges par byed pa'i thig le rim/ gang gis
148b2(rgyud 'grel): gang la de bstan na/ /bde ba chen po'i rgyun 'dzag 'gyur/ /mchog bzang bla ma'i zhabs pad la/ /dkon mchog gsum du mtshungs btud de/ /ye shes rdo rje 'chang bla ma/ /gsang ba'i thigs pa bshad par bya/ /bdag nyid lha'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sa
148b3(rgyud 'grel): bon zo 'phrul kun bsdus te/ /de nyid la ni dmigs pa yis/ /yi ge dran pa rdzogs par 'gyur/ /skad cig la ni rnam grangs brgyad/ /go rim bzlas pa bstan pa dang/ /thig le chen por yang bsdus te/ /reg bya'i dran pa rdzogs par 'gyur/ /
148b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bcu drug gyur pa gang/ /yi ge'i phreng bas bgrang byas te/ /'pho dang 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rlung gi dran pa rdzogs par 'gyur/ /rnam shes ye shes mthong ba gang/ /yul min shes pa'i mtshan nyid las/ /'gro dang lor ba mi dmigs
148b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /thig la dran pa rdzogs par 'gyur/ /steng dang 'og la dmigs pa'i yid/ /thig le stong pa yi ge brgya/ /yid gnas ldang 'jug med pa dang/ /stong pa chen po yi ge lnga/ /'og gi gnas la dmigs nas kyang/ /thig le chen po yi ge med/ /phyed
148b6(rgyud 'grel): pa? lhag pa zla ba'i gnas/ /gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa/ /'byung dang 'jug dang dran par bzlas/ /gsang sngags las byung yi ge med/ /gnas med gnas la gnas pa gang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bla na
148b7(rgyud 'grel): med/ /sbyor ba rdzogs dang sbyor ba gcig pa dang/ /dran pas gnas dang longs spyod chen po dang/ /bsam mi khyab dang lnga yis thig le grub/ /dam pa'i zhal gyi tshig gi 'ching ba grol/ /ri khrod mgon po las rnyed pa'i/ /man ngag gzhung gi dbu ma lnga/ /
149a1(rgyud 'grel): nang gi nang la 'jug pa'i rim/ /kun kyang bde gshegs gnas thob shog /thig le grub pa rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms
149a2(rgyud 'grel): pa pradz+nyA sh+rI dz+nyA na kI rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ ti la kai ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ thig le gcig pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang bzhin bde
149a3(rgyud 'grel): ba brnyed pa yis/ /ye shes sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dmigs pa la ni sems bzhag nas/ /sbyor ba ye shes thig le bshad/ /sna tshogs chos kun shes rab kyis bltas nas/ /gcig dang du ma mdza' yis brtags pa dang/ /
149a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig kyang mi dmigs rang bzhin stong pa yin/ /thams cad rig pa'i ngo bor gsal 'gyur ba/ /gnyis kyi mdza' yis dben pa gnyis med de/ /rnam pa thams cad ldan pa ye shes skur/ /bsgoms te sa bon nyid du sems gnas bya
149a5(rgyud 'grel): de la dmigs pa nye ba nyid du gyur pa ni/ /gsal dang mi gsal phyi ma'i blo yis brtag /yid kyi yi ge nyid dang yi ge nyid/ /rjes la 'gro ba rnam par dag byas la/ /rten dang brten pa sbrul pa'i sku ru bzhag /yi ge la sems gzung
149a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thig le dang po'o/ /thabs dang shes rab kha sbyar la/ /shigs pa med pa'i yi ge nas/ /tshangs pa'i mig gsum bzhi yis bskor/ /de la rnam shes brtan pa dang/ /'dren pa brgyad dang dgur ldan pa'o/ /bde ba'i lhag pa'i bzlas
149a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bya/ /reg bya chen po skyes pa na/ /lhag pa'i thig le chen por bsdu/ /mthar phyin reg bya skyes pa na/ /steng gi gnas su 'pho bar bya/ /reg bya la sems gzung ba'i thig le ste gnyis pa'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' rab mdzes sku/ /zla ba ltar
149b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rdo rje la/ /bcu drug thig le gcig pa gang/ /bcu bdun ldan par bzlas bya ste/ /'pho ba 'byung la bzlas pa bya/ /'jug pa thim la bzlas pa bya/ /gsal dang bde dang yongs rdzogs nas/ /dbyu gu drug cu'i grangs su bgrang/ /phra mo'i rnal 'dod? rdzogs
149b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba/ /bag dang ldan pa'i sbyor bas brtsam/ /phra mo la sems gzung ba'i thig le ste gsum pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i rdo rje'i sku/ /gaM gA klung gi sangs rgyas kyis/ /byin gyis brlabs la bsgom par bya/ /de nyid ye shes thig le bsgom/ /mi shi gsal yon
149b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa can/ /dran pa lhan cig skyes pa gsal/ /'gro 'od med par nyin mtshan du/ /yul min shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /gnas pa'i thig le rdzogs pa yi/ /cung zad mi gsal phra mor gsang/ /ye shes la sems gsang ba'i thig le ste ba zhi ba'o/ /
149b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor lam la bslab pa ni/ /steng dang 'og gi mdud pa la/ /aM dang hUM gi thig le blta/ /thig le stong pa'i sa bon las/ /A li kA li 'dzag pa'i phreng/ /rlung gis mnan la sa kar bstim/ /de la legs rol skyes pa dang/ /'og gi thig le stod
149b5(rgyud 'grel): ma las/ /nyis 'gyur phul la steng du bstim/ /de la legs rol skyes pas na/ /rang 'byung ye shes chen po bsgom/ /dbang po lnga la yi ges khyab/ /yul lnga legs rol chen por bsgom/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma las/ /thig le yi ge
149b6(rgyud 'grel): med pa gnyis/ /dbugs dbyung chen po bdag med bsgom/ /lhan cig skyes dga' rna ba'i dus/ /gsal stong bde ba dbyer med pa/ /gnyug ma nyams su myong bas shes/ /gal te mi gsal gyur pa na/ /rdo rje bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /sbyor ba las byung 'od
149b7(rgyud 'grel): gsal sems/ /rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das/ /ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba/ /rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa/ /sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa/ /ye shes mig
150a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig dri ma med/ /ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs/ /thig le chen po grub pa bstan pa ste lnga pa'o// /man ngag bdud rtsi lta bu grol ba'i rim/ /thig le grub pa gsal byed gcig pa bstan/ /'di
150a2(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i bsod nams ji snyed nges/ /bde ba chen po'i gnas dngos rnyed par shog /thig le gcig ba zhes bya ba slob dpon dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mjad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA
150a3(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI dz+nyA na ki rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ dz+nyA na satwa many+dza sh+rI sa ra sid+d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i snying po grub pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems
150a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag rgya chen por 'gro ba kun gnas pa/ /'od gsal rang byung yid kyis gus phyag 'tshal/ /'gro ba rnams la ji ltar bden don nyid/ /sems dpa' i ye shes 'gag pa med par bshad/ /'das dbam
150a5(rgyud 'grel): 'ongs da ltar dus rnams su/ /dus gsum mnyam pa'i sku shar gzhan rgyu med/ /de phyir yang dag mtshan brjod go ba yis/ /'khor 'das ye shes sems dpa' i lus rig bya/ /rdul dang mun pa snying stobs gsum gyi bdag /de nyid yin phyir
150a6(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis sun mi 'byung/ /phung po lnga yi khur bor nyan thos rnams/ /lam gyi dang por 'bad de gzung bar bya/ /rang rgyal theg pa bag med spong ba'i phyir/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don la bslab/ /dge chos tshol la dge ba'i bshes
150a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyen bsten/ /shes rab gsum ni shes rab kyis shes bya/ /zang pa shes pas rnam par dag 'gyur te/ /skye med shes pas ye shes lus su 'gyur/ /skad cig gcig la grol ba na/ /rang rig ngo bor sangs rgyas thams cad 'chang/ /yul
150b1(rgyud 'grel): dang dbang po bde bar byin brlabs pas/ /ye shes sems dpa' i lus su bdag rdzogs 'gyur/ /thams cad dge bar mthong bas mi dge med/ /snying rje chen po'i cha las sna tshogs gzugs/ /rgyu lam 'brus bu kun du dgag mi bya/ /shes rab pas?
150b2(rgyud 'grel): rol phyin las stong pa nyid/ /dus gsum du ni mi gnas 'pho ba med/ /bde ba chen po'i mngal du yid zhugs na/ /rnal 'byor yid la mi byed bla ma'i sku/ /yul dang gnyen por bcas dang mthong ba dang/ /der shes pa dang nub pa'i ye shes nyid
150b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba bral ba'i sems ni brten pa la/ /rgod dang g.yeng ba'i dri mas gos mi 'gyur/ /rang 'byung ye shes brtan dang thos pa yis/ brtags pa'i rgyu ba rnams la gnas pa med/ /'khrul pa zhig pas snang ba'i rgyub bral/ /dbye ba spangs? pa yi
150b4(rgyud 'grel): shes sems dpa' i gnas/ /yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig bying rmugs med/ /ngas 'byung mdza' la gnas pa the tsom med/ /rgyun chad med pa'i ye shes 'gyod pa spangs/ /nyon mongs gnyen po mi byed le lo min/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
150b5(rgyud 'grel): cig pas zhum pa med/ /'khor ba rnam par dag pas gnyid sogs bral/ /yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas rdo rje 'dzin/ /rang bzhin chos la gnas pas thob bya spangs/ /rdo rje lta bu yin phyir bdud pham gyur/ /dogs la med pa'i gnas
150b6(rgyud 'grel): thob shin tu bde/ /kun rdzob rnam par dag pas e ma mcher/ /bcom ldan mgon po gang gi lung thob pas/ /rgyud dngos grub pa sgrub pa'i thabs 'di byas/ /phun sum tshogs 'gyur tshogs gnyis 'bras bu gang/ 'gro ba rnams kyi dus 'dir rnyed
150b7(rgyud 'grel): par shog /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' i snying po grub pa zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nya sh+rI dz+nyA na kI rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //
151a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kun rang bzhin 'jam dpal ye shes sems/ /ma lus bde gshegs kun gyi mtshan gyur pa/ /rdo rje 'chang chen rnams kyi glur blangs non/ /
151a2(rgyud 'grel): zab cing rgya che'i skye bo blo bzang ngan/ /byang chub sems ldan lhag pa'i ltar mos la/ /sgyu ma'i rten 'brel rnam gsum sbyor ba las/ /ma lus gnyis med mkha' khyab sprul tshogs dgu'o/ /ma skyes mi 'gag sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshogs/ /rdo rje mig
151a3(rgyud 'grel): gis snang thob bar du blta/ /sgyu ma brag cha nam mkha' i rang bzhin du/ /yongs su shes nas ma zhen sems kyi blags/ /gsang sngags tshul chen lam 'di yin/ /ji ltar dngos rnams mkha' la gnas la bzhin/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor phyag rgya che la
151a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /don de mi shes dkar ba'i len gzhan gyis/ /'khor ba'i grong gsum dag las de mi g.yo/ /de lta'i don shes rang bzhin nyes pa spangs/ /spos kyi glang po ke ta ka zos bzhin/ /nyes pa'i tshogs bcom gzhung tshogs yon tan ldan/ /
151a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gag pa med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/ /thugs kyi gsang mdzod gtsug gi rin po che/ /'gro kun sems kyi rang bzhin chos rnams lung/ /rgyud kun dbang po rdo rje tshig du gnas/ /mkhan po'i rjes 'brang nye bar gyur pa yin/ /slob dpon
151a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po shi me tri'i gdams ngag nye bar bsdus pa rdzogs so// //'phags ba 'jam dpal gyi zab cing rgya che ba'i 'grel ba slob dpon dril bu pas mdzad pa bzhugs so// //'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rten ldan de nyid
151a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub 'dod pas/ /bdag gzhan don 'gyur sdags tshul lam/ /ye shes lnga khyab la btung nas/ /zab cing rgya chen gsal bar dbye// //chos kun zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dag dang po 'dis brjod par bya ba dang/ brjod dgos pa
151b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ brjod bya'i dgos pa la sogs pa brjod pa yin no/ /byang chub sems bskyed ces bya ba nas/ tshul 'di yin zhes bya bas thabs brjed pa yin no/ /ji ltar mkha' la zhes bya ba nas/ chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhes bya bas lam dman pa dag ba/ bas?
151b2(rgyud 'grel): khyad par brjod pa yin no/ /thugs kyi gsang mdzod ces bya ba nas nye bar bsdus bshad ces bya bas brjod bya dang brjod pa'i khyab pa bstan pa yin no/ /de lta'i lam ni zhes bya ba nas/ byas pa yin zhes bya bas gzhung nye bar bsdus pa yin no/ /
151b3(rgyud 'grel): don gyi brjod bya 'jam dpal gyi ngo bo gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos kun rang bzhin 'jam dpal ye shes sems zhes bya ba smos te/ chos ni phung po lnga la sogs pa rnams te/ rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa rnams so/ /de dag gis shes bya bsdus
151b4(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa'am/ yang na de dag la nyon mongs pa lnga dang spyi bsdus pa dang ldan pa'i chos kun ni rgyud 'dir 'dod do/ /de'i rang bzhin ni ngo bo nyid de stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ 'dus ma byas pa bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /
151b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dis ni 'gro ba dbyings nyid du khyab pa blangs pa yin no/ /nges pa'i yul la byed pa po med pa dang rgyu nyid yin bas na 'di ni ngo bo nyid du rig pa'o/ /'di'i don yang/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin/ /skye med chos de
151b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs don/ /chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba/ /sems can kun gyi yid la gnas/ /phra zhing zag med sa bon bral/ /zhes gsungs pas grub pa yin no/ /de tsam yin yang nges pa'i yul la byed pa po med na 'gro ba dang sangs rgyas khyad par med pa
151b7(rgyud 'grel): de'i mngon du byed pa'i lam bsten pa ni/ sems zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chad pa ste/ sems kyi gnas skabs 'dir ni lam shes la rgyun gyis 'jug pa mi mthun pa dang/ gnyen po gnyis su shes nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i lam 'chad ba rnams so/ /
152a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di'i don yang nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa/ shin tu sad pa sad pa'i bdag ces gsungs pas bshad pa yin no/ /'di ni ngo bo nyid glo bur ba dang ldan pa dag la lam gyis 'byin par dgongs pa'o/ /yang spong ba dang sgyu mar gyur?
152a2(rgyud 'grel): 'chad par gyur pa ni/ 'jam dpal ye shes la bya ste/ /'bras bu nyid du bdag dgongs pa'i rgyud 'dir zug rngu lnga la sogs pa dang/ 'ching ba las grol zhing dbyings bzhi lus la ye shes rnams ro mnyam du 'dres pa de la 'jams zhes
152a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /'di nyid bdag dang gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa'i gzhi gyur pas dpal yin no/ /sems zhes bya ba ni rgyun dang nyid dang rang bzhin yin pas gsum par yang sbyar ro/ /de yang so so rang rig mi g.yo ba/ /mchog gi
152a4(rgyud 'grel): dang po sku gsum 'chang/ /sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag /bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad la/ /kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog /ces gsungs so/ /de ltar ston pas brjod bya dmigs pa'i yul du phrug? gas la
152a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag nas/ de'i brjed pa bstan pa ni/ bde gshegs ma lus kun gyi mtshan gyur pa zhes bya ba smos te de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa dang/ de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa las byon zhing ston pa'o/ /ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro pa
152a6(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzob can gyi ngo bo byung ba dang/ kun rdzob kyi char gshegs shing ston pa ste/ dus dang phyogs ma lus pa'i ma lus pa la kun tu zhes bstan pa ni kha cig zad par gyi ming dang don la zer ro/ /'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan rnams
152a7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa yin pas nge 'dzin pa'o/ /gi phyir ma dag pa mtshan du gyur pa ni/ ngo bos khyab pa dang/ de'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ de las 'byung ba'i phyir rgya lu gus pa'o/ /mtshan gyur zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan ngag sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa la
152b1(rgyud 'grel): lhag par 'gyur ba'o/ /de yang bcu phrag brgyad dang drug nyid dang/ /brgya phrag gcig dang brgyad cu gcig /bcu phrag bdun la gcig lhag pa/ /brgya phrag gnyis dang bdun cu lnga/ /brgya phrag gcig dang de la lnga/ /brgya phrag gcig la lnga med pa'o/ /
152b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga phrag bcu la gsum lhag dang/ /de bzhin du ni snga ma'i grangs zhes bya ba'i tshigs bcad kyis bstan pa'o/ /brjod pa de dag gis ji ltar brjod pa ni/ /rdo rje 'chang chen rnams kyi glu blangs don zhes bya ba la/ /stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid ting nge 'dzin gyis?
152b3(rgyud 'grel): ba ni rdo rje 'chang ba ste/ bde ba chen po blo mnyam pa'i sku'o/ /de yang mi nyams shing kun la khyab pas de la de skad ces bya'o/ /rnams zhes bya ba ni/ khyab pa po'i sku nyid kun rdzob kyi dor dus med dus kyi rnam par snang ba ste/ dngos po'i cho 'dzin pa'i
152b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro/ /de dag gis sku nyams su bltar ba'i chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa de gsal bar gdul bya la dbye ba ni glur blangs pa'o/ /de skad du 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /ma byon rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la/ /
152b5(rgyud 'grel): ?? byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /yang dang yang du gsung ba gang/ /rgyu chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chad/ /dpag med rnams kyis dga' bzhin du/ /glur blangs gang lags bshad du gsol zhes
152b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /don dam par dus gsum dus med rtogs pa'o/ /sems can kun gyi gtso bo che zhes gsungs pas 'chang ba yin/ /de ltar brjod pa bstan pa de'i dgos pa ni/ /de bzhin bya bas bstan pa yin no/ /don ni gang gis ji ltar brjod
152b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don khong du chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i dmigs pa'o/ /'di yang tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad/ /gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing/ /gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang/ /mi skye'i chos
153a1(rgyud 'grel): can 'di gsungs pa zhes bya'o/ /tshig gi bdag po ni brjod bya'i dgos pa mthong ba'o/ /tshig su bcad pa ni/ rjod byed mtshan don mthong ba'o/ /gsang sngags rgyal po ni brjod bya'i dgos pa las gyi khyad par ro/ /drug ldan ni lam de'i
153a2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa dang/ mi mthun pa drug tu gzigs pa ste/ de yang gsang sngags rigs chen thams cad dang/ /rigs chen gtsug tor cher gzigs nas zhes pa'i bar gyis bsdus so/ /'di dag gi 'brol pa gang gis rtogs pa ni/ skye bo blo bzang nyon zhes bya
153a3(rgyud 'grel): bar 'brel ba'o/ /blo bzang ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa rang dang mtshungs pa ste/ skye bo zhes smos pas sgrub pa po mtshan zab pa dang/ rgya che bar gtogs par 'dra'i dbyibs dang cha byang kyang bum pa la sogs pas ni ma yin no/ /nyon zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa dang ldan
153a4(rgyud 'grel): pas dgos 'brel zhes nas nyams su blang bya la gus par gdams pa'o/ /zab cing rgya chen zhes bya ba ni/ brjod bya'i dgos pa ston te/ zab pa'i bdag gis bsdus pa'i sku'o/ /rgya che ba ni gzhan gyis bsdus pa'i sku'o/ /de yang longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi
153a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal/ /sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba/ /phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed/ /ces gsungs pa yin no/ /de ltar dgos pa la sogs pas zhugs pa rnams ji ltar 'bras bu de ltar bsgrub par bya snyam pa
153a6(rgyud 'grel): la thabs bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems bskyed lhag pas lhar dmigs la zhes bya ba smos te/ byang chub nam mkha' lta bu dang sems can la phan pa'i rnam pa'o/ /de nas de'i ched du spyod pa dri ma med pa sgrub par 'dod pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen
153a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyu byang chub kyi sems yin no/ /de yang snying rje rtsa ba las pa yi/ /thabs kyi mthar ni son pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de yang rgya che ba dang snying rjes rgyun chags bya ba'i bsod tshogs so/ /chos thams cad don dam par lhag par mos pa ni ye shes
153b1(rgyud 'grel): de skad du yang/ byang chub sems dpa' i lam ni mdza' yas te/ mdor bsdu na bsod nams kyi tshogs zhes pa dang/ rgyud 'di nyid las kyang/ snying rje chen po shes rab thabs/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rten 'das/ /tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags
