153b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor gsum dmigs pa med pa byang chub dang sems can la dmigs pa ni sems bskyed de/ srid pa dang zhi ba las rnal 'byor bsrung ba'o/ /des bdag gi srung ba yang 'gyur te/ lhag
153b3(rgyud 'grel): pas lhang dmigs la zhes pa la bdag gi sems ji ltar sbyangs pa'i dag pa ni lhag pa'i don dang phrad par byed pas lhag pa'o/ /de nyid las kha dog dang dbyibs kyi dam tshig tu lta ba ni don gyis lus las byung bas lha zhes bya'o/ /dmigs pa ni de
153b4(rgyud 'grel): dag gnyis med par sbyor ba'o/ /'dis rnal 'byor pa khyad par can dang/ rgyud khyad par can gyis mchog gi rnal 'byor pa bla ma'i kha las brgyud par dgongs so/ /srung ba gnyis sngon du song bas ji ltar sgrub snyam pa la/ rten 'brel rnam gsum sgyu ma'i sbyor
153b5(rgyud 'grel): ba yis/ /ma lus gnyis med mkha' khyab sprul chogs dgu zhes bya ba la rten cing 'brel 'byung ni rang bzhin gyis ma bcos pa ste/ gang gi phyir mdza' gnyis rten 'brel la mi sring pa'i phyir/ /de la brten pa 'dus shing glo bur du rten cing 'byung
153b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni ming tsam dang gdong ma nas mi skye ba dang 'brel pa'o/ /rang bzhin de'i byed pa ni sbyor ba ste/ 'dus pa la rten pa dang 'brel pa dang/ zhes bya ba ni ma skyes par gtogs pa'i rnam grangs so/ /'di nyid bya ba gsum gyis byed de/ dag pa yis byin gyis
153b7(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pa ni rnal 'byor pa'i kun rdzob bo/ /'di yang mi bden lta bur snang bas ngo bo ma yin pas sgyu ma'o/ /de yang rang bzhin med pa'i snang pa la sgyu ma zhes btags so/ /gnyis par gyur pa sgyu ma dang rten 'brel ni skyes bu rnams dbyer med pa la sgyu mar
154a1(rgyud 'grel): ma gtogs dag la 'dod pa bsgrubs pO/ /yid ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi byed pa por dgongs pa'o/ /don dam pa ma skyes pas kun rdzob kyang ni rigs pa'i yul du gyur pa la rigs pa'i yul ma yin pas sgyu ma nyams
154a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /sgyu ma yang sgyu ma nyid la snang gi gzhan du skye ba dang 'gag pa la sel ba dang bsgrub par mi 'dod do/ /gang yang rnam par rig pa tsam la sogs pa rten 'brel don du khas blangs pa la ni rnam par bcad pa 'dod pa yin gyi/ phyogs gzhan gyi ngor
154a3(rgyud 'grel): mi snang ba dang yod par yang ma yin no/ /rigs pa'i shes pa'i yul la snang ba'i tha snyad/ 'gag pa dang ldan pa'i yul ma yin te/ rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /de nyid khong du chung par bya ba'i phyir/ ma lus pa ni sems dang sems las
154a4(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i khyab pa'i chos rnams so/ /gnyis med pa ni de dag la gnyis med par dang de dag gnyis med de/ kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i 'jug pa gnyis ma grub pa'i phyir ro/ /gang gi phyir mi bden pa'i rnam par rtog pas 'jug pa dang/ bden pa la mi rtog
154a5(rgyud 'grel): pas 'jug pa gnyis yin no zhe na/ de bzhin nyid ma gtogs pa rnams la ni skyes bus 'dod pas kyang bzhag /de yang de nyid mthong ba ma yin te/ pha rol smra ba po'i dor rnam par gcad pa dang/ yongs su gcad pas bzhag pa'i phyir ro/ /'dir ni
154a6(rgyud 'grel): nyams su myong ba'i yul du gyur pa la de med pas rang la snang ba'i mkha' khyab bo/ /sprul pa ni rten 'brel las byung bas so/ /tshogs ni de'i bdag med pa'i lha tshogs rnams so/ /'di ji ltar mi 'gal zhe na/ ma skyes mi 'gag ces bya ba ni/ gang
154a7(rgyud 'grel): skye ba'i zlas drang ba 'gag pa yin/ 'di ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la 'gag pa 'byung ba ma yin te/ gang nas gang skye ba med pa la gang du gang gnas pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gzugs ni gang nas kyang ma byung gang du yang
154b1(rgyud 'grel): mi gnas/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do zhes gsungs so/ /de'i phyir ma skyes pa nyid mi 'gag pas 'byung ba de'i skye ba dang/ 'gag pa nyid ma yin pa'o/ /de bas na sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang gsum bsdus pa'i tshig dgu yin no/ /
154b2(rgyud 'grel): de yang sems dang sems las byung ba sgyu ma nyid du 'phrul ba dang/ sgyu ma nyid du gtogs pa'i dra ba ni bdag nyid gcig pa'i 'brel ba'o/ /de ltar rnal 'byor bsgrubs nas/ /da ni bsgom pa dang bzlos pa'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'o/ /rdo rje mig gis
154b3(rgyud 'grel): gnang ba ma gsal bar du blta zhes bya ba la/ 'di lta bu'i rdo rje'i mig gi yul yin pas rdo rje'i mig ste/ ye shes kyi mig gis blta bar 'dod do/ /gzung ba'i chos rnams ni 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyar blta'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
154b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni mi bskyod pa yongs su grub pa'i me long gi gzugs brnyan ltar blta'o/ /mi bskyod pa sems dang sems las byung ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' i mig gis blta ba'i phyir yul yin pas rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ de ltar blta ba'i yul can la yang ming de skad
154b5(rgyud 'grel): ces grags so/ /de yang ye shes mig gcig dri ma med/ /ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs zhes bya ba las dang/ stong pa nyid la stong nyid mthong/ /mig ni mi 'gyur bstan pa'o/ /zhes bya'o/ snang gsal bar du blta zhes bya ba ni/ don de dag la dang po rnal
154b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor bstan pas/ yid ches pa sngon du song bas/ zag pa med pa'i bdud rtsir gyur pas bdag 'dres pa'i bar de srid du shes rab kyis blta zhing bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba don to/ /ji skad du/ mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po/ /ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba/ /rnam
154b7(rgyud 'grel): par rtog med lhun gyis grub/ /cis gsungs so/ /de nas 'bang pa med pa'i mtshan brjod pa ni/ sgyu ma brag cha nam mkha' i rang bzhin du zhes bya ba la/ ji skad bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor na sgyu ma yin pas phyi dang nang dang bral ba'i snang bar mthong ba dang/ mtshan gyi
155a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas pa rnams ni/ byed pa po la sogs pa gsum med pas phyi dang nang du gsal ba'i brag cha'o/ /'di gnyis ni gzugs dang sgra'i rnam pa ste/ mtshan ma'i rang bzhin du gyur pa ste/ ji skad du/ sbyor ba'i sam pa ni/
155a2(rgyud 'grel): sprul sku'i yul gsung gi longs spyod dang/ mi g.yo ba la gnas pa'i ni sku'i yul lo/ /de ltar na dbyibs dang sngags kyis ni 'di dag la thugs rje'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes dngos su skyed par byed pas/ spro ba dang bsdu ba'i bdag nyid can la sogs
155a3(rgyud 'grel): pa kun 'dir ldan pa'o/ /de bas na yongs su shes nas ni khong du chung par byas nas so/ /de yang sems kyis te/ ye shes las byung bas ye shes ye shes mtshon pa'i brnga'i mtshan gdags pas bya ba ni rlag ces pa'i don to/ /gang gi phyir sems
155a4(rgyud 'grel): dang sems las byung ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad bshad can/ de'i phyir gsang sngags lam ni rnal 'byor tshul 'dis byed ces pa la/ gsang ba ni sngar bstan pa'i zab pa nyid kyi dkyil 'khor te/ nyan thos la sogs pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la
155a5(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i phyir ro/ /'di nyid myur ba nyid du dman ba las skyob bas na sngags yin te/ gang gi phyir 'dir ni 'bras bu yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa de yang phun sum tshogs pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'bras bus rlobs nas/ chos
155a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag med pa dang bsres nas tshogs bdud rtsi rdzogs par gyur pas/ 'jig rten pa'i zhen pa dang snang ba myur? du nyams yin no/ /de yang rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bas rnal 'byor/ /'gor ba la dgongs pa'i ye shes khyad par can nges ldog pa yin
155a7(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /tshul 'dis bying pa yin par 'dod do/ /de yang gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed ces bya bas ni/ gsang sngags kyi lam de gsungs so/ /rnal 'byor bsgom pa las byung pa zhes pas/ lam de'i rgyun gsungs pa yin no/ /byed pa sems can
155b1(rgyud 'grel): kun don byed ces bya bas 'bras bu gsungs pa yin no/ /'di skad ston te/ yid dang ba 'am/ mthun pa'i gnas su snga dro la sogs pa'i dus gsum dang dam tshig nyams pa med par gdong bkru ba la sogs pa byas la/ stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ byang
155b2(rgyud 'grel): chub dang sems can la dmigs pa blos rang nyid kyi rgyun bshags bya'o/ /'di nyid la 'khor gsum dmigs pa med par chos thams cad lhag par mos par bya'o/ /de nas rang nyid dam tshig dang dbyibs su langs la/ h+ri dang hUM las lce rdo rjer phyin gyis brlab par
155b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /oM hUM a oM A(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas/ rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal/ /rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba zhes bya bar byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas rdo rje
155b4(rgyud 'grel): su tshur gnyis bcings la/ mthe bo mthe'u chung rdo rjer sbrel/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i ming brjod cing/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad slong pa'o/ /de'i mdza' nam mkha' i bdag po sna tshogs ston ces gsungs pas sems dang sems las byung ba'i dbyings dang rigs
155b5(rgyud 'grel): sdus pa'i des pa lnga dang/ ting nge 'dzin sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad dang/ mthong ba dang bsgom pa ni ngo bo nyid do/ /de nas rim pa phyi ma la/ dri ma dang dral ba'i sangs rgyas ral gri dang 'khor lo can/ /bdud 'dul bar ral gri dang
155b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can dang/ 'dod chags la ral gri dang pad+ma can dang/ spel du yod par ral gri dang/ rin po che dang/ rin chen po che dang/ sna tshogs par ral gri dang/ sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa dang/ bla ma dang slob dpon rnams dang/ dam tshig gi phyag rgyas btab pa pos gdul bya
155b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas gsum po blta bar bya'o/ /de nas brda rnams ni sku rdo rjer blta'o/ /mtshon cha rnams ni gsung rdo rjer blta'o/ /bdag nyid ni thugs su blta bar bya'o/ /de la brda ni ngo bo nyid do/ /mtshon pa ni mtshan nyid do/ /bdag ni rang bzhin gyis snying bskul bar
156a1(rgyud 'grel): byed pas na skad cig ma dang por rnal 'byor rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid la de dag nges par bsgom mo/ /chos thams cad rtogs pa'i mchog skyes nas slob ma rnams la bdag gi khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ /dad
156a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang mos pa dang/ nges par mchon pa brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bstod pa dang spro bsdu dang don rtogs pa rnams yin te/ de nas mthar yang rigs drug gi bdag nyid la rang la bsdus la ji skad bshad pa'i nang gi rnal 'byor ye shes gnas par byed pa
156a3(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bsgom par bya'o/ /de yang chos kyi dbyings dang sems can gyi don gyi phyir ro/ /de ltar thabs brjod nas/ lam 'di'i sa'i ngo bo brjod pas dman pa dag pa ni/ mkha' la dngos rnams ji ltar gnas bzhin du zhes bya ba ni dpe brjod pa
156a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po zhes gsungs pas sa la dang de'i khyab pa ni/ nam mkhas khyab cing de las ma g.yos pa'i phyir ro/ /rten cing 'brel ba sems dang sems las byung ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rnams ni 'od gsal ba'i
156a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes las byung zhing ma g.yos pas bems po dngos por thad chad pas ma yin no/ /de skad du yang/ lus med lus te lus kyi mchog /lus kyi mdza' ni rtags pa po/ /gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun tu ston zhes gsungs so/ /'di nyid dam
156a6(rgyud 'grel): tshig gi dkyil 'khor yang yin la/ phyag rgya chen po yang yin pas na/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te/ brnga dang mtshon pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang snying po len pa'i dkyil 'khor ni phyag rgya chen por gnas pas/ gzhan du mi 'byung gzhan la
156a7(rgyud 'grel): mi gnas te/ phyogs gzhan ni chad pa dang des pa po med pa'i phyir ro/ /ji skad du dpal mkha' 'gro ma gur las kyang/ thabs ni stong par ma bshad do/ /gal te stong yul thabs yin no/ /'bras bu rgyu las mi gzhan phyir/ /de ni sangs
156b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas nyid mi 'gyur/ /des na dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang/ /bde ba'i thabs su sdom pa'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /nges pa med par yang 'byung ba ma yin te/ dpal dam tshig bkod pa las kyang/ sems ni dri med par rtags na/ /dkyil 'khor thams
156b2(rgyud 'grel): cad 'byung 'gyur gyi/ /mkha' la rtog pa'i dri mar bcas/ /de srid bar du de mi snang zhes gsungs so/ /de ltar na 'gyur gyi phyogs gzhan yang mi 'gog ste/ des 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba zhes gsungs pas dkyil 'khor bdag med pa la thang chang
156b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ma yin zhe na/ don do mi shes dka' ba'i lam g.yeng bas 'khor ba'i dri gsum dag las g.ya ba min zhes bya ba ni/ gang yang rgyu 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni rjes su mthun par 'jug pa las thabs su 'os na ni 'dir mthun pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar ma
156b4(rgyud 'grel): yin na ni re zhig dbugs dbyung bar dgongs kyi/ bdag med pa la sogs pa las ldog pa ni nges pa'i lung dang rigs pas gnod pa'i phyir ro/ /gang 'di ltar snang ba ni bag chags kyi tshogs las byung gi /gang gi phyir sangs rgyas dang sems can
156b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba nyid du thal zhes bya'o/ /ji skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa las kyang shes rab dang bral ba'i thabs kyi yul ni bcings pa'o/ /thabs dang bral ba'i shes rab kyang bcings pa'o/ /de yang yod pa dang med pa ni rtag pa dang chang
156b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur bas/ mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po zhes bya ba yang mi 'grub pas/ don de mi shes pa ni sngar bstan pa dag mi shes pa'o/ /dka' ba'i lam ni g.yeng bas na yun ring ba nyid 'dod pa brtags pa la zhen pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa
156b7(rgyud 'grel): dang mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir yul dman pa dang zhen pa'i tshogs kyis gnas gsum gyi 'khrul 'khor bcu gnyis las mi g.yo ba dag go /'dir ni de gnyis nyams pa'i thabs dang shes rab phul du phyin
157a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pas lam chen po yin no/ /de yang snying rje yi ni ya lang bgos/ /shes rab ral gri mnga' gzhu thogs/ /nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sel zhe'o/ /de'i phyir rtogs
157a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa ni/ de lta'i don shes rab rang bzhin nyes pa'i tshogs bcom spos kyi glang po ke ta ka zos bzhin bcom ldan 'das gzhung tshogs yon tan thob/ /'gag pa med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhes bya ba la/ de lta'i
157a3(rgyud 'grel): don shes pa ni sngar bstan pa dang rtogs pa'o/ /rang bzhin nyes pa ni ma rig pa'i yul lo/ /de'i tshogs ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang srid pa'i cha'o/ /de 'joms pa na dpe'i brjod pa'o/ /de yang gzhi gcig la rtogs pas rdzas mi 'ching
157a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /'di ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ rtog pa'i yul gyis stong pa nyid ni gnyen po bcom pa'o/ /gnyen po dang mi mthun pa ni nus pa mnyam du zin pas/ thog ma dang mthar yul yod pa dang med pas phyo bas yul can yang 'thad pa'o/ /
157a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i tshogs ni rgyu med pa'i phyir mi skye ba'o/ /gnyis pa ni de'i thabs med par mi rung ba'i phyir ro/ /'dir ni 'phags pa dang mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i snang ba la grags pa dang sems las byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i kun rdzob 'joms
157a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /gzhung tshogs yon tan thob ces bya ba ni/ gdul bya 'jug pas gnas skabs pa'o/ /de'i mthar thug pa ni nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i nges pa la nam yang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa nas/ 'gag pa med pa'i chos
157a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal por 'gyur pa mthar thug pa ste/ dpal mchog dang po'i ngo bo nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin ma bcos pa nyid la bshad kyi/ gzhan du skye ba dang 'gag
157b1(rgyud 'grel): nga la sogs pa ni byas pa can nyid du 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir 'di la rgya'i rim pas byas pa med pas mthar 'gag pa yang med do/ /de skad du yang/ sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /gang yang dus kyi mthis?
157b2(rgyud 'grel): skad cig la chos thams cad khong du chud pa ni rgya yin la/ de'i rgyu ni sangs rgyas yin pas/ sangs rgyas thog ma dang ldan la mdza' ni med pa yin te/ de lta ma yin na lam la sogs pa'i 'bad pa bya mi dgos par 'gyur ro snyam na ni/ de yang 'di ltar shes par bya ste/
157b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas ni dbyings dang ye shes bya ba yin gyi/ dbyings dang bral ba'i ye shes ni gang gi ye shes kyang ma yin pas/ dbyings ni sngar brjod pa yin te/ gnas skabs kyi ye shes ni rtogs pa'i nges pa ste/ de ni thog ma tha ma gnyis par yang gyur pas lam
157b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dgos par smra ba de'i mthong bar byas pa ni thog ma'o/ /de'i yul mdza' dang bral bas yul yang mdza' med par rigs pa yin no/ /de'i phyir 'dir tha snyad gnyis kyis 'jug ste/ rgyu'i tha snyad ni ngo bo nyid de rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sogs pa mi 'gyur ba'i
157b5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin no/ /de'i rkyen ni thos pa la sogs pa'i de dang mthun par rjes su zhugs pa yin no/ /de dang de'i bdag nyid phrad pa ni/ 'bras bur yang tha dad btags kyang de'i yul las ngas pa po gzhan na med pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te gzhan du gyur pa ni nam yang de
157b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa ma yin te/ kun tu btags pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tha snyad ni rkyen gyis rnam par bzhag gi /nga la 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'i chos gang yang yong pa ma yin no/ /'di lta bu'i 'bras bu dang rjes su mthun pa'i lam de las
157b7(rgyud 'grel): byung ba gzhung tshogs du ma bshad pa'i mthar 'byung bas/ phyogs bcur dam pa'i chos kyi snang ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pa'i chos kyi rgyal por zhes bya ba dpal mchog dang po'i yul thog ma dang tha ma med pas yul can la dgongs pa'o/ /ma 'gags pa'i mi 'bad
158a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni bral ba'i rang bzhin gyi dbang gis 'byung ba ni rgyun chad pa yin pas/ rang gi dag pa'i ye shes mi 'gags pas 'di'i snang ba dang mdzad pa de 'dra'o/ /'di ni mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po/ /phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che/ /mthag med dbul??
158a2(rgyud 'grel): bzang dam pa ste/ /gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal/ /gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /de ltar lam gyi che ba brjod na/ brjod bya dang brjod pa'i khyab pa bstan pa'i phyir/ thugs kyi gsang mdzod gtsug na rin po che/ /
158a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro kun sems kyi rang bzhin zhes bya bas rim pa bzhin du 'bras bu dang lam dang ngo bo nyid la khyab par bstan to/ /thugs ni chos kyi dbyings la nges pa'i bdag nyid du thugs rdo rje'o/ /de ni gsang ba nyan thos la sogs pas mi rtogs pa'i don to/ /'di
158a4(rgyud 'grel): las dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i sgor gyur pas mdzod yin te/ ji skad du/ kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa/ /rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nyid gtsug na gnas pa'i rin po che ste/ lam gyi mthar thug pa'i stad? cig
158a5(rgyud 'grel): ma lus byung zhing de'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /lam de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyams su myong ba ste/ ji skad du/ tshig gi bdag pos tshigs su bcad/ /gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing zhes gsungs pas rtogs so/ /lam de nyid gang
158a6(rgyud 'grel): gis 'grub pa ni/ 'gro kun zhes pa ste/ 'gro ba ni nyon mongs pas der 'gro ba ste/ gang gi phyir rang bzhin zhes bya bas/ ngo bo nyid du gyur pas 'di rgyu'i don du bstan to/ /rang bzhin de yang gnas skabs gsum du rgyun mi 'chad pas sems zhes
158a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de yang dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med pa/ /sangs rgyas thog ma med ces gsungs so/ /de ltar brjod bya'i khyab pa bstan nas brjod pa'i khyab pa ni/ chos rnams lung zhes bya ba dang/ rgyud kun zhes bya'o/ /chos rnams ni rnam par bkod pa'i chos
158b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams te/ bstan pa'i chos rnams dang de las gzhan pa'o/ /de la bstan pa'i chos gsung rab yan lag rnams so/ /de las gzhan pa ni sngar bstan pa dang bsgrub pa la sogs pa'o/ /de skad du/ dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan/ /'jig
158b2(rgyud 'grel): rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog /chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal/ /legs pa'i lam ni ston pa po zhes pa dang/ 'phags lam shin tu mthol gnas/ /dar ba chen po chos kyi tog /ces bya ba dang/ pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa/ /sa rnams
158b3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi rgyan dang ldan/ /rnam par dag pa bdag med chos/ /zhes bshad pa'o/ /rgyud kun gyi ni bya ba dang/ spyod pa dang/ rnal 'byor dang/ bla ma'i rgyud do/ /ji skad du/ brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba che/ /rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog /ces bya bas/ bdag
158b4(rgyud 'grel): po ni de'i nges pa'i ye shes so/ /de bas de rnams kyi dbang po ni nges pa'o/ /rdo rje tshig tu bzhag ces bya ba ni/ gang mi gsal ba dang/ tshig rnams kyi dgos pa rgya che ba de la de skad ces bya'o/ /'o na de rnams gang las rtogs te bshad pa ni/
158b5(rgyud 'grel): zab cing rgya che rgyud kyi dgongs 'grel dang/ /de'i man ngag nye bar bsdus nas bshad ces bya ba la/ zab cing rgya che'i rgyud ni gsung rab 'di nyid do/ /de'i dgongs pa'i don 'grel bzhi de'i man ngag las byung ba dang/ don nye bar bsdus te bshad pa ni
158b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dir nye bar bsdus pa'i bshad sbyar mdzad pa'o/ /tshul gang gis ched du gang mdzad pa ni/ /de lta'i lam ni mkhan pa'i rjes 'brangs pas nye bar spyod rnams la ni bsdus don byas pa yin zhes bya ba la/ de lta'i lam zhes pa ni/ sngar bstan pa'i
158b7(rgyud 'grel): zab pa dang rgya che ba'i don bsdus par gyur pa des so/ /de yang gang zhig 'grel pa rtsom pa por gyur pas de dang mthun par dbyings dang ming rnams so/ /rim par bkod nas byas pa ni/ mkhan po'i rjes 'brengs pa'o/ /nyer 'byor rnams la zhes bya
159a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ rgyud 'di la nus pa'i sgo nas nyams pa med par tshig dang don 'chad pa dang/ bsam pa dang/ bklag par 'dod pa'i don du'o/ /bsdus te byas pa yin zhes bya ba ni/ de yang dam tshig mang po'i sgo nas spangs par gyur
159a2(rgyud 'grel): nas bsdus pa'am/ yang na dngos grub nye bar 'dod pa la sogs pa dang/ dam tshig dang ldan par sgrub pa'i las rnams thams cad 'dis 'grub par 'gyur bas/ zab pa dang rgya che ba ni theg pa chen po'i 'jug pa ste/ de dag bsdus pa'i dngos grub
159a3(rgyud 'grel): ni zab cing rgya che ba'i yul der bsdus pa'i don gyi sgrub thabs brtsams pa yin no/ /zab cing rgya che gang gis rtogs 'gyur ba/ /mgon po ri bo la gnas nye zer dbang/ /mkhan po'i rjes mthun nye bar bsdus pa sbyar/ /dgos don de yi man ngag
159a4(rgyud 'grel): shin tu bsdus/ shing rta chen po rgya mtsho chen po nas/ /blo yul man ngag chu yis snyim pa gang/ /rnyed pa cung zad rnam par bkrol ba yi/ /bzhad pa'i rdo rje'i don rtogs ldan par shog /dpal mi tri pas mdzad pa nye bar bsdus shing/ zab cing rgya che
159a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'grel pa/ mkhas pa chen po dril bu pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu sh+rI satwa dang/ dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// //'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs bzhug
159a6(rgyud 'grel): go// //rgya gar skad du/ sArya many+dzu sh+rI nA ma saM gI ti sAd+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs/ /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan ye shes mchog gi
159a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog gyur ba'i/ /bde ba'i stobs kyis bde ba'i ro myang ba'i/ /rang gi rgyud gsum dag pa'i 'jam dpal de la 'dud/ /'jam dpal mtshan ni brjod pa yi/ /gzhung lugs thob par gyur pa yi/ /yongs bsdus sgrub thabs gsal bar bsdebs/ /
159b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i gzhung bdag gis bshad par bya/ /shes rab snying rjer ldan pa yi/ /zab mo'i don la dgongs pa yis/ /theg chen sngags pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /yid dga' ba yi gnas nyid du/ /bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste/ /snying khar nyid dkyil a bsams la/
159b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od phyung 'phags pa bla mar bcas/ /yid kyi mdun du spyan drangs la/ /maN+Dal mchod pa phul byas la/ /gsum la skyabs su gsol ba dang/ /sdig pa ma lus bshags pa dang/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/ /de yang rgyud las/ dpal ldan pad+ma sangs
159b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas skyes/ /tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa po/ /rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can/ /bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan mchog /rdo rje dregs pa rdo rje'i snying/ rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che/ /rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung/ /kha dog
159b4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas/ /bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog /sems can kun gyi yid ltar 'gyogs/ /dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin/ /mchod cing brjod pa drang srong che/ /gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa/ /dag

159b6(rgyud 'grel): lag pa brgyas gang la/ /gdung ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin/ /phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed pa'o/ /oM many+dzu sh+rI kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT/ b+he ro ha na ra da ha ra/ pa tsa ra sarba mu ka badzra kharga chod rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ces brjod pas
159b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cha dpag tu med pas mtshams bcad do/ /de nas oM shUn+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA pA b+hA pA at+ma ka haM zhes brjod pas stong par bsam/ snying kha'i sa bon las byung ba'i/ /'byung ba lnga'i yi ge rang bzhin chad do/ /e/ e/ baM/ raM/ laM/ nam mkha' rlung chu ri
160a1(rgyud 'grel): rab me dang bcas/ /de stengs pad+ma'i lte ba la/ b+hAM las ye shes gzhal yas khang/ /pho brang pad+ma 'khor lor bcas/ /gru chad sgo bzhi mu khyud ldan/ /rgyud las/ stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo/ /rdo rje snying po mkha'

160a4(rgyud 'grel): dar lcags kyu rdo rje g.yas/ /po ti gzhu dang zhags pa pad+ma g.yon/ /gzhon nu mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /kha dog lnga ldan 'od kyi dbus/ /rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs pa la/ /thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo'i dbus/ /nyi ma'i steng na ral gri a

160b1(rgyud 'grel): kha'i dkyil ltar mdzes/ /gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas de'i thugs ka ru/ /oM las gyur ba'i rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /sku mdog dkar ba'i rang bzhin la/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /dang po ral gri po ta 'on/?

160b4(rgyud 'grel): dog? zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /g.yas g.yon kun gyi dang po 'dre/ /tha ma mchog sbyin rin po che/ /nub tu h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las snang ba mdza' yas ni/ /dmar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /mnyam gzhag phyag rgya pad+ma bsnams/ /byang du ha las gyur pa'i don yod
160b5(rgyud 'grel): grub pa ni/ /ljang khu zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /khu tshur phyag na rgya gram bsnams/ /kun la rin chen sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ /gnas gsum 'bru gsum byin gyis brlab/ /zhabs ni rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
160b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /A li yongs su gyur pa las/ /nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs su/ /yab kyi thugs ka a yi 'phro 'du las/ i A u a'u/ e i o aau 'phros/ /dbyangs yig 'od du zhu ba las/ /chos 'khor rim bzhin bskor bar bya/ /kun tu bzang po nam mkha' i
160b7(rgyud 'grel): snying po dang/ /'jam dpal sa yi snying po dang/ /spyan ras gzigs dang sgrib pa sel/ /phyag na rdo rje byams pa'o/ /'khor lo pi waM utpa la/ /dud phor pad+ma rin chen dang/ /myu gu rdo rje bum pa'o/ /g.yon pa thams cad mchog sbyin no/ /rin chen phreng ba'i
161a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyis brgyan/ /gdan la bzhugs shing 'gying pa'i tshul/ /rgyud las gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rnam shes brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i
161a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od/ /dpal ldan blo dang sgeg par ldan zhes gsungs so/ /phyogs kyi sgo bzhir bsgom pa ni/ /gtso bo'i thugs ka'i 'phro 'du las/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): bzhi 'phros pas/ /'od zhu 'phros zhing 'dus pa las/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril
161a3(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog rang rang phyogs dang mthun/ /rgyud las/ rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che/ /'dzin pa chen po rdo rje'i zhags/ /'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas thugs ka'i sa bon a las 'od 'phros ye shes 'khor lo dgug gzhug phya/
161a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs la/ /a A sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsi t+tA b+hi Shi ny+tsa hUM traM h+ri haM oM/ zhes dbang bskur bar bya/ rgyud las/ sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med/ /ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can zhes gsungs/ /de nas snying po bzlas pa bya/ /thugs
161a5(rgyud 'grel): ka shes rab 'khor lo la/ /de dbus lte ba'i 'khor lo la/ /sngags 'phreng me tog dkyus pa ltar/ /de la dmigs te bzlas par bya/ /oM bA gI shwa ri muM/ oM badzra ti k+Sha du(rgyud 'grel): kha tshed/ pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na mU rta ye/ dz+nya na kA ya bA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa na ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): a
161a6(rgyud 'grel): A sarbA tA thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM h+rI b+ha ga bA na/ dz+nyA na mU rti/ bA gi shwa ra/ ma hA pA tsa/ sarba d+ha rmA ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri shu d+ha/ d+ha rmla d+hA tu dz+nyA na ga rb+ha a:/ de yang rgyud las/ 'od bzangs 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u/ /'od chen rnam par snang bar
161a7(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /gzi brjid phreng ba blta na sdug /gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /de nas mchod pa rgyas pa dbul/ a A sa rbA ta thA ga ta d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha pa Na sa ma ye hUM/ puShpaM/ A lo ke/ gan d+he/ nai bi tye/ shabde/
161b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las/ mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar byed/ /ces pa la sogs pa dug lnga rang grol gyi mchod pa'o/ /oM badzra gAM ti hUM/ oM badzra nre tye hUM/ oM badzra mA le traM/ oM badzra lA sye h+ri/ de yang rgyud las/ mchod cing brjod pa dang gro? che
161b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs so/ /de nas mchod 'os bstong 'os phyag gi gnas/ /zhes pas bstong nge/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/ /gdong lnga zur phung lnga dang ldan/ /lag pa brgya pos kun bskyod cing/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs
161b3(rgyud 'grel): 'chang/ /goms pa'i stabs kyis bar byed pa/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/ /rnam snang gtso la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rigs lnga la 'dud kyi bstod pa bya'o/ /'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /ming ni
161b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag brjod pa mchog /'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /gzhon nu'i sku lus 'chang ba po/ /ye shes sgron mes rab gsal zhing/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel pa/ /'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /nyid kyi 'dab bzangs tshogs kyis ni/ /
161b5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba rgyas pa zil gnon cing/ /rig pa rnam par gsal bsgyur la/ /'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /ma bgyis zur phung gsal ba la/ /nor bu 'bar ba'i sku mnga' zhing/ /nyid ni kun tu dga' ba'i sku/ /'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /
161b6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi 'dra zhing 'jam la zab/ /yid dang gsung gi sgra sgrogs pa/ /dam pa chos kyi rin chen mdzod/ /'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /gangs kyi chu ltar gdangs gsal ba/ /'jig rten khams na rnam par bzhugs/ /nyon mongs dri ma rab spangs pa/ /'jam
161b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /mche ba gtsigs dang bsgyings pa yis/ /'jigs pa'i sku yi tshul gyis ni/ /ya ma'i dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa/ /'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dung/ /rang gi spyan dang mdangs 'dra ba/ /u tpal sngon po rab mdzes pa/ /
162a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu 'dzin/ /'jam dpal de la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ /rgya cher bstong pa rab bstod pa/ /'gro ba'i lam ni ston pa po/ /'jam dpal ril phyag 'tshal
162a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dud/ /de nas sems dpa' brgyad la bstod/ /mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba/ /mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang/ /'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa/ /kun tu bzang po khyod la 'dud/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs chen ldan/ /nam mkha' i bdag po sna
162a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ston/ /nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba/ /nam mkha' i snying po khyod la 'dud/ /shes rab chen po blo chen ldan/ /shes rab ye shes me bo che/ /shes rab chen po skad cig la/ /'jam dpal shes rab khyod la 'dud/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po chi re?
162a4(rgyud 'grel): grags pa/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs dang ldan/ /sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin/ /sa yi snying po khyod la 'dud/ /snying rje chen po blo yi mchog /snying rje che dang shes rab dang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang khyod la 'dud/ /
162a5(rgyud 'grel): shugs chen 'gyogs pa chen po ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs/ /rgyal ba rnam rgyal dgra las rgyal/ /sgrib pa sel ba khyod la 'dud/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po/ /stobs po che la thabs che ba/ /smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho
162a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /phyag na rdo rje khyod la 'dud/ /byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med/ /byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste/ /byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can/ /dpal ldan byams pa khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa cha/ /'dzin pa chen po rdo rje
162a7(rgyud 'grel): zhags/ /'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba/ /ye shes sgo ma khyed la 'dud/ /rdo rje sa twa sa twa che/ /rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa che/ /rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /rdo rje dang po kun tu bzang/ /phyag 'tshal phyag na rdo rje la'o/ /rdo rje rgyal po sangs rgyas
162b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog /rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gshegs/ /nges pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog /phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'gugs khyod la'o/ /rdo rje chags pa bde ba che/ /rdo rje mda' ni dbang byed pa/ /bdud kyi 'dod pa rdo rje che/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje gzhu khyod la'o/ /rdo rje legs
162b2(rgyud 'grel): bde ba che/ /rdo rje mgu ba dga' ba che/ /rab dgyes rgyal ba bud d+ha mchog /phyag 'tshal rdo rje dgyes pa la/ /rdo rje rin chen rdo rje'i don/ /rdo rje nam mkha' nor bu che/ /nam mkha' i snying po rdo rje phyug /phyag 'tshal rdo rje rin chen la'o/ /rdo rje gzi brjid cher 'bar
162b3(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /rdo rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid che/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'ong khyod la'o/ /rdo rje don rab rdo rje dpal/ /rdo rje rgyal mchen rab dga' byed/ /rdo rje chen po rin chen tog /phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpal khyod la'o/ /rdo rje bzhad pa bzhad pa che/
162b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzum pa ngo mtshar che/ /dga' zhing rab dga' rdo rje ston/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje dga' ba la'o/ /rdo rje chos rab de bzhin don/ /rdo rje pad+ma rab dga' byed/ /rdo rje dbang rab rdo rje'i spyan/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje spyan khyod la'o/ /rdo rje rno ba theg pa che
162b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ral gri mtshon chen po/ /'jam dpal rdo rje rab tu zab/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje blo sas la'o/ /rdo rje rgyu dang snying po che/ /rdo rje 'khor lo tshul chen po/ /dpang skor rdo rje las byung ba/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying khyod la'o/ /rdo rje gsung ba rang rig mchog /
162b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bzlas pa rang 'grub phyir/ /mi gsung rdo rje mchog bsgrubs pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje gsung khyod la'o/ /rdo rje las rab rdo rje bka' / /las kyi rdo rje kun rab 'gro/ /rdo rje nges pa rgya che ba/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje rgya gram la'o/ /rdo rje sku ni brtan pa che/
162b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje go cha sra ba ste/ /brtson 'grus mchog ste dka' thub che/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus la'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs chen po/ /rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa che/ /bdud 'joms rdo rje mi zad pa/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje drag po la'o/ /rdo rje mtshams sbyong?
163a1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'dud/ /rdo rje bcings pa rab grol cing/ /phyag 'tshal rdo rje gnyis med la'o/ /lhag cad yi ge brgya bas bshags/ /a ti gats+tsha mu bshags/ /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'das/ /'gro pham? lus 'dren par shor/ /
163a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs zhi ba 'od kyi rim pa zhes bya brdzogs so// //sdom pa bzang po'i thugs dam/ lo tsA ba da mra b+his bsgyur ba'o// //'jam dpal khro bo'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so// /
163a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ many+dzu sh+rI kro d+ha sA dta nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal khro bo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdug pa'i tshogs rnams thams cad 'joms mdzad de/ /
163a4(rgyud 'grel): bdud kyi snying khar zhabs kyis gnon mdzad de/ /bcom ldan gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs bshad/ /dad pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yis/ /rten gyi gang zag tho rangs langs/ /snying khar nyi dkyil hUM bsams te/ /de las 'od zer lcags
163a5(rgyud 'grel): kyu 'phros/ /'jam dpal gshin rje gshed nyid dang/ /bla ma sangs rgyas spyan drangs la/ /maN+Dal mchod pas mnyes par byas/ /yan lag bdun pas mchod pa bya/ /thugs kar hUM gi 'phro 'du las/ /rdo rje shugs can spros te mtshams
163a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang bcad/ /de nas oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA pa A t+ma ko haM/ zhes brjod stong pa'i rang las na/ /hUM nyid nam mkha' i dbyings su bsgem/ /de las byung ba'i yig 'bru chad/ /de steng b+h+rUM gyi 'phro 'du las/ /pho drang rgya gram 'khor lor
163a7(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ /gzhal yas sgo bzhi rdzogs par bskyed/ /a yaM baM laM raM bruM zhes pa'o/ /de steng nyi zla pad+ma dang/ /dregs pa ma he'i gdan la bzhugs/ /hUM las 'jam pa'i rdo rje bsam/ /de zhu gshin rje gshed du kyur/ /zhal drug pa lu
163b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag bcu gnyis/ /sku mdog nag po nam mkha' i mdangs/ /g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dung kha'o/ /steng du zhal nyid ser po'o/ /g.yas pa gri gug ral gri mda'/ /'khor lo tri shU rtse gsum mdung/ /g.yon na thong pa phub dang gzhu/ /be con
163b2(rgyud 'grel): mgo bo sdigs mdzub zhags/ /glang stag zhing chen sbrul gyis brgyan/ /rgyal thong bram snyan rje 'gur rmang rigs lhug /thod skam dbu brgyan thong rlon don shal byas/ /skra kham rno sdug mche ba rab gtsigs shing/ /zhal nas ha la'i sgra sgrogs
163b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs par byed/ /bskal pa'i me dpung dus mdza' i me ltar 'bar/ /zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum gyang kyi dor stabs bzhugs/ /nyi zla pad+ma dregs pa pho mo dang/ /ma he sngo nag brjid pa'i gdan la 'jigs tshul bzhugs/ /pi las bskyed
163b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yul nyid ni/ /g.yas pa gri gug yab la 'khyud/ /g.yon pa thong khrag gtso la stob/ /gnyis med 'khyil pa'i tshul du gnas/ /pho brang rdo rje rgya gram la/ /yab yum gnyis med sbyor mtshams nas/ /shar du k+She las gyur pas dkar
163b5(rgyud 'grel): lho ru ma las gyur pas ser/ /nub tu me las gyur pas dmar/ /byang du nga las gyur pas ljang/ /thams cad zhal gsum phyag kyang drug /gti mug nga rgyal gshin rje gshed/ /'dod chags phra dogs gshin rje gshed/ /rgyan dang cha
163b6(rgyud 'grel): lugs gtso dang mthun/ /phyi rol gyi ni rtsibs bcu las/ /sbyor ba'i mtshams nas hUM bcu 'phros/ /'phros shing 'dus pas hUM bcur gyur/ /shar du shes rab mthar byed la/ /lho ru gshin rje mthar byed do/ /nub du pad+ma mthar byed ngo/ /
163b7(rgyud 'grel): byang du bgegs ni mthar byed do/ /shar lhor du byug pa sngon po la/ /lto nub mi g.yo mgon po'o/ /nub byang 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste/ /byang shar khro po gnod mdzes so/ /steng du hUM mthang 'og tu stobs po he/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis thams
164a1(rgyud 'grel): cad mthing/ /g.yas pa sna tshogs g.yon pa sdigs mdzub bsgreng/ /brkyang bskum dur khrod chas kyis brgyan/ /bskal pa'i me 'bar dregs pa'i gdan la bzhugs/ /sbyor mtshams dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): las(rgyud 'grel): sgo ba bzhi(rgyud 'grel): mas rims
164a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bskyed/ /thugs khar shes rab 'khor lo hUM/ /ye shes gsum gyis gnas gsum brlab/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa/ ye shes khro bo dgug gzhug bya/ /de nas bzlas pa'i rim pa ni/ /oM ya ma rA dza sa da me ya/ /ya me do ru Na yong
164a3(rgyud 'grel): ya/ yang yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ya k+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ ya ta ya ta rtsa sngags so/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+Ti(rgyud 'grel): wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT/ snying po'o/ /oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT/ yang snying ngo/ /oM dwa Sha ra ti mu ta hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /rje btsun ma'i 'o/ /da yang rgyud
164a4(rgyud 'grel): las/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs/ /mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan/ /rkong ru mche ba gtsigs pa po/ /skra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste/ /mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i ming/ /lus ni rdo rje'i bsrung can/ /khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs
164a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ /rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don/ /khro gnyer rim pa ldan la sogs/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che/ /'jigs pa chen po rdo rje zhags/ /'jam dbyangs chen po sgra che ba/ /gang chen ha ha zhes sgrogs pa/ /glang chen ko rlon gos
164a6(rgyud 'grel): su gyon/ /gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal/ /rigs gsum 'chang ba gsang sngags 'chang zhes gsungs so/ /de nas gtor ma dbul ba ni/ /yaM dang raM gyis me rlung bskyod/ /kaM gsum sgyed po a las thod pa'i snod/ /go ku
164a7(rgyud 'grel): da ha na bi mur su khaM/ dam rdzas bcu sbyar a las zla ba'i khabs/ /hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): 'i 'phro 'dus bdud rtsi bsrungs/ /oM sarba d+ha rmA d+hA ba swa btA ba bi shu d+d+ho haM/ zhes brjod pas skyon rnams dag par bsam/ /'bru gsum pa yis byin gyis brlab/ /a
164b1(rgyud 'grel): A sarba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM hUm h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bAM/ dz+nya na kA ya bA gI shwa ra/ ma ha pa tsaM many+dzu sh+rI pa ri shud+d+he i daM ba liM gri tna gri tna/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ de nas stod de/ hUM chos nyid zhi ba'i dang las ma g.yos kyang/ gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bo'i
164b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su bstan/ /bai DU rya yi mdog 'dra sku mnga' zhing/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir 'jigs byed sku la bstod/ /shin tu khro zhing gnag pa ma he'i zhal/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal bzhi 'jigs pa'i zha la/ /steng zhal gtsigs pa'i zhal ni shin tu
164b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khrug /zhal drug spyan gsum 'jigs byeng zhal la 'dud/ /g.yas kyi phyag drug mtshon cha gri gug dang/ /ral gri mnga' dang 'khor lo tri shul mdung/ /g.yon na grong pa phur gzhu be con mgo bo bsnams/ /bsdigs pa'i mtshon cha 'jigs byed
164b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod/ /brkyang bskum tshul gyis zhabs bzhi thur du bgrang/ /ma he sngo nag brdzis pa'i gdan la bzhugs/ /'jigs byed stobs ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /glang stag zhing chen sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /rus pa'i rgyan cha drug
164b5(rgyud 'grel): ni dbang du 'khrol/ /thod skams dbu brgyan thong rlon ngo shal byas/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyan la rab tu bstod/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes/ /rne gdug mche ba rang tu gtsigs/ /ha ha zhes bzhad srid gsum zil gyis mnon/ /pheM gyi sgra sgrogs
164b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po khyed la bstod/ /bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas/ /zhe spang rdo rje'i 'od zer tshe tshe 'phro/ /bdud dang dgra bgegs ma lus bskrag par byed/ /ma lus dbang du bdud la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mun nag lta bu'i sku brjid cing/ /nyi ma 'bum gyi
164b7(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid can/ /gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams/ /bdud 'dul khro bo'i rgyal po khyed la bstod/ /hUM dmar nyi ma'i 'od 'phre ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis mdzes pa'i sku/ /g.yas pa gri gug yab la 'khyud/ /g.yon pa thod khrag gtso la stob/ /
165a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum me stag rab tu 'phro/ /zhal nas ha ha nges par sgrogs/ /dbu skra dmar ser rab tu 'bar/ /phag mo yum la phyag 'tshal bstong/ /hUM gti mug nga rgyal gshin rje gshed/ /'dod chags phrag dog gshin rje gshed/ /dbu
165a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrang/ /gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin/ /glang stag zhing chen rgyan gyis brgyan/ /thong pa'i do shal rgyan drug ldan/ /sku la me 'bar gdug pa 'dul/ /gshed po bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mid ge bcu

165a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /'jigs byed bcu la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /hUM ye shes rnam bzhi yang dag rtogs/ /g.yon pa thod pa kha TwAM ga/ rgyan dang lnga bcus sku la brgyan/ /brkyang bskum ha ha zil gyis mnon/ /lcags kyu ma dang zhags pa mo/ /
165a5(rgyud 'grel): lu gu rgyud dang 'bebs pa mo/ /mkha' 'gro bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /lhag ba chad yi ge brgya pas bshags/ /de nas mjug bsdu ba ni/ hUM zhes pa yi sgra brjod de/ /gcig gi ngang la yab la bsdu/ /yab nyid 'od du zhu las hUM/ /hUM de
165a6(rgyud 'grel): rim gyes nu ba las/ /zag med bde ba'i dang la gnas/ /rtag pa'i mdza' las grol par 'gyur/ /rdo rje skad cig lhar bsgoms la/ /sngags kyi 'khor lo rab brjod pas/ /chad pa'i mdza' las grol bar 'gyur/ /de nas spyod lam
165a7(rgyud 'grel): ci bder gnas/ /'jam dpal khro bo'i sgrub thabs rdo rje 'od kyi rim pa zhes bya pa/ bla ma sdom pa bzang po'i thugs dam/ bla ma'o tsA bar dang ma b+hi yis bsgyur ba'o/ /rdzogs so// //skyabs 'gro sems bskyid dbang bzhi'i gdams ba slob dpor?
165b1(rgyud 'grel): sdom ba bzang pos mdzad pa bzhugs se// //bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shA kya thub pas gsungs pa'i 'jam dpal mtshan brjod 'di la zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis las/ 'di rgya che ba'i man dag go /don brgyad las 'di man
165b2(rgyud 'grel): dag gi sa'o/ /de la rim gyis pa dang cig car ba las 'di rim gyis pa'i sa'o/ /de la bum pa'i dbang gi dus su/ rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas/ de yang/ sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhi yi khyon zer/ /de la brten nas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
165b3(rgyud 'grel): bstan te/ smon 'jug gnyis kyis zlob ma las la 'jug pa'i dus su/ ri yi phug gam chu 'gram mam/ /lha khang mchod rten dben sa dang/ /dur khrod gnas dang shing drung du/ /de la sogs te gnas yid du 'ong bar/ slong dpon stan bde ba la
165b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dug ste/ bsam gtan la gnas par bya'o/ /rgyud nas/ /bsam gtan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gnas gsung ngo/ /de nas rang 'jam dpal du bskoms la/ ched med pa bzhi bsgom/ de'i rjes la/ a A sarbA ta thA ga/ h+ri da ya/ ha ra ha ra/ oM
165b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bA na/ dz+nyA na lu rti/ bA gI shwa ra/ ma hA pa ces sarba d+ha rmA ga ga nA ma la su pa ri shu d+d+ha d+ha rmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na garb+ha a(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas bdag dang lcang srang stong par bsam/ /de'i dang las bdag gshin rje gshed du bsgoms la/ sa snang ba la bslang ba dang/ /
165b6(rgyud 'grel): mi sning ba la/ bslang ba dang/ bgegs bskrad pa dang/ sa sbyang pa dang/ sa gzung ba dang/ mchod gtor gyis mnyes par bya ba dang/ klog 'don bya ba dang/ sngon 'gro rnams bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sta gon ni bdud rtsi chus chag chag btab la/ gnam
165b7(rgyud 'grel): thig gdab pa dang/ sa thig gdab pa dang/ chon bying yis brlab pa dang/ bri ba la 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas lha dang bum pa'i sta gon bya ste/ bum par? po nag po ra ri spangs pa la ras kha tshar ma nyams pa'i mgul chings byas la phyag rgya lnga yang
166a1(rgyud 'grel): gdags/ de la sogs pa'i yo byad rgyas par bsog /de ni bum pa'i sta gon no/ /de nas rnal 'byor pa sta gon la gnas par bya ste/ sbyi'i khrus dang ldan par bya/ /sdig bshags bya skabs 'gro byas la/ slob dpon 'jam dpal
166a2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bya'o/ /de ni slob dpon gyi sta gon no/ /slob ma ma'i sta gon ni phyir khrus byas la/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bar chod bsrung ba'i phyir sung skung gdags pa dang/ dpa' bo 'bru gsum
166a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /de ni slob ma'i ste gon no/ /bar der zhi ba'i sbyin sreg rgyas par bya'o/ /dbang thob pa dang ma thob pa gnyis su shes par bya'o/ /dbang thob na sems skyed bya mi dgos/ ma slob na sems bskyed bya/ /gnyis pa la 'jug/
166a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum ba la rdzogs par bya'o/ /de yang gsum rigs gtsang ma dag pa ste gsung/ dbang thob pa yin na bum pa gcig la dbang bzhi stan thog tu bskur/ /byin brlabs brtan par bya ba'i phyir slob dpon la yon dbul lo/ /de'i cho ga ni dang po kha nas
166a5(rgyud 'grel): sa bslad ste/ sa bdag lha klu 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /sa yi dmigs dang ne'u gsing lu ma rnams/ /rdzing dang lteng ka so so'i gnas rnams nas/ /sa bdag klu gnyan ste dang 'khor du bcas/ /sa yi lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /
166a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'dir sbyan 'dren ched kyis gra shegs su gsol/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i sa bslang phyir/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ /rin chen gser gyi sa gzhi bslang du gsol/ /lag pa g.yas pas la brdabs
166a7(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /sa gas ba'i ser ga nas sa'i lha mo ro stong snyengs der gyur nas/ /lag pa g.yas pa khas len gyi phyag /g.yon pa bum pa bsnams pa de ltar byon par bsam/ /de la gtor ma dang me tog dri zhim pos mchod la/ /'dod pa'i
166b1(rgyud 'grel): don la gsol ba btab ste/ sngon bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas srod la bdud btul/ tho rangs mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la/ yangs gzhi rin po che 'di'i steng du mdzad pa lag pas/ rnal 'byor pa che ge mo zhes bgyi ba la sogs pa ?
166b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i rten 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' pho brad 'debs par 'tshal bas sa'i lha mo 'khor dang bcas pas sa bdag klu gnyan kun/ sa rin du rin po ches brgyan pa'i gter ma 'di bzhes pa/ dang po dge sbyor dbu bzur
166b3(rgyud 'grel): ba nas/ tha ma rdzogs pa mthar phyin phyin du sa gnas 'di bdag g.yas lags pas/ sa 'di brtan pa dang bkra shis par mdzad du gsol lo/ /zhes brjod la gtor ma sbyin/ /de'i cho ga 'di skad do/ /hUM skyob pa sangs rgyas rin po che/ /sa dang pha
166b4(rgyud 'grel): rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo 'khor bcas dbang du gyur/ /shAkya thub pa skyob pa yis/ /bdud kyi sde rnams bcom pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud rnams gzhom/ /pham par byed de dkyil 'khor bri/ /lha mo de de nyid du thim par bsom
166b5(rgyud 'grel): de ni sa bslar ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas bdag nyid 'jam dpal du gsal bar bsgoms la/ /de nas rdo rje gsor dri la bu gsil zhing/ rdo rje 'gros kyis bskor zhing sa gzhi gzung ngo/ /de nas bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsdad de/ las
166b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad pa'i sdags 'jod cing sdang mig phyogs bcur blta/ rdo rje nam mkha' la gsor zhing mtshams bcad do/ /de nas dri sna tshogs dang spos ki chus sbyar la lag tu thogs la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs la 'di
166b7(rgyud 'grel): skad do/ /hUM bcom ldan ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag po ste/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ /dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /de dag slob mar bcas pa dang/ /mgon po bdag ni 'byung bar
167a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal/ /las thams cad pa'i sngags kyi dri'i chus byug go/ bdag gi thugs gar thig skud kyi sna gcig gzung/ slob ma de phyag na rdo rjer gsal btab la/ thig skud de lte ba 'khung du gzung la/ hUM nam mkha' gang ba'i bsod ldan
167a2(rgyud 'grel): 'das/ /khyed kyis sems can 'gro don mdzad/ /las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis thig gdab po/ /thig skud kyi sgra yis bde bar gshegs ba'i thugs dam bskul nas sems can gyi don mdzad bar bsam mo/ /de ni sa tshon byin gyis brlab ste/ oM
167a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM sa hI ta bris la rigs lnga'i dgug gzhug bya'o/ /de zhu bas rin po che lnga'i phye mar gyur nas/ /des bris te g.yon pas de nas pad+ma'i gdan la a ri dgong/ /de las lha'i 'phro 'du dang bskyed pa gzhan nas gsal lo/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po 'dram
167a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bla ma sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //da ni smon 'jug gnyis dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed bya ste/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag mid 'di zhes bgyi ba skye ba nas de ltar
167a5(rgyud 'grel): lus 'di blangs pa tshun chun chad mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa dang/ bgyid du snal ba dang/ bgyid ba la rjes su yi rang ba rnams/ /bla ma dkon mchog yi dam mkha' 'gro'i sbyan sdar ma thol lo bshags so/ /da ni skyabs su 'gro ste/ /bdag mid 'di
167a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bgyi ba snying po byang chub la thug gi bar du/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su mcho'o/ /chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de ni sngom pa bzung ste/ bla ma dkon mchog gi sbyan sdar/ /sangs
167a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni gslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sgud pa dang/ /sems can dom byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis rtag par gzung bar bgyi/ /de na smon pa'i sems bskyed do/ /da ni 'dug par bya ste/
167b1(rgyud 'grel): dang po bshags pa bya sta/ /bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag mid 'di zhes bgyi pas skye ba thog ma mdo pa nas da lta'i lus 'di blangs pa yan chad du mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa dang/ bgyid du scal ba dang/ gzhan bgyil de
167b2(rgyud 'grel): la rjes su yi rang ba rnams/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gre rnams kyi spyan sdar mthol lo bshags so/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snying po byang chub la sbug gi bar du bla ma la skyabs su mca'o/ /yi dam la skyabs su mchi'o/ /mkha' 'gro la skyabs su mchi'o/ /
167b3(rgyud 'grel): din sdom pa bzung bar bya ste/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi gtong do/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yis/ /rdo rje drel bu phyag yang/ /yang dag nyid
167b4(rgyud 'grel): du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du dus drug du/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag
167b5(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ phyi nang gsang pe theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar pa gyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang gnyid du gzung bar bgyi/ mchod pa'i las kyang ca nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni
167b6(rgyud 'grel): ba na med/ /dam bra bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sngom ba ma lus bzung/ /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrod/ ma bsgral ba rnams da dag gis bsgral/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung
167b7(rgyud 'grel): shid/ /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /ces 'jug 'o/ /nub dang po la smon 'jug gi sems bskyed do/ /so shing dang la rang ra'i rmi lam brtag go/ /de nas dbang bskur bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i dus su bzlas pa bya ba ni/ oM bA gI shA riM mu/ /
168a1(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra ti k+Sha du(rgyud 'grel): khats+tshed pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye/ dz+nya na kA ya bA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa na a ho na ma(rgyud 'grel): a A sarba ta thA la sogs pa las thams cad pa'i bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya'o/ /nub gnyis pa la byang chub lam du dra ba ni/
168a2(rgyud 'grel): mig ras kyis bkab la lag tu me tog thogs la/ sga'i phyi logs su bzhig la/ slob dpon kyis 'di skad brjod do/ /skal ldan rigs kyi bu mchog khyed/ /dad dang mos pa ci la dga' zhes lan gsum brjod pas/ slob mas 'di skad brjod/ /
168a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag cag 'khor ba las bsgral phyir/ /kun mkhyen ye shes phung po can/ /srid pa'i 'khor lo gnas sbyod ba/ /di ring bshad pa'i rin chen gyis/ /gtso bos bdag la bka' drin gsol zhes lan no/ /yang slob dpon gyis/ /ma rig rmongs pa'i
168a4(rgyud 'grel): bu mchog khyod/ /rdo rje byang lam drangs nas ni/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan par byas/ /bla med byang chub lam nas drang bar bya'o/ /badzrAM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bdegs bskrad do/ /de nas las kyi slob dpon
168a5(rgyud 'grel): lag tu rdo rje gtang la/ lag pa nas drangs nas gral so sor bya'o/ /rang gi gdong g.yogs byas la bzhag go/ yang slob dpon khong rang gis/ /skal ldan rigs kyi bu mchog khyed/ /las dang spyod pa ci la dga' / /byas pas/ yang slob mas/
168a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni skal ldan bde chen la/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal dngos grub gsol/ /zhes so/ /de nas me tog lag tu thogs la/ /thal mo sbyar la 'di skad brjod do/ /byang chub rdo rje 'jam dpal la/ /rin chen me tog dam pa 'bul/ /bdag kyang 'jam
168a7(rgyud 'grel): dpal skur gyur cig/ 'jam dpal sku i rdo rje gsol/ /pra tdts+tshi ho zhes me tog dbul lo/ /me tog lha la tshud na des chog go/ /ma tshud na lan gsum bskyar ro/ /de yang mtshud na las thams cad bskyar ro/ /de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad brjod do
168b1(rgyud 'grel): de ring dang pa'i shugs kyis ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan par bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs/ /dam tshig mchog tu gyur par byed/ /badzra tsk+Sh+ya pra be sha phaT/ ces mig dbye'o/ /de nas dbang bskur te/ dang po bum pa'i dbang bskur te bdag
168b2(rgyud 'grel): gi thugs ka nas 'od 'phros pas bum pa 'od du zhu ba las de 'khor lor gyur/ /'khor lo 'od du zhu/ hUM du gyur/ de la rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i dbang ngo/ /de sbyi bo'i thog tu gzhag la mchod pa dbul te/ mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar byed/ /mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che/ /nyon mongs kun gyi sgra che ba/ /mchod pa chen po gti mug che/ /gti mug blo ste gti mug sel/ /mchod pa chen po khro ba che/ /khro ba chen po sgra che ba/ /mchod pa chen po chags pa che/ /chags
168b3(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad sol bar byed/ /oM badzra puShpaM hUM/ hUM pe/ A lo ke /ga na d+he/ nai wi tye/ shabda/ hUM/ oM badzra tiksh+Na du(rgyud 'grel): kha ts+tshad/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mu rta ye dz+nyA na kA ya bA gI sh+ra ra a ra pa tsa na ya to na ma(rgyud 'grel): a A i a'i u a'u e i o aau/ aM
168b4(rgyud 'grel): a s+thi to h+ri ti/ dz+nyA na mu rtor haM bu d+d+ho bud+dd+hA nAM a A sarba ta thA ga ta la sogs pa las thams cad pa'i sngags btang/ de ni bum pa'i dbang bskur ro/ /de nas dbu rgyan dang cod pan gyi dbang bskur te/ dbu rgyun dang cod pan mdun du bzhag la/ bdag gi thugs
168b5(rgyud 'grel): ka nas 'od kha dog lnga 'phros te/ dbu rgyan dang cod pan 'od du zhu/ rin po che'i sul mngas gcig tu gyur/ /rin po che 'od du zhu bas/ rin chen 'byung ldan dbang ngo/ /slob ma'i mgo la skon la/ gong gi mchod pas mchod do/ /de nas
168b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i bskur te rdo rje las 'od 'phros pas rdo rje 'od du zhu nas pad+ma dmar po gcig tu gyur/ /pad+ma de zhu bas aM du gyur/ aM zhu bas snang ba mdza' yas kyi dbang bskur ro/ /de slob ma'i lag tu bzhag pas mchod bstod gong bzhin du bya'o
169a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas dril bu'i dbang bskur te/ slob dpon gyi mdun du dril bu bzhag la thugs ka nas 'od 'phris pas dril bu zhu/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cig tu gyur/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de ha cig tu gyur/ de las don yod grub pa'i dbang
169a2(rgyud 'grel): dril bu slob ma'i lag tu bzhag la mchod bstod gong bzhin du bya'o// //de nas ming gi dbang bskur te/ slob dpon gyi phyag g.yas ba'i steng du thugs ka nas a de 'od du zhu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur/ zla ba 'od tu
169a3(rgyud 'grel): zhu oM du gyur/ de las rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang do// //slob dpon gyi phyag slob ma'i spyi bo'i steng du bzhag ste/ mchod bstod gong bzhin du bya'o/ /de ltar dbang bskur ba ni phung po lnga ni rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas te/ ye shes
169a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i dbang thob pa'o/ /des ni bum pa'i dbang ngo/ /gsang ba'i dbang ni/ /bdag lha'i rnal 'byor du byas la/ de'i spyi gtsug tu bla ma bsgom/ de'i spyi gtsug tu gshin rje gshed yab yum bsgom/ de'i spyi gtsug tu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs
169a5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams bsgom mo/ /dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems/ /gshin rje gshed yab yum la thim par bsam/ gshin rje gshed yab yum snyoms par zhugs byang chub kyi sems la babs nas/
169a6(rgyud 'grel): bla ma yab yum la thim par bsam/ bla ma yang yum snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems de dag gi lam du zhugs nas lce stengs su sbyar la/ a rg+ha dang bsres la slob ma'i lce stengs su bzhag la sogs ma'i dag skyon dge par bsam
169a7(rgyud 'grel): de mgrin par/ de snying khar/ /de lte bar/ de rim gyis ar drangs ngag gi lam du zhugs/ sna bug g.yas su zhugs te/ /g.yon du zhugs/ /dag gi rlung ni 'gro 'od bzlas pa byas pas sgra dos gzung med pas ngag gi sgra grag stong du
169b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ste do sprang do/ /shes rang ye shes kyi dbang ni/ /rnal 'byor pa g.yas su gzhag/ rnal 'byor ma g.yon du bzhag/ de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang dril bu mdun du bzhag la/ gshin rje gshed yab yum du bskyed do/ /rdo rje de la bdag
169b2(rgyud 'grel): gi thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros pas rdo rje 'od du zhu 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul/ /slar 'dus pas yi ge hUM gcig tu gyur/ /hUM 'od du zhu ba las 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag
169b3(rgyud 'grel): po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas dbyug tho/ /g.yon sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa bcas pa/ glang chen stod g.yogs/ zhing chen g.yang gzhi stag gi shem thabs dang/ sbrul gyi chun po dang thod pa'i phred ba dang/ dur khrod kyi chas can du
169b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed la slob ma'i thugs kar bzhag la/ ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje de slob ma'i lag tu gtad thabs kyi rang bzhin du dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje la bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od 'phros pas dril bu 'od du zhu/
169b5(rgyud 'grel): dril bu'i 'od zer phyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul/ /tshur 'dus pas yi ge a cig tu gyur/ a de 'od du zhu ba las rdo rje phag mo sku mdog dmar mo/ /g.yas gri gug/ g.yon thod pa bsnams pa
169b6(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu bskyed la slob ma'i spyi bo thog tu bzhag la ye shes dgug gzhug bya'o/ /de nas mo'i lag pa g.yon du bzhag /dngos kyi rig ma med na dril bu'i 'od kyi rig mar bsgom mo/ /de ltar shes rab kyi rim par dbang bskur ro/ /
169b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob dpon gyis mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab/ slob dpon gyis gsang ba'i gnas nas hUM cig 'phros pas slob ma'i gsang bar thim/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa phyed ma cig tu gyur/ rdo rje'i bum par oM gyis mtshan pa cig tu gyur par
170a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ yum gyi mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs ste/ bdag gi yum gyi mkha' las ma dmar mo gcig 'phros pas slob ma'i yum gyi gsang bar thim/ ma de zhub ba las pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad ze 'bru dang bcas pa ?
170a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ de nas slob dpon gyis hUM zhes brjod pas rdo rje bskul/ a zhes dril bu bskul/ a A sarba ta thA ga ta tra da ya/ ha ra ta ra/ oM hUM tri(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bA na/ dz+nyA na mu rti bA bI shA ra/ ma hA pa tsa/ srba d+ha rmA ga ga na/ a ma la su pa ri
170a3(rgyud 'grel): sh+d+d+ha d+ha rmA dtwa tu dz+nyA na grb+ha a(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas skad cig ma la bskyed de/ bde ba ngos gzung do/ /de ni bde ba bskur ba'i rim pa'o// //dbang gi don lam du bslang ba ni/ de'i dus las ma g.yos par yab yum gnyis kyi
170a4(rgyud 'grel): bsrubs pas rlung me'i drod can gyi me lce a ba ld+hU tI na yar zhugs te/ spyi bo gtsug tor gyi zhu ba las/ klang rgyas 'dengs pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsa ba 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrol/ de la bdud rtsi byang chub kyi sems babs te dga' ba'o/ /byang chub kyi sems
170a5(rgyud 'grel): de mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lor bskyil bas rtsa 'dab ma bcu drug grol te mchog dga' / de chos kyi 'khor lor bskyil lor bskyil bas rtsa 'dab brgyad grol te dga' bral/ de lte pa sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du babs rtsa 'dab drug cu rtsa
170a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi grol te/ de lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o/ /de la bla nas su 'phags te ha ha zhes pas lte ba nas snying khar drang/ hi hi zhes pas snying kha nas mgrin par drang/ hUM hUM zhes pas mgrin pa nas klad pa bde chen du drangs pas gtsugs
170a7(rgyud 'grel): tor chen po'i haM las sbung len la sbur 'dus pa 'am/ khab len la lcags 'dus pa bzhin du 'ub kyis 'dus so/ /de la seng ge rnam par rol gyis khyab par bsgom mo/ /de ltar yar drangs mar dbab byed yin bde stong gi nyams ngos
170b1(rgyud 'grel): zin par bya'o// //dbang bzhi pa ni bzhi par ming btags kyang gsum pa las bskur bar mi 'dod do/ /gong ma'i nams de sems nyid la ngo sprod pa la bzhi las shes zer ro/ /de la bzhi pa dbang gis po sprad de/ gdams ngag
170b2(rgyud 'grel): do sprad kyis sems dos zungs shig bya/ dar cig lon pa dang/ de ka rang yin byas la/ lag pa nam mkha' la yug byas la/ bzhi pa bde ba'i don no/ /phyag rgya chen po'i lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes de gzugs dang kha dog tu ma grub pas nam mkha' 
170b3(rgyud 'grel): la ngo sprod do/ /gsum pa'i nyams de ngos gzung dang bral bas/ gzhon nu ma'i bde ba nyams su myong du yod pa la dbang po mngon sum du bstan du med/ de ka la ngo sprad pas dbang bzhi pa'i gdams ngag go/ /lta stangs bzhis rig pa sgros pa dang
170b4(rgyud 'grel): bral bar ngo sbrad do/ /bum pa'i dbang gis dus su rigs lnga'i bkra shis gsol zhing dbang bskur/ gsang dbang man chod dbang bzhi pa rdzogs nas bkra shis kyi dbang bskur te dngos grub blang ngo/ /bkra shis gsol ba ni/ rgyud las/ bkra shis
170b5(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi bkra shes pa/ /grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge/ dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che/ /zhes so/ /rdzas la brten ba'i bkra shis kyi ston mo ni/ /'brang rgyas dang/ mir dang/ thud dang/ zho dang/ mngar gsum dang/ khur ba
170b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ la phug dang zas sna mad du thogs la rigs lnga'i bkra shis gsol te/ bkra shis dam pa chos dbyings bskyod pa med mod kyang/ /rgyal ba rigs lnga'i bkra shis bde legs shog /bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa/ /grags pa'i
170b7(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis snyan grags dge/ dbus phyogs sangs rgyas rigs kyi zhing khams nas/ /spros dan bral ba'i bkra shis gang lags pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /bkra shis 'phre/ shar phogs rdo rje rigs
171a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi zhing gnas nas/ /rdo rje rigs kyi bkris skye mchi med/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang dang 'dir bde legs shog /bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa/ /grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge/ /lho phyogs rin chen rigs kyi zhing
171a2(rgyud 'grel): khams nas/ /rin chen rigs kyi bkra shis dgos 'dod 'byung/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deb 'dir bde legs shag /bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa/ /grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge /nub phyogs pad+ma rigs kyi zhing khams
171a3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /skyon med pad+ma lta bu'i bkra shis des/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog /bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa/ /grags pa'i bkra shis snyan grags dge /byang phyogs las kyi rigs kyi zhing khams nas/ /las
171a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams grub pa'i bkra shes gang lags pa/ /bkra shis dam pa des kyang de ba 'dir bde legs shog /oM bud+d+ha kA la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM badzra kA la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ratna ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa h+ri(rgyud 'grel): /oM karma ka
171a5(rgyud 'grel): la sha a b+hI Shatsu a:/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyi brgyan pa rgyal ba rigs lnga'i bkra shis pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag dpon slob bkra shis par gyur cig /bkra shis rdzas brgyad kyi bkra shis ni/ /bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis

171a7(rgyud 'grel): gdugs/ /bud+d+ha de'u yi bkra shis shog /spyan lnga chags pa yid pa 'chad/ /bud+d+ha spyan gyi bkra shis shog /bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /bud+d+ha mgul gyi bkra shis shog /nyid kyi zhel nas ljags bzang ba/ /bud+d+ha ljags kyi bkra shis shog /

171b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan oM te te hUM bde ba'i don rtogs/ de na hUM bde ba'i don rtags/ te na hUM bde ba'i lam rnyed/ te te te na hUM gnyis su med pa'i bde ba thob pa'o/ /ya te na ma(rgyud 'grel): theg chen ma nor ba yin no/ /bar du dag pa'i do ni/ longs sku lam du byed pa rdo rje'i glu ni/ oM s+thi

175a7(rgyud 'grel): nas byangs ldan mthar legs rdo rje rdzogs/ /lho nas yid bzhin lhun grub ka ni ka/ nub nas bsam 'das bde byed pad+ma brtsegs/ /byang nas khams gsum rmad grags bde rgyas sgron/ /byin brlabs mchod rten brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas

180a5(rgyud 'grel): grub blang/ 'jam dpal gyi bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i gtor ma la/ gnod sbyin pho mo la zla ba gsum du mchod na 'dod pa phun sum tshogs so/ /me tog lug ru dang/ gu gul dkar po dang/ dkar gsum mngar gsum dang nas ngar 'bru sna
180a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas na lha'i longs spyod dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /tho rangs bya ze tsan pho sngags mo sngags zlos pa yin/ chu sbyin yang nas yang du btang na longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan no/ /de yang 'dod pa'i don grub dam
180a7(rgyud 'grel): pa ste gsung ngo/ /'di ni rin po che gter gyi sgrub pa'o/ /rgyud las/ yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang gsung ngo/ /thun mong gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi man ngag /slob dpon sdom pa bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
180b1(rgyud 'grel): dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas maN+Dal dbul te/ maN+Dal tshad dang ldan pa la/ ba'i rnam lnga byugs la badzra re khe hUM zhes pas dri zhim po'i 'de gu byas la phyug pa bya/ oM haM mahA me ra ba ye na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM ya(rgyud 'grel): ga dza ha nA ya na ma:
180b2(rgyud 'grel): oM ra bu ru kha ran+d+rA ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM la sti ratA ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM wA shwa ratna ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM ya(rgyud 'grel): khaDga ratna ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM ra ma Ni ratnA ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM wa(rgyud 'grel): sarba ni d+hi b+hya ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM la tsa kra ratnA ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): de ltar me tog chom bu dgu dgur bya'o/ /paM
180b3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma maN+Dal/ ma sUrya maN+Dal/ a tsan+d+ra? maN+Dal zhes gdan dbul lo/ /gang na de'i steng du tsan+t+ri pa la sogs pa'i bla ma rnams spyan drangs la/ de la phyag bya ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /dkon mchog
180b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi rtsa ba ste/ bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bskor ba bya/ de nas mchod pa bya ste/ mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ sems can thams cad dga' bar byed/ /mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che/ /nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba/ /

180b6(rgyud 'grel): mgu ba che/ /oM badzra puShpe hUM/ oM badzra d+hU pe hUM/ oM badzra A lo ke hUM/ oM badzra gan+t+te hUM/ oM badzra nai bi dye hUM/ oM badzra shabta hUM/ de nas sdig pa bshags/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab
180b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo'o/ /de nas yi dam gyi maN+Dal dbul te/ maN+Dal tshad dang ldan pa la dri'i lde gu byug par bya/ oM badzra re khe hUM/ oM bud+d+ha many+dzu sh+rI na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra satwa hUM na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra ratna hUM na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra pad+ma hUM na ma(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra
181a1(rgyud 'grel): karma hUM na ma(rgyud 'grel): paM pad+ma maN+Dal/ ma sUrya maN+Da la/ a tsan+d+ra maN+Dal la/ de la ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya/ de nas phyag bya ste/ chos sku longs sku sprul sku nyid/ /gzha' tshon nam mkha' dbyer med kyang/ /rnam
181a2(rgyud 'grel): snang mi bskyod rin chen 'byung/ /snang mdza' don yod grub pa la/ /lus dag gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhon nu'i sku lus 'chang ba po/ /ye shes sgron mes rab brgyan cing/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel ba'i/ /'jam dpal
181a3(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod pa gong dang mthun sdig pa bshags nas dge ba'i rtsa bar bsngo ba yan chad gong dang mthun/ de nas ye shes pa gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig pa rang la bsdu/ yi ge brgya pa'i bshags pa bya/?
181a4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i maN+Da la yi dam gyi cho ga 'bro lo tsA bas bsgyur ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI e ka dzA Ti b+ha ga bi maN+Dal tsakra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
181a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs/ /bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos sku rang sems bde chen 'od gsal rnams mi rtogs 'bar ba'i sku mchog sna tshogs chul 'chang mkha' 'dra ba/ /longs spyod rdzogs sprul chos
181a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag dbyer med ngo gcig tshul/ ral pa gcig 'phyad rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gtso la 'dud/ /lnga phung dang ni dri ma bzhi/ /chen po bzhi dang spyod yul brgyad/ /rnam bzhi tshor ba rnam dag lha/ /ye shes 'khor lo 'dir bshad bya/ /
181a7(rgyud 'grel): dang po kho nar rnal 'byor pas bla ma mchog la rim gro yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ de'i bka' drin thob pas dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag po la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ ma smin pa la sogs pa thams cad la snying rje chen pos go
181b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phang bla na med par sems bskyed la/ sku gsung thugs ye shes rol pa'i nang du chud pas dbang bskur ba yang dag par bzung nas/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i de kho na nyid nges par 'byung ba 'di bsgom par bya'o/ /yid dang rjes su mthun lam
181b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /dur khrod dang ni shing drung sogs/ /yang na bdag po'i tshul 'dra 'am/ /dngos grub gnas ni rgyud las bsngags/ /der bar chad bsal ba'i phyir gtor ma sbyin pa sngon du 'gro bas bka' bsgo zhing lha la sogs pa yang dag par
181b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod de sgrub pa'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /gzhan yang ji snyed mchod pa'i yo byad dang/ cho ga'i khyad par thams cad la dgos pa'i rdzas rnams thams cad bsags pa dang/ gnas nye bar bkod bas dgyes pa bskyed pa'i rgyud gyur
181b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ ci nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma ma mthong bar phyir mi nur 'bad pa dang/ brtson pa drag bos spro bar bya'o/ /de nas sgrub par dam tshig can/ /rab tu bde ba'i stan la 'dug /shel ltar dangs pa'i yid kyis su/ /tshigs

181b6(rgyud 'grel): lo ltar bzhag la gzhug par bya'o/ /oM e hye hi b+ha ga wan sh+rI e ka dzrE Ti maN+Dal tsakra mahA ka ru Ni ka ho sa ma ya dza(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya? s+thaM/ sa ma ya hUM/ sa ma ya ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya pa'i sngags kyis so/ /bdag gi dad dang mgon po yis/ /thugs rje dang ni dam

182a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba brjod do/ /stong pa nyid chen po'i dang las raM las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM yig las dag pa'i skyes pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar ba chen pos bsams la/ de las 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyi lce rang tu rnon po 'khrigs pas rdo rje'i
182a7(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi dang/ rab dang/ dra ba dang/ gur du grub par blta'o/ /de dbus e dbyibs nam mkha' dri ma med la/ in+d+ra gyi ru dung dang gser mdog can/ yaM raM baM laM gzhu dang me thab dang/ /zla rgyas ri dbyibs de steng rnam par shes/ /de dag nyid gnas
182b1(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gru bzhi pa dang ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa'o/ /dra ba dang dra ba phyed ba dang twa ra nal sogs pas mjos par bya'o/ /oM badzra shu d+hA(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+ha rmA badzra shu d+hto haM/ de'i dbus su bsgom par bya ba ni cung zad gyen du 'phangs mi?
182b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i pad+ma'i sdong po kha phye ba'i steng du gnas pa dbang phyug chen po dang/ u ma de ba bltas la/ de'i steng du kA li las grub pa'i nyi ma dang A li las grub pa'i zla ba kha sbyor gyi nang du hUM dang baM gi sa bon rab tu 'phro bar bsams te/ de gyur pa las rdo rje gri gug?
182b3(rgyud 'grel): dang thod pa snying po gnyis nyid kyis mtshan par blta zhing/ yang 'od zer can gyi mdzad pa yongs su bsgrub pas/ bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa ral pa gcig pa sku mdog mthing nag g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhabs bskum ba dang brkyang bas

182b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu dga' bas 'khyud ba/ rdo rje dang rin po che dang/ rus pa dang sgrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan cing/ phyag rgya drug gis nye bar spras pa/ mi mgo mang po'i phreng ba'i do shal brgyud pa dang/ Da ma ru dang/ g.yer kha dang/ sil khrol gyi rgyas spyangs pa/

183a1(rgyud 'grel): dbus mthing zhal spyan gsum/ phyag drug gri gug thod pa ral gri dang/ /u tpal 'khor lo tshangs pa'i mgo bo 'dzin/ /ji bzhin zhal phyag yum ni dmar ba'o/ /de nas snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor ba las lha'i 'khor
183a2(rgyud 'grel): lo dbyung bar bya ste/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma bzhi la lhung ba'i sa bon ni/ a i u e zhes bya ba ste/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i spub su chung cing dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang khu'i kha dog can gyi 'od kyi spyor bar 'khor lo
183a3(rgyud 'grel): dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang rdo rje rgyu gram snying po de nyid kyis mtshan par gang gyur ba'o/ /de dag yongs su gyur pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo dang rdo rje rin chen dang rdo rje padmo dang/ rdo rje sna tshogs rnams su grub par blta'o/ /de dag gis bon ni dang gi nye ba'i rgyu'o/ /

183b1(rgyud 'grel): ser po dang dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang khu'i kha dog can no/ /'od kyi sbyor bas ri rab dang zla ba dang/ nyi ma dang ba dan dang/ snying po de nyid kyis mtshan par gang gyur pa'o/ /de dag yongs su gyur pas ni brtan pa'i rdo rje ma dang/ sbyor ba'i rdo rje ma dang/

184a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lcags kyu yongs su gyur pas ni rdo rje lcags kyu'o/ /rA ser po las byung ba'i zhags pa yongs su gyur bas na rdo rje zhags pa'o/ /li dmar po las byung ba'i lcags sgrog yongs su gyur pas ni rdo rje lcags sgrog ba'o/ /DI?

184b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i lha mo sprul pas sems can gyi don du slar ldang bar gsol ba gdab bar bya'o/ /'jig rten mgon po bcom ldan bzhengs/ 'gro ba nyon mongs yongs su skyobs/ /stong pa'i ting 'dzin spangs nas su/ /byams chen sku mchog stas?
184b2(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzod/ /thugs rje chen po bcom ldan bzhengs/ /sems can sdug bsngal rab tu sgrol/ /zhi ba'i mdza' las mi gnas par/ /brtse chen rnam par 'phrul bar mdzod/ /bde chen rgyal po bcom ldan bzhengs/ /lus can bde don yang dag
184b3(rgyud 'grel): gzigs/ /zag med dbyings thugs ma gzhom par/ /dgyes chen kun tu snang bar mdzod/ /gtso chen rdo rje bcom ldan bzhengs/ /skye bo dub pa mngon dgongs la/ /mdza' gcig rgyun chang mi bzhugs par/ /ma lus 'tshal ba sgrub tu gsol
184b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i klus gnyid sang ba dang 'dra bar byas te/ /slar sa bon gyi yi ge gnyis dang mtshan ma gnyis las bcom ldan 'das yab dang yum mdon pa grub ba'i rim pa sngar ji skad smos pa bzhin du sprul par bya'o/ /gsang sngags pas
