184b6(rgyud 'grel): par bste/ /'di skad du mi mnyam med pas zur bzhi yin/ /dran dang dbang po'i sgo bzhi yin/ /bsam gtan bzhi ni rta babs bzhi/ /rnam thar brgyad phyag ka ba brgyad/ /byang chub yan lag bdun dag phyir/ /dra ba dang ni dra ba byed/ /phyogs
184b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi tshir med bzhi yin te/ /pad+ma 'khor lo shes rab thabs/ /rnam par shes brgyad yongs dag pa/ /de ni dur khrod chen po brgyad/ /ces bya ba lta bu dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa gang yin pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor pa yongs su dag pa yang/ re zhi?
185a1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba ni me long lta bur rang bzhin no/ /nyi ma ni mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /sa bon dang mtshan ma ni so sor kun tu rtog pa'i rang bzhin no/ /yongs su gyur pa ni bya ba grub pa'i rang bzhin no/ /gzugs brnyan nye bar rdzogs pa
185a2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnam par dag pa ni dpal rdo rje ral pa gcig pa'o/ /gzugs kyi phung bo rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo'o/ /tshor ba'i phung po rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje rin chen no/ /'du
185a3(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi phung po rtsam par dag pa rdo rje pad+ma'o/ /'du byed kyi phung po rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje sna tshogs so/ /gti mug rnam par dag pa ni gti mug rdo rje'o/ /bag la nyal rnam par dag pa ni bag chags rdo rje na'o/ /'dod chags rnam par dag pa
185a4(rgyud 'grel): ni 'dod chags rdo rje'o/ /zhe sdang rnam par dag pa ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o/ /sa'i khams rnam bar dag pa ni brtan pa'i rdo rje ma'o/ /chu'i khams rnam par dag pa ni spyod pa'i rdo rje ma'o/ /me'i khams rnam par dag pa ni 'bar ba'i rdo rje ma'o/ /smung gi khams
185a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa ni stobs kyi rdo rje ma'o/ /gzugs rnam par dag pa ni gzugs rdo rje ma'o/ /sgra rnam par dag pa ni sgra rdo rje ma'o/ /dri rnam par dag pa'i dri rdo rje ma'o/ /ro rnam par dag pa ni ro rdo rje ma'o/ /reg rnam par dag pa ni rog rdo rje ma'o
185a6(rgyud 'grel): chos rnam par dag pa ni chos rje ma'o/ /zhing rnam par dag pa ni zhing rdo rje ma'o/ /snang ba rnam par dag pa ni snang ba rdo rje ma'o/ /tshor ba bde pa rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'o/ /chor ba sdug bsngal rnam par dag pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'o/ /
185a7(rgyud 'grel): tshor ba btang snyoms rnam par dag pa ni lcags sgrog go /de dag gi bag chags rnam par dag pa ni dril bu'o/ /'od gsal bde chen mi rtog rtag chad rnam par dag /padmo thod pa dbugs dral dbang phyug u ma'i gdan/ dus gsum?
185b1(rgyud 'grel): thar phyin skyob drug thabs dang shes dag phyir/ /zhal gsum phyag drug phyag rgya drug zhabs brkyang bskum nyid/ /de bzhin du rdo rje 'khor lo la sogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor pa thams cad kyi gdan dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa rnam par dag pa? yang
185b2(rgyud 'grel): ci rigs su rig par bya'o/ /gang yang dkyil 'khor pa la rgyas gdab pa'i phyag rgya lnga 'am drug kyang rnam par rig par bya ste/ re zhig bla ma dang lhag pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal pa'i don du spyi gtsug tu 'khor lo ste/ /de ni mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid rnam
185b3(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bsgo ba nyan pa'i phyir rna ba la rna cha sta/ /de ni 'od dpag med kyi bar ge nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsang sngags zab mo bzlas pa'i phyir mgul pa la mgul do ste/ de ni rin chen 'byung ba'i bdag nyid rnam par dag pa'o
185b4(rgyud 'grel): srog chags thams cad la 'tshe ba spangs pa'i lag pa la lag gdub ste/ de ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /phyag rgya nye bar bkod pa bstan pa'i phyir rked pa ske rags te/ de ni don yong grub pa'i bdag nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /
185b5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi shes rab lhan cig pa'i phyir tshom bu ste/ /de ni ral ba gcig pa'i bdag nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /de nas gzhal yas khang gi cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi shar gyi 'dab ma nas brtsams te byang sgo'i bar yul nyi shu rtsa bzhir rnam par dag pa sbyar par shes
185b6(rgyud 'grel): par bzhing rang gi lus kyi cha nyi shu rtsa bzhi yang yul nyi shu rtsa bzhir rnam par dag pa lha dang sbyar ba yang rtogs par bya ste/ dbang po kho nar de kho na nyid kyi gnas snying gi dbus su dpal rdo rje ral gcig pa'o/ /zhes pa 'di ni khyad par ro/ /pu li ra ma la
185b7(rgyud 'grel): kha na zho ba? rdo rje 'khro la zhes nas/ /ja lan d+ha da spyi gtsug dang/ oM Dhyan rna ba g.yas/ /ar ra ba ta sto glang pa'i rgyab/ /go ta ba ri rna ba g.yon/ /ra mI shwa ra smin ma'i dbu ma/ /de bi ko Ta mig gnyis dang/ /ma la wa ni phrag pa gnyis/ /ka ma ru
186a1(rgyud 'grel): ni mchan khung gnyis/ /oM tre nu ma gnyis yin no/ /tri sha ku ne lte ba dang/ /ko sa la ni sna yi rtse/ /ka liM ka ni kha nyid de/ /lam ba ka ni mgul ba'o/ /ka ny+tsi snying gi rtse mo dang/ /hi ma la ya lgang pa gnyis/ /pre ta
186a2(rgyud 'grel): pu ri mtshan ma dang/ /gri ha de ba gsang ba'i gnas/ /sau rSh+Ta ni brla gnyis te/ /su br+Na de byin pa gnyis/ /na ga ra ni sor mo rnams/ /sin d+hU rkang ba'i rgyab tu'o/ /ma ru mthe bo rnaM me gnyis te/ /ku lu ta ni bus mo gnyis/ /rdo
186a3(rgyud 'grel): rje dril bu zhes bya ba'i bar du grangs ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ /de rjes yab dang yum rim rdo rje sngon po dang/ /pad+ma dmar po'i rgyas gdab go cha drug drug bcing/ /dung mdog ha hi hu he ho haM zhes dang/ khrag mdog a i u
186a4(rgyud 'grel): e o dang aM nyid do/ /de la snying khar ni ha 'o/ /mgo bo la na hi'o/ /spyi gtsug tu hu'o/ /phrag pa gnyis ni he'o/ /mig gnyis la ni ho'o/ /yan lag thams cad la ni h+raM ngo/ /de bzhin du lte bar ni a'o/ /snying khar ni i'o/ /kha
186a5(rgyud 'grel): ni u'o/ /mgo la ni e'o/ /spyi gtsug tu o'o/ /yan lag thams cad la ni aM ngo/ /de'i 'og tu dam tshig pa'i 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs pa nyid brtul zhugs dang cho ga de kho na nyid kyis byin gyis rlabs bcug pas des par brtan par bya
186a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don du/ ye shes pa'i 'khor lo dri ma med pa ste/ yang dag par gzhugs par bya'o/ /mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo rtse sbrang cing/ /mthe bong rdo rje brtan po rab tu sbyar/ /sor mo bzhag gdengs dbral ba'i dbus bzhag la/ /bskor zhing
186a7(rgyud 'grel): bskor bas yongs su bskyur bar bya/ /g.yon brkyang g.yas mnan gyen du blta/ /mig sgyur phe ge sgra sgrogs pas/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs dgug/ ces bya ba 'di la bus nyid kyis
186b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas dam tshig rjes su dran pas mdun gyi nam mkha' i ngos 'dir mngon par byon par 'gyur ro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM/ thog mar sku khrus gsol ba'o/ /oM pA dbyaM tIts+tsha swAhA/ zhabs bsil dbul ba'o/ /oM any+tsa ma no
186b2(rgyud 'grel): phra tIts+tsha swAhA/ zhabs bsil ba'o/ /oM pad+ma sU rya tsan+d+ra maN+Dal sa ma ye swAhA/ gdan dbul ba'o/ /de nas thog mar lus thams cad nye bar 'dud pas phyag byas te/ gang zhig sna tshogs ro cig dbang po'i gzhu 'dra ba/ /nyon mongs rdul bral bde chen 'od
186b3(rgyud 'grel): gsal sbrol bral zhing/ /ye shes rgyun 'bab rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor cher 'byung la/ /gus pa'i khur gyi mgrin pa smad nas bdag phyag 'tshal/ /de nas mchod pa byin gyis brlabs nas dbul bar bya ste/ oM badzra puSh+de a(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra d+hU pe a(rgyud 'grel): hUM/
186b4(rgyud 'grel): oM bardza dI pe A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra gan d+he A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra ne bi dbye A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ lag gsum gyis so/ /kha dog sna tshogs dri zhim dbyibs mdzes me tog dang/ bdug spos a ka ru dang sbrul gyi snying po dang/ snod mdzes rin chen skron me snang ba drir bcas dang
186b5(rgyud 'grel): ? gtsar mtshad snying po sbyar ba dpag med dang/ mdog bzang ro brgya ldan pa'i zhal zas mang po rnams/ /gus bcas yid 'ong lha mchog tshogs la 'bul lags kyis/ /sems can ma lus srid pa'i gdung gzhi ba dang/ /rbag med bde chen ye shes bdud
186b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsis myos bar mjod?/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ldan e ka dza Ti sarba maN+Da la tsa kra de ba ta puSh+The pu dza me g+ha sa mu da spa ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa nas/ /nai bi dye pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra sphar Na sa ma ye hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyar bas dbul bar bya'o/ /pi lpang gling bu rdo rje zlum bzhad
186b7(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ /sgeg mo glu ma gang ma gzugs mdzes ra dang reg/ maN+Dal chos ma rgyan sogs de bzhin bkong ba ni/ /zab cing rgya che rgya mtsho sprin 'gro gzhin yang mchod/ /om A(rgyud 'grel): badzra bi ni hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra baM sa hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra mu rtse hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra

187a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs te/ g.yas kyi mthe bor dang/ mdzub me dang/ gung me dang/ srin lag dang/ mthe'u chung dang/ lag ma thi la rnams la go rim lngar/ ha hi hu he ho ha/ zhes bya ba'i yig 'bru gnag la dkar ba dang/ sngo ba dang/
187a5(rgyud 'grel): ser pa dang/ dmar ba dang/ ldan pa dang/ mthing ka'i mdog can yab kyi thugs ka'i hUM las 'phros pa'i 'od zer reg pa las yongs su gyur ba'i gzugs kun tu 'od dang/ rdo rje 'dzin pa dang/ nor gyi dbyig dang/ 'od zer dang las kyi bde dang/ /
187a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed rgyal po rnams/ g.yon zla ba'i gdan la rnam par gnon cing/ g.yas skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis mngon par dgyis pa rang gi sa bon gyi kha dog can/ 'khor lo la sogs pa sangs rgyas lnga'i mtshan ma dang/ gri gug gis
187a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi phyag mtshan pa dang/ thams cad kyang g.yon khrag gis bdud rtsis rab tu gang ba'i thod pa can no/ /de bzhin du g.yon gyi mthe ba la sogs par yang grangs ji lta bas/ a i u e aM zhes bya ba'i yig 'dru dan ra ba la
187b1(rgyud 'grel): dkar ba dang/ sngo ba dang/ ser ba dang/ rab tu dmar ba dang/ ljang gu dang/ sindnya ra'i mdog can/ yum gyi thugs ka'i baM las 'phros ba'i 'od zer reg pa las yongs su gyur pa'i gzugs rab gsal ma dang/ rab brtan ma dang rgyan can ma dang 'og?
187b2(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ tshogs can ma dang/ skrag mdzad ma rnams g.yas nyi ma'i gdan gnon cing g.yon gyi skyil krung phyed ba'i gar byis yongs su dgyes ma/ rang gi sa bon gyi kha dog can 'khor lo la segs pa sangs rgyas ma lnga'i mtshan ma dang/ ka pA la
187b3(rgyud 'grel): ba yas kyi phyag mtshan pa/ thams cad kyang g.yon na khrag gis bdud rtsis rab tu gang ba'i thod pa can no/ /de nas go cha de dag la ye shes kyi lha yang dag par bkug ste/ dam tshig la bcug nas yid las byung ba'i mchod pas mchod
187b4(rgyud 'grel): ? thal ma mnyam par sbyar bas phan tshun rjes su zhugs pa dang/ de bsdams pas phan tshun yongs su thim par blta'o/ /gang thim par gyur pa de yang hUM a ces gsang mthon pos bos pas stong pa nyid dang thig ler mi gnas par yi
187b5(rgyud 'grel): ge gnyis kyis gzugs su mngon par blta bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas g.yas kyi srin lag gi dam tshig la reg cing chos 'byung snol ba pri bar bya ste/ zur drug la go cha'i yi ge drug brjod pas yi ge de dag gis mtshan mar bya ba dang/

187b7(rgyud 'grel): cig gnas pa yang bltas la/ se gol gtog ste ha cang mi ring ba'i steng gi mkhar 'phags par bzhugs so/ /de rjes g.yas g.yon snying khar zla ba nyi ma dang/ chu skyes dbus nas sku gsung thugs pa ltas ming brjod ?
188a1(rgyud 'grel): dkar bsil dmar tsha rab tu sngo 'jam 'od reg phyir/ /dri med rab bzhu lta tshogs sbyar bas bdud rtsi dbab/ /de ltar 'od kyis skul ba na dbus kyi yi ge las gyen du 'greng ba'i/ /zer gyi go cha dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das
188a2(rgyud 'grel): yab yum sbyan drangs nas nam mkha' i yi ge la bstims te/ de ma thag tu lta bcu bzhi'i bdag nyid du gyur nas snyams par zhugs pa dang/ thams cad kyi sbyor mtshams nas thig le bdud rtsi rgyun lhung bas dam tshig bzhu ba'i khu ba bsil zhing rnam par
188a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar ba gya na ma par bya'o/ /rim gyis bde ba chen po'i phyir go cha bcu 'od kyi rnam par zhu ba bdag po la thim pa dang/ de yang mi 'phrogs pa'i dga' bas rnam par myos pa'i phyir sa bon gyi ngo mtshar zhu ba bsam mo/ /de nas baM ho brjod pas

188a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor pa thams cad mnyam par gyur pas dgyes pa'i rgyur byin gyis brlabs te/ rdo rje thal mo'i gar sgyur ba dang ldan pas yang dag par mtshad par bya'o/ /'di dag ni nang gi dam tshig gis mchod pa'i cho ga'o/ /lte ba'i dbus

188b3(rgyud 'grel): ba yab yum 'gro don brtson/ /lha tshogs sras mang ngo'i rjes 'jug 'phrin las byed/ /sdags 'chang rnams kyang nyin re mchod pa'i las brtson pa/ /ma lus ngo mtshar bsod nams rgya mtsho rjes yi rang/ /khrag ma Tung ye shes dkyil 'khor lha tshogs

189a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor de nyid cher dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ mnyes par bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ sdags kyi rang gi dam tshig la/ /mngon par gzhug par bya'o/ /rdo rje thal sbyar mdzub gnyis bkug /rdo rje bsdams pa nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin mthe

189b2(rgyud 'grel): po don kun sgrub byed nyi shu drug bcas mgal me'i tshul/ /de bzhin gang yang sdags rigs gzhan blzas rang rang dbus gnas 'od 'phro ba'o/ /oM o ga shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba dta rma yog ga shud+d+ho haM/ dpa' chen dpa' mo chen gnyis thugs/ /'dam skyes dam
189b3(rgyud 'grel): dbus hUM dang paM/ kha dag sngon po dmar bsams la/ de mdza' nyid gnyis sdaD kyis bskor/ /om A(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA gto grb+he badzra ta twa dz+nya na dza la hUM phaT swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta sa traM badzra ta twA pa ya spha ra Na baM hUM phaT swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das yab yum gyi sdags so/ /oM
189b4(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): badzra dz+nyA na hUM phaT/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzro pa ya hUM phaT/ bcom ldan 'das yab yum gyi nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra tsa kra a hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra i hUM phaT swA hA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra pad+ma u hUM phaT swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra ba sho e hUM phaT swA hA/

189b7(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra d+ha rma ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra khye ra sha hUM phaT swA hA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra A lo ka k+Sha hUM phaT swA hA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra oM ku shi hUM phaT swA hA/ oM a'i(rgyud 'grel): badzra pA shi rA hUM phaT swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra ban d+hi la hUM phaT swA hA /oM
190a1(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): badzra g+ha N+Da lI hUM phaT swAhA/ lha nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i snying po'i sngags so/ /yi ge re re 'bum phrag gang yin yab yum mnyes byed yin bshad gzhan/ /pad+ma dang ni 'khor lo'i lha dang khyams bcas go rims
190a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /'bum phrag gsum dang gnyis dang gcig bzlas mngon sum gzhal yas khang/ /mthong ba 'am rmi lam brtan dang gsal snang mchog thob ting 'dzin mthu grub brtan pa'i bltas/ /dmigs pas dub par gyur pa dang/ /rtse gcig
190a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan go 'phad gnyer/ /rim pa gzhan yang goms 'dod pas/ /de nas rnam par mi rtog bsgom/ /sbyi yi snying kha lte bar ni/ /zla ba pad+ma nyi stang du/ /haM dang hUM dang oM zhes bshad pa'i cho ga 'di dag nyin re brtan
190a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yo mkha' / /nyi ma zla ba sgra gcan 'dzin/ /rmi lam nam mkha' i sbyor ba yis/ /blo chen rnal 'byor bsgrub par bya/ /spro dang sdud dang gzung ba dang/ /dmigs bral dang ni rnam par dag /sna tshogs mdon par sgrul ba yi/ /rim sogs bla ma rgyas
190a5(rgyud 'grel): par 'chang/ /thun mtshams rtag tu gtor ma sngon 'gro ji snyed 'byor ba'i tshogs 'khor los/ /legs mchod thal sbyar dngos grub gsol btab dam tshig ma gyur kun bzod gsol// //de rjes mdun pas rdo rje'i gar bsnyos? se
190a6(rgyud 'grel): gol brdabs pas e shes kyi/ /dkyil 'khor mkhar bskyod shin tu legs shes dbugs phyung mi snang gyur par bsam/ /de ltar sngags ba blo gros can brtul zhugs zab mo sbyod par nus pas/ ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga 'di dag nyin re
190a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin thun gsum gsum bsnyen par byed cing/ bla ma dang lhag pa'i lha la mngon par dang pa rgyun mi 'chad pas sbyor bar byed na/ des ci nas kyang zla ba bdun las mi ring bar bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha nyi shu rtsa
190b1(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i bdag nyid kyi mtshan ma gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom mi bya'o/ /ji snyed 'dod pa'i dngos grub dang las thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang gzung kyi sgo dpag tu med pa yang mngon du
190b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /sbyin bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs dang/ rgyal po dang/ bram ze la sogs pa thams cad kyi rje dpon thob par 'gyur zhing/ /skye bo thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bur 'gyur te/ mdor na de ni lha mi dang lha ma yin
190b3(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ston pa lta bur blta bar bya'o/ /dpal ldan bla med rgyud rgyal de nyid rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gsung thugs mdzad ma lus pa yi gter gang yin/ /sdags 'chang nyid kyi shin tu bka' bsgos rdo rje can dang thong phreng
190b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya mkha' 'gro gnyis kyi rim gsum rgyas btab spas pa ni/ /mgon po de nyid mthod pa'i blo mnga' sbyan gsum ldan pas glo bur kha phye khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /spros med ral pa gcig 'chad ji bzhin sgrub thabs
190b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi bla ma mchog gi sgron me la brten mthong/ /gnas 'dir 'bad byas pa las rnyed pa yi/ /dge ba dri med bdag la gang zhig yong/ /de myung 'gro 'dir ral pa gcig mchog gi /go 'phang nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid shog /dpal btsam ldan
190b6(rgyud 'grel): 'das ral ba gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs/ grub pa brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po a ji ta mi tra gubtas mdzad pa rjogs so// //rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po sh+rI dza ga ta mi tra Ana nda dang/ de
190b7(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma'i rdul la sbyi bos reg cing gsung gi bdud rtsi'i ro myang ba/ bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa dpal gyis bsgyur cid zhus te/ gtan la phab pa'o// //iTi// //
191a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po mi phaM sngas pas mdzad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI e ka dzA Ti b+ha ga wA na sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig
191a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun ral pa gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por re shig sngags pas tshogs bsags pa sngon du 'gro bas pad+ma dang/ ka bA la dang/ ro'i gdan bltas la de'i steng du hUM dang baM las yab dang yum ral pa gcig
191a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phyad pa'i bcom ldan 'das bsgom par bya'o/ /shar dang/ lho dang nub dang/ byang gi pad+ma'i 'dab ma dag la ni rdo rje 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje rin chen dang/ rdo rje pad+ma dang/ rdo rje sna tshogs rnams bsam mo/ /byang shar la sogs pa'i
191a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshems bzhir ni bdud rtsi ka pA la dag go /de'i phyi rol du khyams kyi phyogs bzhir gti mug rdo rje dkar mo sgron ma thogs pa dang/ bag chags rdo rje ser mo rdo rje thogs pa dang/ 'dod chags rdo rje dmar mo zhags pa thogs pa
191a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ zhe sdang rdo rje ljang khu ral gri thogs pa rnams bsgom mo/ /khyams kyi grwa bzhir ni byang shar nas brtsams te brtan pa'i rdo rje ma ser mo ri rab thogs pa dang/ sbyor pa'i rdo rje ma dkar mo zla ba thogs pa dang/ 'bar ba'i rdo rje ma dmar
191a6(rgyud 'grel): mo nyi ma thogs pa dang/ stobs kyi rdo rje ma ljang khu ba dan thogs pa rnams dgod do/ /brgyad ba 'di dag ni pad+ma dang ro'i gdan la rnam par gnon pa yin no/ /de bzhin du shar dang/ lho dang nub dang/ byang gi sgo bzhir yang go rims ltar rdo rje lcags
191a7(rgyud 'grel): kyu dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags sgrogs dang/ dril bu 'dzin pa rnams dkar ba dang/ ser ba dang/ dmar ba dang/ ljang khu'i mdog can rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /ji ltar dam tshig bskyed pa dang/ ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa nyid/ /
191b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags bzlas shing bsgom pa dang/ /rdzogs pa'i rims sogs che ga bzhin/ /dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i man ngag khungs phyung ba/ slob dpon chen po mi phim sbas pas bsdus ba rdzogs so// //rnal
191b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gyi dbang phyug sh+rI mi tra dang/ gnubs lo tsA ba mai tri sh+rIs bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI b+ha ga wA nE ka dzA Ti sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig ma'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun ral pa

191b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rin chen rus pas brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis dbu rgyan cing/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas rtags 'chang ma/ /gar gyi nyams dgugs dgyes bzhugs nyid/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam brgyan pa'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dag pa yis
192a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i phyag rgya brtan byas la/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang/ /rdo rje dril pu'i rigs pas sbyang/ /rdo rjes mchod sogs sngon 'gro bas/ /snying rje chen po mdun bzhag ste/ /sa gsum rnam par sbyong ba yi/ /

192a3(rgyud 'grel): kun sgrub byed gsang sngags 'di/ /de rjes lus can snying brtse bas/ /gtso bo nye bar bya phyir bzlas/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM badzrod+d+ha ba ka ra dz+nyA na pra tiSh+Tha ta hUM phaT swAhA/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs rje ba/ /gsang sngags rgyal po rdo rje can/ /ral pa gcig

192b6(rgyud 'grel): zla ba skar ma'i phreng ba bzhin/ /h+rIM tri hUM phaT/ de nas tshad med rnam bzhi yi/ /mi zad yid kyi rlung bskyod pas/ /'od zer me lce ltar 'bar gyur/ /don gnyis don gsum bsgrubs nas ni/ /bzlas pa'i 'khor lo 'khor lo bzhin/
192b7(rgyud 'grel): sa gsum yi ge gsum gyi 'od/ /sa gsum 'khor lo gsum dngos te/ /dngos gsum dag pa gsum du 'dod/ /bde gsal rnam par mi rtag dang/ /gdod nas de bzhin nyid rdzogs bsgom/ /de nas gtor ma sbyin pa ni/ /cho ga sems
193a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed sngon btang nas/ /rang nyid lha myur bskyed nas ni/ /cho ga rnams gsum phyag rgyar bcas/ /dpa' chen rang nyid lhar dran las/ /mchod rdzas bdud rtsi mchog gyur par/ /bsam byas snying gi 'od zer gyis/ /
193a2(rgyud 'grel): dgug pa'i 'gron rnams tshim par bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM h+ri h+rI hUM byin gyis brlab ba'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): ratna gu ru sh+rI b+ha ga pA na ze ka dza Ta dza Di sarba aSh+Ta de ba ta sarba d+harmA ba laM ta kha kha khA hi/ /ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ /nye bar sbyin pa'o/ /
193a3(rgyud 'grel): ma lus lha sku gsang sngags dang/ /ting 'dzin gang zhig gang gis ni/ /gang du ji ltar bsgom pa nyid/ /kun rdzob don dam mtshan nyid kyis/ /rmi lam nam mkha' deb yis ni/ /khas pas chos rnams rtogs par 'gyur/ /blo sgra dpe zhes bya
193a4(rgyud 'grel): ba yis/ /bsam brjod mtshon par mi nus pa/ /so so rang rig 'od gsal yul/ /gang de nam mkha' i mtshan nyid do/ /ji srid sna tshogs sku gsung thugs/ /'di dag snang ba rang snang ba/ /bden brdzun gnyis dang gnyis min tshul/ /rmi lam gyi

193a6(rgyud 'grel): thod shog /rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po sh+rI badzra kIrtI zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI e ka dza TI yA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal ral gcig ma'i sgrub thabs/ /jo mo byin brlabs can la phyag
193a7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /dran pa tsam gyis sems can rnams/ /oM byang 'phel zhing bar chad zhi/ /dgra rnams 'dul zhing byang chub nye/ /ral gcig ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can nyon mongs bsod nams chung/ /'khor bar yun ring gnas pa la/ /
193b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang thun mong thob bya'i phyir/ /jo mo'i sgrub thabs brtsam par bya/ /dur khrod la sogs nyam nga bar/ /mi ro'i stan la rab 'dus nas/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas/ /dngos sam yang na yid kyis kyang/ /yan lag bdun nam rnam bzhir tsha?
193b2(rgyud 'grel): song pa'i ngang las pad+ma'i gdan/ /ro dang nyi ma zla ba la/ /skad cig dran pa tsam gyis kyang/ /dpal ldan chen mo sku mdog gnag /zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi pa/ /g.yas gnyis ral gri gri gug dang/ /g.yon pa utpal thod pa rnams/ /ral pa sger

193b5(rgyud 'grel): tsam skyo bar gyur pa na/ /rig pa 'di yang brjod par bya/ /h+rI hI hUM phaT/ /mtshan dang ldan pa'i thod pa'am/ /yang na ci yang rung ba'i snod/ /sha lnga bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i/ /ba li rgyan gyis mchod pa bya/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bstod pa 'dis/
193b6(rgyud 'grel): gdangs dang ldan par bstod par bya/ /pra ta ni ni Dal a ro ba ti/ /g+h+ri ta b+h+ri ta g+h+rar ang te hA sa na 'od/ /sra ya hUM khaTTa g+hA ni la ga pa dza tra dzu tra u g+hA ni g+ha ba ra ga ti ga pu dz+nyA da traM nas sa ka pa la/ ki ti ra dzu gu taM haM ut+ta ta ra ye saM/ /thal chen
193b7(rgyud 'grel): khrag dang sbyar ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor dag kyang rtag tu dbul/ /zab mo'i don yang bsgom par bya/ /de lta bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /mi yi ro'am dur khrod ngam/ /gtsug lag khang dang ma yi dam du/ /lus ngag yid gsum 'bar ba yis/ /zhag cig bdun bdun
194a1(rgyud 'grel): dang rtsa gcig /gsum lo gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhal gyi dkyil 'khor bstan nas ni/ /gang ltar 'dod pa dri ba gyis/ /de lta bu yi lung bstan nas/ /dngos grub rnam pa gnyis kyang thob/ /thun mong tshe ring nad
194a2(rgyud 'grel): med cing/ /yo byad dang ni rigs brgyud 'phel/ /kun gyis lta ba'i 'os su 'gyur/ /mchog ni byang chub the tshom med/ /dpal ldan chen mo grub nas kyang/ /gdug pa'i gnod sbyin rnam pa gnyis/ /drag po'i shugs kyis 'phrin las byed/ /
194a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na kA la nag po ni/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du brdzes/ /sprul dang thod pa'i rgyan dang bcas/ /dar nag gos kyi le'u can/ /zhabs la sag sti yu thung gon/ /sbrul nag bcus pa'i ske rags byas/ /g.yas pa ral gri klad la bskor/ /
194a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa utpal dkar po rnams/ /mtshe gcig tog tog skan sgra can/ /g.yon na b+hi ka la dmar po/ /ral pa gsigs pas sa gzhi khengs/ /khro gnyer dpral bar bzhin bsdus pa'i/ /leb rgan dmar po sku la gsol/ /rkang pa brjeb cing
194a5(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa 'dul/ /gri gug g.yas pa thod pa g.yon/ /zhal nas drag po'i dan sngags sgrogs/ /a yin h+rid srid has phreng/ /hang sa hu hang sa hung/ has pring a yin hing srid/ /gdug pa'i drag sngags 'di dag kyang/ /gnod sbyin gnyis kyi srog
194a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang yin/ /de dag 'grub par gyur pa na/ /bsam pa tsam gyis rings pa dang/ /khros pa tsam gyis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /thal mo brdangs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mi ma yin pa'i 'byung po rnams/ /seng ge mthong ba'i ri dags bzhin/ /mthong ba tsam
194a7(rgyud 'grel): gyis 'bros par 'gyur/ /de ltar yin gyis gdams pa 'di/ /'gro ba rnams la phan gyur cig /'di 'dra'i gdams ngag dam pa 'dis/ /kha nas me 'bar khod du sbrul zhugs pa'i/ /bu ngan phal la sbyin pa min/ /dpal rag pa gcig ma'i
194b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub thabs 'khor gnod sbyin dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //rje grub thob chen po'i thugs dam/ /gnubs lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ /ma N+ya lo ke pa ri nA ma/ bod skad du/ brgyal?
194b2(rgyud 'grel): ba nor bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye kye rdo rje 'dzin sogs bdag dgongs gsal/ /dpa' chen khyod drin tshang med kyis/ /bdag bcag nyon mongs dgra las rgyal/ /legs so mgon po khyod legs
194b3(rgyud 'grel): so/ /e ma ho rdo rje'i thugs sangs rgyas/ /e ma ho e baM rdo rje'i chos/ /e ma de sgrub dge 'dun tshogs/ /skyabs gsum rdo rje gcig khyod 'dud/ /sa gsum mkhas sbyod gnas gsum dang/ /sgo gsum rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs/ /mngos
194b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum zab zhi dri bral du/ /ston pa khyod la bdag dga' o/ /de phyir bdag dang 'gro kun gyis/ /bgyis dang bgyid 'gyur dge chen 'di/ /'od gsal bde chen rnams mi rtog /sku gsum rnam dag mthar phyin shog /skye zhing skye ba kun tu yang/ /
194b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs su skye dang dam tshig tsan/ /lag na rdo rje dril 'dzin/ /zag med bdud rtsi 'thung bar shog /dri med rang 'byung skyob bde dang/ /dga' bde dus ma byas sngags zab/ /dkyil 'khor mchog tshogs mi slu ba'i/ /bden pas dngos grub
194b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog thob shog /rdo rje thogs pa'i bsngo ga nor bu'i sgron ma/ /slob dpon mi phan zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta su b+ha sh+rI shIn+ta dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba byams pI dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o//
194b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ /sh+rI e ka dzA Ta b+ha ga wa na sto tra/ bod skad du/ dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo gang zhig dus gsum rgyal ba'i
195a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje thugs las sprul pa'i sku/ /mkha' ltar stong nyid ma ltar snying rjes byams sogs tshad med las byung ba/ /pad+ma nyid dbus bde chen thob pa de bzhin mi ro khros pa yi/ /sna tshogs gdan stongs ye shes yig bsru?
195a2(rgyud 'grel): TaM las yongs 'gyur thod pa dang/ /gri gug las grub hUM dang phyag mtshan 'gro ba'i don sgrub byed pa'i rgyu/ /'bar las bltam byas 'jigs pa'i sku chen shin tu mi bzang rngam pa'i sku/ /'gyin bag rab brtan gzi brjid dpal bar
195a3(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs sgrib tshogs bsreg pa yi/ /ye shes me 'bar kun nas 'khyil ba'i 'od zer drag po dpung 'khrigs shing/ /sdig pa'i rngam stabs hUM sgra dang bcas dag po'i gad mo can/ phyogs bcur gar 'gyed mi thub gcig tu lha klu lha min
195a4(rgyud 'grel): dpung las rgyal/ /bde chen rgyal po gnyis med mchog ngags rtag tu sdug bsngal rnams gnon rtsal/ /rgyal ba dgra rgyal sdug bsngal sdig 'joms dpa' bo dpal chen la phyag 'tshal/ /gar dgur nyams ldan cung zad zhi zhing kho
195a5(rgyud 'grel): dang khro zhing zhi/ /brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin stobs bcu'i dbang phyug mi dang lha las rnam par rgyal/ /sa gsum bdag po lha yi lhar gyur pa bde gshegs ma lus 'phrin las bsgrubs/ /mi g.yo mi 'gyur rtag tu brtan nas de bzhin nyid
195a6(rgyud 'grel): yul zab mo'i lam/ /sgyu ma mkha' 'gro nyid kyi thugs chud ma lus 'gro la rjes chags nas/ /slar yang 'dir zhugs skal ldan srog chags snying gi padmo kha phye nas/ /chags med chags bral gti mug las grol rab tu sdang ba rnam par bshig /
195a7(rgyud 'grel): kun tu rtog spangs rab tu brtan gnas nges pa'i sar chud de nyid thugs rje khros pa yi/ /'jigs byed skur bstan 'bar ba'i zhal gsum dkar dang dmar po sngon po'i mdog /spyan gsum thogs med smar smin ser g.yo ba'i ba spu gyen
195b1(rgyud 'grel): du dgreng/ /dmar zlum spyan bzlog 'od 'bar las byung bgegs tshogs bsreg pa'i me stag 'phro/ /ye shes rnon po'i mche ba gnyis gtsigs rngam zhing bzhad pa'i zhal bgrang de/ /ha ha'i sgra sgrogs rta skang 'tsher ba'i nga ro ku ce gang rgyangs 'phyin
195b2(rgyud 'grel): stab cing rab brgyal 'khrugs pa'i skad gsar ngar ngar rab sar 'o dod 'bod/ /gdug pa'i snying 'byin ma rungs snang 'chod gcod sgra drag pos sa 'khrug pa/ /rnam rgyal khro bo bdud dgra dpung 'dul 'phrin las lha dbang khyod phyag 'tshal//
195b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar ser 'gying ba'i ral pa gcig bcas bde gshegs gtso bo mi bskyod pas/ /drags pa'i dbu brgyan sangs rgyas rnam lnga'i mi thod 'jigs pa'i phreng ba can/ /utpal padmo mo'i sgyu zhags sbrul gdugs khrod pa'i rna rgyan can/ /de
195b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mi rus rin chen sbrul rgyal shin tu 'od 'bar 'jigs pa yi/ /rgyan rnams kyis brgyan sil sil sgra sgrogs kun nas bsdigs pa'i stabs kyis 'gyed pa'i tshul/ /phyag g.yas gri gug rdo rje ral gri de bzhin g.yon phyag
195b5(rgyud 'grel): mgo byed dang/ /utpal sngon mdzes dri bsung yid 'phrogs phyogs bcur dang ldang thugs kar 'dzin/ /dpal ldan gtso bo'i thub pa thub mchog mi pham gcig pu rnam par gnon/ /stangs stabs bgrad pas phaT ces brjod cing
195b6(rgyud 'grel): lha yi brtan pa mi 'gul zhabs g.yas ni/ /dbugs bral gtso bo'i mgo bo nas brdzis g.yon pas gzhibs pa'i rkang gnyis mnan/ /dpa' bo stag pags spu rtse rab 'khrugs du ba 'khyil 'dra gson pa ni/ /bshus pa'i mod la da
195b7(rgyud 'grel): ltar khrag 'jog glo bur stabs pas blangs nas su/ /khros pas bskyod 'dra mi yi bskyob pa pha rol dpung rnams rnam bzlog cing/ /nyid kyi phyogs bsrung zhi rgyas dbang drag ma lus gsang sngags mngon par bsgrub/ /thog med rab
196a1(rgyud 'grel): ltar shin tu mi zlog kun gyis mi thub thub dka' ba/ /nam mkha' kun khyabs chen g.yos mdzad bde gshegs gtso bo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /gang gi snying ni gtso bo chu skyes gsang 'khrungs phyogs kyis mtshon 'dra'i
196a2(rgyud 'grel): kha dog can/ /dkar ser dmar ljang rab tu gsal rgyas de dbus rab tu 'bar ba'i hUM/ /ye shes 'od 'phros 'gro ba'i sdig bsregs phyogs bcur mkha' khyab 'gengs pa yi/ /me lce'i phrad dgrigs mkha' i la nyi ltar kun nas rtag tu lham
196a3(rgyud 'grel): me ba/ /de'i mthar ni dag gi yig 'bru skar ma'i 'od can rnam pa bzhi/ /gsal par ltas te mchod sogs sngon 'gro ji bzhin ji snyed tshogs bsgrubs nas/ /grub pa'i las ni rnam bzhi'i 'phrin las sa gsum lus can kun sgro mdzad/ /
196a4(rgyud 'grel): de las slar 'ongs dkar bsil lus ngag yid kyi dri ma rnam par dag /byas nas de rjes bla ma'i zhal blangs de nyid ye shes mnyam gzhag ste/ /sku gsung thugs dag de bzhin dag de 'ang dri med gang yin gang/ /de nyid ye shes shes dang
196a5(rgyud 'grel): shes bral mdza' rnams las dben kun spyod pa/ /rnal 'byor chen po bde chen de ni bla ma'i drin thob khyod kyis bsgrub/ /brtse ba'i rgyud bskyong byin rlabs ma ni rnam bdun rnam gsum ye shes snying po lce mdud bcas/ /sa gsum na khyab
196a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag med yod med dri ma ma lus las/ /rnam dben de ni rgyal ba'i sku zhes 'dren pa khyod kyis mthu ston cing/ /de rjes dri med sgyu 'dra mkha' 'dra rnam gsum rnam thar sgo spyod pa/ /so so rang rig snying gi dbus gnas bde gshegs snying
196a7(rgyud 'grel): po rtogs dka' ba/ /rtogs mdzad dam pa drang srong mi dbang lha yi dbang phyug ral pa gcig /kun rtog mi zad 'chi ba mi gnas shes rab pha rol phyin dbang gis/ /gcod pa'i mtshon cha shes rab ral gri chags med chags bral utpal
196b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ /bzlas brjod dka' thub sbyin sreg gtod sogs sgrub pa'i mtshan ma brgya phrag gis/ /mnyes par mi nus gang zhig lam min de nyid de la ma gzhan min pa/ /shin tu zab mo gsang ba'i lam gyur yang dag spas pa mngon
196b2(rgyud 'grel): rnyed pa/ /dpal gyi dpal dbang srid gsum thibs po'i mun 'joms ral pa gcig 'chang khyod phyag 'tshal/ /dpal ldan 'jig rten gsum rgyal po/ /sku gsung thugs dag srid 'joms pa/ /zhi bas mi bsnyed 'phrin las sgrub/ /
196b3(rgyud 'grel): lha yi lha mchog ral pa gcig /dus gsum rgyal ba'i ye shes kyi/ /mkha' dbyings las byung lha mchog nyid/ /ye shes 'od zer stong 'bar ba/ /gzhan gyis mi thub ral pa gcig /sna tshogs pad nyid thod par ro/ /hUM
196b4(rgyud 'grel): dang bri gug las byung ba/ /ye shes sku mchog zhal gsum phyag /bzhi ldan bcom ldan khyod phyag 'tshal/ /gri gug ral gri thod pa dang/ /utpal 'dzin mdzad 'jigs pa'i sku/ /padmo yi ge rnam pa ldas/ /sa gsum sbyong
196b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal/ /ma dag pa dang dag pa dag /dri med de ni ye shes dngos/ /thogs med rtag tu bsgyur nas ni/ /'gro ba'i don bsgrub khyod phyag 'tshal/ /dran pa tsam gyi bdud 'dul zhing/ /dgra 'joms nyon mongs kun bsreg pa/ /bde
196b6(rgyud 'grel): chen snying rje stong pa nyid/ /ro myang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan dpa' mo khro mo'i sku/ /gzhon nus sgeg mo 'jigs ma yi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dgyes rol cig /dam du 'khyud phyag bcas khyod 'dud/ /gdul bya'i rigs ni ji bzhin
196b7(rgyud 'grel): du/ /khyod kyis mdzad pa'i rim pa yang/ /de bzhin nyid de phun sum tshogs/ /ral pa gcig mnga' khyed phyag 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal ral pa gcig pa la bstod pa/ kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha sh+rI b+ha dra dang/ bod kyi lo chung
197a1(rgyud 'grel): gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa'o/ /rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ swa tsit+ta bi sh+rA mo pany+tsi baM sha ti kA gA thA nA ma/ bod skad du/ rang gi sems ngal so
197a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i man ngag tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma ho gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /'khor dang 'das pa'i byed rgyu can/ /gzhan mi rang gi snying dbus mas/ /bla ma'i zhal las shes par
197a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /gang skyes gnyug ma nyid yin phyir/ /gang shar dran pa ma brjed na/ /de shar stong pa nyid bdag tu/ /rnal 'byor rgyal po gdon mi zad/ /gang shar thams cad de yin te/ /de ni gang du 'ang ma shar ba'o/ /de phyir gang skyes de ma skyes/ /ma
197a4(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa nyid skye ba'i tshul/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum sdig mdzub gtad/ /rdo rje'i lta bas bltas nas ni/ /rta mchog dal bus 'gro 'ong la/ gnas nas du ma gcig tu bya/ /rkang pa rgya mtsho che la bzhag /lag pa sa steng kun tu nyul/ /
197a5(rgyud 'grel): mi gnyis nam mkha' blta bya ste/ /yid ni gang du 'ang mi g.yo'o/ /sgeg mo'i me long stobs kyi kyang/ /khri btson rgyal po'i btsun mo dang/ /phyag dar ba dang smad 'chod bzhin/ /gcig pur grogs dang 'grogs par byos/ /stag dang seng ge
197a6(rgyud 'grel): glang chen dang/ /rnga mo khri snyan spre'u dang/ /tsan dan sdod po mi ro ltar/ /mkhas pas stong nyid rnal 'byor bya/ /ri gzar chu dang rgya mtsho che/ /bu gcig ma dang glang po skyong/ /gangs ri dag dang shel dag bzhin/ /dmigs bral gyur nas gzhi tshug
197a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /theg ma bar dang mthar rim bzhin/ /rtsa ba ngo bo bye bral ba/ /rmi lam gyi ni mar me bzhin/ /snying brtse mi g.yo goms pas 'grub/ /'gro 'od gnas ni skye gnas 'gag /rnam dag stong pa nyid rnam gsum/ /bde chen 'od gsal rnam
197b1(rgyud 'grel): mi rtog /blo bzang rnams kyis mnyam par bzhag /snying rje chen po mdun bzhag ste/ /de nyid ma yengs rtag blta zhing/ /lha dang bla ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgrub pa po ni ngal bso bya/ /bu nyon khyod gang rnam par rtog /'dir bdag ma bcings ma
197b2(rgyud 'grel): grol phyir/ /ma yengs ma bcod rang dgar ni/ /kye ho dub pa dal so cig /gzugs brnyan gzugs dang brag cha sgra/ /dngos dang rmi lam dran pa'i yid/ /ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa dang/ /rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad sgom pa/ /gser bzhin me bzhin
197b3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' bzhin/ /shes byed zhi byed dag par byed/ /snang med de snang rkyen gyis snang/ /nam mkha' me long shel bzhin te/ /ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang/ /gzungs kyi sgo yis de rtogs byed/ /mthong ba mnyam gzhag 'od gsal te/ /de tshe
197b4(rgyud 'grel): de mthong de ma skyes/ /shin tu mi rtog rtse gcig gnas/ /g.yeng ba'i rdul dang bral ba nyid/ /rlung ni gar 'gro der sems 'gro/ /de lus khyim nang btson bzung nas/ /yid kyis skyes bu gsang byas na/ /de med sems ni gang du 'gro/ /thams cad rang
197b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ma bcos pa/ /kun rtog thams cad rkyen gyi dbang/ /rang bzhin gsum gyis de shes nas/ /kun rtog kun rtog med par byed/ /mthong bas grub dang bshig pa na/ /med ces rnam par rtog par brad/ /'di la gdong nas ci yang med/ /bu
197b6(rgyud 'grel): kye nam mkha' bsgom par byos/ /ga pur dang ni de yi dri/ /phan tshun de med de yang med/ /de bzhin rkyen dang rkyen bral ba/ /so so ma yin rang dgar bsgom/ /mnyam pa'i sems kyis g.yo ba 'gog /mi mnyam dran pas 'ching bar byed/ /de tshe de dang bral
197b7(rgyud 'grel): mnyam gzhag /rnam par rtog pa gsod par byed/ /khrus byas nam mkha' i gos gyon la/ /rnam par rtog pa sbyin sreng bya/ /dran pa'i thal ba 'jug ngo gsu/ /chu lhung lhan cig sbyang bar gyis/ /snod bcud rlung rgyun brtan g.yo mkha' / /nyi ma zla ba sgra gcan 'dzin/ /me
198a1(rgyud 'grel): khyer char dang bung ba'i dpes/ /dam tshig phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur/ /sna tshogs yid kyi me tog las/ /dga' ba rnam bzhi'i bcud blangs te/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ro myang bas/ /yid kyi skyes bu tshim par
198a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /lus rlung rtsa chen phyag rgya yis/ /lus ngag yid ni bcings byar bya/ /drod thob pa la thogs pa med/ /kun spyod nges par mi bya'o/ /rnal 'byor pa rang gi sems ngal sos par byed pa'i man ngag tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes pa
198a3(rgyud 'grel): bde kho na nyid rnal du mtshon par byed pa'i do ha rdzogs so// //jo bo sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug las man dag gi tshigs su bcad pa nyid dngos su gsan nas/ grub pa brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po sh+rI dza ta mi trA nanda dang/
198a4(rgyud 'grel): lo tsA byams pa'i dpal gyis dpal gu lang gser khang gi nags khrod aM bar pa ra ta'i bsil khang du bsgyur pa'o// //rtogs pa brjod pa sum cu pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ tri shat+tya ba b+ho Sha/ bod skad du
198a5(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa brjod pa sum cu pa/ jo bo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa tshangs dbang gtsug /chu skyes che dbus 'jig rten mgon/ /'od zer rgyun gyis dbang bskur bas/ /e ma dri gsum dag mdzad rmad/ /bstan
198a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lus ni ri bo 'dra/ /spros dral sems ni nam mkha' ste/ /g.yo ba'i sems ni rlung rgyun bcings/ /tshul 'dis rnal 'byor bdag legs grol/ /yid ni khyab 'jug nam mkha' i ste/ /'khor lo lnga yi rang bzhin lus/ /srog rtsol nyi ma zla ba
198a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ /bde chen rdo rje'i zhags pas 'ching/ /dri ma lnga ni lnga yis sbyang/ /lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs/ /de dag ma bcos skye ba med/ /e ma 'di na bsgom bya gang/ /rgya mtsho'i snying po me 'bar bas/ /ri rab srog shing shing rta brgyud/ /
198b1(rgyud 'grel): tshangs dbang rtse nas char rgyun 'bab/ /thabs kyis thabs bral de la ltos/ /gang ma rig pa de stong nyid/ /kun nas dkris pa bde ba'i tshal/ /zhe sdang 'bar bas 'od gsal che/ /lha mchog mi de gang gis bcings/ /lte ba'i mar mes mun pa bsal/ /snying
198b2(rgyud 'grel): gar shes rab pad+ma rgyas/ /spyi gtsug ye shes bde chen 'dzag /de ni rang lus dngos grub 'gyur/ /rtsa gsum 'khor lo 'dus pa'i dbus/ /bde chen dangs ma'i thig le gnas/ /de dbus rnam pa mi rtog pa/ /ye shes mi gcig dri med nyid/ /gzung
198b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin mun par rtogs pa'i 'od/ /nam mkha' la ni nyi shar bzhin/ /der yang mi gnas gzhan du 'ang min/ /kye ho shin tu zab pa'i gnas/ /'jig rten thams cad nam mkhas bcings/ /nam mkha' de yi sprin gyis bsgribs/ /gang tshe rtog pa'i sbrin dag
198b4(rgyud 'grel): ba can? de tshe di la ci zhig snang/ /sgyu mas sgyu ma'i grong khyer bcom/ /sems kyis sems ni slu ba ste/ /'di nas bdag 'dras slu med rig /e ma'o e ma bla ma'i drin/ /'og ni las kyi 'khor los bsdams/ /bar ni rdo rje'i mdud pas bcings/ /
198b5(rgyud 'grel): steng du yi ge gyen du bsgyur/ /thabs ni bdag gis rang la rnyed/ /lus ni ri po 'dra byas la/ /ngag ni rlung rgyun lta bur bsdams/ /sems ni nam mkha' i ngo bo nyid/ /dbyer med chos nyid kun gyi dngos/ /brtan lus shing rta rab bcas pa/ /g.yo ba
198b6(rgyud 'grel): srog shing laM du gzhug /de ltar bcings pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ /'chi med nam mkha' i dngos grub thob/ /nam mkha' i rnal 'byor rnam mi rtog /yongs dag lha ni bdeb che/ /de yi zung 'jug 'od bsal nyid/ /gnas 'dir ngal bso mkhas pa dag /rdo rje
198b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa rdo rje 'chang/ /rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje bde/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpas stong/ /e ma rdo rje kun rig pa'o/ /me tog mthing gi rtsi mi mthong/ /chab rom mthong gi chu ma yin/ /lus mthong bde ba blang par gyis/ /sems mthong mthong
199a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ma mchis so/ /chu nang skyes bu su yi bu/ /rmi lam grong khyer bdag po med/ /me long gzugs ni gang las 'ongs/ /'gro ba 'di kun de dang 'dra/ /gdan gnas dang skye ba dang/ /'gags 'gyur du?? rgyu dung
199a2(rgyud 'grel): med pa/ /nam mkha' i mtshan nyid chos 'di la/ /kye ho 'jigs pa gang zhig yod/ /'di dag snang ba snang bsnyan tsam/ /rig pa de yang rig pas dben/ /tham cad rig snyam shes snyam ste/ /tsam snyam de 'ang snyam nyid med/ /skyes bu don kun grub pa'ang/ /ne?
199a3(rgyud 'grel): sdang nyi ma 'od gsal lha/ /'dad chags zla ba bde bas spyod/ /gti mug sgra gcan mi rtog 'joms/ /nam mkha' i sprin dang rgya mtsho'i rlabs/ /me tog rtsi dang ga bur dri/ /me long gzugs dang shel dkar bzhin/ /rnam rtog mi rtog dngos dbyer med
199a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba 'di dag las bas skyes/ las ni nyon mongs de yi rgyu/ /mtshan ma yin te de shes nas/ /skyes bu mtshan med rnam par grol/ /rtog pa'i glang chen lcags kyus dgug /sems kyi bung pa rtsi yis bsdu/ /ting 'dzin dang pa mtsho nang rtse/ /
199a5(rgyud 'grel): shis rab padmo nyi zer 'byed/ /yid kyi mar mes mun pa sel/ /bde ba'i me tog gung bas 'jib/ /'dzin pa'i rba rlabs rgya mtshor thim/ /bde sdug sprin de nam mkha' dngos/ /yi ge gsum gyi brdas mtshon pas/ /yi ge med pa dag gis
199a6(rgyud 'grel): rtogs/ /rnal 'byor rgyal po yi ge mchog /sems las gzhan ni ma mchis so/ /gang du 'gro med 'gro ba 'di/ /gnas shes bya bar ga la 'gyur/ /gang mi gnas pa chos kyi dbyings/ /nge la ji ltar 'gag 'gyur sems/ /rtag tu byed bral gti mug med/ /khong khro bag
199a7(rgyud 'grel): chags brtan bcos pa/ /zhi ba'i dam pa mya ngan 'das/ /gter chen rang la yod shes kyis/ /'jig rten sgyu ma'i las kyis bsgrubs/ /sgyu ma sgyu ma'i yid kyis te/ /'di kun sgyu ma nyid shes na/ /sgyu ma lta bur rnam par srol/ /sgyu mar
199b1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pas bden rtogs 'joms/ /rtog med sgyu ma la mi gnas/ /mi gnas 'gro la phan brtson pas/ /e ma nor bu rin chen rnyed/ /rtag pa brjod pa sum cu pa zhes byi ba rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
199b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po mi tra rdo ki de nyid kyi spyan sngar/ gnu pas lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI kha sarbwA Na ma twI sA d+hA nAM/ bod skad du/ dpal kha sarbA Ni yab yum gyi sgrub thabs/ 'phags pa
199b3(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig spyan ras gzigs dbang yum/ /thugs rje'i dbyings las sku bzhengs pa/ /ye shes lha mo dmar mo sgeg /dpa' mo nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la sgrub po dam tshig can/ /gsang sngags rgyal
199b4(rgyud 'grel): pa la mos pas/ /dur khrod dmar po'i dbus su ni/ /cho ga rnam gsum bsgom par bya/ /re shig skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ /sems bskyed khyad par can bskyed nas/ /dam tshig blum la'i mchod pa dang ldan pas/ /me tog dmar po'i

199b6(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /ngang las skyes gyu rang lha mo 'am/ /yang na lte dbus sprul pa'i nang/ /chos 'byung pad+ma mi rolO/ /bi las mngon gyur dmar mo dpa' / /bcu drug mtshong shin tu sgeg /cung zad khra ba'i zhal bzhad dam/ /gri gug thong 'dzin
199b7(rgyud 'grel): kha TwAM bsnams/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba'i ngo shal brgyan/ /g.yon bskum g.yas rkyang dbang phyug dang/ /u ma'i nu ma mnyam brdzis mdzad/ /shin tu 'od gsal 'jigs pa yi/ /mi rus rdo rje'i phreng pas spras/ /dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra
200a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrogs pa'o/ /skra grol gcer bu bde ba'i nyams/ /rdor phreng rdo rje zur bud ldan/ /g.yung drung 'khyil pas smin mtshams brgyan/ /sngags gsum gyis bkang b+ha ga'o/ /de snying padmo dmar dbus su/ /ye shes
200a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phyag rgyas 'dzin/ /baM zhes bya ba rnam shes khyim/ /rnam rtog bsdus dad mi rtog grol/ go rim ji bzhin ji gnas dang/ /lhag mthong rnal 'byor bsgom par bya/ /de tshe dmigs pa rang dga' dang/ 'chad bzhi pas bde chen/
200a3(rgyud 'grel): rnyed/ /'od zer bzhu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /snad ba thim dang sems can thim/ /lus thim srog thim nam mkha' yi/ /rnal 'byor nyi zla zung du 'jug /dpal 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi sgrub thabs/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po
200a4(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI mi twa'i gdams pa rdzogs so// //gnubs lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI dwa ya b+h+ra tra ra yak+Sha sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin spun gnyis kyi sgrub thabs/ dpal rdo rje 'dzin
200a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis bkang sdod 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /gzhon nu khros pa rngam pa'i tshul/ /gnod sbyin rgyal bo nor sbyin dang/ /grags chen 'jigs pa mkhas pas bsgrubs/ /dur khrod la sogs yang bar bar/ /'jig
200a6(rgyud 'grel): rten mgon ba'i ltas mthong bas/ /de nyid rig pa dran byas la/ /tshar gcod rjes su 'dzin pa yis/ /byang chub sems gnyis yang dag bsgom/ /stong dang snying rje dbyer med las/ /rang nyid spyan ras gzigs khror bsgoms/ /zhebs

200b1(rgyud 'grel): blta/ /bsad gri cit+ta g.yas dang g.yon/ /de bzhin rnga chen mgo phyed 'dzin/ /rus pa rin chen stag pags pa rgyan/ /zho zhing zhil rab tu mdzes/ /mchod cing byin brlabs dbang bskur dang/ /rgyas 'dab bka' la 'dags pa dang/ /dam tshig
200b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing bskul ba dang/ /thams cad bdag po'i bka' yis ba/ /dkar dmar pa dan gyis mtshan pa'i/ /dkar dmar gtor ma las bshams la/ /ra ? gas 'bru gsum ldan pa yis/ /bdud rtsir bsgyur la thob mar sbyin/ /da rjis 'gro
200b3(rgyud 'grel): la phan yid kyis/ /nor 'phel gnod sbyin srog snying ni/ /snying khar bkod la 'dod pas bzlas/ /'od 'phros rin chen char phab bsam/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM kaM badzra ka la ma hA d+ha naM hUM phaT swAhA/ /gnod sbyin kA la'i snying po'o/ /de bzhin phyogs

200b7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub po rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /phyi nang rnyed grogs sgrub byed 'di/ /rkun bos rnyed pa'i nor bzhin du/ /'bad de gsang bas bsgrub par bya/ /dpal gnod sbyin spun gnyis kyi sgrub thabs/ /slob dpon a dzi ta mi dras mdzad pa rdzogs

202b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid do/ /lha dang lngags dang dbyer med cing/ /sngags kyi de nyid bsam gtan bya/ /de yi mdza' la bde ba brnga'i/ /gnas la lha'i sku ru bsgom/ /bla ma'i man ngag bka' stsal gsung/ /bdag gis de nyid rjes su myong/ /sngags dang phyag

203b6(rgyud 'grel): dung ma tshig nyams par 'gyur/ /'di ni maha ma zhes ba'i/ /sgom pa goms pa'i gsung gis bris/ /'dir bsdus mdzes par gyur pa yis/ /bla ma las 'ongs thob pa yis/ /rgyal ba'i tshul gyis rigs de nyid/ /rang gis rjes myong gcig tu rigs/ /
203b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mdza' dag de yis ni/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog thob shog /dpal ldan rje btsun rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs kyi snang ba rje btsun ma hi mas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA d+ha ra dang/
204a1(rgyud 'grel): yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal ldan sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// //lnga bcu pa'i bshad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa shi kA Ti pi Ni/ bod skad
204a2(rgyud 'grel): du/ lnga bcu pa'i bshad pa/ /dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi skye ba la sogs 'gro rnams sdug bsngal mdza' dag 'di yis dang por bcom/ slar yang de ring de bzhin ma 'ongs rab gsal 'khor lo gsum la khyab
204a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa/ /shes rab pad+mar shar bas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rab tu gsal gyur pa'i/ /dri med 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'chil nas ni lnga bcu pa ni rab bshad bya/ /de nas 'di ni zhes pa la sogs pa'i de nas zhes pa'i sgra ni gzhung rtsom pa
204a4(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /de'i mthar zhes rig par bya'o/ /'di ni zhes pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ngo bo'i sngags rab tu bshad par bya'o/ /zhes 'brel lo/ /de bzhin du rnam pa ni sngags so/ /mchog
204a5(rgyud 'grel): tu zhes pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /de bzhin du gsang ba ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'jig rten yang dag rmongs zhes ba ni 'jig rten pa ni mu stegs pa
204a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams so/ /de rnams yang dag rmongs pa ni rang gi sgrub pa'i mdza' i sems med par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir yang gang gi yang dag rmongs par 'gyur ba ni de'i sems par 'gyur ba'o/ /mchog ni phul du byung ba ste/ de'i yang dag rmongs pa'o/ /gang gi
204a7(rgyud 'grel): phyir rigs dang rigs byung mngon brjod pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir gang las mu stegs pa'i grub mdza' i phyir/ rigs dang rigs las byung ba'i rnam par bzhag pa ste/ de'i phyir mu stegs byed rnams kyis de'i lugs kyis de bzhin
204b1(rgyud 'grel): du gdul byar gyur pa sna tshogs pa'i gdul bya 'dul ba'i luT ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis/ yang dag pa'i bzhed pas so zhes so/ /de'i phyir gang las mu stegs pa rnams rigs dang rigs las byung ba'i sgra thos nas de las 'dir bcos
204b2(rgyud 'grel): la dad pa skye bar 'gyur zhing/ /dad pa las man ngag la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te/ /bdag nyid chen po'i khyad par yongs su shes nas rang gi grub pa'i mdza' log bar lta ba yongs su spangs te yang dag ba'i tshul bde bar gshegs pa'i lam la
204b3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu zhugs par gyur nas/ byang chub chen po'i tshogs sogs par 'gyur te/ de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba'i thabs so/ /de'i phyir rigs dang rigs byung mngon brjod pas/ /'jig rten yang dag rmongs pa nyid ni sngags te/ rigs kyi
204b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mgon po'i ngo bo nyid kyis/ /bshad par bya'o zhes pa ni 'brel ba'o/ /'di ni drang ba'i don no/ /da ni nges pa'i don brjod par bya ste/ sngags ni man+t+ra zhes pa ste skyob par 'gyur ba'i phyir man+t+ra zhes brjod do/ /byang chub kyi sems kyi
204b5(rgyud 'grel): thig le lhan cig skyes ba'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin ni sngags so/ /rab bshad bya ni mngon sum du bya ba'o/ /de'i phyir yang na thig le lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo'o/ /a thA'i a yig bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab ste/ de'i phyir phul du byung ba'i shes pa ni shes
204b6(rgyud 'grel): rab ste/ shes rab 'di yang phul du byung ba'i ye shes bdag med pa'i ngo bo rang bzhin med pa zhes bshad do/ /yang na a'i yi ge chos thams cad kyi sgo zhes bya'o/ /tha yig ni bcom ldan 'das nyid de thabs so/ /ci'i phyir gsungs na/ thabs dang
204b7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba'i don no/ /thig le khu ba'i tshul gyi thabs kyis ngo bo nyid do/ /'dir yang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /'di ni zhes pa'i a yig ni dbang phyug go /dam pa i dam zhes pa yang dag par rdzogs
205a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan nyid dbang phyug ste/ daM ma ni ster bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /i dam ni 'di na'o/ /pa ra maM zhes pa'i paM ni pad+ma/ de las rtse bar byed de/ ra mi kra DA yaM zhes pa'i khams las shes rab skye?? chog
205a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung du rol pa'o/ /de'i phyir gsang ba ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo la gnas pa nyid do/ /'jig rten yang dag rmongs pa zhes pa'i 'jig rten gyi sgra ni dbang po rnams so/ /de rnams yang dag par rmongs pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba thob
205a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mthar dbang po rnams 'gag pa'i phyir ro/ /mchog ces pa ni rab tu'o/ /rigs dang rigs byung mngon brjod pas rigs kyi sgras 'byung ba chen po lngar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bo'o/ /de las byung ba'i phyir riT
205a4(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'o/ /de'i phyir rdo rje dang pad+ma sbyar ba las sra bar gyur pa'i sra ba ni sa'i ngo bor byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad nyid do/ /de'i rjes su byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa de yang khu ba'i ngo bo nyid chu'i khams kyi ngo bo mi bskyod pa'i
205a5(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo nyid do/ /rdo rje dang pad+ma gnyis po yang dag par sbyar ba las me skye bar 'gyur te chags pa'i me las skyes pa'o/ /de yang 'od dpag tu med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /de nas shes rab kyi chos 'byung du byang chub kyi sems yang dag
205a6(rgyud 'grel): par 'bab pa de ni rlung gi dbang las so/ /rlung yang don yod grub pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /de nas yang shin tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid chags pa yang dag par skyes pa'i bde ba la chags pa ni nam mkha' i ngo bo nyid de/ de yang rin chen dbang
205a7(rgyud 'grel): po'i ngo bo nyid do/ /de nyid 'byung ba chen po lnga'i rang bzhin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /de'i rigs mngon par brjod pa'i sgras rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i ngo bo lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ??
205b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bshad par bya'o/ /dam tshig spyod bzhes? la sogs pa'i dam tshig ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /de yis lhan cig spyod pa ni sbyor ba'o/ /de rnams dang nges par bral ba ste/ 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni kun rdzob kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /'dir don
205b2(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo nyid phyag rgya chen mo de kho na nyid gzung ba'i phyir ro/ /bya ba dus zhes pa la sogs pa'i bya ba ni byed pa po dang/ dus ni dus chod de dag las rnam par grol ba nyid ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o/ /de nyid sum ldan yang
205b3(rgyud 'grel): dag lha zhes pa'i de nyid gsum ni sngags kyi de nyid dang/ bdag gi de nyid dang/ lha'i de nyid de/ de rnams dang yang dag pa ni rtsa'i 'khor lo thams cad du thig le rol pa ste/ de bu kra DA yaM zhes pa'i khams las 'jig rten dbang po rnams
205b4(rgyud 'grel): la khyab pa'o/ /mgon ni 'jig rten mgon no/ /'gro ba ni lus ngag yid kyi ngo bo nyid dbang du byed pa ste/ bdag po ni 'gro ba'i bdag po'o/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba la sogs pa'i 'dod pa rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul lnga'i rang
205b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po nyid kyis khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /dbang phyug ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis bde ba dam par byed pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i lha'i/ /'thod dang ma mthong 'bras rab ster zhes pa'i mthong ba ni 'di'i
205b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu'o/ /ma mthong ba ni 'jig rten pha rol te/ gnyis ka'i 'bras bu rab tu ster ba'i phyir ro/ /de'i bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /sngags ni bla ma'i zhal la gnas zhes pa ni bla ma'i zhal las blang bar bya ste/ lhan cig skyes pa'i
205b7(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid de po ti la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir te/ bla ma'i zhal nas blang bar bya'o/ /zhes pa'i don to/ /da ni sngags rab tu bshad par bya ste/ drag chen zhes pa la sogs pa'i drag chen gyi sgras ha yig tu brjod par
206a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ he ru ka'i a Sh+Ta dgod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi ha'i yi ge'o/ /'jigs byed lus kyi sgras ra yig go/ lnga pa'i thig le'i sgras a'i yig go/ rnam spyod dang po yang dag ldan ni de la po ti'i rim pa ni a(rgyud 'grel): zhes
206a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ni rnam par gcod pa'o/ /de'i dang po ni thig le'o/ /de dang yang dag ldan pa ni h+ri'o/ /bla ma brgyud pa'i rims pas rnam par bcad pa ni ka yig go /de'i dang po ni tsheg drag go /de dang yang dang por ldan pa ni h+rI(rgyud 'grel): zhes so/ /chen

206a5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid gsum gyi sngags kyi yi ge'i rang bzhin zhes pa'i don no/ /de nyid cho ga bzhin du 'bum du bzlas par bya ste/ cho ga 'di yis ni ji ltar na yi ge rnams kyi bsdu ba las yi ge rnams kyi grangs 'bum phrag gsum gyi grangs

206a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa po'o/ /gtsang dam yang ni mi gtsang yang rung ste'o/ /lha bzhin mthong ba lha mo ste zhes pa ni lha'i bu mo rnams kyis 'dod pa'i lha bzhin du mthong bzhin shin tu mdzes pa rnam pa nyid de dbang byed pa'i gtso bo'i phyir gyi sngags so/ /
206b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni? de bzhin zhes pa la sogs pa 'di ni de bzhin sngon du gsungs pa'i sngags kyi mgon po la bya ba 'khrul pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid blang bar mi bya'o/ /sgrub ba'ang med ni sbyod pa'i brtul zhugs la sogs pa'o/ /mchod dang me la sbyin
206b2(rgyud 'grel): sred med ces pa ni de rnams thams cad de rnams kyi gnas skabs kun rdzob kyi ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro/ /'dir don dam ba'i bden pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro/ /de nyid kyi cho ga'i sngags kyi sgrub thabs kyi gnas skabs kyi rnal 'byor pas so/ /mchog ni rab

206b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ de la rnal 'byor ni dbang po rnams thams cad ro gcig tu byed pa'o/ /stan ni brjod par bya ba'i bkod pa ste/ de yang ma 'ongs pa ni 'chang par 'gyur ba de dag dang ldan pa'o/ /dus ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa la sogs pa'o/ /tshod ni snga
206b5(rgyud 'grel): dro la sogs pa'i thun tshong dang bral ba'o/ /rtse gcig sems ni gnyis su med pa'i sems so/ /yang na mi g.yo ba'o/ /g.yo ba med ni mi brtan pa dang bral ba'o/ /de lta bur gyur pa'i rnal 'byor bas mchog gi bsam gtan bya'o/ /zhes pa ni rigs

206b7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gyi rim pas gtum mo sgom pa'i rnal 'byor brjod par bya ste/ dang por ro shig lte ba sbrul ba'i 'khor lo kha dog ser po'i chu skyes 'dang ma drug cu rtsa bzhi'o/ /de'i dbus su zla phyed thig les brgyan ba'i dbyangs dang po a yig go/ shar
207a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i 'dab ma brgyad po rnams la a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha rnams la zla phyed thig les brgyan pa'o/ /de'i phyi rol gyi dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la a yig la sogs pa'i dbyangs bcu drug dang/

207a3(rgyud 'grel): thur du bstan pa'o/ /shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma bzhi la a i u e dbyangs yig bzhi po rnams la zla phyed thig les brgyan pa'o/ /dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma bzhi la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin dus la sogs pa'i ngo bo

207a6(rgyud 'grel): so gnyis pa kha dog sna tshogs pa'o/ /de'i bre 'bru la mgo thur du bstan pa'i haM yig go/ shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la re re spangs nas dbyangs yig bcu drug la zla phyed thig les brgyan pa'o/ /de la sprul pa'i 'khor
207a7(rgyud 'grel): lo la gang dbyangs yig dang po la a yig dbyug pa'i rnam pa ste/ de nyis gtum mo 'bar ba zhes brjod de/ des de bzhin du pad+ma'i dar pa'i skud pa bzhin du shin tu phra ba steng du 'gro bas hUM dang oM yig dam chos dang longs spyod du song
207b1(rgyud 'grel): nas thig le gnyis bzhu ste bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo re song nas hoM yig gi thig le bzhu ste/ de nas he yig thig le bzhu bas yang ska'i rtse mo brgya stong gi cha'i 'od zer gyis khyab pas a yig gi rang bzhin gtum mo 'bar ba'i thig

207b3(rgyud 'grel): du bdud rtsi'i thig le sbyor bar 'gyur pa'i gnas las thig le g.yo btsam gyis yang thig le 'dzin pa ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor de/ /de bzhin du thig le dang phra mo'i rnal 'byor dag gang gtum mo 'bar ba de bzhin du brjod par bya ste/ snying

209a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du byed do zhes pa'i don te 'dir the tsom med pa zhes pa'i don no/ /bsam gtan zhes pa la sogs pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i bsam gtan/ rnal 'byor yang dag ldan ni bsam gtan dang bsam

209a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang ci'i phyir na dgod par bya ba ni byed pa ste/ sems la dgong pa ste gang gis mi g.yeng ba'i go 'phang la gnas pa nyid do/ /de'i phyir gnas pa ni g.yo ba med pa'i sems so/ /blo ldan ni blo gros gang zhig dge ba'i bla dang

209a5(rgyud 'grel): bas de bzhin du mtho ris kyang shugs la shes par bya'o/ /'gro ba kun dag gi rang bzhin bsgrub pa ni rnam par rtogs pa tsam bsgrub par bya'o/ /zhes pa'i don no/ /da ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin 'jig rten dbang
