209a7(rgyud 'grel): yang ni de bzhin zhes pa'i e yig ni pad+ma/ baM yig ni rdo rje rab tu dgod pa ste/ gang gi tshe thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug par byed pa de'i tsho de'i rnal 'byor pas 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ngo bo nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /lte ba'i
209b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus? su pad+ma chen po ni lte bar 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi ni pad+ma chen po'o/ /de'i de bzhin du pad+ma'i nam mkha' i nang ni ze 'bru'i mdza' o/ /de la gang gi tshe gtum mo 'bar bas thig le zhu bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar rnam gsum ba zhe na/ 'gro ba'i
209b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gsum ste/ de la gang gi tshe g.yo bar gyur pa ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo 'gro'o/ /gang gi tshe 'dzag par 'gyur ba na snying kha'i 'khor lo thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe mi 'dzag par gyur pa na lta ba'i 'khor lo
209b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin rnam gsum ni rnam pa gsum 'gro bas nam mkha' i nang du song ba'i thig le'o/ /de bzhin rnam pa 'dis lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi thig le na pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan pa'o/ /de
209b4(rgyud 'grel): la pad+ma'i phyag rgya ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes dang thabs su gyur pa baM dang/ e yi ge gi rnam par shes rab kyi pad+ma'i/ /hUM yig gi lhag mar gnas pa ni thabs te rdo rje'i rtse mor son pas 'od zer rnam par gsal ba ni dga' 
209b5(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po'i cha gang yin rgyas gdab ste/ rang gis mngon sum du byas pa'o/ /de'i pad+ma ni phyag rgya zhes brjod do/ /shes rab kyi rang bzhin ni de bzhin du/ /yang rdo rje nyi ma reg 'od kyis/ rab pad rgya yis gdab pa yis/ /pad+mar bde
209b6(rgyud 'grel): chan cha shes ni/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgyar shes par bya/ /gzhan yang/ bsgrub bya sgrub thabs yang dag sbyor/ /gang de bsnyen pa zhes brjod do/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba/ /nye bar sgrub pa zhes byar brjod/ /bskyod par gsungs pa sgrub pa ste/
209b7(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT yi ge yang dag ldan/ /rang bzhin shin tu zhi bde ba/ /sgrub pa chen po zhes brjod do/ /'od gsal kyi shes pa'i thabs su gyur pa sgrib pa dang bral pa'i bdag nyid ba yig rdo rje nor bu bde ba chen po'i chi gang gis rgyas gdab pa
210a1(rgyud 'grel): ni mngon sum du byas pa'o/ /de nam mkha' i phyag rgya zhes brjod pa de de'i bdag nyid do/ /gzhan yang rdo rje rtse mor rdzogs/ /gang gis bde chen ri bong 'dzin/ /shar nas bde brgya yis btab/ /nam mkha' phyag
210a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyar shes par bya/ /de bzhin du bsdus pa'i don ni/ /pad+ma'i phyag ni pad+ma ste shes rab po/ /nam mkha' i phyag rgya ni rdo rje ste thabs so/ /de yang 'dir pad+ma'i phyag rgya ni lte bar rnam par gnas pa'i a yig gi rang bzhin no/ /nam mkha' i phyag rgya'i
210a3(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin yang thabs te/ hUM yig gi rang bzhin snying kha'i 'khor lo des kyang thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa ste/ yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bshad do/ /de'i phyir pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin
210a4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i phyag rgyas gdangs/ /ces pa thabs dang shes rab kyis bdag nyid du gsungs te/ srog 'bab ba'i tshad kyis ni/ /de bzhin du gang gis thig le 'gugs ba de ni srog rab tu 'bab pa yis so/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnas gnyis
210a5(rgyud 'grel): goms par byas pa yis zhes te/ lan gnyis ni gnyis su dbugs 'byung ba dang rdub pa'i ngo bo nyid ces pa'i don ni/ /de lta bu'i rim pas rnal 'byor pas e yig dang ba rab tu dgod par bya'o/ /des 'jig rten mgon po'i
210a6(rgyud 'grel): sku ru 'byung te/ rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ngo bo nyid thob ba zhes pa'i don no/ /gzhan du zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'dir gsungs pa'i rim pa las 'das te bzlas pa byed cing rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i las sbyar kyang skyes bu de ni nam
210a7(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la khu tshur bsnun pa dang spun stong 'joms par byed do/ /dper na nam mkha' la khu tshur bsnun pa dang spun stong brdungs kyang dgos pa med pa de bzhin du/ 'dir yang sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pa las 'das te bzlas pa la sogs
210b1(rgyud 'grel): la byed ba bzhin no/ /cho ga bzhin du zhes pa la sogs pa'i cho ga dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan gyi rnal 'byor pa las gang dang gang byed pa ste/ rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'i las ni yid kyir 'dod pa ste/ de ni myur du 'grub par byed par the tshom
210b2(rgyud 'grel): med do/ /'di ni pad+ma 'bar ba las byung ba'i rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyag gi lnga bcu pa'i bdag gi de kho na nyid kyi le'u'i rnam par 'grel pa ste gnyis pa'o// //da ni lha'i de kho na nyid bshad par bya'o/ /dang por
210b3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyi sgrub thabs bshad pa ni chigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'i sgo nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bo bshad par bya ste/ rang bzhin bsam gtan bcas pa yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ de la dang po re shig gang gi tshe sgrub la
210b4(rgyud 'grel): po'i rnal 'byor bas bcom ldan 'das kyi sgrub thabs rtsem par byed pa de'i tshe rang gi snying khar pa yig las skyes pa'i pad+ma las a yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das kyi
210b5(rgyud 'grel): sa yon gyi yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o/ /de las 'od zer 'phros te 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi sa rang gi lus rab tu gsal bar byas nas rjes su dran pa bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas slar yang de bzhin du 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis sems
210b6(rgyud 'grel): can gyi khams thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis mnar bar bltas nas/ de la sems can gyi khams rnams sdug bsngal de las nye bar bsgral te bsod nams kyi tshogs 'phel par bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' i dkyil thams cad
210b7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi yi dam gyi lha dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su gang bar bsgoms te/ slar yang sa bon gyi yi ge'i 'od zer rnams kyi me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams spros nas lha'i tshogs la
211a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa byas la/ slar yang dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o/ /yang de'i 'od zer lcags kyu'i rnam par des lha'i tshogs bkug nas sa bon gyi yi ge
211a2(rgyud 'grel): la zhugs par bsgom par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sems can gyi khams thams cad kyang do'i 'od zer gyis sbyangs te sangs rgyas nyid la bkod nas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis yang sems can gyi khams thams cad sa bon gyi yi ge la rab
211a3(rgyud 'grel): tu zhugs par bsgom par bya'o/ /rang gi lus kyang ngo/ /ra yig kyang ha yig dang a'i yig dang thig le rnams kyang phyi ma phyi ma'i nang du zhugs par bsgom par bya'o/ /de yang dang po'i thig le'i nang du rab tu zhugs par bsgoms nas thig le de
211a4(rgyud 'grel): yang mi dmigs par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin du shU n+ya tA sa brtan par byed pa'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste/ rigs drug gi bdag nyid oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra la at+ma ko haM zhes pa'i oM ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /shU n+ya tA zhes pa ni rin
211a5(rgyud 'grel): chen 'byung ldan no/ /dz+nyA na zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /badzra zhes pa ni 'od dpag med do/ /swa b+hA wa at+ma ka zhes pa ni dzi na yod grub pa'o/ /a ta zhes pa ni drug pa rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /de nyid bsdus pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta ba dang
211a6(rgyud 'grel): spro bar blta ba'o/ /bsdu ba zhes pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste de nyid shes rab tu brjod do/ /spro ba ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa ste thabs so/ /de'i don dam pa'i bden pa 'da' zhig ni gzhan don rdzogs par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ don
211a7(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i bden pa'i mthar sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na gzhan gyi don yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid spro bar blta bar bya'o/ /de'i phyir thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid de/ de nyid
211b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi ka thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de la dang por ra yig yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i steng du hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ de las 'od zer rdo rje'i gzugs kyis 'phros nyid las 'od zer
211b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar pas rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang rdo rje'i gur rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las chos thams cad rang bzhin med par bsgoms la phyi nas chos 'byung dkar po bsgom par bya ste/ dkar po nyid ni shin tu
211b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings nyid do/ /de'i steng du paM yig yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'o/ /de'i steng du oM yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i steng du h+rI(rgyud 'grel): hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i yi ge gsum
211b4(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur pa las lcags kyu/ de yongs su gyur pa las rang nyid dpal ldan rigs kyi bu 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ngo bor bsgom par bya'o zhes pa ni 'brel pa'o/ /rang bzhin bsam gtan bcas pa yis ni gnas kyi don thams cad
211b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi gang gi rang bzhin med pa zhes bshad do/ /de'i bsam gtan ni d+hU tsin+t+ra yaM zhes pa'i khams 'di dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan du blta zhing ldan pa zhes pa'i don no/ /dza ti mtshal gyis 'od zer mtshungs zhes pa'i dza ti dang mtshal zhes
211b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni tshon gyi bye brag go /de dang mdzangs pa'i 'od zer dmar po zhes pa'i don no/ /ze 'bru le brgan rtsi dang 'dra ba ni 'od 'bar zhing sin b+hu ra ltar dmar ba ste gtso bo li khri ltar dmar ba'o/ /'dir yang gtso bo ni yang 'od dpag tu med pa ste
211b7(rgyud 'grel): me dang bcas pa'i/ /gzhan yang sngags kyi gzugs kyi ni yi ge gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi sngags dang lha nyid dbyer med pa'o/ /lha'i lha ni lha rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa'i phyir lha'i lha'o/ /skad cig gis mngon par byang chub pa'i phyir
212a1(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig pa'o/ /phyag bzhi ni bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba'o/ /mkha' pad zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs zhes pa ni sngon du bshad pa'i chos 'byung pad+ma zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /zhags pa
212a2(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu bsnams pa ni gdul bya'i skye bo rnams 'dzin pa'i phyir zhags pa dang/ gdug pa can rnams 'gugs pa'i phyir lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/ /khyab bdag ni dbang phyug la sogs pa gtso bo yon tan sbyor ba'o/ /mchog sbyin
212a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya ni nor bu ste/ phyag rab tu brkyad na gzhan gyi don gyi phyir nor bu dang bcas pa'i phyag gis chu skyes zhes pa'i don no/ /yang dag rol pa nyid ni sgeg pa'i nyams gtso bo'i phyir te sgeg pa dang bcas pa zhes pa'i don no/ /mu tig
212a4(rgyud 'grel): nor bus rnam par rgyan ni rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa'i phyir nor bus rnam par brgyan pa'o/ /thams cad la rab tu 'gro ba ster ba'i phyir mu tig gi rnam par brgyan pa'o/ /pad+ma'i phyag ni pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang yang dag par ldan pa'i phyir
212a5(rgyud 'grel): ro/ /da yang na pad+ma bzhin du sems can gyi don la 'khor ba'i nang du gnas kyang 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i phyir ro/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya ni phyag g.yon pad+mas brgyan pa zhes pa'i don no/ /sku gsung thugs rnam par dag
212a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir spyan gsum mo/ /gdul bya sna tshogs 'dul bar dgongs pas sna tshogs pa'i tshul 'dzin pa ni sna tshogs sku'o/ /'od zer stong ldan bzhin du ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar byed pas gzi brjid chen po ste 'od gsal chen po zhes
212a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don no/ /gdug pa can thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpa' bo'i dbang phyug go /'gro ba rnams kyi bdag po'i phyir 'gro ba'i mgon no/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams thugs dgyes pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis
212b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi yid tshim par byed pa zhes pa'i don no/ /sngags rnams kun la zhes pa ni sngags thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa zhes pa'i don no/ /rnam pa de lta bus bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgo
212b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba ni phyag rgya rab tu ster ba zhes bya ba'i don no/ /rnam pa de lta bu'i dam tshig sems dpa' i ngo bor bsgoms nas/ slar yang nam mkha' i mthil du rnam pa de lta bu nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das yi
212b3(rgyud 'grel): shes sems dpa' i ngo bor bsgom par bya'o/ /de lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa' dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i yi ge rnam pa bzhis dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ mnyes pa rnams dam chag sems dpa' i nang du bya'o/ /
212b4(rgyud 'grel): slar yang ye shes sems dpa' i thugs kar pad+ma dang zla ba la h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig gi sa bon ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' i ngo bor bsgoms par bya'o/ /de'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis nam mkha' i mthil du de bzhin gshegs pa lha mo'i tshogs bsam par bya'o/ /
212b5(rgyud 'grel): de rnams la rnal 'byor pas dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi dzi ny+tsa tu mAM/ phyi nas de bzhin gsheg pa dang lha mo'i tshogs su bcas pas dbang bskur bar bsams te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She
212b6(rgyud 'grel): ka sa ma ya sh+ri hUM zhes pa'i sngags brjod par bya'o/ /de lta bu'i bsam gtan byas te sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /'di ni mdor bsdus pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rim pa'o/ /de lta bu'i rnam pas sngon du gsungs pa'i bcom ldan 'das bsgom
212b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /grib? dang gang gis zhes pa la sogs pa ni sgrub pa pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang gis gang bsgom pa'i bsam pas rnal 'byor goms pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rnal 'byor rdzogs par bsgom par bya'o/ /de dang de'i bsam pa'i dbang gis
213a1(rgyud 'grel): de bcom ldan 'das de'i rang bzhin te de'i ngo bo nyid du 'gyur te yid bzhin nor bu mchog lta bu'o/ /da ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi rjes su 'brangs nas bcom ldan 'das bsgom pa brjod par bya ste/ lha ni
213a2(rgyud 'grel): dkar pos zhi rab steng/ /de bzhin ngag ni rab sad byed ces pa ste/ gang gi tshe rnal 'byor bas zhi pa'i las 'ga' zhig byed na/ de'i tshe des bcom ldan 'das sku mdog dkar po bsgom par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das sku mdog
213a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po zhi ba rab tu ster ba'i phyir ro/ /'dir bsgom pa'i rim pas ni zhi ba'i las byed pa'i skabs su rnal 'byor pa zhal byang du phyogs te bsgom par bya'o/ /de la dang por wa yig dkar po yongs su gyur pa las chu'i
213a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor zlum po bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i bdag nyid rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug sku mdog dkar po rnam par snang mdzad lta bu rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan pa bsgoms par bya'o/ /de la yang ye shes sems dpa' i
213a5(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo'i rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rang bzhin gzhan bsgom par bya'o/ /ye shes sems dpa' de'i thugs kar pad+ma dang zla ba la bsgrub bya'i lus bkug ste/ nyon mongs pa rnams thim par bsam mo/ /de'i rjes la ye
213a6(rgyud 'grel): shes sems dpa' i thugs ka'i zla ba la ye shes gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi sngags kyi phreng ba bshengs te bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab par byed pas bsgrub bya'i lus la dmigs shing snying bar byas te/ rang gi lus las 'od zer rnam par
213a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bros te rtse mo'i cha las dpag tu med pa'i lha mo'i tshogs su gyur nas/ /bdud rtsis yongs su gang ba'i bum pa phyag na bsnams pas/ /bsgrub bya la mngon par dbang bskur te/ de bzhin du rgyan du gyur pa'i lha mo dang snyoms par zhugs
213b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdag po thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhuT pa las yang dag par byang chub pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyun gyis kyang dbang bskur zhing nyes pa rnams nye bar zhi bar bya'o/ /zhes pa ni zhi ba'i las kyi cho ga'o/ /de'i rjes su dag rab tu med
213b2(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa ni shes par bya ste/ ngag rab tu sad pa ni zhal dang phyag dang sku mdog dang dbyibs la sogs pa thams cad snga ma bzhin du'o/ /'on kyang rang gi sems thog ma med pa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi mi shes pas rab tu bcings
213b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdag dang bdag gir 'jid pas zin pa'i sems nyid kyi nyon mongs pa ma lus ba nye bar zhi ba rab tu steng ba rnam par snang mdzad dkar po me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bor bsgom par bya'o/ /re'i dag rab tu sad par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid
213b4(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i las dang/ ngag rab tu sad pa las bcom ldan 'das sku mdeg dkar po bsgom par bya'o/ /da ni dbang dang dgug pa'i chog ste/ dbang dang dgug pa'i de nyid la sku mdog dmar po rnam par bsam par bya ste/ de ni dbang dang dgug pa'i
213b5(rgyud 'grel): las la bcom ldan 'das sku mdog dmar po bsgom zhing zhal dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa sngon ma bzhin du'o/ /'dir bsgom pa'i rim pa ni rnal 'byor pas zhal nub tu mngon par phyogs te/ ya yig yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi
213b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'od dpag tu med pas dbu brgyan pa sgag pa'i nyams gtso bor mdzad pa'i rang nyid rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rnam par bsgoms te/ phyi nas rang gi snying/ bo'i h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig yongs su gyur pa las hUM las rgyud
213b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i pad+ma'i sdong bu las 'od zer gyi skud pa dang bcas pa 'byung ba'i 'dab ma brgyad pa'i pad+ma dmar po bsam par bya'o/ /'dab ma so so las sa bin gyi yi ge dmar po gsum ste h+rI(rgyud 'grel): hUM d+dza(rgyud 'grel): rnams bsam zhing gi sar bkod pa'i ze 'brul
214a1(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig gnyis kyis rnam par brten pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi yi ge gsum gyi sngags rnam par bsgoms ste/ de'i sngags las 'od zer dmar ngos myos byed myos par byed pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyod
214a2(rgyud 'grel): de/ phyogs kyi 'khor lo thams cad khyab nas bsgrub bya'i gnas su zhugs te bsgrub bya'i lus 'dod pas pha rol gyi dbang du 'gyur zhing myos par byas pa mdun du blta par bya ste/ zhags pas mgul pa bcings shing snying
214a3(rgyud 'grel): kha'i pad+ma lcags kyus phug ste/ b+ha ga'i pad+mar de bzhin du 'dod pa'i mtshon gyis bsnun pas 'khrugs shing rab tu myos pa rnam par bsam mo/ /de nas phyis de'i snying kha'i chu skyes kyi ze 'bru la h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yi ge gnyis kyi rnam par
214a4(rgyud 'grel): rten pa'i ming gi yi ge blangs te byis rang gi mgul ba la bcings par bsam par bya'o/ /slar yang rang gi snying kha'i pad+ma'i ze 'brug gnas zla ba la gnas pa'i hUM yig las 'od ze gyi dra ba dmar po srog gi rlung gis 'das te
214a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma la gnas pa'i yi ge gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi sngags kyang steng du stong ste/ gang gi sna bug g.yas pa'i lam nas 'thon nas myos pa'i snying kha'i pad+ma'i za 'brur gnas pa'i ming gi yi ge bkug ste bsgrub bya'i sna bug
214a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi bu ga'i lam nas byung ste ming la shin tu khyud nas de'i sems dang rang gri sems lhan cig tu bya'o/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis dkris pa'i 'di ni dbang gi rab tu sbyor ba'o/ /dgug pa'i rab tu sbyor ba yid 'di nyid do/ /
214a7(rgyud 'grel): da ni bskrad pa'i rab tu sbyor ba gsungs te/ du ba dmar po'i zhes pa la sogs pa ni bskrad pa'i dus su du ba dmar po'i kha dog gi bcom ldan 'das bsgom par bya'o/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis dkris pa'i zhes pa ni rlung la
214b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyis bskor zhes pa'i don no/ /cho ga 'di lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das kyis dgra po rnams skrod par byed de 'dir the tshom med par byed par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bo rnams skrod par byed pa'i 'dir bsgom pa'i rim pa'i ni rnal 'byor pas
214b2(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma gung gi dus su kha lhor mngon par phyogs te du ba dmar po'i mdog can don yod grub pa lta bu ser sna'i rigs don yod grub pas dbu rgyan pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis dkris pa bdag nyid kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi skud bsgom par
214b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /phyag mtshan la sogs pa rnams snga ma bzhin no/ /bsgrub bya yang nga mo'i steng du/ /gnas pa la rang gi 'od zer du ba dmar po'i kha dog lta bus rang gi gnas bskyod par bsam par bya'o/ bdag nyid kyang du ba dmar po'i mdog can lcags kyu'i
214b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam bsam cha na pa'i mtshon cha bzung bar bsgom mo/ /de bzhin du bsgoms pas dgra bo rnams nges par skrod par 'gyur te/ 'dir the tshom med do/ /da ni rnam par zhe sdang ba'i rab tu sbyor ba gsungs te/ du ba dngul gzugs dmar ba ni/ /rnam
214b5(rgyud 'grel): par zhe sdang la nges sbyor zhes pa'i du ba dngul gzugs dmar po'i mdog ni de ma thag tu gsungs pa'i da ni yod grub pas dbu brgyan pa'o/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i zhal dang phyag mtshan dang ldan pa'o/ /rang gi snying kha nas bskul te zhe sdang
214b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam pas/ /rtsams? dngul gzugs dmar po'i 'od zer gyis zhes sdang yang dag par bskyed de/ bsgrub bya ma he dang rta'i steng du gnas te phan tshun dug dang mtshon chas 'thab cing khro bo'i sems dang bcas par bsam par bya'o/ /de lta bu nyid
214b7(rgyud 'grel): du bsgom zhing rnal 'byor par du ba dngul gzugs dmar po'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rnam par byas te/ dgra bo rnam par zhe sdang nges par sbyor bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni the tshom med do/ /da ni gdug pa can gyi sems can rnams so sor bsad pa
215a1(rgyud 'grel): dang rengs pa'i rab tu sbyor ba gnyis gsungs te/ gsang ba la ni kha dog gnag /dengs pa la ni ser por shes zhes pa la sogs pa'i gsang ba la sku mdog nag por bsgom par bya'o/ /rengs pa la ni ser por
215a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o/ /'dir bsgom pa'i rim pa ni rnal 'byor pas khre lhor phyogs te/ rang nyid mi bskyod pa bzhin du sku mdog nag po mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa/ sngon du gsungs pa'i phyag mtshan la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dags kyi 'jig
215a3(rgyud 'grel): rten dbang phyug gi skur bsgom par bya'o/ /phyi nas bsgrub bya yang oM yig yongs su gyur pa las du ba'i mdog gzhu'i dbyibs can rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i ro yig yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar
215a4(rgyud 'grel): po la gnas par bsam par bya'o/ /rang gi snying kha'i pad+ma'i ze 'brul zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i h+rI(rgyud 'grel): hUM dzdza(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyi bdag nyid lcags kyus bsgrub bya'i lus ngag yid gsum gyi bsrung ba blangs
215a5(rgyud 'grel): te/ de'i nang du song nas yi dam gyi lha dang ye shes sems dpa' la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /nam mkha' i mthil du byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang gsol ba btab nas/ de rnams kyi mdun du sdig pa bshags
215a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ 'di ni dkon mchog gsum la gnod par byed pa'i sems kyis dmyal ba la sogs par 'gro bar 'gyur ba las bzlogs pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin du smon lam gdab ste/ de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi snying rje bskyed par bya'o/ /
215a7(rgyud 'grel): de'i phyir yang snying rje dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur zhes so/ /de nas sngon du gnang ba thob nas ye shes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha rnams rang rang gi 'khor lo lo sogs pa'i phyag mtshan dang ldan pas sgrub
215b1(rgyud 'grel): bya'i lus mar rnag gis byugs pa lta bu rab g.yo ba las bsrungs pa la sogs 'thon par bsam mo/ /ji srid bsgrub bya'i sbyor ba yang dag par sbyor bar byed par 'gyur te/ phyi nas bsgrub bya'i blo dang shes pa mar me g.yo ba med pa bzhin du bsam/
215b2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' pang zla ba'i steng du hUM yig las skyes pa'i lcags kyu yongs su gyur pa las de nyid du do'i blo dang shes pa rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug sku mdog nag por gyur nas rlung gis bskyod nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'das nas
215b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bar bsam par bya'o/ /'di na man ngag gi rim pa'o/ /de bzhin du byas na sdig par mi 'gyur te/ snying rje sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir ro/ /gzhan du ni sdig par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni gsang
215b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rab tu spyod pa'o/ /rengs pa la ni ser por shes zhes pa ni mdor bstan pa ste/ rgyas par bshad pa ni tshigs su bcad pa gzhan gyis bshad de/ /rengs par bya ba ser po nyid las gtso bor phyir rgol ba'i dag rengs par byed pa'i

215b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi bar tu rtsam phug nas zhes pa ni rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phug ser por bsgom shing phug gi sung du gnas nas lcags kyus bsgrub bya'i rkan phug nas zhus pa ni de'i phyir thams cad bsgrub bya la nye bar mtshon pa ste/ srid pa gsum du gang gnas
215b7(rgyud 'grel): pa zhes pa ni thams cad rmongs par byed pa'o/ /'di ni rangs pa'i rab tu sbyor ba'i/ /gzhan dag smos pas ci zhig bya/ /don mar tshig na rab 'dus pa/ /zhes pa ni don mang po tshig nyung shas la 'dus pa zhes pa'i don no/ /'jig rten gsum du gang
216a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i/ /las rnams yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'o/ /de la yon tan brgyad ni yang dag ba'i lta ba dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ rtsol ba dang/ dran pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ ngag dang/ las kyi mdza' dang
216a2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag pa'i rtog pa zhes pa rnams te/ 'dir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po zhe bzhes so/ /yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i gzhan yang gsungs pa dang ma gsungs pa'i las rnams rgyud gzhan rnams las nye bar spyod pa ste/

216a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa la sogs pa'i dngos po las re shig bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o/ /kha dog dbye bas slar yang gzhan du tha dad pas/ /'jig ten gsum ni gang sbyod ba'i/ /las rnams thams cad bya ba'o/ /skal bzang byed ba'i

216b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi rang bzhin zhes pa'i don no/ /lha ni de lta bu kri ta oM zhes pa'i khams las rtsa'i 'khor lo thams cad du thig le'i gzugs nyid kyis rnam par rol pha'o/ /steng du 'gro ba gsum dang ldan pa'i gsum na thugs dang ?
216b2(rgyud 'grel): dang sku'i 'khor lo rnams su dam ro gcig tu gyur pa ni seng du 'gro ba'o/ /de dang ldan pa ni bcas bzhes pa'i don no/ /yang na rlang gi de nyid kyi rim pa gzhug pa dang gnas pa dang 'byung ba'i do ba nyin mtshin du bzlas pa nyi steng
216b3(rgyud 'grel): du 'gro ba gsum ldan pa'i/ /de ltar yang rlung na/ a ig gis ni rab tu gzhug/ A(rgyud 'grel): yig sngags kyi dbus gnas des/ /hUM yig sngags kyis dbyung byas nas/ /bzlas bya mchu dang rkan sbyor man zhes so/ /las gsum byed pa
216b4(rgyud 'grel): ni de kho na nyid gsum mngon sum du byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni las byed pa ste/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid do/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams zhal la gnas ni bde ba'i bdag nyid thig le de nyid la rab tu 'jug par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /

217a1(rgyud 'grel): ni mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid do/ /rnam pa gsum ni 'gugs par byed ces pa la sogs pa ni rnal 'byor pas gang gi che thig le'i rnal 'byor la goms par byas pas/ de'i tshe lhan cig skyes pa'i

217a4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'dzag par gyur pa ni sbrul pa'i 'khor lor gyur pa'o/ /de'i che dbu mar mar me g.yo ba med pa bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rnal 'byor pas kyang rtag tu sbyor ba ni rnam pa de lta bus rtag tu gcig tu gnas
217a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/ /mar me rlung gis ma skyod pa bzhin du rab tu gnas pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes pa'i don no/ /sngon gsungs zhes pa la sogs pa ni sngon du bshad pa'i lca'i lha dbang po'i ngo bor

217a7(rgyud 'grel): du gsungs pa'o/ /yang ni e yig dang bruM yig gi mtshan nyid rnal 'byor yang dag par spyod pa'o/ /da ni dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa rnams/ /de'i gzugs 'jin de zhes pa la sogs pas slar pa shad de/ sngon du gsung
217b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bcom ldan 'das sku mdog nag po'i rang bzhin du sgrub po'i lus 'jin pa'o/ /de lta bu'i chogs ? po gang gis de bzhin lta ni bcom ldan 'das te zhags pa lcags kyu 'jin pas bsgrub bya'i lus la spyod par byed pa

218b1(rgyud 'grel): no/ /de la mngon 'dod rol ba ste bsgrub bya'i kha'i sgor yongs su 'khor ba zhes pa'i don ni/ /phyi nas de nyid yi ge rnams bsgrub bya'i khar thim nas ji srid bsgrub bya'i snying kha'i chu skyes la thim par bsam par bya'o/ /phyi nas de'i mthar snying

218b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar gyi rang bzhin sgrol ma'i gzugs ga bur gyi rnam pa de nyid de/ yid 'phrog pa thams cad nges kyang yi ge blang bar bya ba len pa zhes pa'i don no/ /phyi nas gang bsgrub bya'i lus stong par bya ste/ de'i tshe dzdza zhes pa'i gsum pa'i

219a1(rgyud 'grel): tu bzung ba'i bud med sgrub pa ni 'dod pas long zhing 'dod pa la chags pa ste/ nges de bzhin du dbang byas pas lhung bar 'gyur te sdig par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don no/ /rgyu gang gi phyir na de gzhan gyis

219a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dren pa'i sngags nyid bzlas par bya'o/ /sba zhir srog bzhin bsrung bar bya ste/ 'dir sngags ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi snying po'o/ /mchog ni phul du byung ba'o/ /gcig pu grogs dang bral byas te zhes pa la sogs pa ni rnal 'byor pas gang gi tshe sngags zlos par byed pa de'i tshe gcig bu ni gnas kyi don thams cad la chags pa spangs pa'o/ /'bum du bzlas ni 'bum phrag gsum gyi grangs kyi sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /de yang 'khor lo gsum ste sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan

219a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa ni gang sngon du gsungs pa'i chos gsang sngags bzlas pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa des 'jig rten thams cad skad cig tsam la de bzhin du 'byin par byed pa dang skad cig tsam la de bzhin du sdud par byed de/ yang nas yang du
219b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byin ba dang sdud par byed pa'i zhus pa dang ldan pa zhes pa'i don no/ /nam mkha' i go 'phang 'gro zhes pa ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed pa ni phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa ste rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'o/ /de rnams kyi go 'phang ni de dag gi gnas su 'gro
219b2(rgyud 'grel): ba ste sgrib ba bral ba'i gnas su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i don te/ dran pas 'di la the tshom med pa'o/ /da ni pha rol gyi grang du 'jug pa bshad par bya ste/ sems dang sems med sbyor ba zhes pa la sogs pa ni sems ni rnal 'byor pa'i
219b3(rgyud 'grel): shes pa'o/ /lus skyes ni lus las skyes pa'i 'byung ba chen por gyur pa rnams 'jug par byed do/ /gang la sems med pa'i lus so/ /sbyor ba ni 'jug pa'o/ /sems ni rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa sems med pa'i ro'i lus la yang
219b4(rgyud 'grel): dag par thim pa'o/ /lus skyes mang po rnams la rab tu zhugs nas sems ni sems las nges pa mthong ste/ ro'i lus la sems de bzhin du 'dir sems dang bcas pa ste/ des par mthong ba ni ro de la nges par mthong bar 'gyur
219b5(rgyud 'grel): ro zhes ba'i don no/ /'dir tshogs pa'i don ni sems can thams cad kyi srog gi gzugs sems kyi rten du gyur pa de nyid rim pas pha rol gyi grong la 'jug pa'i dus su rnal 'byor steng du blang bar bya ste/ ji srid lte ba'i 'og nas de yang
219b6(rgyud 'grel): steng du mgrin pa'i phyogs kyi mthar thug pa dka' nas sna'i bu ga nas 'thon te ro mnyam pa'i las la yang dag par zhugs par bya'o/ /ji srid ro'i lus g.yo ba ste/ spal ba bzhin du'o/ /ci'i phyir yang rab tu g.yo ba ni slar yang de las ro'i
219b7(rgyud 'grel): lus la phyug ? du srog tshul dgug par bya'o/ /de bzhin du pha rol gyi grong du 'jug pa la goms par bya'o// //da ni sdags kyi bdag nyid kyi che ba bshad par bya ste/ nad bcas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nad dang ldan pa'o/ /nang
220a1(rgyud 'grel): med ni nad las nges par grol bar byed pa'o/ /de bzhin du nad med pa yang nad dang bcas par byed do/ /de bzhin du sngags kyi rgyal lo dbang pos byed de/ zhags pa lcags kyus 'jin pa zhes pa 'di yin gsal ?
220a2(rgyud 'grel): kyus 'dzin pa'i tshig brling ba ni sngon bshad zin te/ /gzhan du zhes pa la sogs pa ni rang bzhin gyi sbyor ba sngon du gsungs pa'i cho ga ma yin pa gang gi las kyi rjes su 'brangs nas sgrub pa de ni gzhan du ste byis pa rmongs bas zla
220a3(rgyud 'grel): ba 'dzin par 'dod pa dang 'dra'o/ /gsum gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgrub pa po gang gis 'jig rten mgon po'i sku gsum gsum du rig pa ste/ gsum ni rnam pa gsum ste/ de las de nyid gsum ni sngags kyi de nyid dang/ bdag
220a4(rgyud 'grel): gi de nyid dang/ lha'i de nyid do/ /gzhan yang gsum tshi? sku gsum ste/ chos dang/ longs sbyod rdzogs pa dang/ sbrul pa'i sku'o/ /gzhan yang gsum ni yi ge rnam pa gsum mo/ /de bzhin du gsum gsum du rig par bya'o/ /

220a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du sgrub pa po gang gis shes pa des ngas par 'jig rten mgon po'i go 'phang du 'gro'o zhes pa'i don no/ /'di ni rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i lnga bcu ba'i 'grel pa mdor bsdus pa ste/ /bci'i bN+Di ta dri med dpal mthang? ngo'i
220a7(rgyud 'grel): zhal snga nas mdzad brjogs so// //dpal sa skya'i btsug lag khang du mi chen lha rje me ga ling gis zhus shing/ /yar lungs pa shud kye grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o// //
220b1(rgyud 'grel): ku la lo ka nA thi'i byin rlabs dang rjes gnang bya ba'i rim pa kha che'i paN+Di ta bi ma la sh+rI'i zhil snga nas mdzad ba bzhugs// //'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgom pa'i rim pa ni /gnas ?
220b2(rgyud 'grel): par stan bde ba la sems dpa' i skyil krungs sam ji ltar bde ba 'dug la/ skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ sdug bsnal ba du mas gdungs pa'i sems can 'di rnams kyi don du/ bdag gis rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub snyam du byang chub
220b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi sems bskyed pa sngon du 'gro bas/ rang gi snying khar baM las pad+ma dmar po'i lte bar a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'phro ba dang bcas pa bsam/ de las 'od zer lus kyi nang kun tu 'phros pas /lus
220b4(rgyud 'grel): ? gtsang pa'i rjas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis gang pa/ snying po med par bsam ba lus rjes su dran pa dang/ de la brten pa'i sems gzung 'dzin sna tshogs su snang ba ro pos ma grub par bsams pa sems rjes su dran pa dang/ de dag las byung
220b5(rgyud 'grel): ? ba'i 'od bar sdug btang snyoms kyis bsdus pa rnams rang bzhin gyis ma grub par bsam pa tshor ba rjes su dran pa dang/ de rnams kyis chos dang bzhin gyis spros pa'i mdza' dang bral bar bsam pa cos rjes su dran pa rnams bsgom/ de'i

220b7(rgyud 'grel): las 'phres pa'i mchod ba'i lha mo rnams kyis mchog/ de nas dkon mchog gsum 'phang? skyabs mchi/ sdig bsang so sor ba shags/ 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung/ zhes don dran bzhin pas brjod/ de nas sems can
221a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la byams pa dang/ snying rje dang dga' ba btang snyoms te/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom/ /de'i rjes su thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros bas mchod bya'i yul rnams dang sned bcung dkyi' s/ /
221a2(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa rnams dang/ rang gi lus kyid sa bon la thim par bsam/ /de nas sa bon gyi yang nam mkha' la 'ja' yal ba bzhan du bsam la/ oM shU n+ya tya dz+nya na badzra swa b+hA wa a haM/ zhes rigs drug gi nga rgyal bya/ de nas
221a3(rgyud 'grel): paM las pad+ma roM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM las khro bo'i rdo rje gdengs pa kha dog nag po lte ba la hUM gis mtshan par bsam/ /de las 'od zer dbang po dang gshin rje la sogs pa'i phyogs kun tu 'phros bas bdud dang

222a1(rgyud 'grel): ltar 'byor pa'i yo byad sta gon byas nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyis rnal 'byor rnams rdzog ba par bsgom ste/ sngags ci rigs par bzlas la/ de'i rjes la bum pa cho ga bzhin du ltar skyed la/ mchod

222a7(rgyud 'grel): bzod gsol dang gshegs su gsol ba rnams cho ga bzhin bya'o/ /de nas las kyi rjes su mngon par bsdus te/ bdag nyid spyod lam gyi rnal 'byor gyis gnas par bya'o/ /ku la lo ka nA tha'i byin brlabs dang rjes gnang bya
222b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rim pa kha che'i paN+Di ta bi ma la sh+rI'i zhal snga nas bris pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas lnga yi rnam dag pa'i/ /ma rig pa yi rim pa las/ /dbang bskur byed pa'i rim pa yis/ /ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/

222b7(rgyud 'grel): ni cung zad nam mkha' o/ /de las langs nas phyogs bcur yang/ /khro bo bcu ni bsgom par bya/ /dpag tshad bya ba'i tshad du ni/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi dkyil du rang gi lus/ /khru bzhi po ni mnyam pa bo/ /ka b brgyad?
223a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan sgo bzhi pa/ /thar pa yi ni grong mchog ltos/ /de dbus chos kyi pad+ma la/ /'char kha nyi ma'i steng du ni/ /shes rab thabs kyi ye shes las/ /mchog gi pad+ma mdzes pa skyes/ /'phreng shing 'dus par gyur pa

224b5(rgyud 'grel): zla'i gzugs ltar dang bas rtse gcig rtag tu yang dag mnyam gzhag bya/ /de la dpal chen zhal gsum mdzes/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dpus mthing kha/ /spyan gsum pad+ma bye bas mdzes/ /phyag drug rnam par rol pa'o/ /dang
224b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas ni yum la 'khyud pa'o/ /gnyis pa gnyis kyis mi'i lpags pa bshus ma tha ga pa bsnams pa'o/ /tha ma'i g.yas dang g.yon na mchan khung na rtse gsum dang thod pa khrag gis bkang
224b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang kha tsog 'dzin pa nyid do/ /mi thod dkar po dang lag pa'i mkhrig ma dang rdo rje dang rus pa'i phreng ba nyid dang/ ma tog sna tshogs pa'i chun 'phyang gis dbu rab tu brgyan to/ /de bzhin tu rin po che dang rus pa dang/ gdug pa can gyi rgyan du mas

229b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams thams cad khengs/ /spyi bo'i haM brgyad zhu ba las/ /bde chen bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun bab/ /rtsa rnams khengs pas bde ba rgyas/ /drod dang bde ba'i khyad par kun/ /steng 'og rlung gi gnang shes bya/ /rta bdun ri bong rgyas bstan nas/ /
229b2(rgyud 'grel): mthar thug lhun grub rnam gsum thob/ /bcu gsum sa rnams rdzogs par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ /ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
229b3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga ba tya pa ri tA yu rdz+nyA na maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ mgon po tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dad ldan mgon la gus pa yis/ /nags 'dab chu gling dgon par ni/ /rang dang slob ma'i don gyi phyir/ /bsnyen pa sa chog sta gon dang/ /dkyil 'khor
229b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po sgrub par bya/ /de la dang po bsnyen pa ni/ /rab dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs dngos su mthong ba/ 'bring rmi lam du mthong ba/ tha ma yang lung bstan thob pa'o/ /grangs kyi bsnyen pa 'bum tsho bdun 'bring gsum/ tha ma 'khri 'am bla ma'i
229b5(rgyud 'grel): rjes gnod thob pa'o/ /sa'i cho ga ni rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor sa ni brtags ba blang bu dang/ /sbyang ba dang byin brlabs gzung ba'o/ zhes gsungs pas/ sa chog rgyas par gzhan du shes par bya'o/ /sta gon la bzhi ste/ lha sta
229b6(rgyud 'grel): gon/ bum pa sta gon/ sa'i lha mo sta gon/ /sbyin sreg sta gon/ slob ma sta gon rnams gzhan bzhin bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /dang po ni tshon sna lnga'i thi gu rigs lnga yab yum dang bcas pa/
230a1(rgyud 'grel): bde stong dbyer med du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' la dam tshig gi thig chen brgyang btab la/ /mchod bstong byas nas sta gon gyi lha dang dbyer med du bsam mo/ /de ltar ye shes kyi thig ri?/
230a2(rgyud 'grel): rjes su dam tshig gi thig gdab pa ni/ slob dpon shar du lta/ slob ma nub tu lta/ tshangs thig dang po gdang/ de nas lho byang mtshams su thig chen brgyad gdab/ /de la bcu drug tu bgos nas gsum pa man chad la 'dab brgyad phyoT
230a3(rgyud 'grel): tshon dbus dmar po'o/ /bzhi pa khyams la shar dkar po 'am mthing kha/ lho ser nub dmar byang ljang/ /rtsig pa lnga dang ldan pa/ 'dod yon dmar pha gu ser/ dra phyed sngo mda' yab dmar ba mchod rten dang ldan pa/ /rta babs che bzhi
230a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten du yod pa'o/ /de yang rdo rje mi ri rab tu 'bar ba dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /de yang tshon byin gyis brlab la ni/ yab yum bde stong dbyer med du bsam pa'o/ /tshon lnga phyogs bzhi dang dbus su bzhag la sa bon bris
230a5(rgyud 'grel): te rigs ldar bskyed nas mchod bstod byas la bri'o/ /de yang shar du slob dpon gyis pan rag sor brgyad bris la pra brtag par bya'o/ /de nas sku tsa ka li 'am me tog cho ma bu bkod pa'am/ phyag mtshan rnams bkod pa'o/ /de ltar
230a6(rgyud 'grel): sla gsung thugs gang bkod pa'i rjes la/ gtso bo'i bum pa shar phyogs rdo rje ra ba'i nad du'o/ /las bum shar me ri'i steng du bum pa rgyas par dgod na gong bzhin no/ /de nas mchod pa dang gtor ma dang 'byor ba'i yo byang
230a7(rgyud 'grel): kyas dkyil 'khor gyi mdza' ma bskor/ /mnga' dang bur pa dang gri brgyad phyogs mtshams su bcugs la steng 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la phyogs dra mig tu yod pa bya'o/ /de nas rang nyid bskyed rjogs ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom/ dkyil 'khor
230b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bum pa'i nang du lha tshogs bskyed la sgrub thabs bzhin 'chi med ye shes bdud rtsis gang ba la rang gis dbang blang bar bya'o/ /slob ma la ji tsam bskur ba de rang gis blang bar bya'o/ /de nas slob ma rnams khrus byas gos so dkon?
230b2(rgyud 'grel): nas yol ba'i phyi rol du 'khod pa la bgogs bskrad/ /kri ya dpung bzang ltar gtor ma gtang ngo/ /de nas slob ma rnams phyag byas la me tog dang bcas pas/ gong bzhin du dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ gsal ba lan gsum gdab
230b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa yang gong bzhin byas la/ /me tog dang bcas pas ni gsol ba gdab pa ni/ slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /thub chen nyi ma ma lus pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams
230b4(rgyud 'grel): ni? dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /slob dpon ye shes spyan mnga' ba'i/ /sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba'i/ /mi ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor par ldan/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog /gsang ba chen pos
230b5(rgyud 'grel): brdzag? par bgyi/ /gsang ba mchog tu thams cad du/ /slob dpon gyis ni bdag 'jug 'tshal/ /phyir mi ldog par dbang bskur ba'i/ /skal pa chen po bdag la gsol/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing/ /dpe byang rnams dang yang
230b6(rgyud 'grel): dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong pa/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /dbang bskur ba ni rmad 'byung che/ sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rtag tu bdag ni slob dpon 'gyur/ /slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol/ /ces lan
230b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyi slob ma la dri ba ni/ /bcom ldan tshe dpag med pa yis/ /gsang ba chen por rigs dag par/ /gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed 'dod dam/ /slob mas 'tshal
231a1(rgyud 'grel): lags zhes brjod do/ /de nas rigs kyi sdom pa'i dam bsgrag pa ni/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song/ /'di de sangs rgyas rigs dag ba'i/ /sdom pa brtan par
231a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa yi/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ /blo chen khyod kyis bzung bar bgyi/ /byang chub sems gang rdo rje de/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do/ /slob dpon nyid kyang bzung bar bgyi/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje rigs
231a3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i/ /sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /zang zing chos dang mi 'jigs byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /
231a4(rgyud 'grel): dam ba'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan bar ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i
231a5(rgyud 'grel): las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /de las gzhan pa bcu bzhi ni/ /spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste/ /phas pham par ni rab bshad de/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re bzhin du blang bar bya/ /gang cho
231a6(rgyud 'grel): nyams gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi blang do/ /'dod pa log par mi spyad cing/ /rdzun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ /chang ni yongs
231a7(rgyud 'grel): su spang bar bya/ /sems can don phyir ma gtogs par/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad spang/ /dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang/ /dag gi las ni rnam bzhi dang/
231b1(rgyud 'grel): yid kyi las ni rnam gsum po/ /ci nus par ni rnam par spongs/ /theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya/ /sems can don la rgyab phyogs min/ /'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spang/ /rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba la/ /khyod
231b2(rgyud 'grel): ni brnyas par mi bya zhing/ /phyag rgya mtshon cha bzhon pa dang/ /mtshan ma bgom bar mi bya zhing/ /'di dag dam tshig yin par gsungs/ /'di las rtag tu mi 'da' bar/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar gyis/ /zhes lan gsum brjod pa'i tshe slob
231b3(rgyud 'grel): mas nyan par bya'o/ /de nas slob mas sdom pa 'di ltar khas blang bar bya ste/ /slob dpon deng 'dir bdag la gson/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal ba/ /de ltar bdag gis bgyid bar 'tshal/ zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas rigs lnga'i
231b4(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa khas blang ba ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /ci tsam dus nas bzung nas su/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi pas su/ /nam zhig byang chub snying po la/ /yongs su gnas kyi bar
231b5(rgyud 'grel): dag tu/ /bdag gis byang chub mchog gi sems/ /ma lus par ni bskyed par bgyi/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sangs
231b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gi brtan por gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i
231b7(rgyud 'grel): dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /nam du yang ni mi spang ngo/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen
232a1(rgyud 'grel): rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog chen po la/ /phyi nang gsang ba

232a4(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'das la dgod/ /ces lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de nas sems bskyed pa ni/ /slob ma skad cig gis/ /dpag med mgon por bskyed la/ rdo rjes dri'i thig le snying kar byas la/ de zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsams nas
232a5(rgyud 'grel): oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): bruM A yurdzA na badzra yo ga tsit+ta utpa da A mi zhes brjod pa ni kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems so/ /yang snying khar rdo rje bzhag la/ /zla ba'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa sgom du gzhug /de nas oM badzra su ra ta sa ma ya sdzaM? bod+hi? tsit+ta ya
232a6(rgyud 'grel): tha su khaM sa ma ya ho/ zhes don dam byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de ltar slob ma lhar bskyed pa de'i sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab/ /mchod pa rnam pa lnga dbul bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la slob ma de rnams shar sgo dang
232a7(rgyud 'grel): lho sgo nub sgo byang sgo rnams nas yid kyis 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas slob ma la spro ba bskyed pa'i sgo nas dam bsgrags pa ni/ /snying khar rdo rje bzhag la/ /mi yi srid pa legs thob pas/ /dus 'dir sangs rgyas rigs su ??/ /

232b7(rgyud 'grel): nas lus kyi gshis ni 'di ltar bya ste /rkang pa gnyis bshibs la langs nas thal mo spyi bor sbyar rlung bzung nas yid kyis gsol ba gdab pa ni/ /bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med/ /yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa yis/ /bdag
233a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes 'bab tu gsol/ /dus 'dir byin gyis brlab par rigs /zhes lan gsum du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i spyi bor tshe dpag med yab yum 'od dang 'od zer gyi ?? bzhin
233a2(rgyud 'grel): gar byed pa la dmigs pa btad pa dang sku lus las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi kha dog lnga byung nas lus la thim par bsam/ /yang yab kyi g.yas su grub pa'i rgyal mo g.yas Da ma ru g.yon thod pa bsnams pa/ sku mdog smug nag dus
233a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyan can gar byed pa la shes pa gtad /g.yon du brgyud pa rnams bsam/ /de nas slob ma lus dmigs pa de rnams bstan nas rang dang slob mas mos gus byas pa dang/ spyi bo'i lha tshogs rnams gar thabs su ling ling la spyi

234a4(rgyud 'grel): rje dbang bskur chen po sbyin/ zhes pa ni sbyir bskur ba'o/ /de nas rigs pa'i dbang lnga skur ba ni/ /bum pa mi bskyod par bskyed la dgug gzhug bya/ rang dang slob ma gnyis ka mi bskyod par bskyed nas dbang bskur ba ni/ /kun
234a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhi rnam shes rnam dag pa/ /me long ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /bcom ldan mi bskyod pa yis ni/ /bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dbang bskur ro/ /zhes brjod nas /chu rgyun spyi bor blugs pas lus bde bas khyab cing/ zhe sdang thams cad dag nas me
234a6(rgyud 'grel): long ye shes rgyud la skyes bar bsgom mo/ de nas dbu rgyan stod pa'i dang las rin 'byung du bskyod/ ye shes pa gzhug/ rang dang slob ma gnyis ka yang rin 'byung du bsam/ /dbu rgyan de slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la/ thor tshugs cod pan gyis
234a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab bsngags pa/ /rin yen dag gis dbu rgyan dang/ /dar dbyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /oM ratna a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM zhes brjod pas/ nga rgyal dag nas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rgyud la skyes par bsam no/ /de
234b1(rgyud 'grel): nas rdo rje dang rang gi slob ma snang ba mdza' yas su bskyed la rdo rje mgor bzhag nas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang/ /deng 'dir khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun tu rab sgrub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long/ zhes de lag pa g.yas
234b2(rgyud 'grel): su byin la/ oM pad+ma badzra na ya h+rI a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM zhes brjod do/ /de dag 'dod chags dag nas/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes rgyud la skyes par bsgom mo/ /de nas dril bu dang slob ma don yod grub par bskyed la/ dril bu mgor bzhag la/ /sangs rgyas
234b3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi dril bu'i dbang/ /der 'dir khyod la bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun tu rab bsgrub phyir/ /dril bu 'di ni khyod kyis long/ /oM ti ta ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ zhes lag pa g.yon du sbyin no/ /des phrag dog dag nas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rgyud
234b4(rgyud 'grel): la skyes par bsgom mo/ /de nas rdo rje dang dril bu rnam par snang mdzad du bskyed /rang dang slob ma yang de bzhin du bsams nas /rdo rje dang dril bu lce thog tu bzhag nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ming gi dbang/ /deng 'dir khyod la bskur bar bya/ /
234b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun tu rab bsgrub phyir/ /ming gi dbang 'di khyod kyis long/ /oM badzra satwa ya trwaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM/ zhes brjod pas/ gti mug dag nas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rgyud la skyes par bsgom mo/ /de dag gis bye brag tu rig pa'i dbang
234b6(rgyud 'grel): lnga? bskur ba bstan no/ /de nas khyad par du 'chi med ye shes bdud rtsi'i phyi nang gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi dbang bskur ba bshad par bya ste/ de yang slob mas gser gyi maN+Dal phul nas/ gsol ba gdeb pa ni/ bla ma mgon po tshe dpag med/ /
234b7(rgyud 'grel): lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /bdag la brtse bar dgongs nas kyang/ /'chi med tshe yi dbang bskur gsol/ zhes gsol ba len gsum gdab po/ /de nas dbang bskur ba ni/ gong bzhin du spyir dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs dang/ khyad
235a1(rgyud 'grel): par du bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun bum pa bkad nas dbang bskur bas/ spyir lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang /khyad par du tshe zad pa dang nyams pa dang 'gribs pa thams
235a2(rgyud 'grel): cad sangs kyis dag par bsams nas /bum pa spyi thog tu gzhag la dbang bskur ba ni/ so sor kun rtog rang bzhin gyi/ /bcom ldan cho dpag med pa ni/ /sku mdog dmar po 'od zer 'bar/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dang/ /bum
235a3(rgyud 'grel): pa tshe yi bkad nas kyang/ /tshe dbang thams cad bdag la gsol/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): bruM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swAhA /de nas dmigs pa thams cad gong bzhin du rang dang slob ma gnyis kas bsams la/ dbang bskur ba ni/ me long ye shes
235a4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyi/ /mi bskyod tshe dpag med pa ni/ /sku mdog sngon po 'od zer 'bar/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dang/ /bum pa tshe yis bkad nas kyang/ /tshe dbang thams cad bdag la gsol/ /oM hUM bruM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swAhA/
235a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid ye shes rang bzhin gyi/ /rin 'byung tshe dpag med pa ni/ /sku mdog ser po 'od zer 'bar/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dang/ /bum pa tshe yis bkang nas kyang/ /tshe dbang thams cad bdag la gsol/ /oM swa bruM badzra
235a6(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na A yu She swAhA /chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin gyi/ /rnam snang tshe dpag med pa ni/ /sku mdog dkar po 'od zer 'bar/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dang/ /bum pa tshe yis bkang nas kyang/ /tshe dbang thams cad bdag la
235a7(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /oM bruM bruM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swAhA/ bya grub ye shes rang bzhin gyi/ /don grub tshe dpag med pa ni/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'od zer 'bar/ /'chi med bdud rtsi chu rgyun dang/ /bum pa tshe yis bkad nas kyang/ /tshe dbang thams
235b1(rgyud 'grel): cad bdag la gsol/ /oM a bruM badzra dzrA na A yu She swAhA/ de dag gis phyi yab lnga'i sgo nas dbang bskur ba bstan to/ /de nas yum gos dkar mos dbang bskur bas lus ngag yid gsum gyi sdig sgrib dang cho nyams pa dang 'gibs nga thams
235b2(rgyud 'grel): cad sangs rgyas kyis ngag nas lus khru ma phus btab pa bzhin gyur to/ /de nas bdud rtsi rkad mthil nas yar skya me re re byung nas spyi bar sleb pa dang rang gi lus ye shes kyi lus su gyur par bsams la bum pa spyi bor bzhag nas/ /'od dpag
235b3(rgyud 'grel): yum mchog gos dkar mo/ /phyag na rA ga'i bum pa bsnams/ /tshe dang bdud rtsi'i bkang nas kyang/ /tshe dbang thams cad deng 'dir gsol /oM bruM a pa ri mi ta A yurdz+nyA na su bi ni shtsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya swAhA/ zhes yum thams cad la
235b4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa dang sngags gong bzhin no/ /mi bskyod yum mchog sangs rgyas spyan/ /phyag na shel gyi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis bkad nas kyang/ /tshe dbang thams cad dang 'dir gsol/ /rin chen yum mchog mA ma kI/ /phyag
235b5(rgyud 'grel): na baiDUr bum pa bsnams/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang/ /tshe dbang thams cad deng 'dir gsol/ /snang mdzad yum mchog dbyings phyug ma/ /phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang/ /tshe dbang
235b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang 'dir gsol/ /don grub yum mchog dam tshig sgrol/ /phyag na in+d+ra'i bam pa bsnams/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang/ /tshe dbang thams cad 'dir gsol cig/ de dag gis yum lnga'i dbang bstan no/ /de nas sems
235b7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bcu drug gi bshad par bya ste/ shar phyogs kyi sems dpa' bzhes dbang bskur bas 'chi med tshe'i dngos grub thob par bsams la/ bum pa spyi thog tu bzhag nas 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ /shar phyogs mi bskyod sems dpa' 
236a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi/ bai DUr sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams/ /g.yon na tshe yi bum pa 'dzin/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang/ /tshe dbang thams cad 'dir gsol cig /sngags ji gtso bo
236a2(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod pa'o/ /lho phyogs rin chen sems dpa' bzhi/ /btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /phyag g.yas rin chen 'bar ba bsnams/ /g.yon pas tshe yi bum pa 'dzin/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang/ /tshe dbang thams cad
236a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dir gsol cig /nub phyogs pad+ma'i sems dpa' bzhi/ /pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba/ /phyag g.yas chu skyes 'dab lnga bsnams/ /g.yon pas tshe yi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang/ /tshe dbang thams cad
236a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dir gsol cig /byang phyogs 'phrin las sems dpa' bzhi/ /in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dra ba/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin/ /g.yon pa tshe yi bum pa bsnams/ /tshe dang bdud rtsis bkang nas kyang/ /tshe dbang thams cad 'dir
236a5(rgyud 'grel): gsol cig /de nas 'chi med tshe'i dngos grub thob pa yin snyam pa'i ngos shes bskyed do/ /des ni gsang ba sems dpa' bcu drug gi dbang bstan to/ /de nas de kho na nyid bshad par bya ste/ rang dang slob ma'i snying khar hUM:
236a6(rgyud 'grel): dang dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs nas lha mo lcags kyu ma dkar mo gcig las bcu/ bcu las brgya la sogs pa mang po dpag tu med pa spros nas rang gzhan thams cad kyi nad gdon zhi ba'i las byas khyad par du shar
236a7(rgyud 'grel): dri za'i lag nas rang gi tshe nyams pa 'gribs pa zad pa rnams bkug nas slob ma la bstims pas nad gdon thams cad zhi nas tshe rgyas par bsams la spyi thog tu bum pa bzhag nas/ /shar phyogs dkar mo zhi mdzad
236b1(rgyud 'grel): lha/ /dri za'i lag nas che khug la/ /nad dang gdon rnams zhi mdzad pa'i/ /dbang bskur deng 'dir bdag la gsol/ /dza hUM(rgyud 'grel): a pa ri mi ta A yu rdz+nyA na su bi ni swAhA/ /de nas rang dkyil 'khor gyi lho nas zhags pa ma sor mo spros la
236b2(rgyud 'grel): tshe dang longs spyod la sogs pa rgyas pa'i las byas te/ gshin rje'i lag nas tshe bkug la bstim nas/ /lho phyogs gser mo rgyas mdzad ma/ /gshin rje'i lag nas tshe khug la/ /tshe dang longs spyod rgyas pa yi/ /dbang bskur bdag la
236b3(rgyud 'grel): deng 'dir gsol/ /yang sa bon dang nub nas lcags sgrog ma nub tu spros chu lha'i lag nas tshe khug la/ srid gsum dbang du byas par bsams nas/ /nub phyogs dmar mo dbang gi lha/ /chu lha'i lag nas tshe khug la/ /srid gsum dang
236b4(rgyud 'grel): du bsdus mdzad pa'o/ /dbang bskur der 'dir bdag la gsol/ /yang sa bon dang byang phyogs nas dril bu ma mang po spros nas nad gdon tshang gcad nas/ /gnod sbyin gyi lag nas tshe bkug la bstim te/ /byang phyogs ljang khu drag po'i lta/ /
236b5(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin lag nas tshe khug la/ /nad gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa'i/ /dbang bskur deng 'dir bdag la gsol/ /nges yum bzhi po nya mor byas nas dbang bskur ba'o/ /de ltar dbang bzhi po de rnams bskur bas nyon mongs dag
236b6(rgyud 'grel): 'chi ba med pa'i dngos grub thob pa de'i dang las bdag nyid gtso bo yab yum du bsam mo/ /de nas de nyid brtan par bya zhing dbang rtags su rigs lngas dbu brgyan par bya ste/ de yang bum pa spyi bor bzhag ste gtso bo yab yum du bskyed/ /
236b7(rgyud 'grel): de las 'od zer dmar po lus la thim pas 'dod chags ngag nas so sor kun rtog rgyud la skyes nas 'od dpag med kyis dbu brgyan par bsams nas/ 'dod chags rnam par dag nas ni/ /'od dpag med pas dbu brgyan te/ /so
237a1(rgyud 'grel): sor kun rtog don rtogs nas/ /mdzes shing pad+ma'i lus thob shog /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): bruM pad+ma ka ma la a b+hi Shi ny+tsa tu mAM/ /yang bum pa mi bskyod par bsams nas dbral bar bzhag 'od 'phros pas/ /zhes sdang ngag nas?
237a2(rgyud 'grel): me long ye shes skyes te/ mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsams nas/ zhe sdang rnam par dag nas ni/ /bcom ldan mi bskyod dbu brgyan te/ /me long ye shes don rtogs shing/ /'gyur med rdo rje'i lus thob shog /oM hUM brUM badzra
237a3(rgyud 'grel): ka la sha a b+hi Shi ny+tsa tu mAM yang bum pa rna ba g.yas kyi steng du bzhag nas rin 'byung du bsam/ de'i 'od kyis nga rgyal dag nas mnyam nyid ye shes rgyud la skyes te/ rin 'byung gis dbu brgyan par bsams nas/ /nga rgyal rnam par
237a4(rgyud 'grel): dag nas ni/ /rin chen 'byung ldan dbu brgyan pas/ /mnyam nyid ye shes don rtogs nas/ /bde chen lhun grub don rtogs shog /oM sa bruM ratna ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM/ /yang lag par bum pa bzhag nas rnam par snang mdzad du bskyed/
237a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'od kyis gti mug dag ste chos dbyings ye shes rgyud la skyes des dbu brgyan par bsams nas/ /gti mug rnam par dag nas ni/ /sangs rgyas rigs kyis dbu brgyan te/ /chos dbyings ye shes don rtogs nas/ /chos kyi 'khor
237a6(rgyud 'grel): lo bskor bar shog /oM bruM bud+d+ha ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM/ /yang rna ba g.yon par bum pa bzhag /don yod grub par bskyed/ de'i 'od kyis phrag dog dag /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes rgyud la skye/ /de dbu brgyan par bsams nas/ /phrag
237a7(rgyud 'grel): dog rnam par dag nas ni/ /don grub rigs kyis dbu brgyan te/ /bya grub ye shes don rtogs nas/ /ci bsams ma lus 'grub par shog /oM a bruM ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM/ /zhes rigs lngas dbu brgyan par bsams nas/ bkra
237b1(rgyud 'grel): shis tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing me tog 'thor ro/ /bdag kho na mgon po tshe dpag med yin zhing/ tshe dpag med kho na bdag yin snyam pa'i nga rgyal brtan pos gnas par bya'o/ /de rnams kyis thun mong ma yin pa khyad par gyi dbang bstan
237b2(rgyud 'grel): no/ /de nas rjes gnang bshad par bya ste dang po gtso bo yab yum bstan nas 'di kho na ltar yid la byos shig byas la/ 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi/ khams gsum na ni sdig med de/ /de bas 'dod la chags bral bar/ /khyod
237b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis nam du 'ang ma byed cig /ces brjod/ /sngags kyi rjes gnang ni/ pad+ma'i phreng ba la gtso bo'i sngags bzlas sangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la stsal lags kyis/ /'di la 'go bar mdzad du gsol/ /zhes pas gsol ba gdab po/ /de nas
237b4(rgyud 'grel): slob mas phreng ba snying khar bzung ste/ /bcom ldan bdag gis stsal lags kyis/ /bdag la 'go bar mdzad du gsol/ /zhes gtso bo yab yum 'khro dang bcas pa'i sngags la na ldar rjes zlos bya'o/ / de nas mchod pa phyi nang gsang
237b5(rgyud 'grel): ba gsum du gus pas phul cig ces pa'i rjes su gnang bar bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig gsum gyi dbang bskur bar bya ste/ de yang slob ma dad rdo rje hUM las rdo rje sems dpar bskyed de/ gzhan don bsam pas/ thog ma med pa'i sems
237b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /bcom ldan dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o/ /zhes rdo rje lag pa g.yas su gtad nge snying khar bzung nas thugs gnyis su
237b7(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i ye shes rtogs par gyis shig pa'o/ /de nas dril bu snang ba mdza' yas gsung gi rang bzhin du bskyed nas/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog /srid pa'i mchog
238a1(rgyud 'grel): ni byed pa po/ /sgra thams cad chos kyi rang sgra rtogs par gyis shig pa'o/ /de nas rang gi snying khar gtso bo yab yum bsams nas/ /yi dam gzugs ni brtan bya'i phyir/ /dam tshig phyag rgya rab tu brjod dam
238a2(rgyud 'grel): tshig 'di la rtag gnas pas/ /lha'i sbyor ba rab tu grags/ /zhes pas lha sku snang stong sgyu ma'i skur blta bar bya'o/ /de nas spyi dang bye brag gi dbang bshad par bya ste/ /dang po slob ma skyil krung du 'dug pa'i rkang pa'i bar du chos kyi 'khor lo
238a3(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yas su dung/ g.yon du glegs baM/ steng du gdugs phub la/ deng nas brtsams te sems skyed pa/ /tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /di ring phan chad 'jig rten la/ /skyob pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /chos kyi dud ni bla na med/ /
238a4(rgyud 'grel): kun tu ma lus gang bar gyis/ /som nyi yid gnyis ma za cig /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs/ /de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas la/ /phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya/ /
238a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang/ /kun tu khyod la bsrung bar gyis zhes pa'o/ /de nas bye brag tu bskur ba ni/ /rang dang slob ma gnyis ka rnam snang du bskyed la rigs lnga'i sgo nas don bya snyam du bsams nas/ /'dzin rten kun la thams cad du/
238a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar snang tshogs 'dul gyur pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /zhes brjod las sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis gdul bya gti mug can gyi don bya snyam du bsam mo/ /de bzhin du rdo rje dang nor bu dang
238a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang/ /rgya gram pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor ba rnams la chog gong bzhin spel bar bya'o/ /de nas rdzas kyi cho ga bstan par bya ste/ de yang lung bstan pa ni/ khyod kyi phung po lnga khams lnga che dpag med yab yum yin pa'i bdag gis
238b1(rgyud 'grel): lung bstan gyis/ /deng 'dir ngas khyod lung bstan bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa rang bzhin rnams dag pas/ /lha yi 'khor lor gnas pa'o/ /zhes brjod pa'o/ /de nas gzengs bstod pa ni/ /yi dam lha dang mnyam par ni/ /dus
238b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid nas 'gyur ba ste/ /dga' zhing spro ba chen po yi/ /phyi rol mi bsams nang du'o/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas dbugs dbyung ba ni/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /slan chad 'chi ba yod min te/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pas/ /cis kyang mi

238b4(rgyud 'grel): chu/ /gang gis reg dang 'thungs pa yis/ /mchog dang thun mongs dngos grub kun/ /thams cad da lta mngon du 'gyur/ /bgegs dang log 'dren kun 'joms shing/ /gzhan gyis rdzi bar mi nus pa'i/ /mi shigs rdo rje pha lam 'gyur/ /lhun
238b5(rgyud 'grel): grub bde ba chen po'o/ /zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khro gyi nub phyogs su pad+ma dmar po 'dab pa brgyad pa'i steng du tshe dpag med yab yum zhal sbyor du bsam/ /de la ye shes pa gzhug sku gsung thugs byin gyis
238b6(rgyud 'grel): brla bas nas/ /mchod pa dang bstod pa byas nas gsang sgrub ltar zlas pa byas/ /rang yang gtso bo yab yum du bsams nas snyoms 'jug byas pas byang sems/ dkar dmar gsang gnas nas don/ /yab yum rnams kyang
238b7(rgyud 'grel): snyoms 'jug byas nas gang gnas byang sems dkar dmar na rang byung bar bsam/ de nas ka pA lar sbrang dang bu ram bdud rtsi bspres la/ /der byang sems dkar dmar bstims pa dang ka pA la 'chi med ye shes kyi bdud rtsi byang sems
239a1(rgyud 'grel): dkar por mer gyis khengs par bsam mo/ /de nas mandal steng du bla ma dang gtso bo yab yum gnyis lha med pa'i gsad gnas nas sems kyi rgyan byung ste/ slob ma'i lce thog tu thim pas bde stong gi nyams rgyud la
239a2(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa dang/ lus byang sems dmar pos khengs par bsams nas ka pA la'i bdud rtsi byin la/ /phyogs bcu rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi/ /gsang ba'i gnas las byung ba yi/ /nga yi byang chub sems kyi rgyun/ /di ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ /

239b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ /tshe dpag med kyi sgrub thabs bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du /a pa ri mi tA yurdz+nya na sA d+ha na ma/ bod skad du/ cho
239b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rigs drug sems can thams cad kyi/ tshe nyams pa la gso ba'i phyir/ /bcom ldan ye shes tshe dpag med/ /sgrub
239b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs yang dag bshad par bya/ /dang brtson dbang thob dam tshig ldan/ /tshe nyams pa rnams gso 'dod pas/ /dben zhing nyams dga' i gnas 'dug nas/ /bsod nams tshogs kyi sngon 'gro ni/ /bla ma dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams/ /nam mkhar
239b4(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs phyag 'tshal nas/ /mchod cing sdig pa bshags pa dang/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom gar bya/ /rang gi snying khar hwI(rgyud 'grel): dmar la/ /ye shes me 'bar rnam smin sregs/ /sngags kyi don la stong nyid bsgom/ /oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+ho sarba
239b5(rgyud 'grel): d+harma swa d+ha wa shud+d+ho haM/ stong pa'i dang las sems nyid ni /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar chog /drug thig le las/ /dbang chen zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /spyan gsum khro gnyer ljags 'dril ba/ /steng zhal rta mgo ljang khu la/ /drag pos rta skad rab tu
239b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshor/ /dbyug pa'i sdig mdzub me ltar 'bar/ /thugs kar pad+ma rgyas pa yi/ /steng du zla ba nyi ma la/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las 'od zer 'phros pa yis/ /e las chos 'byung yangs pa ru/ /yaM las rlung dang raM las me/ /baM las chu dang laM las sa/ /
239b7(rgyud 'grel): suM las ri rab lhun po dang/ /steng du b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs brgyan/ /'dod yon pha gu dra phyed mdzes/ /khor yug chu skyes sna tshogs dang/ /rdo rje me ri thogs pa med/ /pho brang chu skyes 'phang rim gnyis/ /'dab ma
240a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhe dang brgyad pa la/ /mu khyud pad+mas mdzes pa dang/ /lha snam pan reg lnga dang ldan/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba las/ /a las chu shel dkyil 'khor dang/ /ri las rta bdun dag tu gyur/ /steng du pad+ma h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yis
240a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ /de las 'od 'phros don gnyis byas/ /tshur 'dus h+rI(rgyud 'grel): la thim pa yi/ /li khri lta bu'i thig le las/ /bcom ldan tshe dpag med pa ni/ /'gying bcas 'od 'khrug skyil krung bzhugs/ /phyag gnyis pad+ma rA ga yis/ /bum pa 'chi med
240a3(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsis gang/ /'gro rnams re skong dpag bsam shing/ /bum pa'i kha rgyan thugs khong 'dzin/ /yum la 'khyung cing gnyis su med/ /paM las yum mchog gos dkar mo/ /li khri lta bur 'dzum zhing skeg /g.yas pa pad+ma g.yon pa ni/
240a4(rgyud 'grel): dum pa yongs su 'dzin pa la/ /yab la gnyis med legs par 'khril/ /dar dang nor bu du mas brgyan/ /chu skyes brgyad dang lha rnams la/ /pad+ma zla ba nyi ma'i gdan/ /mtshams bzhi'i sgod zhi zla ba'i gdan/ /shar du rdo rje hUM gis
240a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /de las mi bskyod tshe dpag med/ /lho ru rin chen hUM gis mtshan/ /rin chen rigs kyi tshe dpag med/ /nub tu 'khor lo oM gyis mtshan/ /rnam par snang mdzad tshe dpag med/ byang du ral gri a yis mtshan/ /bon
240a6(rgyud 'grel): yod grub la? tshe dpag med/ /shar lhor maM las mA ma kI /lho nub taM las lha mo sgrol/ /nub byang laM las sangs rgyas spyan/ /byang shar hUM las dam tshig sgrol/ /rigs bzhi mnyam gzhag phyag rgya las/ /shel dang bai DUrya gser
240a7(rgyud 'grel): dang ni/ /in+d+ra nI la'i bum pa 'dzin/ /yum lnga g.yas pa rang rtags dang/ /g.yon a bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /shar du rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi/ /lho ru rin chen sems dpa' bzhi/ /nub tu rnam snang sems dpa' bzhi/ /byang du las kyi sems
240b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' bzhi/ /g.yas par rang rtags 'dzin pa la/ /g.yon pas tshe'i bum pa 'dzin/ /thams cad ngar dang nor bus brgyan/ rdo rje dkyil krung bzhugs pa'o/ /mtshams bzhi la ni mchod pa yi/ /bdud spos mar me me tog ma/ /dri char
240b2(rgyud 'grel): mdang lha mo bzhi/ /sna tshogs 'od kyis bskor ba'o/ /shar sgo dza(rgyud 'grel): las lcags kyu kar/ /lho sgo hUM las zhags pa ser/ /nub sgor pa las lcags sgrogs dmar/ /byang sgor hwri(rgyud 'grel): las dril bu ljang/ /sgo ba bzhi po de dag ni/ /khril
240b3(rgyud 'grel): ldem bzhengs nas bzhugs pa'o/ /de nas thugs kha'i 'od zer gyis/ /rang bzhin gnas nas ye shes pa/ /tshig 'dis spyan ni drang bar bya/ /gdon nas rang bzhin nam mkha' ltar/ /thugs rje 'ja' tshon skur stan pa'i/ /bcom ldan gsung
240b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog tshe dpag med/ /dang bzhin lhun grub bzhul yas nas/ /ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dam pa 'dir/ /'gro ba'i don phyir spyan 'dren na/ /tshe nad tshe nyams gso ba'i phyir/ /'di nyid du ni gshegs su gsol/ /rdo rje rin chen
240b5(rgyud 'grel): rbyad? snad dang/ /las kyi rigs mchog tshe dpag med/ /yum bzhi mchod pa'i lha mo dang/ /sems dpa' bcu drug sgo mar bcas/ /rang bzhin bde chen dkyil 'khor na/ /ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dam pa 'dir/ /tshe dang ye shes rgyas pa dang/ /
240b6(rgyud 'grel): sdugs? ma chog ye shes thob bya'i phyir/ /'di nyid du ni spyan 'dren ni/ /byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa dgug gzhug bya/ /sku gsung thugs ni byin gyis brlab/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur nas/ /rigs bdag
240b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis dgu brgyan te/ mnyas par gyur la mchod pa dang/ n/bstod brgyas dang bsdus pa bya/ /de nas phyir rgod rab spangs .nas/ /ma yengs lha rnams gsal stong sgom/ /de rjes bzlas pa bya ba ni/ /lha rnams thugs kha'i bum pa du/ h+rI(rgyud 'grel): hUM
241a1(rgyud 'grel): traM bruM a las ni/ /rang rang sngags kyis bskor bar bsgom/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): bruM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She sbA hA/ /oM hUM b+h+rUM badzra dz+nya na A yu She swAhA/ oM swa b+hUM badzrA dz+nyA na A yu She swAhA/ oM oM b+heru badzra dz+nya na atha ra yu She sta thA?/ oM a
241a2(rgyud 'grel): b+hUM badzra dz+nyA na A yu She swAhA/ /de rnams yab kyi snying bo'i sngags so/ /yum gyi bum par paM maM traM laM taM rnams la sngags kyis bskor/ /oM b+h+ruM a pa ra mi te A yu rdz+nyA na su ban shtsi ta te jo ra dzE ya/ yum mchog lnge'i snying po'i/ /phyogs
241a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi sems dpa' bcu drug la/ /rang gi sa bon rnams la ni/ /gtso bo'i sngags kyis bskor bar bsam/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): a pa ra mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi na swahA/ sgom bzhi'i snying po'i sngags so/ /de ltar bum pa'i sngags rnams
241a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ /dmigs te gsang sngags bzlas pa yis/ /yig 'bru rnams la bdud rtsi'i chu/ /babs bas bum pa gang bar bsam/ /bum nang ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /rang gi gnas gsum thim pa yis/ /lus ngag yid gsum nad gdon
241a5(rgyud 'grel): rang/ /sdig sgrib dag nas dbang bzhi thob/ /'chi med dngos grub thob par bsam/ /de nas rang gis sngags bzlas pas/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad kyi/ /rang rang gsang sngags bzlas par bsgom/ /snying kha'i sa bon 'od
241a6(rgyud 'grel): zer las/ /lha mo dkar mo lcags kyu thogs/ /bsam gyis mi khyab shar du 'phros/ /nang gdon zhi ba'i las byas te/ /dri za'i lag nas tshe bkug nas/ /bdag bskyed lha dang bum par bstim/ /de bzhin lho yi zhags pa mos/ /tshe dang
241a7(rgyud 'grel): longs sbyod rgyas byas nas/ /gshin rje'i lag nas tshe bkug ste/ /gong bzhin du ni bstim par bya/ /nub kyi lcags sgrog dmar mo yis/ /srid gsum ma lus dbang da bsdus te/ /chu lha'i lag nas tshe bkug ste/ /bstim zhing klu gdon dag
241b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bsam/ /byang gi dril bu dgyes mdzad mas/ /nad gdon log 'dren tshar gcad nas/ /gnod sbyin lag nas tshe bkug nas/ /gong bzhin dmigs pa gsal bas bstim/ /bum pa dag la brten nas ni/ /'chi med cho sgrub bshad pa ni/ /rnam
241b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal las bum gnyis po la/ /rdzas dang kha rgyan mgul chings bcas/ /phyag mtshan bris la gdags par bya/ /maN+Dal steng du legs par bzhag /phyi ni bum pa'i rnam pa la/ /nang du gzhal yas khar du bsgom/ /gsang sngags rgyal pa'i
241b3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa bya/ /gong bzhin bdud rtsis bum pa gang/ /de yis rang gzhan thams cad kyis/ /nang gdon sdig sgrib ma lus dag /'chi med dngos grub thob par bsam/ /las bum rta mgrin gong bzhin bskyed/ /thugs kha'i sa bon sngags
241b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bskor/ /oM badzra gro d+ha haM ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ /de yis rang gzhan bar chad bsrung/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i khrus bya'o/ /de ltar rang don gzhan don la/ /ma yengs bskyed rim gsal ba yis/ ting 'dzin gcig tu bsngags
241b5(rgyud 'grel): shas da?/ /rtags rdzogs zla drug zhal mthong 'gyur/ /de nas rgyun du nyams su len/ /kha ta'i skad kyis mnon par/ /bdag nyid gzhan dang dag ma 'dres/ /mdun du chu skyes stong dang ldan/ /gtso bo yab yum gsal bar bsgom/ /oM A
241b6(rgyud 'grel): lus rjes rdza ha k+Shas re she ri rgyu/ gsol pa btab la mchod bstos bya/ /bum pa dag la dmigs nas ni/ /sgrub byed sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/ /oM a ma ra ni dzi waM tI yaM swAhA/ /gsang sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /de lis bdud rtsi'i rgyun
241b7(rgyud 'grel): byung nas/ /rang gi spyi gtsug thim pa yis/ /nad gdon sdig sgrib thams cad dag /bdud rtsis rang lus gang ba yis/ /'chi med tshe yi dngos grub thog /tshe dpag med par gyur par bsam/ /brtan pa'i yan lag lnga bzlas so/ /mdun skyed
242a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag la bstim pa dang/ /de yi tshe tshad nyi zlar 'gyur/ /tshe nyams la sogs smos ci dgos/ /gsang nas sgrub pa rab tu bsngags/ /de nas gsang sgrub bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gong dang 'dra ba la/ /lha tshogs thar
242a2(rgyud 'grel): li khri ltar/ /sna tshogs rin chen rgyan gyis mdzes/ /bum pa thod par bcas pa 'dzin/ /rdo rje kyil krung bzhugs pa'o/ /bcu drug lon ba sku sha rgyas/ /'jam zhing num 'bur ba la/ /pad+ma rdo rje rin chen dang/ /'khor lo sna tshogs rdo
242a3(rgyud 'grel): rje te/ /g.yas pa rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /g.yon pa thod pa bdud rtsis gang/ /yab la stob cing gnyis su 'khril/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med/ /yab yum 'od zer tshogs 'khrug cing/ /snyoms 'jug zag med bde nga rgyas/ /

242a5(rgyud 'grel): po gnyis sa nyis ni/ /rigs kyi yum dang bcas pa la/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bzhengs pa'o/ /thams cad g.yas pa rang rtags 'dzin/ /g.yon ba tshe yi bum pa dang/ /sbrul dang rin chen sna tshogs brgyan/ /me ri 'bar ba'i klong
242a6(rgyud 'grel): na bzhugs/ /lha mo bzhi dang sgo ba bzhi/ /bzhengs pa khro bo'i tshul du gnas/ /'bru gsum sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs/ /ye shes sbyan drang gnyis med bstim/ /dbang bskur rigs kyis dbus rgyan pa/ /gtso bo lnga dang khro bo bcu'i/
242a7(rgyud 'grel): bum pa dag la dmigs nas ni/ /gsang sngags 'di ni bzlas bar bya/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): hUM swa b+h+ruM a/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM be ho mas pa ri mi ta A yurdz+nya na ma hA sid+d+hi ha sa ni ri ti swAhA/ de nas rang nyid bzlas pa bya/ /bum pa legs par bcas pa
242b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ /lha rnams gong bzhin bskyed pa dang/ /rang dang lha rnams sngags bzlas pas/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i bum pa gang/ /rjes su lha rnams zhu ba'i chus/ /rang bzhin thams cad khrus bya'o/ /de yis mchog dang thun mong gi/ dngos grub thaM cad?
242b2(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga'i gtor ma 'di/ /snying bo sngags kyis 'bul bar bya/ /las bzhi'i sbyin bsreg bya ba dang/ /longs spyod spel phyir thod pa mchod/ /de nas de kho na nyid sgrub/ /rang nyid mgon por gsal ba yi/ /gsang
242b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas chos 'byung gru gsum du/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dang pi las me 'bar bas/ /lus kyi nad rnams thams cad khengs/ /spyi bo'i haM brgyad zhu ba las/ /bde chen bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab/ /rtsa gsum gang bas bde ba rgyas/ /drod dang bde ba'i khyad

242b7(rgyud 'grel): tA/ /yur rgA na maN+Da la d+hi ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ /bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang bzhin tshe dpag med pa'i sku/ /ye shes lnga ldan pa/
243a1(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi bdag /thugs rje'i thugs kyis rjes 'dzin pa'i/ /bla ma tshe dpag med la 'dud/ /rtsa rgyud bshad rgyud las byung ba'o/ /cho ga bzang pos yongs bzung bshad/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing/ /pha Na Na phan?
243a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i blo gros can/ /rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub phyir/ /yid 'ong nyams dga' i gnas nyid du/ /lha yi rnal 'byor gsal ba dang/ /gtso bo 'bum la 'khor rnams khro/ /rab 'bring mtshan ma thong pa dang/ /slob mas me tog dang bcas pas/ /gus

243a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /brjod nas sa la thim pa ltar/ /phyogs skyong gtor ma 'bul ba dang/ /mthun pa'i grogs dang gsol ba gdab/ /ro bsal nyes pa spangs pa de/ /'thas par bcag cing rnam lnga dang/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni khyab par byug/ /me yis zhi
243a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i las kun gyi/ /sbyin sreg sbyangs dang sngags kyis ni/ /byin brlabs lha'i khang par bsam/ /bskyed pa'i yan lag kun rdzogs pas/ /slob dpon dkyil 'khor steng 'dug la/ /slob ma gus pas spos thogs te/ mchod cing bstod dang gsol
243b1(rgyud 'grel): ba 'baT?/ /bcom ldan mgon po tsha dpag med/ /skyon gyis ma gos li khri ltar/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba/ /mnyam nyid skul phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad ni/ /yon tan ma lus bskyed mdzad cing/ ming?
243b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nor bu mtshungs ldan pa'i/ /'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tsha la bstod/ /tshe dpag med pa gsung gi bdag /'chi bdag ma lus 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /tshe yi dngos grub gsol pa'i sku/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /de nas rdo
243b3(rgyud 'grel): rje slob dpon gyis/ /dkyil 'khor bsdus te rta mchog sku/ /khro zhing rab brjod nga rgyal dang/ /rkang pa hUM las rdo rjer byas/ /mig gnyis nyi zla 'bar ba ste/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yis/ /'jigs med byang shar mtshams song nas/ /

243b6(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum bskor bar bya/ /de nas khro bo'i phur pa rnams/ /kI la ya zhes btab nas kyang/ /oM ko Ta yis brdung bar bya/ /me b+hi sngags kyis byi gyis brlab/ /sa yi lha dang lha tshogs rnams/ /sta gon gnas par bya ba ni/ /lha
243b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams rdzogs par bskyed pa dang/ /mchod cing bstong de sngos thogs la/ /bcom ldan mgon po che dpag med/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad dang/ /rig pa'i lha ma rdzu 'phrul can/ /byang chub sems dpa' la so/ /
244a1(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa dang/ /slob ma rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje can bdag che ge zhes/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol/ /rjes su brtse khar nyer
244a2(rgyud 'grel): dgongs nas/ /sang nub dgyes par 'byon par 'tshal/ /de nas phyi nang mchod pas mchod/ /dkyil 'khor lhag par gnas pa'o/ /rin chen rgyu las byung ba yis/ /lto che mgrin pa ring ba dang/ /mchu 'phyang nag po ra ri med/ /lha
244a3(rgyud 'grel): grangs mnyam pa las bum dang/ /rang rang phyag mtshan rdzogs par bya/ /ha sa de ba gser dngul dang/ /mu tig mu men gyi ru gzhug /nas til gro srin mud ka dang/ /ga bur dza ti gur gum mchog /tsan dan gnyis dang a ka ru/ / mar dang
244a4(rgyud 'grel): bu ram sbrang rtsi dang/ /lan tsha rnams kyis lto ba dgang/ /kha tshar ma nyams ras zungs kyis/ /mgrin par rab tu brgyan ba dang/ /kha rgyan du sha 'bras bu can/ /sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyi steng/ /yang na ku sha'i gan la bzhugs/
