244a6(rgyud 'grel): bum rta mgrin bskyed pa dang/ /sngags bzlas bar chad bsrung bar dang/ /sha lnga bdud rtsi'i gtor mas mchod/ /'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab/ /slob mo lhag par gnas pa yang/ /snyim pa me tog dang bcas pa/ /skye rgas na 'chi na
244a7(rgyud 'grel): kra yi/ /chu srin la sogs 'jigs rung ba/ srid ba'i mtsho las bdag sgrol mdzod/ /dga' chen khyod bdag bston pa po/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen por tshul bstan pa'i/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /
244b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig de ni bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum de ni bdag la gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /'od kyis bur byas sdig pa sbyangs/ /bu tshur
244b2(rgyud 'grel): beg ba chen po pa/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyis rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas dus gsum 'byung ba rnams/ /rdo rje gsang sngags rab bsgom
244b3(rgyud 'grel): las/ /ye shes mnyam med yang dag bsnyes/ /skyob pa shAkya sang ge yis/ drag po chen po bdud kyi sde/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de nas rdo rje slob
244b4(rgyud 'grel): yon gyis/ /sdig pa bshags pa la sogs kun/ /sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga bya/ /tshe dpag med pa bdag lang gongs/ /ma lus bzhugs pa'i bde gshegs rnams/ /'di nyid nas bzung sangs rgyas par/ /bla med bdag la gzigs
244b5(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod/ /dam tshig sdom pa bzung ba ni/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa ni/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bar bya/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril
244b6(rgyud 'grel): bu'i phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag nyid du bdrung bar bya/ /slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yis/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang
244b7(rgyud 'grel): chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang bzung bar bya/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan pa ran/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bar
245a1(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por bzung bar bgyi/ /gnyis su med pa'i tshangs spyod dang/ /rang gi dam tshig
245a2(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar bgyi/ /bdag gi dge ba'i las kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas myur du bsgrub bya ste/ sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/ /bla med gnas su sgral bar bgyi/ /gus pas lan gsum brjod par bya/ /dpral ba mgrin pa snying kha ru/ /dri'i theg
245a3(rgyud 'grel): le gsum byas te/ /rta bdun chu skyes 'khor lo'i ste/ /thugs gsung sku yi snying pos brgyan/ /rigs kyi lha las 'od 'phros ba/ ye shes gnyis su med par bstim/ /chu gnyis sngon du 'gro bas mchod/ /deng nas bzung nas bu khyod kyis/ /'khor ba'i nyes
245a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam gos bar/ /mchod pa kun dang ldan par ni/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /a shwartha dang bal sha/ /u du wI ra la sogs pa/ /bcu gnyis sor gyi tshar rtsam la/ /rtse mor me tog gis brgyan nas/ /maN+Dal 'dab brkyan rnam ldas byung/ shar bljas
245a5(rgyud 'grel): dbus su dor ba ni/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa/ /steng du mchog gdings grub yin/ /phyogs su phrin las grub pa dang/ /thur bltas sa 'og 'grub pa yin/ /mtshams su 'dzin te dngos grub pos de nas skyor chu sbyin pa ni/ /oM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): bri shud+d+ha d+ha rma sarba rdzas baM tsA bya gir? dta
245a6(rgyud 'grel): yA bi ka lpa a ban ye hUM zhes pas sgo gsum dag sbyang snas/ /skud pa dmar po sum sgril la/ /rta mgrin sngaT kyis bcing bar bya/ /ku rag gcing ma sngas dang stan/ /ma nor seng ge'i nyal stangs bzhin/ /thub pas ting 'dzin 'grub pa ltar/ mtshan ma gang byung brjod pas bya/ /bzang na
245a7(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub sgros bskyed/ /ngan na sbyin bsreg gis ni bzlog /zab cing rgya che'i chos bshad ni/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dang u dum wA ri'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung dam yang na mi 'byung srid/ /gsang sngags spyod pa'i
245b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /bla ma rdo rje can mchod la/ /nang par langs te dkyil 'khor la/ /nam mkhar bteg te thig gang ba ste/ /bu mo gtsang ma sdom ldan gyis/ /ras bal las byung bkal ba dang/ /ye shes lnga 'am
245b2(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs/ /oM a n+yo nA nu ga ta sarba d+harmA brjod nas bskyil bar bya ba ni/ /pad+ma snod du bzhug nas rkyang/ /mi 'chi lnga yis spangs byas la/ /blo ldan ye shes bstim byas nas/ /nam mkhar ye shes je jes gdab/ /sgo yi bcu gnyis
245b3(rgyud 'grel): cha dad ldan/ /srid kyang khang pa nyes 'gyur la/ /tshangs pa'i las thig drangs ba la/ /oM badzra sU tra sa ma ya ma ti kra ma hUM/ tshangs dang zur thig la sogs pa/ /bstan bcos mthong zhing blo ldan des/ /cha ni gang yin rnam par dbye/ /
245b4(rgyud 'grel): gal te nyes pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /chad na bla ma'i srogs yo zhing/ /dman lha gnad kyis btab par 'gyur/ /phyogs 'khrul slob ma rmongs par 'gyur/ /blo ldan nyes pa med par bya/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas/ /dra ba dra pha phyed pas
245b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /nyi zla dril bu g.yeng khas spras/ /pho brang chu skyes rim pa gnyis/ /mu khyab pad+ma'i phreng ba dang/ /khyams dang phyi rol pa pad nga dang/ /rdo rje rer la sogs pa/ /rnam pa ma lus rdzogs par bya/ /rin chen lnga dang 'phru phye 'am/ /pad+ma'i
245b6(rgyud 'grel): snod du so sor bzhag /sa bon bris la ye shes bstim/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phyin gyis brlab/ /sdon po seng po dkar po ljang/ /dmar po 'di ni nang du 'dod/ /g.yas bskor rgyun ma chad par bri/ /dbang ldan mchems su brang ba
245b7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /pad+ma'i snod kyis steng nas bkag /'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni rab sgrol byed/ /bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med/ /chen gyi las ni yang dag brtsam/ /me tog dor la mtshan ma brtag /shar sngo lto
246a1(rgyud 'grel): ser nub dkar po/ /byang phyogs in+d+ra nI la'i mdog /pad+ma lha snam dmar po'o/ /de ltar rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /khrus byas dri zhim lus byug nas/ /gos bzang brgyan la lan gsum bskor/ /tshe
246a2(rgyud 'grel): dpag med pa'i nga rgyal gyis/ /shad gyi sgo nas nar du zhugs/ /yid kyis sgo bzhi dbye bar bsam/ /oM badzra murg+ha Ta/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya hUM/ rnam rgyal la sogs bum pa rnams/ /gnas dang go rim bzhin du dgod/ /sna
246a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gos dang rgyan phreng sogs/ /mchod pa'i rdzas kyis legs par brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed/ /ye shes bstim la mchod bstod bya/ /tshogs kyi 'khor los tshim pa dang/ /bar chad zhi phyir shar
246a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba dang/ /slob ma'i cho ga ji lta bar/ /slob dpon bdag nyid dbang dang ldan/ /shar gyi phyogs nas 'jug pa dang/ /de nas slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir/ /khrus byas bgegs dang sdig pa sbyang/ /
246a5(rgyud 'grel): gdong pa ras kyis bkab nas ni/ /bu khyod su yin ci la dga' / / bdag ni bskal bzang rigs yin no/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi/ /gtso bo lha mor bcas pa yis/ /lha rnams
246a6(rgyud 'grel): la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /de nas tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /tshe dpag med pa'i grong khyer mchog /snying
246a7(rgyud 'grel): po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya/ /oM a khaM bI ra tUM/ me tog phreng ba gtad pa dang/ /dkyil 'khor lha la phyag 'tshal te/ oM na ma te hUM/ oM na ma mi hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swAhA/ shar nas
246b1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs nas lho nas dbang/ /nub nas chos bshad byas nas ni/ /phrin las sgrubs pa la sogs pa'i/ /don du gsol ba gdab pa ni/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo pa thA na yA ta ma naM/ /ni rya tA yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwA d+hi tiSha swa maM/ /oM
246b2(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA b+hi she ka tA dmE nAM ni ryatA yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra ratnA b+hi Shany+tsi maM /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra bar d+ha na yAdmA nI ni rya tA yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga tA badzra d+harma pra wad+ha ya maM/ sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karmA naM/ admA nAM na ?? ?? yA
246b3(rgyud 'grel): mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra ka rma ku ru maM/ dam tshig sdom pa sbyin pa dang/ /rnal 'byor du ni sems bskyed do/ /oM sarba yo ga tsa ta tpe ta ya mi /rdo rje snying khar bzhag /oM su ra te sa ma ya stwaM/ sid+d+hi badzra ya tha su khaM/ deb khyod de bzhin ??
246b4(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad dang/ tshe dpag med kyi dngos grub thob/ /dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos/ /dkyil 'khor ma zhugs mi smra'o/ /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ /'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste/ /gal te khyod kyis smras gyur na/ /dam tshig chen
246b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i rdo rje yis/ /rang gi mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur/ /tshe dpag med pa deng khyod kyi/ /snying la de ring yang dag zhugs/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg
246b6(rgyud 'grel): par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub rnams/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ /badzro tha ka oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ de nas brtsams nas bu khyod kyi/ /tshe dpag med pa nga yin gyis/ /khyod kyis da la brnyas pa dang/ /mi bde ma spangs dus byas nas/ /dmyal bar
246b7(rgyud 'grel): ltung bar gur ta re/ /de nas slob ma'i gtso bo yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis rlobs mdzod la/ /tshe dpag med pa dbab par mdzod/ /rkang mthil rlung gi dkyil 'khor dzhaiM/ /snying khar laM las sa'i dkyil 'khor/ /mgrin par baM las chu'i dkyil
247a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor/ /spyi bo yaM las rlung dang haM/ de'i spyi bor tshe dpag med/ /yab yum 'od kyi rang bzhin ni/ /gar byed sku las ye shes kyi/ /bdud rtsi babs nas sku la thim/ /zag med bde bas gang bar bsgom/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+h+ruM
247a2(rgyud 'grel): badzra dz+nyA na A yu she ya be sha ya a b+he sha ya a/ stwaM bA ya/ ra ra ra tsa la ya hUM a ha(rgyud 'grel): dzhyaiM zhes brjod rol mo'i sgra dang ni/ /gu gul bla mtshan thod pa ru/ /dur khrod sol ba'i me yis bsreg /bab gyur zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /
247a3(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): las gsung gi bdud rtsi bsam/ /b+h+ruM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): badzra dge dang la sogs pa/ /smos shig rdo rje can gyi rigs/ /tiSh+Tha badzra brtan par bya'o/ /tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rigs pa'i me tog 'di dor bas/ /sngon tshe ye shes
247a4(rgyud 'grel): mnyes pa'i lha/ /gang yin de la 'bab par shog /pra tI ts+tsha badzra ho(rgyud 'grel): bye brag dang dngos grub brtag par bya/ /pra te gri h+na sa mi saM satwa mahA ba la/ /slob ma'i mgo la bcing bar bya/ /tshe dpag med pa deng khyod kyi/ /mig 'byed par
247a5(rgyud 'grel): ni brtson par mdzad/ /phye bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /oM badzra ne tra ya ha ra pa ta li h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /khyod ni tshe dpag med du skye/ /sngags dang

247a7(rgyud 'grel): nas slab? ma dang ldan des/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /yon mchog dam pa 'bul ba dang/ /dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab/ /bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med/ /yab yum gnyis med bde chen sku/ /

247b2(rgyud 'grel): rol mo'i sgra/ /rigs lnga rig ma'i lha mo dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' bkra shis brjod/ /khro bo rnams kyis bgegs bsrung ngo/ /gsung gsum dam tshig las byung ba'i/ /ye shes bdud rtsi'i dri ma med/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /
247b3(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod rdo rje dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzrA d+hi tiSh+Tha dz+nyA nA b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ gser la sogs pa'i dbu rgyan la/ /rin 'byung bskyed cing ye shes bstim/ /dar dbyangs bcings la tshig 'di brjod/ /thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ /
247b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyis rab blngags pa'i/ /rin chen dbu rgyan dam pa dang/ /dar dbyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ratna mu ku TA b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ rin chen la sogs rdo rje la/ /snang ba mdza' yas bskyed cing

247b6(rgyud 'grel): bstim la tshig dang brjod/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi/ /'gro don mnyam med byed pa yi/ /mchod pa'i phrin las rdzogs byed pa'i/ /dril bu las kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM a b+hi pa ta ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ /slob ma oM
247b7(rgyud 'grel): las rnam snang bskyed/ /ye shes spyan drangs gnyis su med/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas/ /byang chub snying po'i bar du ni/ /cis kyang gzho ma bar mi nus pa'i/ /rdo rje'i ming du rab tu grags/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi She ka ta maM/ /
248a1(rgyud 'grel): chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang/ /dril bu dang ni ming gi dbang/ rig pa yi ni dbang lnga'o/ /nyon mongs lnga ni rnam dag pas/ /dbang bskur lnga ni thob pa yin/ /ma rig pa las 'das nas kyang/ /ye shes lnga ni rims
248a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis thob/ /de nas spyi bo mgrin pa dang/ /snying kha lte ba gsang gnas rnams/ /'khor lo lnga yis gnas nyid du/ /rigs lnga tshe dpag med rnams kyis/ /dbang bskur lha rnams yab yum ste/ /'chi med byang chub sems su rgyus?
248a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsa gsum 'khor lo lnga rnams gang/ /byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ro/ /'chi med rdo rje'i lus su gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sku ru bsgom/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag na 'dug/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag
248a4(rgyud 'grel): tu bcad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiShEe? Sha twaM d+ha ra ya mi badzra satrwaM ha ha hUM hUM/ thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' i ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun

248a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba bzhad/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /mchog gi srid pa byed par 'gyur/ /mtshan ma med par 'gro ba'i don/ /gang dag bdag gis byed nus pas/ /
248a7(rgyud 'grel): bskyod? mi ldog pa dbang bskur che/ /dpa' bo chen po bdag la gsol/ /shar du seng ge'i khri la 'dug /steng du gdugs dkar phub nas kyang/ /rnam rgyal bum pas dbang bskur te/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po la/ /khams gsum pa
248b1(rgyud 'grel): yis phyag byas te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi/ /gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya/ /oM badzra b+hi She ka tA b+hi Shi ny+tsa maM/ /dril bu glegs baM lag tu gtad/ /phrin las thogs pa med pa rnams/ /bu yis gzhan don bla med byos/ /
248b2(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni rdo rje slob dpon yin/ /chos kyis rgyal por dbang bskur ro/ /lha yi snying po lan gsum brjod/ /me tog phreng ba spyi bor bzhag /bcom ldan bdag gis gzud lags kyis/ /bdag la nye bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom
248b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan bdag gis sbyin lags kyis/ /'di la 'go bar mdzad du gsol/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus par/ /sems can ma lus drang ba'i phyir/ /chags pa med pa'i bsam pa yis/ /ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs la/ /
248b4(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis/ /de bzhin rigs kyis gang 'dul ba/ /khyod kyi phrin las mchog yin no/ /deng nas gzung nas dbu khyod kyi/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang bsad pa dang/ /dgug dang bcing dang bsreg pa rang/ /bskrad
248b5(rgyud 'grel): dang dbye ba la sogs pa/ /phrin las sna tshogs grub bar gyis/ /ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang/ /mchil lham de bzhin ri lu ste/ /mi snang bcud len mkha' la sbyod/ /thun mong dngos grub ma lus pa/ /de dag khyod kyis
248b6(rgyud 'grel): grub par bya/ /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis/ /'jig rten rab rib sal bltar/ /bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /oM badzra nai tA pa ta ra phaT laM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing
248b7(rgyud 'grel): gsal la dri ma med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /chos rnams de ltar shes bar gyis/ /ho(rgyud 'grel): yis mda' gzhu phyogs bzhir 'phangs/ /mtshan mo gnas khang dpen pa ru/ /bzhin bzangs mig yangs lang tshor ldan/ /lus
249a1(rgyud 'grel): la dri yis byugs byas te/ /rtse dang rgod pa la sogs pas/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis phab ste/ /nor bu byang chub sems lhung bas/ /nya phyis dung chos la sogs su/ /drir bcas slob ma'i kha ru ni/ /mthe ??
249a2(rgyud 'grel): srin lag dag gis sbyin/ /a ho su khas de btung ngo/ /zag med bde chen lus la rgyas/ /rdo rje de yis nyon mongs 'joms/ /mtshan ldan shes rab rang bzhin te/ /lha mo 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /mdza' yas bde ba sbyin pa mo/ rnam
249a3(rgyud 'grel): pa kun du phyag rgya long/ /bu yis bla med mchod par gyis/ /yol bas bar chad snyoms 'jug gis/ /srub dang bslab pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mi rtog ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /ltos cig ltos cig sems la ltos/ /sems nyid
249a4(rgyud 'grel): cir yang grub pa med/ /gsal gzhag dgag sgrub gang yang med/ /'dis ni rang rig ye shes yin/ /bla ma sbrul ba'i skur byas te/ /chos gos bzung la lung bstan bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa'i mdza' 
249a5(rgyud 'grel): ni grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro nyid las btan/ /'di ni das khyod lung bstan yin/ /oM sarba thA ga ta sid d+hi sa ma s+thaM b+hur b+hu ba swa/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che/ /rgyal ba'i bdag por brtan pa dang/ /nges ni bdud
249a6(rgyud 'grel): las rnam rgyal zhing/ /grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin/ /deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /de ring sangs rgyas sras su skyes/ /sangs rgyas sras su da gyur to/ /rta dang glang po ma he dang/ /bu dang chung ma la sogs 'byig/ /phyag bya bla
249a7(rgyud 'grel): ma dam pa la/ /bzhen sems kyis 'bul bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs mchod byas te/ /tshogs kyi rnal 'byor tshim byas nas/ /bkra shis brjod cing smos lam gdab/ /dge ba'i rtsa bar bsngo ba dang/ /rol mo'i sgra dang bcas bra? yi/ /
249b1(rgyud 'grel): rdul tshon chu po chen por dor/ /dri bzang gis ni thig phyis te/ /lhag chad bskang phyir sbyin bsreg byas/ cho ga bzang po yongs bzung 'di/ /rtsa rgyud le'u 'bum pa dang/ /bshad rgyud 'od zer dra ba la/ /brten nas grub pa'i rgyal mes?
249b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /de yi dge ba gang yod pa/ /rigs drug sems can ma lus pa/ /tshe dpag med pa'i lam zhugs nas/ /de yis 'bras bu myur thob shog/ bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzang po
249b3(rgyud 'grel): yongs bzung zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta zla ba bzang po dang/ /bod kyi lots+tsha ba glan dar ma tshul ba dang/ /rol mo'i sgra dang bcas bra? yi/ / dpag tu med?
249b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ a pa re mi tA yu ho ma bi d+hi nA ma:/ bod skad du/ tshe dpag tu med pa'i sbyin sreg gis cho ga zhes bya ba/ /mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
249b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg ma byas 'bras mi 'byin/ /sbyin sreg gis ni las rnams la grub/ /las kyi mchog rab sbyin sreg go/ zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang/ /dbang dang drag po mngon spyod do/ /zhi ba thab khung zlum po nyid/ /rgyas pa gru bzhi zla gam dbang/ /
249b6(rgyud 'grel): mngon spyod ?? gsum nyid du bya/ /khru gang khru ro khru gang ba/ /sor mo nyi shu kha dog nag /dkar ser dmar ba nyid du bya/ /mchod rdzas yam shing dur ba sogs/ /bsreg rdzas g.yas g.yon rims pa bzhin/ /shar du zhi ba byang du
249b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas/ /dbang la nub dang drag po lte/ /raM las me lha kha dog dmar/ /dbyug gu ril ba spyi blugs dang/ /bgrad 'phreng g.yon dang g.yas su bsam/ /ral pa cod pan gsus khyim che/ /tshangs sku 'chang la ye shes bstim/ /rigs
250a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag rnams kyis dbu brgyan nas/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs dbul/ /dgang lugs dngul la mtshan ma brtags/ /kha dog sgra dang dbyibs dang dri/ /zla ba rgyas pa du ba med/ /nad med sdig pa ma lus zad/ /
250a2(rgyud 'grel): dung dang rdza rda pi wang dang/ /bde ba ma lus 'phel bar byed/ /tsan dan pur a ka ru/ /dge zhing tshe ring dpal gyi gnas/ /bkra shis rdzas brgyad rgyal mtshan gdugs/ /sgrub pa po rnams dge ba'i rtags/ /ngan pa de las
250a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlog pa'o/ /rta mgrin rgyal pos bsrung ba bya/ /de nas bsreg rdzas rims kyis dbul/ /mar dang yam shing til dang zho/ /'bras so nas dang sran ma dang/ /gro dang durba ku sha dang/ /oM a ka ne ye swAhA/ /oM b+ha te b+ha k+Sha ye swAhA/ oM sarba pA
250a4(rgyud 'grel): baM da ha na badzra ye swAhA/ /oM sarba baM pa te swAhA/ /oM badzra pu Sh+Ta ye swAhA/ /oM badzra bi dza ye swAhA/ /oM ma hA be ga ye swAhA/ /oM ma hA ba la ye swAhA/ /oM badzra g+hasma ri ye swAhA/ /oM badzra A yu She ye swAhA/ /oM a pra ti ha da
250a5(rgyud 'grel): badzra ye swAhA/ /me lha bstod cing gsol ba gdab/ /de nas ma lha'i thugs ka ru/ /dkyil 'khor bskyed cing ye shes bstem/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs dbul/ /khu ba la sogs zhal du mchod/ /yam shing ku sha
250a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od la 'bul/ /zho zan 'thor 'thud phyag du dbul/ /khyad par tur ba brgya rtsa ni/ /tshe 'phel ched du dbul byar bya/ /A yu puSh+TiM ku ru oM/ /'o ma sbrang rtsi ka ra dang/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang sbyar ba'i rdzas/ /slob dpon g.yon gyi
250a7(rgyud 'grel): mthe'u chung gis/ /slob ma'i g.yas kyi mthe'u chung bzung/ /lan gsum bskor bas lha la dbul/ /dngos grub rdzas kyi lha ma de/ /slob ma rnams la sbyin par bya/ /oM badzra A yu She a mri ha sid+d+hi hUM /zhi ba swAhA dang sbyar ??/ /
50b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa oM dbang la ho/ /drag po mA ra ya phaT sbyar/ /dkyil 'khor lha la mchod cing bstod/ /ye shes gshegs su gsol ba dang/ /dam tshig bdag la sdu bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor lha ni mchod ster ro/ /me yis 'dod pa'i don
50b2(rgyud 'grel): grub byed/ /yam shing gzi brjid ster bar byed/ /mar gyis 'byor ba 'phel ba yin/ /til gyi sdig pa 'dag pa dang/ /zho zan gyis ni rig pa 'phel/ /nas kyis brtson 'grus 'phel bar 'gyur/ /'bras kyis nus pa 'phel byed pa/ /
50b3(rgyud 'grel): so? bas 'bru 'phel las yin no/ /gro dang sran mas nad kun sel/ /dur pas tshe ring nang med do/ /ku shas bar chad srung bar byed/ /'o ma sbrang rtsis dngos grub sted/ /dpal 'phel ba ni bud shing ngo/ /sbyin bdag bkra shis thabs
50b4(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa mchod pa'i rdzas/ /thabs dang shes rab gzar bu ste/ /bdud rtsi mar gyis tshim byed pa/ /mchod pa gzhan gyis ca zhig bya/ /thog mar dben pa'i gnas nyid du/ /thab dang mchod rdzas
50b5(rgyud 'grel): bshams pa ni/ /zhi ba tsan dan dkar po'o/ /rgyas pa 'bras bu can gyi shing/ /dbang la tsan dan dmar po dang/ /drag po tshed ma can la bya/ /rgya phyed spangs dang ldan pa dang/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /slob dpon bdag
50b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'dug pa dang/ /g.yas g.yon pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /g.yas su bsreg rdzas rim gyis bzhag /g.yon du bum pa mchod rdzas bsham/ /de'i rnal 'byor bskyed pa dang/ /sngags kyi bzlas pas rab tu tshim/ /bum par
50b7(rgyud 'grel): rta mchog bskyed bar bya/ /sngags bzlas bar chad bsrung bar bya/ /de bas bram ze rgyun zhag me/ /bslang la sbar bar bya ba dang/ /dang po 'jig rten me lha mchod/ / gnyis pa dkyil 'khor rgyas pa tshim pa dang/ /gsum pa me lha
251a1(rgyud 'grel): gtang rag dbul/ /de nas ye shes gshegs dang dam tshig bsdu/ /me rnal thal nga chu bor dor// //sbyin bsreg las kyi 'bras 'byin 'de/ /mkha' 'gro grub pa'i rgyal mos 'jams/ /
251a2(rgyud 'grel): dge ba 'di yis 'gro ba kun/ /tshe dpag med pa rnyed 'gyur shog /rgya gar gyi mkhan po wa la tsaN+Da bla ma dang/ lo tsA bglan dang ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ ha ya gri ba sA b+ha na/
251a3(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs/ pad+ma gsung gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid 'ong gnas su nyer 'dug nas/ /bde ba'i stan la gnas pa dang/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas/ /zla kham smug nag dkyil 'khor du/ /po las
251a4(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad/ /maM las nyi ma'i gdan stengs su/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar rgya'i sa bon las/ /ye shes bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar/ /gdug pa can rnams ma lus bsreg /me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las bskyed pa'i rta
251a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar/ /steng zhal rta mchog ljang khu ni/ /drag po rta skad rab tu bzhad/ /khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud/ /phyag g.yas thod dbyug dkar po bsnams/ /bgegs dang 'byung po ma lus
251a6(rgyud 'grel): 'joms/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub me ltar 'bar/ /gnod byed ma lus sreg par byed/ /g.yas skum g.yon brkyang bdud bzhi mnan/ /spyan gsum sdang mig khro gnyer bsdus/ /ljags 'dril che ba me stag 'phro/ /skra ser dbu
251a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyan thod skam can/ /khrag 'dzag brgya phyed ngo shal byas/ /stag gi phags pa'i sham thabs can/ /klu chen brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan/ /'jigs byed gshin rje'i gzugs 'chang ba/ /gang gis mi tshugs rdo rje'i sku/ /thugs khar
251b1(rgyud 'grel): ti ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig sngags kyis bskor ba las/ /'od 'phros ye shes dgug gzhug bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas sngags kyis bzlas pa ni/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ 'bum du
251b2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas nas las rnams 'grub/ /de nas gtor ma dbul ba ni/ yaM dang rlung dang raM las me/ /a las thod pa yangs pa ru/ /sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga yis gang/ /ye shes bdud rtsi gnyis su med/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ i daM ba'i/ a mri ta kha
251b3(rgyud 'grel): kha/ khA hi khA hi rtsa sngags btags la lan gsum gyis/ /phul nas bstong dang gsol ba gdab/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las bskyed pa'i rta mchog sku/ /nyi ma'i 'od mtshungs nyon mongs bsreg /bdud bzhi ma lus 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /dpa' bo rta
251b4(rgyud 'grel): mgrin phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob ma'i bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir/ /gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ sku gsung thugs rnams bstim pa'o/ /lha dang sngags kyi rjes gnang bya/ /slob mas phyag 'tshal yon 'bul lo/ /
251b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo rta mgrin sgrub pa'i thabs/ /'od dang ga med kyis lung bstan pa'i// //mkha' 'gro grub pa'i rgyal mos brtsams/ /dge bas rta mchog sku thob shog/ //paN+Di ta zla ba bzang
251b6(rgyud 'grel): po dang glan chung dang ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus dag go/ //*/ /'phags pa 'gan rdo rje gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'du bzhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa slob dpon dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa bzhugs so// //
251b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Arya nI lA mpa ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ru ta pi ti ta nh+ra bri ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje
252a1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig nyon mongs dug las sgrol mdzad pa/ /don dam dbyer med khro chags skur snang pa/ /gdug pa'i dug rnams 'joms par mdzad pa yi/ /thugs rje can la rab tu gus btud de/ /dug
252a2(rgyud 'grel): zan chu dang 'o ma dbye ba yi/ /bla ma'i rim gyis rgyud 'dir phan phyir brtsam/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /mi 'gyur dbyer med rtags kyis mtshan/ /drag po rnams gsuM nyon mongs 'joms/ /nyon mongs shes bya las 'phags
252a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /brjod med rtog bral sku don bshad/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bdud rnam par 'joms pa bdud kyi sde dang/ lhan cig tu 'og min gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi pho brang na thabs cig
252a4(rgyud 'grel): tu bzhugs te/ zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyis lung ston pa bstan pa mdzad nas/ /gdul bya 'dul bar mdzad pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs
252a5(rgyud 'grel): par sangs rgyas par mdzad de/ 'od bye ba dpag tu med pa khyab par mdzad nas/ ngan song gsum sbyong bar mdzad de/ g.yo ba dang/ 'gul ba dang/ ldeg pa ston pa mdzad nas/ rdo rje gdan byang chub kyi snying po de nyid du
252a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs so/ /de nas bdud dga' rab dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus de nyid du lhags nas bar du bcad par bya ba'i phyir tshig 'di smras te/ sems can yongs su smin ma byas/ /pha rol phyin drug
252a7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs ma byas/ /spyod pa de gnyis rdzogs byas na/ /de med phyir na mi rigs so zhes smras so/ /de'i bsam pa phyin ci log bzlog par bya pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa sa la brdabs bas sa gzhi thams cad g.yos
252b1(rgyud 'grel): khrugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun de nyid du sa'i lha mo gser btso ma lta bu thon te/ thon ba tsam gyis bdung bred bzhin du 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo de la bsgo ba mdzad nas nge sa'i steng nas rdul
252b2(rgyud 'grel): phra mo blangs te/ sangs rgyas par rigs so zhes smras pas bdung 'khrugs nas nam mkha' la song ngo/ /de nas bdud de gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu'i bdud dang/ sa 'og na gnas pa'i klu dang/ /sa steng na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin
252b3(rgyud 'grel): lag na rdo rje la sogs pa bdud kyi 'khor thams cad bsdus par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud 'khor dang bcas pas mtshon rnam pa du ma dang/ /'brug dang thog dang/ lcags kyi ser ba drag po dbab pa dang/ gcan
252b4(rgyud 'grel): zan gdug pa bzhin khros pa rbad pa dang/ ri dang brag thogs pa med par 'phangs pa de thams cad zhi bar mdzad de/ gang gis kyang mthong bar ma gyur to/ /de nas nam mkha' i dkyil de nyid du dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs
252b5(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis byin gyis brlabs ba'i sku phyag na rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /zhugs pa'i de ma thag tu g.yo ba dang 'gul ba dang/ ldeg pa la sogs pa byung ste/ /bdud de rnams ci byung snyam
252b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bsam pas phyogs su lta ba ni bred cing sdug bsngal ba'i bsam bas so/ /de nas nam mkha' la bltas te/ mthong bar gyur nas snying 'gas pa'i tshul gyis sa la 'gyel bar gyur te/ sa dang po'i bsam pa dar ldan par gyur to/ /
252b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas sprul pa'i phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'thon te/ bcom ldan 'das de la bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje'i phyag gis/ bdud de
253a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la reg ma thag tu dran pa rnyed par gyur te/ snying rje'i bsam pa rgyud la skyes nas/ nam mkha' i khro bo chen po yang mthong bar gyur te/ phyag na rdo rje la myur ba'i tshul gyis skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshig brjed pa ni/ /
253a2(rgyud 'grel): gtso po bdag cag rnams la bskyab tu gsol/ 'jigs pa chen po 'di las bskyabs du gsol zhes smras pa dang/ phyag na rdo rjes de nyid la song zhes pa'i lan brjod nas skyabs su song ngo/ /de nas dus de'i dus su zhu pa phyag na rdo rje
253a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis thos /dus gcig na thos pa'o/ /'o na gang las thos she na/ bcom ldan 'das bdud rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das pa'o/ /gnas gang du zhe na/
253a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa khams kyi rtse mo/ gzugs kyi khams kyi ma tha ste/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas su'o/ /'khor gang dang ldan zhe na/ sa bla sa steng/ sa 'og gi gdug pa can rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /'o na rgyu
253a5(rgyud 'grel): cis de rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs she na/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la sogs pa gaM gA klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed par mdzad pa'i rjes la/
253a6(rgyud 'grel): ma 'ongs par lung ston par mdzad de/ /khyod bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba mi mjed du 'byung ngo zhes lung bstan nas/ gdug pa can rnam pa 'di gsum thul cig ces gnang ba byin pas na/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde
253a7(rgyud 'grel): dbon dang bcas pa pham par byed pa dang/ bdud kyi sde dpon dang bcas pa pham par byed pa/ klu'i sde dpon dang bcas pa pham par byed pa'i dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa'o/ /
253b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i phyir dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas 'das pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ da ltar byung bas byin gyis rlob pa/ ma 'ongs pas rlob par 'gyur pa 'di lag na rdo rjes zung cig ces bka' stsal pa'o/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul nas/ /phyag na rdo
253b2(rgyud 'grel): rjes gsol ba zhes bya ba na gus pa'i tshul gyis bstod pa'o/ /gnod sbyin stong phrag bye ba dpag tu med pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa dang 'tsham pa zhes bya ba ni mche ba ni nyon mongs pa can dang/ nyon mongs pa
253b3(rgyud 'grel): can ma yin pa gcod pa ste/ mtshams ni g.yo ba'o/ /yang na gdug pa can la'o/ /de'i don ni sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis rtsad nas gcod cing thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don la bskyod pa'o/ /mig me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni/ /mig gi
253b4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab po/ /dmar ba ni chags pa'o/ /yang na gdug pa can bsreg par byed pa'i spyan no/ /de'i don ni ma rig pa 'joms pa'o/ /shes rab me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba ni ye shes chen po rang 'bar ba'o/ /dbugs ni
253b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'o/ /me lce ni smin par byed pa ste/ /gzhan smin par byed pa'o/ /yang na 'jigs pa'i nga ro ni hUM ngo/ /sgra ni phyir sgrogs pa ste/ /dbugs phyir 'phros pa'o/ /de ni me lce bzhin 'bar zhing gdug pa can sreg par mdzad pa'o/ /
253b6(rgyud 'grel): de'i don ni dbugs na rgyan mi 'chad pa'i ye shes so/ /me ltar 'bar ba ni gsal ba'o/ /'jigs pa ni 'jigs pas thams cad do/ /nga ro can ni dbugs 'byin pa ste/ /'jigs pa las thar par byed pa'o/ /de bas na 'dod chags kyi
253b7(rgyud 'grel): dbugs 'byin pa la di skad bya'o/ /'o na 'bras bu ci zhe na/ smin ma khro gnyer bsdus ba zhes bya ba ste/ sku gsum gyi 'gro ba'i don byed pa dang ldan pa ste/ rnam par dag cing sku gsum gyi 'bras bu dang ldan pa la bstong pa'o/ /pad+ma dngus?
254a1(rgyud 'grel): lhas lag pa dang dpung pa brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni sbrul dkar pos so/ /nor rgyas dang dung skyong gis dbul brgyan zhes bya ba ni cod pan byas pa'o/ /sbrul rin po che 'bar ba cod pan thogs pa ni sbrul de bzhis?
254a2(rgyud 'grel): rna ba'i steng ni rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od dang bcas pa yod pa'o/ /de yang cod pan byas pa'i nor bu ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'bar ba'o/ /gzhan gyi nor bu ni thon ka dang/ pad+ma rA ga dang/ /in+d+ra ni la'o/ /klu dga' bo dang nye dga' 
254a3(rgyud 'grel): bo 'bad bas snyan cha byas pa zhes bya ba ni sbrul dmar po gnyis so/ /'bar ba ni spyi gtsug na pad+ma DA ga 'bar ba'o/ /rkang pas sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba mnan cing zag /klu'i rgyal bo 'dab bzangs ska rags su bcing shing/ /
254a4(rgyud 'grel): klu nag po se rol khar thegs pa zhes bya ba ni stobs kyi rgyu dang/ rigs ldan gnyis nag po khar bcug nas se ral khar drangs pa ste/ kha nas dug nag bo'i 'phro ba/ spyi bo na/ in+d+ra nI la'i nor bu ljang nag 'bar ba'o/ /
254a5(rgyud 'grel): des ni zhe sdang can 'dul bar byed pa'i mtshan ma'o/ /bzhin rgyas pa ya sos ma mchu mnan pa zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'am/ dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa ste/ rgyas pas ni bde ba chen po'i
254a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi rang bzhin rgyas pa'o/ /de'i 'od ni 'dod chags can 'dul bar byed pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'o/ /gshin rje'i cha byang ni sku che ba dang/ shin tu khros pa'o/ /de dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das de ni phyin ci
254a7(rgyud 'grel): log la zhugs pa la khros shing ljags 'khyug pa dang/ gsus pa 'khyil zhing sbrul za bar ston pa'o/ /de'i don ni gshin rje ni phyin cig log gi gang zag la bya la/ de la shes rab kyi snang ba ston par byed bas na gsung gi sgo
254b1(rgyud 'grel): nas snang ba bskyed pa'i glog go /gsum pa ni yangs pa yin la/ sbrul ni gti mug gi rang bzhin no/ /de 'joms par byed pa la/ zab zhes bya'o/ /des ni gti mug can 'dul ba'o/ /de ltar dug gsum 'dul bar byed pa'i mtshan ma
254b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'i stod pa'o/ /'o na yon tan gyi khyad par ci zhe na/ rgya mtsho'i thabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa rkang pa'i bus mor phyir pa zhes bya ba ni sku'i tshad ston pa ste/ shin tu che zhes bya ba'i don to/ shin tu che zhes bya ba'i don to/ /dbang po dang nyi ma'i steng
254b3(rgyud 'grel): na bzhugs ba zhes bya ba ni/ dbang po ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi brgya byin dang/ gzugs kyi khams kyi tshangs pa ste/ kha bub tu bsnol ba'i tshangs ba'i phrag pa'i steng na zla ba nya gang ba lta bu'o/ /brgya sbyin gyi phrag pa'i steng na nyi ma ste/
254b4(rgyud 'grel): de gnyis kyi steng na bzhugs pa ni brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa'o/ /lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ stobs phul du byung ba ste/ lag pa brdabs pas 'jig rten gyi khams brlag par byed pa'i stobs
254b5(rgyud 'grel): mnga' ba'o/ /a la la zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid la ngo mtshar ba'am/ gdul bye la ngo mtshar ba'i sgra sgrags pas skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba ni sa bla dang sa steng ngo/ /klu rnams brlag par byed ces pa ni sa 'og na gnas pa'o/ /de
254b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams gang mo drag po sgogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das sku de dang ldan pa'i gang rgyangs chen po dgod pa des brlag par byed pa'o/ /'o na 'phrin las mi mnga' 'am zhe na/ kun tu 'phrugs par byed cing gshin rje'i gzugs can/ khams
254b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum 'jigs par byed pa/ klu rnams 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ kun tu 'khrugs par byed pa'i sku de las 'od zer kun tu 'khrugs shing 'pho ba de las sprul pa dpag tu med pa phyag na rdo rje lta bu'i sprul pa 'phro bas na gshin rje'i gzugs
255a1(rgyud 'grel): can/ sa 'og sa steng sa bla gsum 'jig par byed pas khams gsum 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /de yang gdul bya rnam pa gsum 'dul bar byed pas na/ klu rnams 'dul bar byed pa'o/ /de'i phyir de la phyag
255a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes phyag btsal nas sbabs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir na phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'i don to/ /de la dgos pa ci zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gstong nas
255a3(rgyud 'grel): gsung du gsol zhes sgras pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas kyi bdud kyi khang pa de nyid du ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs pa ni/ de nas nam mkha' de nyid la gzhal yas khang dang zhes bya ba ni/ ting nge
255a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyi 'phrul pas bdud kyi khang pa de nyid gzhal yas khang du sprul te/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhis rnam par mdzes/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang/ bdud rnams 'dul bar twa ra na'o/ /d+harma d+hA tu nam mkha' i dkyil/ /
255a5(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod 'jigs pa'i dbus su'o/ /'khor lo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i drag po chen pos 'khor bsdus nas zhes bya ba ni/ gzhal yas khang de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje zhal gsum pa ste/ 'dod pa
255a6(rgyud 'grel): dang gzugs dbang du sdud pa'i zhal g.yas gong/? na dkar phro dmar ser dbus mthing nag gti mug can 'dul pa'i zhal lo/ /yang na khros pa dang/ bzhad pa dang/ gtsigs pas drag po gsum 'dul bar byed pa/ /yang na
255a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa bdud gtso bo'i cha lugs 'dzin pas bdud dbang du sdud pa'i rtags so/ /phyag drug ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang/ sdigs mdzub dang/ bar ma gnyis thal mo rdegs pa/ tha ma gnyis sbrul za pa/ zhabs gnyis nyi zla
255b1(rgyud 'grel): dang tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin mnan pa/ stag shi sham thabs dang/ rigs bzhi'i klus sku la brgyan pa'o/ /gong gi bstod pa'i yon tan skul rdzogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das dang ldan cig tu lha mo mdzes ldan ma mthing nag gri gug
255b2(rgyud 'grel): dang thod pa bsnams shing/ sku la 'khyud pa ltan cig tu gnas te/ bdud 'dul ba'i tshul can no/ /shar phyogs su dri za'i rigs kyi gnod sbyin 'dul bar byed de/ dri za pho mo'i steng du khro bo 'dud las rgyal bar byed pa zhes bya ba sku
255b3(rgyud 'grel): mdog dkar po/ phyag bzhi pa/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang kha TwAM ga 'dzin pa/ 'og ma gnyis sdigs mdzub bcangs shing yum la 'khyud pa/ lha mo 'od zer can sku mdog dkar mo spu gri dang thod pa bsnams shing g.yon phyogs nas 'khril
255b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /lho phyogs su gshin rje'i rigs kyi gnod sbyin 'dul bar byed pa/ gshin rje pho mo'i steng na khro bo gzi brjid 'bar ba zhes bya ba mdog ser po/ phyag bzhi pa rdo rje dang dbyug tho 'dzin pa/ 'og ma gnyis sdigs mdzub bcangs
255b5(rgyud 'grel): shing yum la 'khyud pa/ /lha mo mdangs can ma sku mdog ser me zangs gri dang thod pa bsnams shing g.yon phyogs su 'khril pa'o/ /nub phyogs su chu lha'i rigs kyi gnod sbyin 'dul bar byed pa chu lta pho mo'i steng du khro bo rngam pa'i sgra bsgrogs
255b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba mdog dmar po/ phyag bzhi pa rdo rje dang sprul zhags 'dzin pa/ 'og ma gnyis sdigs mdzub bcangs shing lum la 'khyud pa/ lha mo sgra dbyangs can sku mdog dmar mo sta re dang tho pa bsnams shing g.yon phyogs nas
255b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khril ba'o/ /byang phyogs su gnod sbyin gyi rigs kyi gnod sbyin 'dul bar byed pa'i bgegs kyi rgyal po pho mo bsnol ba'i sten gna khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zhes bya ba bsku mdog ljang khu phyag bzhi pa/ rdo rje dang be con bsnams pa/ /thog ma
256a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis sdigs mdzub bcangs shing yum la 'khyud pa/ lha mo rlung 'byin ma sku mdog ljang khu 'khor lo dang thod pa bsnams shing g.yon phyogs nas gtso bor 'khril ba'o/ /shar phyogs kyi sgor sgo ba gnyis
256a2(rgyud 'grel): te/ lcags kyu mdog dkar po zla ba'i steng na phyir brkyang zhing/ lcags kyus 'dren cing sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor sgo ba gnyis te/ zhags pa mdog ser po/ zla ba'i steng na phyir brkyang zhing/ zhags pa
256a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phen cing sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor sgo pa gnyis te/ lcags sgrog mdog dmar po zla ba'i steng na phyir brkyang zhing/ lcags sgrogs bsnams shing sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o/ /byang phyogs kyi sgor sgo
256a4(rgyud 'grel): ba gnyis te/ dril bu mdog ljang khu zla ba'i steng na phyir brkyang zhing rdo rje dang dril bu sdigs mdzub bsnol ba'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor rab tu sprul nas gdugs pa can rnams dbang du bsdus nas gtso bo 'khor lo chen
256a5(rgyud 'grel): po la gdug pa 'dul phyir bstod pa ni/ phyag na rdo rje drag po che/ /rdo rje khro bo drag chen 'joms/ /rdo rje mi thub 'jigs byed che/ /rdo rje gzi brjid sngags kyi gtso/ /rdo rje phrin las kun don mdzad/ /thabs 'dul 'khor lo che sku
256a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid che/ /mdzes ldan 'od zer can dang ni/ /mdangs can sgra dbyangs rlung 'byin te/ /skyed byed las kun sgrub pa la/ /'gugs shing sdud dang sdom zhing 'dzin/ /mdza' rtul las rnams grub pa
256a7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /zhes bya bas bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du byas nas bstod pa'o/ /da ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i de kho na nyid dbang du byas nas bstod pa ni/ thig le'i rang bzhin mi shigs la/ /kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las
256b1(rgyud 'grel): bgegs rigs stong phrag 'joms mdzad pa/ /'khor lo'i bdag po khyod la bstod/ /ces bya ba la bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ste/ lha'i bdag nyid do/ /'khor lo ni sprul pa dang/ chos dang/ longs spyod dang/ bde ba chen
256b2(rgyud 'grel): po'o/ /thig le ni byang chub kyi sems zhu ba'o/ /rang bzhin ni de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin mi rtog pa'o/ /mi shigs pa ni dbyer mi phyed pa'am/ tha mi dad pa ste/ de bas na thabs shes rab dbyer med ces bya ba'i don to/ /de rang bzhin
256b3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na/ kha sbyor zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo'o/ /nyi zla zhes bya ba ni la la nA dang ra sa nA'o/ /'phro 'du zhes bya ba ni bsreg pa dang/ gso ba dang/ srog dang gnang du 'phro zhing 'du ba'o/ /dgos pa ci zhe na/ bgegs
256b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs stong phrag 'joms mdzad pa/ /zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa la bya'o/ /yang na 'khor lo ni rnam pa bzhi'o/ /bdag po ni phyag mtshan rdo rje'i rang bzhin te/ srog dang rtsol ba'i rang bzhin no/ /de'i phyir mi shigs
256b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i don to/ /kha sbyor ni rdo rje'i rwa dang bum pa'i rang bzhin 'khor lo bzhi'o/ /de yang thabs shes rab kyi rang bzhin te/ /nyi zla rnam pa gnyis so/ /'phro 'du'i tshul gyis ni bsreg pa dang/ gso bdang bsdu ba'o/ /ji ltar
256b6(rgyud 'grel): zhe na/ bdags rigs stong phrag zhi bar mdzad pa'i phyir/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs shing zhi bas na bgegs la sogs pa zhi ba'o/ /de bas na phyi'i bgegs dang/ nang gi bgegs zhi bar mdzad nas phan pa skyed pa'i phyir
256b7(rgyud 'grel): dgos pa ni de'o/ /sa bon rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /thabs dang shes rab bsregs gso mdzad/ /bde chen rab tu gsos mdzad pa/ /sdug bsngal nyon mongs 'joms la 'dud ces gsungs so/ /des ni gong dang yang 'brel lo/ /de'i don ni
257a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di'o/ /bgegs ji ltar zhi bar mdzad ce na/ gtor mas zhi ba'i phyir/ /sa bon rab tu 'bar ba yis zhes bya'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid bstan nas/ gsang sngags ston pa'i sgo nas 'khor rnams
257a2(rgyud 'grel): la dam bsgrag pa ni/ tadya thA/ b+ho b+ho pAM nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye /i daM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM badzra pA ni h+ri da yin/ ya sa ma ti kra ma te/ ut+mA da naM b+ha bi shud+d+hi zhes bya ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ kye kye brang gis 'gro ba'i klu'i bdag po la
257a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa rnams 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig /gang las she na/ phyag na rdo rje gos sgnon po can gyi sku 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di las so/ /'das na ci zhe na/ 'das na brlag par 'gyur ro/ /'das par gyur na nyes ba ji lta bu
257a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung zhe na/ tadya thA/ bu d+ha bu d+ha/ bi bud+d+ha ma ti phra ba ta zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang/ da ltar dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' bcag pas/ ha ra ha ra nA ga nan/ phra ha ra phra ha ra nA ga nan/ tshin+d+ra tshinra nA ga
257a5(rgyud 'grel): h+rI da ya ni b+hinda b+hinda nA ga d+ha ma ni/ pI sI man+ta nA ga sha rI Ni/ bi spho Ta ya nA ga na ya na ni/ nA ga bi da ra NA ya hUM phaT/ nA ga kro d+ha sa ta nA ya phaT/ zhes bya ba ni sa 'og na gnas pa rnams la gnod pa mdor bstan te/ 'di 'dra
257a6(rgyud 'grel): ba 'byung ba'o/ /klu rnams gdan du byas nas za ba dang/ mnan nas gtso bo la ster ba dang/ /dbang po'i rten gcod pa dang/ lus bcing ba dang/ klu'i lus dang snying 'bral bar byed pa dang/ klu'i lus gshog pa dang/ klu rnams
257a7(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa dang/ klu khro bos brlag par byed do/ /de'i las la sbyar ba ni/ dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi byang du bcas te/ bsgrub bya'i gzugs spra tshil lam rten gyi sa la byas te/ de yang gru gsum pa bcug
257b1(rgyud 'grel): nas bdag nyid gong du bstan pa'i 'khor lo chen po bsgoms la/ sgrub pa'i sngags la las kyi sngags de rnams btags te/ yungs kar spru bar byas la las brtsam mo/ /de ni phu las bskyed cing/ dgug gzhug bcing dbyung
257b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing sa bon phu la las bya'o/ /de nas mnan no/ /sa steng gi gnod sbyin la smod pa dor ba ni/ tadya thA/ bi dA ra NA ya hUM phaT kro d+ha sA d+ha nA ya hUM phaT/ ni lAM ba sa nA ya phaT/ a pra hi ha ta ba la ya phaT/ pa la kra maya phaT/ kra
257b3(rgyud 'grel): twan+ta ya phaT/ kri TAn+ta rlu ba ya phaT/ ro Sha N+Tha ya phaT zhes bya ba ni/ khro mo 'joms ma dang/ sgrub pa'i khro mo dang/ sgrub pa'i gos sngon ma dang/ thogs med stobs ma dang/ pha rol gnon ma dang/ mthar byed mnon ma dang/ mthar
257b4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs gnon pa dang/ gtum chen gnon pa'o/ /yak+Sha a basmAr phaT zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyis 'gal ba ni 'di lta ste/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya zhes bya ba ni brdeg pa dang/
257b5(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa dang/ gsod pa dang/ gnon par byed pa'o/ /de'i las sbyor ni/ sdub pa dang 'brel ba'i las sbyor gyi dkyil 'khor byas te/ de yang gru gsum mdzub gang ba byas te/ sbra tshil la gzugs sor brgyad pa snying khar
257b6(rgyud 'grel): k+Sha gzhug par bya'o/ /'khor gyi sprul pas yungs kar la gsang ba'i las bya'/ /de nas mnan pa'i las bya'o/ /tadya thA/ bi dA ra Na ya hUM phaT/ kro d+ha sA d+ha ya phaT/ nI lAM ba sa na ya phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la ya phaT zhes
257b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni sa dang/ me dang/ chu dang rlung ngo/ /sa'i lha mos ni rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu tar byin gyis brlabs so/ /me'i lha mos ni 'od gsal ba dang/ 'bar ba dang/ 'od gzhan zil gyis gnon par mdzad do/ /chu'i
258a1(rgyud 'grel): lha mos ni 'bab chu dang/ bdud rtsi'i mtsho dang/ yid du 'ong ba'i char du byin gyis brlabs so/ /rlung gi lha mos ni sgra snyan pa dang/ yid du 'ong ba dang/ sim pa'i ngad dang/ spos kyi ngad du byas
258a2(rgyud 'grel): te bdud rtsi'i cho 'phrul legs par byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /pa ra kra mA ya phaT/ kri t+tand+hA ya hUM phaT/ kri tAM ta rU pA ya hUM phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ ces bya ba ni tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ gzugs dang/
258a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par shes pa'o/ /mtshan mar 'dzin pa la brten nas rnam par 'byed cing phrag dog zhi nas sdug bsngal can rnams bde bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /mi dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dge bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /
258a4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs mi sdug mdzes par byin gyis brlabs so/ /zhe sdang dang bcas pa byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni gtum pa 'am 'bar ba'o/ /gzugs ni brten pa'i rang bzhin no/ /'du
258a5(rgyud 'grel): shes ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can no/ /'du byed ni thogs pa med pa'am/ chags pa dang bral ba'o/ /tshor ba ni bde ba'am rgyud la srog 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin no/ /gzhan gyi rgyud sreg pa'i khro bo'i gzugs
258a6(rgyud 'grel): mngar 'joms par byed cing pha rol gnon par byed pas/ trA sa nA ya phaT/ kusma N+DodsA ta nA ya phaT/ pre ta pe shA tsa bi na shA ka rA ya phaT ces bya ba 'ching ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ gsod pa dang/ gnon pa la sogs
258a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnod par 'gyur ro/ /de'i las sbyor ni 'di lta ste/ bdud rnams dang/ grul bum rnams pa dang/ srog 'phrog par byed pa'i yi dags rnams dang/ sha za la sogs bdud dang bdud kyi rigs ma rungs pa rnams so/ /de rnams
258b1(rgyud 'grel): bka' las 'das na brlag par 'gyur te/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya zhes bya ba ste/ 'ching ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ gsod pa dang/ gnon pa la sogs pa'i gnod par 'gyur ro/ /de'i las sbyor ni
258b2(rgyud 'grel): bskrad pa dang/ gsod pa'o/ /bskrad pa ni gro ga'am shing shun la gdon gyi gzugs brnyan bris te/ rdo rjes mi la bsro zhing bya ba par bya'o/ /sngags che ge mo u tsa ta ya phaT ces brjod nas bskrad par bya'o/ /gsad pa ni sgrub pa'i
258b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dang 'brel ba'i gsad pa'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ gru gsum pa ni ma ba'i khu bas phyags te/ nang du rdo rje rtse mo gyes pa/ nag po bri bar bya'o/ /zur gsum la lcags kyu bri bar bya'o/ /mdza' ma la me ri dang gri
258b4(rgyud 'grel): gu gis bskor bar bya'o/ /de'i gzugs brnyan sor brgyad snying khar bre dang bcas pa rer bcug nas ni ma ba'i khu ba dang yungs kar dang phye ma gsum la sprul pa'i khro bor byas la gsad pa'i las bya'o/ /chas gos ni nag por
258b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /bdag nyid bsgom pa ni 'khor lo chen po ji lta ba bzhin du gsal bar bya'o/ /phyir gsad thabs sbyar ba ni/ sarba bid+h+nAM bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT ces bya bas las bya'o/ /bstan pa 'jig rten pa rnams la ni/ /gu hya 'di
258b6(rgyud 'grel): ni rab tu bstan/ /rabs chad thod pa'i snod nang du/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): brgyad bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan gzhug /gru gsum rgya gram sku gzugs te/ bsnyen pa rdzogs nas las brtsam mo/ /tadya thA/ b+ho b+ho pAM nA ga a b+hi pa ye yi daM ni
258b7(rgyud 'grel): lA ba ra d+ha ra sha rI rAM badzra pA Ni h+raM da yaM/ ya(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ti kra ma te/ utpA da naM b+ha bi shu d+hi/ sarba sha truM bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ /sarba sha truM d+harma ya bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ sarba sha trAM saM g+ha taM bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT ces/ bzlas shig /
259a1(rgyud 'grel): lan bdun bskor bas bzlog par bya'o/ /de thim pa dang shar phyogs su 'dug ste/ gtor ma btang nas bslab pa gso ste gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas rdo rje rtse dgu pas brdungs pa ni/ ha ra ha ra/ pra ha ra
259a2(rgyud 'grel): pra ha ra/ tshinda tshinda/ b+hinda b+hinda/ sarba sha truM bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT ces bya bas brdeg par bya'o/ /de yang dang du bsdu ba dang/ gsad pa dang/ 'dren pa dang/ bcing ba ste/ sgo ba'i gtso bo la brten pa'i sngags so/ /rdo rje rtse mo
259a3(rgyud 'grel): yas rtses bskor zhing brdung bar bya'o/ /ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA shA ya nA sha ya zhes bya ba ni/ rkang pa'i 'og nas mnan cing brdeg /dgug dang dbang du bsdu ba dang/ /gsad dang mnan pa'i las yin
259a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ /dkyil 'khor lha'i dbang du byas pa'i sgom pa'i las sbyar ro/ /khro mo bzhis ni mchod pa dbul/ /khro bo bzhi yis las brtsam mo/ /mchod rten bcas pa'i ri rtser spa/ /de yis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/
259a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gzhod dkar po'i snod nang du/ /nA ga brgyad kyi gzugs byas te/ /'phel ba'i dus kyi tshes grangs la/ /bdud rtsi 'o mas dus gsum mchod/ /bsnyen pa 'bum du thim pa dang/ /lto phye'i gzugs nang ming gzhug bya/ /
259a6(rgyud 'grel): ma ti pra ba ta ha ra ha ra nA ga nan/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nU gnan/ tshinda tshinda nA gi h+ra da yin /b+hinda b+hinda nA ga d+ha ma ni/ b+hi si ma ta nA ga sha rI ra Ni/ bi spho Ta ya nA ga ya na ni/ nA ga bi dA ra Na hUM
259a7(rgyud 'grel): phaT /na ga ko d+ha sA d+ha ni ya phaT/ klu brgyad drag po'i gsang sngags te/ /bsnyen pa gtso bo'i bsnyen pa la/ /phu btags 'di yi rtsa sngags te/ /'bum bzlas 'di yi lam brtsam mo/ /bsrung ba lus la gdags par bya/ /las
259b1(rgyud 'grel): theb lto 'phye'i thod bcug la/ /byad la gdol pa can la gtang/ /mchod rten rab gnas sgrub sngags so/ /thod pa byin brlabs bskor ba'i sngags/ /phur bu hUM dang phaT kyis so/ /lto 'phye la ni klu brgyad sngags/ /'khor lo gnyis
259b2(rgyud 'grel): su shes pas gzhug /gdon sngags gsal byed dbyangs yig bskor/ /bsnyen bsgrub las rnams rdzogs gyur na/ /rang 'og thams cad 'du bar sba'o/ /'dag pa la sogs byin brlabs nas/ /gru gsum rdo rje mtshan pa'o/
259b3(rgyud 'grel): su rtseg drag po'i mchod rten la/ /bum par gdung dang bcas pas mchod/ /zhag gsum bsnyen pa rdzogs byas nas/ /byin brlabs can gyis rab tu mnan/ /klu 'dul ba yi gzugs bya ste/ /gtso bo'i sngags kyis
259b4(rgyud 'grel): legs bsgrubs nas/ /gru gsum gzugs brnyan bcas pa ni/ /gdams ngag ldan pas legs sbyar sba/ /'khor lo grog shing shun pa/ /nim pa'i chu yis bri ba ni/ /thig bzhi le tsha dgug ba la/ /ma nor
259b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags rnams dgod pa ni/ /bi d+hA ra nA ya hUM phaT/ kro d+ha sA d+ha na ya phaT/ nI lAM ba sa nA ya phaT a pra ta ha ta ba lA ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya hUM phaT ces pa dgod/ par kra
259b6(rgyud 'grel): mA ya phaT/ kri tI ta ya phaT/ kri tI ta du pA ya phaT/ ro ShArka ya phaT/ ha ra ha ra/ phra ha ra pra ha ra/ tshinda tshinda/ b+hinda b+hinda/ hUM phaT/ zur la gzugs dang ming bcangs pas/ 'khrul 'khor gtso bo'i lte bar bskor/ /bi dA
259b7(rgyud 'grel): ra dyA ya hUM phaT/ par kra ma ya phaT/ ces bya bas sa i dkyil 'khor steng gnas pas/ zhi zhing spyang po'i las bskor ro/ /kro d+ha sA d+ha na ya phaT/ kri tAM tA ya phaT/ ces bya bas me'i gdan la rab bzhugs pas/ rgyas
260a1(rgyud 'grel): shing smin pa'i las bya'o/ /de gnyis rtsibs bzhi'i 'khor lo ste/ /dang po'i mtshams su laM bsams te/ /gnyis pa'i mtshams su raM bsam mo/ /ni laM pas nA ya phaT/ kri tAM ta rU pa ya phaT/ a pra
260a2(rgyud 'grel): ti ha ta ba la ya phaT/ ro Sha ha ta ba la ya phaT/ dang po'i 'khor lo rtsibs drug ste/ /chu yi gdan bzhugs 'khrul 'khor na/ /dbang du bya dang sdud pa'i phyir/ /chu yi 'khor lo bskor bar bya/ /tha ma'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
260a3(rgyud 'grel): de/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ /dbye zhing brlag pa'i las brtsams te/ rlung gi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o/ /dang po'i rtsibs mchan baM bsam nas/ tha ma'i rtsis yaM dgong bya/ /thun mtshams gcod cing
260a4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma btang/ /'khor rnams sna la gtso bos gsad/ /de thams cad kyi bsnyen pa ni bco lnga pa'am/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis bas bya'o/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i rim pa ni/ /bdag nyid 'khor lo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin du bsgoms te/ tadya thA/ b+ho
260a5(rgyud 'grel): b+ho bAM nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i daM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM/ kro d+ha sA d+ha badzra pa Ni h+ri da yaM/ ya sa ma ti kra ma te/ utwA d+ha naM/ b+ha bi shud+d+hi rA dz+nyA ba ya ti swAhA/ zhes bya ba ni gtso bo dang yum dang bcas pa'o/ /oM bi d+hA ra tA ya hUM
260a6(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ oM kra d+ha sA b+ha nA ya phaT/ oM nI lAM pa sa na ya phaT/ oM a pra ti ha ta ba la ya phaT/ zhes bya ba ni khro mo bzhi'o/ /oM pa ra kra mA ya phaT/ oM kri tAM ta ya phaT/ oM kri tAM ta rbu ba ya phaT/ oM ro Sha Na ha ta ba la ya phaT/ zhes
260a7(rgyud 'grel): bya bas ni gtso bo'i sngags bstan pa ste/ 'bum du rdzogs nas las brtsam mo/ /oM ha sa ha sa hUM/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra dza(rgyud 'grel): oM mA ra ya mA ra ya baM/ oM nA sha ya nA sha ya ho(rgyud 'grel): 'khor nyid la ni rab tu sbyar/ /oM ha ra ha ra ho/ /oM pra ha ra pra
260b1(rgyud 'grel): ha ra baM/ oM tshinda tshinda dza(rgyud 'grel): oM b+hinda b+hinda hUM/ gtso bo nyid la sbyar bar bya/ /las kyi sngags ni de nyid do/ /sngags kyi don bstan pa'o// //da ni brjod pa gso bar bya ste/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis brjed na chu khyor ba gang
260b2(rgyud 'grel): la sngags btab ste/ nam mkha' la gtor ro/ /sa 'og na gnas pas brjed na ba la po se'us sam/ /nya bri mas brab bo/ /bdud dang log 'dren gyis brjed na ni skud pa la brjod pas gso'o/ /gal te de las 'das na gang du bstan
260b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nyes pa dang 'gyur ro/ /ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du yang 'gas pas dran par bgyis zhes brjod do/ /de'i tshig ni zhes bya ba'i don ni gdon gsum po de'i'o/ /de las gnod sbyin gyis cho ga ni dang por bdag nyid bsod nams
260b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ye shes gnyis sngon du song ba'i bdud rtsi thigs pa'i sgrub thabs bzhin bsgoms te/ zhag gsum bstung bar 'dug ste/ maN+Dal gyi thog tu yungs kar la sngags bzlas te/ zhag gsum thim pa dang nad pa'i spyi por bzhag/
260b5(rgyud 'grel): lag tu yang byin pas sdang ba dang/ khro ba dang/ bzhin mi sdug pa ston cing phyir 'bros so/ /de la maN+Dal gru bzhi pa mda' gang ba byas te spos kyis byugs/ dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i thig gdab ste/ tshon ser por bri bar
260b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /bum pa kha dog sngon po mgul chings sngon po can brgyad dgod do/ /mda' dang gri dang me long bzhi grwa bzhir gzugs so/ /ras sam dang sngon pos gur du dbub bo/ /gtor ma dmar gtor ma brgyad kyang bkram mo/ /mdun du
260b7(rgyud 'grel): bum pa sngon po mgul tshings sngon po dang bcas pa bzhag go /nad pa byang du khrus byas ta ku sha'i steng du bzhag par bya'o/ /de nas bum pa byin gyis brlab pa ni braM las bskyed cing zla ba'i steng du hUM las khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sngon po/ phyag
261a1(rgyud 'grel): brang du bsnol pa/ mche ba cung zhig gtsigs pa bskyed la ye shes bstim pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid bdud rtsi thigs pa bzhin bsgoms la/ bum pa sgrub pa'i sngags rings? brgya rtsa
261a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad bzlas bas zhu bar bsam mo/ /de nas rang gtso bor bsams la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la gnod sbyin chen po brgyad k+Sha las bskyed/ dgug pa dang bgegs bskrad pa dang/ bstim pa dang bdud rtsi myar ba yan chad rdzogs pa dang
261a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags rings bzlas so/ /de nas gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa ni/ oM hUM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas sbyang ba dang spel ba dang/ sgar bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das mchod pa ni/ oM nI
261a4(rgyud 'grel): lAM ba ra d+ha ra kro d+ha sA d+ha badzra pa Ni hU hUM ma hA ya tSha ba la ni kha kha khU hi zhes bya bas phul te/ de'i rjes la bum pa'i chus nad pa'i lus bkru bar byas la gtor ma btang na zlog par 'gyur ro /de'i phyir gnod sbyin
261a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi gden gyis bris pa la chu la sngags btab ste gtor ma btang bar 'gyur ro zhes bya'o/ /klu bzlog par byed na bdud rtsi thigs bnas 'byung ba bzhin du zhag gsum bsnyung bar 'dug ste/ bdag nyid lhar bsgoms nas mdun
261a6(rgyud 'grel): dum ngal mchod pa dang bcas pa'i thog tu ku ku ra'i ma'i nya phyis sam/ dngul las byas pa'i gbur gcug nas/ gser sngags su sngags rings 'bum bzlas pa 'am/ /brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas nad pa la byin na/ /'phrin pa phang/ /
261a7(rgyud 'grel): snying mi dga' ba dang/ sna 'gags pa dang/ du snying 'dod pa dang/ lus bar ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /brtag pa dang/ rmi ltas ni mdze nad brtag pa dang/ rim pa drug par shes par byas nas/ gsor rung mi rung shes pa'i
261b1(rgyud 'grel): brtags 'byung ngo/ /de la ni bu mo lo brgyad nas bcu drug lon pas khrus byas te/ sa blangs la klu sgrub bzhin dkyil 'khor bzhengs la sgrub pa bya ba ni klu sgrub tu shes par bya'o/ /de nas nad pa la rma bya'i sgro lam smyag shad kyi
261b2(rgyud 'grel): lcug? mas bya ba par bya zhing/ bdag nyid bdud rtsi thigs ba bzhin bskyed la klu brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa mchod pa ni/ gtor ma paM las pad+ma'i snod du byin gyis brlabs la/ phyag las bdud rtsi'i rgyan dbab pa ni lag mthil
261b3(rgyud 'grel): du zla ba la a bsams la/ de la chu rgyan rnam pa lnga 'bab par bsam zhing sngags 'di bzlas so/ /oM a mri te hUM phaT na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo bi shwa mu khe b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sarba tad khaM un te spha ra Na hi mi ga ga na khaM swAhA/ zhes pa'i sa
261b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags lan gsum btab ste byin gyis brlabs la/ oM ni lAM bar d+ha ra kro d+ha sA d+ha badzra pA Ni i daM ba li kha kha/ oM dam ba liM nA ga sha ri ra Ni/ i daM ba lI nA ga sha ri ra Ni/ /i daM ba lAM nA ga d+ha ma ni/ i daM ba bIM nA ga bi d+ha ra Ni/ aM daM ba liM nA ga
261b5(rgyud 'grel): kro d+ha sA d+ha na ya kha kha khA hi khA hi phu phu phu phu phu phu phu phu swA hA/ zhes pas gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /mchod pa sngon du song nas gsol ba btab ste/ rtags brten pa ni rim pa drug par shes par bya'o/ /de'i phyir klu
261b6(rgyud 'grel): gzlog par byed na smyag shad lcug ma 'am/ /bal po se'u'i lcug mes bya ba bar bya'o/ /zhes pa'i don to/ /char dbab par 'dod na gzhag klu bsgrub tu shes par bya'o/ /byad par ni de na gnas pa'i klu de klu'i rgyal po dung skyid
261b7(rgyud 'grel): du byas te/ sngags 'ongs kyis gzir ro/ /ser ba srung na steng 'og 'khor lo bsams la sngas ring ba bzlas so/ /yi dags dang blang de phyed rnams la ni nang pa'i lag pa dang rkang pa tshon sna lha'i skud pas dkris te/ bdag nyid
262a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi thigs pa bzhin du bskyed la nad pa'i srin lag nas bzung ste/ sngags btab na 'dar ba dang rdul ba dang smra ba 'ong ngo/ /de la ni bdag nyid gong bzhin du bskyed la nyi zla'i bar du gdon bre las gci?
262a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab la rlung lha la bskyon la 'phang do/ /gzugs brnyan ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bcings la bya'o/ /de'i phyir brjod byed dang smyo byed dang ni skud pas bya'o/ /rims nad med par bya ba dang/ gzhogs pa byas?
262a3(rgyud 'grel): na ba dang/ yi ga mchus pa dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ klu dang yi dags la sogs pa'i nad 'di gsum bzlog pa ni skud pa sngon pos bya ste/ me tog sngon pa'i chus bsgyur la maN+Dal byas te/ bdag nyid bdud rtsi thigs pa bzhin bsgoms
262a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ g.yu'i nang du gzhag ste/ zhag gsum bsnyang ba dang bcas pas bsgub? po/ /bdud pa byin gyis brlab pa ni/ stong pa las zhal nas rdo rje'i phreng ba mdun pa la khro bo rdo rje phyir 'phyar ba zla ba'i steng du bsam zhing rag gnas sngags rigs
262a5(rgyud 'grel): bdun bdun gdang po/ /de bas na skud pa sngon po gdags so/ /nor 'dod na zhag gcig bsnyung bar 'dug ste zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ za gcig par byas la sbrul dkar po'i tshil bu dang/ skung
262a6(rgyud 'grel): khrod kyi ras la me btang ste bsgrub po/ /de nas lcags kyu lnga dag dang/ /sa bon gnyis dang rkyen gsum gyis/ /sgrub pa'i rdzas? kyis de rnams sbyar/ /spa ma bu gcig tu bzhag /maN+Dal sngon pa legs byas te/ bdag nyid
262a7(rgyud 'grel): lha yi skur gsal bas/ /'od zer 'phro 'du'i bzlas pa bya/ /'od dang sgra dag byung ba na/ /byugs pa lus la byug byas na/ /mchod pas mchod nas gsol ba gdab ces bya ba ni/ /songs kyis gdugs nas zhes bya mtho?/ de
262b1(rgyud 'grel): la dbang po rab la ni dngos su /tha ma la rmi lam du dge ba ste/ /yod pa dang mi dge ba ste gter med ces ston no/ /nor lha bsgrub pa ni dpen pa'i gnas su song ste/ stan bde ba la 'dug nas maN+Dal sngon po byas te/ de'i steng du bzhug pa
262b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ mchod rten sku gdung dang ldan pa'i drung du me tog sngon po la sogs pas mchod la/ zhes bya ba ni bdag ba la mchod rten sngon po gdung sha rI ram bum pa na yod pa'i 'khor lo dang gdugs dang bcas pa dbus su bzhag go /bum
262b3(rgyud 'grel): pa sngon po me tog sngon po'i la rgyan can bzhi yang mchod yon dang rdzas phyogs bzhir bzhag go /mchod pa rnam pa lnga ni me tog la sogs pa ci 'byor ba'i mchod pa'i rdzas rnams bzhag go /chos skyong gi gtor ma rgya chen po yang bshams
262b4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ sgrub pa na bdag nyid bsnyung bas 'dug ste/ tshogs gnyis sngon du song ba dag nyid bdud rtsi'i thigs pa bzhin byas te/ mchod rten las nor lha ser po zhag gcig phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas na nor bu rin po che'i
262b5(rgyud 'grel): chod rkyen/ phyag g.yon ne'u le'i rkyal pa rin po che 'brul ba/ zhabs rkyang skum bi na ya ga'i steng du bsam mo/ /de'i snying khar h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar po bsam la/ spyan drang zhing bstim pa la sogs pa rdzogs pa dang/ sngags sngags
262b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'phro 'du bya'o/ /de yang sngags stong bzlas nas gsol ba gtab na gser gyi dod tshe bdun stong sbyin bar byed do zhes bya ba ni sngags stong thim pa dang bum pa'i chus lan bdun mchod pa ni chu thigs pa re re la sngags lan bdun bdun
262b7(rgyud 'grel): gdab pa/ de nas gsol ba gdab ste bdag che ge mo 'di zhes bya ba la/ 'dus byas kyis dngos po 'di dang 'di stsol cig bya snas chos skyong rnams la gtor ma btang na nyin re la ci 'dod pa'i rdzas gser gyi dor tshe bdun steng
263a1(rgyud 'grel): bdun stong rib 'byung ngo/ /rgyas gdab pa dgrol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni rgyas btab pa ni ban bod kyi byang du bcug pa'o/ /de dgrol ba'i thabs ni sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i tshig? pa
263a2(rgyud 'grel): zag gis thag khung gru gsum bcas te/ drag pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas de'i thal ba dang sngags pa de nyid kyi dri chu sbyar te/ nag po phyogs kyi chos grangs kyi dus su khrus byas na drang srong mod mo yang zlogs so/ /bsrung bar 'dod na
263a3(rgyud 'grel): drag po'i sbyin sreg gi thal ba dang/ skye ba bdun pa'i thal chen la sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ skyabs 'gro sngon du song ba la btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod pas yungs
263a4(rgyud 'grel): ka ra gyis bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni thab khung gru bzhi byas te/ yungs kar ser po sgrub pa byas la shing sha ra bi ra'i me la zla ba rgyas pa'i dus su sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba dang/ yungs kar bsres pas mig na mar blugs
263a5(rgyud 'grel): nas sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na 'bye par 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni rnam pa brgyad de/ me'i 'jigs pa dang/ chu yis 'jigs pa dang/ sbrul drug can gyis 'jigs pa dang/ rgyal bo'i chad
263a6(rgyud 'grel): pas 'jigs pa dang/ shugs can gcan gzan gdug pas 'jigs pa dang/ rdo rje 'bar bas 'jigs pa dang/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i bar du gcod pas 'jigs pa dang/ srin po khros shing rngam bas 'jigs pa'o/ /
263a7(rgyud 'grel): pas 'jigs pa dang/ shugs can gcan gzan gdug pas 'jigs pa dang/ rdo rje 'bar bas 'jigs pa dang/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i bar du gcod pas 'jigs pa dang/ srin po khros shing rngam pas 'jigs pa'o/ /
263a8(rgyud 'grel): de la bsrung ba ni rtsi mar gyi snying po dang/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas ba'i thal ba dang/ yungs kar la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i bar du blugs te/ yongs su
263b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i lpags pa'i mdza' mar bstums te/ mgul du btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /nad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni rlung ba dang/ mkhris pa dang/ pad kan dang/ ldan pa dang/ 'dus pa dang/ yangs dang/
263b2(rgyud 'grel): rims dang/ 'brum bu dang/ shu ba dang/ me dpal dang/ g.yan pa la sogs pa thams cad do/ /de bsrung ba ni skud pa me tog sngon po'i chus skud pa sngon por bsgyur ba la/ rang lha'i skur gsal bas mi dmigs pa las rdo rje'i
263b3(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin rgya gram dang ldan pa'i bsrung ba'i mdud ba byas te mgul du btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa zhes bya ba ni gdon gyi za 'phro'o/ /thams cad ni pho mo'o/ /de bsrung ba mi tshon
263b4(rgyud 'grel): sna lnga'i skud ba la bdag nyid lha'i sku dang ldan pas 'od kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi gong bu'i nang du oM hUM swA aM hA zhes bya ba bsams te/ rab tu gnas pa byas la de la skyabs su 'gror bcug ste/ mgul du bzhaT?
263b5(rgyud 'grel): na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /chom rkun bzlog pa zhes bya ba ni lam du zhugs pa la sogs pa'i dus su'o/ /sas bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ dang po mal sa nas gom pa 'dor ba'i tshe skyes pa'i g.yas/ bud med kyi g.yon
263b6(rgyud 'grel): nas nron? lag ma btogs pa'i lag bas so rlabs te/ spags lan bdun btab nas byung ba'i tshe ba mas pa dang ldan pa'i bsam pas gdong du gtor na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dug la ni rtswa ku shas byab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni
263b7(rgyud 'grel): dug rang la byab po/ /dug gi na ba la ni rtsa sta sha bsregs pa dang/ yun ring po lon pa'i dmar po'i khru gang 'og nas 'jam po brud de lo brgyad pa'i chus sbyar nas sngags btab ste ba tang na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag
264a1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba la yid kyis zhes bya ba ni dus thams cad lhar mos pa'o/ /yang na chu la sngags btab ste bya'o/ /gzhan la ni gong gi skud pa so sos bya'o/ /las de thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni gcig gaM/ gsung
264a2(rgyud 'grel): ma ma/ /lan bcu bzhi 'am/ /brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na 'grub bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang/ 'khor rnams la de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje
264a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bdud dpung dang bcas pa rjes su yid rangs te/ yid rangs nas stan pa la 'khod do/ /drag po gsum ni sa bla/ sa steng/ sa 'og go /drag po ni ma rungs pa'o/ /de la 'dul ba dus la bab par gzigs nas bstan pa la
264a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor? pa'o/ /de'i 'grel ba bdag gis brtsams/ /lung dang man dag rtogs pas de don bsgrubs/ /'bras bu bdud rtsi lta bu bdag gis 'thung/ /seng nga la yi yul du de thob nas/ /phyi rabs rnams la phan phyir de don brtsams
264a5(rgyud 'grel): mos shing 'jug pas phyag na rdo rje'i zhal mthong shog /drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyis 'grel pa bdud rtsi myu gu zhes bya ba/ dngos grub brnyes pa'i dza ba ri pas sa ba ri pa la man ngag tu zhus pa /rdzogs so// //
264a6(rgyud 'grel): ranyti? ta de bu rgyan ti dang/ lo tsA ba chos kyis bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ nI lAM ba da d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha kA la baM ma hA tsa kra swa d+ha na nA ma/ /bdod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyis sde dpon chen po log na rdo rje gos? sngon
264a7(rgyud 'grel): po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs 'khor lo chen po zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba kha cig sa bon gnas par stsol rkyen gyis/ /gdug pas zin cing dug dang khrag ni 'dres gyur pa/ /thabs gzhan du
264b1(rgyud 'grel): ma gang gis 'byed par mi nus te/ 'dab bzangs rgyal pos chu dang 'o ma 'byed pa bzhin/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir dbang bskur ji srid mnyes byas pas/ /des ni 'byed cing gsal bar phong pa yin pa ste/ /brgyad khri zhabs nub 'jig
264b2(rgyud 'grel): dus me dpung nang 'dug pa/ /gdug pa'i dgrar gyur ljags 'gril dbugs tsha mi shigs 'dzin/ /byol song rgyan ldan mche ba gtsigs shing nga ro 'jigs/ /de la lus ngag yid gsum dang bas gus btung de/ /ji srid mnyis
264b3(rgyud 'grel): byas dam pa'i drin gyis man dag ri/ /rang nyams myong bas dug zin sgrub po rjes su dran/ /de la rgyal po dang rkun po dang stag la sogs pa yang ba thams cad dang bral ba'i ri 'am/ yid du 'ong ba'i gnas 'du 'ji med pa
264b4(rgyud 'grel): gnag yang rung bar rnal 'byor pas khrus byas te/ snan bde ba la 'dug nas rang gi snying khar nyi ma gnas pa'i ye ge hUM bsams te/ de'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i gi gA klung gi bye ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams dang
264b5(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskul te/ byon par bsams la mchod pa ltas yang dag par mchod de sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de'i rjes la byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba btang snyoms zhas bya ba
264b6(rgyud 'grel): tshangs po'i ge nis bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i blos phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad stong zhing bdag med par bsam mo/ /oM mahA shU n+ya hA dz+nya na badzra na badzraM swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko haM zhes bya bas mi g.yo bar
264b7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas gur dang ra ba la sogs pa sa bon la bsams te/ /sa bon gyi yi ge las byung ba yongs su gyur pa las gzhal las khang gru bzhi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud dang bcas pas so bzhi rda babs bzhi dang ldan pa dud
265a1(rgyud 'grel): khrod chen po'i dbus su'o/ /de'i lte ba la tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin gyis thog na nyi ma dang zla ba/ shar dri za lho gshin rje nub chu lha byang gnod sbyin de rnams kyi steng du nyi ma'o/ /yi ge hUM las byung ba'i nyi zla'i thog tu ni/ sprin sgra'i
265a2(rgyud 'grel): yi ge yongs su gyur pa las thong ba dang khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga ba bsam mo/ /de'i 'od kyis phyogs bcu gaM gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams spyan drangs te/ bstim nas de yongs su gyur pa las sangs rgyas rgyas gsos sngon po can zhal
265a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum phyag drug pa/ zhabs g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang ba/ sku mdog mthing nag spyan gsum me'i phung po 'dra ba/ smin ma dang dpral par khro gnyer du bsdus pa/ sngags 'gril zhing mche ba gtsigs pa/ nga ro'i sgra 'byung zhing
265a4(rgyud 'grel): dbugs me ltar 'bar ba/ dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa ral pa'i cod pan la sogs pa la sbrul mgo brgyad kyi gdengs ka yod pa/ de'i dkyil na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo mi bskyong pa sku mdog sngon po g.yon brkyang
265a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas bskum pas bzhugs pa gdug pa can zhes mnan nas sdigs mdzub can no/ /zhal g.yas dung dang 'dra ba/ g.yon pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba/ dbu sku dang mthun pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar rgyas pa'o/ /gsus pa yangs shing
265a6(rgyud 'grel): gsus pa 'khyil ba ste/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje 'phyar ba/ g.yon dang po sdigs 'chang ba/ bar pa gnyis yum la 'khyud pa/ tha ma gnyis sprul rked pa nas bzung zhing za ba'o/ /rang gi snying khar nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge
265a7(rgyud 'grel): hUM dang ldan pa'i gos sngon po can stag gi ris can mnabs pa'o/ /klu rigs bzhi rgyan du byas pa ni nor rgyas dang dung skyong gis dbu la brgyan pa/ dga' bo dang nyer dga' 'bar bas snyan cha byas pa/ pad+ma dang chu lhas lag pa brgyan pa/ stobs
265b1(rgyud 'grel): dri? sgyur? dang rigs ldan khar za ba can gyi ska rags byas pa ste/ de ltar bdud la sogs ba brlag pa can du bdag nyid bsgom mo/ /lha mo mdzes ldan sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas pa gri gug gtso bo la 'khyud par
265b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa khrig gis bkang ba gtso bo'i zhal du stob pa'o/ /de'i sbyor ba'i mtshams nas shar phyogs kyi pad+ma'i steng du thig le kha sbyor 'phros pa las thod pa dang/ rdo rje ra gyur te rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las/ khro bo bdud las rgyal
265b3(rgyud 'grel): byes? sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje 'phyar pa/ g.yon gyi dang po rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa/ 'og ma gnyis sdigs mdzub brang du bsnol bas yul ma 'khyud pa/ gso sngon po stag gi ris can mnabs pa'o/ /
265b4(rgyud 'grel): thod pa de yongs su gyur pa las lha mo 'od zer can sku mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas pa sdu gris gtso bo la 'khyud pa/ g.yon pa ban d+ha khrag gis bkang ba gtso bo'i zhal du stob ba'o/ /lho phyogs kyi pad+ma'i steng
265b5(rgyud 'grel): du thig le kha sbyor 'phros pas thod pa dang rdo rje rwa gyur te/ rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las khro bo gzi brjod 'bar ba/ sku mdog ser po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas dang po rdo rje 'phyar ba/ g.yon gong ma dbyug tho 'dzin pa/ 'og ma gnyis
265b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags mdzub bsnol ma yum la 'khyud pa/ gos sngon po stag gi ris can mnangs pa'o/ /thod pa de yongs su gyur pa las/ lha mo mdangs can ma sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas na zangs gri/ g.yon na thod pa khrag
265b7(rgyud 'grel): gis bkang nas zhal du stob cing gtso bo la 'khyud pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi pad+ma'i steng du thig le kha sbyor 'phros pa las thod pa dang rdo rjer gyur te/ rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las khro bo rngam pa sgra sgogs sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag bzhin
266a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ g.yas dang po rdo rje 'phyar ba/ g.yon dang po sbrul zhags 'dzin pa/ 'og ma gnyis sdigs mdzub bsnol ma yum la 'khyud pa'o/ /thod pa de yongs su gyur pa lha mo sgra gcan ma sku mdog dmar mo zhal gcig
266a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas pa na ste ka g.yon pa na thod pa gtso bo la 'khyud pa'o/ /byang phyogs su pad+ma'i steng du thig le kha sbyor 'phros pa las rdo rje dang thod par gyur te/ rdo rje de yongs su gyur pa las khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa sku mdog ldang?
266a3(rgyud 'grel): khu zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa phyag g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje 'phyar ba/ g.yon gong ma be chon 'dzin pa/ 'og ma gnyis sdigs mdzub bsnol bas yum la 'khyud pa/ gos sngon po stag gi ris can mnabs pa'o/ /thod pa de yongs su
266a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las lha mo rlung 'byin ma sku mdog ljang khu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa phyag g.yas na 'khor lo/ g.yon na thod pa gtso bo la 'khyud pa'o/ /shar gyi sgor thig le 'phros pa las/ lcags kyu de yongs su gyur ba las lha mo
266a5(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu ma sku mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa phyag na lcags kyu thogs pa'o/ /lho'i sgor thig le 'phros pa las zhags par gyur te/ de yongs su gyur pa las lha mo zhags pa ma sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag
266a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa zhags pa bsnams pa'o/ /nub kyi sgor thig le 'phros pa las lcags sgrog tu gyur te/ de yongs su gyur pa las lha mo lcags sgrog ma sku mdog dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis phyag na lcags sgrog bsnams pa'o/ /byang
266a7(rgyud 'grel): gi sgor thig le 'phros pa las dril bur gyur te/ de yongs su gyur pa las lha mo dril bu ma sku mdog ljang khu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ phyag na dril bu bsnams pa zla ba'i steng na thabs shes rab kyi tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o/ /de
266b1(rgyud 'grel): nas rang gi snying kha'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge hUM las 'od zer 'phros pas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ci 'dra ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing/ snying
266b2(rgyud 'grel): kha nas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis yang dag par mchod pa la sogs pa byas te/ de nas dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bzhis dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba la sogs bas tha mi dad par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la sangs rgyas ge gA klung
266b3(rgyud 'grel): gi sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ oM dang A(rgyud 'grel): dang hUM ste dkar po dang dmar po dang mthing ga'i rim pas spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang/ snying khar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par bsgom mo/ /de nas snying kha na gnas
266b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i hUM las 'od zer 'phros pas gi gA klung gi sangs rgyas rnams sbyan drangs te/ de dag kun gyi phyag na bum pa rdo rje rtse lnga bas mtshan pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ro/ /de nas gtso bo nas byang
266b5(rgyud 'grel): sgo la thug par bsgom mo/ /skyon thun mtshams bzhir rnal 'byor bar bsnyen ba dbul bar bya'o/ /de ltar lha ni gsal ba dang/ /sa bon rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor bas ni/ /bde
266b6(rgyud 'grel): chen rab tu gso mdzad nas/ /sdug bsngal nyon mongs 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /thig le'i rang bzhin mi shigs kyis/ /bgegs rigs stong phrag 'joms par mdzad ces bya bas bsgom pa bstan nas/ /gtor ma btang la yang dag
266b7(rgyud 'grel): bar mched nas skyo bar gyur na sangs rgyas ga gA klung gis gsungs pa 'di bzlas pa bya ba ste/ ta dya thAd b+ho b+ho bAM nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye i daM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sha rI raM badzra pA Ni h+ri da yaM ya sa ma ti kra ma ti/ u t+mA d+hA nAM pa bi shu ti? hUM
267a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM /oM badzra kra ma ya phaT/ kri tAM ta ya phaT/ kri tAM ta rU pa ya phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ oM bi dA ra NA ya phaT/ kro d+ha sA d+ha na ya phaT/ ni lAM ba sa nA ya phaT/ a pra ti ha ha bA la phaT ha ra ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ pra ha
267a2(rgyud 'grel): ra pra ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ tshinda tshinda/ ha sa ha sa/ b+hin da b+hin da/ d+hA ra yad+hA ra ya/ zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas sbyong lam gyi gnas par bya'o/ /rig pa rang byung sku nyid rang gsal rtogs/ /blangs dang
267a3(rgyud 'grel): 'grogs dam pa'i drin gyis thob/ /rjes su gzung phyir rang nyams myong bas brtsams/ /zla ba ltar gsal dag cing dri med des/ /'gro kun rtog pa'i dri ma rab zhi nas/ /'bras bu phyag na rdo rje dang 'drar shog /slob dpon chen po
267a4(rgyud 'grel): dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs 'khor lo chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de pa pU rtsa ma ti dang/ la tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ nI lAM b+ha ra
267a5(rgyud 'grel): d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha kalpaM nA ma d+hA ra Ni sA d+ha a mri ta bindu/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi sgrub thabs bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag
267a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /sems can rnams ni sa bon gnas dang rtsol rkyen gyis/ /gdug pas zin gyur dug dang khrag ni 'dres gyur pa/ /thabs gzhan du mas dbye zhing bsal bar mi nus te/ /'dab bzang rgyal pos chu dang 'o ma 'byed pa
267a7(rgyud 'grel): ltar/ /gdul bya 'dul phyir dbang bskur ji srid mnyes gyur pas/ /des ni 'byed cing gsal bar phong pa yin pa ste/ /rgya mtshor zhabs nub 'jig dus me dpung nang 'dug pa/ /gdug pa'i dgrar gyur ljags 'dril dbugs
267b1(rgyud 'grel): tsha mi shigs 'dzin/ /de la btud de ji srid mnyes byas man ngag bris/ /rang nyams myong bas dug zin sgrub pa rjes dran gzung/ /rgyal po dang/ rkun po dang/ stag la sogs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ri bo 'am/ yid du 'ong ba
267b2(rgyud 'grel): 'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas su byams pa dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos khrus byas te/ stan bde ba la 'dug nas/ /rang gi snying khar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge hUM bsams te/ de'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu na
267b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i gi gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams dang/ bla ma dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bskul nas mchod pa rnams lngas yang dag par mchod de/ sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de'i rjes
267b4(rgyud 'grel): la byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms zhes bya ba tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la 'dris par bya'o/ /de nas gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i blos phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad stong zhing bdag med par bsam
