267b5(rgyud 'grel): mo/ /oM ma hA shU n+ya tA ShtE? na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM zhes bya bas mi g.yo bar bya'o/ /de nas paM las pad+ma'i lte ba la/ a las zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbang po dang gnyis kyi steng du bsams te/ yi ge hUM ring po'i sgra
267b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa 'od 'bros pa las khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams te/ de'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu gaM gA klung gi bye ma snyed 'bum phrag gi sangs rgyas rnams spyan drangs la/ de'i 'od zer de nyid du thim ste/ de yongs su gyur pa las/
267b7(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas gos sngon po can/ /zhel gsum phyag drug dang ldan pa/ zhabs g.yon brkyang ba/ g.yas bskum pa/ sku mdog mthing nag tu 'dug pa/ spyan gsum me'i phung po 'dra ga dbu skra/ bam pa gyen du brjes pa/ /ral pa'i cod ban?
268a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ sbrul mgo brgyad kyi cod pan yod pa/ smin ma dang dbral ba'i mtshams su khro gnyer bsdus pa/ ljags 'dril zhing mche ba gtsigs pa/ kha blangs tsha zhing nga ro'i sgra 'byung ba/ de'i dkyil na sangs
268a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon po g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ gdug pa zhe la mnan nas sdigs mdzub mdzad pa can no/ /lto ba yangs shing gsus pa'i smad 'khyil ba/ zhal g.yas dung dang 'dra ba/ g.yon pad+ma
268a3(rgyud 'grel): rA ga 'dra ba/ dbus sku dang mthun pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar rgyas pa'o/ /phyag dang po khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon sdigs mdzub mdzad pa/ bad ma gnyis thal mo brdebs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ tha ma gnyis sgrul
268a4(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa'i rkang pa nas bzung zhing mgo nas za ba'o/ /rang gi snying khar nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge hUM dang ldan pa'o/ /gos sngon po'i stod g.yogs dang/ sham thabs stag gi ris can mnabs pa'o/ /lta ba phyin ci log
268a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi gzhung 'joms pa'i rtags su nyi ma dang zla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa/ tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyi steng na rigs bzhi'i klu yis rgyan du byas pa ni dga' po dang nye dga' 'bar bas snyan cha byas pa/ lag
268a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang dpung pa pad+ma dang chu lhas brgyan pa/ stobs kyi rgya dang rigs ldan khar za ba'i ska rags can nor rgyas dang dung skyong gis dbu la brgyan cing rgyan du byas pa ni ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang nag po ste/ rin
268a7(rgyud 'grel): po che spyi bo'i steng na yod pa'o/ /de ltar bdud la sogs pa brlag par byed pa can du bdag nyid rnam par bsam mo/ /de nas rang gi snying kha'i hUM las 'od 'phros phas/ rang 'dra'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ snying kha
268b1(rgyud 'grel): las 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): bzhis dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang bcing pa dang/ tha mi dad pa'i phyir dbang du bya'o/ /de'i rjes la sangs rgyas gaM gA? glu?
268b2(rgyud 'grel): gis sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ oM dang/ A(rgyud 'grel): dang/ hUM mthing kha dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po'i rim pas spyi bo dang snying kha dang mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor laM rnam par bsam mo/ /de nas
268b3(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas lag na brkud rtsi'i bum pa khro bo'i rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o/ /skyo bar gyur na sangs rgyas gi kA klung gis rjes su gnang
268b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzungs kyi phreng ba kho na bzlas par bya ste/ nyung du 'dod pa rnams kyis ni/ oM nI lAM b+ha ra d+ha ra badzrA pA Ni h+ri da ya ma hA kro d+ha sA d+ha hUM phaT/ zhes snying po'i sngags yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o/ /dag gi brjod pas kyang skyo
268b5(rgyud 'grel): bar phyung na oM a kA ro mu khaM/ zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtor ma nye bar phul te/ rdo rje sems dpa' i snying pos lhag pa dang ma ched pa dag par bya'o/ /de nas ldang bar 'dod na ye shes sems dpa' phyung ste/ yang dag par
268b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod la oM tri to waM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas de'i nga rgyal gyis ldang bar bya'o/ /bla ma mnyes byas dang ldan snying rjer bcas/ /brtson 'grus drag ldan dran ldan brtan blo can/ /skad cig tsam
268b7(rgyud 'grel): yang gnyid ni log pa min/ /de bzhin gnyid las rgyal byed shes rab kyis/ /tak+Sha ka yis zin par gyur pa yang/ /zla ba drug gis nges par bzung 'gyur zlogs/ /bla ma la gus brtse bas bdud rtsi thigs pa lhung/ /bdag gis blangs?
269a1(rgyud 'grel): te mid pas lus rgyas te/ /lus rgyas stobs kyis sgrub po rjes gzung sgrub thabs dran/ /bsod nams gang yod sgrub po'i rtog pa'i nad med shog /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon
269a2(rgyud 'grel): po can gyi gzungs kyi sgrub thabs bdud rtsi thigs pa zhes bya ba/ nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon dzA ba ri bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bal po'i mkhan po de ba pU rna ma te dang/ bod
269a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi sgrub thabs bsdus pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni sA d+ha na mo pi ka tsi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad dung
269a4(rgyud 'grel): lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngar nyid don dam thugs chud 'gro ba'i don du rdo rje'i sku/ /gnas mdzad mthu stobs khyad 'phags gdug
269a5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyi dgrar gyur ba/ /rgya mtshor zhabs bzhag 'jig dus me dpung dang ldan snying rjes khros/ /rtog pa'i sdug bsngal thar mdzad khyod la dngos po kun gyis 'dud/ /rtsod pa'i dus gang phrad gyur brtson 'grus chung
269a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing blo zhan pas/ /shin tu bsdus la dga' zhing ma bcal 'bras bu 'dod la gzung phyir dran/ /de la snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas khrus byas te/ yid du 'od ba'i bsam gtan gyi khang par stan bde ba la 'dug
269a7(rgyud 'grel): nas rang gi snying kha'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu gaM gA klung gi sangs rgyas rnams dang de'i sras rnams mdun du spyan drangs te/ mchod pa'i yo byad lngas yang dag par mchod pa/ /sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /
269b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes su oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko haM zhes brjod pa dang bcas pas stong pa nyid du bsgom mo/ /de nas paM las pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor hUM dang bcas pa bsams te/ de yang ring po'i sgra dang ldan zhing
269b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'phro ba can no/ /de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga dang ldan pa'i sa bon las 'phro 'phros te/ phyogs bcu gaM gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas spyan drangs te/ de nyid la thim nas/ de yong su gyur pa las sangs
269b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gso sngon po can/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yon brkyang pa g.yas bskum pa/ sku mdog mthing nag sbyan me'i phung po 'dra ba/ ya sos ma mchu mnan pa/ 'brug sgra can gyi dbugs tsha ba/ skra gyen du brjes ba/ phyag
269b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa/ g.yon sdigs mdzub mdzad pa/ gos sngon po can la ltos 'gro brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ bdud la sogs pa tshar gcod pa'i tshul can du bdag nyid bsam mo/ /rang gi snying kha'i sa bon gyis rang
269b5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ snying po bzhis tha mi dad par bya/ de nas byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur ro/ /ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du bsgom zhing /skyo ba'i tshe sangs rgyas gaM gA klung gi rjes su gnang ba'i 'phre
269b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sngags kho na bzlas par bya'o/ /bsdus pa dag la dga' bas ni/ oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni h+ri da ya ma hA kro d+ha sA d+ha hUM phaT/ snying po'i sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha sA dzhA hUM/ nye
269b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i snying po dang/ yang snying ste bcu bdun pa'o/ /gtong bas 'dod pa'i tshe gtor ma phul la/ ye shes sems dpa' phyung ste gshegs su gsol lo/ /spyod lam thams cad du yang rang lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas gnas par bya'o/ /
270a1(rgyud 'grel): kha zas gos sogs zas skom dang/ /dbul ba kun zad nad med dang/ /'jigs chen brgyad dang sdug bsngal sogs/ /'jigs pa med cing gang bsam pa'i/ /'dod pa'i don rnams thams cad ni/ /blab? thabs
270a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di las 'byung 'gyur ro/ /'go rnams 'dod pa tha dad pas/ /de la dgongs nas bde gshegs kyis/ /byang chub lam ni sna tshogs gsungs/ /rang 'dod lam ni thob bya'i phyir/ /dad pas bla ma bzang ba tsal te/ ji yid? blams?
270a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyes byas nas/ /'dod don man ngag blang bar bya/ /mnyes pas yin gyi gzhan gyi min/ /bdag gis sgrub thabs mdor bsdus smras/ /smras pas zla ba ltar gsal ba'o/ /bdag cing nam mkhar mi shong ba'i/ /dge pa gang gi
270a4(rgyud 'grel): thob pa gang/ /'dir bzhugs 'dod lha'i zhal mthong shog/ dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba /nam gru'i rigs las byung pa/ dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po dzA ba ri bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
270a5(rgyud 'grel): bal po'i paN+Di ta de wa pu r+Na ma ti dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ nA ga ku la tsa ri sA d+ha nAM nA ma/ bod skad du/ klu rigs bzhi'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal
270a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje byams pas 'gro ba rnams lam bzhin brtse bar mdzad/ /gdug pa'i 'dul phyir khro rgyal 'bar ba'i skur ston pa/ /byol song rgyan ldan bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar/ /bzod dka' gdug
270a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nad las mthar mdzad de la dngos po kun gyis 'dud/ /byams pas zhe sdang zhi ba dang/ /drag po'i zhi rings gsad pa'i phyir/ /de yi sgrub thabs gzung ba'i phyir/ /bla ma'i drin gyis thob nas brtsam/ /gang zhig bsnyen brdzogs?
270b1(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /gang zhig dbang du bsdu 'dod na/ /klu yi sgrub dang 'khrul 'khor dang/ /sbyor ba brtsam par bya ba yin/ /dang po gnas chen yid 'ong du/ /bsnyen pa sngon du rdzogs byas te/ /klu brgyad gzugs ni 'khar gzhong bzhag /rang nyid lha yi
270b2(rgyud 'grel): skur bsgoms nas/ /dus gsum klu la mchod pa bya/ /rtags dang rmi lam brtags nas ni/ /de las bzlog pa'i las brtsams te/ /mtshams bcad sa yi cho ga bya/ /stegs bu byi dor legs byas te/ /sta gon cho ga rgyas
270b3(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /de nas rdzas rnams bsag par bya/ /'bras kyi rgyu las byas pa yi/ /klu chen brgyad ni sbrul mgo can/ /dngul gzhong nang du gsag par bya/ /kha dog tshon gyis sgyur la bzhag /so so lto phye'i mgo bo ni/ /dgu dang bdun dang
270b4(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang gsum/ /skyes pa bud med mdzes pa dang/ /sbrul dang sbal ba lcong mo dang/ /nya dang ru sbal rkang mangs dang/ /sdig pa phags pa mdzod rtol dril/ /gzhan yang gang byung gzugs bya'o/ /de nas thig dang tshon dgye zhing/ /dbus
270b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi lte ba zlum po la/ /gtso bo dbus su bris nas ni/ /'dab ma brgyad la klu brgyad bri/ /phyi rol gyi ni 'dab ma la/ /'khor du gtogs pa so sor bri/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su/ /skyes pa bud med la sogs bri/ /mtshams
270b6(rgyud 'grel): su stong mo nya sogs dgod/ /steng du sdig pa phag sogs bri'o/ /steng du 'khar gzhong klu chen brgyad/ /bar 'khyams lha yi snam bu la/ /klu dang gnyan dang sa bdag gsum/ /rim gyis mnyam par dgod par bya/ /bla rgyan 'og rgyan
270b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor tshad dbram/ /'bru lnga sman lnga'i gtor ma dang/ /na ge sar kaN+Ta ka ri dang/ /nag pus pa rgya mtsho lbu ba dang/ /chu srin sdir mo dbang po lag pa dang/ /bal po'i se'u smyag shad lcug ma dang/ /ni lotpa la 'dam bu'i rtsa ba dal/
271a1(rgyud 'grel): dar tshon sna lnga bas skud dmar po dang/ /li khri dmar po dang ni ga bur shel/ /pu ci shel dang 'dam bu tshal/ /dkar gsum mngar gsum 'bras chan khur ba'o/ /de nas 'dod ba'i 'khor lo gru bzhi sgo bzhi/ hUM?
271a2(rgyud 'grel): las ni/ /'dab bzhi 'dab brgyad bskyed par bya/ /phu las klu brgyad klu chen te/ /'khor yang de bzhin bskyed byas nas/ /gtso bo sgrub thabs las gsungs bzhin/ /spyan drangs stim pa la sogs kyi/ /klu la sogs pa de bzhin
271a3(rgyud 'grel): dgug /oM rgya mtsho chen po'i klong dkyil nas/ /gtsug na rin chen klu yi rje/ /nor rgyas bu dang dung skyod dang/ /dga' bo dang ni 'jog po dang/ /pad+ma dang ni chu lha dang/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang ma dros dang/ /klu chen brgyad po 'khor dang bcas/ /
271a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'dir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol/ /rgyal rigs dang ni bram ze'i rigs/ /rje rigs dang ni gdol ba'i rigs/ /gnas 'dir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol/ /klu zan gnyan dang sa bdag sogs/ /sprul pa 'bum sde
271a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas/ /gnas 'dir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol/ /me tog la sogs mchod pa lnga/ /'dod pa'i lha la dbul bar bya/ /gtor ma rnams kyang so sor dbul/ /ga na ga ge sar sman gyi mchog /sngags dang phyag
271a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas byin brlabs nas/ /ting 'dzin 'bro 'du'i brdas bkrol te/ /klu chen brgyad la mchod pa 'bul/ /sngon gyi dam tshig slar dul la/ /zhe rings dug las smar dul cig /kan ka ri na ga pu shpa dang/ /rgya mtsho lbu ba chu srin sder
271a7(rgyud 'grel): mo dang/ /dbang po lag pa nag gsar dang/ /bal po se'u smyag shad lcug ma dang/ /nI lotpa la 'dam bu'i nags 'tshal dang/ /dang tshon sna lnga'i ras skud dmar po dang/ /li khri dmar po ga bur shel dang ni/ /pu shel rtse dang
271b1(rgyud 'grel): dung g.yas 'khyil ba dang/ /shu dag dkar po snying ni sho sha dang/ /mkhal ma zho sha stag pa'i shun ba dang/ /seng ldeng dkar dmar klu sman sna tshogs kyis/ /klu rnams kun la rab tu mchod par bya/ /mchod pa phul nas bzlas pa?
271b2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /oM ha ra ha ra nA ga phu/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA ga phu/ /tshinda tshinda nA ga h+ri nga ya ni phu/ /b+hinda b+hinda nA ga d+ha ma ni phu/ bi si ma ta nA ga sha rI ri Na phu/ pi spho Ta ya nA ga na ya ni phu/ nA ga bi dA ra NaM ya phu/ nA ga kro d+ha na ya phu swAhA/ oM a nanda
271b3(rgyud 'grel): ya hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM bA su ki hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM tak+Sha ka hUM nI swAhA/ oM pad+ma hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM mahA pad+ma nAM hUM swAhA/ oM shaM kha pA la hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM ka rko Ta hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM a Na wa ta hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM nA ga ku la tsa ri shAM
271b4(rgyud 'grel): ti swAhA/ oM na ga pra ti spo Ta ya swAhA/ oM nA ga pra pany+tsa bu nye ba swAhA/ oM ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya hUM swAhA/ kun la brgya brgya bzlas par bya/ /gtsug na yid bzhin nor bu can/ /mig gdengs pa lto 'phye'i rigs/ /klu chen brgyad
271b5(rgyud 'grel): pho mthong ba'i dug /bzod dka' i dug rnams phyir phyung shig /lus chen mgo bo tha dad pa'i/ /zhe sdang drag po rgyas pa yi/ /rigs bzhi klu rgyal yid kyi dug /bzod dka' i dug rnams phyir phyung shig /gsher la gnas pa mdzangs
271b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rigs/ /gtsang ma bal la gnod mi byed/ /klu bran 'bum sde reg pa'i dug /bzod dka' i dug rnams phyir phyur zhig /zhe rigs nag po byol song rigs/ /rmig bzhi lcags las na bun 'thibs/ /gnyan chen 'bum sde kha rlangs
271b7(rgyud 'grel): dug /bzod dka' dug rnams phyir phyung zhig/ /dman pa'i cha 'dzin zhe sdang can/ /bden ba mi nyan kun la gnod/ /sa bdag 'bum sde mche pa'i dug /bzod dka' i dug rnams phyir phyung zhing/ /dregs pa zhe sdang 'bar ba yi/ /klan pa nga rgyal mthu
272a1(rgyud 'grel): mthu bo che/ /'gro ba 'di la gang gnod pa/ /bzod dka' i dug rnams phyir phyung zhig /sbyor gzhan rab tu khros pa'i pho nya ni/ sprul pa 'bum sde 'gro ba'i gnod pa skyel/ /sman dang sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin byin
272a2(rgyud 'grel): bzod dka' mi bzad dug rnams phyir phyung zhig /de ltar bsnyen pa sngon song pas/ /mchog tu sgrub pos dgug phyang nas/ /rmi ltas rim pa so sor gsal/ /thub rtags byung na rdzas rnams ni/ /rten yod gnas su sba bar bya'o/ /gal
272a3(rgyud 'grel): mi thub rtags byung nas/ /tsho 'phrul drag po ston byed na/ /'khrul 'khor las kyi sbyor ba brtsam/ /gsang pa'i las kyi sbyor pa ni/ /'khor lo chen po la brten nas/ /klu grub dkyil 'khor shar phyogs su/ /thabs bzlog pa yi
272a4(rgyud 'grel): las bya ste/ /byang du gsad pa'i las bya'o/ /srog nan nan phaT phaT/ /pra raM pra raM dzwa la dzwa la phaT phaT/ shad shad shig shig phaT phaT/ /rigs bzhi glu la mnan pa bya/ /rA dza ku li'i thim pa'am/ /
272a5(rgyud 'grel): yang na sgrub kha ra them 'og tu/ /dbyar gyi khyim gsum tha ma la/ /drug gnyis bzhi yi nyi phyed na/ /shin tu dam par sba bar bya/ /rgya gram 'bar bas steng nas mnan/ /ji ltar bstan pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /ri rab klad pa bskor
272a6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /bskal pa'i mdza' ru mnan par bsam/ /mthu stobs chen po'i nga ro yis/ /phreng ba'i sngags ni rab bzlas shing/ /rgya gram 'bar bas stang stabs bya /mos pa rang 'dod lha mnyes te/ bsgrub bas mngon sum snang
272a7(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad rtsol ba drag pos rtog pa'i nad las thar/ /yun du ma gtang dad ldan dang bsrings na/ /tak+Sha ka yis gzung bar gyur pa yang/ /zla ba drug gis bzlog 'gyur the tshom med/ /gang zhig rang sems dpang du btsugs
272b1(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /the tshom med par rtag tu ma brjed na/ /rtog pa'i nad las thar cing dngos grub 'byung bar nges/ /'gro la brtse bas klu sgrub 'khrul 'khor brtsam ka'i las bsod nams dge rtsa ci yod pa/ /gang mos rtog pa'i dad las thar gyru? nas?/
272b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhal mthong shog /rin chen dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal nas/ /dngos grub sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar shog /slob dpon dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa'i klu sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /
272b3(rgyud 'grel): bal po'i paN+Di ta de ba pu N+yai ma ti dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ yak+Sha se na pa ta ye bi sho d+ha na ha ra sA d+ha na mA ma/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde rnams sbyor
272b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing sel ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku mdog mthing nag khros pa'i gzugs ldan shin tu 'jigs/ /gnod sbyin 'dul mdzad me 'bar rdo rje 'dzin la gus btud te/ las ngar nyan mongs pas
272b5(rgyud 'grel): dang rkyen gyis bar bskul nas/ /'bras bu sdug bsngal gnod sbyin dug ni bsal phyir bri/ /lha yi bsnyen pa rab rdzogs shing/ /dul la snying brtse ldan pa dang/ /cho ga thabs la mkhas pa dang/ dbang rdzogs nus pa ldan pas bzlog /
272b6(rgyud 'grel): khrus la sogs pa dang ldan pas/ /bum pa yungs kar legs par brtag /rtags byung sgrub pa rab tu brtsam/ /gnas ni yid 'ong der 'dug ste/ ba srung dang sa chog rdzogs pa dang/ maN+Dal?  legs par byas nas ni/ /sta gon rdzogs par
272b7(rgyud 'grel): byas pa dang/ /dmar gtor bum la lnga rnams dang/ /'bru sna sman sna rin chen dang/ /khrag dang sha dang snying la sogs/ /rdza dang sta gon rdzogs par bsag /de nas thig gis gdab bya ba/ /byin brlab dam tshig can gyis bya/ /dang po tshangs
273a1(rgyud 'grel): thig gdab pa dang/ zung dang logs dang cha chen dbye/ /sgo rgyan lha snam gnyis btab nas/ /de nas tshon rnams byin gyis brlab/ /dge ba 'khor lo lte bar bcas/ /lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
273a2(rgyud 'grel): la/ /rdo rje sngon po bri bar bya/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser po ste/ /shar du ral gri lhor dbyug pa/ /nub tu mdung ste dgra sta byang/ /shar lho 'khor lo lho nub mda'/ /nub byang gri gug byang shar tri shul dgod/ /lha rnams
273a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs skyong bcu dgod do/ /de nas rdzas rnams dgram pa ni/ /dbus su bum pa sngon po dgod/ /phyogs bzhir rigs dang bstun pa'o/ /mtshams bzhir khrag gi gtor ma gzhag /grwa rnams mchod pa sngon po bsham/ /phyoT
273a4(rgyud 'grel): skyong gtor ma sgo bzhir bzhag /nad pa khrus byas byang 'dug lho/ /bdag nyid lhor 'dug byang du'o/ /de ltar rdzas rnams rdzogs pa dang/ /mchod bstong sngon du rdzogs pa dang/ /sngags kyis stong bzhi bsgoms nas ni/ /de rjes
273a5(rgyud 'grel): sa bon hUM yig las/ /rdo rje gur sa gzhir gyur/ /de steng b+hUM las gzhal yas ni/ /drug khrod 'jigs par skyed par bya/ /de nas grub bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad du byung bcas/ /dra ba dra phyed rta babs so/ /
273a6(rgyud 'grel): dbus su nyi ma'i dbang po steng/ /hUM las bskyed pa'i rdo rje can/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rab bskyed nas/ /de pha la gnas hUM mthing nag /thugs kar rab tu bsgoms pa las/ /rtsibs brgyad re pha brgyad steng du/ k+Sha las bskyed
273a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnod sbyin ni/ /sha za dang ni ral ba can/ /gdong ser dang ni seng gdong ste/ /mo bzhi mtshams su rab bsam bya/ /rab tu smug gnag shin tu dmar ba dang/ /rab tu 'bar ba'i gser bsregs dung mdog go /'khor lo
273b1(rgyud 'grel): mda' dang gri gug tri shul/ /g.yas na de rnams g.yon na thod pa'o/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i gnod sbyin mo/ /nyi ma'i dkyil na g.yas bskum bzhugs/ /bong bu sna dar rna ba 'phyang/ /ral ba gyen 'greng ral gri so/ /thal ba'i mdon?
273b2(rgyud 'grel): dang dung gi dang/ /dmar gnag shin tu gnag pa'o/ /ral gri dbyug pa mdung dang dgra ste dang/ /g.yas na de rnams g.yon na thod pa'i/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i gnod sbyin ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil na brkyang skum bzhugs/ /ye shes sbyin
273b3(rgyud 'grel): drang mchod nas bstim par bya'o/ /yak+Sha pi ngA ra NA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha kro d+ha swA d+ha nA ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha nI lAM ba sa nA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a pra ti ha ta lA ya phaT/ gnod sbyin ma rnams yongs bskor nas/ /'jigs byed gnod sbyin
273b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags zlas/ /yak+Sha pa ra kra mA ya phaT/ rak+Sha bi taM tA ya phaT/ yak+Sha ba d+haM ta rU pA ya phaT/ rak+Sha ro Sha NA ya phaT/ zhes pa brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /dus gsum mchod pa rnam lngas mchod/ /bzlog dang las bcol nam
273b5(rgyud 'grel): ngag bzhin bgegs dang log 'dren las bcol bya/ /thod pa dur du nges par gzhug /bzlog na yungs kar rtags kyis brtag /mi len rtags su shes par bya'o/ /hUM zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i sku/ /mthing nag mi 'gyur
273b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje can/ /gnod sbyin gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa/ /rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal stod/ /oM badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo/ /bdag gis 'gro la phan phyir brtsams/ /des ni 'bras bu bde thob shog /gnod
273b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin gyi bsgrub pa'i thabs nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon dzA ba rI bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bal po'i mkhan po de ba pU r+Na ma ti dang/ lo tsE ba ban de chos kyi bzang pos
274a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ /kuSh+ma N+Do dsA d+ha pre ta pi shA tsa ye bi sho d+ha ya ha ra sA d+ha nA ma/ /bod skad du/ yi dags dang sha za dang grub bum dang srul po rnam rnam par sbyong zhing ser
274a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku gsum pha ral phyag drug ldan/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i/ /rdo rje can la gus btud de/ /sems can rnams la phan phyir bri/ /sngon du bsnyen
274a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rab rdzogs pas/ /yan lag tshon snas rab bcings nas/ /lha yi rnam pa gsal bsgoms te/ /rtags ni rab tu gsal ba brtags/ /brtags zin nas ni sgrub pa brtsam/ /sa yi cho ga rdzogs byas la/ /sta gon legs par
274a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor thig skud byin brlab gdab/ /ye shes thig gdab sa thig ni/ /tshangs thig nas gzung sgo rgyan bar/ /legs shing rdzogs par gdab par bya/ /de nas tshon dgye dbus nyi dkyil/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad
274a5(rgyud 'grel): ge sar bcas/ /kha dog so so gru chad ljang/ /rdo rje ra ba lha snam rigs/ /mtshan ma sa bon rab tu dgod/ /shar nas brtsams te 'khor lo ral gri dang/ /dgra sta rdo rje kha dog so sor bri/ /shar sgo nas bzung lcags kyu gri
274a6(rgyud 'grel): gug dang/ /mi mgo dang ni rgyu ma'i zhags pa bri/ /mtshams su gtor ma phyogs su mchod pa dbus su sku gdung bcas/ /gur dang bla re lha snam phyogs skyong gtor ma so sor dgram/ /bum pa phyogs bzhir las kyi bum pa shar
274a7(rgyud 'grel): sgor bzhag /mdun du bla ma yi dam spyan drangs mchod nas stong nyid bsgom/ /de nas hUM las sa gzhir ba gur du gyur pa'i rdo rje me 'od bcas/ /de las hUM las grub bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas shing dbang po nyi za'i gdan/ /
274b1(rgyud 'grel): de steng bdag nyid gsum gyis zhal gsum phyag drug bskyed/ /mdun du dga' rab dbang phyug thod phreng can dang bum rna sha zan sen dgu bskyed/ /thal dkar mdog dang gnag dang sngo dang shin tu gnag /g.yas na 'khor
274b2(rgyud 'grel): lo ral gri dgra sta rdo rje dang/ /g.yon sdigs pa'i sdigs mdzub po/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i bdag nyid can/ /thal bas lus phyugs khrag 'dzag pa'o/ /mtshams su ni me tog ma dang mdzes ldan dang ni 'od zer 'phog dang
274b3(rgyud 'grel): mdangs 'phrog ma'o/ /g.yas na lcags kyu gri gug mi mgo rgyu ma'i zhags/ /g.yon na thong pa khrag gis bkar ba'o/ /smug nag mthing nag dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs can bdung mo bzhi'o/ /thugs ka'i re pa'i hUM la
274b4(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs bstim sogs rdzogs byas na/ /gsang ba'i sngags ni rab tu bzlas/ /oM kuSh+ma Na bi d+ha ra ya hUM phaT/ DongsA ta na kro d+ha ya hUM phaT/ /pre ta bi sa na ya phaT/ /bi shA tsa ha ta ba la phaT swa hA/ /kuSh+ma Na ka ma ya phaT/ /DotshA ta na kri
274b5(rgyud 'grel): tAM ya phaT/ /pre ta kri tAM ta rU pa ya phaT/ /pi shA tsa ra Sha Na ya phaT swA hA/ /zhes pa bzlas te/ sngon du bsnyen pas bsgrub bya'i rtags ni rim pa drug par brtag /rtags byung bskrad pa'i las brtsam mo/ /yaM las rlung bsams steng
274b6(rgyud 'grel): du bskyed/ /dgug cir uts+tsha nga yas bskrad/ /las bcos 'phrin las gzhan yang brtsam/ /rabs chad nag po'i thod par ni/ /gzugs gzhug bsad pas dur khrod sba/ /hUM me dpung 'bar ba brid pa'i sku/ /gang rgyangs bzhad
274b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad thal mo rdebs/ /rgya mtshor zhabs nub dbang po mnan/ /sku gsum dog ldan zhal 'dzum bzhad/ /phyag drug bdud 'dul mtshon cha 'dzin/ /rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /oM badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas gshegs su
275a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol nas bsdu ba'o/ /bdag gis gzhan la phan phyir brtsams/ /dge ba de yis 'gro ba kun/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /nam gru'i rigs las byung ba'i dza' ba ri bas mdzad pa'i bdud bzlog
275a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //bal po'i bla ma de ba pU r+Na ma ti dang/ lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI badzra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra ba laM d+ha rab liM d+ha ra Ni bi d+hi nA ma/ bod
275a3(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsod nams 'dong dang 'dod la mnyes/ /bar chod spong dang dug zhi phyir/ /thugs rje can la gus
275a4(rgyud 'grel): btung de/ /gtor ma'i las 'di brtsam par bya/ /dang ldan byang sems rnal 'byor pa/ /ser sna med cing gtor brtson pas/ /bza' ba bca' ba 'jib dang btung/ /rin chen snod du rab tu bsham/ /hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): oM gyis byin brlab bya/ /
275a5(rgyud 'grel): lnga de nyid can/ /sngo bskyod med 'bar rdzas rnams khol/ /'od kyis zla ba rdo rje zhu/ /thim pas dngul chu lta bu gnas/ /de'i steng du oM dkar pos/ /'dod kyis gaM gA klung sogs bkug /bdud rtsi drangs te gnyis med bstim/ /'bru gsum
275a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis byin brlab bya/ /de rjes mdun gyi mkha' stong la/ /paM las chu skyes 'dab brgyad bskyed/ /de dbus hUM las 'dod lha bskyed/ /lte 'khor dag la oM las ni/ /phyogs bzhi snags rgyas bzhi las bskyed/ /'dab ma mtshams?
275b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhir khro mo ste/ /gong ras sgo ba bzhi po'o/ /dmar po'i sa bon 'dab brgyad dmar/ /phu las 'dab mar klu brgyad bskyed/ /ze 'bru bcu drug sna tshogs la/ /bdud dang gnod sbyin sna tshogs bskyed/ /rang gi snying kha'i 'od kyis ni/ /'phros
275b2(rgyud 'grel): pas sangs rgyas gi gA yi/ /bye snyed dkyil 'khar lha la bstim/ /klu dang gnod sbyin bdud dang ni/ /sa 'og sa stad sa bla yi/ /thams cad de gsum dag la bstim/ /spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur te/ /sku dang sung dang thugs lhar
275b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur/ /mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag mchod/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang mgon rnams kyis/ /rang rang lce la rdo rje ni/ /hUM las nas ched tsam ni bskyed/ /rtse mo dag la oM bsams te/ /'od 'phros drangs pas gsol bar
275b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur/ /mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag mchod/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang mgon rnams kyis/ /rang rang lce la rdo rje ni/ /hUM las nas tshad tsam ni bskyed/ /rtse mo dag la oM bsams te/ /'od >'phros drangs pas gsol bar
275b5(rgyud 'grel): bsams/ /gnyis med ye shes thob 'gyur te/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis mchod/ /gtso bo nyid la gtso bo ste/ /'khor ni so so'i sngags rim bzhin/ /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+ha rmA NAM A dyA nu tA n+na twAd/ /gnyis la sbyin pa gong
275b6(rgyud 'grel): dang 'brel/ /de nas bstod cing gsol ba gdang/ /so so yi ni sngags kyis ni/ /rang rang gnas su gshegs su gsol/ /spyod lam gyis ni dus dag tu/ /rang nyid du lha'i rnal 'byor bya/ /'di yis phan dang bsod nams ci bsags
275b7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /'dras bu myur zhing longs spyod rnams ni thob/ /dgegs rnams zhi dang gdug pa zhi byed shog /bde ba mchog chen bdag gis thob par shog/ //dpal phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi gtor ma'i
275b8(rgyud 'grel): cho ga zhes bya ba'o/ /nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa/ slob dpon bram ze'i tsun pa dzA ba ri pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bla ma de ba pu rtsam rti dang/ lo tsA ba she'u badzra de bas bsgyur pa
276a1(rgyud 'grel): las/ spang kyis bdag dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bla ma la shin tu legs par zhus te/ phan nu tsho bcos pa lags so// //dpal phyag na rdo rje'i rim pa drug pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du?
276a2(rgyud 'grel): kra ma Sha Ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ rim pa drug pa zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro rnams rtog pa'i dor gyur rtogs gnas te/ /de la rtog cing dge dang mi dge 'dzin/ /dug dgra gseb thar chu srin kha ru ni/ gru chad
276a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du dga' dang mi dga' skye/ /rtag tu brtse bas 'dzin cing nga ros 'jigs/ /de la dngos po kun gyis 'dud cing 'dud/ /bka' drin thob dang rang nyams rtog de dran/ /de 'dir 'dod lha mnyes dang des pa 'byung ba dang/ /sbyor ba gzhan gyis
276a4(rgyud 'grel): nges par 'byung ba yin/ /dang po gnyis yin gnyis pa bzhi ru snang/ /dang po bzlas pa 'grub dang grub pa'i rtags/ /gsang sngags 'grub pa'i rtags dang mtshan ma ni/ /glegs bam du mas 'tsher mthong lag gis len/ /rnga chen
276a5(rgyud 'grel): dung dang cha lang dril bu dang/ /mchod pa'i sgra sgrogs du ma'i gzugs mthong ba/ /maN+Dal dkyil 'khor las byed chos 'chad nyan/ /glegs baM klog cing skyus lta 'dri ba smra/ /ras ris la ni bde gshegs gzugs brnyan ni/ /du ma mthong
276a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing rten gyi gzugs mthong ba/ /rol mo'i gzugs byed mchod rten gdugs sogs byed/ /rdo rje la sogs mtshan ma rnyed dam mthong/ /me tog sna tshogs gsal bar mthong ba dang/ /nyi zla'i 'od 'bab gza' skar go mthong dang/ /
276a7(rgyud 'grel): me gtong du langs nam mkha' yang ni 'khrigs/ /rdzing la chu 'dren khrom pa las ni len/ /'bras kyi myu gu bzang dang lo ma bzang/ /lce spyang la sogs thul pa gos bzangs gyon/ /rgyan cha bzang zhing mtshon cha rno ba 'dzin/ /de rnams byung
276b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags/ /rnal 'byor bas gsang sngags 'grub pa'i rtags kyi rim pa ste/ rim pa dang po'o/ /mig la sogs pa'i dbang po srid gsum mthong/ /thos dang snga phyi'i rkyen dran rdzas kun lung/ /ras ris bzhad 'ang?
276b2(rgyud 'grel): ro sogs 'od 'byung dri/ /mun nag me tog char 'bab 'ja' tshon sna/ /tshogs na chos 'chad mun nag glegs bam dpyod/ /nam mkha' stong las sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra/ /'brug sgra glog 'gyur thog chen 'bebs pa dang/ /nam mkha' 
276b3(rgyud 'grel): stong zhing sbrin sngon mthong ba dang/ /de bzhin mthing nag sprin sdo nges 'gyur dang/ /nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor 'od ldan sa gzhi bdal/ /ras ris lugs ma la sogs bde gshegs gzugs/ /mchod cing bskor ba byed dang rten la
276b4(rgyud 'grel): skor/ /dkyil 'khor bris nas mchod dam dbang bskur ba/ /mdzes pa'i snod du me tog sna tshogs 'thu/ /rin chen sna tshogs me tog bai DUr rnyed/ /shin tu skam pa'i sa la chu rdol ba/ /bdag nyid me dpung nang 'dug srog chags
276b5(rgyud 'grel): tshig /ting 'dzin gsal zhing yi dags gzugs la brtson/ /dpen zhing nyams dga' i gnas ni du ma mthong/ /rtse gcig pa yi bsam gtan byed/ /seng ge'i khri steng gnas pa rmi/ /lha khang gnas gzhi rtsig mtshungs
276b6(rgyud 'grel): dang san? chu po che dang rgya mtsho'i steng nas 'gro/ /bar snang 'phur zhing bsdigs pa'i ltos 'gro len/ /'di 'dra'i rmi lam gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags/ /rnal 'byor bas gsang sngags grub pa'i rtags kyi rim pa ste gnyis
276b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// //gnyis pa bzhi pa'i dang po'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sbyor ba gzhan byung rnal 'byor nyid la 'od/ /ri gzar dag la mi thar mthar zad lhung/ /ri brag 'jul 'dod chu dong lhung ba dang/ /phyugs lhas 'dus?
277a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzab bshad gcan dang ni/ /kha dog dmar dang skya ba'i chu dag la/ /rtsub dang gnag pa'i gos dad dmar ba'i gos/ /shin tu h+rul po'i rtse ta lpags pa gyon/ /shin tsi ri las lhung dogs rten med 'dug /gcer
277a2(rgyud 'grel): bur 'dug cing lcag lcig chu nang 'gro/ /gzung 'dzin yong pa'i rten sa dbu ni/ /nyin dang mtshan du rtag tu 'gro ba rmi/ /glang nag glang dmar ba nag pa dmar zhon/ /rtsub pa'i gos gyon g+ha ta la zhon pa/ /ma he ba lang khyus 'gro sogs
277a3(rgyud 'grel): rmi ba/ /gnag dang ba lang khyus 'gro sogs mthong dang/ /rta dang ga ta rmig zlum khyus 'gro sogs/ /be ta tshe ta khyus 'gro sogs mthong ba/ /seng ge spyang dang khyi sogs mche can rmi/ /bse dang byi ba sder chags rmi 'gyur ba'o/ /sbyor ba gzhan
277a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis gnod pa 'byung ba rnal 'byor pa la mtshan ma 'od ba'i rim pa ste gsum pa'o// //gnyis pa'i bzhi pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /rnal 'byor stobs kyis mi thub mtshan nyid ni/ /bya dang byi ba sprul dug gnas
277a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtsho/ /chu srin nya dang chu sogs gnas pa dang/ /sdig pa sdom dang rtsang pa rkang mangs dang/ /sprang bu mchu rings srog chags phra mo rnams/ /de rnams rmi gyur bran rnams sbyor ba gnod/ /sbrul dang sbal pa sdom dang sdig pa dang/ /
277a6(rgyud 'grel): bya sogs lus 'byar mchu 'debs gshog sbrug dang/ /be ta la sogs rji med mdog rgod rmi/ /mi thub rtags te bud med smyo ba dang/ /mi thub kun la brdeg 'gyur mdog rgod ma/ /rgyan bzangs mdzes pa'i snod du zas soT
277a7(rgyud 'grel): bkang/ /rtag tu rgan mor 'od 'gyur mi thub rtags/ /lto 'gros lus dkris ldan zhing mi phrel dang/ /sdig dang rtsang sogs 'byor zhing mchu btsugs pa/ /sbrang bu mchu rings srog chags phra mo rnams/ /khrag 'jib lus nang
277b1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs gyur mi thub rtags/ /chu srin nya srogs chu chen 'phyong zhing 'khyung/ /gnag dang dmar srog chu yis khyer ba rmi/ /de yang mi thub rtags te brtson par bzlog /dad ldan brtson pas mi 'grub gang yang med/ /sbyor ba gzhan las
277b2(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i gnod pa rnal 'byor pa'i stobs kyis mi thub pa'i rtags kyi rim pa ste bzhi ba'o// //gnyis pa bzhi pa gsum pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rnal 'byor brtsal gyis thub cing non pa'i rtags/ /ma he gnag
277b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs rdzud cing rid pa dang/ /dud 'gro rnams ni brtags sam brtod gyur pa/ /dud 'gro dgras khyer brtod dam rkun mos khyer/ /dud 'gro 'tsho dang 'bras kyi phub ma 'chag /dud 'gro 'khor dang rdzi yis skyong ba dang/ /dud 'gro yor
277b4(rgyud 'grel): dang 'ga ba thegs grub pa'i rtags/ /dud 'gro gsang dang btsos nas za ba dang/ /rang gzhin me byung 'gro tshig gyur pa dang/ /de ni nges bar dbang du 'dus pa'i rtags/ /bud med gud cing do dma' shi ba dang/ /ngu zhing rgyan bzang
277b5(rgyud 'grel): gus pas phyag byed dang/ /gnas nas gzhan 'gro thub pa'i rtags su bstan/ /sbrul la sogs pa'i srog chags du ma rnams/ /gsang dam zos sam shi 'am ded gyur dang/ /ske ma dang tshig 'gyur thub pa'i rtags yin no/ /
277b6(rgyud 'grel): bya dang byi ba sbrul gdug gnas mtsho sgams/ /bud med zhum zhing du ba thub pa'i rtags/ /sbyor ba gzhan rnal 'byor pa'i rtsa la gyis non pa'i ltas kyi rim pa ste lnga pa'o// //gnyis pa bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sbyor
277b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan rab tu khros par gyur pa ni/ /rang nyid mi g.yo gnas na gnas nas ni/ /sbrul pa sna tshogs gsugs ni ston cing phyogs/ /'khor dang bka' yi pho nya 'gyeng cing 'dug /rigs mtho'i 'dra 'bab bu chung rab byung gzugs/ /
278a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od gyur thang las skyes pa'i pho nya yin/ /de ni bzlog pa'i bya ba'i thabs ni gzugs/ /blon po yul gyi rgan rabs 'ongs 'gyur dang/ /brod pa skyes pa gzhon nu bon po'i gzugs/ /sngags pa'i gzugs?
278a2(rgyud 'grel): ni 'ong 'gyur brag skyes yin/ /de bcol bya ba'i thabs ni bstan pa yin/ /dkar dmar gnag cing shin tu mang ba yi/ /ba lang 'chi zhing phyugs nang 'dug pa dang/ /ral pa bzang po bud med smug nag dang/ /g.ya' ri gangs ri
278a3(rgyud 'grel): las skyes pho nya yin/ /de phyir thabs ni du ma yod par gsungs/ /bud med gzhon zhing rgyan bzangs rab byung ma/ /ma dang skro mo ne ne mo yi gzugs/ /nye du nye 'brel khro mchen bud med dang/ /bu mo chung ma mtsho las skyes pa
278a4(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /de nas mnan pa'i thabs ni bya ba dang/ /de rnams nam zhig 'ga' zhig dbang du 'du/ /dbang du 'gro ba rtog pa'i nad las thar/ /khyi la sogs pa dud 'gro phal cher ni/ /sbyor ba gzhan gyis pho nya yin pas bzlog /
278a5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi ngo bo gtse bo'i gzugs can te/ /brang 'gro'i gzugs ldan rgyan ldan de nyid do/ /nam mkha' i mthongs na gnas shing sprul pa yi/ /gzugs ni ma lus brjod kyis mi lang ste/ /de yang dpag tu med pa'i mdza' mi rtogs/ /
278a6(rgyud 'grel): de phyir bde gshegs mthu dang mtshungs pa yin/ /sbyor ba gzhan gyis bka' i pho nya bkye ba'i rim pa stwe drug pa'o// //bla ma'i bka' dang lhag las gnad ba byin/ /'gro la brtse bas rtog pa cung zhig sbyar/
278a7(rgyud 'grel): de yi dge ba ci bsags pa/ /rtog pas des shing nges rtoT shog /rim pa drug pa zhes bya ba rtags gsal bar byed pa/ /nam gru'i rigs las byung pa dngos grub brnyes pa dzA wa ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
278b1(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta de ba su N+ya ma ti dang chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ ma ri na ma rya mri ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ gsad pa bdud rtsi gso bzhes bya ba/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
278b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba gso ba ma byas na/ /gang zhig la ni sdig pa dang/ /gang zhig shin tu khros 'gyur ba/ /de phyir gso ba'i cho ga dran/ /rin chen ga'u pad+ma can/ /de mtshungs ga'u steng 'gebs bya/ /phyogs bzhi pad+ma'i steng du ni/ /'bras phye'i rgyu
278b3(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba yi/ /tsan ngan chus bkrus bskus pa yis/ /rigs bzhi klu yi gzugs bzhag ste/ /gdong pa mtshal gyi byug par bya/ /gtso mo bzhi dang khyi'u bzhi/ /bu mo bzhi yi gzugs kyang bzhag /de dag mdzes pa'i gzugs
278b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /pad+ma'i lte bar rin chen lnga/ /mtshams kyi pad+ma bzhi po la/ /dkar ser dmar ser bud med kyi/ /'o ma bzhi ni mtsho bzhi ste/ /der ni klu gzugs sna tshogs bzhag /ljang khu dar gyis steng dgab po/ /de nas rang lha'i sa
278b5(rgyud 'grel): bon las/ /'od zer lcags kyu lta bu las/ /'ga' zhig rnam smin lus bor ba/ /bar do'i sems de bkug byas te/ /dri chu yis ni gnyis ka bsang/ /gzugs la stim zhing 'o mar bad ra/ /sna tshogs sman gyis gtor bar
278b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de ltar dgug pa lan gsum bya/ /de ltar gas ba phyi nang gnyis/ /rang lha'i sa bon 'od 'phros pas/ /'ga' zhig sems kyi bag chags sbyangs/ /lce yi rdo rje lte bar a/ /a yi 'od zer phul btab pas/ /'ga' zhig
278b7(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi a la tham/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun phab sems gso'o/ /sems dang shes pha dam gsal bsam/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'o rgyun 'dis/ /klu brgyang 'khor bcas khyed rnams kun/ /sems dang shes pa gsal gyur cig /lus
279a1(rgyud 'grel): dang dbang po rgyas gyur cig /drin lan dam tshig dran gyis la/ /bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar/ /shin tu khros pa zhi gyur cig /de ltar rim pas lan gsum par/ /de ni nang gi gso ba yin/ /de nas
279a2(rgyud 'grel): mngar gsum 'bras chan mar/ /gser dang khyi yi 'o ma dang/ /na ga ge sar la sogs pa'i/ /gso ba'i sman ni sna tshogs bsags/ /bdud rtsi'i 'o rgyun byin brlabs te/ /de yi nyams pa rnams sos bsam/ /gso sman la sogs
279a3(rgyud 'grel): rim pa ni/ /mchod cing 'di skad brjod par bya/ /hUM nga ni thugs rje chen po yi/ /ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas/ /gso ba'i bdud rtsi rgyun phab nas/ /klu brgyang 'khor bcas khyed rnams kun/ /drag po'i sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ /
279a4(rgyud 'grel): bsreg dang btso ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ /mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /bsnun cing gtubs pa'i sdug bsngal dang/ /sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong/ /'chi med gso bar sman tshogs kyis/ /bsregs shing btsos pa sos
279a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /bsnun cing gtubs pa sos gyur cig /lus dang dbang po rgyas gyur cig /mthu stobs ldan zhing bde gyur shog /sdug bsngal kun las thar bar shog /byang chub sems bskyed dga' sems ldan/ /dbang po rnams kyi
279a6(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul du/ /mkho dgu longs spyod thams cad ni/ /'dod pa thams cad ldan gyur cig /nyams pa'i lus sogs rgyas gyur cig /yan lag thams cad bde gyur cig /klu nang thams cad sos gyur nas/ /sdug bsngal nang
279a7(rgyud 'grel): las thar bar shog /ngan song gsum las thar nas ni/ /tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan gyur te/ /chos sbyor dbang po thul nas ni/ /phyag na rdo rje'i zhal mthong shog /'jigs pa kun las skyabs ldan shog /longs spyod chen po thob
279b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /sngags dang sman sogs byin brlabs kyis/ /nad dang nyer 'tshe kun sos pas/ /drin lan dam tshig dran par gyis/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' mi 'da' / /zhe sdang gdug pa zhi gyur la/ /de ring che ge mo la ni/ bsam ngan sbyor rtsub
279b2(rgyud 'grel): zhe gyur cig /glu byang bcings pa grol gyur cig /legs bsams thams cad 'grub pa dang/ /dar zhing rgyas pa'i dngos grub gsol/ /nA ga rA phu shA n+ti ku ru swAhA zhes pa'i tshig /rim pas kun nas gdags par bya/ /gdengs
279b3(rgyud 'grel): ka'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni/ /dam tshig 'di yis bsgrag par bya/ /de ni phyag na rdo rje ste/ /klu brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa nyon/ /chos bshad bden pa mi nyan dang/ /rig sngags rgyal po'i bka' bcag na/ /gso ba'i sman ni
279b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kun/ /mtshon cha'i char du gyur nas ni/ /lus kyi gnang la gzer bar byed/ /bcang cing bcang cing dum bur 'gyur/ /mngar gsum la sogs gtor ma yang/ /dug chen ha lar gyur nas ni/ /myos dang rmongs par
279b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas ni/ /tshe ba chen pos gzir bar byed/ /de pas dus rnams thams cad du/ /dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu srungs/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sa ma ya nA ga yak+Sha yak+Sha hUM phaT/ /de 'dra'i mchod pa gsum byas te/ /dkar gsum mngar
279b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum gtor ma ni/ /cho ga'i rim pas btang bar bya/ /de ni phyi yi gso ba yin/ /nyams dga' ba yi gzhal yas khang/ /'dzam gling pho brang chen po ste/ /rten yong gnas su dam du spa/ /thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gso ba'i de ni rim pa
279b7(rgyud 'grel): sten da chog 'di ni shin tu legs/ /bdag gis man ngag rim pa 'di/ /gang zhig 'ga' la phan phyir byas/ /zla ba lta bu gang thob des/ /'gro rnams rtog pa'i nang grol shog /gsang pa gso ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta re ba
280a1(rgyud 'grel): pu N+ya ma ti dang lo tsA pa chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ du sbya mri ta pU dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi 'o ma'i chod pa zhes bya ba/ /rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
280a2(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs dug rnams 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /bdud rtsi lta bu khyod la 'dug /'gro ba rnams la phyan pa'i phyir/ /gseng ba gso ba'i thabs 'di bri/ /gser grangs la sogs snod du bsham/ /sa bon gsum gyis byin gyis brlab/ /
280a3(rgyud 'grel): rjes su gzung phyir sku bskyed nas/ /de nas de la mchod pa 'bul/ /rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM 'gro ba'i mgon po thugs rje can/ /gzung 'dzin dri ma'i skyon spangs nas/ /mnyes pas sku gsung thugs la 'bul/ /thugs rjes
280a4(rgyud 'grel): dgongs nas bzhes su gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra pA Ni nI lAM pa ra d+ha ra ma hA kA ya a ha ra pA jo mi d+ha sa mu dra spha ran sa ma ye hUM zhes mchod yon dbul/ /hUM me tog dam pa 'di dag dang/ /de bzhin mdzes pa'i me tog rnams/ /
280a5(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs thugs la dbul bar bgyi/ /chags med thugs rjes bzhes su gsol/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni pu Shpa dzE be g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM swA hA/ mun pa'i phyogs ni 'joms byed cing/ /phyogs bcu gsal
280a6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di/ /gtso 'khor bcas la dbul bar bgyi/ /rtog med thugs rjes bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra pA Ni nI lAM pa ra d+ha ra d+ha pA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM swAhA/ mun pa'i phyogs ni 'joms byed cing/ /phyogs bcu gsal
280a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mer me 'di/ /kun mkhyen ye shes thob bya'i phyir/ /ye shes thugs mchog bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra pA Ni nI lI bar d+ha ra A lo ke pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma me hUM swA hA/ lhan cig skyes dang sbyar pa'i dri/ /dri mchog dam
280b1(rgyud 'grel): la 'di dag ni/ /rang rang thugs la dbul bar bgyi/ /kun bzangs thugs rjes bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra dand+he pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM swAhA/ kha dog dri dang ldan pa'i mchog /bza' ba'i mchog dang yang dag
280b2(rgyud 'grel): lnga nang nga thams cad sbyar ba'i bshos 'di dag /rang rig ye shes brnyes la dbu/ /oM badzra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra pU lAM dza yaM na prA Na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma yi hUm swAhA/ bla med theg pa mchog gi don ston pa/ /shes rab mchog gi rjes
280b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro rol mo'i sgra/ /bdud kyi 'khor lo gzhom phyir dbul bar bgyi/ /thugs kyis 'gro la mnga' brnyes 'di bzhes shog /oM badzra pA Ni nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra bu d+hA k+She tra pra tsA li ti pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM swAhA/ /nor rgyas dang ni
280b4(rgyud 'grel): dung skyor dang/ /dga' bo dang ni 'jig po dang/ /pad+ma dang ni tshu lta dang/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan la/ /bdud rtsi 'o ma'i mchod pa 'bul/ /klu yi nad las thar gyur cig /gnod sbyin nang las thar gyur cig /rdzas sba'o/ /dpal phyag na rdo
280b5(rgyud 'grel): rje'i mchod pa'i rim pa rdzogs so/ //paN+Di ta de ba pu N+ya ma ti dang lo tsA ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ nA ga ka ra ma kro d+ha mA ra na nA ma/ bod skad du/ klu khro bos gsang
280b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phrin las zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de brnyen bzlas pa'i rtags byung na/ /'ga' zhig dbang du bsdu dogs pas/ /de dbang bya phyir man ngag rim/ /mgon la lus btud man ngag dren/ /drur khrod la sogs
280b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas dag tu/ /sngon du bston pa rdzogs pa yis/ /nag po'i phyogs kyi zla ba la/ /bdud dang dgu dang lnga dus la/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum khru gang chang/ /mgo ni lho ru bstan par bya/ /sprul dang sbal ba'i sha dang ni /ske tshe dru che khri dang til/
281a1(rgyud 'grel): thal ba sa dang lan tshwa dang/ /bu ram 'bras phye rnams las ni/ /sor brgyad tshad kyi sman 'khyil ba/ /dgu dang bdun dang lnga dang gsum/ /klu yi rgyal po'i gzugs byas te/ mthing nag hUM phaT snying gar gzhug /gru
281a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum nang du gan rkyal bzhag /de ltar rdzas rnams bsags nas ni/ /lha yi rnal 'byor bdag ldan pas/ /lcags kyu lnga dang sa bon lnga/ /'dod pa'i lha la dbul ba ste/ /sprul dang sbal pa'i sha khrag sogs/ /bsgrub bya de nyid la
281a3(rgyud 'grel): ni sbyin/ /rta sha la sogs sna tshogs sha/ nang gi bka' srungs rnams la sbyin/ /'bras chan la sogs gtor ma ni/ /phyi yi bstan bsrungs rnams la sbyin/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya/ /sa bon las ni sna tshogs pa'i/ /khro bo mtshon
281a4(rgyud 'grel): cha 'dzin pa yis/ /bsgrub bya'i cho ga dang bral nas/ /drangs te sa bon la ni bstim/ /snga ma'i sa bon nyid gyur pas/ /'gugs par byed pa'i sa bon byung/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ /ni lAM ba ra badzra pA Ni aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): a karSha ya che ge mo hUM
281a5(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni brjod pa la/ /lcags kyu thogs pa'i lha mo ni/ /dpag tu med par bskul bar bsam/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): nI laM ba ra badzra pA Ni che ge mo pra pe sha ya phaT/ /gzugs brnyan kha phye bstims
281a6(rgyud 'grel): la bzhog /sna tshogs nad kyis gzir ba dang/ lus 'dar sems ni gdung bar bsam/ /sta ri la sogs mtshon gyis gzir/ /rlung nag gis g.yengs grang bas khyab/ /gcan gzan sogs kyis lus zos bsam/ /dam tshig
281a7(rgyud 'grel): bsrung phyir gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas phur bu mtshon cha thogs/ /gsang thabs gsum gyis gsad par bya/ /gnas gdun du ni phur bus gdab/ /hUM nga ni phyag na rdo rje ste/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir
281b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bas/ /stobs chen 'phrin las drag po yis/ /skad cig tsam yang mi gnas phyir/ /lus kyi gnad du gzer bar gyis/ /oM nI lAM badzra pA Ni che ge mo kI li kI lA hUM hUM phaT/ gsang ba'i bdag po bsrungs phyir/ /gsang ba'i
281b2(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig bstan par bya/ /oM ni lAM ba ra badzra pa Ni sa ma ya hUM phaT/ /phyag na rdo rje'i dam tshig ste/ /phur ba'i lha dang che ge mo/ /dam tshig gnyan gyis ma 'da' bar/ /ci sgo thams cad mnyan par gyis/ /hUM nga ro stobs chen drag po'i sgra/ /
281b3(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa gang zhig 'da' mi byed/ /nga yi mthu stobs drag po'i sgra/ /mgo bo chol pa brgya ru 'gems/ /nyon cig ltos 'gro thams cad kun/ /mthu stobs drag po'i bka' ma 'da' / /oM nI lAM ba ra badzra pA Ni che ge mo ha ra ha ra/ pra ha ra pra ha
281b4(rgyud 'grel): rang da tshinda tshinda/ b+hinda b+hinda hUM phaT/ hUM rdo rje chen po rab 'bar tho/ /bka' las 'da' bye che ge mo/ /rdo rje chen pos snying bsregs nas/ /lus sems phra rab rdul du lhogs/ /rdo rje tho ba'i gtun khung du/ /rdo rje tho ba'i gtun khung du/ /rdo rje tho bas btags byas cas/ /slar
281b5(rgyud 'grel): yang thal bar brlag byed 'gyur/ /lha yi che ge mo nges gsod/ /oM nI lAM ba ra badzra pA Ni che ge mo ha na ha na/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya hUM phaT/ tadya thA hUM phaT/ rim pas gtor ma 'di sbyin no/ /bdag med
281b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos po btab cing dbul/ /des bas sad nas mnan pa bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la sdad pa'i dag /man ngag rim pas gsang par bya/ /thos pa mang zhing shes rab can/ /bla ma las gus ser sna med/ /yin gyi gzhan du sbyin mi bya/ /phyag
281b7(rgyud 'grel): med pas ni gal te byin/ /'bras bu mi 'dod sna tshogs ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la myong bar 'gyur/ /sdang dang gdug pas zin pa'i thabs/ /zab mo'i man ngag cung zad smras/ /de yi bsod nams ci bsags pa/ /sdang dang gdug pa 'dul bar shog/ //
282a1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon dzA ba ri ba'i zhal snga nas mdzed pa'i khro bos gsang ba'i phris paN+Di ta de ba pu N+yi ma ti dang/ lo tsa pa chos kyi bzang pos bcos pa'o// //*/ /klu rigs bzhi mnan pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
282a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ nA ga ku la tsa ri staM b+ha ya bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ klu rigs bzhi mnan pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig dbang du 'dus gyur pas/ /bskal pa bye ba'i mdza' ru yang/ /ldang
282a3(rgyud 'grel): bar mi nus bya ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje can la gus btung nas/ /sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/ /de yi mnan pa'i cho ga dran/ /gser las byas pa'i mchod rten nam/ /yang na rin chen lnga las byas/ /khru gang tshad kyis mchod rten brtsig/
282a4(rgyud 'grel): bum pa khang stong byas pa'i nang/ /ku la ca ri'i gzugs byas te/ /khong stong phyogs bzhir dgong par bya/ /de 'og phyogs bzhi'i rmad du ni/ /ku la ca ri'i bran rnams gzhug /de nas lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /phreng ba'i sngags kyis bzlas
282a5(rgyud 'grel): pa las/ /sngags kyi 'od zer lcags kyu yis/ /bsgrub bya bkug ste gnyis med bstim/ /yang na rang lha'i sa bon las/ /khro bo sna tshogs spros pa yis/ /bsgrub bya bkug ste snga ma bzhin/ /mngon sum lta bur khugs par bsam/ /
282a6(rgyud 'grel): ku la tsa ri'i spyi steng du/ /rdo rje rgya gam me ri 'bar/ /de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni/ /mi 'khrugs rgyal po g.yon brkyang bskum/ /bskal pa'i mdza' ru gnas par bsam/ /de nas bdud rtsi lngar bcas pa'i/ /rang gi 'dod pa'i lha la dbul/ /
282a7(rgyud 'grel): dam la gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ /sprul dang spul pa'i sha dang ni/ /glang dmar ba dmar la sogs pa'i/ /khrag la sogs pa rnams kyis ni/ /bsgrub bya la ni gtor ma sbyin/ /dbyar gyi khyim gsum tha ma yi/ /drug gnyis gzhi yi
282b1(rgyud 'grel): nyi phyed na/ /sgrub khang them rtsa'i 'og tu ni/ /shin tu dam par sba bar bya/ /phyag na rdo rje khro bo che/ /rab tu khros pa'i mthu stobs kyis/ /ri rab klad la bskor nas ni/ /de 'og ku la tsa ri ni/ /rigs de rnams ni mnan byas kyis/ /thar pa
282b2(rgyud 'grel): yi ni dus med par/ /dam tshig gnyan gyis ma 'da' cig /nyes pa 'di las ma sdod cig /lus 'di rul cing myags gyur nas/ /snying ni 'gems shing zags par byed/ /tshe yi 'du byed byas nas ni/ /mnar med par ni 'gro ba
282b3(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /byang chub sems bskyed byams pa'i sems/ /skyes pa'i tshe na btang bar bya/ /phreng ba'i sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ /shin tu khros pas bzlas par bya/ /mthu stobs drag po'i nga ro yis/ /stang stabs kyis kyang mnan par bya/ /dang
282b4(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzang zhing shes rab can/ /bla ma la gus gtong phong pa/ /gal te rmongs pas gzhan du sbyin/ /tsha ba chen por yun rings gnas/ /oM nI lAM b+ha ra badzra pA Ni sa ma ya nA ga ku la tsa ri i mAM ba lIM khe hi kha hi swAhA/ /gtor ma sbyin
282b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags so/ /klu rigs bzhi'i mnan pa nas gru'i rigs las byung ba'i dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ nI lA ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ho ma bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag na
282b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig med par de mi 'byung/ /des na de la 'jug pa dran/ /gang zhig 'dir rgyar khru gang ba kun nas zlum po'i thab khung nang du rdo
282b7(rgyud 'grel): rje sems? rgyad pa bkod de/ /des dkar pos byugs la tsan dan dkar po la sogs pa'i dris kyang gtor ro/ /der rgya shug gam dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci ba gcer te/ /nas dang/ gro dang/ 'bras dang/ san ma dang/ bdud rtsi lnga dang/ me
283a1(rgyud 'grel): tog dkar po dang ldan pa'i mchod yon no/ /spos dang/ mar me dang/ dri chab dang/ lha ba shos te mchod pa yin no/ /til dang/ yam shing dang/ mar dang/ yungs kar dang/ zho dang/ 'o ma dang/ zas
283a2(rgyud 'grel): dkar gsum dang/ mngar gsum dang/ ku sha dang dur pa dang/ nas dang/ 'bras dang/ gro dang/ so ba dang/ sran ma dang/ bil ba dang/ su rga dang/ 'dza ti pha la rnams ni g.yas su bzhag par bya'o/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor
283a3(rgyud 'grel): byas la mchod rdzas rnams byin gyis brlabs te/ bgegs bskrad nas bram ze 'am tha mal pa'am rgyun zhags sam/ 'o ma can gyi me blangs te/ oM badzra pA Ni dzwA la dzwA la hUM hUM phaT ces bya bas me sbar bar bya'o/ /de nas hUM las
283a4(rgyud 'grel): thab khung bskyed pa ni raM las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum la yi ge oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM las 'khor lo dang pad+ma dang rdo rje gyur pa las zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyi me lha mchod phyir thogs pa dkar po dang ldan pa ba spu'i bu ga thams cad
283a5(rgyud 'grel): nas bdud rtsi dkar po'i rgyun 'gyung ba zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /g.yas na rdo rje dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ g.yon dril bu dang bgrang phreng 'dzin pa can chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par bsgom mo/ /ye shes sems dpa' 
283a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bzhis dgug pa la sogs pa byas te/ /byin gyis brlab pa dang dbang bskur ba dang/ khrus byas nas mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod do/ /mar la sogs pa'i bsreg rdzas rnams rig sngags 'dis dbul te/
283a7(rgyud 'grel): oM ma hA g+hU ta dzwa lA ya sarba bi g+hwA hUM phaT/ che ge mo shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /zhes pas zhe bar bsam mo/ /de'i rjes la me 'bar ba'i rgyur gyur pa'am de'i snying gar dpal phyag na rdo rje sgrub thabs las ji skad gsungs
283b1(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin du ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ gnyis su med par byas la/ rang gi lha la mchod rdzas dang bsreg rdzas rnams la phreng ba'i sngags la che ge mo shA n+ti ku ru btags la dbul zhing zhi bar bsam mo/ /de nas
283b2(rgyud 'grel): nga? gang blugs phul te/ sngags 'dis gshegs su gsol lo/ /oM kri to wi sarbba sa twa/ ba to dat+tA ya thA nu sa/ ka tsa da ta bud+d+ha ba shA ya/ pu na ra ka ma nA ya mU(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'o/ /de nas yang thabs bsangs la rdzas snyig?
283b3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyi me lha la phul te/ oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol zhes me lha gshogs
283b4(rgyud 'grel): su gsol/ /de nas dam tshig rang la bsdus nas 'bras can la sogs pa'i gtor ma sbyin no/ /nyung bar 'dod na bla ma'i zhal nas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin 'di la 'jug par bya'o/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sbyin sreg
283b5(rgyud 'grel): gi cho ga nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon dzA bi ra bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de ba bu N+ya ma ti dang chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur pa'o// //
283b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra po Na ha ma bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig med par de
283b7(rgyud 'grel): mi 'byung/ /des na de la 'jug pa brtsam/ /de la 'dir thab khung gru gsum pa bsgo lhor bstam pa'i nang du/ khro bo'i rdo rje sor brgyad pa bkong de/ thal ba dang sol bas nag por byugs la dri chu dang bong bu dang rnga
284a1(rgyud 'grel): mo'i rtug pas byug par bya'o/ /der mgal du ma'am/ /tsher ma can nam/ /skam po'i shing bcer te/ khag dang/ ba'i gcin dang/ bdud rtsi dang/ me tog nag po ni mchod yon no/ /dri mi zhim pa dang/ ro kha
284a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ sngon po'i me tog go /bdud rtsi lnga sbyar ba'i sos so/ /mar chen po'i mar me/ dri chu dang/ til nag po sbyar ba ni chab/ /dri chen dang mi sha bsres pa'i lha bshos te/ de rnams g.yas su bzhag par bya'o/ /dug dang khrag dang
284a3(rgyud 'grel): ske tshe dang/ lan tshwa dang/ nim pa dang/ da du ra dang/ bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres pa'i yungs mar rnams ni dgang gzar du blugs te khrag tu byas la dbul lo/ /shing tsher ma can gyi yam shing dang/ mar nag dang/ khrag dang/ dri chen
284a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dri chu dang/ mi rus dang/ skra dang/ sen mo dang/ dug dang/ ske tshe dang/ lan tshwa de rnams dang/ rkang rjes dang/ khyim bya'i sgo nga dang/ bya rog gi sha rnams dang/ por bu dang/ rnga mo'i rtug pa rnams ni bsreg rdzas te/ sha
284a5(rgyud 'grel): dang rus par bsam mo/ /de rnams ni g.yon du'o/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor byas la/ rdzas byin gyis brlabs nas bgegs bskrad do/ /rdol pa'am/ /sme sha can nam rdo las byung ba'am/ ri'i me blangs te/ bsar
284a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /oM badzra pA Ni mahA kro d+ha dzwA la dzwA la hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes pas sbyar ro/ /me 'bar ba'i nang du raM las thab khung bskyed la de'i nang du hUM las nyi ma'i steng du oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM las 'khor lo dang/ pad+ma dang
284a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjer gyur te de nas khro bo'i me lhe shin tu khros pa/ sku kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phro ba/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /g.yas na rdo rje dang skyabs sbyin/ /g.yon ni dril bu dang dbyug pa/ /raM las
284b1(rgyud 'grel): me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bsams te/ ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du byas nas de'i byin brlabs dang/ dbang bskur te/ khrus gsol nas zhal gdangs pa'i nang du mchod rdzas dang
284b2(rgyud 'grel): bsreg rdzas rnams 'dis dbul te/ oM badzra pA Ni ma hA b+hU ta dzA lA ya sarba b+hasmi ku ru sarba duSh+TaM mam che ge momA ra ya hUM phaT ces pa gsad par bya'o/ /de nas me 'bar brgyar gyur pa'am/ yang na de'i snying khar dpal phyag na rdo rje gos
284b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon po can sgrub thabs las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa bskyed nas ye shes sems dpa' snga ma bzhin bstims la/ de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa dang dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas phreng
284b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sngags la mA ra ya dang bcas pas mchod rdzas snga ma bzhin du dbul lo/ /yang dgang blugs phul te/ ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas thab bsangs te/ rdzas lhag ma rnams me lha la phul nas/ oM
284b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang gzhan gyi don rnams ni/ /bsgrub te sbyin bsreg bzhes nas kyang/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad nas kyang/ /bdag la sngags kyi dngos grub gsol zhes me lta gshegs su gsol lo/ /de'i rjes su dam tshig pa rang la
284b6(rgyud 'grel): bsdus te/ gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /nyung par 'dod na bla ma'i zhal nas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du 'di la 'jug par bya'o/ /phyag na rdo rje'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub
284b7(rgyud 'grel): bsdis? pa'i slob dpon dzA pa ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de ba pu N+ya ma ti dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye nI
285a1(rgyud 'grel): lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon bo can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba rnams
285a2(rgyud 'grel): ni ma rig mun pas bsgribs shing rkyen gyi ri bos non pa rnams/ /gsal ba'i ye shes nub cing 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying/ de 'dra'i 'gro ba mang po yid kyis mngon sum mthong/ /'gro ba de dag sa bon gnas dang rtsol rkyen gyis
285a3(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal mang po spyod cing gdugs pas zin gyur pa/ /de las thar pa'i thabs dag gzhan gyis mi nus te/ /srid 'joms sdug bsngal thar mdzad dbugs tsha mi shigs 'dzin/ /gdug pa'i nang rnams ma lus thar mdzad snying rjes
285a4(rgyud 'grel): khros/ /'jigs byed khro rgyal rngam pa'i gtso la dngos po kun gyis 'dud/ /de la rtag tu mos shing dang bas mngon sum snang bar mdzad/ /ji srid mnyes byas lhag lhas gnang ba byin/ /rang nyams myong la gdug pa 'dul la dbang bskur
285a5(rgyud 'grel): gces/ /de dbang bskur phyir 'khor lo chen po'i cho ga dran/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon mdun/ /slob ma snod dang ldan pa yis/ /maN+Dal zlum po khru gang tshang/ /byi dor legs byas me tog dgram/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi gtor ma bsham/
285a6(rgyud 'grel): snod ldan spyod lam legs byas te/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni/ /dus 'di nyid nas bzung nas ni/ /snying po byang chub thob kyi bar/ /bla ma dam par gsol 'debs kyis/ /bdag gi bla ma
285a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol/ /sems can ma rgal bsgral ba dang/ /ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang/ /dbugs ma phyud ba dbugs phyung dang/ /mya ngan mi 'da' zla ba dang/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsgrub pa dang/ /bla mar zhu bar khyod sgro'i?
285b1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon snang ba byin nas ni/ /slob mas ci 'byor pas mchod nas/ /dgos pa thams cad dri bar bya/ /lung rnams phog la bsnyen pa bya/ /thim nas sdig pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bdun byas te/ /bar chad bsal phyir gtor ma
285b2(rgyud 'grel): gtang/ /tshogs bsags phyir ni mchod pa bsham/ /mkha' 'gro ma la gtor ma gtang/ /de nas gong ma'i maN+Dal te/ /byi dor legs byas me tog dgram /spyod lam legs byas mchod pa dbul/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams
285b3(rgyud 'grel): cad dang/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i lha tshogs dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la/ /sgo gsum dang pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /mchod pa bla na med pas mchod/ /'khor ba thog ma med pa
285b4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /mtshams med lnga dang nye ba lnga/ /mi dge bcu dang lci ba brgyad/ /kha na ma tho la sogs pa/ 'phags pa'i tshogs la so sor bshags/ /rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas dang/ /'dod chags bral ba'i chos rnams dang/ /tshogs kyi
285b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhir gyur dge 'dun la/ /dad pa'i sems kyis skyabs su mchi/ /phyogs bcu mdza' yas zhing rnams na/ /mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /ring po ma lon thams cad la/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /ji srid 'khor ba ma
285b6(rgyud 'grel): stong bar/ /mya ngan mi 'da' gsol ba btab/ /'jig rten dge bcu ji snyed pa/ /nyan thos rang rgyal dge sogs bcas/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas 'gro don mdzad/ /de dag la ni yid rang ngo/ /dge bcu ji snyed spyod pa dang/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang
285b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu la sogs/ /byang chub chen por sngo bar bgyi/ /bdag gi lus 'di ji srid du/ /len pa rdo rje slob dpon dang/ /'khor lo chen po'i lha tshogs dang/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bsam pa la/ /dag yid dang bas dngul bar bgyi/ /
286a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub mchog gi rang bzhin can/ /sems can kun la khyab par gnas/ /ma rtogs 'khor bar 'khyams pa rnams/ /de dag don du sems bskyed do/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas sras bcas pa'i/ /bslab dang?
286a2(rgyud 'grel): slob par gyur pa yi/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims dang/ /sdom pa'i tshul khrims ldan pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos sdud tshul khrims dag /yang dag blangs te gnas bgyid do/ /dus 'di nyid nas bzung nas ni/ /'khor ba'i nyes pas ma

286a7(rgyud 'grel): bsran ta ka/ nas dang gro dang til dang ni/ /'bru sna bum pa'i nang du blug /gser dang dngul dang byi ru dang/ /mu tig man shel rin chen lnga/ /bum pa'i nang du blugs par bya/ /bu ram sbrang rtsi len chwa dang/ /mar kar til gyi mdza
286b1(rgyud 'grel): dang lnga/ /bum pa'i nang du blugs par bya'o/ /'o ma chu yis sbyangs pa yang/ /bum pa'i nang du blugs la bzhag /de dag thams cad blugs pa la/ /gzungs kyi phreng ba bzlas par bya'o/ /kha tshar ma nyams ras yug gis/ /bum pa'i

287a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed nas/ /yang dang yang du brtan por bya/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo bskyed pa ni/ /sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin/ /stong pa nyid ni bsgom pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ting nge 'dzin/ /lha bskyed gsal bar bsgom pa'o/ /las rgyal
287a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi ting nge 'dzin/ /ye shes lha la mchod pa nas/ /dbang bskur yan chad bsgom pa'o/ /skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /mig tu ma dang Ta las ni/ /nyi ma zla ba bsam par bya'o/ /lha yis dkyil 'khor mkha' la gdab

290a3(rgyud 'grel): dang brgya byin dri za dang/ /chu lha ku be ra yi gang na/ /dbus su nyi ma zla ba'i steng/ /hUM dang nyi ma zla ba bsam/ /de yi bar du sa bon las/ /gtso bo yab yum sku bskyed de/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni/ /rang 'dod lha yi nga rgyal bya/ /
290a4(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag nyis gsal ba dar/ /dpral bar khrag gi thig le bya/ /sngags 'di brjod cing dkyil 'khor skor/ /lan gsum bskor la shar du 'jug /oM badzra d+ha ro tsha ma ya swAhA/ /sngags de brjod cing ting 'dzin gyis/ /gzhal
290a5(rgyud 'grel): yas khang ni sgo dbye'o/ /bla re rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs/ /dar dpyangs dang ni yol bar bcas/ /lnga ldi dar dang ras kyis klubs/ /grwa bzhir mnga' bzhi me yong bzhi/ /stegs bu'i zur la dgod par bya/ /zhal gsil la
290a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs mchod pa'i rdzas/ /ji ltar 'byor bar dgram par bya/ /phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma dang/ /tshogs kyi zhal zas phyogs bzhir dgram/ /skad cig me yi ting 'dzin dang/ /bskyed tshul rgyas pa'i rim pa yis/ /'dod yon
290a7(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga/ /skad cig ma yi ye shes su/ /gsal bar byin gyis brlabs la bzhag /de nas rdo rje slob dpon dang/ /las kyi phyag rgya byin brlabs la/ /mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs byas nas/ /gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba bya/ /
290b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs ka yi ni sa bon las/ /phyogs bcur 'od zer 'phros pa las/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas yab yum bcas/ /spyi bo gtsug tu spyan drangs la/ /tshangs pa'i bu ga'i nang nas gzhug /gsang ba'i rdo rje lam nas dbyung/ /yum gyi pad+ma'i go sogs?
290b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ /sgrub pa'i thabs nas gsungs pa bzhin/ /yab yum sgo mar bcas pa bsam/ /oM spha ra Na hUM phaT/ /sngags de brjod pas rang rang gi/ /gnas su gdan la bzhugs par bsgom/ /de nas sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /phyag rgya ye shes 'khor
290b3(rgyud 'grel): lo rnams/ /mdun gyi mkha' la spyan drangs te/ /bsad gtor bya zhing mchod pa dbul/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim/ /mkha' la bgeg la bstim byas nas/ /nus par lan nas byin brlabs ni/ /'bru gsum sngags kyis byin
290b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab/ /spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur ro/ /ya bskyod dbul brgyan par bsam/ /skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /phyi nang bstan skyod spyan drang ngo/ /zhal gsil gdan dang sku khrus gsol/ /de nas mchod pa rnam lnga
290b5(rgyud 'grel): dbul/ /bshos dar gal zas sna tshogs dbul/ /rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs dbul/ /gong gi mchod rdzas lhag ma yas/ /phyi yi bstan skyong rgyas par mchod/ /de nas sgrub khang phyi rol tu/ /'byung po'i gtor ma gtar bar bya'o/
290b6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rim ba de rnams ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa yis bya'o/ /de nas skad cig ting 'dzin gyis/ /zhal gsum phyag drug nga rgyal byas/ /nang dang gsang ba bla med dang/ /dngos dag ting nge 'dzin gyis dbul/ /thabs dang shes
290b7(rgyud 'grel): rab gnyis med pa'i/ /kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las/ /bgegs rigs stong phrag 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /'khor lo'i bdag po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi/ /kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las/ /dri za'i gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /
291a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud las rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi/ /kha sbyor nyi ma'i 'phro 'du las/ /gshin rje gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /rdo rje gzi brjid phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba
291a2(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las/ /chu lha'i gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /dam sgra sgrogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi/ /kha sbyor nyi zla'i 'phro 'du las/ /gnod sbyin gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /rdo
291a3(rgyud 'grel): rje phrin las phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'byung ba lnga'i bdag nyid che/ /mdzes ldon 'od zer can dang ni/ /mdangs ldan sgra dbyangs rlung 'byin te/ /skyed byed las kun sgrub pa las/ /'gugs shing sdud pa sdom zhing 'dzin/ /
291a4(rgyud 'grel): mdza' rtul las rnams sgrub la bstod/ /ces bstod pa rnams kyang dbul bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin gyis brlabs/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod
291a5(rgyud 'grel): du med/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu byung/ /de bzhin nyed las nges par skyes/ /bden pa des ni dkyil 'khor du/ /gzugs brnyan gsal ba'i slob ma ni/ /kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog /de nas rdo rje slob ma ni/ /khrus byas spyod
291a6(rgyud 'grel): lam mdzes pa yis/ /sgrub pa'i grogs mchog mkhas pa yis/ /sgrub khang phyi ru tshig 'di bsgrag /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /ma mthong snod dang mi ldan na/ /su la'ang
291a7(rgyud 'grel): ston par ma byed cig /de nas bdud rtsi lnga yi chu/ /blangs nas byin gyis brlab par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi snying po 'di/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la sbyin/ /'di ni rdo rje dam tshig chu/ /srungs shig ma srungs sreg par byed/ /srungs
291b1(rgyud 'grel): na dngos grub ster bar byed/ /bdud rtsi 'di ni myang bar gyis/ /oM pany+tsa mi to da ka Tha lcA zhes glud/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /slob ma lha ru byin gyis brlab/ /sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dam pa yis/ /gdong g.yogs ngad ram ras kyis bcing
291b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu lag tu gtang/ /rdo rje nas bzung ha ha yis/ /sngags kyi dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor/ /de na sa yol ba'i nang khrid la/ /phyag 'tshal me tog dor bar bya/ /lha rnams gang la phob pa ste/ /slob dpon gyis ni blta bar bya/ /de nas
291b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzas kyi dud pa gtang/ /rdo rje slob dpon thugs ka nas/ /kha dag dmar po'i a bton te/ /slob ma'i snying khar gzhug par bya/ /slob mas nyams kyi bde ba bsgom/ /'phyir dang ldeg pa'i rtags byung na/ /de nyid brtan pa'i yan lag bya/ /de
291b4(rgyud 'grel): nas phyag na rdo rje nyid/ /slob ma'i spyi bor spyan drangs la/ /yi ge hUM du gyur par bsam/ /de gyur rtse lnga de nyid can/ /zhu nas che dam pa'i bu gar zhugs/ /snying gi dkyil du lha ru gyur/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pI Na tsit+ta maN+Dal badzra sa ya ma rten
291b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di brjod la gsal bar bsam/ /mthu stobs phyag na rdo rje ni/ /khyod kyi snying du yang dag zhugs/ /rtags tu yi dam lha yin gyis/ /tshul 'di smra bar ma byed cig /gal te tshul 'di smras nas ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /
291b6(rgyud 'grel): nga ni phyag na rdo rje ste/ /nga yis bsgo ba'i las nyon cig /ma mos brnyas par ma byed cig /gal te khyod kyis brnyas na ni/ /dam tshig 'dis ni bsreg par byed/ /che ba chen po'i gnas su sreg /rang bzhin rnam dag bdag nyid lus/ /dpa' 
291b7(rgyud 'grel): bo dbang phyug ma ye gnas/ /dri med rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni/ /bu khyod kyis ni lta bar bgyis/ /gdong g.yogs bkrol te 'khor lo yis/ /de bzhin nyid ni bstan par bya/ /gtso bo sgo bar bcas par bstan/ /de nas rdo rje slob ma yis/ /spyod
292a1(rgyud 'grel): lam legs par bsrungs pa yis/ /bsam gyis mi khyab dam chos snod/ /dbang bskur dam pa rtsa jed du gsol/ /de mas bum pa rnams kyi chu/ /rnam rgyal las kyi bum par blug /chu de mi dmigs stong pa
292a2(rgyud 'grel): las/ /mthing kha'i mdod can hUM du gyur/ /de gyur rtsi lnga de nyid can/ /de las 'od 'phros 'dus pa las/ /sangs rgyas mi bsdod par gyur/ /sa bon las ni 'od 'phros nas/ /ye shes mi bskyod spyan drangs te/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis
292a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med bstim/ /de la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /de nyid chu ru gyur pa yis/ /slob ma la ni dbang bskur ro/ /sku gsum dam tshig las byung ba'i/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /mi bspyod par ni dbang
292a4(rgyud 'grel): bskur ro/ /oM badzra da d+ha shU n+ya tA a b+hi'i ny+tsa mi/ /slob ma mi bskyod pa ru bsam/ /de la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /cod pan mi dmigs oM ru gyur/ /oM gyur rin chen oM gyis mtshan/ /de las 'od 'phros 'dus pa las/ /sangs
292a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan bsam/ /sa bon las ni 'od 'phros pas/ /ye shes rin chen 'byung ldan ni/ /mdun gyi mkha' la spyan drangs te/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim/ /'bru gsum sngags kyi byin gyis brlab/ /de nas mchod
292a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam lnga dngul/ /de nyid cod pan gyur pa yis/ /slob ma la ni dbang bskur ro/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal srid de/ /dbu rgyan rin chen bla na med/ /dbu rgyan rin chen mchog 'gro ma/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra sa ma ya
292a7(rgyud 'grel): tA dz+nya na ra ta sa b+ha ba hUM/ /a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /slob ma rin chen 'byung ldan bsam/ /de la mchod pa rnam lngas mchod/ /rdo rje mi dmigs dzri du gyur/ /de gyur pad+ma dzi gas mtshan/ /de las nyod 'phros 'dus pa las/ /sangs rgya sa 'od dpag med du
292b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur/ /sa bon las ni 'od zer 'phros/ /ye shes sems dpa' 'od dpag med/ /mdun gyi mkha' la spyan drangs te/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim/ /'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ /de la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /de nyid rdo
292b2(rgyud 'grel): rjed gyur ba yis/ /slob ma la ni dbang bskur ro/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsal ba las/ /chos rnams kun gyi sgor gyur pa/ /rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM pra dz+nyA a be sha dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /slob ma 'od dang
292b3(rgyud 'grel): med du bsam/ /de la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /dril bu mi dmigs khaM du gyur/ de gyur ral gri khaM gis mtshan/ /de las 'od 'phros 'dus pa las/ /sangs rgyas don yod grub par gyur/ /sa bon las ni 'od 'phros pas/ /ye shes
292b4(rgyud 'grel): don yod grub pa ni/ /mdun gyi mkha' la spyan drangs te/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim/ /'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ /de la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /de nyid dril bur gyur pa yis/ /slob ma la ni dbang bskur
292b5(rgyud 'grel): dod/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /'gro don nyams med byed pa yi/ /mchod pa'i rdzas rnams rdzogs byed pa/ /dril bu las kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM tiSh+ThA nu ta na dz+nyA na pa te badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu gnyis kha sbyor
292b6(rgyud 'grel): tshul du bsnol la sbyin/ /lag tu gtang la gsil du gzhug/ /slob ma don yod grub par bsam/ /de la mchod pa rnam lngas mchod/ /slob ma mi dmiT oM du gyur/ /de gyur ba 'khor lo oM gyis mtshan/ /de las 'od 'phros 'dus pha
292b7(rgyud 'grel): las/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad gyur/ /sa bon las ni 'od zer 'phros/ /ye shes rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /mdun gyi mkha' la spyan drangs te/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim/ /'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis
293a1(rgyud 'grel): brlab/ /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas/ /byang chub snying po'i bar du ni/ /cis kyang mi chod mi shig pa'i/ /rdo rje ming du rab tu grags/ /oM tre tsa krA mo g+ha dz+nyA na badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /slob ma rnam par snang mdzad
293a2(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /de la mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang /dril bu dang ni ming gi dbang/ /rig pa yi ni dbang lnga'o/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag rgyu/ /dbang lnga yis ni thob pa yin/ /ma rig pa las 'das nas kyang/ /ye
293a3(rgyud 'grel): shes lnga ni rim gyis 'thob/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /lag tu sbos thogs dril bu gsil/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rgyas par mchod/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /lan gsum bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /bcom ldan
293a4(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyis byin brlabs ni/ /'di la 'go bar mdzad du gsol/ /sngags kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ /rtul zhugs brtan pa mdzad du gsol/ /slob ma'i lag tu me tog gtang/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig lan gsum bzlas/ /de nas rdo rje
293a5(rgyud 'grel): slob ma yis/ /lha dang slob dpon bcas pa la/ /me tog phul te tshig 'di brjod/ /bcom ldan bdag gis bzung lags kyis/ /bdag la 'go bar mdzad du gsol/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /rdo rje lag tu blang byas te/ /ye shes
293a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjer byin brlabs nas/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /mthu sdobs mnga' bdag phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bzung/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM badzra sa ma ya staM b+ha ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /sngags
293a7(rgyud 'grel): de brjod la slob ma yi/ /lag tu rdo rje gtang bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /rgyan dang cha lugs thams cad pa/ /slo ma la ni bskon la bzhag /zhal gsum phyag drug sgom du gzhug /rgyan dang cha lugs 'bar ba ni/ /dpa' 
293b1(rgyud 'grel): po bu yis blang bar gyis/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /phyi rol nang na yang dag gnas/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni he he/ sngags de brjod la brtan par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /thub pa chen po'i cho lugs zhugs/
293b2(rgyud 'grel): slob ma la ni chos gos bskon/ /da ni shAkya seng ge ste/ /rgyan cha phyag na rdo rje bcas/ /'di kun nga yi sprul pa ste/ /ma 'jigs 'jigs par ma byed cig /khyod ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs las thar/ /mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing dag tu/ /
293b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur/ /oM badzra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM a b+hi'i ny+tsa mi/ /sngags de brjod la bsrungs la bzhag /bu khyod 'khor lo'i dbang bskur gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/ /phyag na rdo rje'i mthu stobs can/ /can de bzhin
293b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs par lung bstan no/ /khams gsum bdag po rgyal srid che/ /dpal ldan yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas/ /bdud kyi sde rnams bcom zin gyis/ /khyod kyis grong khyer mchog tu zhugs/ /oM nI lA ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Na se daM dsa ma
293b5(rgyud 'grel): a stwaM b+ha ya a b+hi'i ny+tsa mi/ /sngags de brjod la lung bstan no/ /slob ma spyod lam mdzes pa yis/ /mtshan ma med pa 'gro ba'i don/ /gang dag bdag gis byed nus pas/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur che/ /dpa' ba chen po bdag
293b6(rgyud 'grel): la gsol/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchod par bya/ /de nas seng ge'i khri bshams la/ /slob ma gzhag ste dbang bskur ro/ /ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang/ /lha rnams kyis ni sku khrus gsol/ /de bzhin
293b7(rgyud 'grel): lha yi bdud rtsi yis/ /sku khrus dam pa gsol bar bya/ /oM badzra a b+hi She ka a b+hi Shi ri lca mi/ /dud pud rnga chen brdung du gzhug /po ti glegs paM lag tu gtang/ /chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ro/ /slob dpon thugs kar zla ba bsam/ /
294a1(rgyud 'grel): de yi steng du yig 'bru bsam/ /de gyur rtse lnga de nyid can/ /de yi lte ba'i nang du ni/ /lha yi 'khor lo bsam par bya/ /rdo rje slob ma'i snying khar yang/ /zla ba hUM dang rdo rje bsam/ /de yi lte ba stong pa ru/ /slob
294a2(rgyud 'grel): dpon thugs las 'khor lo bton/ /slob ma'i stong khar bstim la bzhag/ /ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs la/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bstim/ /'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab/ /spyan la sogs pas dbang bskur/ /rnal
294a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor 'di ni shes pa yis/ /mi bya ba ni gang yang med/ /dpa' bo chen po'i nga yi bkas/ /'dod yon lnga la spyad par gyis/ /oM su pra tiSh+Tha swAhA/ /de nas rjes su gnang ba'i dbang/ /slob ma la ni bskur bar bya/ /deng nas bzung nas
294a4(rgyud 'grel): bu khyod kyis/ /lus dang srog la mi phangs par/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ 'gro ba'i don ni dpag med byos/ /sems can gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /rten cing 'brel pa'i chos dang ldan/ /khams gsum de ltar
294a5(rgyud 'grel): shes nas ni/ /sems can don ni mtshungs med byos/ /de nas slob ma'i dbang bcu ste/ /phal cher bum pa la brten bas/ /bum pa'i dbang zhes brjod pa yin/ /phyir mi ldog dang rjes su gnang/ /rdo rje slob dpon dbang
294a6(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /lus ni dri ma 'khrud pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa yi sgrib pa spang/ /sa ni dang po thob par byed/ /dbang bskur rim pa bcu gnyis so/ /de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur te/ /dang por snod ldan slob ma yis/ /tshogs dang dpa' po'i ston
294a7(rgyud 'grel): mo bya/ /shes rab ma ni bcu gnyis sam/ /bcu drug nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar/ /rgyal rigs rje rigs bram ze'i rims/ /mig kyus ring shing sha mdangs dkar/ /mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can/ /lus la nu 'bur
294b1(rgyud 'grel): kha dri zhim/ /smras na dag 'jam mdzes par 'gro/ yon tan gzhan yang ldan btsal te/ /slob dpon mdun du maN+Dal ni/ /gru bzhi lham pa khru gang tshad/ /byi dor legs byas me tog dgram/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /
294b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang spyod thabs dang ldan pa yi/ /shes rab chen po'i snod 'gyur phyir/ /dbang bskur chen mo mdzad du gsol/ /gsang spyod thabs dang ldan pa yi/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med/ /bdud rtsi chen po'i ro myang phyir/ /dbang bskur 'di la khyod
294b3(rgyud 'grel): spro ba ma/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /lha mo 'di ni khyad par can/ /yon tan mdza' yas ldan pa ste/ /gsang spyod thabs kyi sbyor ba las/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur mdzad du gsol/ /de nas rdul tshon gzhal yas
294b4(rgyud 'grel): khang/ /nang du gsang ba'i yum bzhag nas/ /de nas sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi yum/ /phang na gnas pa'i lha mo rnams/ /spyi bo'i gtsug tu spyan drangs te/ /tshangs pa'i bu ga'i laM du zhugs/ /rdo rje bum pa'i 'khor
294b5(rgyud 'grel): lo la/ /rgyal ba sangs rgyas lnga ru gyur/ /rgyan dang cha lugs gsal bar bsgom/ /mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab pa dang/ /gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba bya/ /yab yum 'khril pa'i sgom pa yis/ /ye shes gsal ba'i byang chub
