353a5(rgyud 'grel): mdun gyi mkha' la bzhugs su gsol/ /mchod yon la sogs dbul bar bya/ /gnod sbyin drag po'i sngags kyis ni/ /bgegs rnams ma lus bzlog par bya/ /rnam par rtog pa spang pa dang/ /lus ngag nus pa mthu bskyed phyir/ /lha rnams
353a6(rgyud 'grel): so so snyim par bya/ /yi ge rnam pa gsum dag ni/ /dag byed sku gsung cho gar ldan/ /dang por gsol 'debs cho ga yis/ /mchog rnams kun tu bskul bas su/ /bde gshegs thams cad mnyes nas kyang/ /lha mo klu len gar
353a7(rgyud 'grel): byed mas/ /bdud rtsi bum pa thogs nas kyang/ /rim bzhin dbang ni bskur bar byas/ /so so'i rigs kyi lha 'dzin 'gyur/ /mchog rnams kun tu bskul bas su/ /bde gshegs thams cad mnyes nas kyang/ /slob dpon mi bskyod
353b1(rgyud 'grel): yab yum la/ /gnyis dang gsum gyi man ngag blang/ /de nas lha la mchod pa dbul/ /phyi mchod nang mchod gsang ba'i mchang/ /mchod pa tshul bzhin dbul bar bya/ /phyi ni ji bzhin gzhan dang mthun/ /nang ni lha yi bde bskyed pa/ /cig shos lnga chu
353b2(rgyud 'grel): byas pa yin/ /brtag pa ldan pa de dag ni/ /gtso bo lnga yang bya ba yin/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /gnyis pa la sogs sbyar ba dang/ /des ni dang po'i don kyang bya/ /rigs dang rtags ni ldan gyur pa'i/ /nga nyid snyed pa de la byung/ /de dang dur khrod
353b3(rgyud 'grel): byung pa yi/ /snang ba med pa mchod yin no/ /lnga dang bcu ru sbyar ba yi/ /yid du 'ong ba dpag med mchog /nga ni nang gi don bstan to/ /gu hya don ni bstan bya ba/ grol dang phyag rgya gnyis su bstan/ /grol gyis ying kyi gzugs sbrul to/ /phyag
353b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya rtags ldan dngos su 'jug /mi ldan byin gyis brlabs par bya/ /de rnams cho ga'i yan lag ni/ /rten dang brten pa'i tshul nyid kyis/ /dang bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /rten ni as su byin gyis brlab/ /brten pa hUM gis byin gyis brlab
353b5(rgyud 'grel): rten dang brten pa'i gtso bo dang/ /yan lag rnams la lha rnams kyis/ /byin gyis brlab pa bstim par bya/ /d+har ma e yi nang she du/ /gsum rtsa ma yi dkyil 'khor bsam/ /rin chen pho brang nang shed du/ /rtag pa nyid kyang bsam par bya/ /
353b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas dang g.yon gyis thabs shas rab/ /lnga lnga yis ni gnas su bstan/ /bskyong cing dgyes par byed pa nyid/ /de yi grogs 'gyur gnyis dang bzhi/ /'gyed par byed dang bskyod par byed/ /spro bar byed par sbung par byed/ /de nyid spro bar byed
353b7(rgyud 'grel): ba yi/ /bde par sin tu bzhes? ni/ /khyad par mchog du gyur pa ni/ /gsang don mchog tu spro ba'o/ /gnyis med spro ba'i 'od zer sogs/ /de sogs cho ga rgyas par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu lngan pa yis/ /rdo rje glu dang ldan pas bstod/ /hUm gsar
354a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor pho brang mchog /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /mthun pa'i don rnams ston mdzad pa/ /rdo rje 'khor bcas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje mi 'gyur 'jigs byed pa/ /khams gsum
354a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bar byed pa'i mchog /dpal ldan nag po yon tan mchog /gsung gi sgra sgrogs rgyal po mchog /'phrin las rang bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /'byung po 'jigs byed gnod sbyin mchog /dgra la rnga ma ba'i zar byed ma/ /rdo rje
354a3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkhar 'gro ba'i mchog /'jigs pa'i byed pa'i sku 'chang ma/ /'od kyis gsal byed mdzes pa'i mchog /yid du 'ong ba'i yon tan ma/ /lta spyod bzang bar byed pa'i mchog /sgra dang gar gyis mnyes mdzad ma/ /rnam par
354a4(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa gcod pa'i mchog /'byung po zhal du rdub byed ma/ /chags pa'i mdog can khrag 'thung ma/ /sa bdag dang ni dri za'i mchog /lha'i 'khor lo tshogs rnams la/ /bstod cing gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /drag po 'jigs pa'i
354a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la/ /bstod cing gus bas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bstod cing mchod pa'i man ngag ni/ /nyid kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /sprul nas nyid la mchod par bya/ /'khor lo gzhan rnams kyang ni mchod/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom
354a6(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ /dang po gtso bo brtan byas la/ /de nas 'khor lo rim gyis brtan/ /gtso bo rim gyis brtan pa dang/ /'khor lo rim gyis brtan pa dang/ /rdzogs par lta ba gnyis su bya/ /dang bor dbyug tshod phyed tsam la/ /de 'og dbugs
354a7(rgyud 'grel): chod gcig tsam la/ /de 'og 'pho ba gcig tu bya/ /thun ched rnams kyang rims kyis so/ /de ltar brtan par gyur nas ni/ /che bar 'dod na che bar ro/ /chung bar 'dod na chung ba nyid/ /mang bor spros nas nyung bar bsdu/ /nyung bar bsdus
354b1(rgyud 'grel): nas mang bor spro/ /kha dog ji ltar 'dod ba bzhin/ /ldang ba yang zhing gzi brjid ldan/ /yun ring btang yang mi 'chor la/ /rlung yang ji ltar 'dod par thub/ /bdud rtsi zas kyis 'tsho bas byed/ /des su bskyed ba mthar phyin te/ /bskyed ba mthar phyin dus
354b2(rgyud 'grel): su ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mdzad spyod ston/ /mdzad sbyod bstan pa'i dus dag tu/ /mdzad spyod bstan pa'i las rnams bstan/ /de dus gsal zhing gsal gyur nas/ /yang nas yang du brtag par bya'o/ /man ngag zab mo ngon ston pa/ /gus bas
354b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab bar bya/ /de ru bzlog ba'i don ston yang/ /mi 'jigs the tshom med pas su/ /man ngag bdud rtsi blang bar bya'o/ /gal te bskyod pas skyo gyur na/ /bsgom ba ma nus las gzhan phyir/ /bzlas brjod man ngag rgyas pa rnams/ /
354b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du bstan pa mang mod kyang/ /bzlas brjod man ngag bdud rtsi 'di/ /rin chen lta bu'i gang zag la/ /rna ba brgyud de 'ongs pa 'di/ /bstan par bya yos gus par nyon/ /snying kha'i 'khor lo'i man ngag la/ /sems dpa' gsum gyis man
354b5(rgyud 'grel): ngag rdzogs/ /'od zer dkar po 'ja' tshon tshul/ /yi ge 'phro ba'i man ngag dgod/ /'khor zhing spros bas gyen du spros/ /lce yi rdo rje rtse mo las/ /lha yi zhal du spro bar bya/ /mchod der gnas ni gang 'dod nas/ /slar la 'khor bas sgrib ba sbyang/ /sgra
354b6(rgyud 'grel): cher ma yis sgra chung min/ /yan lag ma nyams bzlas brjod byed/ /de ni phyi yi tshul du bstan/ /nang gi bzlas brjod bstan pa ni/ /a ba d+hu tI'i nang shed nas/ /kha dog lnga ldan rlung byung ste/ /de nyid rta yi tshul du bstan/ /phyir 'gyur rta la oM ni zhon/ /
354b7(rgyud 'grel): nang du zhon pa'i hUM yin no/ /gnas par byed pa A(rgyud 'grel): nyid yin/ /de ltar sgro zhing bsdu ba la/ /dang bor bcu la bstan par bya/ /de nas nyi shu la bstan no/ /de ltar gyur pa'i rim pa'i mthar/ /nang gi rims kyi bsdu bar bya'o/ /snying kha ri thig le'i gnas
355a1(rgyud 'grel): dag la/ /'dzin par nus so mchog yin no/ /de nyid gtan la dbab na ni/ /nyi khri chig stong drug brgya ni/ /nyin mtshan gcig la rgyu ba yin/ /de yang gnas kyi sde tshan sdu ba ni/ /dang por bcu drug gnyis par ni/ /
355a2(rgyud 'grel): sum cu du ni shes par bya/ /bcu drug bcu gnyis brgyad du bsdu/ /bzhi dang gnyis su bsdu ba'o/ /phyir byung sgo yi 'byong tshul ni/ /g.yas dang g.yon dang gnyis ka yang/ shin tu phra ba'i tshul du byed/ /med dang brlung dang sa dang ni/ /chu yi rang bzhin
355a3(rgyud 'grel): dmar dang sngo/ /ser dang dkar ba nyid du 'dod/ /pad+ma las dang rin chen dang/ /rdo rje thabs dang shes rab ni/ /de yi nus pa de ltar snang/ /dang po 'byung byed gnas dang ni/ /longs spyod chos dang sbrul pa dang/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'dod/ /
355a4(rgyud 'grel): de yang bsdu na gnyis su snang/ /gso bar byed pa srog 'dzin yin/ /phyi dang nang gi zhes kyang bya/ /'chi byed cha rnams ma nyams par/ /rnam pa gnyis su bstan pa yin/ /de ltar spyod pa la sogs rnams/ /dngos po'i gnas lugs yin pas
355a5(rgyud 'grel): na/ /sngon du 'gro ba shin tu gces/ /bzlas pa'i don la mi 'jug gi /yang na sngon du song ba yis/ /rdzogs pa'i don la 'jug par bya/ /dngos po'i gnas lugs bstan pa ni/ /rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub sems/ /de yi spros pas ma bstan
355a6(rgyud 'grel): yang/ /bsngas pa'i don ni gsung du 'dus/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo gnas dag tu/ /rtsa yi 'dab ma brgyad yin te/ /de yi dbus su d+hU tI gnas/ /de yi dkyil na 'ong kyi ni/ /kha dog lnga ldan dkyil shed nas/ /thig le'i rang bzhin byang
355a7(rgyud 'grel): chub skyems/ /bzhugs pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nyid la ni mu stegs kyis/ /log par rtog pas bdud du 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog gis ni/ /de nyid nges par rtog pas su/ /dngos grub rnam nyid de las 'byung/ /de
355b1(rgyud 'grel): bas rnal 'byor nan tan gyis/ /bla ma mnyes par byas nas kyang/ /bla ma'i zhal gyi sgo nas ni/ /de nyid man ngag shes par bya/ /kha dog lnga ldan de nyid la/ /dang po bstan par btan nas ni/ /de nas rtags rnams byung ba dang/ /thig le nyid la brten par bya/ /
355b2(rgyud 'grel): de la brtan nas sbro ba dang/ /bsdu ba'i sbyor ba shes par bya/ /de nyid brtan par gyur ba na/ /bde dang shin tu bde ba dang/ /bde ba chen po thob par 'gyur/ /de 'og nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor la/ /zhag bdun bar du gnas pa 'byung/ /bdud rtsi 'dim
355b3(rgyud 'grel): gang lus khyab bas/ /bdud rtsi zlas kyis gso bar byed/ /de 'og sgyu ma lta bu yis/ /de brgyad dag la bltas pas su/ /de nyid nges par thugs su chud/ /de 'og stong ba'i man nag la/ /man ngag stobs kyis zhugs bas su/ /de nyid kho nar nges par
355b4(rgyud 'grel): mthong/ /de nas 'gro ba gzhan don la/ /mos ba ma yin dngos su ni/ /'jug pa'i stobs dang ldan bar gyur/ /nyin mtshan phrugs re dags yang/ /bde gshegs mang bo'i dkyil 'khor ston/ /de yi man ngag pa na rnams ni/ /ma lus shes par
355b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba yin/ /de ltar gzhan don mthar phyin bas/ / rang don lhun grub phyag rgya'i mchog /skad cig gcig la shes par bya/ /phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i mchog /khyad par phyag rgya mchog rnams ni/ /rim pa bzhin du 'grub pa ste/ /sras po tshul
355b6(rgyud 'grel): ni rdzogs nas byung/ /yab kyi don ni rdzogs pa yin/ /de ltar rdzogs pa'i man ngag ni/ /rnal 'byor grol lam pa la bstan/ /phyag rgya'i lam la 'jug tshul ni/ /rtags dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya ma/ /rtags dang ldan par btsal bar bya/ /de la brten
355b7(rgyud 'grel): nas ye shes ni/ /skye ba thabs kyi man ngag kyang/ /dang por byin brlab la sogs bya/ /de nas man ngag thun tshod dang/ /gzung ba'i thabs ni shes bar bya/ /de la brten par gyur nas ni/ /dngos grub kyang ni thob bar 'gyur/ /de la mngon par zhen
356a1(rgyud 'grel): chags na/ /mchog ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de yi zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /nang gi phyag rgya nyid la brlabs/ /de la brtan par gyur na ni/ /de yi zhen pa bzlogs pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya tum mo'i mchog /de nyid la ni
356a2(rgyud 'grel): bslab pa'i phyir/ /'khor lo la soT rdzoT byas la/ /dang po 'byed 'dzugs spyor ba yis/ /thabs kyi rim pa bslab bar bya/ /dmar po chen po spros shes la/ /rtags rnams rim pa lnga po 'byung/ /de 'og spro bsdu'i sbyor ba yis/ /dgug dang mnan
356a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rim pa yang/ /dang po bslabs nas 'di la bstan/ /de la lobs par ma gyur na/ /'di ru bzlogs pa'i man ngag bstan/ /de 'og lhan cig ma yin na/ /man ngag stobs la zhugs pa yis/ /nam mkha' i bdud rtsi 'khor lo ni/ /rim la
356a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas rten med rnal 'byor ma/ /de nyid la ni 'jug par bya/ /yod dang med pa'i mdza' sogs kyi/ rtog pa thams cad 'jigs pa'i mchog /kun tu zang po'i don rtogs 'gyur/ /de ltar rtogs pa'i man ngag ni/
356a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab snying rje ldan pa dang/ /bla ma la gus brtson 'grus ldan/ /g.yo sgyu med pa'i bsam pa yis/ /yid du 'ong ba'i rdzas kyi mchogs 'bul bar byed pa bstan par bya/ /'di ni rin chen gang zag yin/ /dang po man ngag thob bya'i phyir/ /g.yo
356a6(rgyud 'grel): sgyu'i bsam pa ldan bas su/ /shin tu gus pas tshul pa byed/ /man ngag thob bar gyur nas ni/ /bla ma la ni rgyab kyis byogs/ /dmyal pa yi ni rgyu sogs pa/ /de ni rgyun du spong ba yin/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan nas ni/ /skabs 'di ro bsrung
356a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'khor lo ni/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lor bstan pa yin/ /dur khrod kyi ni ras ma la/ /'khor bo'i rim pa rtsam pa yin/ /de med gyur na grog 'am/ /shing shun dag la bya ba yin/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bris nas ni/ /dbus su snying po'i don
356b1(rgyud 'grel): bstan la/ /phyogs su bzhi bo don ni bstan/ /mtshams ni 'grub bar byed pa yin/ /'khor lo rtsibs kyi mtshams su ni/ /gang yin pa'i mir rnams ni/ /phyi rol mu khyud bzang po la/ /thabs dang shes rab yi ge dgong/ /de ltar 'khor lo brtsams nas nis?
356b2(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal mchod pa la sogs bsham/ /bdag nyid rnal 'byor rdzogs byas la/ /da yang lha yi 'khor lo bskyed/ /ye shes lha la mchod byas la/ /gsol ba btab ste gnyis su bsraM/ /de nas bsrung ba'i sngags bzlas bya/ /so so pa'i rtsa sngags mong lan/?
356b3(rgyud 'grel): bar du mir rnams bcug nas ni/ /de nas bsrung ba'i sngags gdags bya/ /sngags rnams kyang ni bstan bya ste/ /oM na mo nAM lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye hU hUM dang/ oM tre le kya ba ji ya hUM phaT/ oM me hA ka la ro Sha na hUM phaT/ oM bai sha
356b4(rgyud 'grel): ba Na ya hUM phaT/ oM a mraM ta ka N+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra yak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra bi ta li hUM bar/ oM badzra Da kI ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra be ra ya hUM phaT/ i bidta ya hUM phaT/ /oM na mo me ha ra ya hUM phaT/ oM sa ma nas te d+ha dri ya hUM phaT/ oM ba sha
356b5(rgyud 'grel): ti rti ya hUM phaT/ oM pra ti sa ta maM ma hUM phaT/ oM shas ga ba la hUM phaT/ oM rA ga ta bri ta ya hUM phaT/ oM ma sa d+ha k+Shi ni hUM phaT/ oM nI lA bar d+ha ra badzra pa Ni hUM phaT/ zhes pa ni drag po'i sngags bsdus pa'o/ /swAhA zhes pa ni zhi ba'i'o/ /oM zhes pa ni rgyas pa'i
356b6(rgyud 'grel): bo/ /ho zhes pa ni dgang ge'o/ /dkrA rakA zhes pa ni bsrung ba'i'o/ /bsrung ba'i sngags ni 'di dag la/ /bar du ming ni gzhug par bya/ /bsrung ba'i 'khro lo de dag kyang/ /bzhi tshan bzhi yis bsrung ba dang/ /gtso bo nying dang bcas te bsrung/ /yang na sde tshan
356b7(rgyud 'grel): so sor bsung/ /gtso bo gcig pus bsrung ba yin/ /yang na so sor ro ngas kyang/ /bsrung ba'i chog shes par bya/ /thams cad kun gyis bsgrung ba yi/ /'khor lo bca' ba'i thabs bstan pa/ /dang po 'khor lo brgyad pa la/ /ris pa gnyis pa bcu gnyis dang?/
357a1(rgyud 'grel): de 'og rim pa bcu drug pa'o/ /mdza' ma mu khyud gnyis dang ldan/ /dang po gtso bo'i rim pas dgod/ /de 'og sde tshan gnyis pa dgod/ /tha ma sde tshan gnyis su bstan/ /mu khyud zlum po gnyis la ni/ /shes rab thabs kyi ye ge dgong/ /
357a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rim pa ni 'dra'i gzhung/ /rnam pa gsum du shes par bya/ /zhi bar bya dang dbang du bsdu/ /rgyas dang drag sogs gzhan dag kyang/ /man ngag gis ni sbyor zhes bya'o/ /las bzhi yi ni 'khor lo la/ /bzlas pa khri tsho gcig gis 'grub/
357a3(rgyud 'grel): de'ang bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yis/ /bsrung ba la sogs gzhan dag la/ /de ltar bzlas na mchog tu bstan/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig tsam bzlas kyang/ /sngags kyi nus pa mthu rnams kyis/ /bsrung dang bskyab 'grub par gsungs so/ /lha yi 'khor lo 'di nyid
357a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ /brten na cho ga gzhan dag ni/ /thams cad kun la 'grub par gsungs/ /de ltar 'khor lo'i man ngag sogs/ /gab pa'i don dang spas pa'i don/ /dgongs pa'i don dang dgra bzlog don/ /rna brgyud 'ongs pa la brten nas/ /man ngag can gyis
357a5(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor bsdus pa'i don ched du/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar gyur ram/ /las rnams gzhan la 'jug 'dod pas/ /bcu bdun lha yi dkyil 'khor las/ /bcu gsum dag tu bsdus pa dang/ /de la dgu ru bsdu pa dang/ /lnga
357a6(rgyud 'grel): ru yang ni bsdu bar bya/ /gnyis su bsdu ba bcu drug tshogs/ /yang na rgyan cig rnal 'byor gyis/ /bcu bdun du yang shes par bya/ /de ltar bsnyen pa sngon song bas/ /phan gdags pa dang tshar bcad pa'o/ /las dang sgrub pa thams cad la/ /
357a7(rgyud 'grel): nges par 'jug par shes par bya'o/ /sbyor ba'i che rkyen gzhan dag kyang/ /dus skabs sbyar te shes par bya/ /da ltar the tshom med gyur na/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i rtags ston pas/ /de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni/ /bsgrims te shes
357b1(rgyud 'grel): bar ma byas na/ rnal 'byor pa ni brlag par 'gyur/ /de bas mkhas pas nan tan du/ /sngags kyi lta ba spyod pa ni/ /bla ma mkhas pa mnyan par gyis/ /mi mkhas tshul 'chos g.yon can gyis/ /gnyis ka brlag ste dmyal bar ltung/ /mkhas
357b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rna brgyud tho ba pa ni/ /'di dang pha rol gnyis su yang/ /'bras bu bzang po nges bar bya/ /de bas bla ma mkhas pa ni/ /dang po nyid du btsal bar bya/ /man ngag can ni rnyed nas kyang/ /tshul 'chos g.yon can phyir 'breng na/ /dal ba don med 'bras
357b3(rgyud 'grel): bu med/ /las ngan dus kyi tha ma la/ /gang zag 'dod pa'i dbang gis ni/ /lta spyod sna tshogs ston par 'byung/ /gsang sngags dngos grub ma thob par/ /sgra dang tshad ma la brten nas/ /rgya rgyal 'dod pa'i dbang gyur nas/ /gsang sngags 'khor
357b4(rgyud 'grel): lo rtsom pa 'byung/ /des na yang dag don mi rnyed/ /la la mu stegs dag dang bsre/ /des ni dmyal ba'i gnas su khrid/ /gsang sngags 'khor lo 'di dag la/ /de lta'i spyod pa ma byung yang/ /mthu rnams je chung je chung 'byung/ /nad dang mu ge
357b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa/ /sna tshogs dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /las ngan dus kyi tha ma la/ /slob dpon sku la bdo ba dang/ /bstan pa 'jigs sogs 'byung 'gyur pas/ /de la bzang pa mi bsgom ste/ /gsang sngags 'khrul 'khro bskor bar bya/ /de
357b6(rgyud 'grel): las gzhan du byas gyur na/ /dam tshig nyams te dmyal bar 'gro/ dpal ldan rdo rje mthu stobs can/ /dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyis/ /rigs sngags gsang sngags bdag po ru/ /dbang bskur mnga' gsol mdzad nas ni/ /
357b7(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags 'khor la mdza' dag ni/ /khyod kyis bsdus la khyod kyis bskor/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi bka' yang bsgo/ /'khor lo rgyas par bskor nas kyang/ /de 'og rang gi 'khor lo ni/ /rtsod pa rgyas pa'i dus dag tu/ /bskor na las/
358a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'grub pa dang/ /de las gus pa mang 'gyur bas/ /de yi dus su bstan par bya/ /rgyal ba nyid kyis de skad gsungs/ /de bzhin bdag ni rjes mthun pas/ /'di la mos pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /phyogs rnams
358a2(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis gsol gdab dang/ /bdag rang bsod nams bsags pa'i phyir/ /'di bstan pa yi sems pa skyed/ /brtson 'grus dag pa'i sgo nas ni/ /lha rnams sgrub cing gsol gdab pas/ /gsang sngags don dang mthun pa yis/ /
358a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' skye ba de nyid srung/ /dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer ni/ /bye ba brgya phrag mang po las/ /gzi brjid khang pa'i nang du shar/ /de bzhin 'od zer phra mo gcig /bdag blo yi ni mun par snang/ /snang pa de yang bdag gis ni/ /gzhan
358a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun la bstan par bya/ /man ngag 'di bkod cho ga yis/ /bdag dang sems can thams cad kun /bsod nams 'di la brten nas ni/ /thams cad byang chub thob par shog/ //slob dpon b+ha
358a5(rgyud 'grel): bas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ti nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can
358a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi sgrub thabs/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgyud dag la/ /brten nas nang gi sgrub thabs 'di/ /bdag gis dran phyir bshad par bya/ /lha yi rnal 'byor yud tsam bsam/ /rang gi snying khar zla
358a7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil bsam/ /de yi steng du hUM yig bsam/ /hUM las 'od zer 'phros pa las/ /phyi nang gsal nas 'od zer 'phros/ /bla ma dang ni gos sngon can/ /dkon mchog la sogs spyan drangs nas/ /phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa
358b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba gdab/ /skyabs gsol lus dpul dge rtsa bsngo/ /tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya/ /de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom/ /de la 'od phung tshul du bdag rang nyid/ /de yi nang na hUM gnas la/ /
358b2(rgyud 'grel): de las tsam 'phros 'khor lo 'gyur/ /lte bar nyi bsam hUM de nyid/ /de las gnod mdzes rgyal por gyur/ /de yi hUM gi 'phro 'du yis/ /khro bo chen po bcu ru gyur/ /hUM bzhi'i gsang sngags brjod pa yis/ /khro bcu'i sprul pas gdug
358b3(rgyud 'grel): bkug /sku gsung thugs kyi phur bus gdab/ /btul zhing sbyangs nas nam mkhar gyur/ /de nas hUM gi 'phro 'du yis/ /rdo rje gur dang ra ba dang/ /dra ba nyid du gyur ba'o/ /hUM gi 'phro 'dus slar la zhu/ /stong pa nyid las 'ong dpung byung/ /de las nyi zla
358b4(rgyud 'grel): kha sbar gyur/ /A li kA yis nyi zla brgyan/ /dbus su a dang hUM sbyar te /kha dog dkar mngar nyid du blta/ /'od zer dkar dmar 'phro 'du las/ /zhu bas rdo rje pad+mar gyur/ /pad steng rdo rje rked nub tsam/ /lta ba nyid la snying pos bskor/ /de gnyis
358b5(rgyud 'grel): las ni thugs dang gsung/ /gnyi gas sku bsdus byin gyis brlab/ /de nyid 'od du zhu ba las/ /rdo rje las ni khro bor gyur/ /pad+ma las ni khro mor gyur/ /kho bo rdo rje gos sngon can/ /sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig pa/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje
358b6(rgyud 'grel): dril bu bsnams/ /mche ba gtsigs pas 'dod dgur gyur/ /zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum 'khril ba'i tshul/ /g.yon du rdo rje khro mo ni/ /sku mdog ljang dmar zhal gcig ma/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje gri gug gtso la 'khyud/ /g.yon
358b7(rgyud 'grel): pa ban dmar gtso la stobs/ /gnyis med 'khril ba'i tshul du sgoms nas/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ /phyi nang bdud rtsi mchod nas bstim/ /'od zer 'phro 'du byin gyis brlab/ /de bzhin khro chu lus byin brlabs/
359a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bas ni mi bskyod 'gyur/ /de ltar bsgoms nas bzlas pa bya/ /de steng ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /mtshan ma la sogs bsgoms nas su/ /thugs kar 'khor ram yul 'khor la/ /'od zer la ni yi 'bru bskyod?
359a2(rgyud 'grel): ma gsal bar du bsgom par bya/ /de ltar rab 'bring tha ma yis/ /'buM maM nyi 'bum sum 'bum 'grub/ /the tshom med na dngos grub 'grub/ /dam tshig nyams sam sdig che bas/ /sbyin sreg la sogs mang du bya/ /mtshan ma gsum mam
359a3(rgyud 'grel): nus par rtag /de ltar byung na bsgrub pa brtsam/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o// //bsgrub pa'i rim pa bstan pa ni/ /mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i gnas phyin la/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag por bya/ /rdo rje gri gug nang du ste/ /
359a4(rgyud 'grel): bar du me ri gtang bar bya/ /gzhu dang dgra sta mdung dang gsum/ /me ri'i zur na gtang bar bya/ /chub ma dur khrod sol ba dang/ /bdud rtsi bag zan gsugs brnyan bya/ /snying khar gru gsum gzugs brnyan gzhug /ba gcad sed ldang
359a5(rgyud 'grel): phul la btong/ /mtshan ldan gla pA la ru ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lngas dgang/ /de na gos sngon nyid la mchod/ /lcags kyi gru gsum nang du ni /bdud rtsi sha lnga khrag gsum dgang/ /de ni nag po'i gtar rta'o/ /rnel gri'i snod du dug
359a6(rgyud 'grel): gter gsags/ /phye ma gsum dang yungs kar gdab/ /slob dpon slob ma gnyis ka yang/ /gos sngon gos nag rgyan cha bgo /rag sha rus pa'i phreng ba bsgreng/ /nub dang lho ru la bltas te/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshul bzhin bsgom/ /
359a7(rgyud 'grel): thun mong sngags dang khyad par sngags/ /dgra 'am 'byung po klu rnams la/ bzlas pas gsang ba'i rim pa brtsams/ /snying kha'i mtshan ma la sogs gsal/ /lce ni hUM gi rdo rjer bsgyur/ /'od zer dkar dmar 'phros pa las/ /de la khro tshogs
359b1(rgyud 'grel): byung bas dgug /yang na mgon po skul bas bsam/ /khri yi bar du bzlas nas ni/ /thun bar du ni phye ma gsum/ /mgon pos las kyi gtor mar gdab/ /yungs kar gos sngon can gyis so/ /phyi ma dug nag 'od zer dgang/ /yungs kar khro chung nyid
359b2(rgyud 'grel): du spro/ /rtags byung nas ni gzugs brnyan bzhugs/ /de nas bsgrub khang them rtsa ru/ /gru gsum nag po'i 'brub khung du/ /de nyid bcug la kha bcad ri rab bri/ /de steng mnan cing stang stabs bya/ /de ni mnan pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /phur bus gdab cing
359b3(rgyud 'grel): gri gug gtub/ /de nas gru gsum gtor mar dbul/ /nag po chen po nyid la bstab/ /drag sngags bzlas pa'i gtor ma yis/ /gsang ba'i man ngar shes par bya'o/ /yang na sbyin sreg nyid kyis bya/ /de rnams gsang nga'i sbyor ba'o/ /
359b4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dab brgyad bskyed pa yi/ /lte bar gtso bo bskyed nas ni/ /klu chen brgyad po 'dab mar bskyed/ /rin chen snod du gtor ma bsham/ /chu gcang sman la sogs pa dang/ /khyad par klu sman sna tshogs dang/ /dkar gsum mthar gsum rnams
359b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis bya/ /sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs sogs bya/ /klu la byin pas zhe sdang zhi/ /lhag ma 'khor la byin pa yis/ /gnod pa rnams ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /sngags bzlas 'od zer phog pa yis/ /btso bo'i dam tshig rjes dran pas/ /'khor rnams zhe sdang
359b6(rgyud 'grel): zhi bar 'gyur/ /yang na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya/ /bskrad dang bcing dang dgug pa yis/ /de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /sbyor ka chen por shes pa bya/ /'khor lo ser po'i lte bar gtso/ /mdun du rgyas po bskyed par bya/ /de yi g.yas su nor lha ni/ /
359b7(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dkar po 'dzum bag can/ /nor bu'i sgrom ni g.yas g.yon bsnams/ /mchod cing bskor? pa gsang sngags bzlas/ /gzugs brnyan 'di ba rin chen brten/ /kha dog ljang dang gser gyis mtshon/ /kha dog sir po'i bzlas thi mas nas/ /
360a1(rgyud 'grel): ci 'dod ba yi nor rnams ster/ /de ni thun mong dngos grub po/ /bdud rtsi rtsa ba lnga btsal la/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor bya/ /dkar gsum mngar gsum nyid la ni/ /sngags bzlas ri lu byas te bza' / /zas dang sman pa sra ra la
360a2(rgyud 'grel): brje/ /brjes zin zhag gsum 'bras bu 'byung/ /de gsum skye ba bdun pa dang/ /yum gyi cha sres sman rnams sbyar/ /de sgrub 'od zer btul zhing sbyang/ /rtags byung nas ni bza' zhing byug /de yis thun mong dngos grub 'grub/ /mchog gi
360a3(rgyud 'grel): yang ni grogs su 'gyur/ /mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub pa yang/ /thugs ka yi ni dkyil 'khor du/ /rtsa rgyud 'dab ma brgyad du bsam/ /de dkyil rtsa ni lnga rta'i tshad/ /de yi nang du dbugs kyi lha/ /kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'o/ /de dkyil thig le
360a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems/ /de la lta zhing bsgom pa ni/ /rtags lnga'i mthar ni stong nyid 'gyur/ /de nyid spro zhing bsdu ba dang/ /dgug cing bskyil ba'i rim pa 'am/ /mnan cing bzlog pa'i man ngag gis/ /rim gyis ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /de nas phyag
360a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya'i dngos grub 'thob/ /nang sgrub rim pa 'di yis ni/ /bdag dang mdza' yas sems can dang/ /'di la brten pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs/ /
360a6(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //*/ /lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ma hA yak+Sha sen pa ta ye nI lI ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ye maN+Da la nA ma/ bod skad du/
360a7(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud rnams thams cad tshar gcod pa'i/ /mthu stobs can la phyag 'tshal nas/ /chags
360b1(rgyud 'grel): la mos par gyur pa yi/ /rnal 'byor lam pa'i don chen du/ /rgyud rnams kun dang mi 'gal pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid ldan pa yis/ /sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs byas te/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /yid du
360b2(rgyud 'grel): 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu/ /dri bzang tsan dan spos kyis byugs/ /dri zhim me tog mchog bkram nas/ /lho ru kha bltas rol pa'i 'dug stangs bya/ /yang na bsnyen pa zhi ba'i tshul yin pas/ /shar du kha bltas sems dpa' i skyil krung bca' / /
360b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying pa yi/ /'gro la phan dang skyob pa'i phyir/ /snying rje chen po'i dmigs par bya/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshul bsgom bya/ /de nas bzlas brjod tshul bzhin bya/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo'i 'bum du bzlas/ /nge las gzhan pa'i
360b4(rgyud 'grel): ru bzlas/ /mtshan ma rnams gsum thob pa yis/ /yang na bsnyen sbyor goms pas ni/ /rdul tshon dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya'o/ /slob ma snod dang ldan pa yis/ /dang por gsol gsum btab nas ni/ /snyen rdzogs gting la gdab par bya/ /dang
360b5(rgyud 'grel): por sa ni brtag par bya/ /phyogs chad dbyibs ldan skyon bral ba'i/ /mkhas pas ci nus brtag par bya/ /maN+Dal legs byas me tog dgram/ /lha yi gnas dang gdan du bsam/ /lha bskyed la sogs byas nas ni/ mchod dang bstod pa tshul
360b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bya/ /dgongs cig dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa dang/ /slob ma rnams la sman slad du/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa 'bri bar 'tshal/ /
360b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol/ /zhes lan gsum du brjod de/ gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas chos skyong pa'i srungs ma rnams la/ mchod dang gtor ma byin la ni/ /bstod cing gsol ba gda
361a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de nas las thams cad pa'i thab khung du sbyin sre gis spyad pa bya'o/ /sbyin sreg grub par ma gyur na/ /las thams cad ba'i gsang sngags chus/ /bgegs ni nye bar zhi bar bya'o/ /de nas ji ltar brtags dbus su/ /byin brlabs rdo rjes phru gang
361a2(rgyud 'grel): brko/ /skyon rnams spangs nas sa rin bcal/ /'thas par bcags la byug par bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs pa'i/ /ri rab gzhal yas bskyed nas ni/ /lha bskyed la sogs rdzogs byas la/ /de nas skad cig myur du khros/ /'khor
361a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi ni gsol ba gdab/ /khro bo mig dang rkang sogs byin gyis brlabs/ /rdo rje dril bu gnyis bzung nas/ /stang stabs sbyor ba la sogs kyis/ /bgeT rnams ma lus tshar gcad do/ /de nas sa yi lha mo la/ /mchod bstod gsol ba
361a4(rgyud 'grel): btab pa yis/ /dbang po phyir ni sta gon gnas/ /bdud rtsi thig le la sogs bya/ /lha rnams cho ga la sogs rdzogs/ /de nas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /bdug spos lag thogs bus btsugs la/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog /rig
361a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyi/ /dkyil 'khor bdag ni bri bar bya/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de ni gnang ba mdzad
361a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ??/ /sangs rgyas 'gro don bya don gsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags lha/ /'jig rten skyong dang mthu chen dang/ /gang yang rdo rje'i spyan mnga' ba'i/ /sems can bstan la dga' ba rnams/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi pa
361a7(rgyud 'grel): yig/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /yo byad ci yod pas 'drin/ /deng bdag slob mar bcas pa la/ /thugs brtse bar ni dgongs su gsol/ /tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad du gsol te de ltar
361b1(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum gsol btib nas/ /ra ba dra bas mtshams bya'o/ /gser la sogs pa'i bum pa yis/ /lto ba che ba mgrin ring ba/ /skyon spangs nyes pa bral ba dang/ /yon tan la sogs lha grangs bstun/ /rdzas dang kha rgyan mgul chings ldan/ /mtshan ma
361b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs nas byin gyis brlab/ /rnam rgyal las kyi bum pa la/ /khyad par cho ga la sogs bya/ /de nas slob ma blo ldan la/ /slob dpon gyis ni cho ga bya/ /slob ma sgo yi drung gnas te/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su
361b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de ni stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems ni bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon mchog gsum ni bdag la stsol/ /thar
361b4(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag nyid 'jug par 'tshal/ /de ltar lan gsum gsol btab nas/ /slob dpon gtso bo'i ting 'dzin zhugs/ /tshigs bcad 'di ni gsang sngags sbyin/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yis/ /gsang sngags
361b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul spyod chog 'di/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang/ /rdo rje gsang sngags rab bsgoms pa'i/ /dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du/ /thams
361b6(rgyud 'grel): cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med do/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa'i/ /dpung chen dag kyang de yi bcom/ /'jig rten rjes 'jug par rtogs nas/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan
361b7(rgyud 'grel): 'das /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir /bu yis blo gros 'di bgyi sheg ces smras so/ /gnas skyabs 'gro sdig bshags la sogs kun/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor nyid du shes par bya/ /srog chags rnams ni bsad mi bya/ /ma byin bar
362a1(rgyud 'grel): yang mi blang ngo/ /'dod pa dag kyang spyad mi bya/ /nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yi/ /chang ni myos par btung ma yin/ /sems can gdul bya ma gtogs pa/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad spang/ /dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing/ /rnal
362a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor can du bsnyen bkur bya/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang/ /ngag gi las ni rnam pa bzhi/ /yid kyi las ni rnam gsum dang/ /ci nus pa ru rjes su bsrung/ /sems can don la rgyab mi phyogs/ /theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya/ /
362a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba dag kyang spang mi bya/ /rtag tu mya ngan 'da' mi bya/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /de la brnyas par mi bya zhing/ /phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang/ /mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o/ /de ltar dam tshig phog pa dag /blo ldan khyod kyi rtag
362a4(rgyud 'grel): tu srung/ /mdor na rtsa ba yan lag gi /dam tshig nyin mtshan bgrang zhing bsrung/ /de nas bla mas gsungs pa yi/ /sdom pa legs par bzung bar bya/ /tshul khrims zhes bya sogs pa ni/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni/ /ji srid byang chub snying
362a5(rgyud 'grel): po'i bar/ /bdag ni rab tu ldog par bgyi/ /de ltar sdom pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma la/ /snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral ba gsum du rdo rje khu tshur gyis dri'i thig le gsum du bya ste/ /nyi ma dang zla ba dang pad+ma'i yi ge gsum so sor bkod la/
362a6(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab cing las thams cad pas bsrung bar bya/ /de nas mchod pa bya ste/ spyi bor me tog dang spos so/ /mar me dang dri ni snying khar do/ /lha ba shos mdun du'o /de nas tshig ni 'dis su sbyin/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung
362a7(rgyud 'grel): nas su/ /'khor ba'i nyes pas ma gos par/ /mchod pa kun dang ldan par ni/ /dus kun du ni bde bar mnas/ /de nas tshems shing la sogs sbyin par bya/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams/ /u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam
362b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i chos bshad par bya'o/ /de nas thig byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa shes par bya'o/ /de nas thig skud gdab pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor spyi dang mthun pas na/ /chon rnams byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /tshon rnams dgye ba'i
362b2(rgyud 'grel): las bya'o/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad dkyil du/ /zla ba nyi ma'i gdan stengs su/ /gtso bo bri bar bya ba yin/ /'dab ma brgyad la lha brgyad bri/ /gru chad bzhi la lha mo bzhi/ /sgo bzhir sgo ba bzhi bri'o/ /de 'og lhag chad bskang bya'o/ /nam mkha' 
362b3(rgyud 'grel): 'degs par 'dod pa dang/ /yang bskyed yang sdud byed pa gnyis/ /gang ltar mos pa 'jug pa yis/ /gtso bo sngon du 'gro ba rdzogs pa yin/ /'khor rnams sbrul pa 'am cho gas bskyed/ /dbus su gtso bo sku mdog sngon po ste/ /zhal gcig
362b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas rdo rje bsnams/ /g.yon ni gdul bya'i skabs dang sbyar/ /shar gyi pad+mar rnam par rgyal/ /sku mdog dmar po dbu gsum po/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin/ /g.yon pa dgra sta bar ma gnyis/ /gung mo mthe bo ngos
362b5(rgyud 'grel): mdud nas/ /gzhan rnams yongs su brkyang ba yin/ /de nyid snying khar bzung nas ni/ /de 'og zhags pa ral gri bsnams/ /lho yi pad+mar mgon po ni/ /sku mdog nag po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /g.yas g.yon tsan dan beng chen
362b6(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa bsnams/ /nub kyi 'dab mar lus ngan po/ /sku mdog ljang khu zhal gcig pa/ /phyag gnyis mchod rten ne le bsnams/ /byang gi 'dab mar bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig pa/ /phyag gnyis brang bsnol
362b7(rgyud 'grel): sdigs mdzub 'phyar/ /shar lho'i 'dab mar gnod sbyin bskyod/ /sku mdog dmar nag zhal gcig pa/ /phyag gnyis gri gug cing te'u bsnams/ /lho nub pad+mar ro langs ma/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje lcags sgrog bzung nas su/ /gung mo srid
363a1(rgyud 'grel): lag la sogs gsum po rnams/ /dam por bkyag nas yongs su bsdam/ /mtheb mdzub bzhi rnams rab brkyang ste/ /spyi bor nges par bsnol ba bsnams/ /nub byang 'dab mar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /sku mdog dmar?
363a2(rgyud 'grel): skya zhal gcig ma/ /phyag gnyis spyi bor spyar nas su/ /me lce phreng ba yongs su 'dzin/ /byang shar mtshams kyi 'dab ma la/ /'jigs byed mkha' 'gro gdod sngo nag /zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gnyis pa/ /g.yas kyi dang
363a3(rgyud 'grel): po glang po bsnams/ /g.yon pa glang chen lpags pa bsnams/ /de 'og dgra ste rdo rje bsnams/ /tha ma mi mgo lcags kyu bsnams/ /gru chad bzhil lha mo bzhi/ /'od skyed ma sku mdog dkar mo/ /zhal cig phyag gnyis me
363a4(rgyud 'grel): tog bsnams/ /yid 'phrog ma sku mdog ser mo/ /zhal cig phyag gnyis dri'i spos phor bsnams/ /kun bzang ma sku mdog dkar mo/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis ro mchog bsnams/ /glu sgra ma sku mdog sngon mo/ /zhal gcig
363a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis sgra snyan gar/ /shar gyi sgo ru srog gcod ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing/ /phyag gnyis tho ba zhags pa bsnams/ /nub sgor khrag 'thung ma sku mdog dmar mo/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis gri gug gzhaT
363a6(rgyud 'grel): byar sgor sha za ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis rnon po zhags/ /de ltar gsal bar bskyed nas su/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas/ /nam mkhar bzhugs pa de nyid la/ /mchod bstod byas nas dam tshig gi/ /dkyil 'khor dag la
363a7(rgyud 'grel): bstim par bya/ /de nas bdag nyid shar sgo ru/ /dang po nyid nas mes po'i tshul/ /shar sgo ru ni gnas pa 'am/ /yang na phyi nas sras kyi tshul/ /de nas byin brlabs dbang bskur bya/ /mchod dang bstod brdzogs byas la/ /bsgrub pa'i bzlas
363b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod thim pa dang/ /slob ma dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya/ /de nas yol bas bcad ba'i bar du/ las kyi chu gtor ba dang/ gdong g.yogs bcing ba dang/ yon phul nas ni mthong ba dri/ /chu blud bka' bsgo byas nas me tog dor/ /mig dbye lha
363b2(rgyud 'grel): ngo de ni rim bzhin bltan/ /de nas dbang bskur rim bzhin bya/ /yang yum snyoms zhugs 'od zer las/ /bde gshegs 'od bskul bum par thim/ /ma 'dres pas ni 'od zhu nas/ /spyi bor chu yi dbang bskur ro/ /tshigs bcad 'dis ni
363b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin par bya/ /sku gsung dam tshig las byung ba'i/ /ye shes bdud rtsi las byung ba'i/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /mi bskyod pa yi dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra A darsha dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pas so/ /dbu rgyan man ngag shes byas la/ /'di skad do/ /
363b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes de/ /dbu rgyan rin chen dam pa ste/ /dbu rgyan rin chen mchog 'gro bas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal la/ /oM sa man+ta dz+nyA na ratna nA ma hUM tiSh+Tha a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pas so/ /rdo'i man ngag shes byas la/ /sangs
363b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang/ /mi phyed rdo rje 'od gsal ba/ /dam chos 'byung ba'i sgor gyur pa/ /rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM pra ta a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ dril bu'i man ngag shes byas la/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /
363b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro don mnyam med byed pa dang/ /mchod pa'i las rnams rdzogs byed pas/ /rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM kri tA nut+ta dz+nyA na badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ ming gi man ngag shes byas la/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas/ /byang chub snying po'i bar du ni/ /cis
363b7(rgyud 'grel): kyang mi shigs mi g.yo bas/ /rdo rje'i ming du rab tu grags/ /oM pra ti sho d+ha d+ha rma d+hA tu dz+nyA na nA ma ya b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /de nas dam tshig gsum gyi dbang bskur bya ste/ dkyil 'khor phyi rgyud cho ga bzhin/ /tshigs bcad rnams kyang bsgrag par bya/ /oM
364a1(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ de gsum man ngag 'od zer ni/ /bla ma las ni shes par bya/ /de nas me khor dbang bskur bya/ /gong ma bzhin du man ngag gtso/ /de nas khyad par dbang bskur ni/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ji bzhin no/ /gos sngon
364a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i dbang bskur ba rdzogs so// //rdo rje slob dpon 'dod pa yis/ /yon gyis bla ma mnyes byas la/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni gsol ba gdab/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod cing gsol mdzad
364a3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /bdag la bsrung pa'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje bdag la gsol/ /zhes gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas shar phyogs su dkyil 'khor chen po dang/ bar du 'dom gyis chod par ni dbang gi dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin bris la de'i
364a4(rgyud 'grel): steng du dbang stegs kyi khri byas la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa seng ges mtshan pa bzhag ste/ de la gdugs la sogs pa thams cad kyis klubs la/ rnam par rgyal ba dang/ lha thams cad kyi bum pa dang/ las thams cad kyi bum pas man
364a5(rgyud 'grel): ngag ji lta ba bzhin dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rdo rje brtul zhugs dang/ lung bstan pa dang/ rdo rje 'dzin dbugs dbyung ba dang/ dus dang 'khor la sogs pa'i dbang byin la/ de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan de nas yon phul la de nas
364a6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab po/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba yang 'od dang/ grib ma'i tshul du g.yon du bsams la/ man ngag bzhin du byang sems dbab/ /phab pas sbyin par bya ba dang/ /yang na bdud rtsi rnam lnga
364a7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /mtshan dang ldan pa'i snod bzhag nas/ /sa bon lnga la rigs lnga ni/ /snyoms bzhugs bdud rtsir zhu bar bsam/ /yang na dbab pa'i tshul du bya/ /yang na dngos su dbab pa dang/ /yang na gnyis kas bya ba yin/ /bcu gang gi ni lde gu spyar/ /
364b1(rgyud 'grel): cha gnyis bsres pas gong bzhin no/ /tshigs bcad 'dis ni gsol ba gdab/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod sangs rgyas kyis ni bde ba 'grub/ /rnam dag byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /rgya cher sras su bcas pa rnams/ /yun ring stong nyid sgom gdung la/ /
364b2(rgyud 'grel): dga' bas yid 'ong bde chen gyis ni dgyes par mjod/ /kye 'dod chags dri med kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ste/ /dga' ba'i 'dod chags rdo rje'i dam tshig la ni phye mdzad nas/ /dga' ba rnam pa drug po spyod pas shin tu gdung ba ni/ /rab tu dgyes dbang
364b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i bde ba nyid kyis 'jug par 'tshal/ /byang chub sems ni rin chen 'bar 'byung ba'i/ /ma lus rgyal ba rnams ni lus skams la/ /rnam dag rdo rje las byung ye shes chu/ /dri med rin chen sbyir dbab dbang bskur ro/ /mnyam pa ma mnyam 'dod
364b4(rgyud 'grel): chags tshul dag pas/ /pad+ma'i gnas su rdo rje gtong mdzad pa/ /sna tshogs sems dpa' sems can brlag gyur pa/ /sbyor ba gzhan pa yin pa thogs bshad par gsol/ /rdo rje sems khyod dbang mchog bde bar byed pa yi/ /rdo rje pad+ma bye ba'i
364b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis sbyor mdzad de/ /rgyal ba kun gyi gzugs sku rab ston nas/ /thams cad bde grub nyid kyis bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /de nas tshogs kyis mchod byas la/ /mtshan ldan snod nas blangs nas ni/ /rdo rje srin mtheb byin brlabs la/ /
364b6(rgyud 'grel): oM a mri ta gu hya a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pas mgrin par gsung la dbul bar bya'o/ /slob mas byad bdud rtsi chen por bsam la a ho sa zhes pas btud par bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i bstod pa yang bya'o/ /da ni shes rab ye shes
364b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbang bskur bar bya ste/ phyag rgya la brten mi 'jug la/ /man ngag 'di ni bstan pa yin/ /yid gyi lta mo gzugs mdzes la /man ngag sbyar bar bya ba dang/ /yang na rdo rje lce ba tung gi /sbyor ba'i man ngag brten pa dang/ yang na rtsa ni gnyis bo
365a1(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba bstan pa dang/ /yang na rdzas rnams mthu chen gyis/ /byugs pas dga' ba skye 'gyur ro/ /slob mas yon dbul gsol ba gdab/ /mchod cing bstong pas mnyes byas la/ /'di skad tshig
365a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang brjod par bya/ /khams gsum la ni rnam grol zhing/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pa/ /'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /phung po rnams dang skye mched rnams la mi brten cing/ /phyin ci log pas
365a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam grol zhing/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam 'gyur zhing/ /'dod pa dag gis ma gos pa/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam rtog med cing kun rtog med/ /thugs ni rab tu mi gnas pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi thugs/ /
365a4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar nam mkha' gnas med cing/ /sgros med dgos pa med pa ltar/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba'i/ /dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin can/
365a5(rgyud 'grel): mngon par byang chub blta bar 'tshal/ /dga' mchog sgo nas bstod mdzad pa/ /lhan cig ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal/ /de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ zhes pa lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig
365a6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas so/ /de nas dbang bzhi bstan pa ni/ /bzhung lugs mi 'dra mang mod kyang/ /dang po'i tshig rten man ngag ni/ /rna ba dag tu brgyud pa yin/ /tha ma lhan cig dga' ba yin/ /dang po bum pa'i dbang gis ni/ /man ngag rnams
365a7(rgyud 'grel): ni bstan pa yin/ /de nas gsang ba yi bstan la/ khyad par sngags rnams don dang bcas rnams ni/ /rna ba brgyud par bya ba ni/ /oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT/ oM pradz+nyA ti sa ta ni ya hUM phaT/ oM sha swa gA pa yi hUM phaT/ oM ga ti sh+rI??
365b1(rgyud 'grel): ni hUM phaT/ oM maM sa b+hak+Sha ni hUM phaT/ /oM trai lokya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra yak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM mahA kA la ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ oM badzra be ta li hUM phaT/ oM bai sh+ra pa Na ye hUM phaT/ oM badzra DA? gi ye hUM phaT/ oM a mrita kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM/
365b2(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra b+ha ra ya hUM phaT/ oM bra bitpa na ya hUM phaT/ oM ma na maha ra nA ya hUM phaT/ oM sa man+ta b+ha drE ya hUM phaT/ oM shabda gI ti ya hUM phaT/ oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni mahA yakA se na ba ta ye hUM hUM phaT/ sngags kyi don rnams ma shes na/ /
365b3(rgyud 'grel): dag gi sgrib ba mi 'dag phyir/ /des na slob dpon rna brgyud kyi/ /man ngag de la nan tan bya/ /de nas shes rab ye shes kyi/ /man ngag de ni bstan par bya/ /dga' ba bum pa'i don bstan la/ /mchog dga' gsang ba'i don bstan no/ /khyad
365b4(rgyud 'grel): par shes rab ye shes bstan/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni/ /bzhi pa kho na bstan pa yin/ /yang na bum pa'i dbang bskur nas/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa yin/ /de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur nas/ /rdo rje bzlas ba bstan par
365b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ?? shes par ye shes dbang bskur nas/ /sems dben par ni bstan par bya/ /de nas sgyu ma la gnas pas/ /bzhi pa'i man ngag bstan par bya/ /de nas 'od gsal la gnas pas/ /zung 'jug ting 'dzin bsgom par bya/ /zung 'jug
365b6(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin mthar phyin pa/ /chos kyi sku zhes de la bya/ /de ltar bzhi pa'i rna brgyud bstan/ /dpa' bskur rdzogs nas tshogs 'khor bya/ /gtor ma btang nas mkha' 'gro bskang/ /sbyin sreg gis ni lhag chang bskang/ /yi ge brgya ba zlos
365b7(rgyud 'grel): byed cing/ /dkyil 'khor bskor zhing sgra rnams brdung/ /ye shes gshegs nas ting 'dzin bsdu/ /rdul tshon chags la chu la dor/ /maN+Dal zhal bsil dga' ston bya/ /rnal 'byor lam ba'i don chen du/ /rgyud rnams kun dang mi 'gal
366a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga 'di byas pas/ /'di byas dge ba'i rtsa ba yis/ /bdag dang mdza' yas sems can rnams/ /thams cad byang chub thob par shog /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /
366a2(rgyud 'grel): lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// // */ /lung bstan sbyor ba'i man ngag slob dpon chen po b+ha bas mdzad pa bzhugs so// //bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
366a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lung bstan sbyor ba'i man ngag 'di/ /rgyud rnams kun las mi gsal ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyas btab la/ /rnal 'byor blo dman don du ni/ /yang nas yang du gsol btab nas/ /yid ches brod pa bskyed
366a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /man ngag rim pa bstan pa la/ /bla ma la ni mnyan par gyis/ /gsang sngags sgo ni dpag med nas/ /thabs kyi rim pa mang gsungs pa/ /sems can las ni sna tshogs pas/ /so so mos pa mi mthun phyir/ /dper na
366a5(rgyud 'grel): sman rnams nus pa yis/ /nad rnams so sor sel ba bzhin/ /man ngag thabs rnams so sos kyang/ /dug gi nad rnams 'joms par byed/ /dper na sman nus gcig gis kyang/ /phrad pa tsam gyis nad 'jom pa'o/ /yang na
366a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis 'joms gsum 'joms dang/ /bzhi 'joms lnga 'joms la sogs dang/ /mang po 'dus nas 'joms pa dang/ /de dag kun gyis ma tshoms pa/ /sbyor ba gzhan log 'joms pa dang/ /gzhan pa kho nas 'joms pa dang/ /sman  dang sbyor ba de dag kyang/ /mkhas pa yis ni 'joms par 'gyur/ /mi mkhas pas ni gnod par 'gyur/ /sman pa mkhas par gyur kyang ni/ /brtson 'grus nan tan ma byas na/ /nang rnams 'joms par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin mthun
366b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dpe rnams kyang/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi lung bstan na/ /zhib pas 'di ru ma phye'o/ /bsgoms pa'i stobs kyi nyon mongs 'joms/ /bsgoms pa las byung dngos grub kyis/ /mchog gis dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin thob par
366b2(rgyud 'grel): ma gyur pas/ /tshogs 'khor tshogs mchod dngos grub po/ /de ma byung na sbyin sreg gis/ /dngos grub bsgrub par gsungs pa yin/ /de ma byung ba bzlas brjod do/ /de ni ma byung gtor mas bya/ /de rnams kun la ma byung na/ /las ni phran tshoT
366b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang bstan/ /yang na de dag thams cad kyang/ /gcig 'dus gnyis 'dus gsum 'dus dang/ /bzhi 'dus lnga 'dus la sogs pas/ /'byung bar 'gyur ba gsungs pa yin/ /yang na mchog 'dod pa la ni/ /thams cad rdzogs
366b4(rgyud 'grel): par dgos par gsungs/ /thun mongs dngos grub sgrub pa la/ /che chung gis ni rim pas gsungs/ /sbyor ba re res kyang ni 'grub/ /gsang sngags la la'i bzhed kyis ni/ /dper na sbrul ni gshu bur zhugs/ /rtsa bar 'gro dang co tor 'gro
366b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin rnal 'byor sngags pa yang/ /rig 'dzin sa dang rdo rje dmyal/ /la la dag gi gzhung gis ni/ /bar ma do nas 'gro ba'o/ /la la skye ba phyi ma la/ /la la dag gi bzhed kyis ni/ /gnyis dang gsum pa dag la'o/ /bzhi pa 'am lnga
366b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod pa'ang yod/ /la la skye ba bdun pa la/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'dod/ /de ltar gzhung lugs mi 'dra ba/ /mang du gsungs pa de dag kyang/ /'gal ba med de kun kyang bden/ /gsang sngags kyi ni gzhung gis kyang/ /skye
366b7(rgyud 'grel): ba bdun las mi dma' bas/ /skye ba bdun gyi tha ma la/ /ma bsgoms kyang ni sangs rgyas so/ /zhes su rgyud las bstan pa yin/ /skye ba bdun zhes bya ba yang/ /sngags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin/ /sngags dang sman la sogs
367a1(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /stobs kyis lus sems las rung ba/ /sha dang thod pa la sogs pa/ /bsten cing zos pas dngos grub thob/ /de pas sngags mthu'i yon tan no/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /skye ba bdun ba 'ong srid kyang/ /
367a2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar 'ong ba shin tu dkon/ /skye ba bdun pa zhes bya'i gnas/ /phal cher dur khrod ched po yi/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi gnas su skye/ /rig 'dzin sa zhes bya ba yang/ /gcig ni de la'ang bya ba yin/ /rig 'dzin sa la'ang
367a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum yod de/ /dur khrod rin chen sa dang ni/ /bar snang lha gnas lha rten sa/ /mkha' spyod 'og min stug po'i sa/ /gnas ni de gsum yin par gsungs/ /skye ba bdun pa'i gang zag ni/ /yul dang gnas ni khyad par
367a4(rgyud 'grel): can/ /sngags spyod pa yi gnas dag tu/ /'ga' tsam 'byung ba dag kyang yod/ /skye ba gcig sogs gzhan pa ni/ /de rnams gnas kyang de bzhin no/ /skye ba bdun pa'i gang zag ni/ /dad dang snying rje la sogs ldan/ /
367a5(rgyud 'grel): pha rol phyin bcu'i chos la spyod/ /mthun 'jug spyod pa kun la mkhas/ /bzo dang rig pa gnas la mkhas/ /lta ba ma nor gdeng du gyur/ /spyod pa la dor thabs la mkhas/ /man ngag mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /the
367a6(rgyud 'grel): chom med par 'jug par byed/ /man ngag bsgoms pa dag tu ni/ /ting 'dzin skye 'gyur rang gis ni/ /khams dang dus kyi bye brag shes/ /rgyud lung mtshan gyi man ngag la/ /thos pa tsam gyis dbu zhabs kyi/ /man ngag rnams
367a7(rgyud 'grel): ni khong du chud? bshad pa'i rgyad dang 'grel pa dang/ /mngon rtags pa yi rim pa rnams/ /ma thos pa ru shes par 'gyur/ /dper na shing 'dzor stsal ba tsam/ /rgyud lung man ngag mdo mdo yi/ /mkhas pa la ni brten pa su/ /thams cad
367b1(rgyud 'grel): don rnams khong chud nas/ /skabs phyed spyi don shin tu rgyas/ /dka' 'grel mngon rtogs rim pa ni/ /rtsom nus don la shin tu mkhas/ mig ni yun rings mi 'dzums shing/ /yi dam lha bsgoms dus su ni/ /skye pa bdun pa'i grib ma snang
367b2(rgyud 'grel): skye ba gnyis sogs gzhan po la/ /grib ma'i rtags kyang de bzhin ne/ /bskoms pa'i stobs kyi khyad par gyis/ /zhag bdun zla gcig zla bdun du/ /mkha' 'gro mas ni lung ston zhing/ /chos bshad rtags rnams ston par mdzad/ /chos pa yi
367b3(rgyud 'grel): ni mdze skyed kyang/ /dngos su sprul nas ston pa dang/ /yang sprul sum sprul la sogs su/ /sprul nas ston dang yang na ni/ /sku ni mi snang sgra yis su/ /nam mkha' las su ston pa dang/ /yang na phyag mtshan la sogs la/ /sgra byung nas ni ston pa
367b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ yang na rmi lam mtshan mas su/ /dus bzhi dus gsum dus gcig tu/ /yang nas yang du sten pa'o/ /ma thos pa yi man ngag rnams/ /ston mor byed na skye bdun sogs/ /sngags kyi dngos grub thob pa yi/ /rnal 'byor rig 'dzin byang
367b5(rgyud 'grel): chub sems/ /yang ni dang po bskyes nas ni/ /theg chen chos la mos nas yang/ /man ngag bsgom la shin tu dga' / /slob dpon la ni man ngag gi/ /rna rgyud gcig tsam thos pas su/ /bsgoms pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas
367b6(rgyud 'grel): gong bzhin byung nas su/ /gzhan la yang ni ston par nus/ /yang na skye bdun gang zag ste/ /skyes ma thag tu yi dam lhas/ /rmi lam na ni chos bstan nas/ /man ngag de bsgoms dngos grub ni/ /phra mo dag ni thob nas kyang/ /gzhan la chos
367b7(rgyud 'grel): ni ston pa 'dus/ /de nas rim gyis gzhan yang 'byung/ /yang na skye bdun gang zag de/ /rkyen ni gnyis lo 'dzoms pa las/ /bsgom pa la ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /sngon gyi bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /'bad rtsol drag po ma byas par/ /thun
368a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig la ni sgom pa rnyed/ /de nas rims kyis bsgoms pas su/ /zhag bdun nas ni lung ston 'byung/ /de nas rim gsum gong ma bzhin/ /de nas mngon shes drug ldan nas/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /
368a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa'i dngos grub thams cad kun/ /skye ba 'di la phyag rgya thob/ /de ltar ma gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /gong ma bzhin du skye bdun du/ /len pa'i rtags ni gong bzhin 'byung/ /skye ba 'di thob tshul rnams kyang/ /theg chen snod du rung pa la
368a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur man ngag thob pa yis/ /dam tshig ma nyams bshags la brtson/ /bskyed rims bsnyan par gyur pas ni/ /lus kyi rnam rtog bzlogs nas kyang/ /rdo rje bzlas la brten nas kyang/ /ngag gi rnam rtog bzlog nas ni/ /sems
368a4(rgyud 'grel): dben pa la brtan par bya/ /sems kyi 'khrul rtog bzlog nas kyang/ /sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin la gnas nas/ /'od gsal la ni 'jug par bya/ /de nas spros med man ngag la/ /lhun gyis 'grub 'gyur phyag rgya'i mchog /yang na bskyed rim
368a5(rgyud 'grel): la brten nas/ /che la dbang pa'i rig 'dzin sgrub/ /tshe la dbang sgrub rig 'dzin gyis/ /rdzogs pa'i man ngag bsgom par bya/ /des su phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'thob/ /yang na bskyed rim brtan pa yis/ /rdzogs pa'i man ngag gar bsgoms
368a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /zla ba drug gis phyag rgya 'thob/ /rdzogs rims bskyed pa la brten nas/ /de nas rdzogs pas rdzogs pa'i ni/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par gsungs/ /de ni slob dpon chen po'i gzhung/ /spyir na lta ba gdeng 'gyur gtso/ /lan cig
368a7(rgyud 'grel): ldog bya'i tshul du ni/ /byas nas the tshom mi skye zhing/ /ldog par mi 'gyur 'byung pas kyang/ /tshugs par mi 'gyur 'bras bu myur/ /de ltar ma gyur rnal 'byor pas/ /man ngag nyams su yon par bya/ /man ngag bsgoms par stobs kyis
368b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yis lung ston pas/ /lung ston pa'i dus su ni/ /lta ba man ngag zab mo ni/ /bstan pa bsgoms pas phyag rgya 'thob/ /yang na rnal 'byor rim pas ni/ /slo yi rab 'bring khyad par ni/ /bag chags rkyen la sogs pa yis/ /rab 'bring
368b2(rgyud 'grel): dgu dang gsum dang ni/ /dbye bar bya ba'i don shes bya/ /rgyu rkyen 'dzom pa'i gang zag ni/ /skye ba 'di la lung ston pas/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rkyen ni rab tu mang gyur pa'i/ /rab kyi 'bring sogs ldan pa can/ /bar mdo la lung
368b3(rgyud 'grel): ston no/ /rab kyi tha ma ldan pa ni/ /skye ba phyi ma lung bston ni/ /'bring gi gsum po'i rigs ldan yang/ /gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi ru sbyar/ /tha ma'i rigs ldan gsum pa yang/ /lnga dang drug dang bdun du sbyar/ /yang na rkyen sogs ldan gyur kyang
368b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal sogs pa'i nus pa rnams/ /drag zhan gyi ni rim pa yis/ /rkyen gyi tshul bzhin sbyor shes bya'o/ /rgyu rkyen gnyi ga 'bring sogs kyi/ /rim pa dang ni ldan pa rnams/ /gong ma gnyis mthun pas/ /gsum dang bdun du sbyar shes
368b5(rgyud 'grel): byar? gnyis gzhan par gyur pa na/ /gsang sngags song du mi rung bas/ /dbang bskur mi bya 'jug pa tsam/ /dge ba'i sa bon chung gyur kyang/ /smon lam btab pa'i dad ldan ni/ /gsang sngags la ni mos gyur nas/ /yang nas yang du gsol
368b6(rgyud 'grel): 'debs la/ /phyi yis dbang bskur tsam byas la/ /mi za ba dbyibs kyi man ngag bstan/ /de las bstan pa'i gang zag la/ /lhag ma rnams ni rims kyi bstan/ /yang na rnal 'byor rim pa ni/ /yi dam lha tshogs so so ru/ /so so bag chags
368b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pa dang/ /mos pa la sogs rim pa yis/ /the tshom la sogs med mod kyang/ /dngos grub 'grub par ma 'gyur na/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du shes kyi/ /tha mi dad par bsgoms nas kyang/ /man ngag yang yar spos kyang ni/ /'gal bar?
369a1(rgyud 'grel): med de dngos grub 'grub/ /de ltar byas kyang ma byung na/ /sgrib pa shin tu che gsungs pas/ /sbyin sregs 'khor tshogs bzlas brjod dang/ /gtor ma la sogs cho ga yis/ /bdun nas stong gi bar du ni/ /mkhas pas?
369a2(rgyud 'grel): ci nus rgyud brtags la/ /tshogs sdig pa sbyad ba gsungs/ /lus kun la ni gnod pa yi/ /tsher ma'i phung pos lam rnams 'gags/ /me yi sbyor ba mkhas pa yis/ /bsregs pas thams cad med par byed/ /de nas lam ni
369a3(rgyud 'grel): rnyed nas ni/ /gang du phyin par 'gro bar byed/ /de bzhin sngags sogs mthun rnams kyis/ /sgrib pa la sogs bcom nas kyang/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi lam rnyed nas/ /dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur/ /dngos grub khyad par
369a4(rgyud 'grel): ma thob kyang/ /phra mo la sogs thob par 'gyur/ /mtshan ma'i lung ston phra mo 'byung/ /gal te de ltar ma gyur par/ /tshe dbang mthob rnal 'byor pas/ /sgrib pa rnams ni byang gyur nas/ /skye ba phyi ma la sogs su/ /dngos grub kyang  ni thob par 'gyur/ /yang na sngags kyi mthu rnams kyis/ /sdig sgrib rtsad nas ma chod kyang/ /che long rags pa mgo bcem nas/ /gzhan dag mi skye mgo gnon zhing/ /dam tshig ma nyams bshags la brtson/ /smon lam dge
369a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsa bsngo legs pas/ /skye ba 'di rjes gzhan dag tu/ /dus dang gnas dang slob dpon dang/ /grogs dang phyag rgya man ngag sogs/ /skyes ma thag tu rnyed par 'gyur/ /de ru dam tshig sngon sogs pas/ /rims kyis skye bdun
369a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud nas su/ /'bad rtsol drag por byas par/ /sangs rgyas sal 'gro bar gsungs/ /de sogs lung bstan sbyor ba rnams/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i lung ston du/ /rnal 'byor mkhas par shes par bya/ /'di ni blo dman don ched du/ /
369b1(rgyud 'grel): cung zad bsdus te bstan pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi lung ston kyang/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa/ /'jig rten 'das la gnyis yod de/ /sa nas rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro dang/ /bde gshegs byin brlabs mkha' 'gro'o/ /mkha' 
369b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro de dag gnyi ga yang/ /mdzes pa'i gzugs dang mi mdzes pa'i/ /gzugs ni sna tshogs sprul nas ston/ /de la 'jig dang mi 'jigs dang/ /re dang dogs pa'i sems spangs te/ /phyag rgya brda la sogs pa yi/ /ston pa'i dus
369b3(rgyud 'grel): su las rnams ni/ /ston par shes par ma gyur na/ /dngos grub med de nyams par 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan cher skyed la/ /man ngag thos pa che ba gces/ /thos pa che bar ma gyur yang/ /gang sgrub rgyud skor la sogs la/ /slob dpon
369b4(rgyud 'grel): la ni yang nas yang/ /the tshom chod par mnyan par bya/ /rgyud rnams thos par mi nus pas/ /sgrub pa'i cha rkyen bcu bdun po/ /shes rab de ni ma byas na/ /dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /slob dpon la ni brten pa yis/ /ma
369b5(rgyud 'grel): tshang yang ni 'grub par gsungs/ /'jig rten pa la gnyis yod do/ /rgyal bas bka' la brtags pa yis/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung pa dang/ /bdud ni nag po la sogs pa/ /dam lam thogs par tsheng mkhan/ /de ltar
369b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su ma shes na/ /dngos grub thob kyang slar la 'tshor/ /de gnyis gzugs dang rtags sogs pa/ /gong ma bzhin du ston pas na/ /de yi rim pa gong bzhin bya/ /de dag brtags par cho ga yang/ /zhag gsum zhag
369b7(rgyud 'grel): bdun rtsa gcig tu/ /ri dogs la sogs thams cad kun/ /spangs nas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin la/ /nan tan du ni brtson 'grus bya/ /tshogs 'khor la sogs yang dang yang/ /byed pa'i dus su rdo rje glu/ /lin? cing phyag rgya sogs bstan pas
370a1(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin phyag rgya gsal ba dang/ /mtshan ma la sogs gsal 'bar zhing/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri la sogs/ /thams cad brtan zhing mi 'gyur na/ /lha yi mtshan mar shes par bya/ /de las bzlog pa thams cad
370a2(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /bdud kyi rtags su shes par bya/ /de la sogs pa mdza' yas mchog /mkha' 'gro'i lung du bstan pas na/ /'dir ni sgrub po'i don du bsdus/ /sgrub pa'i cha rkyen man ngag rnams/ /sgrub po nyams su len pa la/ /bstan shing?  spel na bsod nams 'phel/ /nyams su mi len ser sna can/ /rdzas dang las srog la sogs pa/ /bla ma la ni 'bul mi nus/ /de la man ngag bstan mi bya/ /de la man ngag bstan pa na/ /dngos grub nyams te sdig pa 'phel/ /dam tshig
370a3(rgyud 'grel): nyams nas mkha' 'gros gseng/ /cha rkyen la sogs bcu bdun po/ /ston pa phyag na rdo rje yis/ /sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la/ /rna ba brgyud pa'i gdams ngag de/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la bstan/ /des ni ro langs ma la
370a4(rgyud 'grel): bstan/ /gnod sbyin phyag na rdo rje dang/ /slob dpon phyag na rdo rje yis/ /brgyud pa'i gdams ngag rim pa rnams/ /nan tan gyis ni brtsal bar bya/ /de la brtsal bam shes na/ /dper na yid bzhin nor bu ni/ /klu rgyal gtsugs
370a5(rgyud 'grel): nas rnyed nas ni/ /'dam rdzab nang du stong ba bzhin/ /de bzhin man ngag rin chen 'di/ /lus ngag yid gsum dka' ba yi/ /sgo nas slob dpon la btsal nas/ /dam med rmongs pa'i lag shor na/ /dngos grub ni/ thob nyams
370a6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan bskyed de btsal/ /lung bstan pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ka'o/ /slob dpon chen po b+ha bas mdzad pa rdzogs/ //lotsA ba tshul khrims gzhon nus bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o// //
370b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje las kyi cho gas rim par phye ba'i cho ga slob dpon b+ha bas mdzad pa bzhugs so/ //rgya gar skad du/ badzra sutra tsakra karma bid+hi/ bod skad du/ rdo rje las kyi tshogs rim par phye ba'i cho ga /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsnams
370b2(rgyud 'grel): pa la dad cing gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can la ni phan pa'i phyir/ /las kyi tshogs ni bdud rtsi mtshungs/ /rgyad rnams kun las btus nas ni/ /bdag gis sgrub bo'i don du bshad/ /las rnams thams cad ci byed kyang/ /gtor ma'i las
370b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di grogs su 'gyur/ /de bas gtod ma sngon la bshad/ /gtor ma'i las rnams kun la yang/ /ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dang/ /tshigs bcad rdzas kyi nus pa'i mthus/ /de lnga tshogs na las rnams 'grub/ /de yang ting 'dzin rgyal
370b4(rgyud 'grel): po'i tshul/ /bram ze sngags kyi nus mthu can/ /rje'u rigs phyag rgya nyid dang mthun/ /tshigs bcad tha ma la spyod pa 'dra/ /rdzas ni kun gyi bzhi rten 'gyur/ /de yang spyi dang khyad par ro/ /spyi ni kun gyi nu mthu can/ /nus pa drag po 'byin pa yin
370b5(rgyud 'grel): khyad par so so kun la yang/ /nus pa che chung rim pa 'byung/ /de yi rnal 'byor dam pa yang/ /las dang po ni mos pa 'jog/ /dngos grub phra mo phrin las dbang/ /ye shes phra mos phrin las rdzogs/ /ye shes can ni de nyid thob/ /yang dag
370b6(rgyud 'grel): pas ni bya ba rdzogs/ /rnal 'byor de lnga'i rim pas kyang/ /gtor ma la sogs las rnams la/ /ting 'dzin la sogs 'jug thabs lnga/ /man ngag can gyi shes par bya/ /de bzhin las rnams kun la yang/ /man ngag can gyis spyad bar bya'o/ /
370b7(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma dbul ba'i rim pa yang/ /mgron gyi lha ni gnyis mu? bya/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa/ /'jig rten 'das la gnyis yod gde/ /bde gshegs sprul dang sa la gnas/ /de dag gnyis la'ang spyi dang ni/ /so so'i khyad par
371a1(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya/ /'jig rten pa la gnyis yod de/ /spyi dang so so'i khyad par ro/ /spyi ni khams gsum sems can kun/ /khyad par chos skyong gsungs ma rnams/ /de la khyad par so so la/ /dpag tu med pa yod mod
371a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /dgos pa bsdus pa bstan par bya/ /gtor ma'i rdzas rnams bstan pa ni/ /thun mong rdzas dang khyad par rdzas/ /thun mong drug cur sbyar zhes bya/ /khyad par bdud rtsi rnam lnga dang/ /dkar gsum bang mar gsum sogs dang/ /
371a3(rgyud 'grel): sha sna khrag la sogs pa dang/ /mgron gyi skabs dang sbyar bar bya/ /ting 'dzin bstan pa'i rim pa yang/ /bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar skyed la/ /mtshan dang ldan pa'i snod mchog du/ /nyi zla'i gdan bsam bdud rtsi bsam/ /
371a4(rgyud 'grel): sa bon las skyeng nges su tshan/ /de 'og me dang rlung ni bsam/ /de yi steng du rdo rje bsam/ /de yi steng du ri bo can/ /yi ge oM gyis mtshan pa yin/ /hUM bskyod pas ni rlung 'byung bas/ /me 'bar bdud rtsi drod par 'gyur/ /oM
371a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi ye shes bdud rtsi phab/ /rdo rjes dkrug cing sku gsung bzlas/ /dri med dag pa'i bdud rtsir gyur/ /de ni thun mong ting 'dzin yin/ /khyad par so so'i skabs su bstan/ /thun mong gi ni sngags bstan pa/ oM bud+ha rA ki ni
371a6(rgyud 'grel): sarba sa? la? ti kha kha khA hi/ oM badzre DA?? ki nI sarba baM liM ta kha kha khA hi/ oM ratna DA ki nI sarba ba liM ta kha kha khA hi/ oM pad+ma DA ki nI sarba ba liM ta kha kha khA hi/ oM bi shwa DA ki nI sarba ba liM ta kha kha khA hi/ oM sarba DA ki nI sarba?
371a7(rgyud 'grel): ba liM ha kha kha khA hi/ khyad par gyi sngags bsnyan pa ni/ oM badzra DA ki bya ba khye ra ci/ ru pha kA kA sya tsi la kA la ru ba/ i maM ba li gri ha tu sa ma yaM raksha n+tu ya theSh+Ta sarba sid+d+ha mme pra yats+tshandu hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ tshigs bcad kyi
371b1(rgyud 'grel): ni rim pa yang/ /spyi dang khyad par gnyis su bstan/ /spyi yi tshigs bcad bstan pa ni/ /mkha' dbyings rnam dag klong dkyil nas/ /smon lam thugs rje dbang gis na/ /mkha' 'gro mi zad sku sprul nas/ /'jig byed 'jigs pa'i sku 'chad
371b2(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /sku la sgribs pa mi mnga' yang/ /'gro ba sems can don slad du/ /bdud rtsi las gsogs gsol mdzad ma/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /bud+d+ha mkha' 'gro dpal 'bar ba/ /smug nag 'bar ba'i
371b3(rgyud 'grel): ral ba can/ /stobs ldan drag shul sku 'chang ma/ /sku yi stobs ldan mthu chen las/ /sku yi lha mo'i sprul pa 'gyed/ /bud+d+ha mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas rnams/ /yang sprul smug mo 'bum gyis skor/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis

372a1(rgyud 'grel): mo 'bum gyis bskor/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /las kyi mkha' 'gro dpal 'bar ma/ /ljang nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can/ /las rnams mdzad pa'i rigs ldan ma/ /phyag zhabs

372a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma/ /rdo rje nam mkha' 'gro ba'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /sa la 'gro ba'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /rdo rje 'og 'gro ma dang/ /bar snang 'gro ba'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang shugs 'gro ma/ /ma mo'i tshogs dang sring mo'i tshogs/ /

372a5(rgyud 'grel): so'i tshigs bcad ni/ /mkha' la spyod pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /bya rogs gzugs can 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /pad+ma las gnas kha' gdong ma/ /thod pa kha TwAM ga yis brgyan/ /gri gug gcod mdzad thod khrag 'thung/ /phyag bzhi
372a6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin rol pa mdzad/ /zhal gyi nga ngos bdud rnams rgyal/ /spyan gsum smin ma'i dkyus ldan ma/ /spyan gsum 'od kyis khams gsum gsal/ /rol pa'i 'dug stangs gar dang ldan/ /sgeg pa la sogs ro ldan pa/ gar
372a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi spyod ldan mkha' 'gro ma/ /khro bo'i rgyal po stobs chen rnams/ /sbyor ldan tshul gyis 'khor gyis bskor/ /'khor bcas ma lus thams cad kyang/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /mkha' 'gro
372b1(rgyud 'grel): chen mo sa spyod ma/ /khyi yi gdong can 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /spyan mig glog 'gyu stong mdzad ma/ /zhal gdangs pas ni khams gsum rdud/ /phyag gi gar gyis dgyes par mdzad/ /sku yi sgeg pas rol pa ldan/ /zhabs kyis 'byung po?
372b2(rgyud 'grel): zil gyi gon na/ /drag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /sa 'og gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /gau ri nag mo chen mo ni/ /nya yi gdong can 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /spyan gsum
372b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'bar ba yis/ /khams gsum ma lus skrag par byed/ /zhal gyis sa 'og sems can gsol/ /phyag gi dri yis nyams rnams btub/ /zhabs rnams rol pas sa 'og gnon/ /gar gyi 'gying? tshul la brtson pa/ /ha ha hi hi
372b4(rgyud 'grel): sgra sgrogs ma/ /drag po'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyi 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /phyogs spyod gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /thod pa 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas/ /rdo rje hUM bdag gtso bdag mdzad/ /sdigs
372b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzug rdo rje 'gying bag can/ /shin tu mi bzad 'jigs mdzad ma/ /spyan ni sngon po'i mdog dang ldan/ /'bar bar sngon por rab tu khyab/ /bskyang bskum tshul gnas ma mo non/ /de 'khor phyogs spyod mkha' 'gro ma/ /shar gyis phyogs kyi
372b6(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa mo/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum gang la brtson/ /rdub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las/ /phreng ba spyi blugs bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /lho na gnas pa'i khyab 'jug ma/ /
372b7(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig spyan gsum gang la brtson/ /rdub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las/ /'khor lo pad+ma bsnams pa'o mkha' 'gro ma/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /nub na gnas pa'i gzhon nu ma/ /zhal gcig
373a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum gar la brtson/ /rdub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las/ /rtse gsum phreng ba rnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /byang na gnas pa'i gshin rje cas? /zhal
373a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig spyan gsum gar la brtson/ /rdub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las/ /dbyug pa mi mgo bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /me yi phyogs na gnas pa'i tsa muN+Di?/ /zhal gcig
373a3(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum gar la brtson/ /rdub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las/ /'khor lo seng ge bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /srin po'i phyogs na gnas pa'i tsa muN+Di/ /zhal
373a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig spyan gsum gar la brtson/ /rdub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las/ /ral gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyi 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /dbang ldan mtshams na gnas pa'i dbang
373a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan ma/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum gar la brtson/ /rdub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las/ /mdung thung thod pa bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /rlung gi phyogs na gnas pa'i
373a6(rgyud 'grel): rlung lha ma/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum gang la brtson/ /rdub dang skrag dang 'dzin pa'i las/ /gos dang thong pa bsnams pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas rnams/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod
373a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhes/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo thang? spyod ma/ /khyung mchog rdo rje 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /de yi thugs las sprul pa mo /mkha' 'gro drag mo mthu mo che/ /ro langs ma ni za la dga' / /gtum mo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can/ /
373b1(rgyud 'grel): seng ge chen mo 'chod byed ma/ /stag mo chen mo 'khyug byed ma/ /'ug gdong chen mo mun pa 'joms/ /lce spyang ma ni khrag tu za/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo 'khor bcas kyang/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /
373b2(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro chen mo gzhon nu ma/ /sku mdog ser mo 'od zer 'bar/ /'od zer phreng ba stong phrag 'phro/ /mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can/ /mya ngan med pa'i me tog phreng /dbu la
373b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa'i rgyan du byas/ /zhal gsum phyag drug mthu mo che/ /sgeg cing rol dang bcas pa mo/ /gzhon nu chen mo 'khor bcas kyang/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo lhag sdud ma/ /
373b4(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod brgyad kyis dbus gnas pa/ /bcom ldan 'khor ba sgrol ba'i mchog /dar mo nga yi nang gnas pa/ /ljang khu'i mdog can 'gying bag can/ /gru gsum nang gi phyogs dag na/ /ye shes can dang mkha' 'gro ma/ /skyon ma gos
373b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gos dkar mo/ /nyon mongs 'khru phyed mA mA kI/? 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing drag /mkha' 'gro chen mo khyod bzhi yang/ /lhag sdud rnams kyi gtse mor grags/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo lhag sdud rnams/ /dru khrod brgyad kyi phyogs
373b6(rgyud 'grel): dag na/ /kha TwAM ga dang mgo la sogs/ /thod pa rnams kyis yongs su brgyan/ /shing gcig dang ni ldan pa nyid/ /khra dang khyi dang spyang gu dang/ /seng ge stag dang byi la dang/ /bya rgod la sogs 'khor gyis bskor/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma
373b7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis/ /mnyes par spras pa'i gzugs 'dzin ma/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo keng rus ma/ /drag po gri gug snod thogs pa/ /gri gug gcod pa'i las mdzod cig /thod pa'i khrag ni 'thung bar byed/ /sra? bshig pa la spyan gsum
374a1(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /yi dags zhal du rdub par byed/ /drag po mi bzang gsum pa 'phyang/ /thod pa 'bar ba'i rgyan dang ldan/ /rgyu ma'i phreng bas nges par brgyan/ /stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ /mi yi drus pa'i
374a2(rgyud 'grel): phreng ldan pa'i/ /ska rags khrag gi thig le can/ /yi dags klang pa'i tshil dang zhag /lus la byugs pa la dgyes pa/ /lag 'gro chen mo'i rna cha can/ /brang 'gro'i rkang gdub 'jigs rung ba/ /kha dog dkar po 'bar ba'i
374a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs/ /gzi brjid thub pa dag pa yi/ /shin tu mi zad khros pas ni/ /gnod sbyin la sogs bsdigs par byed/ /ha ha chen po'i sgra sgrogs pa/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo dud sol gdong/ /de 'dra'i mkha' 'gro dpag med dang/
374a4(rgyud 'grel): sha za la sogs 'khor gyis bskor/ /'khor bcas ma lus thams cad kyis/ /'dir gshegs lhag ma'i gtor ma bzhes/ /lhag ma'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ /las rnams ma lus myur du mjod/ /khyed kyi las rnams
374a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad tshul ni/ /rgyal ba shAkya thub bstan pa la/ /gnas pa'i rnal 'byor bsrung ba dang/ /bstan pa gnyan po bsrung ba dang/ /nad rnams ma lus bzlog pa dang/ /de la sogs pa'i las rnams kun/ /myur du mdzad cing bsrung du
374a6(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /gzhan yang bcol ba'i las rnams ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bshig pa dang/ /rgyal khams yongs su smod pa dang/ /dge 'dun 'du ba'i sgo 'phrog dang/ /gsang sngags theg chen smod
374a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /rnal 'byor spyi yi dgrang gyur rnams/ /mkha' 'gro khyed kyi myur du sgrol/ /sha za mo ni 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /dur khrod gnas pa'i shing gcig la/ /rtse mor gnas bcas kun tu lta/ /gcer bu sgra bshig sha za
374b1(rgyud 'grel): ma/ rtag tu sha ni za bar byed/ /sha za 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /'dir gshegs mchod pa dam pa bzhes/ /mkha' lding rgyal po gser mig can/ gdong gcig pa la lag bzhi ba/ /kha dog dkar po'i 'od chen ldan/ /gser kyi
374b2(rgyud 'grel): gshog pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /nor bu baiDUrya yi chu/ /rkang gzer byi ru las byung ba/ /shel ltar dkar ba'i mdog dang ldan/ /skye ba'i gnas su bdud rtsis bkang/ /phyag gi bum 'dzin phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'od zer dmar po'i tshogs kyis
374b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /mkha' lding bar phyag 'khor bcas spros/ /gshog brur brgyab pas rgya mcho skams/ /klu rnams ma lus zas su za/ /mkha' lding rgyal po 'khor bcas rnams/ /'khor gshegs mchod 'dam pa bzhes/ /klu yi rgyal po gzi
374b4(rgyud 'grel): brjid can/ /klu chen brgyad du sku sprul pa/ /klu chen rgyal po nor rgyas bu/ /sku mdog dkar po skyen ma gos/ /shar phyogs klu rnams 'dul mdzad pa/ /skul? mgo can la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /klu yi rgyal po 'jog po ni/ /sku mdog ser po sprul
374b5(rgyud 'grel): mgon na/ /byang phyogs la gru rnams 'dul mdzad pa/ /sbrul zhags bsnams la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /klu chen rgyal po stobs kyi rgyu/ /sku mdog dmar po sgrul mgo can/ /nub phyogs klu rnams 'dul mdzad pa/ /mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal
374b6(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /klu chen rgyal por pad+ma'i ?? rgyal/ /sku mdog sngon po sbrul mgo can/ /lho phyogs klu rnams 'dul mdzad pa/ /yon tan rgyas la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /klu chen rgyal po pad+ma che/ /sku mdog dkar ser sprul mgo can/ /dbang ldan klu rnams
374b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dul mdzad pa/ /skyon ma gos la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /klu chen rgyal po dur skyor ni/ /sku mdog dkar sngo sbrul mgo can/ /shar lha'i klu rnams 'dul mdzad pa/ /dug rnams 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /klu chen rgyal po rigs lnga ni/ /
375a1(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog sngo dmar sbrul mgo can/ /lho nub klu rnams 'dul mdzad pa/ /stobs po che la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /klu chen rgyal po pad+ma 'khyil/ /sku mdog dmar ser sgrul mgo can/ /nub byang klu rnams 'dul
