378a2(rgyud 'grel): thogs myur du bsgral du gsol/ /rnal 'byor lcam dral bsrung ba dang/ /rims nad yams nad bcad pa dang/ /mi mthun rkyen dbang bzlog du gsol/ /de nas gsang sngags bstan bya ste/ /sngags rnams nus pa'i mthu yis ni/ /
378a3(rgyud 'grel): dug rnams 'joms shing thams cad sbyong/ /sngags rnams so so'i tshigs bcad dang/ /sbyar ba ru ni shes par bya/ /yang na sngags rnams phyogs gcig gtang/ /tshigs bcad kyang ni phyogs gcig btang/ /de ni man ngag skabs
378a4(rgyud 'grel): shes bya'o/ /skabs rnams de ni ma shes na/ /nus pa'i mthu ni nyams par 'gyur/ /yang na tshigs bcad gcig pus kyang/ /gang yin don rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i tshigs bcad don ldan ni/ /sngags dang 'dra ba nyid du
378a5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /rdo rje tshig gi khyad par gyi/ /sngags kyi lha yi yon tan gyi/ /don rnams kun ni brjod pas su/ /don dam kun rdzob las mi 'da' / /don dam kun rdzob brjod tshig du/ /sngags mtshon byed pa'i rdo rje'i tshig/ /de la sngags zhes bya ba
378a6(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /oM na ma sh+rI badzra DA kI ye/ oM zha? kA sye hUM hUM phaT/ oM a yan+t+ra yaM du DA ki bya sha na thag tra ma ho/ /gra b+hi ma wa/ i sha i maM pi li/ /b+hu nya dza ji g+h+ra pi pa gri h+Nata/ A ta a kaM puSh+TiM ku ru/ /sa ma ya ma nu sma ra a hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shwa
378a7(rgyud 'grel): na se b+hu ce ri e i me ba lI/ gihUM thaM hUM/ hUM hUM phaT/ oM e hye hi ma hA pA la ba ryi ba ra kram yo dza na sa ha sre pra laM bar? pu shaM/ ti li ti si gi yi ma hA ti ming gi li bra b+h+ri ha yo ma hA mi na a d+hi pa ti ya a sa ni ni ha ta b+ha ban+tu/ ma ma a baM be ta wa
378b1(rgyud 'grel): id+d+hi ma bi ta ra na tu swAhA/ oM A A i a'i u a'u ri rI li lI e i o oM a(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM na mo b+ha ga b te badzra hUM ka ra/ h+rim Sh+TaM sarba b+hU ta ni staM b+ha swAhA/ oM bra hmai hpaM/ htsaM hUM phaT/ oM ba sha bi hUM phaT/ oM kau mA rI ya h+ri hUM phaT/ oM ya me hI hUM
378b2(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ oM ko pAM rI ye hUM phaT/ oM tsa muN+Te ya hUM phaT/ oM i shA n+yai h+ri hUM phaT/ oM me prA h+ri hUM phaT/ oM a A aM a/ a kU ro mu khaM sarba d+ha rmA NI a tya nu tpa n+na twang oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ oM tA re tut+tA re A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ oM mA ri syo? ngar la
378b3(rgyud 'grel): b+ha d+ha li bA ra hA mu khi sarba du Shbu naM mu khaM/ b+ha ma dta b+ha na d+ha hUM hUM phaT/ aM maM ba li pra tI ts+tsha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ma hUM phaT swA tA/ oM mA hA kA a ya ti a A hi/ me hA bi ha ra ba lan barba DA kI ni ya kA rak+Sha sa pa ri ba po/ at+tA sa n+ni haM to b+ha bas swAhA/
378b4(rgyud 'grel): oM a ra sho ri ka ji A rya saM bya pa ti Sh+Thi ta/ sarba da sha di ka lo ka d+hA tu pa ra ma n+ya pa ran tang par ting/ sarba ti ga lo ka pa ya/ /mA hA kA la badzra A u d+ha mA ya badzra/ badzra na ma badzrag la badzra mu sa la nA gA badzra/ /badzra e ni la/ badzra she na DA/
378b5(rgyud 'grel): badzra kro d+ha/ ba dzra pra pa/ badzre ka na dta shaMpa ri pu ra/ sa thA ya bA/ hA sAM sa ngaM mar ma sarba sa sa taM naM tsa/ satu kha sid+d+hi ye swatA/ ya kA b+ha banju hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra DA ki sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya/ badzra DA ki tre ni pa ti tha DI Dha me b+ha ba/ su toM khyo me b+ha
378b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ gzhu rag to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+hi mme bra yats+tsha/ sarba ka rma su tsa me/ /tsit+ta sh+rI yaM ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ /b+ha ga bA na/ sarba ta thA ga ta DA ki ma me mu ny+tsa/ DA kI b+ha pa mahA sa ma ya satwa a(rgyud 'grel): mu(rgyud 'grel): oM dri ta raSh+Ta a ga gan d+ha dza
379a1(rgyud 'grel): se nra d+hi pa ta ye i i ba lI pra tits+tsha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ya hUM hUM phaT swAhA(rgyud 'grel): oM bam sh+ra ra pa na ya yak+Sha se nA d+hi pa taM ye i maM pi laM pra tI ts+tsha sa ma ye ma nu sma ra A(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM bai bu Dda kA ya ma hA ku ma b+ha d+ha rnyis
379a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ta ye/ i maM bi laM pra tI ts+tsha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra A(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT swAha'/ oM bo ru pa k+Sha ma hA nA gA d+hi pa ta ye i maM pi laM pra ti ts+tsha/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra A(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM gaM d+ha rba a b+hi pa ta yaM pi tsa tra/ a g+ha nd+d+ha yo/ /me ma ka rya sa ta ye/ oM
379a3(rgyud 'grel): ha yan+tu/ b+ha ga bI badzra d+ha ra shas ni tiSh+Tha n+tu/ a tra saM ne ha ti b+hya bo swAhA/ oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+ha rmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+ha ba shu d+d+ho haM/ oM a kA ngi mu khaM sarba d+ha rma Ni A dya nu tda n+na twA da oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ oM a ra li ho dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ badzra DA kI nya
379a4(rgyud 'grel): sa ma yi staM dri sh+ya ho/ /oM pi tsi pi tsi sma she na rba si b+ho/ /ma hA pi shA ci b+hya/ /i mdaM baM liM g+hi h+Na ta b+hu nyja tha pi pa tha/ ma mSh+Ta sid+h mai pra ya ts+tshi du swAhA/ oM d+he pa kI rE dza ya/ /A gats+tsha sarba duSh+TaM naM mu khaM b+han d+ha ku ru ma hA kA la ku ta bi sha ba hi ri
379a5(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI gras sa ma ye tiSh+Ta/ stuM stuM stuM sa sa sa hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta na bi tya sa ma ya sa mu dra/ spa ra Na sh+rI ye hUM oM na mo b+ha ga ba te A rya pa ra ma a shwa ya/ te thA ga tA ya/ a ra hA te/ saM mya ka saM bu d+ha ya/ oM
379a6(rgyud 'grel): tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ oM gri h+Na puShpa d+hU pa la li i maM sarba u ba tsa ra saM pan+naM/ kha gA d+hi pa te la kha khA hi sa ma ya ma nus sna ra a(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swahA/ oM e dza hya dza hi sham shA na wa se ni ma ma sa pa ri p+pA rar k+Sha ku ru i ha san ni hi ho b+ha ba swA
379a7(rgyud 'grel): pa swA hA/ oM ku ru wa pa tra li/ si d+d+huM mu khi pdma sha na kha si ni/ /pre ta wa ta ni tsa d+hi ka re li/ ru d+hi ra pri ye/ /sa ma ya rakA ti/ go gat+tsi/ ki li ki li/ ra be badzra pre ti wa na mi d+ha b+hu ny+dza ti/ b+ha ga ni gu hya na du te/ b+hu maM ga ri/ tsa Na Da kA ra li/ ti thung
379b1(rgyud 'grel): hiSh+Sha/ i mu u ts+tsha Sh+Na pa li grih+Na sarba du shT bak+Sha yA/ hUM phruM broM phaT swA ha'/ oM ba le pa ta le mahA pa ta le hUM hUM dzhta sA ha/ hUM hUM ho ho A ka rSha ya/ /A ka rSha ya/ /sa ma ya a d+hi pa te bO phaT sw'hA/ /oM A gats+tsha A gats+tsha ma hA nA nga/ a d+hi pa te sarba
379b2(rgyud 'grel): b+hur bu ba(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swA hA/ hUM a pa ra da ra/ oM pa ta la pa ta la b+ha k+Sha pri ya/ oM ki ni ma d+he hUM hUM swAhA/ oM d+ha na a d+ha pa te ye pa tal bruM swAtA/ oM ga ka ka ta ba b+ha ban d+ha na/ kha ga kha noh+na/ sarba duSh+TaM naM/ ha na ha na/ ga ga ga ta ya/ oM mu na sya/
379b3(rgyud 'grel): shIM n+ti ku ru hUM hUM phaT dzre swahA/ oM ti Sh+Tha hUM bak+Sha dzdza dzdza swAhA/ /de ltar sngags rnams bstan nas ni/ /khyad par byin brlab bstan pa ni/ /de nas blo dang ldan pa yis/ /gal ta sbyong ba gzhan dang bcas/ /tshon chen gyis ni gos dag gam/ /dang
379b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa gon nas ni/ /rdo rje dril bu nga ba bzhin du/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes pa'i brgyan/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyags rnams su/ /las kyi skabs dang bstun te blta/ /'dug stangs la sogs de bzhin sbyar/ /bskyed pa'i
379b5(rgyud 'grel): smin pa tshul bzhin bsgom/ /myur bar 'dod na rdzus skyes tshul/ /mchong bya sprul dang spyan dang ba/ /gang 'dod pa ni bya ba yin/ /gnyis kas bya bar 'dod pa'ang yod/ /thun mong byin brlabs gong bzhin no/ /khyad par byin brlabs bstan pa
379b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ /zla ba oM rli bsams nas su/ /'od zer stobs kyis rnam rtog song/ /nyi ma? sogs bsams nas kyang/ /dri ma med par bsams par blta/ /gnyis ka'i hUM gi 'od du 'bar/ /has su bdud rtsi hu bar bsam/ /yi ge raM gyis
379b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma bspegs/ /yaM gyis bregs pa gtor bar bya/ /khaM gyis bdud rtsi dri med 'gyung/ /oM gyis gang 'dod don rnams 'grub/ /hUM gis sbyangs nas as su 'bar/ /oM gyis rtogs par bya ba yin/ /has su gzugs bcom
380a1(rgyud 'grel): h+ri yis na/ /rol sogs pa bcom pa yin/ /hos su bdud rtsi 'bar bar bsam/ /yang na jis su ro dang hos su dri/ /bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin nyid du blta/ /ri rab rdo rjes dkrugs nas kyang/ /ye shes bdud rtsi bstim pa
380a2(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ /hUM ni gcig pus sbyang zhing bsreg /ye shes kyang ni des su dbab/ /so so rtsa ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /lan gsum lan bdun brjod pas su/ /sbyang zhing byin gyis brlab pa dang/ /sngags rnams so so'i nus mthu ni/ /brgyad rnams
380a3(rgyud 'grel): so so dag nas ni/ /'byung ba dag gis brlab pa 'am/ /sngags ni gong ma lan zhes bya/ /so so lha yi yig 'brus kyang/ /lan gsum lan bdun sbyang pa yin/ /de ltar byin brlabs man ngag rnams/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten
380a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /byin brlab man ngag skabs dang sbyar/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i las rnams so/ /phyag rgya bcings pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /thun mong phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /rdo rje thal mo'i tshul du ni/ /bcangs nas kha ni dbye ba dang/ /rdo rje se gol gtogs
380a5(rgyud 'grel): la'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i gung mo bsgreng/ /mthe chung mthe pos so sor bkug / mdzub mo srin lag nung zang dgug /mkha' lding dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rtse gsum phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /
380a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyab dang rgyab du sbyar bar bya/ /pad+ma ma gdugs sprel nas su/ /dkar po dang ni 'gi hang bsgreng/ /dkar po nud zad bkug pa yis/ /lha min dgug pa'i phyag rgya yi/ /zla ba snod la reg nas ni/ /nyi ma rdo rje khu tshur bcing/ /dkar po bsgreng te
380a7(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab/ /zla las su tshur bstang na bcings la/ /rnam shes kyang nis gdugs brkyang/ /nyi ma lag pa legs brkyang ste/ /gdengs pa'i tshul du steng du sbyar/ /phyag rgyas snod la reg par bya/ /khu tshur gnyis ni sbyar nas su/ /snying
380b1(rgyud 'grel): kha'i phyogs su sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis sbyangs nas/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /pad+ma dag ni sa gdugs sbrel/ /dkar po'i 'gi har sgrog tu bya/ /de bzhin phyag rgyas byin brlab cing/ /dgug pa yang ni shes par? bya/ /phyag rgya'i man nag?
380b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan sogs kyang/ /skabs dang sbyar te shes par bya/ /gtor ma'i rdzas rnams so so dang/ /maN+Dal la sogs cho ga dang/ /de la sogs pa'i man ngag rnams/ /thabs rnams thob pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /sna tshogs gtor mas rgyas par bstan/ /
380b3(rgyud 'grel): de dang mthun par shes par bya/ /gtor ma'i las sna tshogs pa'i cho ga ste dang po'o// //tshogs kyi las kyi sbyor ka bstan pa ni/ /tshogs kyi bya ba'i rim pa rnams/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lor shes par bya/ /cho ga'i las rnams 'di
380b4(rgyud 'grel): ru bstan/ /'khro lo phyi nang gsang ba la/ /cho ga'i rim pa skabs dang sbyar/ /phyi mchod nang mchod gsang ba'i mchod/ /phyi mchod rim pa bstan pa ni/ /phyi la yang ni gnyis su bstan/ /mi zad dbyings kyi mchod pa ni/ /rnal 'byor rgyud du shes bar
380b5(rgyud 'grel): bya?/ mtshan ldan dri med snod mchog tu/ /byang chub sems kyi dri med chu/ /dkyil 'khor bzhugs pa'i lha la dbul/ /thugs rjes dgongs la bzhes su gsol/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtad do/ /oM na mo nI laM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni maN+Dal
380b6(rgyud 'grel): de pa lha nam/ /a ha pA dza ma g+ha snya? mu dra sta ra na sa ma ye hUM/ d+hu pa ni rA ta yA mi hUM/ a ro lig ni rya ta yA ma hUM/ puShpe/ d+hU pe/ A lo ke/ gan d+he/ nai bi dyai/ shabde/ nri tye/ nam pa sa/ spa rsha/ nan ratna/ sarba pastu/ gan d+ha rb+ha/ badzra lA sye hUM/ badzra mA le hUM
380b7(rgyud 'grel): badzra gI te hUM/ badzra nri tya hUM/ bA dzha d+hUM pa hUM/ badzra pu Shpe hUM/ pa dzra A lo ke hUM/ badzra gand+he hUM/ re re laM yang rdo rje'i glu gsum gsum brjod la/ /lha mo dpag med sbrul nas kyang/ /dkyil 'khor lha la mchod pa dbul/ /de nas mchod pa nyi shu ni/ /
381a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje glu ni phra mo yis/ /hUM gi glu dang sbyar bar bya/ /de nas pad kor sngon 'gro ba'i/ /sgeg pa'i tshul gyis sgog pa dang/ pi wang tshul gyis 'bud pa dang/ /gling bu'i tshul gyis 'bud pa dang/ sil snyan tshul gyis dkrol
381a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /brdabs pa'i chul gyis rdebs pa dang/ /gar gyi tshul gyis yan lag bskyod/ /rlung yab tshul gyis g.yob pa dang/ /rgyal mtshan tshul gyis bsgreng ba dang/ /bla res tshul gyis bre ba dang/ /ba dan tshul gyis 'phyar pa dang/ /cang te
381a3(rgyud 'grel): 'u tshul gyis rdebs pa dang/ /gdugs kyi tshul gyis dbub pa dang/ /rnga yi tshul gyis brdung ba dang/ /bzhad pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang/ /gar gyi tshul gyis gar byed dang/ /khro ba'i tshul gyis khro ba dang/ /sgeg pa'i tshul gyis sgeg pa
381a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /'gyid ba'i tshul gyis 'gyid ba dang/ /mda''dren tshul gyis 'khyad pa dang/ /rdo rje gsor zhing phyag 'tshal pa'i/ /tshul gyis 'dud bar byed pa ste/ /phyag rgya'i mchod pa nyi shu nyid/ /rdo rje dril bu rol bcas pa'i/ /glu yi sgra
381a5(rgyud 'grel): yis dga' bar bya/ /lha mo dpag med sprul nas ni/ /ji ltar mnyes pa'i mchod pa dbul/ /de nas bdud rtsi lnga po nyin/ /lha gsum gyis ni bsgrubs nas kyang/ /mtshan ldan snod mchog bkram nas kyang/ /nyi ma pad+mar bzhag par
381a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rdo rje srin mthab sbyar nas kyang/ /thigs pa'i gtor ma kun la dbul/ /rnal 'byor shes rab gar rnams bskor/ /yang na bzlog pas thabs kyang de/ /lan gsum mchod pas gnas gsum gyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi lha gsum
381a7(rgyud 'grel): mnyes/ /rdo rje glu dang ldan pa yis/ /sdags ni lan gsum brjod par bya/ /so so rtsa ba'i sngags mdza' la/ /bdud rtsi'i sngags ni gdab par bya/ /de nas lcags kyu lnga po ni/ /gang ma bzhin du dbul bar bya/ /lha mo drug gis mchod ba
381b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje'i lha mo ni/ /gzugs brnyan bzhin du rgyas mdzad ma/ /kha dog dbyibs ldan mchod ba 'bul/ /bde gshegs sbyan mchog rgyas gyur cig /sgra yi rdo rje lha mo ni/ /gsungs dbyangs yan lag brgyad ldan pa'i/ /sgra
381b2(rgyud 'grel): snyan yid 'ong mchod pa 'bul/ /bde gshegs snyan mchog rgyas gyur cig/ rdo rje lha mo dri ldan ma/ /dri zhim bdug spos dad bsrung ldan/ /dri zhim yid 'ong mchod 'bul bas/ /shangs kyi mchog rnams rgyas gyur cig /rdo rje lha mo ro ldan
381b3(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /ro mchog brgyad ldan mdzes pa 'di/ /yid 'ong dpag med mchod pa 'bul/ /bde gshegs ljags ni rgyas gyur cing/ /rdo rje lha mo reg ldan ma/ /na bza' ling ka mjos pa rnams/ /yid 'ong dpag med mchod pa 'bul/ /bde
381b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs sku rnams rgyas gyur cig/ /rdo rje lha mo chos ldan ma/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i chos sgrogs ma/ /ying 'ong dpag med mchod pa 'bul/ /bde gshegs thugs mchod rgyas gyur cig/ sems dpa' chen po dang po mchog /dkyes chen
381b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje snyems pa bdag po'i bdag /thugs kyis sems dpa' ting 'dzin mchog/ rdo rje'i rdo rje stobs po che/ /kun tu bzang po spyod pa'i mchog /bdud kyi bdud sde 'joms pa po/ /sems
381b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' kun gyi sems byang chub/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog skyes mchog /rdo rje hUM ste hUM mdzad pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug nor sbyin pa/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /'dod dang thor ba nor che ba/ /dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum
381b7(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa/ /mi rgyu ba ni mchog tu gsal/ /shin tu phra dang sbom po'i chogs/ /rgyu ba rnams kyi rab mchog brnyes/ /srid ba'i 'khor lo sbyong mdzad pa/ /thog mdza' med cing gsal ba min/ /shes rang
382a1(rgyud 'grel): sdud la rnam par gnas/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya snyoms zhugs pa/ /de nyid sems dpa' i che bas che/ /rdo rje khro bo khro chen po/ /'jigs pa'i me ni 'dul mdzad pa/ /gdugs pa'i mchog ni 'dul ba che/ /drag po'i drags cho ga
382a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub che/ /chos kyi las chen 'dzin pa po/ /dam chos la ni bzang ba'i lam/ /byang chub sems ni sbyod bar mdzad/ /thams cad dag tu pad+ma che/ /shes rab thabs kyi nor che ba/ /'dod
382a3(rgyud 'grel): chags dag pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /sna tshogs chags pa'i dbang phyug che/ /nam mkha' mdza' las rtags pa'i don/ /sems can kun gyi gnas chen po/ /dpal gyi 'byor ba 'byor ba'i rgyal/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /
382a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /dad pas khyed la 'dud bgyis pas/ /bdag sems rdo rje sems grub mdzod/ /rdo rje lha mo'i mchod pa dang/ /te na te te hUM zhes bya ba la sogs pa
382a5(rgyud 'grel): yang gtang ngo/ /dang po 'dren pa'i tshigs? bcad ni/ /'khor lo nyid dang mthun bar bya/ /bstod pa la sogs rgyas par bya'o/ /tha ma 'dren pa'i tshegs bcang ni/ /dam tshig sbyod pa thams cad la/ /tshigs bshad 'dis ni sbyin par bya/ /
382a6(rgyud 'grel): ltos shes mcos pa tham pa'i chos/ /'di la the tshom byar mi rung/ /khyi dang bram ze gdol pa gsum/ /rang bzhin cig pas ltan cig bza' / /pad+ma'i las skor sngon 'gro bas/ /gzhan gyis de bzhin bzung nas kyang/ /sbom pas chung du mnan
382a7(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang?/ /lhag ma rtse gsum lta bur bya/ /nyi mar zla ba bzhag nas ni/ /tshigs bcad 'di ni rjes su bzla/ /rin thang mang pa'i dam pa'i chos/ /'dod chags dri bral legs 'ong cing/ /gzungs dang mtshan ma rnam spangs pa/ /de nyid gnas la phyag
382b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /de nas rnal 'byor so so yi/ /nang gi 'khor lo gsal bsgoms nas/ /khrus ni rnam gsum bya bar gsungs/ /de dus rnal 'byor ci dgar rol/ /rdo rje sme gdung bshags pa ni/ /bdag cag rnal 'byor sgrub ba bos/ /bla ma yi dam lha dang
382b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor bzhugs pa'i spyan lam du/ /sdom pa gsum la gnas pa dang/ /khyad par nang gi sngom pa ni/ /sngo zhing bsgred bar khas blangs nas/ /tshul bzhin ma gyur bshags par bgyi/ /bla ma rdo rje slob dpon la/ /gshes shing smad pa la
382b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs bshags/ /bde gshegs dka' yis chos rnams la/ /gzhung bzhin ma gyur 'brul pa bshags/ /rnal 'byor lam cig spun rnams la/ /brtsod pa la sogs bgyis pa bshags/ /snying rje'i yul gyur sems can la/ /snying rje la sogs
382b4(rgyud 'grel): smangs pa bshags/ /chos rnams kun gyi bya? ba ste/ /byang sems phyi nang spangs pa bshags/ /rang dang gzhan gyi grub mdza' la/ /smad cing spangs par gyur ba bshags/ /ma smin pa yi sems can la/ /man ngag gsang ba bsgrags pa bshags/ /phung po
382b5(rgyud 'grel): ha yi dkyil 'khor la/ /smad cing spangs pa la sogs bshags/ /rang gzhan dag ba'i chos rnams la/ /the tshom la sogs bgyis pa bshags/ /bstan pa la gnod sems can la/ /ma bsgral byams pa bgyis pa bshags/ /chos nyid spros
382b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bral ba la/ /yod med mtshan mang brtags pa bshags/ /sems can dad dang ldan pa la/ /sems sun phyud bar byas pa bshags/ /dam tshig rnams la thams cad 'byung/ /ma brten bgrang bsngo ma bgyis bshags/ /bud med
382b7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab rang bzhin la/ /smad cing spangs pa la sogs bshags/ /rtsa ba'i dam tshig ji snyed kun/ /tshul bzhin ma bsrungs rngo ma thogs/ /bde gshegs bka' dang ma mthun pa/ /ji snyed pa gyis ba de dag kun/ /rdo rje slob dpon
383a1(rgyud 'grel): yi dam lha/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams dang/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas la/ /'gyod pa'i sems kyis mthol lo bshags/ /rnal 'byor ma ni byin brlabs ma bgyis par/ /nan ?
383a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bgyis pa bshags/ /bla ma'i man dag mthob par/ /nan rtegs chos rnams bgyis pa bshags/ /mi zab lam gcig sbun rnams la/ /rtsod pa la sogs bgyis pa bshags/ /gsang mchod man ngag shes gyur kyang/ /snod
383a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan rnams la ma bstan bshags/ /dang dang ldan pa'i sems can la/ /chos rnams log par bstan pa bshags/ /rnal 'byor la sogs mi shes par/ /sngags par nga rgyal bgyis pa bshags/ /lta ba sbyod pa mi gcig pa'i/ /nyan
383a4(rgyud 'grel): thos lam du zhag 'das bshags/ /phyi yi chos bshad yin pa la/ /gsang pa'i chos rnams bshad pa bshags/ /mdor na yan lag dam tshig rnams/ /nyin mtshan bgrang bsngom bgyis dang/ /bla ma mchod pa la sogs dang/ /
383a5(rgyud 'grel): bshags pa la sogs ma bgyis rnams/ /rdo rje slob dpon yo dam lha/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i lha rnams dang/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la bshags/ /mtshams med mi dge bshags pa dang/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi bshaD
383a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /mkha' 'gro'i gsar rgyud de zhan bya/ /de la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams/ /man ngag bsdebs su shes par bya/ /tshogs kyi las kyi sbyor ka ste/ /gnyis pa'o/ /sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga ni/ /sbyir na sbyin sreg las rnams la/ /
383a7(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams rtogs ma bzang par/ /bsam gyis mi khyab gsum med kyang/ /bsdus na bcu drug dag tu 'dus/ /de 'di bzhi ru 'dus pan/ /bzhi por ri dag la yang/ /rgyas dang bsdus dad shin tu bsdus/ /gsum gsum dag tu shes
383b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /dang po sa yi cho ga ni/ /brtan pa la sogs rgyas pa yang/ /cho ga la sogs gzhan dang mthun/ /bsdus pa'i cho ga bstan pa ni/ /lhag pa'i lha yi ting 'dzin gnas/ /sa yi bdag po rnams la ni na/ /gtor ma phul pas sa rnams
383b2(rgyud 'grel): blang/ /khro bo'i las rnams thams cad pa'i/ /phyag rgya bcas nas sngags rnams brjod/ /thugs kyi 'od zer dag gis ni/ /sa rnams sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs/ /shin tu bsdus pa'i cho ga ni/ /'od zer stobs kyi byin brlabs kyis/ /
383b3(rgyud 'grel): thab khung gang 'dad byin gyis brlabs/ /mchen ma la sogs dga' ba dang/ /rgyas par spro ba'i gang zag dang/ /las dang po yi gang zag gi /thabs rnams bru ba rgyas par bstan/ /mtshan ma la sogs mi dga' la/ /thabs rnams bri 'am
383b4(rgyud 'grel): me tog dgram/ /rnal 'byor nus pa thob pa yis/ /rin chen snod du bya yang bzod/ /yang na de dag shes rab chung/ /rgyas pa mi nus dag la bstan/ /thabs rnams bru ba'i rim pa yang/ /rgya ru ji tsam yod pa'i tshad/ /de yi phyed ni
383b5(rgyud 'grel): thur la pru/ /yang na sum cha bru ba 'am/ /mtho gang dag tu bru ba 'am/ /brgya yi tshad cam bru pa ni/ /rgyud rnams kun dang mthun par ni/ /mkhas pa yi ni shes par bya/ /kha khyer mur na tshad sogs kyang/ /so so'i gzhung dang mthun par bya
383b6(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi dbyings rnams bslan pa yang/ /zhi ba la ni zla ma bar ro/ /rgyas ba gru bzhi 'am rin chen dbyibs/ /dbang la zla gam tshul du'o/ /drag po gru gsum rnam par bstan/ /mdor na dbang dang drag po gnyis/ /go bzlog par ni
383b7(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa yang/ /de yam dgongs pas shes bar bya/ /gzhan yang thun mong las rnams la/ /zla ba kham ba lta bu 'am/ /go che rin chen pad+ma dang/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs su/ /mi 'dra thabs kyi dbyibs bstan pa/ /rgyud rnams
384a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun tu shes par bya/ /tshe bsrid la sogs las la sngags/ /thabs kyi rgya yi tshad rnams kyang/ /khru bzhi khru gsum khru do dang/ /khru gang khru phyed sum cha'o/ /de la sogs pa'i tshad rnams kyang/ /rgyud dang mthun bar shes
384a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /tshon rnams bri ba'i rim pa yang/ /gzhan dang mthun te khyad par ni/ /zhi la dkar te rgyas la ser/ /dbang la dmar po drag la gnag /las ni thams cad thab khung la/ /kha dog lnga char tshang ba'am/ /yang na las kyi skabs dang sbyar/
384a3(rgyud 'grel): las ni thams cad pa yi dbyibs/ /a shwad lo ma lta bu dang/ /pad+ma 'dab gcig lta bu 'am/ /pad+ma kha phye lta bu 'am/ /kha yi ge sar lta bu 'am/ /de sogs gzhung ni mang mos kyang/ /rnal 'byor mos la gtso zhes bya/ /gzar bu mtshan
384a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid bstan pa ne/ /yu ba chad ba lnga yi tshad/ /gzar bu'i skod bu sor bzhi dang/ /mchu yang sor bzhi'i tshad du bya/ /zabs su sor gcig brko ba 'am/ /sor gnyis brko ba so so'i gzhung/ /de ni rab yin 'bring ni phyed/ /tha ma de bas cung
384a5(rgyud 'grel): zad chung/ /khung bu che chung mtshan nyid do/ /yu ba'i tshad ni mnyam zhes bya/ /rgyud gzhan dag la brten nas mi/ /slob dpon gzhan gyis gzhung dag gis/ /yu ba yang ni che chung 'dod/ /snyoms 'jug rgyud la brten nas kyang/ /yur? sor
384a6(rgyud 'grel): ni nyi shu bzhi/ /khung bur brgyar ni sor bzhi la/ /zabs cu sor gnyis kho na ste/ /mchu yang rdo rje rtse gsum dbyibs/ /sor bzhi'i tshul du shes par bya/ /las ni thams cad gzar bu yang/ /pad+ma'i dbyibs sam 'dab ma'i dbyibs/ /mchu
384a7(rgyud 'grel): yang pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra dang/ /a shwang rdo rje'i rnam par ro/ /zhi ba la ni zlu ma po ste/ /rgyas pa la ni grub bzha'o/ /dbang ni zla gam lta bu ste/ /drag po gru gsum rnam par byang/ /dbus su 'khor lo rin chen dang// /
384b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma khro bo rdo rje bri/ /yang na rgyud gzhan dag la brten nas ni/ /slob dpon gzhan dag 'dod gzhung ni/ /sum cha sum cha phri bas su/ /rab 'bring gsum du 'dod pa yin/ /de ni dgang gzar mtshan nyid do/ /brugs gzar mtshan nyid
384b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa ni/ /yu ba chang ba lnga yi tshad/ /khung bur rgyar ni sor gnyis la/ /zabs su sor gcig shes par bya/ /de ni rab yin 'bring ni phyed/ /tham cung zad chung ba'o/ /yang na slob dpen gzhan dag ni/ /mthe bo san mo gang las ni/ /dang
384b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bring gsum ni dbye bar bya'o/ /de rnams se se'i mtshan ma yang/ /geng ma bzhin du shes par bya/ /me lha'i mtshan nyid bstan ba ni/ /ba ba ka zhes bya ba yis/ /zhi ba'i me lha sku mdog dkar/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dag la gnas/ /
384b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i me lha sku mdog ser/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor dag la gnas/ /dbang gi me lha sku mdog dmar/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dag la gnas/ /drag bo'i me lha sku mdog gnag /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dag la gnas/ /de dag kun
384b5(rgyud 'grel): la mthun par ni/ /zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste/ /phyag g.yas dbyug pa mchod sbyin can/ /g.yon pa'i phreng ba ril ba bsnams/ /mi tra zhes pa'i ma lta ni/ /las rnams kun la bsngags pa ste/ /mid pa ring la gzi mdangs can/ /thor
384b6(rgyud 'grel): tshugs ser bo'i spru can la/ /las la rjes mthun kha dog ma/ /dud pa lta bu'i mdog tu ste/ /phyag ni bgrang phreng ril ba ni/ /spyi lu dag ni bsnams pa yin/ /'jig rten pa'i me lha dang/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i me lha dang/ /bcu gnyis
384b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ru rtsa sogs ni/ /rgyud kyi nang du shes par bya/ /'jig rten me lha'i thugs kar ni/ /'jig rten 'das pa bskyed pa dang/ /'jig rten pa ni sbyangs nas kyang/ /dam tshig me lha bskyed pa dang/ /ye shes me lha bskyed pa dang/ /'jig rten
385a1(rgyud 'grel): me lha'i khong pa ru/ /dam tshig me lha bskyed nas kyang/ /ye shes me lha bstim pa 'am/ /'jig rten 'das pa nyid la yang/ /dam tshig bskyed dang ye shes bstim/ /sprul pa'i me lha nyid kyis kyang/ /'jig rten
385a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang mthun pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten pa dang mthun par bstan/ /de la sogs pa'i the tshom dang/ /me nyid cho ga zin pa dang/ /shar lhor mtshams su gnas pa dang/ /me lha'i 'thugs kar bskyed pa dang/ /'bar dang gshegs dang steng
385a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams/ /slob dpon man dag nyid kyis bshad/ /dang pos sa cho ga rjogs byas la/ /de nas thabs kyi cho ga bya/ /de nas rjas rnams rdzogs pa dang/ /mchod yon gyi ni cho ga bstan/ /de rnams bud shing yam shing dang/ /
385a4(rgyud 'grel): bas gra dang dgram pa la sogs kun/ /gzhan dang mthun par shes par bya/ /chos grangs dus dang 'dug stangs dang/ /rgyan cha la sogs pa go ba yang/ /las kyi skabs dang sbyang bar bya/ /bdag nyid lhag pa'i lha bskyed nas/ /
385a5(rgyud 'grel): me lha'i cho ga rgyas par bya/ /me yi cho ga zin nas kyang/ /de nas lha'i cho ga bya/ /tha ma me yi cho gas bsdu/ /me yi rgyas 'debs bzhi po yang/ /bsam dang bcing dang brjod pa gsum/ /bzhi ga ni sbyar bar bya/ /thugs kar rdo rje
385a6(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas kyang/ /lag pa'i sor mo bcings nas kyang/ /g.yas pa 'bar ba lta bur bya/ /sngags ni oM badzra a na la ma hA b+hu ta dzwa la sarba b+ha smi ku ru sarba du Sh+TaM hUM/ /sa ma ya staM sa ma ya staM
385a7(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ lce la rdo rje rtse lnga bsams la/ /oM dzra la dzwa la hUM zhes brjod cing bsam bar bya'o/ /rdo rje rgya gram thugs kar bsams nas/ /phyag mtshan med par bsam zhing/ /bcings ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje rtsa lnga thugs kar
385b1(rgyud 'grel): bsams te/ /phyag mtshan dang bcas shing bsams pa ni/ /phyag rgya chen po'o/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas gdab pa ni/ /bsam pa tsam du 'dod pa yang yod/ /thams cad tshang bar 'dod pa yang yod/ /rgyas 'debs gcig tu 'dod pa yang yo
385b2(rgyud 'grel): tha dag rtog pa med pas su/ /ji ltar mos pa gco bor bya/ /dbang bskur la yang de bzhin no/ /me lha'i bstod pa bya ba yang/ /gzi brjid chen po me yi lha/ /bdag gzhan don grub sa la gnas/ /'dod pa thams cad scol mdzad pa/ /
385b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jin byed me lha nyid la 'dud/ /me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog/ /bskal pa'i me dpung gzi brjid 'bar/ /nyon mongs thams cad sreg pa'i mchog/ /ye shes me lha khyod la 'dud/ /me lha rnams kyi gtso chen po/ /'khor rnams 'dul
385b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing skyod mdzad pa/ /dug rnams 'joms shing mthu ldan pa/ /dug 'joms sman pa khyod la 'dud/ /me lha'i rgyal po gzi brjid can/ /'gro ba mi mthun la gdul slang du/ /'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs ston pa/ /las rnams kun
385b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad khod la 'dud/ /da ni thun mong gi bstod pa'o/ /khyad par gyi bstod pa ni rgyud du shes par bya'o/ /sbyin sreg gi las kyis rim pa ste bzhi pa'o// //dang po yi ni rnal 'byor dang/ /rdo rje slob dpon byid
385b6(rgyud 'grel): bas su/ /bdag gzhan tshogs ni bsags ba'i phyir/ /slob dpon la ni srog lus dang/ /yul zhing sno bran chung mar bcas/ /sgyu ma'i sems kyi phul nas su/ /yang dang yang du? gsol btab la/ /man ngag las kyi rim pa 'di/ /nyams su
385b7(rgyud 'grel): bla ma zhing the tshom bcad/ /de nas gzhung bzhin spyad par bya/ /de ltar byas na nges par ni/ /dngos grub rnam gnyis thob par bgyur/ /drang ba'i don ni ma yin no/ /de ltar mi byed ser sna can/ /bdag 'dzin dam po gzung nas su/ /slob dpon
386a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par mi 'gyur te/ slob dpon mnyes par ma gyur na/ /dbang dang man dag thob mi 'gyur/ /yang na man ngag thob nas kyang/ /slob dpon
386a2(rgyud 'grel): la ni rgyab kyi phyogs/ /dam tshig med pa'i nyams pa ste/ /rdo rje da myal bar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /de nas rang gi rgyud rtags la/ /skyon de yod na spang bar bya'o/ /bdag gi 'gro
386a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don du ni/ /cho ga 'di brtsams dge ba yis/ /bdag dang mdza' yas sems can rnam /bla med byang chub thob par shog/ //rdo rje las kyi
386a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rim par phye ba'i cho ga /slob dpon b+ha ba bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo lo tsA ba khu ba pir ya dang/ /dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab ba lags so// //bkra shis/ zhal dro'o//
